recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Enhance capability to modify tickets after preprinted for customers on location will call use. Basically, add customers name via the online system

title: Top-of-the-line Ticketing Software
name: Taylor M.
comments: Comments: I've had the benefit of working with this software at two organizations in different locals; this is by far the most flexible and powerful ticketing system I have seen thus far! The versatility offered by the AudienceView platform makes it good solution for Arts, Athletics, and Academic ticketing needs, as well as more complex ticketing events such as large-scale concerts, commencement ceremonies, and even film festivals. The built-in correspondence tool is a strong component of the product offering and is something my organization has come to rely on. It has allowed us to develop a more frequent, targeted relationship with our customers through-out the ticketing experience. It also works in unison with the membership tool, which can be configured to handle our subscriptions, memberships, ticket passes/packages, and more. Once our guests have enjoyed the event we're presenting, the software has a diverse set of reporting tools that can isolate and refine our data - the sky is the limit. One last important tool to note is the online content management tool. We operate multiple white-label branded websites from the system with ease.

title: Highly customizable software meets the needs of our unique organization.
name: Bethany N.
comments: Comments: AudienceView has allowed our Off-Broadway theater and subsidiary ticketing company to customize a one-of-a-kind CRM system. Due to the unique structure of our business, we have worked closely with the team at AudienceView to harness the product to great success. The flexibility of the application along with the integrated email marketing tool are just a sample of the strengths that this product has to offer. Our organization highly values the amount of data that can be collected and stored on our customers. This allows us to research and target specific segments without leaving the application.

title: AudienceView meets the needs of our university
name: Ryan G.
comments: Comments: AudienceView is a great platform that meets the needs of our university.

title: AV is very user friendly, easy to learn, and a powerful resource to assist your organization.
name: Zach D.
comments: Comments: AudienceView has been an extremely powerful tool for us. While our main goal is to sell tickets, we are also able to sell merchandise, accept donations, and integrate AV with other department's software to get accurate data transmitted each day. Not only is it beneficial to our Sales & Service office; Marketing staff can easily access sales reports and our Development officers can get a quick biography of a donor or prospect while also having the ability to view their ticket history.

title: My favorite thing about AudienceView is how configurable it is for different types of sales.
name: Sarah S.
comments: Comments: I have been using AudienceView since 2009. I like how I can change most settings to be specific to my needs and how I can filter information for all of the users who sell within the system. It is easy to train users because i can really lock down what they can and cannot do depending on their expertise. AudienceView has also been able to accommodate new sales initiatives as they come up which helps increase revenue and respond to upper management requests.

title: To many steps to get one thing done
name: Verified Reviewer
comments: Comments: I have been using AudienceView since 2009. I like how I can change most settings to be specific to my needs and how I can filter information for all of the users who sell within the system. It is easy to train users because i can really lock down what they can and cannot do depending on their expertise. AudienceView has also been able to accommodate new sales initiatives as they come up which helps increase revenue and respond to upper management requests.
pros: Pros: I like how it is all online. I am able to access it anywhere and fix something.
cons: Cons: You have to go through so many steps to get one thing done. We use this to sell tickets for our patrons and when I want to set them up with tickets, I have to go through 10 different steps to get to the person. Then when you get the show selected, need to make sure you always click the "update" button or it messes the whole order up. Just needs to simplify some of the steps to get the process done smoother

title: Amazing Product
name: Brandi G.
pros:
Pros:

We were looking for an affordable and easy to use mobile bidding auction program and this one did not disappoint. The company sends a representative to the auction to basically be the point person and fix anything that might come up and help with check in, entering data, etc. They show up early and stay through the event. They bring tablets that are easy to use for our volunteers and staff.

Entering items and bidders is easy and functional. Your event can go live as soon as you'd like it to so that even donors that can't attend the night of, can bid on items. This increases revenue tremendously. They also helped us with not having small items but focusing on larger items of value and only having around 100-150 silent items. The colorful pictures and descriptions are easy to view on mobile devices. And if guests don't have a smart phone, we can help them bid on our tablets.

Guests receive notification of being outbid, but you can add am amount you are willing to pay and Gesture will continue bidding on your behalf until the amount is reached.

Guests are also able to check out from their device, so it makes check out a lot faster and smoother.

It is a lot easier to collect on balances as well because we collect credit card information before the event.

Guests received notification of being outbid, but you can add am amount you are willing to pay and Gesture will continue bidding on your behalf until the amount is reached.
cons: Cons: If the tablets go down at check in, it pretty much puts everything at a stand still. Even though the tablets run without wi-fi.
overall: Overall: Most of our donors and guests loved the new aspect of our Auction, including switching to mobile bidding/checking in and out. Instead of the previous years of pen and paper bidding. There were only a few people that preferred the old method and just couldn't seem to get on bored. People were concerned that guests would be on their phones all night and no one would be interacting but it was quite the opposite. People had more time to mingle not having to go back and check the paper bid sheets since there were none.

title: Gesture is the real deal for mobile fundraising; intuitive to use, with great customer support.
name: Anne S.
pros: Pros: The software is intuitive to use and streamlines so many of the processes that eat up your time when you have to do them manually; we eliminated so many Excel spreadsheets, thanks to everything being easily captured, managed, and tracked right within the software - from auction packages to ticket sales to even the seating and meal requests.
cons: Cons: Since our event is coordinated by a mix of paid staff and volunteers, it would be helpful to have an administrative access level in Gesture that is "view only" - currently, it's all (full admin rights) or nothing.

title: The software is easy to use and provides a seamless experience for our staff and event guests.
name: Annie P.
position: Manager of Special Events & Annual Giving
pros: Pros: The software is easy to use. It's intuitive and easy to navigate. It makes my job as an event manager much easier. Adding auction items, auction close out, and financial reporting are a breeze. It is also a smooth process for our guests. Bidding on auction items or making a donation is very easy for them, which means more donations for our cause. We set up our auction online in advance of the event. This gives guests an opportunity to start bidding on silent items, and become familiar with live auction items. All of this leads to more revenue to support our mission. I also appreciate the ability to customize our site so it looks like us. This creates a cohesive experience for our guests and helps us put our brand front and center. As a site administrator, I love the ability to download the generated auction sheets. This is a huge time saver. We also download the receipts and send to guests with a thank you letter after the event. It calculates the tax deductibility automatically on the receipt which is an essential feature.
cons: Cons: There are a few custom queries/reports I would like which are not currently offered. It can be confusing as an admin to see clearly what funds have been paid and not paid. However, the staff are great and have helped me figure things out. They even created a custom report for me.

title: Excellent customer service and product was perfect for our 250 person fundraiser!
name: Allison P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Very easy to navigate the dashboard to build fundraising website and to upload pictures and descriptions of auction items. Bidders loved how easy it was to register for the silent auction, and we benefitted greatly from launching the website and opening the auction prior to the event. There were many easy tutorials for our volunteers to watch so that they could get comfortable with the online bidding system, and they were well equipped to handle questions from guests. We benefitted greatly from having an onsite specialist with us at the event. She was extremely professional, smart, highly capable and knowledgeable about the software, and she worked nimbly and confidently throughout the night to answer any questions and even offered suggestions that contributed significantly to the success of our auction - and on top of that, she was very enjoyable to be with! After the event, we were able to easily close our books and to process all payments (a significant improvement from many years of dealing with cash and checks and tracking down payments) and to run reports providing incredible data for us to review and learn from.
cons: Cons: I cannot think of anything to improve this software. It was perfect for our event - simple to use and very geared toward serving a volunteer-based event!
overall: Overall: Streamlined auction process before, during and after event. We went "paperless" and didn't have to fuss with paper bidding forms and associated headaches. We raised more than $10,000 more than we ever raised before using an online bidding system. We look forward to using again next year!

title: Amazing event support
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easily create auction website to link to your website. Bidders receive texts when they have been outbidded. You are able to create endless silent and live auction items for your page. Event support is so responsive and you are able to customize your support needs for in state and out of state events. Their team arrive to your event with ipads to complete donor bidder profiles on site. They will come to your booth in exhibit hall and encourage people to register for bidding. They are super friendly and outgoing and are great as live auction spotters. They raise far more than their cost and double our giving. You are able to even enter in different pledge amounts as donation items on the auction site.
cons: Cons: They are a little costly however it's worth it for a smooth, successful event. I do wish the website was a little more attractive and grouped the silent and live items together. The items appear kind of small and cramped together.
overall: Overall: GiveSmart provides much needed day of event support as well as an easy to use interface for auction bidding. Reporting has helped ease the closeout process and assure everyone receives their items and we receive payment. They send continuous follow-up to donors for payment post event. You also have access to crowdfunding for 6 months after your event has ended.

title: HIGHLY satisfied customer for over 5 years now. Amazing customer support!
name: Kenneth M.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, customize and edit and update. Features offered have improved each year we have contracted with Givesmart. "One stop shopping" for event and auction management. We have utilized more features each year. What started as just utilizing auction management capability with limited effort into making the online auction site attractive has evolved to guest ticketing, table assignments, a highly customized auction site that reflects the event theme and with real time auction progress and bids scrolling on large screen ad televisions throughout the event venue to increase people's competitive bidding nature. After action information has been vital to determining what auction items had the most interests and highest profit margin. Has enabled us to better focus solicitation efforts for the next year.
cons: Cons: Really very few cons for the software. Only limitation observed was limited printing options for auction item description for printing on card stock. There needs to be several options for the size and information/photo of the descriptive card tents.
overall: Overall: Nearly full event management by using this software.

title: Gesture offers excellent professional software with outstanding customer service.
name: Crystal P.
pros: Pros: Gesture's software is user-friendly, fun to utilize and has a clean, professional look. I thoroughly appreciate Gesture's frequent software updates. They are continuously in search of even better ways to improve upon the customer experience, which they communicate through their Gesture Innovation Center emails. I believe that they value customer opinions and implement suggestions, accordingly. As an event planner, other companies often approach me, but none offer the experience Gesture has given my clients over the years. Our account manager, Allie Erickson is on top of our every need, patient, accessible, friendly and helpful. Our on-site manager is thoughtful, communicative, professional and kind. The Gesture team is trustworthy, diligent and fully dedicated to their customers. Every year, our attendees highly rate Gesture in our post-event survey. We have remained loyal to Gesture for many years and will continue for many more to come.
cons: Cons: I would like to remain logged onto the system longer, but I understand that the system logs me off for security purposes. I really don't have any complaints.

title: Worth the investment to skyrocket your event fundraising!
name: Meghan G.
pros: Pros: Ultimately, it has very clear ROI for the agency. The transition from paper building to mobile has drastically increased our pre-event and day of event fundraising. My favorite part about the software is the increase in funds collected the night of the event. It was incredibly unfortunately how much staff time we had to dedicate post event to collecting money, for many of our events we not have 100% funds collected the night of the event, which frees our staff up to focus on thanking donors. Lastly, the interface is very easy to understand and navigate. We have a number of events that have more mature attendees, who were skeptical when we began to make the transition from paper to electronic. After one use they all required we use the technology at future events. This is also a credit to the Gesture onsite staff who really meet the attendees where they are at and give extra attention when needed!
cons: Cons: I guess my comments would be both a pro and a con. The fact that Gesture is constantly evolving and improving the technology it can sometimes be hard to keep up with all of the current offerings and capabilities as a client. This is one of many vendors you work with so it can be hard to keep yourself educated. Although, this is when you really rely on your account manager to relay this information to you, which our, representtaive, does a wonderful job.

title: I think the staff at Gesture are wonderful!
name: Heather D.
pros: Pros: I love the ability to add photos, descriptions, bid, buy it now pricing, and much more all in a single entry of an item. I also really like the ease in which bidders can participate, get alerts, and have knowledge of their purchases. Finally, the added bonus of a PR team to work with was an extra perk I was not expecting!
cons: Cons: There are certain gaps in the software we have discovered such as: Nowhere to record solicitors such as staff, committee, or Board member who was responsible for bringing in the item; Nowhere to record an individual's name associated with a company in donor details; Nowhere to record details for pledged item, such as when it will be delivered, staff pick-up needs, etc.; Need to have ability to check box if donor has already received thank you for their contributions (such as when it went unsold at a past event and is being used again); Non-transferrable input from one event to another such as donor information. I also have major concerns over the software abilities to capture donations during the ask. There is simply no way to ensure those that raise their hands, are actually hitting the button to donate that is texted to them.
overall: Overall: During this first year in using the software, I saw the additional benefit of securing bids in advance of opening the auction. This started us out thousands of dollars ahead of where we would have traditionally began at the event.

title: My experience with the gesture site was easy, worry and stress free.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The gesture software is very easy to learn. I am new to the website and it only took me about an hour to figure everything out. Everything is pretty self explanatory. I had to create an auction site for a silent and live auction. Adding each item came with ease. When you go to add an item each section is categorized telling you exactly what information to put in. I also found it very easy to go back and change things if I had made a mistake. The site is easy for others to use and view the auction items I posted. I felt that the crowd we were trying to attract was the older generation of people and this site allowed them to have the ability to see each item without complication. I really liked that the software told you who was watching certain items. It was easy to generate an item sheet in order to print them out and post them for our auction.
cons: Cons: I think my least favorite thing about this software is trying to figure out when someone bids higher than you and who it is. I found that I had trouble when I bid on an item. My friend and I really wanted an item and we kept out bidding each other but didn't realize we were the only two bidding. I wish it would tell you who is bidding against yo.
overall: Overall: I had a wonderful experience with this software. I found it was easy to make my own auction site.

title: Good event fundraising and mobile bidding solution
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We have used this software for two years now for our annual charity golf outing. It's a fantastic tool for mobile bidding at auctions and overall "day-of-event" fundraising. Easy to use and navigate. In addition to the software, you get actual people that run the software the day of the event.
cons: Cons: One challenge I have found is that the information from last year's event doesn't carry over to the next year. Since we typically get a lot of the same donors, I have to re-enter donors from scratch instead of having the system "remember" them from last year.
overall: Overall: Good overall experience, we will use them again next year. Custom service for the software is very responsive. Most of the people they send to the event are very polite and professional, but we have had a couple of people that have not been the best at representing our organization.

title: Great company, easy to use, lots of great features!
name: Karen H.
pros: Pros: I love that you can generate reports (I use Excel) with information you need for money raised on tickets-silent-live-raffle items, $ raised by donor, FMV vs what was donated for tax purposes, and the list goes on. The spreadsheets can be sorted as you like for your purposes. I also like the messaging. You can send out text messages to your guests for reminders like auction open for bidding, parking, auction closing, links to photos post event, etc. You can also generate tax letters from the site. A lot of great features!
cons: Cons: The only thing I wish it could do is generate tax letters for each guest separately. If you need to make a change for one guest, you have to generate all letters as they go into a single PDF file. You can't just generate them for one guest. Not a major problem, just wish it was a feature. Overall it is a great system!
overall: Overall: I have been able to generate reports that I need for sharing with my committee and for tax letters. Also, the on-line bidding system is a favorite of our guests. I love the messaging too. It allows me to send messages to my guests pre, during, and post event.

title: BEST ONLINE AUCTION RESOURCE OUT THERE
name: Kenneth M.
pros: Pros: Customer service is INCREDIBLE. The organizations has utilized GiveSmart for 4 years and has never had an issue. When they assign an event representative to you, you can be assured that any question you may have in setting up the auction site or any technical problems that you may have will be resolved immediately by the assigned rep or they will ensure that they find the right person to correct the issue or answer the question if they cannot immediately help. In addition to the auction management, their pacakge allows for FULL event management; everything from
cons: Cons: Cost of using the service would be the only negative, and not really a negative because their costs are actually lower than some other options that the organization looked into.
overall: Overall: Cannot sing their praises more. If you want to go with a group that honestly cares about wanting to make your event a success, use GiveSmart.

title: Gesture use for our annaul Gala
name: Angel Q.
comments: Comments: Aside from the comprehensive report, everything else with gestures was fairly simple and easy to use. The staff from gestures that helped during the event was knowledgeable and able to help and respond quickly and effectively during the event went on which made it less chaotic feeling for us.
pros: Pros: I love that gesture was easy for our guests to use at our gala. We used it for check in and the process was simple and easy to understand for our volunteers at registration to find info. We used it for our silent auction and guests were able to see the items from their phones and bid very easily and they received notices when they were outbid or when they won. We used it for general donations, selling centerpieces, and checkout. Overall pretty easy to use during the event.
cons: Cons: During the check in process we were unable to search by table number which would have been helpful because sometimes we are asked who is sitting at a certain table and it would be nice to look up by table. Also after the event we needed specific reports to be able to input all of the money we received and record all of the info and gestures did not yet have one comprehensive report to give us what we needed, instead I had to modify and combine several reports to make it work for our needs.

title: We've enjoyed working with Gesture, the customer service is outstanding and the site is easy to use!
name: Emily G.
pros: Pros: The site is easy to navigate, the customer service is friendly and attentive, we like the different features like being able to text guests at the event, the site is clean and modern looking, being able to insert sponsor ads throughout the page is great, and the onsite coordinators were a life saver! We also enjoyed the categories options for items and the ease of creating and managing the tickets portal.
cons: Cons: Some of the features like not being able to manage donations made pre-event and the donation thermometer is lack luster. We went from doing a paddle raise to doing all mobile donations and did not feel the thermometer display was as exciting or captured the attention of guests. We did not realize until the night of the event that in order to show progress in the thermometer we had to keep refreshing the page. Just not what we were expecting.
overall: Overall: Ease of ticket sales and managing all of our fundraising items including silent auction, games, and donations.

title: Gesture helped to organize our large event planning and provided great customer service.
name: Mary D.
pros: Pros: The software allowed us to get rid of excel sheets and a separate ticketing vendor. We like the auction capabilities and simplicity of use. We like that Gesture makes enhancements and improvements based on user feedback. We like the ability to use the helpdesk chat function when we have a question. We like the dashboard and reports. Unrelated to software , but a nice customer service perk is that you have a rep designated to you.
cons:
Cons: A few improvements can be made (as with any software) and when I suggest them, they are escalated.

I have been very pleased over the years and plan to continue to use Gesture.
overall: Overall: I have recommended this product to quite a few non profits for the ease of use and the fact that it combines several event planning tasks into one platform.

title: Such an upgrade from doing an auction on paper. Can't believe we waited so long to make the switch.
name: Ben S.
pros: Pros: Having used this 3 years now, I appreciate being able to access previous years' info and descriptions. The reporting functionality is fantastic and I love being able to see results in real time.
cons:
Cons: 1. I wish we could have several screens for the same item. Silent Auction packages are sometimes made up of a few items and it would be nice to showcase those items visually on more than one available page.

2. Similarly, the automated process of creating table tents/placards for your project is not ideal. The available space for an image is too small, as is font size. You don't want people squinting at your package descriptions.
overall: Overall: Ease of use and real time results. Also having GiveSmart employees at the event.

title: The technology allows us to run great auctions and easy registration.
name: Judi S.
pros: Pros: It makes every aspect of running the inside logistics so much easier. Auctions raise more money, texting keeps all communications flowing and ultimately drives revenue.
cons: Cons: There's still some room to grow and some features that can be implemented that would be so helpful.

title: Software is easy to learn and use. My team felt good support. Dashboard is very motivating
name: Monica C.
pros: Pros: We love the dashboard. It's incredibly motivating to see our progress as the event unfolds. We also can compare last year's dashboard to this years and know where we need to step it up. The second best feature are the sponsor ads. We like how they are not only on the homepage but integrated through the software.
cons: Cons: Limited design capability and limited selection on display board that we used for Fund the Need. We thought sponsors names would appear after they hit the donate button, but names kept coming alphabetically.
overall: Overall: Great tracking of donors and donations; an easy and effective platform to highlight sponsors of our event; a great summary of our night.

title: Great experience with Gesture from start to finish. A few glitches but overall, great!
name: Barbara S.
pros: Pros: Ease of use setting up the site with important information. Also, inputting registrants who pay with a check. Honestly, just about everything or we would not have used Gesture for a second time. Support was fantastic!
cons: Cons: Online Help! Difficult to navigate when in a hurry, too many screens to go through, need to print help or have a download capability such as a User Manual especially for new people. This might seem trite but the blue "Help" button is in the way when trying to work with a list or read a screen. Keep it at the top and turn it blue. Some of the dashboard items are difficult to get the right reports out of.

title: Great product, great people.
name: Jill K.
position: Director of Advancement and Community Relations
pros: Pros: The best thing about Gesture are the people who work there! We LOVE our account rep - she is super responsive. The folks that come out to work the auction are always wonderful too. The extra staff support is essential to our event! I also think the interface is very user-friendly and not overly complicated.
cons: Cons: I wish there were an easier way to do a mass photo upload for items, and I wish that items said SOLD instead of CLOSED when they are purchased outright, and that they said NOT OPEN FOR BIDDING if they are something being auctioned in the future.
overall: Overall: It makes my online auction much easier.

title: Easy to use for the most part!
name: Hailley F.
pros: Pros: I train on-site staff with GiveSmart weekly, and the software is usually very easy for them to pick up and use, which makes my life a lot easier! There are lots of reports available for the client as well.
cons: Cons: There are some needed features that myself and my colleagues have requested, such as: ability to check in 2 guests at once, easier way to add credit card to guests that are already checked it, etc. Hopefully these features will be rolled out soon.

title: Gesture made our event more successful due to the right balance of technology & customer service.
name: Robert K.
pros: Pros: Ease of use and Dashboard-as well as as detail when I needed to review it. The "live" feature si amazing as well as ability to adjust prices, text messages,etc to gain funds.
cons: Cons: That I didn't invent it. Seriously, we had user issues when we logged in as we had three administrators. Hence, when each wanted to bid, they forgot to switch to donor- an easy fix- but we missed that in training. Gesture solved it easily.
overall: Overall: Breakout of where sales came form/who won what/I could call the winners easily.

title: We love Gesture - it is great! Easy to use, great onsite teams and it helps you raise more money.
name: Kyla M.
pros: Pros: From a guest perspective, it's easy to use, the onsite staff is helpful and it makes bidding quick and fun. From an adminstrator perspective, entering items is user-friendly, the software takes much of the manual work outu of your auction and the Gesture team makes sure you're supported throughout the whole process. The best part is that you can open your auction before your event begins, so you're making money before a guest has even arrived!

title: Mobile bidding is a great component to running a silent auction.
name: Cheri H.
pros: Pros: Love the ease and user-friendly app. Also, our first year utilizing the mobile app netted us a 20 percent increase In auction revenue. Our guests love the option to bid two weeks prior to the event as well as sitting in their chairs during the event bidding on items.
cons: Cons: There are no cons. This product is well worth the money! The system is easy to understand and operate.
overall: Overall: For the past two years, since utilizing the service, our revenues have increased by 20-35%.

title: My experience with Gesture has been nothing but positive.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love the fact that the Auction is not limited to those who are physically at the event. The fact that there is a website that allows ANYONE to bid on auction items widens our bandwidth and allows for a much higher return. Additionally, the customer service is always impeccable. They are willing to answer any question or jump on a conference call to discuss questions or concerns and they always make sure to accommodate our needs.

title: The Gestures site is easy to use.
name: Debbie M.
pros: Pros: The customer support is great and always available. The reports produced by the software are very helpful in making decisions for the future of our events.
cons: Cons: Some of the functionality is a bit cumbersome as in changing labels for items that are "out of the ordinary" realm.
overall: Overall: This software has streamlined our event process making report processes to our Board and Committees easier and better organized. Most of all the reports have helped us to determine how to make the event better from year to year.

title: Give Smart goes above and beyond to ensure all needs of the customer are met.
name: Anne C.
pros: Pros: Give Smart is always working to improve their software to keep up with the latest trends. Give Smart listens to the customer's needs and requests. The post event reporting gives us a great picture of our donors so that we can continue to make changes and adapt our events so we can raise as much money as possible.
cons: Cons: It would be extremely beneficial to have mailing address required on all elements of the site. Mailing address is crucial to us in order to thank our donors appropriately. This year, the Give Smart team worked with us to help us collect addresses when our guests were registering for the auction online the week leading up to the event, but we would love to see mailing address as a required field for the registration process also.

title: Excellent support, fantastic employees and great experience.
name: Ron L.
position: Co-Chair of our Annual Dinner Auction
pros: Pros: The software is so easy to use, from a loading standpoint to the night of the event. Changes made easily from the cell phone. Really good software.
cons: Cons: I have nothing negative to say. I did ask to add a report that would identify items during our event that were at a certain percent under fmv so that could be sent out, but it's very good software.
overall: Overall: Easy setup, quick additions, and edits, and instant results after the event. Great reporting is available also.

title: It's been easy and there has been a lot of support.
name: Heather O.
pros: Pros: The reports, how easy it is to look up what im looking for (a particular guest, an item, ticket sales etc)
cons: Cons: There isn't a lot of flexibility in the event page site. I don't like that you can't easily see how many of each ticket type has been sold. There is no easy way to make nice looking bid display sheets.
overall: Overall: Increased our revenue for silent auction, made check in and check out easy for our event, allowed us to grow our event with the support staff

title: Perfect Program for Auctions
name: Adam M.
pros: Pros: This program is great for our school auction. From set-up to closing the event, you have a lot of great features and tools to promote the event and get guests excited about giving.
cons: Cons: When you need to send a donation letter to a donor, you can't customize the letter to fit your organization's needs. I've used other programs that allow this customization, but GiveSmart doesn't have that.

title: Great for multiple areas of events especially registration and auction purposes
name: Angel Q.
comments: Comments: Overall I do like the ease that gestures brings to our events. We have worked with other software like bid pal in the past and I prefer gestures as they have easier and more fluid capabilities for what we need.
pros: Pros: The ease of registration is refreshing. They have staff that assists along side our staff and have made event check in/out a seamless process
cons: Cons: Custom reports are a little more difficult. The company was able to work with us and create what we needed but it would be nice if we were able to access the reports any time and pull info we need on our end instead of waiting for custom reports.

title: I think this was our 4th or 5th year with Give Smart. It has been a great tool to use for our auctio
name: Doug T.
pros: Pros: it is easy for me to use to develop our dash board and entering all the auction items. It is also easy for our guest to use their phones to bid and teh quick feedback. It also makes the check out of auction items go smoothly.
cons: Cons: I can't think of any. We have used Give Smart for the past 4 or 5 years and have really like the product and there staff.
overall: Overall: I think we raised more money because we have it.

title: A great fundraising tool!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's an incredible fundraising tool and has grown our fundraising efforts through online ticket sales, online auction, and donation ask.
cons: Cons: I wish there was an app the guests could download and use year after year. The current platform is not difficult but I wonder if an app would be easier to navigate and store donor information.

title: Our experience has been great!
name: Jinger R.
pros: Pros: The reports, the ability to learn as you go. Ease of use. Clarity and uploads. Ease of use for our donors. Mobile bidding has helped increased fund raising.
cons: Cons: Regardless of the quality of the pictures we upload they are not good quality on the mobile application.
overall: Overall: Increased funding, donor information, reports and ability to view at a glance who donates, what they donate etc.

title: software is very easy to use, excellent for collecting payment at checkout
name: Courtney A.
pros: Pros: The fact that we have people there to help facilitate check in and check out was really beneficial for our event. It helped ensure that our guests would be paying by the end of the night and the extra helped also help take pressure off of our team to tend to the other auction logistics.
cons: Cons: I think the fact that you cannot upload a picture with the quick add is a little annoying and sort of defeats the purpose of adding multiple items at one time since you still have to go back and adjust the picture.

title: Easy-to-use mobile bidding platform
name: Mandy D.
comments: Comments: Overall a great product--and so critical to a successful silent auction!
pros: Pros: Text to bid and online auction capabilities. Bidders receive text messages when they are outbid on items. You can also set up instant purchases, text to donate, or purchase raffle tickets. You can now customize the online website to your organization or event colors, logo and information. Great customer support.
cons: Cons: You do need to encourage attendees to register BEFORE the event, otherwise, it can bottleneck as people arrive.

title: Great, Easy to Use Program
name: Aaron M.
position: Director of Annual Giving and Stewardship
pros: Pros: We can easily set up online auction items. Bids are easily tracked within the system. Bidders can easily place bids from their computer or mobile devices.
cons: Cons: Exporting a report with user data (email, phone, etc.) is somewhat complicated.
overall: Overall: We use GiveSmart for our annual live and silent auction. Their on-site are very professional and knowledgable.

title: Great platform to do everything for your event in one place. Customer support was comprehensive.
name: Kristine W.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and comprehensive from ticket sales, sponsorships, donations, and online auction. The support staff is also very good, knowledgeable, and provides support from pre-planning, to planning, and post-event.
cons: Cons: Still limited in customizing certain elements, such as website elements and bid sheets, but is not a deal breaker!

title: GiveSmart for auctions
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Very easy to use interface. For registration, was very efficient and helped keep our lines moving. For auction, extremely easy for silent auction check-out.
cons: Cons: Might build in a mechanism that will recognize dupe CC entered for registrants. We had Guest X check-in with his CC and then Guest Y checked in and somehow he was checked in by mistake with Guest X's CC. Post-gala had to refund Guest X and charge Guest Y.
overall: Overall: Easy to use, great interface, and exceptional customer service!

title: Gesture has helped make day of customer service smoother and check out quicker.
name: Amelia D.
pros: Pros: The software is easy to use to update auction items and see how things are tracking during the event.
cons: Cons: There were older reports that we were sent which were easier to use to reconcile sales and use with QuickBooks and Raiser's Edge. The visual part is nice online, but reports are not as broken out and usable as before.

title: Gesture is a very responsive and helpful company.
name: Beth S.
pros: Pros: The ticketing and auction aspects of the software are easy to set up and change and it provides the guests at our events with a great experience.
cons: Cons: Some of the reports are a little difficult to use and there should be a bit more flexibility when sponsorships are offered on line.

title: Gesture Review
name: Michele P.
pros: Pros: This product is great for silent auctions for fundraising events. Making changes (text content) even after your event goes lives, take merely moments and so efficient. If you have any questions, customer service is available via phone or email with fast responses.
cons: Cons: Limitations, meaning you have to contact your rep fairly often due to restrictions with rotations or changes to any images under your account.

title: Great to work with
name: Meghan G.
pros: Pros: It is the best auction technology I've ever worked within. They are also constantly making it better for their clients.
cons: Cons: Their onsite staff can be hit or miss sometimes. If you talk to your manager about having experienced staff, they will accommodate.

title: Outstanding
name: Gail C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The ease of loading images and descriptions. Customer support and training was excellent as was on-site, day of support.
cons: Cons: Character limitations on certain fields. It would have been helpful to have a comment about the fact that no decimal points should be used when entering dollar amounts in FMV, opening bid, etc.
overall: Overall: Ease of registration, implementation, overall ease for our guests and check out was super easy!

title: Satisfies the need
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This interface clearly satisfies the need for fundraising events tickets/sales, auction, and more.
cons: Cons: The creativity is very limited and the website is boxy. The customer service is also lack luster.

title: Great experience. But didn't like how everything went the day of
name: Gianna D.
pros: Pros: How easy it is to use! I love that a lot of Organizations are using it so it's easy to understand when I'm going to other functions. Another feature would be that I could print all sheets for all the items . This is a huge help and time saver . It's also great to be able to call your manger at all times
cons: Cons: Showing the value on all items or none . Wish you can pick and choose . I didn't like that the manger I spoke with wasn't at event . I feel like having someone you worked with should be at event not just anyone . Had a tough time with that.

title: Easy site to work with and very helpful emloyees.
name: Shannon F.
pros: Pros: This software is very user friendly on both macs and pcs and on mobile phones. I have taught everyone from millennial to those who are 80+ use this software and they all comment on how wonderful and easy it is to use!

title: Site is to manage and get other user trained.
name: Ruben N.
pros: Pros: The ability to send out notifications on silent auction readiness for bids. Dashboard is perfect when needing to know exact dollar amount raised.
cons: Cons: Item sheets need some work on spacing and layout. No other real issues other than bid sheets. Once fixed there will be no cons.
overall: Overall: With another year with this software we seen an increase in our silent auction bids.

title: Our first experience with Gesture was excellent. The support was professional and helpful.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The entry of the items, though time consuming, was all made worth it by how much easier the event became. Gesture turned check out from a logistical stress-filled nightmare into an easy, clean experience.
cons: Cons: The reports available could use some upgrades. Item donations should be able to be listed on the same receipt as check out if the user is linked to save extra paperwork.
overall: Overall: This is a time-saving device for an auction team. Closing out bidding is an ease and done instantly.

title: The folks are Gesture are amazing!! Any and all questions are answered right away, very responsive.
name: Nubia H.
pros: Pros: It's very GUI, easy to use and manipulate. Reporting function is instant which is a plus. Simple enough that an intern can assist with alot of the inputting (which saves me time!).
cons: Cons: Character limits for auction items could be longer. There aren't really any other things that i would change.

title: Easy to work with - gets all of the info the client wants
name: steve s.
pros: Pros: It is efficient and provides many different pieces of information that is needed - easy to access and find the answers for the client
overall: Overall: How much information it provides me and the client

title: Used For Event Registration and Silent Auction
name: Matthew M.
comments: Comments: We used Gesture for our main fundraising event. I believe it paid for itself with its silent auction mobile bidding functionality, but we would not get that kind of ROI with our smaller events, so it's too expensive to use more than once per year.
pros: Pros: Communication during implementation was great. Excellent interface. Mobile bidding was a hit with our guests.
cons: Cons: We'd use it for most of our events if the pricing wasn't on a per-event basis. We'd love to see a subscription-based pricing model.

title: I love working with Gestues. The system is easy to use with wonderful reports.
name: Karen P.
pros: Pros: The ease of checkout, bidding and loading items. The reporting and dashboard after the event are amazing.
overall: Overall: All our data is documented and easily retrieved.

title: Wonderful company to work with!
name: Beonca C.
pros: Pros: The user interface was a great experience for our bidders while the backend of the platform was simple and easy for our staff to navigate and use. The Gesture staff was awesome! They were always there to answer any questions every step of the way.
cons: Cons: While the current photo process is very simple, I would like to see an automatic pairing of photos with items when doing a mass upload of items into the system instead of adding each individually.

title: So grateful to you for their excellent support throughout the whole process! Easy to use system too!
name: Lauren D.
pros: Pros: Easy to set up website ! We also like having the extension GiveSmart staff at our event! The ability to do a mass upload of our items is very helpful.
cons: Cons: Leader board options for one specific item - like paddle raise. The landing website isn't as flexible as we need sometimes.

title: We utilized Gesture for the first time at our June 10, 2017 Hangar Party silent auction.
name: Sue W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Our auction checkout was incredibly easy for us and our guests. We did not have to follow up post event to collect from bidders who left without confirming if they had won an item. The auction results reporting saved hours of manual calculation.
cons: Cons: While the sign making function is a big time saver, the printed signs were not as visually impactful as those we had previously designed. The formatting could be improved.
overall: Overall: Gesture greatly improved the productivity of our auction administration. With their great customer support, we were able to launch the software within a month of our event. By allowing guests to preregister, checkout was a breeze for guests and our staff. Guests could spend more time visiting with others without the need to run and check their bids. While their is a learning curve for all, we feel that mobile bidding is the wave of the future.

title: We had a great experience with our account manager and the system helped us capture what we needed.
name: Blaise J.
pros: Pros: We like the capability of on site event live donations and the ease of use for our guests for the acution
cons: Cons: We think the ticketing piece can be improved upon as well as the security with the personal link for suction bidding that is sent to the user.

title: This software has enabled us to take our fundraising event to a new level.
name: Brenda F.
pros: Pros: Ease of check out at the event , promotion of auction items, collection of funds. Having Gesture staff at our event is very valuable.
cons: Cons: Would like easier ability to email to our database using the site . Would like to be able to sort and organize options for donations on the front page of the site.
overall: Overall: We are very pleased and will continue to use the software for our future events.

title: Our company uses Gesture's ipad payment feature for our annual fundraising event's paddle raise.
name: Anndriene B.
pros: Pros: The convenience that comes with having payment options for donors to quickly process gifts on sight is the best. We can also pre-register our attendees to expedite the gift giving process.
cons: Cons: The wifi connectivity issue that comes along with this convenient software is a bit of a pain. There is often fear of losing donations during that down time, but their staff is always more than willing to make things right.

title: Customer service is awesome! Allie always helps me out and gets back to me ASAP.
name: Mallory S.
pros: Pros: I like all the different views I can look at it through. Like based on donors or items, it's very helpful.
cons: Cons: I don't personally have any problems, but I know our accountant feels that the reports could be clearer for her purposes.
overall: Overall: How easy it is to use during events! Game changing.

title: Has taken our event to the next level. The staff could not be more friendly or helpful!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: User Friendly. Reports of all kinds available. Transparent. Easy to use. Raffle option is a great tool!

title: Everyone has been very helpful at GiveSmart
name: Sherry E.
pros: Pros: This product is easy to use and customizable. I like that we can add graphics and other items. Very user friendly.
cons: Cons: I don't like how we can create our own events and have to reach out to Give Smart to do their part first then we revise.

title: I will never have a fundraiser without Gesture now that I've used it.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Super easy to use, automated the most tedious parts of event planning and follow up. Saved me so much time - at least 20 hours on just the silent auction information sheets! Also, having an onsite staff member was absolutely amazing and reduced staff stress significantly. Also, we could see exactly where we were at during the auction with the dashboards - no guessing on how well we were doing!
overall: Overall: Saved so much time before, during and after the event, gave us instant feedback on our progress, automated a lot of tedious tasks. Helped us raise more money!

title: Perfect! Functionality 2018 donors expect
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The text to give!! Brilliant, donors want easy almost thoughtless ways to give.
cons: Cons: I want it to integrate even more with common social media platforms.

title: Great support, would like better reports, overall good!
name: Lexus B.
position: Assistant Director of Stewardship and Donor Relations
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It was very user friendly. The support staff were very helpful whenever I had a question. The onsite staff during the event were phenomenal and made such a difference at our event.
cons: Cons: Sometimes it felt too simple. I wanted a few more options particularly around reports. The reports aren't the best I've used. I'd like them to be more reader friendly, instead of simply Excel exports.
overall: Overall: Easy to use and the onsite staff during our event were amazing.

title: I am fairly computer savvy but have found meandering through your site difficult.
name: Bonnie F.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I liked the help I received from support. I do like the ease it will be for those going to the site. I like that it will make our life easier in determining ticket sales and getting donations.
cons: Cons: I taught technology for almost 30 years to teachers and students. I didn't find this site to be user friendly. It's been about 4 years since I retired but I cannot believe my skill has dwindled that much. Maybe it has.

title: Great Platform for Higher Budget
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Packed with high quality features and capability to both manage online donations, auctions, event management. Comprehensive package to cover all organizational needs in one platform.
cons: Cons: Cost was prohibitive for us to continue use. This would be a great platform for an entity with a larger budget. For a smaller NGO, there are more cost effective options out there. Do your research.

title: Pretty easy to use and update
name: BRIENNA W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: Easy to use- update - manage

-Like the push notification options

-Photo adding seems easy

-Like the customization header options
cons:
Cons: -When you try to print more than 1 - 5" x 7" it will not let you completely format that so you end up wasting a lot of paper

-Would be nice to have a scrolling screen of featured items or a way to highlight different items other than through push notifications

title: It was our first time using Gesture and overall it made our auction checkout process much smoother
name: Laura C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy for customers to use. Great support. Have suggested to other chapters to implement online bidding with Gesture for their events.
cons: Cons: Time consuming to add pictures, set up the items. Didn't see a huge increase in money in, especially with the cost to consider, but will use again for next event.
overall: Overall: Much smoother checkout process for our event.

title: An mobile version of craiglist for bidding
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's really simple to learn and use this software. Layout is very simple for non-techy people to pick out and perform the bidding.
cons: Cons: Sometimes it takes a while to load. And the bidding numbers dont update until you refresh the current fragment or activity.

title: GiveSmart for Associations
name: Tom M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Mobile based application; mobile functionality; account rep solid
cons: Cons: lack of comprehensive reporting tools; inability to get required reporting in timely manner; difficult to integrate with our ASM system
overall: Overall: We wanted a mobile bidding platform for our event

title: charged for an item that we did not win
name: Kathy H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It seemed usuable for people with smart phones. I do not have a smart phone. My husband did the bidding.
cons: Cons: I didn't like being charged for an item that I didn't win.
overall: Overall: We bid on an auction item for a charity that we support. We did not win the auction item, but our credit card was charged anyway. I did not want to complain about the small amount, but was glad I did not bid more! I hope the charity got the money, but I probably won't do any bidding at the next auction.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: If we are being charged for just using the software, that needs to be stated up front.

title: Works pretty well for managing guests and silent auction, but not for seating
name: Caroline S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This software works pretty well for managing guests at a large event, managing the silent auction, and managing donations.
cons: Cons: The seating chart functionality is very difficult and inconvenient to use.

title: Great experience with the Gesture staff and software.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Having a template/framework for each fundraising event is great. Additionally, the staff support has been exceptional. Anytime I had a question they were quick to answer.
cons: Cons: Software uses only text messages; this is prohibitive when using internationally at conventions. Would like to see e-mail. Also, the software does not feed into a CRM platform.
overall: Overall: This software allowed me to generate thousands of dollars with limited resources and personnel.

title: GiveSmart has been so easy to use, and the support from Amy has been unbelievable!
name: Erin H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I feel like it's very intuitive and it was easy to navigate through the different functionality and find what I needed. It's also very easy to explain to others how to use, which is always a plus!
cons: Cons: Nothing really; I did have a few guests ask if there was an app they could download so that may be something worth looking into?
overall: Overall: Ability to make bidding for a silent auction at an even EXTREMELY easy for staff, volunteers and guests.

title: Simplify and streamline ticketing from front and back
name: Rob C.
pros: Pros: The customisation is unparalleled and very easy to learn.
cons: Cons: The software has increased our ticket and voucher sales, so it's given our tour guides extra work.
overall: Overall: We abolished paper records, paper vouchers and fuel miles from having to deliver hard copy vouchers. We also passed on the savings from postage and printing costs. rep and his team worked tirelessly to get the system implemented on our website. Time was spent with me and other staff, screen sharing and working through script and code to get everything working. Transferring existing bookings and vouchers over from our old system. Training and explanation were available at every turn and the service feels very personal.

title: One of the best system for my companies needs.
name: Oliver M.
pros: Pros: We have used Ticketinghub for a number of years because their system fits perfectly with our needs for selling tickets globally; at a very fair price point. We have been with them almost from the start and although we have looked at other competitors, we have always stayed due to the constant software updates that has matched our growth. They have amazing customer service as well. I highly recommend.
cons: Cons: Sometimes updates can be a little slow but they have always come through in the end and been significant improvements. The system they have now is now top class.
overall: Overall: Overall its been been an invaluable tool and system for my business, helping us both grow and expand.

title: Customer focus!
name: Alex P.
pros: Pros: First and foremost, the TicketingHub customer service team is superb - always available to help and the motto: no question is too dumb! The software itself it great, very intuitive with a simple yet effective interface that allows us to sell our products, do some upselling, connect via API with our preferred suppliers and use several payment processors as well.
cons: Cons: What I like the least is something they're working on as we speak which are bespoke improvements for a particular part of our business.
overall: Overall: Overall its been been an invaluable tool and system for my business, helping us both grow and expand.

title: Absolutley Great
name: Luke E.
pros: Pros: This ticketing system is very versatile and will let you do almost anything you can think of. They have exceptional customer support and seem to know their customers by name so if you have any trouble at all just give them a call and the'll sort it out. No monthly fees, you just pay as a % of the bookings. Absolutely great.
cons: Cons: It can be hard to get your head around as one or two bits aren't overly intuitive. Luckily the staff are always ready to help at any time and explain things very clearly.
overall: Overall: Absolutely fantastic! Affordable and great support/customer service.

title: Usefull, efficient & easy !!!
name: Val L.
pros:
Pros: I wanted a platform, simple for me and simple for the clients. Easy to use and avoiding all the technical & complicated problems you can face with "payments" or "bookings" etc ... The ticketing hub founder was so helpful setting up everything and being very concern about my needs. Very pro and efficient, didn't hesitate to call me straight away to deal with a questions and solve any queries.

Few minutes ago, I wanted to change some things but could't find on my intranet, but their "helper" was so good, connected in a second to answer me straight away, patient and just great.

I definitely recommend Ticketing hub for their professionalism and listening. I love it !
cons: Cons: receiving daily summary everyday when no booking... but they working on it.
overall:
Overall: I think I've said it all previously. What is easy for you, will be to your customers. Ticketing hub is pro and perfect for my business Booking.

Thanks you !

title: A revelation!
name: Jodie B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: The simplicity of this system. It is so easy to use. They have really thought about what we need as a visitor attraction from the outset as opposed to developing a ticketing system in response to customer needs that becomes cumbersome and complicated.

Big benefits for us:

- A no-nonsense, honest approach.

- We keep customers within our site so we have full analytics for digital marketing.

- We are integrated with Viator so we have live availability and are on sale to the masses.

- We can add all types of resellers easily so we can extend our marketing reach without difficulty.
cons: Cons: We haven't currently identified anything we really don't like and any developments we think could happen, we simply let them know, then they assess the importance and if agreed, add them to the list of tasks for the developers.
overall: Overall: It is a huge relief to be with TicketingHub. We are really thrilled after having been with a system that was difficult to use for too long. We can't recommend them highly enough.

title: SyAM one stop for all!
name: Pamela M.
pros:
Pros: By using the SyAM applications - it has reduced the time in so many different ways. Making the daily work load so much less than it was.

We use SyAM for asset management , one benefit is that is has taken away the task of touching each machine to grab the mac address for MAC authentication. We just run a report and grab it from the SyAM asset management application. It also helps us with our yearly inventory report that needs to be presented to the BOE.

We use SyAM for our MDM - by using SyAM we touch the machines once when they come in and then we never see them again unless the screen breaks.

We use SyAM for our ticketing system. We had a reduction in staff this year and the ticketing system has been amazing. When a ticket is created - it is sent out to the techs and they are able to respond in a reasonable time, making everyone happy. I am so glad we have this system.

The support from SyAM is fantastic. I have never been disappointed.
cons: Cons: I would like to clean up the ticketing system so it flows better for the end user. I am pretty sure this is on my end not SyAM. I can't really think of anything that we do not like about the software.
overall: Overall: It has been exceptional!

title: SyAM Software
name: Lauren R.
pros: Pros: We have tried many helpdesk/MDM/inventory systems and this one is very intuitive to learn. The customization level is decent and the support from the company staff has been amazing. Someone is always a phone call away and willing to explain or remote into the system. Their support documentation is also very detailed which makes it easy to follow along with steps to something you are unfamiliar with.
cons: Cons: The cons that I have about this software seem to all be items SyAM is working on, which is nice. The MDM system currently does not allow assignment based on ID's like some other systems. Currently the helpdesk system is not integrated with Google SSO sign in for our organization, which does not allow us to use the helpdesk end-user portal. In the future they say this will be possible and we are very much looking forward to it!
overall: Overall: SyAM has been a good solution for us this last year. We were looking for a system which could help us eliminate multiple vendors and costs for MDM, inventory, helpdesk, power management and software installs. We are actively working with SyAM to discuss desired features and adjustments to the system and are thankful they are willing to be part of the conversation.

title: Great software
name: Richard S.
pros: Pros: It is a great tool to manage desktop and laptops. We were able to deploy secure browsers to all of our desktop and laptops that needed the browser install. We have been able to update Java and Internet browswers with a few simple steps.
cons: Cons: When switching from the ticket system to asset management you cannot have two tabs open with each showing up.
overall: Overall: Syam has help us get a control on our assests and management of the desktops/laptops from one location.

title: Automating processes
name: Roberta P.
pros: Pros: The software allows you to automate many processes. The team works with you to customize what they already have in production and then works with you on any add-ons you would like. Their assistance in setting up the software and working with you every step of the way to make sure you are successful.
cons: Cons: there isn't much to say here, they are helpful and stay in touch.
overall: Overall: Distributing software is easy once you understand their process. They work with you from the beginning through all processes. They still keep in touch and ask if there is anything they can do to help. Their help desk is a little difficult to set up but after that it is easy and informative.

title: Multiple instances
name: Tim K.
pros: Pros: The wealth of information that it gives you about devices, as well as the automated way in which it keeps everything up to date. Also, the built-in remote support tool is phenomenal.
cons: Cons: The utilitarian appearance and slight learning curve to using the Management Utility
overall: Overall: I worked with Syam at a previous job. It was a good experience and when I found a new position, rather than the in-house Access database, I immediately implemented Syam to start a full inventory of live devices and get me specifics of the machines. Additionally, it provides me the necessary alerting when I have server issues.

title: SyAM System at TON
name: Ramon F.
pros:
Pros: 1) Site Manager Suite very user-friendly

2) System Area Manager very user-friendly

3) Remote Support is also easy to use - just wish we had the option to see users' second or third screen.
cons: Cons: These are not 'CONS" per se but I just need to get more acquainted with the Management Utility modules. I have had worked on some features but I need more training on them.
overall: Overall: The remote support to other PCs is very helpful for us, but like I stated above; wish we had the option to see users' second or third screen when they used.

title: Outstanding
name: James M.
pros: Pros: The customer support is top notch and the software does what it is supposed to do very well.
cons: Cons: I really haven't found any cons. The software is outstanding.
overall: Overall: It is a very powerful software suite and I can't say enough good things about the customer support.

title: Daily use of syam
name: Angela W.
pros: Pros: The ability to have a remote view and control over our devices
cons: Cons: There are so many steps to configuring the devices and some of the steps are confusing and complex for the average user
overall: Overall: The support has been outstanding and I am looking forward to learning more about syam and using it to its full potential

title: SyAM Review
name: Evan L.
pros: Pros: Once the software is setup, it is easy to manage and use. I personally use the Mobile Device Management part of the software the most. I believe it is cheaper per device then any of the other MDM software products currently on the market.
cons: Cons: Sometimes, our SyAM server (which is local) will go down. It ends up using too much memory on the windows server.
overall: Overall: The support has been outstanding and I am looking forward to learning more about syam and using it to its full potential

title: Great MDM software
name: Christopher H.
pros: Pros: The ease of use. Getting devices up and running is almost too easy.
cons: Cons: Honestly, my only complaint is the loading time, and I'm sure it's just my impatience.
overall: Overall: The support has been outstanding and I am looking forward to learning more about syam and using it to its full potential

title: SYAM ROCKS!
name: Christine G.
pros: Pros: SYAM is an awesome device management suite that allows remote management, energy monitoring and inventory management all in one. I like the level of detail I am able to see on individual devices as well as groups of devices.
cons: Cons: The user interface is a little confusing in some areas. Syncing can be slow at times to the point where I am wondering if it is actually performing a task or is just hung up. It would be helpful to have a "working on it" indicator so I know it is working.
overall: Overall: SYAM has helped my organization manage our fleet of ipads and customize preferences and apps by group. We have been very impressed with their level of customer service. Reps are quick to answer questions, explain functions, helped us set up the system, and even come visit us when we needed extra training.

title: Grandmaster Entertains
name: Stephanie M.
pros: Pros: I used this product several years ago in a previous job. The company I worked for owned an aquarium, tour boat, banquet hall and an exhibition center. I used this software to create group reservations and to check-in groups upon arrival. This software worked very well for the general admission process and the point of sale terminals in the gift shop and the cafe. The yearly gift shop inventory process went smoothly using this software. The company also sent someone to our location to help us get acclimated to the new system.
cons:
Cons: Personally, I had two main problems with this software. The first problem involved the creation of group visits, we had previously been able to create a group account for a group that was a repeat visitor. Once the account was created, you could pull up the account and view the organization's history of visiting the aquarium. We no longer had this option with Gatemaster. Each visit was a desperate entity and this caused difficulties when billing groups with multiple visits; that required one invoice sent to their corporate office.

The second problem involved combination tickets. The combination tickets included visits to both the aquarium and the tour boat or the aquarium and the exhibition center. I would create daily attendance reports which became problematic with Gatemaster because the software was always double counting the attendance on the combination tickets. If a person purchased a combination ticket, the computer counted it as two people visiting not one. We were unable to separate the combination attendance from the admission only attendance. This aspect of Gatemaster was extremely frustrating and it was impossible to get accurate attendance numbers.
overall: Overall: The product works well if it suits your business exactly as created. The problems occur if and when you need to customize the software to suit your needs. It is very difficult to change or modify this software. If you need this product for basic point of sales processing you should be fine.

title: One of the best things we have done for our business
name: Matthew U.
pros: Pros: Integrated POS, Reporting, Access Control, E-Commerce - Built like it was made for our business - most POS systems just don't understand the ticketing/reservations side of our business and Gatemaster makes it easy while still being powerful enough to handle anything we have thrown at it. Support is some of the best we have ever had always an easy phone call away and they typically remote in and help us understand our questions with hands-on demonstrations. Very receptive to ideas and improvements to the system.
cons: Cons: The power of the system means that sometimes the backend is not very intuitive but support is always willing and eager to help us understand and get up to speed quickly.
overall: Overall: Gatemaster has helped us take our multiple manual systems for POS, ticketing, retail, reporting, e-commerce and combine them into one unified system that was built for our industry. Everyone here loves it from frontline staff to accounting to management it has made all of our lives easier. The purchase process was easy and the Gatemaster staff was so helpful in helping us figure out what we needed. It took us almost a year of deciding to buy the system but they were never pushy and always willing to help. Implementation was streamlined and painless. Ongoing support and upgrades have been great they still treat us like we are one of their best customers even though we know they have many customers much larger than us.

title: Great Support!
name: Evan A.
pros: Pros: As soon as you have a question or a problem, pickup the phone call and 9.9 out of 10 times someone picks up and is ready to help. Great person to person support.
cons: Cons: Overall the smart gates for the arcades feels a little dated. But we have been contacted and great strives towards updating has been made and they are currently working on new things which is great!
overall: Overall: We have been with Gatemaster since 2011 and we are extremely satisfied with their service, knowledge and support. Customer suppport have been there for us constantly helping us out and really taking on our comments and coming back with solutions to help us out. We are a one location FEC getting ready to expand in the new year and Gatemaster will definitely be there with us!

cons: Cons: Having to update expiration dates for the next season.
overall: Overall: I've hd this system for 7 years and have been in the miniature golf industry for over 35 years and I wish I had this from the beginning.The experience I've had with Gatemaster and continue to have with Gatemaster is by far the best I've ever had with any company. I've told them more than once they should start a sideline to teach other companies how to run their service and support departments. I think the support staff summed it up best in an email he sent me and explains why Gatemaster takes such great care of its customers "We know that when we sell a system it is the start of a long time relationship that will be for many years to come."

title: Great experience from start to finish!
name: Jeremy F.
pros: Pros: Gatemaster supplies us with calendar booking, reporting and tracking sales. It hits on all of our needs.
cons: Cons: The overall aesthetic look of the reports.
overall: Overall: We went about 10 years without updating our system, (I think that in itself shows you that the product is built to last), and reached a point were are hardware was starting to fail. I contacted Gatemaster to see what we could do to get updated and get our PoS running smoothly again. I was pleasantly surprised when the told me that for a small fee that would not only help me reinstall that software but also update us to their most recent version. I purchased that hardware myself and spent about a week on the phone with the tech support getting everything working again. I can't say enough about the hospitality of the tech support staff. They were patient and always followed through with calling me back and making sure that our problems were solved. As the title says: It was a great experience from start to finish!

They are always there when I need them and any questions I have they always have a answer for me . The big part as well when you go to the shows they remember you , so you are not just a sale to them they are they for you and your business.

title: Good service until you are a customer
name: Erik B.
comments: Comments: We have gatemaster for 7 years. We paid approx $45,000 for a complete install of 5 terminals and software licenses. Upgrades and ticket support service was included in the purchase. Now that I need to switch over to new computers, which needs a Mac Address swap on the end of Gatemaster. They are forcing me to buy a support agreement of $1,250 annually. On their support FAQ they say it is included in the software license and would only cost $39 per computer which is understandable. Now Mr. Joe Ross , VP of GM blocked me out of the ticket support too unless I pay $1,250 first. So much for service to existing clients. We are in the process of franchising out our business. Unless this matter is solved Gatemaster will not get our business. F
