overall: Overall: I had an overall amazing experience with Ticket tailor I have been with ticket tailor for over 2 years.

title: Extremely easy to use and wonderful customer service
name: Lauren C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This is the first time I've run an event and I did a lot of research into ticket selling sites in order to figure out the most suitable site. I had a lot of questions as event ticketing was new to me and out of all the sites I emailed, Ticket Tailor provided the fastest and most comprehensive answers to all my queries. They made me feel very confident about setting up my box office and when the tickets went live they dealt with queries I had immediately (both queries turned out to be user errors!). This is such an easy website to use and very intuitive. The Ticket Tailor Help Centre is also very good and most answers you can find in their FAQs.
cons: Cons: There is nothing I can fault about ticket tailor but I was unable to combine selling tickets for my event with the ticket purchasers ability to book preferred time slots which was important to the smooth running of my event.
overall: Overall: As a first-time charity event with a very small budget, the cost effectiveness of using Ticket Tailor as opposed to other sites meant that more of the money raised went to charity!

title: Ticket Tailor
name: Naijha W.
pros: Pros: It's easy to learn. User-friendly. We're able to use it as a ticketing system for all of our events.
cons: Cons: I would like to be able to modify the "buytickets.at/....." URL. Most times are events are free for attendees and vendors need to pay a fee to register. The attendees get confused with Free being associated with a "buytickets.at/....." URL.
overall: Overall: The cost is a major reason why use this platform. We have a for profit and non-profit business so the monthly subscription rates are extremely fungible reasonable compared to Eventbrite overall fees.

title: Ticket Tailor great value for the price.
name: david l.
pros:
Pros: Love the fact that there are no fees, unlike Eventbrite.

Easy of use, very easy to use and has help if you get confused.

I can pause my service , so not paying monthly fees is a great feature.

I can have multiple box offices, makes it easy to have different events.

They seem to have frequent upgrades and keeps me informed about any changes.
cons:
Cons: Wish I had more options on customizing the ticket page.

Not much else is to say, by no means a perfect product, but a really good product.
overall: Overall: Ticket Tailor is a really good product, it makes selling tickets a breeze and is easy to use. I help organizations ( not for profits), when they want to sell tickets , this is my go to software. Been using for about 2 years and it has not failed me yet.

title: Ticket Tailor for the Win!
name: James R.
pros: Pros: I have tried all the major ticketing sites for my film festival and found Ticket Tailor to be head and shoulders above the competition. The site is exceptionally user-friendly and the monthly package - as opposed to hefty commissions charged by rival sites - is advantageous to my business model. No hesitations whatsoever in recommending it.
cons: Cons: Nothing really comes to mind - I'm sure it will continue to get better and better.

title: Deep functionality ticketing system for flat fee price
name: Ross S.
comments: Comments: Ticket Tailor is a fully fledged ticketing system but instead of charging a per ticket % commission like competitors, it provides a single fixed fee monthly fee with unlimited tickets. For smaller events this provides a far more cost effective way of developing a ticketing system.

title: Saved a ton of money
name: Lori G.
pros: Pros: Price is great. Run a bunch of events per year and event brite was eating too much into my profit. Ticket Tailor does not have the breadth of tools that some of the bigger players do but they cost so much less it is worth it to me as a small business. This tool does everything I need it to do.
cons: Cons: Missing some key features related to emailing ticket holders (although they have upped their game in this area they still have some way to go) and their reporting is really minimal and not what is needed on the back end.
overall: Overall: Overall - happy with them and plan to continue using them going forward.

title: Excellent ticket sales programme
name: Nikki W.
pros: Pros: The ease of setting up an event and the collection of money
cons: Cons: The inflexibility of some of the options i.e. you cant currently add values to some of the drop down boxes
overall: Overall: I get great service and the system looks good

title: Ticcket Tailor review
name: David B.
pros: Pros: TT is easy to set up and customise the box office. The most appealing feature is the low monthly cost and instant payments via Paypal.
cons: Cons: I have in other jobs used TT with higher order volumes in short amounts of time and had issues with tickets getting sent out to customers.
overall: Overall: Cost effective and easy to use tool, recommended.

title: Ticket Taylor Ticked All My Boxes For Selling Tickets Online For An Event
name: Steve P.
comments:
Comments: Having recently being tasked with sorting ticket sales for my old colleges reunion, I searched to see if there was on online ticket solution to my dilemma as the former students were now all over UK/world and I had no direct contact for them.

This is where I found Ticket Taylor. On researching other companies of similar attributes, Ticket Taylor came out on top especially in the value for money department.

On signing up to the package, I soon found the site very easy to use. You can also SEO the ticket office to suit direct hits for potential online searches.

The system is, in my opinion, faultless. It made what a thought would be a cumbersome task into something very delightful.

The process of buying a ticket online was simple. I created links from the Facebook page and my website to the online ticket office.

I could regularly extrapolate information from the data collected by Ticket Taylor.

I found the e-ticketing system very useful indeed.

During the use of their system I had little need for help But when I did, their messaging system was simple to use and the small problems I had were dealt with quickly and in a very friendly manor.

title: Stable, Cheap and Customisable
name: Alex M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: After looking at alternative online ticketing solutions we were initially drawn to TicketTailor by their competitive pricing, but they have proven to be great. Their platform is stable, easy to use and very customisable. They even offer a charity discount on top of their low pricing! We weren't sure about choosing someone other than the brand name for organising events online - let's call them Shiny Events - but TicketTailor have met all our expectations.
cons: Cons: The only inconvenience we've found is that TicketTailor fees are paid to them via credit card, whereas card transaction fees are debited by their payment provider (Stripe) from the remittance. This has caused our accounts team a few challenges as the bank account we're having the remittance paid into isn't the same as the bank account with a credit card! Not a show stopper, but upset our finance team a little!

title: Excellent and intuitive ticketing tool. reasonably priced too!
name: Joann S.
pros:
Pros: intuitively designed, even a non-technical person like me can use it

excellent price range, with non-profit discount and NO TICKET FEES!! (plan and event size dependent, of course)
cons: Cons: maybe because I am a technology layman I wasn't able to fully make use of the linked/connected apps as fully as I hoped.. (I attempted to connect Zapier, but was not successful... but that might just due to operator error...)
overall: Overall: Overall excellent product, should be used a lot more vs those that charge ticket fees!!!!!

title: I find ticket tailor so user friendly and unbelievably useful
name: Harriet B.
pros: Pros: It is straight forward and easy to use and saves me so much time when selling tickets for events. I particularly like the ability to duplicate a past event which saves the time of setting up a new one.
cons: Cons: I generally like all the features of the software. The only thing is it might be nice to have a prompt to check that you have done everything that needs to be done before putting tickets on sale - once or twice I have forgotten to change the email response sent when a ticket is sold which has been quite confusing for the buyer!

title: Outstanding service and customer communication at an affordable price.
name: Mathilda L.
pros: Pros: Monthly subscription making high volume low price tickets possible for small businesses. Their response to all of my queries have been fast and easy to understand.

title: They are what you looking for!
name: Sergio S.
pros: Pros: Easy to use it and amazing interface! There are so many functionality and more are added making it very exciting!
cons: Cons: That's is not available in other languages!

title: Everything we need and easy to use
name: Rob B.
pros: Pros: Ease of use. Ability to easily create coupon codes. The Box Office that lists all of our events on one page. Easy to understand and use Dashboard. There's a lot that we love.
cons: Cons: Not much to say here. It would be nice if there was a bit more in terms of options for how pages look as far as design is concerned. Meaning the ability to make the Box Office look and operate more like a lead page for example.
overall: Overall: It has absolutely simplified our workflow relative to putting on events and collecting the admission fees. We love it.

title: Best Ticketing platform in existence
name: Kevin K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ticket Tailor is by far the best ticketing platform in existence. After trying a half-dozen ticketing partners over the course of 4 years, we've finally fallen in love with a platform - Ticket Tailor. The platform has virtually every feature set you could ever want, it integrates seamlessly on your own website, processes credit cards simply with Stripe, and best of all - is offered at a cost that is unbeatable. Moreover, unlike every other ticketing platform, Ticket Tailor allows the event organizers to charge and keep ticketing fees, which can greatly help the bottom line of an event. We look forward to a long term partnership with Ticket Tailor!
cons: Cons: This platform has just about everything our business has been looking for. Easy to use, affordable, and great customer service!

title: Ticket Tailor is easy to use & helps give us a professional look to our online sales
name: KRISTI V.
pros: Pros: Ticket Tailor is super easy to use!! We have used them for multiple events over the past two years.
cons: Cons: What is there NOT to like?! Their fees are very reasonable. The system is easy for us to set up and integrate into our website. Our customers have found it easy to use as well!! We have no complaints! We love Ticket Tailor & referred several others within our industry to them!
overall: Overall: We are able to easily integrate online ticket sales onto our website. It has been easy to use. Their customer service has been quick to respond when we do have any questions!

title: We no longer need to be slaves to Eventbrite's fees!
name: Bob N.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: We no longer need to be slaves to Eventbrite's fees. Eventbrite has now removed the cap on how much they take per ticket. We have been searching for an alternative with no hope in sight for more than a month. We switched to Peatix to realize AFTER we moved everything over that they don't pay out until the event occurs. With customers buying tickets more than a year in advance for us, this was simply unacceptable for our cash flow. Finally, someone recommended Ticket Tailor to us, and we have been using it seemlesly for more than a month. We are so thankful they exist, and we hope this review helps more people in our old position to find them.
cons: Cons: They do not (yet) have a waitlist for tickets.
overall: Overall: We are so thankful they exist.

title: Highly Recommended!
name: Beckie W.
pros: Pros: Really flexible, easy-to-use and fair fees - makes selling tickets to all our events a dream!
cons: Cons: We've not encountered any issues using Ticket Tailor to be honest.
overall: Overall: We've been using TicketTailor for our small business for nearly a year now and have found it fantastic!

title: Easy to use and great value for money
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We have been using Ticket Tailor to sell tickets for our events for 3 years. It's super easy to set up events and sell tickets and customer support is always spot on, but the best feature is the price! There is 1 low monthly subscription fee rather than a % fee on tickets which saves us hundreds of pounds per event. Highly recommended!
cons: Cons: The event view for guests could do with some design. Ability to add tickets below the description would also help.

title: 30 year old dream come true
name: Adrienne F.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ticket Tailor was very easy to use, and most importantly, integrate into our existing website. Everything is designed to offer our customers the best experience from ease of buying their tickets to the follow-up e-mails and reminders to keep them excited and ready to play with us!
cons: Cons: Nothing yet. We're continuing to use it, and we'll let you know if we run across something that doesn't work!
overall: Overall: I've waited 30 years to launch the business I've just launched - Conundrum House, which offers Live-Action Role-Play games that I and my team write (Black Ink Mysteries). I've not used a ticketing service before, needed one, and my daughter recommended that I use Ticket Tailor. I am 100% pleased that I took her advice as the system has worked beautifully for our murder mystery LARP events.

title: Fantastic
name: Fred S.
pros: Pros: It's easy to use, super cheap, robust & customer service is great. Being able to build and manage our own ticketing pages saves a huge amount of time, means we can absorb the booking fee (and set it reasonably) and receive funds immediately rather than waiting for them to be released.
cons: Cons: Very little as a small event. Perhaps a little more flexibility in design/style for our landing page.

title: Medium Sized Conference: Love It!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We used Ticket Tailor for our medium sized conference. It was great. The site is intuitive, there is nothing superfluous- so I didn't feel like I was paying for add-ons that I was never going to use. Definitely recommend this platform.
cons: Cons: I would like to see the ability to set limits to the promotion codes, ie: expiration date, number of redemptions

title: Ticket Tailor -Fast and Efficient
name: Deborah S.
pros: Pros: Ticket Tailor is so easy to use and the cost is really flexible for our budget. I only use what I need. It has saved our PTA so much time and effort too
cons: Cons: I have to do a lot of rework on the reports but that is mainly because Parents fill the questions in incorrectly. It doesn't allow for multiple children from 1 family requests
overall: Overall: Ticket Tailor saves me time and money. It covers GDPR and allows me to receive funds really quickly

title: Great price, great features, great support.
name: DeAnn N.
pros: Pros: Ticket Tailor pricing is what made me jump in and try it for my free and paid tickets. Love the box office feature and the functionality. Discount codes, etc. are all helpful. They are very responsive when it comes to answering questions.
cons: Cons: Needs to better integrate with social media. Ticket Tailor events don't pop up like other company's events do.
overall: Overall: Fabulous!

title: Excellent Value for Money
name: Lynda T.
pros: Pros: Easy to set-up events. I love the integration into my own site with copy and paste of pre-prepared code which means that clients don't need to leave my site to make a booking.
cons: Cons: Limited functionality for more complex multi-day, multi-speaker events. ,
overall: Overall: Quick and easy to set-up

title: Elegant and Cost Effective
name: Lisa S.
pros: Pros: With TicketTailor, registration portals for events are effortless to create and look very professional. The customers' payment portal is user-friendly with an optional "donation" feature that we love, and the Tazotix smartphone app makes it a breeze for us to check in our attendees by scanning their barcode or finding them on the door list. We highly recommend TicketTailor for any small business or not-for-profit who wish to keep their running costs low. It is simply the best we have found!
cons: Cons: It would be very useful from the customer perspective if bank transfer services such as POLi Pay could be included in the payment options in New Zealand. Many of our users do not have Visa Debit or credit cards.
overall: Overall: We love Ticket Tailor.

title: Convention Review
name: Todd H.
pros: Pros: Ticket Tailor is an innovative, full-service, and cost-effective ticketing platform.
cons: Cons: Many of my attendees pay by check. The only flaw in the platform is the inability to invoice folks for check payments. There are workaround methods, but it would be very helpful to add invoice functionality.
overall: Overall: Ticket Tailor is far more cost effective way than any other ticketing platform.

title: The perfect partner
name: tim b.
pros: Pros: Ease of use and up to date info. clarity of information
cons: Cons: There is nothing about the new software that i dislike
overall: Overall: amazing

title: This is the Best and Easiest Site To Use!
name: Emily E.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I love how easy and user friendly it is to setup the site by simply adding pictures and text and filling out the information in the boxes. If you have a question or get stuck, the help articles are very well written. When I had a question that the articles did not answer, I received a prompt response by the staff through the chat. NO other site has cheaper rates and level of customer support that Ticket Tailor does!
cons: Cons: There are no cons about Ticket Tailor! This software has everything you need at your fingertips for setting up from the simplest site of a few tickets to the largest events!

title: Best ticketing site for the best price!
name: becca P.
pros: Pros: Love TicketTailor! Always have since day one.. they're always striving to grow and get more features and their pricing makes sense for businesses. I've recommended TT to many of my event partners.
cons: Cons: I would like to see easier to read and understand stats of sales to compare events.

title: Great app!
name: CHARMAINE R.
comments: Comments: Pros: The customer service was great! They answered in a quick and timely manner! At first I was very skeptical of paying for this program when their customer service was only an email. I was not sure they would be able to answer quickly whenever I had a question. However, when I first had any issues, they were able to quickly answer it! This program definitely helped our check in desk at the time of event, which made the lines run smoothly.

title: Great ticketing platform with no fees per ticket!
name: Helen B.
pros: Pros: Low subscription cost (we are a charity so get a 30% discount), easy to use and great support. Great end-user experience too for ticket buyers.
cons: Cons: You can customize your event page and tickets but the page itself is not as sleek as Universe. However, they have recently updated this and so it's better now.
overall: Overall: Ticket Tailor is much easier to use and takes a fraction of the time to set up events and sell tickets than our previous platform. It's also better for user experience too.

title: Cost effective ticketing solution
name: Laura S.
pros: Pros: Ticket Tailor provides a cost-effective ticket solution that provides a customisable experience that fits with our business. Highly recommend as it helps you keep your ticket costs down and not worry about your ticket provider taking a cut.
cons: Cons: Contacting ticket buyers/attendees can be clunky
overall: Overall: Really enjoyed using this system. I like the fact you can have multiple tickets for events and that these can be easily customised.

title: Simple to use
name: Samantha C.
pros: Pros: Simple to use, excellent support function and links with payment gateways easily.
cons: Cons: Can't separate Australian and New Zealand income, so require separate accounts per region
overall: Overall: I've used 4 ticketing platforms and found this the best by far.

title: Brilliant platform for PTAs
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We get the charity discount with Ticket Tailor and Stripe and only pay for the months we are actually selling tickets - that means it works out much better for us than all the other platforms we looked at who take a percentage of the ticket price. The functionality is also great - we can customise the checkout process easily to ask for menu choices, allergies, attendee names etc etc. Our parents love the ease of paying online and we have definitely sold more tickets as a result. It saves our treasurer a huge amount of work as they no longer have to reconcile bank payments and cheques. I also use Zapier to automatically send ticket sales to our Wave accounting system.
cons: Cons: Nothing honestly - it does everything I've needed it to

title: Great way to manage event tickets
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love that Ticket Tailor have a mobile option. This allows us to easily manage event tickets even when we're working remotely.
cons: Cons: The minimum and most affordable package option only allows hosting of 5 active events. This was a challenge to us during the festive seasons where we had multiple events and we had to upgrade to another package which cost more than our initial budget
overall: Overall: Simple and convenient way to manage event tickets

title: Simple solution for small organisation
name: Nick R.
pros:
Pros: Ability to pause payment in between events.

Low, fixed costs are easy to predict

Payment is received straight away
cons: Cons: User interface looks a little dated and could do with updating. Some greater adaptability would be useful.
overall: Overall: BASIS uses TicketTailor to support with conference and event organisation.

title: Fantastic product, way better than Eventbrite
name: Philip M.
pros: Pros: I love that I pay a fixed fee for my events, and that I get paid straight away. Other services take a percentage of my money, and wait till the event is over before I get paid. Ticket Tailor is a great product, and I have run multiple events on it, and it's fantastic. It makes ticketing a breeze.
cons: Cons: nothing. It's a great all round software platform.
overall: Overall: I can now set up events quickly and easily without having to deal with a percent of my business being taken away. Having a fixed cost based on the number of events I run is a great way to go.

title: Works very well for a small not for profit
name: Rob R.
pros: Pros: We have used Ticket Tailor for ticketing events at the Pells Pool, Lewes in 2018 and are continuing to use them now in 2019. We have found it a very easy to use and cost effective system. Our ticket charges are relatively low per ticket, so a fixed monthly rate (rather than as a per ticket + % of sales model) works out well for us. Plus the charity discount! The check in app also makes for speedy entry. And we are seasonal - so the fact we can then suspend the account until we start up again is great. And the customer service when we started off was top class.
cons: Cons: Hard to think of what we would improve ...
overall: Overall: Unhesitatingly recommended!

title: Great product
name: Terrence M.
pros: Pros: User friendly to use once you spend the time learning the features and capabilities.
cons: Cons: Need more features to customize event dashboard.
overall: Overall: It's been good for me. I have even shared with other promoters and now they are using Ticket tailor.

title: Very easy to use
name: Elise P.
pros: Pros: Very user friendly and intuitive, all the features that I need as a business owner
cons: Cons: There are only two ways to export door list data (alphabetical by first or last name)
overall: Overall: Have been using Ticket Tailor for 4 years and have always found their customer service fast and responsive

title: Great for charity events
name: Alistair F.
pros:
Pros: Easy and simple to use

Good visibility of sales progress

Low cost due to no continuous charge and charity discount

Great customer service
cons:
Cons: A few inflexible areas, but very minor.

Non-admins can't test the site before it goes live.
overall: Overall: We use it for occasional events so its really import that it's easy to use, and that they don't charge when we're not using it. You can set up an event in about 20 mins and don't pay until it goes live.

title: Wine & Dine
name: CT A.
pros: Pros: Cost and ease of the product and loading in our information
cons: Cons: You cannot break out Categories to retrieve certain information
overall: Overall: After going through two other ticketing platforms this by far was easier and cost effective

title: Great box office solution
name: David F.
pros: Pros: This is a cost effective platform, that can be embedded into your website, and works seamlessly.
cons: Cons: Minor point, but if you want to add extras (eg. programmes) it counts them as attendees on your dashboard - but not really an issue.
overall: Overall: Great customer service

title: User friendly and easy to manage
name: Nikki H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I like the monthly subscription over individual ticket charge feature of ticket tailor, as it makes it easier to budget your costs without offloading your expenses onto your customers if you don't want to. It is extremely user friendly and easy to manage your subscriptions.
cons: Cons: Although it has the ability to create discount codes or single use vouchers, It doesn't have a group by discount feature which is inconvenient.

title: Great Bang for the Buck!
name: Scott H.
pros: Pros: Very easy to setup and link to my website and share on our social media. Can customize based on tiers of ticket sales. The administration of checking in ticket purchasers was super easy on the day of the event.
cons: Cons: Co-branding, this can be removed with more expensive plans.
overall: Overall: Low cost way to administer a once a year event for our store. There are others out there but this was economical and checked all our requirements.

title: A charity dream
name: Gary B.
pros: Pros: We are able to use and pay for it only while tickets are on sale, for a charity and keeping costs to minimum this has been great value to us
cons: Cons: A little more personalisation could be available on the ticket side
overall: Overall: Our second year of using them and it frees up people from answering phones at all times of day and allows people to buy tickets whenever they like, it also means that we are sure of payment for all requested thickets.

title: Easy to set up, Easy to integrate into our Website and Great value for money!
name: Ian R.
comments:
Comments: It has taken 3 years for us to find the solution to providing online ticket sales along with still being able to offer a personal telephone service for those who require that. Easy to set up the events although we had to rethink the way be gave discounted offers - we can no longer offer the 1 child free with 2 full fare paying adults but we found another way. It was very easy to customise and integrate into our website.

The Stripe payment solution offers an easy way to take online payments. The Ticket Tailor solution is considerably cheaper than many other online ticket solutions which is very important to us .

Our charities volunteers have found it very easy to learn to use the system with telephone bookings which again was important.

Finaly I must mention the great customer service received from Lorant who rapidly answered our queries and requests

Thank you Ticket Tailor

title: This was exactly what we needed!
name: Kenna H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This was our first experience selling tickets online, and it was easy to set up, use, and get to our patrons. I also especially like the option of asking required questions that help us test our marketing and customizing the confirmation page.
cons: Cons: I can't think of anything that we haven't liked about TicketTailor.
overall: Overall: By selling tickets online at a reasonable price, a small community theatre, such as ours can still offer our audiences leading technology access, while not paying for high priced ticket programs that we may not use.

title: Great way to sell tickets!
name: Sanne B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: TicketTailor is by far the easiest and cheapest method I have ever used to sell tickets for an event. The monthly subscription system works great, so that you don't have to spend a fee on each person that buys a ticket. The system is also very easy in use and straightforward, I could put the ticket sales system on my own Wordpress website within seconds.
cons: Cons: Please be aware that PayPal will subtract a fee for each payment still, but this is not something TicketTailor can help.

title: Simple process, clear website, easy to use
name: Amy D.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The website was clear and it was easy to create an event and set up a payment system. We are updated with all ticket purchases so we can track orders and keep up to date with sales. The event page was easy to customise and the ability to have various ticket types per event has been very useful.
cons: Cons: I think the monthly cost could be a little less, or the number of maximum tickets sold per event should be increased
overall: Overall: The finance team spend less time handling cash transaction which is a huge plus for us.

title: Ticket Tailor is excellent
name: Hattie K.
pros: Pros: It is easy to use even for those who are not savvy with technology
cons: Cons: Nothing. I haven't had any problems with Ticket Tailor
overall: Overall: This is the second year I have used Ticket Tailor for my event, Tunes and Spoons. I can't recommend the company highly enough - it's FAR less expensive than any competitors, really simple to set up (I'm a techno-idiot and I managed it) and if I have a question, someone replies promptly. What more could you ask?

title: Ticket Tailor has transformed my business.
name: Nigel B.
position: Founder, Curator and Chief Wildness Officer
pros: Pros: It's really easy to use - we can now take bookings direct from our website and add different ticket types, discounts and voucher codes without any hassle.
cons: Cons: Ticket Tailor's pricing structure makes it uneconomic for our company to add more than five events at once
overall: Overall: We're now able to sell tickets to our events and workshops directly from our website

title: Excellent features, excellent customer support, very easy to use
name: Andrew S.
pros: Pros: Ease of use and included features, especially for the price. Also it was particularly beneficial for me that they have Stripe integration.
cons: Cons: When I first used it a couple of years ago there was an issue finding attendee names on the check-in app but that has since been resolved.
overall: Overall: Glad to find a simple ticket management service with great customer service for a fair price.

title: Practical and user-friendly
name: Cathy I.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, customizing, and customer service were key! And the app was just perfect, making check-in a breeze!
cons: Cons: None to report other than to have a minimum of 40 characters in this question!
overall: Overall: This software made it very convenient to organize and host events, at an affordable fee.

title: TicketTailor rocks!
name: Sherree F.
pros: Pros: TicketTailor is quite easy to use and very affordable for the non-profit sector. Their customer service is outstanding.
overall: Overall: Easy ticketing and reporting. It has been 100% dependable for every event we have used it for.

title: Ticket Tailor
name: Laurence P.
pros: Pros: Ticket Tailor is great. It is simple to set up and operate and the help and support from Ticket Tailor is first class. It is really cost effective because there is no per ticket commission, just a one off price depending on how many tickets are to be sold per event.
cons: Cons: There is nothing to dislike - it really meets all our requirements
overall:
Overall: Tickets are being sold by and in-house system instead of using an expensive 3rd party ticketing company.

Much more manageable and easily modified.

title: Ease of use
name: Sue H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: As someone who is not very IT literate I found this really easy to use and navigate around.

Help was always on hand if I needed it and no question was treated as stupid.
cons: Cons: The orders download doesn't seem to be ideal for what I need but it may be that I haven't figured it out properly yet.
overall:
Overall: The system is reliable and the charges are fair - definitely the most competitive for what my needs are.

I would certainly recommend Ticket Tailor and I would use them again for any future events.

title: Ticket Tailor - Thank U front Resonate
name: Susan M.
pros: Pros: The user friendly nature of the platform and the ability to customise the box office is a cool feature.
cons: Cons: A mobile app would be cool to have but really there's nothing I don't like about the platform
overall: Overall: Superb!

title: Fantastic sales service
name: Calum B.
pros: Pros: Cheap to use and does not take long to get tickets selling
cons: Cons: Sometimes complicated to use and things are not always where you think they should be on the website.

title: Ticket Tailor made last years manual ticketing storm into this year's 'breeze'.
name: Steve N.
comments: Comments: We used TT to help us sell tickets online for a small community music festival on the Isle of Skye. Last year we tried (and succeeded, but at a cost of much hard work, loads of hours and reams of paper) to sell tickets manually - by phone, by email, etc...

title: Ticket Tailor has been a great solution to our ticketing problems.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Extremely easy to set up and customize. Also, the savings compared to other ticketing platforms has been invaluable.
cons: Cons: The only thing I would ask is being able to set up personal event ids and passwords for the app. Really, other than that it is really straightforward and no complaints.

title: Best Ticketing Service Out There
name: Amanda C.
pros: Pros: Ticket Tailor makes it so easy to setup events and ticket sales as well as discount codes, easy-to-import widgets and even allows you to freeze your account in between events in case you're not producing year-round. Ticket sales are deposited directly to PayPal so there is also no wait time to receive your earnings. I am beyond happy with Ticket Tailor and highly recommend them!
cons: Cons: I really can't think of anything negative - they're a great service and I've been very happy as a customer.
overall: Overall: As I self-produce, this allows me an easy-to-use, organized and professional service to sell tickets to our audience - an essential tool for me.

title: We used Ticket Tailor for our fundraising event in October. The applicaion is easy to use adn setup
name: Patti L.
comments: Comments: The Ticket Tailor application itself was easy to use and setup. The service that is provided by Ticket Tailor is excellent! When I submitted questions, I heard back either the same day or the following day with very easy to understand instructions and explanations. They even created a special form for us to use to collect information about the ticket purchaser and his/her guests. Our only concern was that even after we ended our event, we got billed for two more months. We were not aware of the charges until the banking statment arrived. Ticket Tailor gave us store credit and did give us a prorated refund on the partial month based on when we notified them. We think there should be a clear explanation of how to prevent this from happening once the event has ended. Other than that we were happy with the whole service.

title: The only solution we use
name: Stephen M.
pros: Pros: It is so easy to use, and so thorough in its development it saves us a TON of effort.
cons: Cons: I always want more options to customize everything.

title: Ticket Tailor knows what they are doing!
name: Kathleen P.
pros: Pros: It is so easy to set up and manage. Takes a bit of stress off my shoulders with my organization's events!
cons: Cons: Everything works just fine for me! Loving the new updates.
overall: Overall: A+. I used Eventbrite before and moved to Ticket Tailor because of a friend's recommendation. Customer service has been great. Also love the nonprofit discount!

title: Easiest ticketing site ever!!!!
name: Neirah H.
pros:
Pros: easy to use

I love that it's fully customizable
cons: Cons: I've never had a problem that ticket tailor's customer didn't help me with right away

title: Stressless concert ticket sales
name: Eric T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Professional quality event page for each event, the ability to provide discount tickets to students and the intuitive interface made it easy to share pertinent information to attendees. There was a widget so I could embed a direct ticket link on my website's home page and easy posts to social media sites. Also the integrated check-in app for the day of show was easy to use even without wifi.
cons: Cons: I enjoyed the ease in which to set up with PayPal. Would like to use my own business account which accepts credit card payments through my bank. The only options of payment are Stripe and PayPal. Not a deal-breaker, though.
overall: Overall: Having all these tools with which to promote and keep accounts straight for multiple productions lets me focus on the art and less so on the administration. As a single person operation this is essential.

title: Very good up & coming ticketing platform
name: Natalie F.
pros: Pros: Almost all the features of industry-leader Eventbrite but about half the price
cons: Cons: If you use Stripe for payments (which is the cheapest option), all events have to pay out to one bank account, which can be annoying if you run multiple events with different people. Also it doesn't have a mailing list like Eventbrite to promote your events, but otherwise very good.
overall: Overall: Very responsive to emails and questions.

title: We've used Ticket Tailor for the last 3 years for our events and have no hesitation recommending.
name: Pam P.
pros: Pros: Set up is quick and straightforward and should you require any assistance their customer support is responsive and helpful. Ticket Tailor delivers all the functionality that we need at an affordable cost. Most of all, feedback from our customers using the service is positive.
cons: Cons: Initially when launched functionality was basic but Ticket Tailor now has all the functionality we need
overall: Overall: Affordable yet functional - great for small companies with big ideas!

title: Amazing ticket outlet
name: Andrej Z.
pros: Pros: Everything is in my control - prices, charges, discounts. It can be implemented in the website or box office can be customised

title: Great Program!
name: Chshin B.
pros: Pros: It's ease of use and links that work when embedding into our website. It's been a reliable source of ticketing for years now!
cons: Cons: The odd time something didn't work, i.e. mandatory gathering of information on the order form. Even though there was a little red star, unclicking it didn't work for a while. I believe it's fixed now after contacting customer service.
overall: Overall: Easy capture of ordering and funds. Easy to set up. I highly recommend this program!

title: Seamless Event Management Aid
name: Sandra E.
pros: Pros: It's ease of use, flexibility and customer support. Tracking customers and being able to adapt marketing to a targeted audience.
cons: Cons: I couldn't get the offline app to work at the event, but that was the only difficulty I encountered
overall: Overall: It suited our needs perfectly for event management.

title: Great online ticketing solution
name: Neil R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: easy to use, we're in total control, we control money coming to us, great customer service, easy to use dashboard, easy to personalise the ticket pages and events. direct link with with Mailchimp if required
cons: Cons: Some events are a bit slow to populate, and ticketing reports (box office doorlists are pretty standard, no way of personalising this. Minimal really, highly recommend the site

title: Intuitive All-in-One Ticketing Option!
name: Jen M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It was very intuitive and easy to learn right away. There really wasn't a learning curve or a lot of questions. Very clear help options when I did have a question.
cons: Cons: I liked everything about it. I'm not currently unhappy about anything at all.
overall: Overall: We are an interactive murder mystery dinner theater and we sell tickets to our show. This is one stop shopping for us. Intgrates perfectly on our website backend!

title: Ticket Trailor IS the solution for a reservation system that our company, Eliances.com selected
name: David C.
comments: Comments: Eliances is the place "Where Entrepreneurs Align" and consist of entrepreneurs, celebrities, CEOs, inventors and leaders. We have many events that take place, including Secret Sessions, ROUNDtables, Panel Discussions, and more. We needed a reservation system that had the following: easy to use, easy to setup, responsive technical support, affordable, customer service, and ability to customize the solutions we needed. After spending extensive research on many ticket and reservations systems, including large companies and small we selected Ticket Tailor. We have been using ticket tailor over a year, have had hundreds of events using ticket tailor's system and have been 100% happy with them. In fact, they have exceeded expectations and are incredible to work with.

title: Hugely impressed.
name: Andrew C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: Really easy to use and set up. Great customer support ensures any questions I had were answered quickly.

The fact that our branding is used throughout any interactivity with end users is also great.
cons: Cons: Nothing at the moment. Everything the Ticket Tailor system promises to do, it has done superbly.
overall: Overall: Excellent. Absolutely no complaints. I have been really impressed.

title: Beyond our Expectations
name: Kim B.
comments:
Comments: Our nonprofit organization utilized Ticket Tailor for our Tricky Tray Event registration. It was a fantastic experience and extremely cost effective for our needs. Our experience was great; the set up was very simplified and any questions we had were answered in a very timely manner (always the same day). Our guests had no problems (to the best of our knowledge) with registration; the staff at Ticket Tailor was able to modify our site to include extra drop downs and mandatory fields which resulted in making our lives easier and assured the guests had a better experience beginning at the registration process and through the night of the event.

I would definitely recommend Ticket Tailor to others looking to make their registration process a breeze!

title: Great online ticket solution
name: Patty S.
pros:
Pros: Easy to setup

Great customer service

Easy for our customers to purchase tickets

Great value
cons: Cons: Occasionally would like some customization that is not available, but certainly not a deal breaker
overall: Overall: Ticket Tailor has solved our event ticketing need. Before Ticket Tailor we were manually processing tickets and collecting at the door. We are a small organization, but Ticket Tailor has made our lives so much easier!

title: Perfect First Online experiencea
name: Anil D.
comments:
Comments: We have numerous charity events every year and were keen to try selling ticket online. After comparing a few sites, we decided on Ticket Tailor for 2 reasons - they have special rates for charities, and you can subscribe per event.

Setting up the event on their site was surprisingly very simple, and the box-office templates for tickets were also not difficult to set up.

After set-up was completed we sat back and watched as we received email confirmation of every ticket sold.

For the event day, you can print out door lists or use their check-in app on your mobile/tablet.

Whenever we had any enquiries, the responses were very prompt.

Overall, it was a very satisfying experience to use Ticket Tailor for online ticket sales.

title: No tickets fees
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: of course being able to sell tickets without fees is great, and the monthly subscription is reasonable as long as you guarantee to sell enough tickets that's value is more than the subscription, also it's very easy to use, and I believe that it will save most of organizers money.
cons: Cons: Some events sell mainly offline, and a few tickets online, in that case it might not be suitable for them, as the total paid subscription fees, could exceed the online sales value, so Ticket Tailor need to add more pricing options.

title: Love love love Ticket Tailor
name: Dona F.
pros: Pros: The software is easy and intuitive! And the customer service is amazing!!
cons: Cons: Doesn't have the functionality of edit the type of ticket after they have been purchased or adding additional tickets to the order.
overall: Overall: Ticket Tailor has been a perfect software for managing our online ticket sales for our music festival campground.

title: Great first experience
name: Chris F.
pros: Pros: I loved the ease-of-use it's a simple clean platform that does a good job.
cons: Cons: I was selling raffle tickets for my event which pushed me well over my plan price and into a new payment category. It would be great to have a way to circumvent something like this, but I'm not really complaining.
overall: Overall: I have had an excellent experience with ticket tailor.

title: Great features
name: Tudor S.
pros: Pros: I really like the fact that I can add it to my website and more than that, I can customise it.
cons: Cons: I don't think it's something I don't like about this software.
overall: Overall: So far I had a great experience using Ticket Tailor. I organised over 50 events using it and will continue to do so. Thanks for all the TT team who made this possible.

title: Your Event, Your Ticket!
name: Safeer M.
pros:
Pros: - Easy to use UI and integrates with our business website

- Very reasonable fees

- Payments are credited straightaway through payment gateways
cons: Cons: - Nothing in particular. The product is really worth for the fees we pay.
overall: Overall: Ticket Tailor is a such a great way to sell tickets for our events and programs.

title: Choose Ticket Tailor for Event Registration
name: Robert W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It is very easy to set up and use, easy to customize and has wonderful features that enable me to email my registration list or put the whole service on hold so I can save the monthly fee when I'm not offering events. One of the best features is the cost. It's cheaper than the big name services yet it offers just as much utility.
cons: Cons: Haven't found anything that I don't like.
overall: Overall: I am able to automate my seminar registration process so that it works while I sleep. It provides me up to date info on who has registered and allows me to communicate with them through the platform or upload data to my email service provider. I have found it to be versatile and convenient. I like a lot.

title: Excellent product
name: Emma S.
pros: Pros: It's very easy to use and the customer service is great.
cons: Cons: It's a bit complicated to add extra choices per ticket
overall: Overall: All very positive, can't fault the customer service

title: Easy to use and fast, customizable set up
name: Maggie B.
comments: Comments: I work for a small non profit organization and we had recently put together a fundraiser to raise money for our arts programs for at-risk youth in Los Angeles. We needed a ticketing system we could manage with our small staff, that connected to our PayPal account, and was easy to drop right into our website. Ticket Tailor was all of those things and so easy to customize our box office and event! I couldn't be more impressed with this software and am so grateful we found an affordable option to make ticketing for our fundraiser a total breeze for both the attendees and us. I would definitely recommend this software!

title: Ticket Tailor is the best option for a small venue.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like to ease of use. Our customers can easily buy tickets without having to jump through many hoops.
cons: Cons: I do not like that you cannot upload a seating chart and be able to pick the seats you want. I think this would be a great feature for in the future.

title: Ticket tailor made selling our show tickets easy!
name: Nicola G.
comments: Comments: We chose Ticket Tailor as it seemed to be the most suitable online booking system for our needs, and I have to say the experience has been very positive. It has great flexibility to adapt the system to suit your ticket needs and when a question did arise a quick response was received from the online Ticket Tailor team! For our show we have received 99% of our bookings online and this is the first time we have used an online booking system. Our customers have been very favourable over the ease of use and we will definitely use Ticket Tailor again for future shows!

title: Small/medium sized event service
name: Craig T.
comments: Comments: We organise medium sized gaming events for between 200-2000 people, but have always struggled to keep up with personally issued physical tickets and most ticketing providers charge high commission, have overly complex pricing and software, and restrict access to funds. Ticket Tailor has a customisable ticket shop, customisable receipts, simple web and checkout app interfaces and importantly, a no nonsense pricing system allowing event organisers direct control of their event funds - critical for personal, hobbyist or non-sponsored/non-commercial events. Excellent system!

title: Easy to use
name: Donna L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The site is very wasy to use, with very helpful online customer service, made my 1st experience of promoting an event very stress free.
overall: Overall: Theres not a lot i would change about the site, i would recommend to all that are new to this kind of software for their events.

title: Happily giving 5 starts to Ticket Tailor
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: easy to use system, lots of option to customise, very cost effective and a super responsive support team. Highly recommend!
cons: Cons: There is nothing I dislike about it the system. Find it much easier to use than other ticketing systems out there

title: Brilliant system, great customer service.
name: Chris V.
comments: Comments: I had not heard of Ticket Tailor before, and the event we were planning was a large and high-profile - i.e. I didn't want it to go wrong! But, I'm really glad we went with Ticket Tailor - it's a brilliant system, easy to use and the price is amazing, especially for charities. You can customise what data you collect, have many different ticket types, and easily create discount codes. The link-up to Mailchimp is really handy, and payment processing with Paypal was very simple. Thanks to all at Ticket Tailor for the great system.

title: Low Fees and Easy to Use!
name: Jennifer R.
comments: Comments: I have used Ticket Tailor for two events for our non-profit. Both times I needed custom fields to capture attendee data. It would of course be easier if I can edit these fields myself, but unfortunately I can't. Fortunately though, the customer service team can, and they were very quick to respond and to make the edits for me. Friendly and quick service. I will use them again.

title: A bargain cost with high end tools for online ticket sales.
name: Dominic S.
comments:
Comments: As a start up small arts company budgets matter for our events. We were looking for an online ticket sales system to use with our events. Well exploring the small print and costs with some other better known sites we were shocked at what costs were involved. So we started to look deeper and discovered Ticket Tailor a gem of a find. With unbeatable costs and a simple to use set up along with embedding ticketing into your website we had found the perfect solution.

I cannot recomend Ticket Tailor highly enough, so stop reading this and give it a try as you will not be disappointed.

title: Event for charity
name: catherine d.
comments: Comments: I'm having a really good experience with the service. We are organizing an event with our ngo. The customer service is really good as they answer eery question we have.

title: Couldn't be easier
name: Pat B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use and enabled me to sort all my ticketing needs. Definitely one I'll be using in the futurw
cons: Cons: I haven't found anything yet that would make me want to go to one of the other vendors that offer similar service

title: Easy to use and great customization!
name: John P.
position: Master Taster Sommelier and Italian Culture Experience Provider
pros: Pros: Pay per month as opposed to a "small" percentage from each transaction. That monthly fee can be "paused" when you are not in need of app.
cons: Cons: Maybe the app for check-ins could run more smoothly. But that could be user error.
overall: Overall: Better than other similar apps.

title: Good Stuff
name: Ciera A.
pros: Pros: Ease of use. I was able to customize a lot without needing to use coding skills. Also I love that I could offer multiple coupon codes and assign them to certain tickets.
cons: Cons: Sometimes the simplicity made it so I couldnt design portions exactly as I wanted but it may just be a matter of me needing to learn the program more.
overall: Overall: It helped me streamline my ticket sales without complicating the sign up process.

title: Respects and supports grassroots promoters
name: Daniel T.
comments: Comments: Ticket Tailor has been a small revolution in our ticket sales. As an event producer (and event management lecturer) it has been great to use a company that respects and supports grassroots promoters (and their audience). The monthly subscription fee makes total sense to us, represents better value, is clearly explained and offered helpful charity discount for our charity event. Having vcontrol over booking fee is important too. Customer service has been helpful. I look forward to using Ticket Tailor more

title: You can't go wrong!
name: Johanna T.
pros: Pros: This product is easy and simple to use. The reporting feature is great! It was easy to set up and manage!
cons: Cons: I honestly haven't found a con yet. When I do i will update

title: Great ticketing service
name: Harin C.
comments: Comments: I discovered ticket tailor when I was searching for an alternative to the more well known systems. The costs are amazing - monthly fee rather than per ticket, which for me, selling low cost tickets works out much better! The form builder is really easy to use and allows me to tailor it and add my own questions, and best of all is that it integrates with my website! The customer service has been amazing, with emails asking me how I'm getting on and very quick responses. Highly recommend!

title: Love this site
name: Wendy H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Very easy to use. Lots of options for events and ticket types
cons: Cons: editing the total amount of tickets available
overall: Overall: I have not had any issues with Ticket Tailor

title: We use Ticket Tailor for all of our events
name: shane g.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and setup and is very affordable
cons: Cons: Seating plans would allow us to use the product more often.
overall: Overall: Ticket Tailor is a well priced product that provides a ticketing solution that works!

title: Strongly Recommend Ticket Tailor
name: Paul S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Our business reached the point where we had to move to ticket admission. We researched a number of other companies but Ticket Tailor was by far the cheapest. We pay a monthly fee and minimal cost on each purchase. It is also simple to use and very intuitive. It can be linked to Facebook, which makes purchasing easier, and an app downloaded to your mobile allows you to check people in directly by scanning their bar code. It then shows you they have arrived and who is still to come. It is also possible to print off a hardcopy in alphabetical order so it couldn't be simpler. We have been very impressed and we are very glad we chose Ticket Tailor.
cons: Cons: The only issue is that as a company we pay the cost of the service as opposed to the customer. However, increasing the charges could absorb this.

title: Fantastic experience!
name: Alison C.
comments: Comments: Really impressed with this site. I looked into lots of different sites offering similar things but tickettailor seemed to be the cheapest. I have been very happy with it so far. It has meant that I have not had to accept any cash for tickets for our event and so this is so much better. The use of paypal is great because most people use paypal to pay for items online so it is familiar to them. Will definitely use again and recommend to other.

title: I used this application while giving out tickets for a conference we organised and it was positive
name: Dennis M.
pros:
Pros: Ticket Tailor fees are low and this makes the software affordable to even the multiple SMEs

The software is easy to use and install
cons: Cons: The online support is available mostly on business hours but it should be expanded and be available 24/7
overall: Overall: Real-time ticketing to the subscribers of our various conferences and functions that we hold

title: Finally the 'estate agent' has been taken out of ticket sales!
name: Julian F.
comments:
Comments: Bridges the gap between what the customer pays and you get paid... Finally the 'estate agent' has been taken out of ticket sales!

When your tickets are only to cover costs, and you have to charge the customer another 50% to pay the ticket website it feels like your ripping off the fans. Ticket tailor makes low price small events worth while promoting and affordable to the fans, but I can't see why it couldn't upscale for larger events.

title: Great platform for ticket sales
name: Jordan D.
pros: Pros: Easy to use for both event organisers and tickers buyers, and is great value for money compared to competition.
cons: Cons: Inability to capture data for multiple ticket holders when one person is purchasing multiple.
overall: Overall: We love using Ticket Tailor for all of our events, it's easy to set up and intuitive for customers purchasing tickets.

title: Easy, simple, effective
name: Ben C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to use, great customer service, integrated easily with my Wordpress website, and low fees. Very happy :-)

title: Easy to use with a good range of options
name: Russell C.
comments: Comments: I build online booking systems for different kinds of websites, and I needed something that would be rock solid and secure for a conference/festival based site. I needed ticketing with lots of options, variable dates for different early bird offers, various meal and ticket booking options, coupon codes, etc. In short, after surveying a range of different options, I settled on Ticket Tailor and so far I am very satisfied.

title: Very easy to set up and use and clear pricing
name: Stefanie B.
comments: Comments: We are using ticket tailor for a small event and really like the pricing; monthly (choose your subscription) versus a % of sales. Plus the fact it's free until your first ticket has been sold and the flexibility to amend you contract whenever you like. Setting it up with Stripe was super easy as well. Nice clear ticket booking site with enough flexibility for our needs. Would definitely recommend!

title: Great system and even greater customer support
name: Graham W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The system is easy to use and all major needs are catered for. The pricing is also perfect for a small members club. The most important point is that the customer support is truly first class!
cons: Cons: Difficult to think of anything. If I were to be picky it is that when you scan someone into the app you have to then touch on the name to check them in. Many of our users thought that the scanning was also the signing in.
overall: Overall: Reduction in cash based transactions.

title: Jurassic Coast Tattoo Convention UK
name: Kerry C.
comments: Comments: Delighted with the service provided by Ticket Taylor :) the one off months fee was such a good deal compared to the percentages asked for by other ticket sellers. This made budgeting much easier and of course profits higher ! The simple set up was a god send taking very little time to add the sales area to our website and facebook account. 11/10! Won't use anyone else now :)

title: At last, no more booking fees!
name: Mark C.
comments: Comments: Having been an event organiser for five years, booking fees felt like that unnecessary norm. I stumbled across Ticket Tailor when I was looking for an alternative to my previous ticketing agent and must say I was very impressed. Whist it is simplistic, it works perfectly with very fair monthly rates. The customer service is great and we managed to secure our own customised package. Would definitely recommend to other event organisers.

title: My event "box office" was up and selling tickets in a breeze
name: Nahur F.
comments:
Comments: It was so easy to set up the account with TT and install and configure the Wordpress widget that in under one hour I had a polished word press page, with the TT widget, working.

The next day, I put a link in my Facebook page, with a special tag, and now I can see where I sell more tickets on-line, our web site, or FB.

I am looking forward to using the "check-in" app for iPhone on the day of my event.

cons: Cons: I didn't originally realise we would pay Stripe fees on top of Ticket Tailor fees, so the cost savings we were expecting wasn't as big as we thought it would be. But it's still reasonable & we are still happy.
overall: Overall: We've been happy with this software and like being able to export guest lists.

Pros: Easy to use

Fair pricing

title: Tour Reservation & Food Sales System
name: Kim G.
pros: Pros: Rezware is an affordable system that was able to be customized to meet our unique needs. When doing our research, it was the only system that allowed for this customization while having a base to start from that understands our business type. The system we were looking for had to accomodate reservations for two types of daily tours running on an hourly basis. We were also able to incorporate our food and drink sales into the system which was a requirement. The reporting gives us various ways to look at our data which we found has been a real need. And, while the system took a while for everyone to get comfortable with, we now find that it is quite easy to use. There are lots of shortcuts and helpful tools within it as well. And, having the training mode that uses real data is another very useful tool. Finally, the people at Rezware have been very responsive to our questions and providing support whenever needed.
cons: Cons: Due to the customization of our system, the implementation took longer than anticipated. And, we have run into some glitches that probably wouldn't have happened if we used the system as is. But, the technology and customer support team at Rezware went above and beyond to remedy any situations that occured. There is not enough written documentation on the system so we had to develop our own reference manual. Our training sessions and calls with Rezware have always been helpful and has allowed us to map out how to use the system for our needs.
overall: Overall: Rezware is a solid system that we expect to be using for a long time. And, we look forward to growing into the system more by using the additional features that are available. The customization has been essential to the requirements of our business. And, the support on the system has been very responsive and understanding of our needs.

title: RezWare is a good basic Tour Package Management System
name: Wendi K.
pros: Pros: The base package is easy to understand, allows for quite a bit of self-managed customization and the RezWare staff has been very helpful in training us how to get the most out of the system. The RezWeb Online module was easy to implement and the RezWeb programmers did a good job integrating with our web site graphics.
cons: Cons: Our biggest challenge has been our own learning curve in understanding the impact of some of the custom programming changes we have requested of RezWare. We would have been better off to learn the system first and then decide what we wanted changed.
overall: Overall: My recommendation is that you first map your current requirements against the RezWare system. You need to understand what drives the data for your management reports and how the data flows through the system. Once you fully understand the core competency of Rezware, identify any potential custom modification requirements. Be sure and allocate enough time for testing before you need to go live with any changes.

title: Quite Flexible
name: Rachel G.
pros: Pros: The system accurately displays reports, is quick to navigate and once you've been at it a while it really becomes second nature. The support staff is quick to respond to queries and explaining the "brain" behind the system so you know why things work as they do.
cons: Cons: Some small system hangups with printing at times. Sometimes it takes a little longer than desired to get changes made but then again our system is pretty specialized considering its initial design.
overall: Overall: The system is good and it works. We have a very specialized version as we use it for racing reservations and keeping count of gift certificates, strange discounts, laps, guests and programs and they've been able to make it work well for us.

title: Great experiance
name: Heather S.
pros: Pros: RezWare has outstanding customer service, showed great attention to every detail important to our business. Worked with us after business hours, promptly answer questions on weekends. Very professional and knowledgeable during our on- site training.
cons: Cons: We didn't use RezWare sooner!
overall: Overall: I recommend Rezware's Tours and Events solution to streamline daily operations, and enjoy a substantial profit increase with its booking on line capability.

title: Great Service!
name: Brianna B.
pros: Pros: Easy to learn and easy to use. The numerous pricing and flight scheduling options make our reservation system efficient and precise. Should I ever need help, friendly tech support is always available.
cons: Cons: It would be easier to organize the flight codes if it were possible to remove the ones we no longer use.
overall: Overall: We have always been happy with the customer service.

title: General Manager and Marketing Director
name: Robert D.
pros: Pros: I can easily export my reports to the forest service, and we can change all the data on our end.
cons: Cons: Sometimes it takes several days for our changes to take place.
overall: Overall: It has worked well for us and helped our company to grow.

title: Manager
name: Kathy R.
pros: Pros: Have been very happy overall. We are still in a training mode but everyone has been most helpful.
cons: Cons: Not to a point where I have any yet.
overall: Overall: Definetly would recommend for any similar business.

title: Excellent value for money, capable platform for Agile projects with remote/global teams
name: Simona G.
pros: Pros: Quick setup, ease of use, features-rich. The UI scales from a tablet-size screen up to large 30-inch monitors. The software is very fast and data entry for stories and issues is very well designed: data entry in Herogami is effective and quick and this is especially true when entering issues, which is a pain in other competing products. The visual Kanban boards are very clear and cards are well organized, there's multiple views to choose from, including swimlanes based on a large number of attributes. Effort planning and tracking is available as well as "active notes" that send comments via emails. Herogami notifies relevant events via email: assign / reassign, closing, notes and comment being entered, etc. Every action is recorded and listed in the project / sprint timeline with links to the entities being modified, this is actually very impressive. The UI is very, very clean and elegant and this contributes to the overall ease of use: our development team was quick to get up to speed with the platform that, literally, felt into our process like none we tested before. This has happened most likely by virtue of its conceptual underlyling clarity and sharpness.
cons: Cons: The product is very flexible. In order to fully leverage all the features you want to spend some time with it. Yet the admin / setup UI is very clear (it's not Jira!) and taking it for a spin is a breeze. Document upload features may benefit from some drag'n'drop hot spots.
overall: Overall: Our team is sparse and remotely located, with developers living far away from each other. Running a software development consulting firm with a remote teams requires a project tracking tool that is available 24 by 7 and does not get in the way. We found that Herogami provides the right balance in terms of features completeness, ergonomics and cost. The platform is available in the cloud at a very convenient rate and and team setup is a breeze. Projects can be created in a matter of seconds and staff allocated. Agile practices are fully supported (sprints, stories, issues, backlog) and the shared wiki plays a roles in tracking project specs as well as review meetings. Document management and the shared project calendars are also a plus. Overall the platform does a lot for what it costs. Interfacing customer support was a breeze and they responded in a matter of hours. Overall the product is solid and is considerable easier to use than other comparable platforms in the Agile market.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: The company offers the option of hosting it on your own server, I have not explored this path but it's worth checking.

title: I was tasked to find a good kanban tool, this one is the best
name: Monica G.
pros: Pros: Ease of use and very quick and intuitive setup. Once you get to know a couple menus everything falls into place naturally.
cons: Cons: Very few. A native mobile app would be great, yet the web version works great on both iPad and iPhone with a little attention. Kanban is not a tool for small screens anyway. I contacted support and got told that a mobile app for iOS and Android is on its way.
overall: Overall: We manage a portfolio of complex projects with sparse and remote teams. Herogami does an excellent job keeping everyone in the loop. A good balance in terms of features and ease of use, not too simple that it feels like a toy, not too complex to get in the way or require external consultants. It'a a 5 stars product for me and my team of approx 50 people.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: The company offers the option of hosting it on your own server, I have not explored this path but it's worth checking.

title: A friendy, easy to use and complete Agile project management software at a fair price!
name: Luca M.
pros:
Pros: Herogami is how its logo represents it: light, flexible, quick and fun to use!

The aspect that I liked the most is that you can start to use it right away, as its interface is intuitive and uncluttered and you can discover the functions as you use it, in a natural way.
cons:
Cons: I don't know, I think it's subjective based on one's preferences and needs...

Personally I don't have something negative to say in particular.
overall: Overall: Overall, the feeling of working with Herogami is very pleasant: it's not a boring, intricate and heavy software that you have to bear with, nor a toy that lacks a lot of features and flexibility.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: The company offers the option of hosting it on your own server, I have not explored this path but it's worth checking.

title: Herogami: full featured project management application
name: Roberto M.

pros:
Pros: I love the many views built in Herogami, you can view your projects from many angles without losing any important information: the Kanban Task Planner, in particular, has the correct balance of information and data that satisfies my daily needs. In any view you have a vast list of options to filter your data and nobody in my team has never had a problem to retrieve any information.

The sprints dashboard is so tidy and essential that you could share it to any external stakeholder without the fear to be incomprehensible.

Data entry forms are very effective: you can easily manage the rapid flow of ideas tipical of a brainstorming without losing a bit.
cons:
Cons: After few months of use, I miss the possibility to create a new task directly from the kanban lane and save and share customized views.

I'd like to have a Zapier integration also.
overall:
Overall: Herogami has the rare ability to make you feeling confortable after a brief session of work: no matter how complex the project to manage, its smart data-entry form, its many effective builtin' views puts YOU at the helm of the ship.

Whether you are an old Agile Jedi or a young Padawan you will find the answer at any doubts within a mouse click moreover it's sumptuous design makes you eager to use it.
