title: We Love TICKETsage
name: Trish H.
pros:
Pros: The absolute best thing about TICKETsage is their customer service. When the system was first implemented last summer, with our season tickets being printed and mailed from our office for the first time, we needed to depend on the staff of TICKETsage heavily. We came into the office on the weekend to print the tickets and were on the phone with TICKETsage support multiple times during the day. Since then, anytime we have the slightest problem, we are very comfortable calling (in an emergency) or emailing (if the situation is not dire) TICKETsage support. They are very prompt in returning our calls or email.

The day to day operation of the system is easy to use and dependable and it is pretty much impossible to "mess up" an application as the system almost always has you confirm or apply an application after it has been changed. The staff at TICKETsage is friendly and helpful even for us "non-techy" computer users.
cons: Cons: The TICKETsage system has a lot of features that we do not use to the full potential. They seem complicated and confusing, although after a year of day to day use, I am becoming more comfortable with trying to solve problems before I call for support. Occasionally (maybe 3 or 4 times in the past year) there has been an error that needed to be fixed at the TICEKTsage end of the system. Only once in the past year did the system "go down" and was off-line for 15 or 20 minutes.
overall: Overall: Overall, we LOVE TICKETsage! The few problems we have had are completely over shadowed by the great things about TICKETsage. I am sure that if we had the time to schedule a session with TICKETsage, they would be more than happy to help us learn how to use the features that we do not fully use and the reports (and there are many) from which we, thus far, have not been able to gather information. I'm sure it's all there, we just need to learn how to use it.

title: TICKETsage has gotten it right!
name: Willis A.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, flexibility, addons, customer service. This system is going to save us a lot of money through ease of use and reduced labor costs. If you have a subscriber base, data rollover, speed of processing, and package sales capability are very strong and useful features.
cons: Cons: What few problems we had because of our special needs were taken care of in a prompt and courteous manner. Training could be improved with a manual and more personalized training to eliminate user error. In a few cases we found ourselves not understanding parts of the software. TICKETsage has been proactive in solving problems and helping us.
overall: Overall: After years of Ticketmaster, Tickets.com, New Era, and Showare, it is refreshing to find a ticket software that completely fits our needs. Their CEO was a breeze to work with and we settled into our deal with few complications and very little legal oversight. Our legal counsel pretty much said that everything was great with their contract and we should sign, this was a first for us. Their entire staff is to be applauded for their customer service and genuine attitude.

title: TICKETsage Untiy platform review
name: Jack N.
pros: Pros: Untiy has an intuitive UI, easy to use for box office staff and patrons alike. It's exceptionally reliable for a hosted platform. I can't say enough about the tech support. They're always helpful; quick to respond and to add or modify features, if that's appropriate. Back-end reporting functions make it easy to generate basic reports or to export data from more complex analysis or marketing purposes. The system maintains reliable, accurate inventories for online and box office sales. Credit card processing is extremely fast, and they made it easy for us to settle directly to our bank. They have managed to balance ease of use with flexibility, making this a good product for almost any venue.
cons: Cons: Some parts of the back-end are a bit rusty, although these are mostly cosmetic issues. Currently, online buyers can't use existing patron records resulting in duplicate patron info for orders placed online. I'd like for patrons to have to ability to use an email/password combo to order tickets. There's a tool to merge orders under these duplicate records, but that's a step I'd rather avoid...
overall: Overall: In my opinion, of the systems I've looked at, Ticketsage offers services, features and really great technical support at a price point that can't be beat. We ticket about 30 events per year - 12,000 to 15,000 tickets per year - and Ticketsage performs pretty close to flawlessly.

title: Flexible and User Friendly
name: Kate R.
pros: Pros: We have found Ticketsage to be incredibly user friendly. The ease of training new staff on this system makes it so valuable for our organization. Additionally, Curious Theatre Company has recently gone through significant changes in seating, all of which Ticketsage has accomodated with flexibility.
cons: Cons: We've found that Ticketsage is not particularly compatible with Mac systems, which poses a problem for our organization.
overall: Overall: Ticketsage is the strongest of the midsize ticketing systems that I have experienced, particularly because of their very responsive technical team.

title: Ticketsage meets our needs
name: Weldon B.
pros:
Pros: The Ticketsage system has helped us customize ticket sales and donations to meet the very specific needs of our organization. Integrating development and ticket purchase information has never been easier for us.

Steven and Sandy have been the best at understanding our business and working with us to achieve our goals.
cons: Cons: Could use more people in Tech Support however Justine, Josh and Jessica are amazing.
overall:
Overall: The more you know about your specific needs the better Ticketsage is able to help you.

A wonderful ticketing tool.

title: Theater Works reviews Ticketsage
name: Sandy L.
pros:
Pros: Very user friendly.

Good tech support, friendly people.
cons: Cons: Reports are sometimes not what we would like, but they are always willing to work with us.
overall: Overall: Highly recommend.

title: Well-rounded event management tool for non-profits, small, and medium businesses
name: Phil O.
position: Team Lead, Student Recruitment and Prospective Student Centre
pros: Pros: I've used Picatic across a two post-secondary institutions and with multiple non-profit groups. Picatic provides flexible and easy-to-use tools to handle registrations, check-ins, payments, and communication for your event. The crux of the system is in the ability to quickly create an attractive and responsive basic event registration in very little time. The ability to collect robust, custom information from clients is very helpful. Recently-added capacities to work in teams/groups and to manage events with multiple dates are very welcome. Support staff are quick and helpful.
cons: Cons: Some of what makes the software the simplest/friendliest also causes some restrictions - i.e. the survey tool is limited in its configuration options meaning you cannot structure/validate the data, or the multiple parties cannot register together (parent with child, spouse with spouse).
overall: Overall: This software provides a single tool for our department of four to create, administer, and market events to our clients and prospective market.

title: Easy to use ticketing product with a very reasonable price tag
name: Amanda G.
comments: Comments: Our company needed registration for two different types of events, a race/rally and a tour. Being completely new to the event space, we didn't realize how useful the management tools would be. The attendee lists, analytics, and email tools were crucial. In addition, Picatic's interface is really user-friendly. Our team had varying degrees of computer skill, and no one had a problem navigating the management tools. We required support to issue a complicated refund, their support team was prompt and friendly when dealing with our team and customer. Overall we've had a great experience with Picatic's product and team.
pros: Pros: As mentioned, the management tools were a huge asset to our event. Now that we've used them we'd have a hard time living without downloadable entrance lists, attendee surveys, Google analytics, and Mailchimp integration. Picatic's interface is also really nice, it was user-friendly and intuitive.
cons: Cons: There are a few features missing. (I understand that start-ups need to start somewhere and build up) We would love the ability to add time zones and close an even early. We would love to take advantage of their API for future events - a more seamless check-out that looks like part of our website will be really beneficial.

title: Simple And effective
name: Mike D.
pros: Pros: Super easy to use and doesn't have any glitches. It is super quick and easy to set up events update them and pull up reports at a glance
cons: Cons: Wish that I could do T-shirt sizes and add-on items on the app when checking people in. Its a huge deal for a large event

title: Outstanding platform that handles my events like I have a team working with me!
name: Jennifer S.
pros: Pros: I love that it is so easy to use. The structure is intuitive and it is easy for my clients to use as well. There are lots of features that allow me to host my event the way I want to - I can set it and forget it! Love the updates that come to my inbox and the ease of refunds and the customer support is AMAZING!
cons: Cons: I love it all. There is nothing that I do not like about this software platform. I would love one spot to download reports in easy PDF format for my accountant :)

title: As an event planner, I am looking for ease of use for myself and my clients - Picatic does it all!
name: Jennifer D.
pros:
Pros: - Ease of use for setting up events

- Donation options for fundraisers

- Quick and easy to set up your account initially

- Reports available to event organizers

- Being able to mass email attendees

- Comp tickets easily setup and distributed

- The Picatic app for checking in patrons

- Quick and friendly customer support

- Up to date on trends and technology

- Choice to pay or pass on the ticketing fee
cons: Cons: I have yet to find a Con with Picatic. I have been pleased with my experience on the multiple events that I have setup.

title: The Picatic interface is very easy to use and we have always had great customer service.
name: Michelle B.
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to manage our events through the website. We can gather all the information we need through the surveys and the Picatic collects everything into useful reports that we can download and save. This cuts down on the need to go back and forth by email with registrants.
cons: Cons: In the past we have had some trouble with cutoff times between early-bird and regular ticket sales, but the Picatic team was very responsive and have made changes to address this. We found this aspect easier to navigate with recent events.

title: Picatic is Great!
name: Gabriella B.
comments: Comments: I have used Picatic for 2 events now (one Halloween Fundraising Event and one to ticket an Independent Film screening), and I absolutely love the service. The main appeal for me is its user friendly interface and customizable nature. For both events, I have been able to set up very aesthetically pleasing pages with custom graphics, posters and videos. I also very much appreciate that all customer information is collected and a guest list is complied for you.
pros: Pros: -There is always support available if you run into troubles. I personally have rarely needed to use the customer support because the set up process is very easy to follow. - Donation feature and customer survey features are great additions to the regular ticketing app. - Visual customization easily done.
cons: Cons: - When loading a video onto your page, I noticed that it can only appear at the top of the page. It would be cool to be able to imbed this anywhere on the page, just like you can imbed photos.

title: A classic site for ticketing.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It is easy to use this system. It is great it has different features available. A big pro is that Picatic is always innovating new features for a better customer experience.
cons: Cons: The price has increased significantly over the past few years. This has been a challenge for our nonprofit organization that does not make as much money as a hospital foundation or foodbank so it is posing a challenge that could eventually direct us elsewhere.
overall: Overall: The features are ample for a good ticketing site, and the customer service is really good.

title: Great Canadian Product for Events
name: Jane Ellen F.
comments: Comments: It is awesome that a Canadian company has come up with a way to give events a free service. Setting up tickets & the ticket website was very easy. One does not need to know any coding language making this a very appealing system to volunteer/charitable groups. If you are in need of a simple system, this is an event ticket system for you. I would highly recommend it to volunteer/charitable groups running an event that need a simple registration system with a ticket output. I personally look forward to the system evolving. Currently the additional fields answers download in a separate report known as "Guest Surveys", thus having to merge the entrance list and guest survey list together for a complete report - if you are not good at excel, this would be a hindrance. As well, you can't run multiple events, with different bank accounts, under one Picatic account. As an event planner who has multiple clients, with multiple events, this means running multiple accounts and is inconvenient. All in all, it is a great system that just needs some time to evolve. I love getting my weekly sales reports in my inbox - I don't have to go into the system to see how the tickets are selling. Thank you Picatic - I can't wait to see what you do next!

title: Was able to upload information quickly.
name: Tracey C.
pros: Pros: Takes credit card payments and easy to edit. Can pay for multiple "tickets" at one time. For the most part was user-friendly for the attendees when registering, although a few did have difficulties with payment.
cons: Cons: Not as user-friendly as I hoped. Had to contact CS frequently because the process to make things active was not super self-explanatory. Event attendees did get confused as to if they had to bring their "tickets" to the event.

title: Easy to use platform, visually pleasing, more functionality than other ticketing sites
name: Nashelley K.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, easy to integrate onto website; good flexibility in design; customer service team is quick to help
cons: Cons: Some limitations in the functionality, but Picatic may already be working to remedy these - front of mind is that with promo codes, we can't limit the number of tickets that can be purchased with that code, we can only limit the number of tickets that can be purchased per ticket type... would like more flexibility with codes and ticket types. I'd also like to be able to view full lists, which promo code was applied, and reorder the lists online rather than having to download each time.

title: I've used a variety of ticketing systems this is the most flexible while being easy to use.
name: Dave M.
pros: Pros: I run a series of festivals and always need different ticket pricing tiers and discounts. This system makes that really easy to do.
cons: Cons: Could be some better exporting of sales for accounting. The door reports are great, but I'd like to export out a summary of sales for reporting to stakeholders and export transactions to an accounting system.
overall: Overall: I've sold a lot of tickets to events through this system. It is my go-to ticketing system these days.

title: I've enjoyed some of the feature as the ticket designer, but our customers have had many issues.
name: Sara P.
pros: Pros: I like the sleek, professional look of Picatic. I like that it easily integrates with our website. I've had helpful customer service.
cons: Cons: I don't like that it makes me create the same survey every time I make a new ticket. I don't like that to pay with an invoice customers have to click "OFFLINE", which is very confusing and often unclear that this option will allow them to do an invoice. I don't like that I can't customize the email or the invoice that goes out to customers after they've bought a ticket. I don't like how much time I've spent manually putting in customer information because so many of them have had trouble using this product. :(
overall: Overall: Using this product helped me learn what features I truly need and am looking for in a ticketing service so that I could make an informed decision on the next company we choose.

title: Reliable platform for hosting events - looks great and gaining traction.
name: Bonnie F.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and looks great. Great user interface for both event creators and for event attendees. Happy to use a made-in-Canada solution for my local events.
cons: Cons: Doesn't have the same level of adoption in US and UK (where I have hosted events before). My audience/attendees in those geographies are still more familiar with registering for events via Eventbrite.
overall: Overall: Easy to use for free and paid events, easy to manage RSVP list.

title: Easy to Get Up and Running Quickly
name: Sabrina B.
pros: Pros: Picatic is very user-friendly and easy to set up quickly. Its fees are less than similar sites. The customer service is very responsive and they have a great help section for when you get stuck.
cons: Cons: The only issue I have had is with the map feature pulling the wrong address even if the address is entered correctly. This has caused some confusion with event attendees but nothing major.

title: Great design and functionality for event management
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I loved the easy interface and access to important information about the event and attendees. It took a few minutes to set up the event and start selling tickets. The layout looked great as well! Being able to link between our site and the event page was also very useful.
cons: Cons: We had a few issues with attendees unable to process payment for tickets, that may have been on the bank's side but still made selling tickets a bit more complicated. Support replied to requests in a timely fashion to help us deal with any issues though.

title: Always dependable and easy to set up.
name: Rosemary C.
pros: Pros: The ability to track attendance and payments and to download lists for use at events. Ability to create and upload our invitations
cons: Cons: Hard to understand what was collected and then paid to us -v-s what comes from stripe. Would like to see the difference between what was stated to be the final amount to pay out and what goes to stripe to pay out.
overall: Overall: Ease of use and ability to track events and budget.

title: A good ticket system that will be excellent with time
name: Sam L.
pros: Pros: Integration into other website is good. Prefer the look and feel a lot more than Eventbrite. Also, it feels a lot more white label in its design.
cons: Cons: Lack of customisation is very limiting. Colours, labels, buttons, etc. They really have room to improve in customisaton. Also, I find it very annoying that they don't have support 24/7/365
overall: Overall: Go implementation for WordPress and one off events.

title: Utilizing Picatic as a non-event service
name: B W.
comments: Comments: Robbie has been great in working with me to use the service for our business card ordering model. Overall it is great. Sometimes it gets confusing when you update things and without knowing, I have to figure out how to find the things I am looking for. Entrance list for example keeps getting re-organized so I have to search around to figure out where it is located etc.

title: Easy to use ticket management software!
name: Barrie T.
pros: Pros: I love the easy to use features and the ability to customize each event to our branding. Customer Service response time is fast with excellent follow-up from our representative. Our issues were handled with high priority and quickly resolved.
cons: Cons: I would love to have more editing capabilities and more diverse survey options. It would be beneficial to be able to assign more than one survey to a category. Right now, only one survey can be assigned to a group.

title: I absolutely love picatic. I've been using them for a few years and have absolutely no issues.
name: Danielle M.
pros: Pros: Their customer support is amazing. They are quick to respond and the software is easy to use for both the creator and purchaser. Thank you!
cons: Cons: There are no cons. It's very informative and easy to use. The system is very clear and concise. The money gets transferred on time and I cannot say enough good things about the customer support.

title: I've used Picatic for Innovation Island's event registration platform for years.
name: Chelsea P.
pros: Pros: I mostly like how user-friendly this software is. It is so simple to build a registration page for events. I also like the mobile app for registrations.
cons: Cons: Hard to say...I think mobile capability could be improved. I remember not being able to add walk-in registrants to the mobile platform the last time I used the app for an event.

title: An excellent product for simple events.
name: Lynda T.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use and set-up. Visually attractive and delegates found it easy to navigate to make bookings
cons: Cons: No option to provide partial refunds through Picatic in the case of a cancellation fee being deducted. A place is not reserved until the purchase is complete. This caused us problems with a fast-selling event in that delegates had the ticket but by the time they completed checkout, the ticket had gone to someone else who could type faster.

title: Great service that I have used for 3+ events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The interface is really user-friendly and makes throwing an event really simple. We can literally get an event up and running within 30 minutes
cons: Cons: We have had a few small tech issues with the service, but luckily the customer support has been really helpful in fixing any issues.

title: Great platform
name: Titus F.
pros: Pros: The ability to add surveys to ticket types so that we can create the right attendee experience. We have used these surveys to provide the right type of swag bag for our conferences.
cons: Cons: The functionality of the Android app could be improved so that its a more useful tool for my volunteers checking people in at the door

title: Excellent customer service, and site is generally easy to use.
name: Jan S.
pros: Pros: Can be free to me, and is reasonably easy to use. It gives folks an easy online sign up option for events, whether free of for an entrance fee.
cons: Cons: Some of our attendees have had trouble with the credit card process for some reason. although they were quite open to feedback about the potential problem on the site.

title: Easy to use, great UX and good price
name: Jeff G.
pros: Pros: I like that the platform gives you a landing page to basically direct all traffic to, versus having to "house it" on my existing site.
cons: Cons: I haven't found any significant dislikes with the software after a few years of using it, it has consistently met my expectations.

title: We are satisfied with the service that is provided to us via picatic
name: Adam S.
pros: Pros: We like the ease of use, and the interface is great feature. Stripe payments us a nice feature as well.
cons: Cons: The lack of a sold out function, if we could have sold out header come up on the site after the tickets are sold out.

title: Easy event and ticketing platform.
name: Kevin W.
pros: Pros: Picatic is extremely simple to use, thr payment is quick and directly deposited, and lots of stats are tracked .
cons: Cons: This may not be entirely correct, but in the past, once an event is started, changes can't be made. Luckily support is quick to help.

title: Picatic has given me the ability to have my attendees register right from our website.
name: Joan S.
comments:
Comments: The leaning curve was a little difficult when I first started but now I feel comfortable. I just started using the Pro features and so far I like them.

The one thing I discussed with Robbie was the issue of offering Early Purchase discounts and his suggestion was to create multiple pages so that when the deadline for one was over the new one would be in effect. Other than that I really have not had problems with your products.

I have noticed that you now have a setup to offer clients your own processing of credit cards. One of the reasons I choose Strip was the instant payments into my account. My small business does not have sufficient cash flow to pay vendors upfront, if I have to wait for the money until after the event is over. I feel this may be an issue with small companies like my self.

I teach continuing education classes and adding classes to your list of options for what the event is doing would be a nice little addition.

title: Very easy to ser up, people recognize the brand and buy tickets and made donations easily
name: Maru A.
pros: Pros: Once you set up your event , the advertising is very easy because the target can see where to get the tickets .
cons: Cons: So far we didn't find any problem with the software, we have been using this software for 6 years and never have a problem.

title: Great for event management and centralizes multiple aspects of event in one place
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: - Amazing for ticket management because I can monitor promo code use, entrance lists and create attendee reports

- Creates a shareable link which makes it easy to send to potential attendees

- Very user friendly and easy to navigate

-
cons:
Cons: - I don't like that I feel i need to charge more for tickets

- Would like to have more than one administrator for events instead of having to share a log in

- I wish they had a searchable database

- I wish there was a 'email all attendees' option

title: We really like picatic, it is user friendly and customer friendly
name: Jessica G.
pros: Pros: the design is beautiful and has a professional look. It is easy to set up and has all the features we need.
cons: Cons: sometimes the QR codes are difficult to pull up on an android device; however this has not been a huge issue

title: Use picatic heavily for regular classes I run.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Saves me time. It is easy to duplicate past events, maintain all the settings and create a new event. Easy to pull reports to create a mailing list and the payment integration is flawless.
cons: Cons: due to me always duplicating past events to save time, the current config of the multi-day event is somewhat cumbersome. It would be nice to be able to multi-select and delete dates in this setting. A small annoyance for an otherwise great platform.
overall: Overall: It's time savings. It's well laid out, and just functions properly. I want to be able to quickly create an event, and sell tickets. Picatic allows me to do this in minutes and I can focus my time and effort on advertising and getting sales instead of just setting up a page.

title: I enjoyed the sleek layout, easy interface, and great customer support.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I liked their visually appealing layout, easy-to-use interface, great customer support, and the check-in system.
cons: Cons: Integration with Facebook wasn't available at the time. Hope it is now. The biggest reason i would choose Picatic over Eventbrite is the sleek layout. I wish there could be more options availble to adjust the page layout.

title: Very good
name: Karen F.
comments:
Comments: Great product.

For the most part, easy to learn and use.

Customer service is excellent.

A couple of pointers would have made for a better experience first time through:

- before I can click on "live" let me know what i *can't* change once its live i.e. web address

- more clarity about pricing ... i felt that i had to do some searching to figure out what my ticket price would be, and whether I needed pro or not, and what I would need to purchase (in addition to picatic) to be able to charge for events.

One very minor bugs:

- in the event information panel, when I click on country, and then move my cursor to the next line, the country changes. This has happened with each of the four events I've made. I've discovered the workaround is to fill in the city first, then the country then the province i.e. not the order you've got them on the page.

-

title: Picatic is easy to use and costs are lower for non profit organizations, which is a huge plus.
name: Warren M.
pros: Pros: The software is very easy to use and there are some fail safes in place in the event you make an error. I like the simple step by step process that you get walked through when you create an event. The analytics after an event goes live is also very valuable as it gives insight to the success of the event and how to improve it.
cons: Cons: You cannot re-open a closed event. Even if the event was closed in error, you have to get Picatic's admins to re-open it.
overall: Overall: Easy and friendly to use.

title: I had a great experience
name: Joseph G.
comments: Comments: I liked my experience with Picatic... Unfortunately I did not advertise my page well because I had to use my website page because it has the price in Canadian and US $ at the same time.

title: All I needed
name: Hans S.
pros: Pros: The design of the event page looks very neat and stylish. No need to create my own events landing page. It's very quick it easy to create a good events landing page.
cons: Cons: The user interface is a bit fiddly and I would like to see more option to make the events page bespoke, by moving features around on the events page.

title: Has been great so far!
name: Santiago O.
position: Operations & Partner Relations Lead, Account Manager
pros: Pros: We use Picatic for our quarterly panel talks. I like the platform for its ease of use, ability to customize, integrations, and the fact that I can send out emails to invitees directly from the platform.
cons: Cons: The discovery feature is not the best. It's hard for people to find our event directly from the platform.

title: Relatively smooth and seamless.
name: Verified Reviewer
position: Operations & Partner Relations Lead, Account Manager
pros: Pros: The aesthetics for ticket buyers and mobile integration is well done. The overall design is intuitive and simple to use.
cons: Cons: percentage lost from ticket sakes. Also, there are some options that are too many clicks away and take away from the simplicity from the rest of the user experience.
overall: Overall: Simplicity and ease of use.

title: Great! Makes events easy!
name: Verified Reviewer
position: Operations & Partner Relations Lead, Account Manager
pros: Pros: We can check people in as they arrive to the events and track how many people are coming for fire code. Also helps to promote events to other audiences.
cons: Cons: Nothing! I like it a lot better than other apps I have used. It's user-friendly and great to use.
overall: Overall: Making our meetup events and registration way easier to use

title: Everything has been good with the software, easy to set up and manage.
name: Jarred C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It has been easy to set up our event and manage the sales. There has been no lag or issues between people submitting inquiries online and our ability to communicate with them.
cons: Cons: I know that this would be in the preferences, but the daily sales reports have come in a couple of times as two reports for the day. I could probably shut them off, just slightly a hassle to clear them from my inbox.
overall: Overall: Transparency and ease of use.

title: just fine, but not overly advanced
name: Sean B.
pros: Pros: It's simple to set up and use, even for the novice. I don't have 65 other characters to put into this space. Sorry.
cons: Cons: Limited functionality, but works well and serves the purpose for a novice. I don't have 25 other characters to put into this space. Sorry.

title: Always flawless
name: Janice D.
pros: Pros: The results/look of the event page looks amazing! I like how you can make the web page address customizable.
cons: Cons: The spacing challenges when putting in content on the page. I do not have anything else to state. I can image that Picatic has so much potential so I look forward to what lies ahead.

title: Good software, good layout
name: zareen r.
pros: Pros: Professional nicely made page, easy payment option, quick update of changes . Tickets arrive nicely in email.
cons: Cons: No human interaction/chat bot of no use due to time difference, Change of dates of event not easy to make. Not much customization.

title: Great
name: Ratchadej W.
pros: Pros: The best part of Picatic is that you are able to do almost everything. Scan in the phone and add the date of what your costumer would like to attend. And there is much more
cons: Cons: The payment method is not covered all the countries. But well most of them are covered. That's good enough.

title: Helpful for tracking events
name: Christopher T.
pros: Pros: Picatic is good--it'll allow you to track events, what you've signed up for, and it has an ability to add the invitation or RSVP onto your Wallet on your phone. It's easy to keep the events organized with Picatic, especially when someone has multiple events to get to each week.
cons: Cons: The main problem I would see with Picatic is that their "add" to the Wallet in your phone doesn't have much information. It just has the basic details, rather than adding the event organizer or anything else.
overall: Overall: Good and useful.

title: Easy, attractive, well-designed event solution
name: Laura G.
pros: Pros: It looks professional and easy very simple for my clients to use. It's well worth the fees if you need an external event host.
cons: Cons: A little hard to navigate on the backend. I usually must click around three or four times to find the info I want when managing the event.

title: VEC: used picatic for 2 paid and 2 free event
name: Pietra B.
comments:
Comments: PROS:

super easy to use and manage

amazing customer service

great built-in features to help you build a better registration page, communicate clearly with attendees, and create a hierarchy of information

title: I have been using picatic for a few years now for fundraising events.
name: Paulina B.
pros: Pros: Picatic is easy to use, user intuitive and has excellent customer support. Would highly recommend for event planners as it provides a comprehensive report.
cons: Cons: One time a feature disappeared. However, when I reached out o customer service it was fixed right away.

title: One of the keys to the success of the Stanstead House Concerts Network - SHCN
name: Hal N.
comments: Comments: We began leveraging the power of Picatic about halfway through the 2015 Season of the Stanstead House Concerts Network. My only regret is that we should have started earlier. The team at Picatic is responsive - even when dealing with a small family music project like ours. They have answered our questions and resolved any issues - almost all of them due to operator-error (mine) with patience and understanding. Working with Picatic allows us to focus on actually hosting concerts rather than having to deal with all of the minutia related to ticket sales. The unique url links are excellent for promoting our events on social media - and our audience members report the purchasing process is quick, easy and secure. Quite frankly, Picatic has been one of the keys to our success.

title: Simple, beautiful event ticketing platform
name: Jenn M.
pros: Pros: I love the professional look I can give my events, all the way down to purchasing your tickets. It makes me feel more credible.
cons: Cons: I wish it integrated with square payments, because stripe takes a week to be deposited into my account. Square is only a day or two.

title: I enjoy usng Picatic, would recommend to to anyone, love the Picatic is a Canadian company!
name: Marie Helene S.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and support is there when you need it. Easy to edit and adjust event info as necessary.
cons: Cons: some additional features would be helpful in terms of sharing the event on to other social media platforms.
overall: Overall: Events that I have posted have been well received and attended.

title: I've run about a dozen events with Picatic and am extremely happy.
name: Michael P.
pros: Pros: Gorgeous event pages, incredibly easy to use interface. Everything is highly customizable. In particular I like the "multi-day events" feature that we use for hosting the same event each month. I get a response from the support team within 24 hours and they are eager to help.
cons: Cons: The fees work out to about 7% which eats into our profits. But, it means we don't have to set up our own website to sell tickets.
overall: Overall: We've run about a dozen events and grossed in the 5 figures. Our customers seem to love our offerings because our conversion rate is over 6%

title: Great platform for events.
name: Jessie-Lynn M.
pros: Pros: I like this software because it is fairly easy to use. I also find it's easy for clients to register.
cons: Cons: For me, I would like the multiple week formats to be a bit easier to do. I found it a bit of an issue and had to re-enter a few times. It's not that big of a deal. It may have been me at the time I was creating the event. I was too rushed.

title: The platform has been a great addition to our events.
name: Marjorie S.
pros: Pros: The sponsor feature is nice. I like that the branding appears to be more like my company rather than Picatic.
cons:
Cons: I don't like that we can't call someone.

I wish there were a few more features or enhancements that I enjoyed from Event Brite.
overall: Overall: I have recommended this software to my entire team, by the way!

title: use for a variety of free and paid events. Was very easy to figure out
name: Colleen Y.
pros: Pros: easy of use and tracking. Ability to print off entrance list. Surveys (great for capturing dietary restrictions for dinner events). Comp ticket feature makes it very easy to send tickets to sponsors.
cons: Cons: not very flexible for sponsors - can't scale logos or designate categories such as Gold, Silver, Bronze

title: Great program to simple events.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The program is very easy to add information and and having a standard template makes it consistent to attendees. Anytime I have a question I use the chat box and ALWAYS get an answer in just a few hours- that's amazing!
cons: Cons: I'd like to have more functionally to choice what credit card processor we use. If a company is purchasing a table of 10 (for a different cost than 10 individual tickets) for the system to ask for each attendees name without having to create a survey. If you create a survey it take manual work to see on the entrance list who else is coming as we need names of attendees not just the ticket for entry.

title: Love it
name: Jen F.
pros: Pros: The low fees. Simplicity of the program.
cons: Cons: I don't really have any recommendations. The program works for the need we have and it is reliable.
overall: Overall: Great.

title: It's an absolutely fantastic tool. Seamless, cool looking, great support.
name: Dean S.
pros: Pros: The ease of use, nice clean look of the pages and support is always available when you need it. Users have always loved it and feedback has been it's simple.
cons: Cons: Could do with some slight optimization for mobile. For example, when building a page on an iphone it's not as easy as desktop.

title: Standout event marketing tool, ease of use for both event planners and customers
name: Christine M.
comments:
Comments: Picatic enables the event planner to showcase their event in the best possible way.

Setting up an event is quick and easy and enables non-profit's such as ourselves to recognize our sponsors in a meaningful way.

Picatic is not only a great product but set on revolutionizing the events marketing space with a great team who listen to their customers.

One small bug bear is when duplicating an event, I'd like the ability to duplicate the whole thing then take out elements no longer needed e.g. surveys, promo codes. This is relevant to our organization as event elements are very often repeated - not one off shows

title: Easy to use platform and helped garner revenue
name: Sara S.
pros: Pros: I like that you can customize the software to suit your brand and that you can sell tickets easily without losing a lot of money.
cons: Cons: No major cons - it is a very standard setup and I haven't hit any glitches while using the software itself.

title: Beautiful Product, Easy to use
name: Amanda G.
comments: Comments: We used Picatic for our annual EV Race/Rally, The E-mazing Race.

title: Easy to use software with world class support
name: Qaid D.
comments: Comments: I've used Picatic numerous times - both for events at my previous job and to build a quick MVP of my current business - and its easily the most user friendly platform I've used. The software is intuitive, works flawlessly, and makes it easy for you to make your events look nice. I also really like the event tilting feature, as it allowed us to plan some events with basically no risk until we hit our targets.

title: I'd choose Picatic over Eventbrite any day. Love the layout, design, and the ease.
name: Anna S.
pros: Pros: Straightforward population of event info page. Very intuitive layout for customers/attendees! Love the font and colors too.
cons: Cons: Would love to be able to offer customizable package tickets - so that an attendee gets an increasing discount the more tickets they buy.

title: Instant Happiness
name: Jeremy A.
comments: Comments: We'd been looking for a better ticketing platform for our summer camp for a while. PIcatic was better and less expensive than the competition. What's more, their service team was ridiculously helpful. Responses were quick, expansive, and personal. Couldn't rate highly enough.

title: I like the product but it could be improving offerings as time goes on
name: Emily D.
comments: Comments: It has been good, there are a few things that have changed since the beginning which make me upset but its still better than others.

title: The best event website ever.
name: Daniel D.
pros: Pros: The platform is absolutely frictionless, it has great UI/UX, the Picatic team provides support, and best of all it's free.
cons: Cons: It's hard for me to think of any dislikes. You can't change a custom URL once a custom URL is selected but that's not much of a con.

title: Great platform with all kinds of groovy features
name: Sherry S.
comments:
Comments: The software is fabulous and the fact that there are no charges is

pretty amazing.

title: Picatic is easy to use and provides a lot of features!
name: Lisa W.
comments: Comments: I find Picatic very user friendly. Not only is it easy to set up the events, but there are features that provide a very professional look to the ticketing site. I especially like the ability to put not only the venue information and picture, but the host and sponsor information as well. The management tools available are easy to use and extremely helpful.

title: Slick and simple event software at a great price.
name: Dave V.
comments: Comments: Picatic events look great across a variety of platforms. It's easy to take those events and embed them in your own website for ticket sales (awesome). Is like to see more users of the service (not many people in my area use it), better event discovery features and better integration with the calendars we already use (Facebook events, for example). But the service is great and the price is great. There is even a free option. Customer service has been incredible, too. Awesome to see a service like this based in Canada.

title: Great ticketing product
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's great to be able to create a variety of tickets and varying price points. The registrations are easy to export. The user interface is easy to use for me, and for people purchasing tickets.
cons: Cons: I wish I could customize the ticket receipts. We use this for webinar registrations, so in practice it means my customers get multiple emails and that is confusing.

title: I have enjoyed using Picatic. Lots to learn. Make mistakes, learn, lots of support.
name: Deb H.
comments:
Comments: Pros- great support.

Cons- using Picatic to run a Community Association, with many programs/events has been somewhat challenging but OK. Lots of potential just not enough time available to master the program and use it's potential.

title: Such and easy to use program and the customer support is so responsive.
name: Alann D.
pros:
Pros: - Ease of use

- support team is great to work with

- User Interface is clear and very little overhead in learning to use
cons: Cons: - wanted to be able to edit the emails that are sent out and add a block of information people need to have. This functionality was not readily available so had to go through support to get them to add it for me. Was good that support was so easy to work with, but would have liked to be able to to this myself/.
overall:
Overall: easy to use

local company

very little overhead for knowing how to use

title: Picatic is easy to use, convenient and they provide great customer service when needed.
name: Ginelle P.
pros: Pros: I like it's functionality, ease of use and ability to create a aesthetically pleasing landing page from the information you provide.
cons: Cons: I have no negative comments regarding the software at this time. I wish you could have more historical data and keep more of your past events on the site, but that would be my only comment.

title: Excellent ticket and event management platform.
name: Graeme S.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, value for money, UI design and overall end-user experience. The platform is far more engaging for our use than its competitors, and easy to train staff to use.
cons: Cons: Some elements could use great customization, including styles, surveys and text inputs, hopefully this will come at a later date.

title: Extremely easy even if you haven't used it before - as I had not
name: David C.
pros: Pros: Ease of use. It's simple, so simple, extremely simple and easy to use. I hate learning new software but this one was very straightforward and easy to use.
cons: Cons: It's just another software program I needed to learn to use. Other than that there isn't anything I didn't like about using Picatic.

title: Great customer service and easy to use functions
name: Daniella B.
pros: Pros: Ease of use. Ability to add video and images. Aesthetically pleasing and easy to track sales and monitor progress of event.
cons: Cons: Fees are a little high and it would be good to be able to upload more than one video. Also to speak with someone on the phone if there is a burning issue

title: Overall great.
name: Nicole T.
comments:
Comments: Pros:

Nice big headline picture on each event

Super easy interface

Can e-mail all participants from the interface with one click

Easy widgets for website

title: Great features
name: Marie H.
comments:
Comments: The huge plus for this app is the possibility to scan ticket with a smartphone, this is easy, convenient and works very well.

Connection with Stripe s also a great feature because it allows you to get the money from tickets sooner than other ticketing app (usually it us after the event).

Had to contact the customer service for questions and they have been really helpful and fast to answer.

title: Great platform for the little guy!!
name: Heather R.
pros:
Pros: Ease of use, quick troubleshooting, easy to use interface.

It is increasingly difficult to find good resources to reach the public with as a small business. This platform takes all the stress our of managing event guests, tickets, etc!!
cons: Cons: Was a little tough to get the hang of..... more than a few buttons pushed in the wrong order. A tutorial would be great for any new users!
overall: Overall: Ease of event management and ticket management!

title: Useful
name: sonia t.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I was easy to use once I figured out all the possible toggles and options when creating an event. It was pretty easy to get things laid out the way you want it to look.
cons: Cons: I had to email updates to registrants for each event that I had created over the week and the system crashed on me several times and mis-sent some of my emails. I wish that the ticket information can be edited more than it currently is.
overall: Overall: registration was a bit easier to manage for my week long events

title: Easy to use, which results in an appealing page and good results
name: Ammaar M.
pros:
Pros: Easy to use.

End result looks great.

You can also add your sponsor logos here, which platforms don't usually provide.
cons: Cons: I have not come across anything i don't like about this platforms as yet. It's a great item to have while marketing an event and selling tickets!
overall: Overall: Massive marketing of our event

title: Picatic is a great platform. Many features, easy to use, and the customer service is the best. Thx!
name: Vincent W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The features for non-profits. Also the customer service is arguably the best in the industry. I'll be using it over other platforms going forward.
cons: Cons: The only con I can think of would be with the brand identity. It's still relatively new to some users, which may give them some hesitancy when completing a transaction. But I don't think its a major fault. If anything, users perceive it as a reliable platform.

title: Covenient and affordable
name: Richard M.
comments: Comments: I find picatic really helpful for our plays and concerts. It's easy to set up and manage events and it integrates with social media and WordPress sites really well. Given our tight budgets, the affordability is very important too. Picatic does what I need at a better price than the competitors. Now if they could only give me an Android check in app.

title: Picatic works as good Event Organizer
name: Bob W.
comments: Comments: Overall it was easy to set up ticket collection site. It was flexible to accommodate last minute changes. I am our Reunion's Treasurer and expected to find the right software to work the event ticketing. It worked pretty much as described. Good reports for tracking activity. And the iPhone App to Check-in at the events was helpful.

title: Clean, functional interface!
name: Michel N.
comments: Comments: There are a lot of newcomers to the ticketing space, and Picatic certainly warrants a look. While at the time of this writing, there are still a few features I'd like to see compared to a more mature product, it's clean, functional and the support is awesome. And their development team is seriously improving the platform every day.

title: Easy, efficient and customer service extraordinaire!
name: Trina O.
comments:
Comments: The software is easy to work with. The only difficult thing is when setting up payment method can sometimes be difficult but whenever I have an issue it is quickly resolved with the fantastic customer service I receive from your team.

I have recommended pic-a-tic to other charity groups I work with as it is one of the easiest.

title: Make my live easy
name: Eric M.
pros: Pros: Easy to setup. Sometimes I need to change the URL and picatic team is always ready for us. Really good experience
cons: Cons: Before Picatic has a free version, no fee. For small events like ours, it was pretty good. I miss it

title: Quick, Easy and User Friendly
name: Shad A.
comments: Comments: We have been using picatic since there beginning I believe and the experience has always been great. As they have grown they have remained responsive and flexible enough. It is relatively quick and easy to get an event set up and active and the enhanced levels allow for more options if and when you need them.

title: Picatic was the event payment solution I was looking for!
name: John H.
comments: Comments: Picatic has been great. No fees. Simple interface with useful customization. Clean look and useful tracking info. I like the fact that I can embed their widget into my website. This was easy to do. The one question I had was answered quickly and clearly but the Picatic rep I spoke with on the phone.

title: Best online ticketing platform ever used!
name: Jason G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: Picatic is easier to use compared to any other platforms, even eventbrite. I love its user-friendly interface, which allows me to see my changes right away on the event page. It serves well as a stand-along page. So, I don't need to create my own website before start selling tickets online. And, it is the cheapest with all those great features! Recommend and free to try.
pros: Pros: - Easy to use. - Clear pay structure. - Beautiful design. - Responsive customer support.
cons: Cons: - Better mobile app will make it wonderful.

title: So easy to use!
name: Carrie G.
pros: Pros: Clean interface and it always works well. It also looks very nice and professional, from the back end and the front end.
cons: Cons: Could have a few more features but the simplicity is also nice.

title: Great tool for creating polished graphics
name: Myra B.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: When you need to design something you don't need to start from scratch - there are templates available.
cons: Cons: The editing tools and options take some getting used to.

title: Great services and features
name: George M.
comments: Comments: Picatic meets our small organization's needs for advance ticket sales for educational workshops in every way. Customer service has been responsive and quick. Having an option for invoicing was essential for us--and Picatic has it--without even charging a fee!

title: beautiful. easy to use. great for churches.
name: laura p.
comments: Comments: i really appreciate the flexibility that piratic offers (e.g. passing on fees to the purchaser or paying yourself; option for donations, etc...) which is why we use it for our events. creating an event is simple and aesthetically pleasing and intuitive.

title: Picatic is the perfect option for ticketing small events
name: Florence B.
comments: Comments: We have used Picatic to sell tickets for our Business Leaders Luncheon for several years now. It is easy to use and tech support has been very helpful over the years - five stars to the Picatic team! We truly appreciate their contribution to Literacy for Life!

title: Does what it says on the tine.
name: Matt E.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to use and very fast to set up. Integrations with popular 3rd party tools are good. The WordPress integration is one we are looking forward to testing out.
cons: Cons: It is sometimes too 'Apple-esc' in that it does not have the flexibility to adjust fields, add more data fields, or just flex to our specific needs.

title: Great product. Getting better
name: Noah B.
comments: Comments: For one, Picatic is a likeable company -- its customer support, public profile, and flexible fees make you want to use their product. It's also new and constantly improving, so I'm willing not to fuss about any cons with the product.

title: Love Picatic!
name: Kristen S.
comments: Comments: I've been using Picatic for a few years now to sell tickets to my social dinners. I love how easy it is to create professional looking events. Integrating the ticket sales on my website is also super easy and makes selling tickets a breeze.

title: Excellent So Far!
name: David C.
pros:
Pros: Regular updates from the development team

Attractive and easy to use user interface

Great communication on new features
cons:
Cons: No real control about what information is displayed on the guest list

Being able to display information from Surveys would be ideal!
overall:
Overall: Lower costs for ticketing

Improved customer experience

title: This is very easy to use platform. I host events all the time with my NPO and picatic makes it easy
name: Zaib Z.
pros:
Pros: User Interface is very cool.

Intuitive

Looks very slick

Not too technical or complex

Background options are amazing
cons: Cons: too many clicks to set up an event - Whenever I have to set up an event, it seems as though I have to go through a lot of points. I believe it can be made even shorter.

title: Seamless, easy, convenient
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use and understand, I was able to just open and figure it out without anyone showing me exactly how to use
cons: Cons: There were a few small things that were difficult for me to.fogure out like how to have the event ongoing with different ticket sales
overall: Overall: Was able to generate interest for my free workshops

title: Picatic
name: Verified Reviewer
comments: Comments: An extremely user friendly app, great UI and a very solid runtime environment. The application performs well under loadin and has virtually no glitching or freezing. Overall a very modern approach to what a ticketing app SHOULD look and run like.
pros: Pros: Very user friendly, extremely good aesthetics and design.
cons: Cons: Almost none, possibly the feature to manage multiple accounts doesn't exist yet, might be wrong here though.

title: Easy to use, hassle-free
name: Michael S.
comments: Comments: Picatic is a great low-touch event tool. They make setup a breeze, and most importantly, every new iteration has addressed previous concerns and feedback I've had, to the point now where I have no concerns left! Great software!

title: Great product for simple events.
name: Paul H.
comments: Comments: While it doesn't have all the bells and whistles of its high-end competitors, Picatic is a great product for simple events and the price is great.

title: Good user experience
name: Allan D.
comments: Comments: Throughout the product it seems there is a good attention to detail. I like the "choose your rate" feature'it leaves the user always feeling satisfied. Don't have any significant criticisms at this time. Good job guys.

title: Good find it harder each year to speak to a live person when needed
name: Jackie S.
comments: Comments: I'm impressed with the services that are offered I haven't posted an event recently but hope to shortly which leads me to my question about setting up a membership renewal on this site

title: Disappointed. Experienced few glitches that annoyed me and my event attendees.
name: Arcelia O.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: What I like the most about Picatic is the way it looks. Compared with other software Picatic is eye catchy but elegant. Looks like there was lots of thought in the design.
cons: Cons: Sometimes isn't as user-friendly. The bugs I encountered really annoyed me and ended up using Eventbrite for my last event.

title: Picatic is great for running our non-profit group's classes and events.
name: Jane E.
comments: Comments: The only downside was when we tried using it for regular yearly membership fees. It works, but it's not really set up for that. It's good for running events though. The support is great, too!

title: Awesome!
name: Amanda C.
comments: Comments: Hi!

title: Top Shelf - Im a fan!
name: ed R.
comments: Comments: This is one of the best kept secrets on the net. Software works great, integrates well with Stripl, Tools are great. Customer support via email very fast and accuarate

title: Picatic just became expensive
name: Moz N.
comments: Comments: We were all set to launch with Picatic/Wordpress, when the basic plan was stripped of all its value on 21 Dec, essentially forcing our client to consider moving to the Pro plan or find an alternative.

title: Review of Picatic from Piper
name: Piper C.
comments: Comments: I love the easy of use with Picatic (invoices, comp tickets, etc.). I would appreciate more options to ask questions and collect further information from participants as they register. Additionally, a few of our events require ticket prices to increase over time (ie. early bird, regular, late registration), having a feature to set this up would be great. Also, sometimes we require various ticket types (ie. student, speaker, regular participant, etc.) having the ability to set this up would be great as well.

title: Intuitive platform, that makes planning events easy!
name: Pavan A.
comments: Comments: Very user friendly and simplified. Provides event planners of any experience, an easy avenue to sell tickets in a professional manner and manage their event.

title: Wonderful Event Ticketing Software!
name: Charlene T.
comments: Comments: Love using Picatic, easy fast and free!

title: It is very user friendly
name: Emma W.
comments:
Comments: Pros:

1. User friendly

2. Nice appearance

title: Easy to Use Ticketing Platform with Excellent Customer Service
name: Nicole P.
comments:
Comments: Pros

- easy to use

- visual event creator

- pay what you want service fees

- strip integration

- whitle label ticketing

title: Four events.
name: Fred S.
comments: Comments: The editing on the left side bar area is too small.

title: It is useful
name: Katie V.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Automatic imagines make it quick to upload events which I like -- easy to sell tickets which is nice
cons: Cons: kind of confusing side bar would prefer something more intuitive, clicking directly to edit would be nice

title: Experience has been great. Love the product
name: Colette C.
comments: Comments: I really don't have any cons. Its easy to use, customer service is great. Thanks for such a great product.

title: Best priced and easy to use
name: Chris C.
comments: Comments: Been using this service for almost 2 years with events of over 1000 people and it's amazingly helpful and useful.

title: It tooks some time to navigate all the features. It has an odd layout but ultimately it is simple
name: Reko W.
pros: Pros: It is easy to use, connects with stripe, chimp mail and other apps which help promote and connect. Its a good app
cons: Cons: The confusing layout of the desktop site anf the over simplicity and basicness of the mobile app. It has room to improve on both of these.

title: This system has worked well for us!
name: Sarah M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I like that there is a free option when tickets are free - I love the layout of the event information and that images are easy to add.
cons: Cons: I'm not sure - but do they send reminders to people who register? Also, it'd be nice to have an option in which there is no "ticket" someone just signs up.
overall: Overall: We do a lot of events - and this site gave us tons of options to customize it to our needs.

title: Great experience with Picatic so far, no complaints!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Picatic is very user friendly. I was able to set up a new event in minutes! It is also easy to make changes very quickly.
cons: Cons: I have no complaints with Picatic so far. It's worked perfectly for what I need and look forward to continued use.

title: Great experience with Picatic so far, no complaints!
name: Tyler B.

title: Metropolitan Grand Lodge & Bookitbee
name: ben j.
comments:
Comments: When we were 1st introduced to the bookitbee system I was over all impressed by the ease of use and the functionality of the system. My initial reaction was "GET IT", "GET IT NOW" and I am pleased to say the boss listened and we started using the system. We now have a wondefully easy system for our members to book seminars and events, which previously was done by using our systems and taking cheques, which meant we had to make sure people had paid, booked etc. which was a long drawn out process. Now all that has been taken out of our hands and sits very well in Kenton & bookitbee's capable hands.

Another thing I have found is their knowledge and customer/tech support team are great to get along with and will help you out very rapidly and keep you informed along the way.

title: Awesome, friendly and flexible
name: Alison T.
comments:
Comments: When we were 1st introduced to the bookitbee system I was over all impressed by the ease of use and the functionality of the system. My initial reaction was "GET IT", "GET IT NOW" and I am pleased to say the boss listened and we started using the system. We now have a wondefully easy system for our members to book seminars and events, which previously was done by using our systems and taking cheques, which meant we had to make sure people had paid, booked etc. which was a long drawn out process. Now all that has been taken out of our hands and sits very well in Kenton & bookitbee's capable hands.

Another thing I have found is their knowledge and customer/tech support team are great to get along with and will help you out very rapidly and keep you informed along the way.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, flexible, low cost
cons: Cons: None
overall: Overall: I have used Bookitbee for about a year now and they have been brilliant. Helpful, easy to use and really know about working with events. Great service as well as great system.

title: BookitBee for PTA events
name: Claire W.
comments: Comments: We have used BookitBee to manage the ticketing for a couple of the bigger annual PTA events ( including Fireworks night) we have held in the last couple of years and found it to be super easy to set up and use. It was the first time we had used an online ticketing system for these events (normally the several hundred tickets would only be sold in the playground) and we saw an increase in the take up of tickets almost immediately. This I think was partly due to being able to send around general links and share the event on facebook (reaching a bigger audience) and also the ability for people to pay online securely. We will now use BookitBee for all PTA events and as a result for many other community events and would highly recommend it.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, flexible, low cost
cons: Cons: None
overall: Overall: I have used Bookitbee for about a year now and they have been brilliant. Helpful, easy to use and really know about working with events. Great service as well as great system.

title: great widget
name: Sharon H.
comments: Comments: Bookitbee is set up to provide online ticket sales, but we use it to sell places on our training courses and that works fine. It's quite a flexible and allows you to customise practically everything (background, colour highlights etc). The UX is really clear, with lots of feedback ('changes saved', 'have you checked the pricing?' etc).
pros: Pros: Easy to use, flexible, low cost
cons: Cons: None
overall: Overall: I have used Bookitbee for about a year now and they have been brilliant. Helpful, easy to use and really know about working with events. Great service as well as great system.

pros: Pros: Easy to use, flexible, low cost
cons: Cons: None
overall: Overall: I have used Bookitbee for about a year now and they have been brilliant. Helpful, easy to use and really know about working with events. Great service as well as great system.

title: Wychwood Festival
name: Stefan E.
comments: Comments: We've used bookitbee for our ticketing for the past couple of years. The system is really user friendly and easy to use for both us and out customers. Our office processes and event check in have both sped up massively by using bookitbee. It also helps that the company is run by great guys who are always happy to help make our event run smoothly.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, flexible, low cost
cons: Cons: None
overall: Overall: I have used Bookitbee for about a year now and they have been brilliant. Helpful, easy to use and really know about working with events. Great service as well as great system.

title: Awsome
name: Brocas B.
comments: Comments: We organised a live gaming event using Bookitbee and it made our lives simple. We have used other ticketing systems but were blown away by how helpful the team at Bookitbee were while we were setting up. It was great to be able to speak to someone on the phone who can not only help out but also shared some wisdom on discounts.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, flexible, low cost
cons: Cons: None
overall: Overall: I have used Bookitbee for about a year now and they have been brilliant. Helpful, easy to use and really know about working with events. Great service as well as great system.

title: great site very helpfull
name: martyn j.
comments: Comments: put my company events on this site very easy to use and simple to follow for my staff
pros: Pros: Easy to use, flexible, low cost
cons: Cons: None
overall: Overall: I have used Bookitbee for about a year now and they have been brilliant. Helpful, easy to use and really know about working with events. Great service as well as great system.

title: Our experience has been exceptional! I'm very seldom impressed and I've been totally impressed!
name: crysti e.
pros: Pros: Software is great, but Seat Advisor's, in my opinion, best feature is there Customer Service! It's not only prompt but extremely courteous, no matter who we get. We also have had personal visits to check in and make us aware of new opportunities and programs. We just recently added brand new/upgraded scanners, combined with launching them on a rental client. Seat Advisor partnered with us the entire journey. We had over 3000 people come through that weekend and we looked efficient and professional. I cannot thank Seat Advisor enough for all of there assistance and for working with me to resolve all the issues. My favorite feature is the cell phone scanning capabilities. Impressive!
overall: Overall: Professionalism!

title: We are in our eighth year with SABO, and continue to be pleasantly amazed.
name: Lisa W.
comments: Comments: For more than 10 years we ticketed our 1,200 seat venue manually - three tier reserved seating with multiple package options, ACCESS services, holds, and various comps. While it was a lot of tedious hands on labor, it was exactly appropriate to the level of electronic skill our box office manager possessed. Annual audits were accomplished by counting torn stubs.

title: Great Ticketing solution!
name: Kyle M.
comments:
Comments: The Dallas Bach Society has gone through a number of different ticketing solutions, and to be honest, almost all of them left a great deal to be desired! In 2012, we began a search for a new ticketing solution and came upon SABO. We were impressed then with the flexibility, reporting features, Patron management and integrated marketing. When the problems with Java occurred we were very concerned because our online ticket sales dropped to about 25%, which meant that our phones were ringing off the hook because people could not purchase online. As you all know that was a very trying time. With the new enhancements and re-designs now our online sales is at about 90%!

The thinks we are most impressed with are the Patron Management features of automatically assigning attributes based on certain criteria. This is vital as we are a membership organization and we have to keep track of patrons who make donations of $50 or more. SAGO does this seamlessly! The second thing we are thrilled with is the Online Sales flow. Our patrons are very happy with the look, feel and ease of use of online purchasing. This alone has saved the organization a great deal of money! We constantly use the reporting features to keep track of Sales trends and sales volume. We also are impressed with the new MPP feature and plan to utilize it for special pricing events!

title: Client Support and Tech Support are out of this world!
name: Jeremy P.
pros: Pros: We have been using Sabo for the past year and half. After searching for a ticketing solution for months, SABO stood out amongst the rest because of its informative sales/support team and pricing. Marc in particular (our client relations contact) has gone above and beyond our expectations from day one. Whether supporting a new business with growing needs and constant changes, providing specific and specialty support options, or creating solutions for problems we thought were too great to overcome - Marc constantly surprises us with his ingenuity and ability to meet our needs. Most recently, SABO added Social Network features that once again keep this system current with the growing demands and trend changes of the ticketing industry.
cons: Cons: I must say that SABO has a range of reporting features that really help us understand who our customer base is, where they are purchasing from, how they heard about our event, and if they desire to be on our marketing contact list. However, as a client that is always looking for more data, I could use a couple more report options that allow me to understand our customer base with a little more ease of use and streamlined information.
overall: Overall: If the pricing doesn't convince you that SABO is in it for the long haul and partnership relationship - then the customer support provided should hit the message home - SABO has genuine concern for its clients and ensures their success with personal attention and response to the needs of its users.

title: Increased Patron Satisfaction of the Turtle Creek Chorale
name: Robert C.
pros:
Pros: Great customer support

User friendly

Social Networking features

Patron ease

Real time seating charts
cons:
Cons: Reports should be more customizable

Would like a review of a patrons history including seats, without having to select each order.

Price structure is very challenging to master and can't be changed.

Don't like how it inputs text for the event description.

Print at home tickets are great, however a challenge that we have when at the venue box office,patron needs us to reprint that ticket that has already been printed at home. There is no easy way to do that. I can't even begin to describe the process in which to accomplish it and most of the time we reprint the ticket by happenstance, not sure how we reprinted it. It's about a 4-5 step process unless there is an easier way that we don't know about.

Would still love to see a feature of refunding a ticket price to a donation. As a nonprofit we don't allow refunds on tickets, we do offer our patrons a tax letter on tickets donated back to us. Would love to release that ticket back into inventory and still capture the purchase.
overall: Overall: Overall SABO is fairly easy to use and meets most of our needs. Even thought there are a few drawbacks that could easily be fixed I would defiantly recommend this product to any arts organization looking for a better ticketing option. It has continued to bring a professional image of our organization to our patrons. Huge thanks to Justin Baxter for his continued support.

title: Been a client since 2010...they ARE the best!
name: Steve I.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, great back office and web presence, and great customer support
cons: Cons: None that I can find in 6 plus years
overall: Overall: The customer service is the best in the industry. They make you feel like you are their only client!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: These people have the best product in the industry. Other ticketing companies have tried to get us to use their services but they don't compare to SeatAdvisor in terms of functionality, support or price point.

title: SeatAdvisor makes online ticketing easy
name: John G.
comments:
Comments: Since we first implemented SABO in 2007, our organization has come a long way utilizing technology with our ticketing and online sales. The implementation process was very straightforward, with the largest obstacle being our internal volunteers adapting to the change from paper tickets. The training was done remotely though online collaboration and desktop sharing tools, which still continue today for any support needs which may arise.

The SABO interface and seat maps are very clean and professional looking. While we are a small non-profit community theater with 360 seats, we only use a small portion of the functionality. For example, we don't have a need for setting up portals and barcode scanning of tickets at the door as larger venues would use.

Setting up new events for our six show season, including the creation of three subscription plans is relatively easy. Fortunately, we set up our season once per year, but adding special events or additional performances on the fly takes no time at all.

One area we need to take a look at is the email integration with Vertical Response in hopes of sending out automated pre and post performance emails to ticket holders with relevant information including location, parking, and local dinner show specials with area restaurants.

While the per ticket and credit card gateway authorization charges can get high for a small non-profit such as ours, we still feel that SeatAdvisors offers a superior product compared to the competition.

title: Service & Value
name: David A.
pros: Pros: SABO provides great value for our 500+ performing arts venue to sell tickets for our approximately 100 events per year. In addition to tickets, we also use it to sell our Performing Arts Academy tuition.
cons: Cons: The Java-based seat maps and ticket printing have caused a myriad of problems for our theatre. The good news is that HTML-based seat maps are on their way - but can't come soon enough.
overall: Overall: Balancing the pros and cons, we haven't been able to find another ticketing solution that matches the service and value. Improvements and developments continue to roll out - albeit sometimes slowly - and enhance the user experience both in-house and online.

title: Service & Value
name: David A.
pros: Pros: SABO provides great value for our 500+ performing arts venue to sell tickets for our approximately 100 events per year. In addition to tickets, we also use it to sell our Performing Arts Academy tuition.
cons: Cons: The Java-based seat maps and ticket printing have caused a myriad of problems for our theatre. The good news is that HTML-based seat maps are on their way - but can't come soon enough.
overall: Overall: Balancing the pros and cons, we haven't been able to find another ticketing solution that matches the service and value. Improvements and developments continue to roll out - albeit sometimes slowly - and enhance the user experience both in-house and online.

title: AU PAC
name: Jessica D.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, quick event set up and management, excellent resource in the online Knowledge Base allowing me to have a big pool of information to search for before I need to contact support. SABO makes it easy to solve your own issues!
cons: Cons: The reports sometimes have bugs, and I wish they were a little easier to manipulate. Even in excel, I'm doing more cutting and copying than just calculating. I'm dying for a Transactions by Patron report, where I can search an individual or range of patron id's and get a list of transactions.
overall: Overall: I definitely recommend this software for a university performing arts center such as ourselves.
