Specifically for those who are just starting out and might be making the jump from hard tickets to software...learning the logic of event set up is quite easy on this software. I'm not so sure how well it would work for a bigger venue (we have 5 venues, the largest is only 500 seats), but if you're just getting going...absolutely a good web-based program! And a fantastic price, I should mention.

title: SeatAdvisor Review
name: Ashley W.
pros: Pros: Seat Advisor is a great Ticketing Solution. With this company, I have been able to serve over 15 clients with unique needs, including subscriptions that involve events at multiple venues, reserved/GA seating at one event, GA events with different price scales, the list goes on. With SeatAdvisor, I am able to track my marketing efforts through the use of promo codes, and advertise upcoming events right on the Print at Home Ticket. The pick your own seat option is very useful! Since we have that option available to our online patron, we have successfully taken our walk up down to virtually nothing. We have now trained our audience to purchase their tickets online and over the phone reducing our staffing costs significantly! The support team is incredibly helpful and knowledgeable about the product.
cons: Cons: SeatAdvisor does not offer a scan out option as part of their access control.
overall: Overall: I would recommend SeatAdvisor as a perfect ticketing solution for any venue, or group of venues. We are very happy with it at Southern Illinois University!

title: I just wanted to thank the staff at SABO. You have all been so understanding and helpful.
name: Cyndie S.
pros: Pros: The ease of the software setup it is very logically laid out and easy to follow and great knowledge base.
cons: Cons: We need a few changes one big thing no second name for the patron which is very negative to our customers. Renewals not exactly what we thought but the subscriptions system works great.
overall: Overall: We had a manual system and this really helps to automate the ticket and subscription process so we can be efficient.

title: Customer Service is AMAZING!!!
name: Tammy H.
comments: Comments: I just wanted to send a huge shout out and THANK YOU to the staff at SABO. You have all been so great in helping us, mainly me, understand your system, make our dreams work and get me through any struggles I make. Any question or problem'which isn't a problem with the software it is a problem with my untechy mind is dealt with amazing help and compassion. I hope you realize how great you are and what a benefit I find in your assistance in any thing I need. You get back to me so quickly either by email if possible or by phone if needed, I don't feel like we are 2 time zones apart. We have so enjoyed the change to SABO and our patrons seem to like the ease of purchasing tickets and things we able to do send out email reminders of a show time, email a confirmation of an order and just being more user friendly. The transfer of information from our prior software to SABO and setting our new season was very easy. We are starting our 2nd year with SABO and are very happy with everything. Customer Service and Technical help are fantastic.

title: SABO Saved My Summer
name: Elizabeth W.
pros: Pros: Sabo was an excellent addition to our business. We used to do everything by hand. Having SABO saved so much time that I have been able to enjoy my summer. It's like having an extra "INTELLEGENT" employee. The ease of the system is great for my customers. They love to have the opportunity to choose their own seats and print their tickets to bypass our long lines. SABO's customer service is amazing, I put in a ticket and I have answers within 30 minutes or a phone call to solve the problem. The customer service department is better than I would have ever imagined.
cons: Cons: The only two things I wish SABO would do is: When a customer pays cash you can enter the cash so it tells you how much change to return to the customer. That would help our staff tremendously. Also, I wish SABO would be able to post the events right to "Celebrity Access", Facebook and Myspace. Other than those two small inconveniences SABO ROCKS!
overall: Overall: I highly recommend SABO for anyone that is thinking about becoming automated.

title: SABO Has Increased Our Revenue and Patron Satisfaction
name: Rick C.
pros:
Pros: I absolutely love that the patron can select their seats via the internet. Our previous ticket service did not allow us to set fees - or retain convenience fees.

The system is stable and I have high degree of confidence that it will be so during our peak sales times.

Back office sales are effortless, the interface is easy to use.

Customer history feature is very useful.

Reporting is powerful. I appreciate the export feature allowing me to customize reports as necessary.
cons: Cons: I really do not have any strong negative impression of either the product or the company.
overall: Overall: I am glad I made the change from the earlier program we used. Our overall profit has increased because we now retain fees. In addition, the quality of the internet user interface makes my patrons happy - and more importantly WILLING to purchase tickets online.

title: Del Mar Thoroughbred Club
name: Ann H.
pros: Pros: We came to SABO from Pro Venue, and it was an enormous improvement. Probably the biggest driver for us to move to SABO was the ability to have an online box office. The online feature works fantastic, and has significantly reduced the wait times on the phone. Enabling Print at Home is a great feature and has dramatically reduced lines in will call. Other improvements are the map display, the stability of credit card reconcilliation, their willingness to adapt SABO and make changes to fit our needs, the ease of balancing etc. The staff at Seat Advisor is very open to any of our needs, and when feasible works to make any changes or enhancements we need.
cons: Cons: There are rare occassions that because SABO is web based, we lose connectivity or are affected by other SABO patrons. It would be nice to be able to customize reports. Would be nice to have a patron summary rather than having to drill into each patron order.
overall: Overall: Very highly recommended.

title: SeatAdvisor Fits Our Organizational Needs
name: Emily S.
comments: Comments: SABO really works for what we do at the CIM. We do a mixed bag of general admission and reserved seating that require tickets which are free or paid. SABO gives us the opportunity to create these events and make them available to our patrons online 24/7. "Batch Print" is a wonderful feature to have when creating the will call. It prints all the tickets in alphabetical order according to disposition. Another feature that is helpful to our business is the reporting feature. I find the "patron profile" report particularly useful information from each performance. The reports can be used on both paid and free concerts, and there are a dozen of different reports to choose from or even customize, if needed.

title: Incredible Service and the fastest setup i have ever seen!
name: Salihin A.
pros:
Pros: Setup was done fast and quick, if new venues was mostly done within days, it is easy to use great security features specially with name on the ticket and pdf password logged etickets. Best Online eticketing system i have seen.

Finally i can keep my own database which was a problem when i used other ticketing systems and this reduce my marketing budget. Thanks for allowing us to use SABO!
cons:
Cons: Paypal Integration is easy and great but sometimes loose data.

SHould concentrate more on using paypal as the only gateway as it is easy and quick to setup.
overall: Overall: Best Online and Box Office Ticketing System in the market, if you have events in Asia and also need staff to assist at your venue/event they are always ready to help!!!!!!! Incredible Team Work. great Guys and all in Uniform very Professional.

title: SABO is amazing!
name: Melissa O.
comments: Comments: SABO has made the ticketing process for Harvard-Westlake School so easy. From a computer, phone, or any kind of mobile device with all types of browsers you can purchase tickets to events and access the back office to make sales and edit information. The cloud based system is definitely the way to go as far as ease of use and accessibility. Training for the system and customer service are wonderful, and the employees are helpful and patient. Customer service response time is immediate and they are extremely knowledgeable about every detail of the system and can assist and walk you through how it works. SABO is a wonderful ticketing system that will work with your needs to promote and sell tickets to your events.

title: SABO is a great way to sell tickets online!
name: Joni H.
pros:
Pros: SABO is very user friendly. It has great help menus and well as great customer service. If you have a question that is not in the help data base and need to ask customer service the get back to you very quickly. I have never had a problem that didn't get resolved promptly and to my satisfaction.

The Patron Management is by far superior to anything else we have used.

My patrons find the online ticket option very convienient and very easy yo use.

The repots menus will get you about any report you can think of. And then some.
cons: Cons: I really can not think of any.
overall: Overall: AA+++ Recommended.

title: Great program - easy to use and wonderful customer support.
name: Courtney H.
pros: Pros: Customer Support - problems are taken care of immediately and I can always get a support tech on the phone. Lots of user options. We can set up our performances any way we like and have total autonomy unlike other ticketing programs.
cons: Cons: Because there are so many options it takes a little time to familiarize yourself with all the choices, but once you learn how to setup an event the site/program is VERY EASY to understand and navigate.
overall: Overall: I would recommend SABO to any organization that wants to have control over their ticketing setup, sales and fees and enjoys working with a company that has very strong customer support and service.

title: Best Ticketing Software!
name: Loni B.
comments: Comments: I have been using SABO for nearly 7 years, and I am very satisfied with the product and support. The software is very user friendly which makes training a smooth process. I manage a performing arts center attached to a college, and SABO is the perfect fit for our staff and patrons. Creating events and changing event details is an easy and efficient process. Support has been great! I have never had a problem reaching someone for help when I needed it. SABO is also committed to continually improving and enhancing the features, and it is great to know that they are willing to work with their customers to provide what we need for our venues.

title: High Quality Package
name: Kevin A.
pros: Pros: SABO is an extremely easy to use software. Back office set up is a breeze. Patrons have no problem using the system to purchase tickets online. Great range of reporting that appeases the accounting department.
cons: Cons: We are an east coast company, so sometime we have to wait for them to get to the office.
overall: Overall: After 3 years we left SABO to be with a different ticketing provider. One year and one big mistake later, we returned to SABO after an extensive search looking for the software that meets our needs. SABO is absolutely one of the most versatile ticket systems avaliable on the net.

title: Marc Hashagen
name: Rory P.
pros: Pros: We are new users of SABO and have had a great experience with the staff in training and getting SABO set-up. I would like to specifically mention Marc Hashagen, who has been extremely helpful in getting our Credit Card Server set-up. Marc has gone above and beyond in terms of his service and has made the transition so simple for our office!
cons: Cons: I haven't experienced any cons as of now.
overall: Overall: The SABO program is extremely user-friendly, and the staff is efficient and timely in getting back to us with answers we have! Their service is also very personal and has made the transition very simple.

title: Second year to use on-line ticketing service. both with SABO. Good experience
name: Pete P.
comments: Comments: After set up daily use is simple and easy to use. We do not use or plan to use in the near future all the bells and whistles the program offers. other do I am sure so they are needed to complete the software program. If maybe there was a level one or level two type thing that included all the possibilities at level one and not so many at level two or something like that. we can work with it as is.

title: SABO PRODUCT
name: Donna l.
pros: Pros: The team at sabo has been awesome for our use inparticular going above and beyone to meet our needs.. in particular Brendan H, Omar, Aaron and Elizabeth from the help area.. they have taken my calls on holidays weekends early mornings late nights - they can tell you we have all the issues in the world (not with Sabo) but doing our events so they have been amazing for my purposes
cons: Cons: i am not a big fan of the new contact support method but it does work just fine..
overall: Overall: Overall i would totally recommend this product

title: Suits our needs & Beyond!
name: Emily S.
position: Box Office Manager & Concerts and Events Assistant
comments: Comments: SABO has been a transition into 21st century ticketing for the Cleveland Institute of Music. We have been able to make great strides by offering tickets online, having a secure way to process sales, and creating a patron database. Since we are only in our 2nd year of use with SABO, there are many aspects we plan to use in our future ticketing here at CIM. During my training I was made aware of these additional features, and assured by the trainer that he would be happy to assist me when we decided to implement them.

title: Suits our needs & Beyond!
name: Emily S.
position: Box Office Manager & Concerts and Events Assistant
comments: Comments: SABO has been a transition into 21st century ticketing for the Cleveland Institute of Music. We have been able to make great strides by offering tickets online, having a secure way to process sales, and creating a patron database. Since we are only in our 2nd year of use with SABO, there are many aspects we plan to use in our future ticketing here at CIM. During my training I was made aware of these additional features, and assured by the trainer that he would be happy to assist me when we decided to implement them.

title: Dakota Jazz Club - SABO Review
name: Kristen M.
pros: Pros: Patron records and ticketing histories are terrific. I love that we can make notes about each order------we use this function 80% of time----SO helpful. The maps are great.
cons:
Cons: Price structures are VERY tricky. I also dislike the terminology for prices as 'discounts'----for whatever reason, this seems to confuse people.

Major con - the text that is 'hardwired' to the internet sales screens. I'm sure many users would prefer to refer to merchandise as something other than 'tickets.' 'Items' would work great......

Also - The 'description' text for events should have more flexibility insofar as editing is concerned. As it stands now, any text that one posts as a description turns into one long run-on paragraph. It looks a bit tacky.
overall: Overall: Overall? SABO is great. There are a few drawbacks but a LOT of really fantastic advantages. SABO has definitely made my box office life MUCH easier.

title: Great Company to have for your ticket sales
name: Barb S.
pros:
Pros: SABO is all ways there for you no matter time or day. You will be able to get a hold of any one for any problem.

Employees are very friendly will have answer for you if not they will find out and contact you within minutes

System is very user friendly for anyone

.
cons: Cons: NOT a SABO problem but JAVA is the only item that would be an issue.
overall:
Overall: Team is awesome!

System is easy!

Always there for you when needed!

Very supportive!

title: SABO Gets The Job Done With Good Support, Great Value
name: David A.
comments:
Comments: PROS

- Straightforward to use. Has more tools & features than we ever use.

- Adaptable, with updates often developed at the suggestion of users.

- Responsive support.

- Cost effective.

title: Good App
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use and help those shopping with a budget.
cons: Cons: It's great for people with a budget but you get for what you pay. If you pay cheap tickets, you get the worst seats ever.

title: Best, hands down!!!
name: Steve I.
comments: Comments: With 37 years of IT, and 45 years of theater (32 years as a producer). I have used several different computer based, and web based ticketing programs. SABO, is (according to our patrons and myself) the most powerful, easiest to use. Their customer service is unmatched, and even though we are a small community theater company, they make me feel like I am their only customer. Never feel rushed, never feel like a burden. Thank you, SeatAdvisor!!!

title: Review of Sabo Software
name: Maryann W.
pros: Pros: Love the tutorials, Excellent customer support, Can easily build a show and manage events
cons: Cons: Wish some of the reports were different, if an error is made in pricing (when building a show) you can't go back and change certain rows
overall: Overall: I have and will recommend Sabo to anyone in the ticketing business. The over all flow of the software is smooth and the customer service is spot on.

title: Multi-year user for seasonal ticket events
name: Adam R.
comments: Comments: The pros are the customer service and commitment to constant improvement. The cons are probably more related to interface. I have internal clients who shy away from it because of the UI. Also, navigating the backoffice/admin has a real learning curve due to limited UI and walk-throughs, however that has improved over the years.

title: The start of my third year with SABO and love it!
name: Debby A.
comments: Comments: Although there was a learning curve, I am very happy with the software. Many of the little annoying things have been ironed out in the latest versions. I especially like how quickly customer service gets back to me after starting a case. And Clarisse is fabulous!

title: SABO Review
name: Eric A.
comments:
Comments: Pros:

Alot of flexability in creating tickets, as far as setting up different price scales and discounts.

Rep was always willing to help as is customer service. But they are not always available, so it could take days before conversations or fixes can happen.

title: One-on-one customer service
name: Paige S.
pros: Pros: I am impressed with the customer service. Instead of having to go through online tutorials, help is just a phone call away and I never sense that the person feels rushed during our conversation. They take the time to explain or amend whatever problem I might be having. I appreciate their patience!
cons: Cons: Setting up each user preference is important. I found that if a setting isn't correct it could cause problems down the line.
overall: Overall: I like that this is a web-based ticketing system and for that reason alone I would recommend it to organizations. You don't need to be onsite to run reports, make changes or program events.

title: Positive Experience with SeatAdvisor
name: Marieke G.
comments: Comments: SeatAdvisor has worked well for our ticket processing needs at the Children's Theatre. The system is fairly intuitive, requiring minimal training for new users. We look forward to upgrades that will improve searchability and database functions.

title: This software has been excellent. Continued upgrades and improvements make it even better.
name: Gregg S.
comments: Comments: I have been very pleased with SABO especially since they changed from Java to HTML.

title: TOLD SEVERAL FACILITIES HOW MUCH WE LIKE IT.
name: JULIE B.
pros: Pros: NOT MUCH TO COMPARE IT WITH, BUT WE'VE HAD GREAT SUCCESS SO FAR.
cons: Cons: WE SENT IN COMMENTS REGARDING REFUNDS WITH MULTIPLE GROUPS ON ONE TICKET (IE. AN ADULT PRICE WITH A CHILD PRICE). iT CAN NOT BE DONE IN ONE TRANSACTION.
overall: Overall: TOLD SEVERAL FACILITIES HOW MUCH WE LIKE IT.

title: I find it extremely helpful for what we are trying to accomplish in our organization.
name: Gary P.
comments: Comments: One of my personal pros working with SeatAdvisor, support is always there to assist me. I really don't have any cons. At least none that I've experienced at the moment!

title: Sabo meets all of our needs, helps our company organize and brings a professional image.
name: Daniel S.
pros: Pros: Meets all our needs. The support is outstanding, especially Justin Baxter!
cons: Cons: Not really much to say about cons
overall: Overall: Sabo meets all of our needs, helps our company organize and brings a professional image to our company.

title: Overall Orchestra Kentucky is quite satisfied with SABO.
name: Jennay K.
position: Director of Marketing and Patron Services
comments: Comments: When we run into any issues with seat advisor, we are met with efficient and helpful technicians.

title: SABO/PRF Relationship
name: Candace S.
pros: Pros: SABO was easy to implement and the staff was on hand to assist with getting it off the ground. The program is able to fit our needs and the ability to request new features is a highlight.
cons: Cons: There is a lag time with support and sometimes requests have gone unanswered.
overall: Overall: I recommend SABO to implement an online ticket option in a quick and easy manner.

title: Very good system. Very happy with SABO.
name: Char A.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use, much like retail.
cons: Cons: Have had a lot of problems scanning.
overall: Overall: Very good system. Very happy with SABO.

title: Very good system. Very happy with SABO.
name: Sazzadun Nabi S.

title: My experience of using Ticketsource for setting up Dulwich Players bookings
name: Kevin E.
comments: Comments: I have only used Ticketsource two or three times so far, but on the whole I find it a useful and relatively easy to use tool. It took me a little while to get used to it, being mainly a case of trial and error, as there are no real guidance notes; but some advice from a previous user helped considerably. With a bit of experience it is relatively easy to use, although I do have trouble moving between screens to check entries. I also have trouble swapping between data entry and viewing the public screen; it won't always let me view the public side after I have been entering information. It seems to get stuck in one mode at a time.

title: Reliable and efficient
name: Maxine H.
comments:
Comments: We have been using Ticketsource for at our theatre for approximately 5 years now. The system works well for our customers who can book seats at a time that suits them and we do not have to be on site to take bookings. As a small venue this is very cost effective for us as we do not have to staff a 24hour box office. Our staff we find the systems straightforward and reliable. We have all the booking details at our fingertips, so we are able to answer customer queries efficiently. Archive materials are easily accessible which makes financial reconciliation straightforward and transparent.

We are able to link directly to our website and can also benefit from the wider Ticketsource community on line.

Ticketsource allows us to customise each event to our own needs allowing us to create tailor made seating plans, pricing structures and booking discounts and incentives. We can add information and publicity material to each performance.

Customer support is very good with a number of options including FAQ's to assist with basic problems, an on line help facility and a telephone help line. The site also includes very helpful tutorials for setting up events and trouble shooting, which are brief and not at all patronising.

Ticketsurce also allows us to run our own box office at strategic times and as much of our business is from schools, dance schools and local amateur companies within a small radius of the venue, it means that customers have the option not to get involved in the extra cost of booking fees.

It would help us greatly as a venue if there were an option to print off whole shows with all the ticket prices on one ticket, as many amateur groups who sell within their own small community like to take possession of all the tickets to sell directly. I am aware that this does not benefit Ticketsource and would make accounting for ticket sales impossible, but many of our clients would prefer to have multiple prices on each ticket, enabling them to highlight the price paid or to cross off the other prices. I'm not sure if other venues would benefit from this service and I fully appreciate that we may be in the minority.

I would certainly recommend Ticketsource to venues of all sizes as it really is a complete package. The rates are reasonable and the support is excellent

title: Outstanding
name: Michael H.
comments: Comments: We have been using TicketSource as our sole provider for Box Office solutions now for just over a year. During this time, they have continued to improve what was already an excellent product! The service provided when cancelling a show or encountering a technical issue has been superb. Issues are dealt with efficiently and you are kept informed of progress at all times.

title: Amazing - Simply amazing
name: Paul T.
pros: Pros: TicketSource system is the best Box Office system I have found, does everything we would need and more. There are so many features it is such a flexible system. Support is excellent, very responsive and quick.
cons: Cons: Nothing really, its just a great system that does all we need.

title: Excellent System
name: Paul T.
pros: Pros: Ticketsource is an excellent Box Office system, great customer support and always adding new features.
cons: Cons: Nothing really, its a great system, does exactly what it should do without too much complication!

title: Hard to fault TicketSource
name: Paul K.
comments: Comments: I have been using TicketSource for 18 months and once you get to understand what the various options are and how to deal with the charges (fee added on in full or fixed amount etc) it is simplicity itself to use thereafter. Help is at hand if you don't understand the online instructions. Copying and then amending an existing event to create a new event makes life very easy as you do not have to enter all the regular details each time. Reporting is excellent on both customers and event ticket sales and having emails when there has been a sale is an excellent facility to keep track of progress on ticket sales.

title: Amazing!
name: Paul T.
pros: Pros: This Box Office system is amazing, works perfectly, and support is first class.
cons: Cons: Nothing really, it does everything that is required

title: Wonderful service
name: Paul K.
comments:
Comments: TS is one of those rare services that delivers exactly what it says. For a small arts organisation that is always looking for cost-effective solutions, TS has proved invaluable to us. It is easy to use, provides a variety of information in formats that can be exported to our other systems and flexible enough to not only serve as an in-house box office, but also as an on-line customer service which can be managed off-site by our volunteers - everything we need.

Its customer service is truly outstanding. On the rare occasions when we have had to contact them with a technical issue it is resolved quickly and efficiently. Sometimes we have asked for slight changes to made to the system and, when possible, these have always been made.

The only small criticism I would make is with regard to the ticket printer which every now and again stops working. This seems to be caused by a problem with the printer cache which, because it is not on our network, has to be cleared by TS. Again, technical support resolves this quickly and has made suggestions for preventing future problems.

title: Fantastic service!
name: Mat R.
comments: Comments: I don't often leave feedback when asked, but I thought I would this time.

title: Good overall but needs some work to be amazing
name: Joseph H.
comments: Comments: The service is great and fairly easy to use, I particularly like the options to customise the landing page with your personal banners. Customers who are issued tickets have commented how easy it is to use and The paper ticket service is faultless and great value for the purchaser.

title: Capitals Hockey
name: Scott N.
comments:
Comments: 1, Good customer service and very helpful to provide solutions and ideas to suit the clients needs

2. Simple to use system, however we still have issues with the scanners and collation of scanned users

3. Versatile product - but the functionality to allow the client to associate a bar code with a particular seat for Season Ticket holders would be useful. For example we need bar codes printed onto cards before a person has chosen an actual seat.

4. Competition is growing from other similar companies offering to charge ticket commissions of 5% and payments made as they are purchased by the customer - From our company viewpoint we are very happy with Ticketsource but we have to evaluate options, especially commercial ones that serve our customers and cash flow better from a commercial standpoint.

title: Great software but still room to grow.
name: Rebecca D.
comments: Comments: In general, I like this software. It does the basics of ticket provision well and is easy to use from a ticket buying customer point of view.

title: Ticket Source Review
name: Paul F.
comments: Comments: Ticket Source is a very able ticket sales solution for events (we use if for a Fireworks event). It has lots of functionality and flexibility which is what we need. The only con I can think of this that it's a bit expensive in terms of the cut Ticketsource take from sales - we're a non-profit / fundraising event and we would have hoped that Ticketsource would have let us keep more of the profits for the charity donations we make from the proceeds of the event.

title: Must-have Ticketing Software for Small Venues
name: Luke B.
comments: Comments: When we decided to open up the then Writhlington School theatre as a small professional venue, a robust box office system was essential. The venue was run by one full time and one part time staff, so minimising effort was very important for us. TicketSource makes everything so easy. It took less than an hour for us to set up the system, from scratch, including seating plans, venue details box office front-end and Facebook integration. Customer support from TicketSource has also been first rate. One one occasion, I had to phone them an hour before a show went up and they quickly resolved my problem over the phone.

title: I Love TicketSource
name: Omar P.
comments: Comments: I use ticket source for 90% of my events. I found them via The Pumphouse Children's Theatre in Watford UK, and have been singing there praises ever since.

title: Resolving trouble tickets was never so easy
name: Vijay K.
pros: Pros: they have a very systematic solution and addressing the user data for the ticket collected and resolve it with the very fastest and reliable way possible.
cons: Cons: Submitting the ticket in the system is a little slow if they have a huge queue. i suggest an improvement there if they can.

title: Ticket software fine, customer service seriously lacking
name: Nicholas F.
comments: Comments: Ticket software was fine, analytics were useful, not particularly stand out amongst competition, what did make ticketsource stand out was the availability of ticket scanning hardware, unfortunately hardware did not work (most importantly incorrect charger for base station laptop), causing a great deal of extra work during the event and cost of temporary universal charger to get the thing to work. Faultiness of charger then completely denied by customer service, will not be using ticketsource again, is ridiculous after they made around 1300 from the event.

title: great overall but room for improvements
name: amber c.
comments: Comments: Great back end functions etc but interface is a little ugly especially on mobile devices. Wish could bulk update events, i.e. if change general terms and conditions, it's very painstaking to indiv modify each upcoming event. We really use the public facing ticket remaining function, it would be great if this was visible on mobile view and not just desktop.

title: Hassle free experience from start to finish.
name: Phil Y.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: Once set up, this software takes most of the trouble associate with ticketing away. The interface is fairly self explanatory and if things do get confusing the help site is both intuitive and informative.

There was no claim process, as soon as the event was over funds were credited to our accounts and there was a full detailed report regarding every transaction.
cons: Cons: The initial planning is a little long winded. I would like the ability to customise the seating plan layout further. There's nothing wrong with the current set up, I'd just like to be able to configure it to look like my theatre.
overall: Overall: Took away the hassle of ticketing almost completely.

title: Very good ticket selling software
name: Sharad G.
pros: Pros: they are very user friendly and we have always got positive remarks and cheers from our customers. Thanks to TS
cons: Cons: There is no box office download option, everything needs to be cloud based/internet usage. but they are user friendly!

title: Great for customers and for us!
name: Shirley J.
pros: Pros: We've been using TicketSource for many years now and the customer service team are exceptionally good at getting you started, helping to iron out kinks and give support when needed. However, the system is really intuitive and easy to use. They have added extra functions over the years and it feels very bespoke given how it can be adapted to different venues and events. I feel it is by far the most friendly and easy to use system out there.
cons: Cons: The only thing (as a charity) we don't like is that any donations also get a surcharge as it feels like a heavy penalty on people's generosity over and above what they pay for their ticket fee.

title: Live Music!
name: Ian S.
comments: Comments: I've been using Ticketsource for nearly four years with a Live music project in the Yorkshire Dales. the system allows multiple venues to be stored so setting up a gig is as simple as copy event and change the band name. I use a bar code scanner at event which makes entry easy and looks awesome. most of my guests just use the home printed tickets and the system alerts if someone tries to cheat. Support is great, but hardly had had to use it. it works best with wifi access at the venues but can be ran off line if down loaded once online ticket sales close. A great advantage it that cash sales pre event can be entered free of charge for those guests without internet. The only disadvantage is the sales payment is not made until the Wednesday after a weekend event which effects cash flows if you have a expensive band to pay on the night. In conclusion its a fab system which is easy to use and sell tickets online, hopefully I will be using Ticketsource for years to come.

title: A great ticketing company!
name: Rihanon H.
comments: Comments: This is the second time we have used TicketSource and this time round it has been great! Last year we had a couple of problems that didn't help the way we handled our tickets but we went back with ways of how they could improve and their technical team worked together to help us. With their help we were able to sell our tickets with no problems at all. The back of house system worked really well for us, as a company we sell lots of different ticket types and its important to be able to pull off reports, check customers details and doing this with TicketSource was very easy. If we had any questions or were struggling to set up the event the customer support was brilliant and very helpful! As we are a seasonal event we only use TicketSource for a certain amount of time but we will certainly be returning to use them again. Highly recommend!

title: General review
name: hannah t.
comments: Comments: The customer support was great, I especially liked the fact the team could view how I had set up our event page and provide step by step advice. The FAQ's on the website were helpful too.

title: Excellent resource for ticket selling
name: Christine R.
comments:
Comments: My amateur dramatic society have no need to look elsewhere in order to sell tickets for our annual pantomime. Should we have any questions or queries there is someone to come to our aid either by phone, online chat or email. The customer service personnel are very patient and helpful.

As someone who has limited understanding of technical knowhow I can get frustrated when trying to follow tutorials as there can be points that look simple enough but I get myself into difficulties. I seem to find things can't be completed as easily as TicketSource would think. I am someone who has to to have every move clearly explained and not assumed we know what to do - hence for me 3 Stars.

title: Absolutely Ideal for Amateur Theatre Groups
name: Laurie R.
comments:
Comments: The TicketSource site is quite the best I have found for on-line booking for our shows. We are just starting to accept bookings on line and were very nervous about the things that could go wrong leaving our customers frustrated and angry. I am pleased to say that nothing like this has happened and the feedback we have had so far is very favourable. The reports that are readily available keep us in control of the sales and monitor their progress. The detailed financial reports and the prompt payment of receipts are a boon to our treasurer. I particularly like the way we can integrate the on-line sales with our over the counter sales as many of our older patrons are uneasy about using computers to buy things on-line.

The facilities in the software range from very simple to the most elaborate you could imagine.

I would not hesitate to recommend this site to any Amateur Groups.

title: Cygnet Players Review
name: Katy G.
comments: Comments: I think Ticketsource is a very good website for amateur companies to use. The seating plan side of things is quite difficult to create but once you have the main template for your theatre its great that this is added top you account and reused.

title: Great service!
name: Charlie C.
comments:
Comments: We've been using TicketSource for a few years now for our amateur theatre, and have been very happy with the service. It's pretty simple to use, and a lot of extra functionality has been added since we started using it. Unlike Microsoft, however, they don't completely rewrite the interface every time they make a change! One of the unexpected side-effects of migrating to online ticketing is that, because they can see how many tickets are still available, our patrons often leave it to the last minute before booking, which gives some directors sleepless nights!

In our experience, customer service has been brilliant. We haven't experienced many problems, but any issues or questions raised have alway been dealt with very promptly, and the technical staff seem to very be open to sensible changes requested by their customers.

title: Great Service
name: Mark F.
comments: Comments: This is such a useful service for small organisations who want to sell tickets over the internet. We are a small amateur drama society who do no more than 4000 a year ticket revenue but find it is well worth while. It is very flexible and if you are reasonably comfortable with using the web it should not take more than an hour to learn how to use it.

title: User-friendly, pro quality ticketing site
name: Mark N.
pros: Pros: It is comprehensively able to take care of all of my needs.
cons: Cons: My previous criticisms were answered satisfactorily by customer services.
overall: Overall: Ticketsource has all the functionality I could possibly want from a ticketing site, and is user-friendly to boot. I run uk based events and find it far superior to any other ticketing site I've used. The fees are reasonable, especially for higher priced events. Would thoroughly recommend.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: No... use it, it's great.

title: Very pleased!
name: Rose -Marie O.
comments: Comments: I have been using ticket source on behalf of The Kings Hall and can say just how pleased I am with the service. It's very easy to use - customers have given great feedback and I've been able to edit events with no fuss. On a couple of occasions I have called the help line and they have been very quick to answer - no long waits which is so often the case with other companies and they have been able to advise and sort my question straight away. If I have to mention an improvement I would only say it would be good to see our events go out in their Twitter feeds occasionally. Overall, top marks!

title: Good but customer service could be improved.
name: Annabelle L.
comments: Comments: I find you site easy to use once you know what you are doing but it would be nice if there is a guide on how to use Ticket Source. If there is already one, I couldn't find it so you might want to make it easily accessible especially when people first sign up.

title: Excellent ticketing experience for us!
name: Benoy I.
comments: Comments: We've just used ticketsource for our first event and it was a fantastic experience for our admin users and our clients using it to book the event. Easy to setup, simple to use and it has some great features too. The only two improvements I would suggest is with the free scanning app for iOS and Android where it was sometimes a 'hit & miss'. The other improvement could be with the 'refund' process where one can only refund in full and part refund requires ringing in to their support rather than having to deal with it ourselves online. But overall it was an excellent experience for us and we will certainly be using them again! Highly recommended!

title: Penarth Operatic & Dramatic Society
name: Michael J.
comments:
Comments: As a society we started using TicketSource a few years when we started our website.

We were told about it by another local company ( Concept Players ) and I was charged with finding out what they could for us. I went to the website and the site was simple and informative and within minutes I had all information for me to advise the committee about it. The commttee deceided to use them and I was instructed to to go ahead and I then went back to the website and within minutes I had arranged an account and it did not take long to get our tickets online. The tickets sell well and we can get all the information about our ticket sales and at the end of the sales period the money is transfered to our bank account with no fuss.

It would be fair to say that they offer a first class service with no fuss and if you need any help then it is only an email or phone call to get it sorted.

title: Bath beer festival boost
name: Martin A.
comments: Comments: I researched reviews of on-line ticketing services before selecting TicketSource to sell beer festival tickets, based on the experience of other Campaign for Real Ale users. Even though I was a first time user of on-line ticketing, I was pleased by the ease with which I could set up details for the event. I used the system at a basic level but there is plenty of scope for more sophistication, for example, bar code scanning. Over 70% of our tickets were sold via TicketSource.

title: Helpful staff. Easy to navigate the site.
name: Peter R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I could do almost anything I wanted. Reports were easy to generate. It was extremely easy to make alterations to people's bookings, or recover customer details. I needed one phone call at the start just to sort a couple of minor things, then it was really easy!
cons: Cons: I had no real issues. From initial set up, I was not sure how the ticket booking fee would work, but one phone call sorted it out.

title: Fabulous.Made it so easy for me to sell tickets and promote my show.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to set up in the first instance, very easy to operate both from a customers point of view and from an administrative point of view. Easily amendable and controllable for an admin, if changes needed to be made and on top of that, paid out extremely quickly.
cons: Cons: Nothing, it worked perfectly for me. I found it perfect for what I needed - I really do not have any cons for this product,

title: Established Amateur Dramtic Company adopt online booking
name: Nick C.
comments: Comments: We decided to offer online booking to our audience members and found TicketSource by looking at the online service provision offered by other local amateur dramatic groups.

title: Overall ticket source did exactly what I required and I'm very happy.
name: Darren P.
comments: Comments: I did a bit of searching on the internet before eventually going with ticket source. You only know at the end of the process whether it was a good decision or not, and I can say now that I'm at the end, it was a good decision. I'm a fairly competent user of IT software and found my way around everything ok. I've marked it down to a very good 4 stars on 'ease of use' as I feel that it probably could be just a little bit more user friendly to people who aren't IT literate. The FAQ section is also very useful. I would recommend this to others and will also be using it again in the future.

title: Great Resource for a Charity
name: Rosie S.
comments: Comments: Really useful resource for selling tickets to all manor of events ( and free events). Easy to use, lots of flexibility: can set up offer codes and discounts, brand your page, summary reports etc. All the usual options for tickets, self print, post etc. inclusion of bar codes/QR codes and readers gives security as well.

title: Downsview Players
name: Michele C.
comments:
Comments: Would have liked to have been involved in the chip an pin trial but never got a reply from you?

We are looking to use card machines and your trial would have let us trial if it would suit out group. Your programme is very easy to use. We don't have a huge audience but they are starting to use ticket source via our web site. The tickets people can have sent to them look very professional and those who used it were impressed. Being able to print ticket or have on phone has worked well with our audience and is used more at pantomtime time.

title: Nailsea Community Christmas Fair skate rink tickets
name: Carol D.
comments:
Comments: Some people thought we were wrong to sell our tickets online - it was the best decision, relatively straightforward but from the organisers point of view, easy and less time consuming.

We had a few issues setting out the different times and numbers - for example the penguins for little people and the disabled chairs - and have learned a lot for this year.

Yes, we will use them again - we now know where to get support and help.

The tickets looked lovely - we got them sponsored which helped towards the cost...2016 learning groove, 2017 learned!

Thank you TicketSource.

title: Chichester Cathedral
name: Kay M.
comments:
Comments: Following the closure of our in-house box office, we needed to find a reputable ticket agent that could offer a cost-effective ticketing solution and whose software was continually updated in line with developing technologies.

Ticketsource provides all this.

The website and back office is very easy to navigate. Purchasing and selling tickets is a quick and painless process, and the software design very user-friendly.

The software provides real time reporting and the provision to sell tickets in-house when required.

The customer support is outstanding. Issues are resolved immediately and instruction when given is systematic, clear and precise.

I would recommend Ticketsource to any event organiser.

title: Overall Very Good
name: Mark H.
comments: Comments: The website is easy to use and offers a comprehensive range of features. Some of our customers struggle to buy tickets when accessing the website from certain devices, though. It would be really helpful in it could be possible for customers to buy tickets from mobile devices as well as desk tops. It would also be helpful if we could arrange refunds when necessary, rather than having to email for support.

title: Great Ticket Facility but...
name: Rob M.
comments: Comments: Overall I find Ticket Source excellent and find website integration very easy. An option or tick box of what events to be listed to the site would be an bonus as we like to great tickets for competition or complimentary tickets but if you create an event for free tickets they will automatically be listed on our website - I hope that makes sense.

title: New user of the Ticket Source system
name: Alison W.
comments: Comments: We had to set up our own system in late summer following the closure of our previous outlet and as Ticket Source had come highly recommended to us by a smaller user we decided to try it. The system is easy to set up, even for the complicated ticketing systems we need for some venues. Once in place, it is easy to adjust and, more importantly, our end users find it easy to use. The reports are excellent and one key area we have never been able to look at in detail before is our marketing. We are now able to target the right places for marketing our events to ensure maximum take-up of tickets. Overall we are very happy with our first few months of using Ticket Source

title: Outdoor event using downloaded database and scanner
name: Derek L.
comments:
Comments: The event sold around 200 tickets with differing values.

We knew that the customers would all arrive in a short period of time so we opted to buy a scanner and use this linked to a downloaded customer database on a laptop.

The system worked fine for 10mins then started to freeze but with a reset worked again. This occurred several times. I'm not sure if it was the laptop or scanner/connection that was at fault but without doing another event will not know.

That aside, the system worked well and the ticket that I made purposely void was met with a loud refusal bleep.

Overall the system is good and kept a large sum of money in electronic transfers rather than cash on the gate.

Recommended.

title: Worked well for 3 years now
name: Ian S.
comments:
Comments: Very happy with the software and the enhancements that come out from time to time. Also appreciate the ability to be able to influence new features using the feedback sections.

Web based so there are the usual problems that that technology creates - occasional speed issues (could be anywhere in the loop) and print difficulties; but balances by no hassle looking after the system and no hassle updates.

Brilliant support people on the few occasions I have needed it. No thought of going elsewhere.

title: Have dropped my old ticket provider for Ticket Source
name: Cheryl M.
comments:
Comments: Having battled for a two year period selling my tickets on an international ticketing website I decided that the options for our customers and the time it took to upload our events was not sustainable.

We had used ticketsource for one of our very large events and it worked well and we have now migrated all of our ticketed events on to ticketsource. The system is intuitive, straightforward, easy to use, understand, based in the UK and the costs are cheaper for the customer too.

I have been contacted by a few other ticket sites to try their product but the service and product offered by ticketsource delivers exactly what we need and the customer can use easily.

title: Market Theatre
name: Michael E.
comments: Comments: We have no ticket office other than very limited hours in the Council Office in Ledbury. The majority of our tickets are sold through TicketSource and some through a mobile phone that we man ourselves. We have had very few problems and the helpline has been very helpful when we have. The TicketSource website is not mobile phone friendly and we have asked if a mobile phone App could be developed but I understand there are no plans to do so at present. Otherwise it works extremely well for us.

title: Belvoir Players
name: Shane J.
comments: Comments: The one function that i believe is missing from the package is the ability to communicate effectively with our customers. We should be able to use the system and the data that is collected to communicate effectively with our audiences . Overall the booking system works effectively , the only issue we have is trying to to check the seats that are allocated by name and it is very difficult and long winded to establish this

title: Convenient, Useful, Easy to use.
name: Will H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Useful reporting, quick and easy booking features and settings are easy to amend and use. Useful add ons such as wristbands and E-tickets, which is very helpful.
cons: Cons: Not much in the way of 'cons'. I wish there was a summary sales report that broke the information down in one swift form. Including : Open Tickets, Sold, Comps, Unpaid.

title: Easy to use and great for publicity!
name: Rachel D.
comments:
Comments: We love TicketSource at WTG. It's easy to use, we can put on special offers easily, we get comprehensive reports and we can set up events using our template in minutes.

The charges are at a brilliantly competitive rate, we've found ticketsource to be very helpful with event problems (on our end!) and we love that there's no charge on our cash/cheque sales!

We are also a fan of the publicity functions e.g. we can drop all email adresses (of those who have agreed to receive marketing) into a CSV file and it takes just seconds to mailshot an email publicising our latest event or sale!

All in all I don't think we will ever use another company now. Thankyou TicketSource!

title: excellent!
name: chloe n.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: very easy to set up! Even for me who is a bit of a technophobe
cons: Cons: Not always obvious how to change settings. Eg. I wanted to change the time that sales could run to - couldn't find it on the evening of my event, so may have lost sales.
overall: Overall: Excellent customer service, great product.

title: Amazing easy and cost-effective
name: Anthony L.
comments: Comments: All I can say is this is the best service I have ever come across in and I have tried a few for it's easiness it's cost effectiveness and the ability to call upon somebody instantly for the one little problem that I did have amazing. Hundred percent five stars. If you are choosing between another company and this one - you will end up coming to this one eventually because it is just too good so you might as well just come here straight away.

title: A great Product
name: David F.
comments:
Comments: We are a small An-Dram group based in East Hamphire We have used Ticket Source now for a number of recent productions; they provide exactly the service we require and we have had problems with them. Our audiences, when booking direct, get a seamless professional service and our administrators all find the website easy to use. The reporting system is excellent and having a day to day review of ticket sales enables us to target our marketing where it is needed.

One minor quibble: The "Next" , "Print tickets"and "Back" buttons are placed at the bottom of each page and can be missed. We had two customers who didn't realise they had to print their own tickets and we had rather fussed 'phone calls.

title: Great for independent events
name: Imoteda A.
comments:
Comments: Used the site to sell tickets for my one time event in London. It was easy to use and the customer service was great. The fees are lower than other similar sites,

The only thing I would have wanted would be a choice to make the event site a lot more attractive. I will be repeating the event this year and will definitely be using this site again!

title: Ticket Source
name: Joshua N.
comments: Comments: Easy to use, very user friendly. Helpdesk are really responsive and can soon diagnose any issues you may be having. Would be useful to have better options when doing refunds or exchanges, i.e. being able to exchange different ticket types over various dates and refunding the difference...

title: Straightforward Box Office
name: John L.
comments: Comments: We are a small amateur theatre company and stage one open air production per year. In the past we only ever offered the option of paying on the door, but we started using TicketSource a few years ago and since then we have seen advance ticket sales grow year on year.

title: Brilliant Support for volunteer users
name: Cathy H.
comments: Comments: We are a small theatre, entirely run by volunteers, with 80 seats for 50+ events a year. I am very happy to give help and advice to any potential customers with similar theatres. We transferred to Ticketsource 3 years ago and have seen our online ticket sales increase to about 60%. This saves a huge amount of volunteer time in dealing with ticket sales. The support has been first class with prompt replies to emails and fixes for most of the problems and individual requests eg for membership numbers to be included. We started off using the system for free for 3 months, getting used to the system with our volunteers, before going online for customers once we were used to it and then paying the booking fees. Look us up on Google if you want to contact me via the Box Office email.

title: An Great Online Ticketing Agency!
name: Fred P.
comments: Comments: We've used Ticket Source for our concerts for a couple of years now and have found that online bookings have increased steadily . The site is easy to use and customer support is friendly and very helpful - not that you'll need it very often. The fees they put on tickets aren't outrageous and we also used them for a free concert we offered because they don't charge anything for ticketing these! Shortly after the event, the money appears in our bank account and always tallies with ticket sales.

title: Great tool
name: Malcolm M.
comments: Comments: We are a small private community theatre and it was not envisaged that it would be used by many of our patrons, but after a small number of years, we have greatly increased use online, and the charges are reasonable, I do wish some of the better known venues would use this service, as recently I booked to see an Andre Rieu performance, and in addition to the high card fees, I had to pay delivery on the tickets, so, I opted to collect from the box office, but was charged an identical fee to the deliver charge, as a collection fee, come on promoters, switch to ticketsource..

title: Ticket source is overall a good product and I will continue to use it
name: Mike P.
comments: Comments: I have used Ticketsource on a number of occasions. Some with individually numbered seating other simply with a number of available seats.

title: The best way to sell your tickets online
name: Peter T.
comments: Comments: We began using TicketSource about 18 months ago after having used a competitor for a couple of years. TicketSource is great giving you a great deal of flexibility - far more than we, a small local amateur dramatic society, need! Ticket sales are easy for our clients, and we receive a daily sales list to keep us up to date with how they are going. We then get a compilation list for each evening to use in the box office. I wish all our clients would use TicketSource, it's easier for us than selling tickets ourselves or through local outlets!

title: Great work all round!
name: Kat A.
comments: Comments: Fantastic service with a sensibly designed and easy to use the system. Excellent re-tweeting as well much appreciated.

title: Full featured, nice layouts but expensive.
name: Phil M.
comments: Comments: Better than most alternative systems because it allow seat plans to be created that are roughly to scale, with angled seats. Customers have to choose a seat price before seeing the plan which I don't like, but otherwise the customer experience is OK. The system can also handle thermal ticket printing which I haven't tried (we just use emailed tickets and there's no internet access at the door) but might be very useful for some.

title: Black Dog Days gig
name: Bob N.
comments: Comments: I had spent ages trying to work with MusicGlue, but found it very difficult to get exactly what I needed. Eventually I gave up and tried TicketSource as a last resort, not expecting to solve the issues I was having. I was amazed at how intuitive TicketSource was. I had spent literally days toiling with MusicGlue, but I set up my TicketSource event and started selling tickets within a couple of hours! I will definitely use TicketSource for all my events in the future and would recommend TicketSource to anyone.

title: Charney Church
name: Pam E.
comments: Comments: On the whole it's really good. Ticket bookings (ie when they are paid for) works better than reservations. When I reserve tickets it doesn't always send a "reservation e-mail" to those making the reservation and it is difficult to change a reservation to a confirmed booking. I now get around it by completely cancelling the reservation and starting a new booking, this does however make the reports a little confusing and take a little more time than I would like. Your customer service team is spot on though. They are great.

title: Ticketsource from a promotor point of view
name: Peter D.
comments: Comments: The system is great and way out ahead of other ticketing systems in terms of ease of use, access to information and being able to present a good fresh interface for customers and as a back office.

title: Easy, well run and just what we needed
name: Stephen I.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Very simple to use for an old fogey like me!
cons: Cons: Found it a bit complicated to organise comps
overall: Overall: Good service and really professional

title: TicketSource
name: Mike W.
comments:
Comments: As a regular event organiser I have used several ticketing companies over the years, I have settled on TicketSource because it offers me a complete solution to ticket sales; whether I want to sell tickets from my website or social media or whether I want to offer a telephone or postal booking service - TicketSource does it all.

It's a very easy to use but fully featured 'front end' but if I do get into difficulties there is plenty of help available online or on the phone, the customer service is excellent.

TicketSource are constantly improving the features and have recently provided integration with MailChimp. I can't speak highly enough of them!

title: Great App, Easy to use.
name: Marc S.
comments: Comments: The app seems to drain device power at an incredible rate. But other then that a great app. Was very impressed with all the features, being able to sell your own tickets and having them all on the same spreadsheet for ease and speed front of house. Back of house reports were quite comprehensive for what we needed them for.

title: TicketSource is a great solution for semi-pro events
name: Gareth P.
comments: Comments: Over the years I've used several websites to provide ticketing for small scale events I've been involved in. TicketSource is by far the best solution. The interface is fairly intuitive. Creating new events, for a play with numbered seating, a cinema screening or a poetry event with more casual attendance was straightforward and the results were attractive. It was easy to interface the site with our theatre website via HTML code. It is also excellent for filtering the customer data for marketing purposes.

title: Ticket Source? 'May the Source be with you!'
name: Richard B.
comments: Comments: Just great. Soooo much easier to handle our box office. However would prefer instant notification of seats sold as we also sell them over the old telephonographic method!

title: Great on the whole
name: Erin E.
comments: Comments: It is a user-friendly system for customers, and the process of money transfer for organizers is great. Setting up events in the first place is a little quirky, but it's easy to get past this. A demo thermal ticket app for Mac would be brilliant

title: First ever show - so glad I chose TicketSource!
name: Bethan H.
comments:
Comments: Site is very easy to use, easy to navigate and get event set up (I'm fairly good with computers but not a total whizz and this is the first event I'd ever run).

I like that there are lots of customisable options and that I could put my event "stamp" on it, so my audience felt involved before the night - they were buying tickets from me, not a generic site. Customer service was good, I didn't have any issues to report but just after I set up the event, I got a call advising of some other options I could use within the event page for ticketing (which was very useful!) Other producers I know have decided to use TicketSource based on my experience and I will definitely use them again for my next show :)

title: Good product. Just a few niggles.
name: Gavin R.
comments: Comments: We sometime have customers tell us that the transactions buttons are not visible on their screen, it is too low to show. We usually have the same problem but the slider bar allows us to scroll down - annoying but not a show stopper.

title: Brilliant!
name: Martin C.
comments: Comments: Used Ticketsource for all our ticketing for past 3 years. Brilliantly designed, its ease of use both for the venue operator and online for customers is outstanding. Customer support is the best I've had from ANY software/IT supplier. In my years as a venue manager I've operated numerous ticketing systems including BOCS (!), Databox, ENTA, and others. Ticketsource is streets ahead of them all!

title: Thoroughly recommended - Great Customer Service
name: Sandra H.
comments: Comments: I have been using ticket source very successfully for a couple of years now. I am a small business that runs small scale events.

title: Great product and great product support
name: Bob S.
comments: Comments: My only negative is: we usually have a different layout in our auditorium for each of our 5 plays and we offer a password early booking week for members. This means that for each block of seats (typically 3 and sometimes more) there is a lot of setting up for each production. A way of making this easier would be great. Otherwise a great product and great support whenever needed.

title: The perfect Ticketing system for Hebden Bridge Piano Festival
name: Jan S.
comments: Comments: Once I'd taken a good look round the system I found it all very straightforward. And whenever I've been unsure I've had a speedy reply to my query. It's great that I can brand our sales pages to match the website - that gives people real confidence as they buy tickets for our events. All in all, Ticketsource is fantastic.

title: easy booking system
name: Yvonne T.
comments: Comments: I work on the box office as a volunteer for our theatre and am not particularly "technical" but find the system easy to use. I've also tried online booking and couldn't find much wrong with that either. A few of our customers have reported problems printing their e-tickets but I can't comment on that.

title: Absolutely brilliant!!
name: Ben W.
comments: Comments: As a long time established pantomime group we have been stuck in our ways for many years running a manual cash/cheque based ticket sales system. We decided to explore online ticket sales this year after a rise in non collected & non paid for tickets and also move into the 21st century! We cannot fault ticket source in any way! The support we have received for little niggles & how to's has been exceptional on the odd occasion we have had to ring them we are always greeted by a very friendly, knowledge member of staff who couldn't do anymore for you!

title: Excellent Service - Don't know how we managed without it
name: Dale R.
comments:
Comments: Several local theatre groups have taken our lead and now also use TicketSource. It's so easy, even for the non-techie. The printing is so simple and reliable, bookings can be made by anyone you give access to it (all our members booking their's and their families tickets themselves) and it even has a simple CRM system inbuilt now. Great, just great.

We hide the credit card charge in our ticket fee to encourage online sales and although they started slowly we now see 30-50% of sales going through the service. It costs us a little more but we're too small to have a dedicated booking office person so it's ideal.

title: Excellent Service - Don't know how we managed without it
name: Dale R.
comments:
Comments: Several local theatre groups have taken our lead and now also use TicketSource. It's so easy, even for the non-techie. The printing is so simple and reliable, bookings can be made by anyone you give access to it (all our members booking their's and their families tickets themselves) and it even has a simple CRM system inbuilt now. Great, just great.

We hide the credit card charge in our ticket fee to encourage online sales and although they started slowly we now see 30-50% of sales going through the service. It costs us a little more but we're too small to have a dedicated booking office person so it's ideal.

title: Harlow Chorus Concert Ticket Sales
name: Kathleen L.
comments: Comments: Ticketsource is, on the whole, easy to use in order to add concert details and update any changes to details as necessary. I'm not so happy with the recently slightly changed formats of the Daily Summary sent by email but am getting used to that. If I've encountered any problems, technical or otherwise, customer support is excellent - helpful, speedy and efficient.

title: First time user
name: Sue H.
comments: Comments: This is the first time we have used an outside agency to sell tickets for our Festival. As the Box Office manager I have found it brilliant. It's quick, easy to use and every query I've had has been answered simply and straightforwardly. Everything I thought might be an obstacle just wasn't!

title: First class ticketing solution matched by outstanding customer service
name: Carol D.
comments: Comments: TicketSource has been simply superb. The service has taken the hassle out of managing our box office and online sales now make up a significant proportion of bookings. The website is straightforward to use and on the odd occasion where it has been required, help is never far away. It is refreshing to find a company wanting to help you out so much, you genuinely feel like a valued customer. Highly recommended!

title: Excellent Ticket facility
name: Sarah J.
comments: Comments: I use TicketSource about 6 times a year for selling tickets online for concerts. The site is very good, it is generally very simple to see how to set a concert up. The fees are very reasonable and the money gets paid without fail promptly after the event. The 'Help' facility is good and the customer service is excellent. I got a phone call from them a few days after I registered simply to see if everything was ok and to make a connection with me. That was a good personal touch. I have recommended TicketSource to several friends who now use them for their own events.

title: Coach Potato
name: Ian K.
comments:
Comments: Would like to work with you to develop existing software product to be more tour event friendly

This is a big market and I know with a few tweaks you could open up more opportunities.

Example instead of door opening times could provide coach pick up points

title: House of Stand Up loves TicketSource
name: Trevor J.
comments:
Comments: There's a choice when considering who you should trust with your external ticket sales. However TicketSource initially explained everything in an easy to following format and in over three years as a customer they've never disappointed.

They are constantly improving their product and updating customers with a regular newsletter. On the very few times I've needed to contact the support team whether by email or phone my query has been dealt with in a prompt and efficient manner.

TicketSource are a company that I would have no hesitation in recommending.

title: Very easy to use service - great support and reasonable fees. Sold over 2,000 tickets through them.
name: Colin A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: Ease of setup

Very helpful support

Quick reports that can easily be reviewed on a phone

Quick payment
cons: Cons: Reports selection is poor. We were mailing our own tickets and to do the weekly mailing I had to download two reports into Excel, join using VLOOKUP and then manually check as the address report does not have the customer reference and if there are two people with the same surname the address reports sorts differently to the sales report.
overall: Overall: The ability to easily sell tickets online

title: First time user
name: John O.
comments: Comments: I found they system a little difficult to understand until I had the guidance of the support staff. Following that was less of a problem but I still found some of the menus in terms of ticket display a little confusing. The search for a gig on the customer site is not always foolproof as well

title: Ticketsource Review
name: Dick H.
comments:
Comments: Delighted with ticketsource, which I find extremely user friendly and simple to use. I have now converted our local theatre, our local music concert organisation, and our local festival to on-line ticketing through ticketsource. The other organisations involved like it. There's no registration for purchasers, one-off events can be easily included, and amendments to events are easy to do. The reporting system is fine, and moneys are paid efficiently.

All told a very satisfactory product.

title: So easy and customer support were fantastic
name: Alison D.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I have not done anything like this before and was a bit nervous but it was so straightforward and easy to use.I liked being able to check the ticket sales and was simple to do refunds.

title: Excellent Customer Service. Always polite and willing to help.
name: Molly A.
comments: Comments: Would be helpful if box office stayed open until the start of the performance to cope with people coming in the door.

title: Great - Great - Great
name: Anthony L.
pros: Pros: Ease of use
cons: Cons: Don't know any.
overall: Overall: Amazing ease of use even for me - who can't even do Facebook - brillent customer service - value for money, I just wish infoind these guys earlier.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Don't bother searching for another piece of software. This one does it all and so easy.

title: Ticket source Review
name: Kendal M.
comments: Comments: I think it is a good way for people to book tickets and it is easy for a user to go through the process. i just wish that the printing go tickets option was still available as not having that is a bit of problem.

title: Software for softies
name: Angela B.
comments: Comments: We have used Ticketsource for 2 annual music festivals held in October, in Buckinghamshire. We were able to set up the venues and events with minimal support from Ticketsource. The system enabled an initial 'in house' box office followed by online and telephone provided by Ticketsource. Support from Ticketsource was easily available on the phone, in a user friendly fashion.

title: Useful ticketing system
name: Alan Y.
comments: Comments: We are a small singing group using a small local theater for our performances. We sell most of our tickets via TicketSource and have found their system invaluable, especially for a small group like ours with few resources. The system is easy to use, both for us as a group, and for our audience, and we now wonder how we managed without it in the past.

title: Online Box Office and Ticket Sales Solution
name: John C.
comments: Comments: Ticketsource provide a very intuitive and easy to use system that was a perfect partnership for our theatre group. It allows a great deal of control and provides brilliant reporting facilities that we have found very useful for managing and analysing our events. The merchant/sales service is great for an organisation like ours where setting up our own online merchant service is impractical. The Ticketsource team have always been on hand should we need any questions answering or help with the system.

title: So glad we chose TicketSource
name: Jane P.
comments: Comments: TicketSource offer a great service. We chose them because we operate reserved seating at several different venues and the programme allows you to create seating plans. All their staff are knowledgeable and helpful and don't make you feel an idiot! There is quite a lot to learn at first, but the it gets easier. We are now finding the reports on sales and who purchases very useful. Thank you TicketSource!

title: Easy online ticket sales
name: Richard F.
comments: Comments: Using Ticketsource has allowed us to expand into online ticket sales, which is not something we would otherwise have been able to do. The flexibility of charges (allowing a fixed charge, a percentage of the ticket, etc) allows us to ensure customers are not burdened with the complete cost of using the service.

title: Administrator entitlement
name: Anthony O.
comments: Comments: All aspects of managing ticket source appears very easy to operate and obtain reports on, even for the technophobes of our group. Only con found so far is how to change income from normal ticket prices when a third 'discouted' option is in place yet not set up on system. This has been referred back to my groups' installer of the system to address. Cannot understand why we did not do this earlier.

title: Pirbright Players
name: David G.
comments: Comments: I've found Ticketsource really useful for our amateur dramatics group. We're able to have both online bookings and traditional bookings, using cheques, for our performances. Our online bookings have increased as customers realise how easy it is to use. The software is straightforward and links well into our website. Ticketsource's customer service, when needing help, is very good. I'd recommend this booking system.

title: I recommend Ticket Source
name: Phil L.
comments: Comments: I have used Ticket Source to provide an online ticketing outlet for two events this year, and its so easy to set up and use I am recommending Ticket Source to people I meet who are looking for an online booking service. On the one occasion I needed help - the support team responded promptly and resolved the problem. I will be using Ticket Source again.

title: The best move we've ever made
name: Shaun D.
comments:
Comments: We took the decision to go with ticket source a few years ago and have never looked back since. Professional in every aspect and so easy to use. We don't yet use the "Scan" feature (as we haven't really needed to) but i can imagine this being a real winner with bigger events.
