The report facilities are also fantastic. Never had any problems whatsoever and I would recommend TicketSource to anyone...!

title: Greta customer support!
name: jennifer s.
comments:
Comments: The customer support is great! - I made a few errors/needed help a few times. I rang the helpline and spoke to someone every time who talked me through any problem without being patronising to a noncomputer person! I have now used ticket source for 2 events (Musical Theatre shows.)

I will be using the site again and recommend it to everyone I know! - Thank you.

title: We love Ticketsource
name: Craig B.
comments: Comments: We have been using Ticketsource as our primary box office service for the past 5+ years. The software is easy to use and intergrates into our mailing helping us to save on time. The Ticketsource gang are always quick to respond, very efficient and so friendly, we don't have to think twice about contacting them with queries.

title: A brilliant answer to a question we didn't know that we needed to ask
name: Gwilym B.
comments: Comments: Occasionally we have the opportunity to sell car park spaces for events and Ticket Source has been the ideal tool for us to take pre payment for people traveling from afar. When it comes to market the availability of spaces the ability for people to book in advance and secure their places in advance has been a blessing.

title: Making Ticket Management Easy
name: Darren S.
comments: Comments: We have been using the system for nearly a year to keep a track of our school performances. The system allows us to know exactly how many people we are expecting with ease. No more sitting for hours making paper tickets that are then binned.

title: Box office service
name: Farquhar M.
comments: Comments: I think the site is greatly improved. It's very easy for punters to use, and I, as the event organiser am able to manage my own bookings very effectively.

title: Excellent ticketing system
name: Hilary S.
comments: Comments: I've used this system both as a buyer of event tickets and as a manager selling tickets for a show. it's a simple, easy-to-use system which works really well. the set up process takes no time and it's designed to be accessibly to even informal settings like a family garden party. Fantastic and supportive staff check that you are doing OK. I recommend them highly.

title: One of the best services I have used in any sector
name: Mark N.
comments: Comments: Ticketsource is really easy to use and the customer service is absolutely outstanding. Unlike so many service companies, Ticketsource actually listen to and act upon feedback. Using the service frequently has raised areas where I think refinements would be beneficial - in both cases Ticketsource has adopted that feedback (which I've no doubted was duplicated by other users) to make its service better than ever.

title: The system was so user friendly, and managing our event was terrific, why did we not discover Ticket
name: Pamela R.
comments: Comments: My experience was only positive , staff very helpful with any minor glitches I had but once I got the hang of the reports and functions of the system it was so easy.The promptness after the event at getting details of our overall sales and income was superb. I cant praise Ticket source enough.

title: Couldn't ask for more!
name: Chris M.
comments: Comments: An absolutely TOP QUALITY company - have been using TicketSource for around 6 or 7 years now and have watched it grow and evolve. If I have had any queries or issues, their customer service has always been absolutely brilliant and it's great to see the features and options grow and grow.

title: Outstanding piece of kit
name: Sue M.
comments: Comments: This is the first time we haver used Ticket Source for our dance productions and we will certainly be making you guys our no 1 source for selling tickets.

title: Works a treat
name: Dave H.
comments: Comments: TicketSource works great, we've not had any major problems and minor queries were soon answered by the support team. The MailChimp integration is useful for us as well as everything is connected together.

title: We Learned Along The Way
name: Rick C.
comments: Comments: We use the facility for an AmDram group of volunteers. A way of capturing sales by credit cards. I have learned to reserve tickets until paid for rather than issuing them as sold. It helps massively at the box office for the person to know who to collect money from 'on the door'. But we would highly recommend the service as easy to set up, easy to use

title: Brilliant, helpful service
name: Hilary S.
comments: Comments: We tried out Ticketsource for a small-scale outdoor event in September. I had bought tickets from them before but this was our first time selling. The system works really well and it's flexible so you can decide whether to absorb the commission charges or not. I was surprised to get an actual telephone call from one of the staff asking how it was going and did I have any problems? Really good to speak to a human being. She also phoned after the event had finished to check how it all went. It goes without saying that the final payment came in promptly. Excellent.

title: A good experience
name: Graham R.
comments:
Comments: First time use for us. Really good personal technical support. Don't change it!!

We had been looking for this type of service for some time. One are that could be better is the pre-population of the database with member data. This is a small point overall

title: Easy-to-use system!
name: Branwen M.
comments: Comments: Our local theatre group have been using Ticketsource for our online ticket sales for the last couple of years, and have been very impressed with the service. The Ticketsource interface is VERY easy to use, with lots of functionality and flexibility. Whenever we've run into difficulty (that has only happened once or twice!) the customer support team have been very quick to reply to emails and have always been very helpful and patient. I can't imagine ever needing to look elsewhere for online ticket services.

title: Ticketsource for us
name: Chris A.
comments: Comments: We've used Ticketsource for our last 5 productions and would thoroughly recommend them. Even if you have made a mistake in preparing the entry, the helpline is super-efficient and friendly.

title: Brilliant system
name: Jennie F.
comments: Comments: We have used TS for two years now and despite our administrators being well retired and our seating in a very old church being very complicated with help from the service team it's all been a piece of cake!!! We'd like it to be cheaper but we certainly wouldnt be without it now.

title: Excellent service for amateur theatre groups and more
name: Dale R.
comments: Comments: We've been using ticketsource for 5 years or more and although I review alternative services often, I can't find anything better out there. I would even recommend it for professional organisations but certainly for amateur theatre groups like us and several similar groups in the area use it on my recommendation.

title: First time users views
name: Frances O.
comments:
Comments: As a Charitable Trust which puts on events as fundraisers, it is important to us to be able to control and track bookings for our events and to raise the maximum amount of money from them.

Using Ticketsource has removed an enormous and sometimes inevitably inaccurate paper exercise And the need for physical collection of cash. It allows day by day monitoring of sales enabling us to increase marketing effort when needed.

title: Great ticket site
name: Edith W.
comments: Comments: This is a great site to promote and sell your tickets. It is easy to set up and instinctive to use. Customer service is second to none. They pay very quickly after your show has finished straight to the nominated bank account. Very highly recommended

title: Simple and Efficient
name: Dawn S.
comments: Comments: We are an amateur theatre in Arundel West Sussex and have been using ticket source now for over a year, All our patrons say how easy it to use and as the box office manager I find it great in all aspects. Also find the people at ticket source very helpful.

title: Easy, economy, efficient - look no further for a booking system
name: David Y.
comments: Comments: Over the years I have progressively come to use TicketSource for Manor Players and Riverside Players reservations and now rely on it completely for public on-line bookings and my own in-house reservations. And I am looking at using it for other organizations with whom I am involved

title: We love TicketSource!
name: Darren B.
comments: Comments: Since switching our ticketing to TicketSource, coupled with the growing engagement on our social media, we've noticed an increase in sales, due to the ease our customers find using their software.

title: Ideal solution
name: Liz S.
comments: Comments: We are a small/medium community theater with a flexible performance space and seating layouts. Ticketsource has proved ideal for our requirements. Volunteer Box Office staff have found the system easy & intuitive to use for bookings and administrators have found the functionality equally intuitive. And it's free!

title: Ticket Source is Fantastic
name: Gill H.
comments: Comments: We signed up to Ticket Source 12 months ago. The customer support is amazing, I cannot tell you how many times I have rung to ask questions. The great thing is that you get to speak to someone who really understands the product and I have yet to have an unanswered question. Everyone without fail is helpful and friendly and immediately understand your needs. I would not hesitate to recommend Ticket Source!

title: The BEST Box Office Solution
name: Ian M.
comments: Comments: Having looked at all the current web box office providers, TicketSource is definitely the best, the most feature-rich, the most user-friendly and the most comprehensive. Customer service is always prompt & friendly, and our customers have given brilliant feedback about using it.

title: Brilliant
name: Ian G.
comments: Comments: As a small Am Dram group, we have been delighted with Ticketsource and the service they offer. We would not have been able to sell tickets online without them. We were unsure whether our audience would be interested in online ticketing, but we sell many of our tickets this way now, by a simple link from our website which shows customer's easily how many tickets are still available and for which nights.

title: The Heron Theatre uses Ticketsource
name: John B.
comments:
Comments: Ticketsource has proved to be an excellent ticketing process for a small rural theatre run entirely by volunteers. Most custmers find qthe online booking easy and Box Office staff have also learned the system quickly. Support when needed is very quick.

Highly recommended

title: Windsor Theatre Guild's Experience with Ticket Source
name: Derek R.
comments: Comments: We have used Ticket Source twice now and are about to use it again shortly. Throughout we have been very pleased with the service as have our customers. In particular, the staff has always been extremely helpful and prompt whenever we have made a query.

title: TicketSource - one stop solution for event promoters
name: Mike W.
comments: Comments: I've been using TicketSource for selling tickets for Opera Anywhere events for several years, the system is so easy to use, offers great functionality and there is great support available from TS. The really nice thing is it's literally a one-stop box office solution. No need for anything or anyone else!

title: New user experience
name: Mike P.
comments: Comments: We do not sell a large number of tickets for our film club through the web but have found Ticket Source to be very useful for the members of the film club who want an online purchase. Reports are very efficient and timely to track sales. The website was quite easy to set everything up with a little bit of guidance from helpful staff there.

title: Novice user pleased by straightforward set up
name: Harold M.
comments: Comments: I had no knowledge of how to set up an event on TicketSource and was a bit apprehensive. As it turned out, I had little difficulty. The only slight criticism I have is that the set up screens didn't clearly define what a 'section' was - a few more words to explain that this is how you define differential seating/ticket pricing etc wouldn't be amiss.

title: Does exactly what we want it to!
name: Christine W.
comments:
Comments: This is my choir's first experience of selling tickets online. Other choirs on Twitter recommended Ticket Source, so we gave it a go - and it's worked really well.

If I'm looking for any criticism - maybe the display style could be modernised a bit?

title: Experienced Staff & customer service, easy to use, fair costs.
name: Anthony L.
comments:
Comments: This is by far the easiest way to have a professional box office.

Very easy to set up.

There is always some one on the other end of the phone or email to talk you through any problems you are having.

Very very good reasonable prices which you can add into your ticket or not.

Overall, I am so pleased that we chose ticket source, it has made our life so much easier and our small theater look and feel so much more professional.

title: Professional and cheap
name: Rich P.
comments: Comments: Extremely low cost and possibly free but with the look and feel to end customers of a professional set up (we're an amateur dramatics group)

title: REVIEW FROM THE ALBANY THEATRE, GREENOCK
name: Linda F.
comments: Comments: We have used Ticketsource for a few years now and we are very happy with our experience with Ticketsource so far. Whenever an occasional problem has cropped up the staff have been very effective in assisting to resolve the matter in without delay. Keep up the goo work!

title: The Ticket Source service is great - very happy to recommend to any other theatre group.
name: Nigel A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: Easy to set up. Very good emails to keep you informed on what is going on with sales.

Various reports which are really useful.

We love it, and will be encouraging our audiences to use Ticket Source much more in the future.
cons: Cons: I did find it hard to work out how to do a couple of things, but I phoned in for help and it was sorted out very quickly.
overall: Overall: Much easier ticket sales to a good portion of our audience.

title: Makes ticket booking a doddle
name: Vara W.
comments: Comments: Since we started using TicketSource, the number of bookings in-house has reduced to about one tenth, making the job for amateur box office people so much easier. Customer support is excellent.

title: Melbourne assembly rooms
name: andy h.
comments: Comments: could do with some training on ticket source as I am sure I don't use it to the full capacity, I am sure that the marketing options would be of use to us.

title: Nomad Theatre
name: Elaine B.
comments: Comments: the software does almost everything I would like, I would like to be able to split bookings more easily on show nights but otherwise it is straightforward

title: Review feedback
name: Alison L.
comments: Comments: The change of booking fee set up form ticket source to stripe is annoying - we haven't moved as we lose flexibility in how that is set up - it is complicates but the old flexibility is MUCH better

title: Excellent system and service
name: Dorothy G.
comments: Comments: The Helpdesk always responds promptly, and has either emailed instructions or led me through the process to resolve any problems I've had. Our ticket-purchasers say that the booking system is easy to use, and the telephone staff are always helpful.

title: Use at The Norbury Theatre, Droitwich
name: Justin D.
comments:
Comments: We tried two other systems at our Box Office, and this is much the best.

We would unhesitatingly recommend it to any theatre, for ease of use and for customer service.

In every way it is a user-friendly service, quick to learn for a new recruit and with staff always ready to help when one needs it.

I cannot praise the staff and system too highly!

title: Haddo House Choral and Operatic Society
name: christopher m.
comments: Comments: As a new user I found the whole package very easy to use and straight forward. When I needed help over phone the response was quick and very helpful. It seems ideal for our purpose.

title: Amazing Box Office System!
name: Paul T.
comments: Comments: We have used TicketSource for many years now, I have always found their customer service extremely helpful, the system is packed with great features and quite simply - it just works - very well!

title: TicketSource for an Amateur Orchestra
name: Stuart A.
comments: Comments: We at Havant Orchestras and several other local ones use TicketSource as an on-line platform for ticket sales. Once a venue is set up on the software it takes less than an hour to enter the details for a new event there. The takings from TicketSource sales have always come through to our bank account within 2-3 working days after a concert.St

title: LIBERA ticket sales feedback
name: David S.
comments:
Comments: Overall, TicketSource is a great service and prefer it over others I have tried.

My only niggle so far is that building a seating plan takes a long time to do, either because I am not doing it right, but I suspect because it is not as intuitive as it could be.

title: TicketSource is great
name: Rebecca C.
comments: Comments: We've used TicketSource for 2 events now and both times have been incredibly impressed with how smoothly it has run. Our customers have also commented on how easy the process is and enjoy selecting their own seats. We'll continue to use TicketSource for many events to come.

title: Excellent system
name: Deborah E.
comments: Comments: Have used this system for 9 months now and find it very efficient and easy to use. The customer service is excellent and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a good ticketing system.

title: Ticket source helps small promoters
name: Juliette L.
comments: Comments: In general ticket source is easy to use, but putting information about up coming shows on the site can be quite laborious with a lot of repetition between shows . Once this part is done, the rest is easy

title: Superb UK based Ticketing company
name: Jonathan G.
comments: Comments: We run a 50 event community arts festival and avail ourselves of their free service. They have listened when we say we would like new features, their UK based helpline is prompt and speaks everyday language that is easy to follow. Thank you for making our events go so smoothly

title: Great piece of software
name: Vince L.
comments: Comments: After a quick call to Customer Support, was up and running. It keeps track of all your sales and provides any report you can think of. Scanning tickets in was a doddle and the whole process gave us a professional appearance to the audience. Without doubt, we will be using the system for our next event.

title: Pleased user
name: Chris D.
comments: Comments: Easy to use and great quality but would be good if featured easier ways of exchanging bookings e.g., from one seat to another or from reserved to confirmed (and paid) booking.

title: The Malford Players - "Aladdin"
name: Bob F.
comments: Comments: TicketSource has provided a very effective and efficient way of promoting the group's productions, as well as offering an additional outlet for ticket sales. The site has proved to be very easy to use and adaptable. A particularly valuable part of the service provided are the regular and cumulative reports sent out by TicketSource informing of current tickets sales and associated income.

title: Compare Ticketsource
name: Tim D.
comments: Comments: We used Ticket source for our festival in 2013 and subsequently for a few odd events, This year I have bieen obliged to use a local arts centre service supported by the Hampshire County Council preferrred system. The experience this year has been dire and served to underline just how good TicketSource are. I recommend them without reservation and cant wait to run an event where I use them again..

title: Compare Ticketsource
name: Tim D.
comments: Comments: We used Ticket source for our festival in 2013 and subsequently for a few odd events, This year I have bieen obliged to use a local arts centre service supported by the Hampshire County Council preferrred system. The experience this year has been dire and served to underline just how good TicketSource are. I recommend them without reservation and cant wait to run an event where I use them again..

title: Couldn't be better
name: Jamie O.
comments: Comments: This was our first charged event and from the moment we decided to go with TicketSource they couldn't have been more helpful. The interface was intuitive and straightforward and the fact that they called us to see how we were getting on eased any worries we had. Our guests were happy and we were well pleased with the service.

title: Great flexibility and intuitive deskgn
name: Clare S.
comments: Comments: I've introduced Ticketsource to a number of organisations I've worked with, including an Arts Festival, an Arts Centre and a theatre. All really happy including multiple sites and new users who have no box office experience.

title: P.O.D.S. Joy
name: Mike J.
comments:
Comments: This site makes it so easy to sell your tickets online. To set up your show is easy we use numbered seating which makes it a little more complicated but Tiicketsource just makes it so easy for you, I needed to ask a question from the technical dept a quick email problem solved.

They continue to update their system. So if you want to sell tickets for your show or event look no further than Ticketsourse. You will not be sorry.

title: Ticket source has been a key part of our business success
name: Alyssa R.
comments: Comments: So easy to use, even for a technophobe like me! Love the options for adding discounts and the general ease and efficiency with which it runs. Our shows sell out every time and Ticketsource has helped us achieve that

title: Excellent ticket selling service
name: Sue J.
comments:
Comments: Ticketsource provides a very flexible ticket selling service to the amateur theatre company that wants to present a modern way of booking to an increasingly computer savvy public.

It's easy to set up, totally in your control and the phone help service is there with friendly staff to guide through any problems. Customer feedback is excellent, everyone comments how easy it is

to book . And the funds are there right in your account as soon as your event is over.

title: Easy way to sell tickets
name: Pam E.
comments: Comments: We are a small performing group, but selling online is very useful to us. TicketSource is easy to use, not too expensive and easy to keep track of sales. Although we only sell a small number of tickets we get the same good service as bigger users.

title: Warminster Athenaeum Centre
name: Keith R.
comments:
Comments: Superb support and it's easy to setup events while keeping control of every aspect of adding events or differing leves of pricing and even hidden discounts if you need that option.

It is worth getting to know the FAQ section as all the answers are in there.

You will go a long way to find anything as good as this .

title: Excellent all round service
name: Steve H.
comments:
Comments: This is one of the best web based services I have ever used and backed up by a really great help desk.

Everything works as it's supposed to. It's easy to use both setting up events and buying tickets.

title: Ticket Source
name: Pete R.
comments: Comments: Used on line ticketing for the first time as an event organiser. Very impressed. Everything I wanted the software to do - it did! No customer feedback about the process but at least no customer complaints either.

title: New user who could not be more pleased.
name: James M.
comments:
Comments: I have recently started using Ticketsource and could not praise them highly enough.

From first contact they have been patient and supportive answering my endless questions. The product is easy to use for both myself and my clients. The functionality is great offering clear reports for FOH and finance.

title: Best ticketing system we have use.
name: Chad H.
comments: Comments: In a blackbox theater, our stage and seating layout changes every single show. Ticket Source rose to the challenge. We use tech support twice and each time they resolved the issue with patience and understanding to our needs.

title: TicketSource - how its grown with us
name: Hiten K.
comments: Comments: The system has grown over the years as have we and has accommodated us well, The system is easy to use and has never had any technical issues whatsoever. The support to learn how to use the new features has also been very good.

title: Ticketsource
name: Carl C.
comments: Comments: Good over all experience.....Can be a little fiddly and a touch expensive for small groups.....But you do get great service and help for that cost.

title: Very good interface!
name: Ash B.
comments: Comments: Ticketsource has been a great help for us at EMAS

title: Great Service
name: Dec M.
comments: Comments: Always easy to use and don't recall a time being unable to access the site due to it being broken. Customer Service when contact have always been great and helpful

title: Excellent service
name: Nigel D.
comments:
Comments: Super efficient and friendly service . Easy to use and when I did get stuck I found the support great.

Really appreciated the welcome contact when I first signed up. And the fast dependable payment is really appreciated . All good . Thanks

title: TicketSource ticketing system
name: Peter D.
comments: Comments: They proved a great product and s very efficient service. I've looked at lots of ticketing products and theirs always comes out tops. Highly recommended.

title: So easy to use
name: Steve D.
comments: Comments: Perfect for small groups like ours. Enabling on line booking has been a real bonus for us. This has reflected in increased sales. Very easy to set up even for a complete novice.

title: Awesome functionality
name: Tom L.
comments: Comments: Started as a novice and 14 events later this software is the backbone that supports everything else. Looking forward to using it for all future Bigger Boat Pictures UK events

title: We are a charity who doesn't use TicketSource much but when we have there have bee no problems.
name: Kate A.
comments: Comments: We only use TicketSource for selling tickets to events. These are fixed price entry tickets so have never used seat allocation systems, graded ticket costs etc.

title: A Christmas Concert in aid of ABF The Soldiers' Charity
name: Alys P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It was simple to use and make amendments if needed. The process was quick and straightforward. We were also able to set up more than one account as we have volunteer committees for our charity that run events for us but they are linked by one log in.
overall: Overall: It was easy for our supporters to purchase event tickets. Administration costs were of no extra cost to the charity.

title: Exellent
name: Adrian P.
comments: Comments: A great piece of software which as transformed the ticket selling experience for the societies that use it at our local theatre and their customers. Ticket booking as transformed from an antiquated amateur process to a professional operation whilst still retaining the personal touch.

title: Outstanding
name: Mike D.
comments: Comments: What a company! They're truly passionate about great ticketing. They even make parting with your money an enjoyable experience! In times of problems, they help refund your customers. When you need technical support, they're there for you. Would definitely recommend.

title: Outstanding
name: Mike D.
comments: Comments: What a company! They're truly passionate about great ticketing. They even make parting with your money an enjoyable experience! In times of problems, they help refund your customers. When you need technical support, they're there for you. Would definitely recommend.

title: Sunart happy
name: Eoghan C.
comments: Comments: I have always found TicketSource easy to use and navigate. Customers also find it easy and on the few occasions I've needed support it's always been there.

title: Top service
name: Isabelle P.
comments: Comments: This was the second time I used the service and the team were as helpful at every point as ever. Easy system to use too more so than others I visited. Will use again.

title: Simply the best!
name: Tim J.
comments: Comments: Great product. Everything you want to do is there for you to decide and set up yourself (unlike it's major rival where you don't know what features are available, and then you have to ask them to set it up, then check and correct several times until they get it right)

title: Amazing Doesn't Cover It!
name: Lee T.
comments: Comments: We've used this company for the early stages., and it has just got better and better as time goes on. We've made some suggestions and seen them implemented which is great. Highly recommend this software to any event organiser.

title: Awesome service
name: Chris F.
comments: Comments: We've been using TicketSource for our theater now for 3 years but just recently started using it for all of our productions. The changeover was smooth, it's easy to set up, customer friendly and the customer service has been exceptional.

title: Really simple and cost-effective
name: Bryony H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: So easy to use with lots of options to upload branding, download scanner apps etc if you want to go further. Also very reasonable fee per ticket and income was paid promptly.
cons: Cons: Nothing to complain about! Interface is perhaps a little dull and could be more eyecatching, but then again it needs to work for a wide range of events.

title: Takes the headache out of booking
name: Emma P.
comments: Comments: I run bread making courses and this is the easiest way for clients to book and pay without giving me a headache trying to manage all their enquiries which just took up too much time.

title: Chairs problem solved
name: Geoff C.
comments: Comments: Asked a question unrelated to ticketsource software but was advised how to solve my problem which unfortunately may require me learning a new website software program

title: Great website and great customer service!
name: Eliza F.
comments: Comments: Always so good on the phone and taking time to help you if you have specific requirements/setting for your event. Love the overall use of the website!

title: Anything Goes Nov 2016
name: Helen K.
comments: Comments: Second time using and it just gets easier. Help staff when I need assistance with changing tickets and refunding

title: Great all rounder - and they keep improving
name: Stephanie L.
comments: Comments: We used Ticketsource for our first year as they provided so many options for people to buy the tickets - on-line, through us and onthe phone. Always available to answer questions and overall a great service. There were a couple of configurations that we could have done with, which hopefully will be added this year. Overall well done

title: First time user. Really impressed with this service
name: June Y.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use. Everything explained fully and easy to understand. So easy for customers - a simple click and it's done. So many options which cover different aspects of the service. Brilliant all-round ticketing solution
cons: Cons: Really nothing that comes to mind.
overall: Overall: Takes the hassle out of ticket selling

title: Great for our small theatre group - more tickets sold!
name: Pam J.
comments: Comments: We are only a small am dram group but we find Ticketsource easy to use and our audiences like to use it. It also means we capture their information and so with every production our mailing list grows.

title: TicketSource is excellent!
name: Jemma B.
comments: Comments: If you're selling tickets, you have to use TicketSource. It's brilliant. Its functionality is excellent - from reporting to monitoring and it's absolute ease of use. The customer support is also second to none. We love it.

title: Walking Festival Event
name: Harry B.
comments: Comments: We set up 13 walks on Ticket Source for our Walking Festival at the end of September. The software was fairly easy to use and easy to link to our website. The only criticism was that we wanted to include a small map with each ticket to show the start location and these could have been clearer. The sales reports were brilliant

title: Great product
name: Peter W.
comments: Comments: We use this software for every event. It's great value for money and the customer service team are second to none.

title: pretty good service
name: Jo S.
comments: Comments: Pretty easy to use once you delve into the programme, lots of options for information gathering which is useful, fairly dear I think though.

title: The Comedy Clubhouse
name: Mike A.
comments: Comments: The purchase process is cumbersome for our patrons. The site hangs at the point of purchase locking up tickets at the worst time as people make multiple attempts. Many, many, many fields and dates reflect London standards and not the US. Specifically, reporting draws inaccurate information because it will juxtapose the month and day. So will searching. Great features, good pricing, but a very buggy platform.

title: Our first online tickets sales - excellent!
name: Pam J.
comments: Comments: We are only a small local drama group but felt that online ticketing would be good for us. Very pleased with our first event. Easy to manage, so much flexibility, a definite advantage. It made it easier for us to promote tickets sales on our website and Facebook.

title: Operation of Ticketsource in relation to the Account holder and the end user
name: Nicholas B.
comments: Comments: This company has proved absolutely faultless in dealing with us as a company promoting theatre events,and our customers booking tickets.

title: An excellent service.
name: Eric B.
comments: Comments: Ticketsource provide an excellent service. The software is easy to use, and ticketing can be set up quickly for an event. Customer service is first class and the charges are reasonable being based on the value of the tickets sold.

title: Excellent support from friendly team
name: Marian V.
comments: Comments: I use Ticket Source as I run the Box Office for a local amateur dramatics group. Whenever I have had any issues or queries and have e-mailed the support team, I have received immediate advice and in a language which I able to understand! Well impressed.

title: An easy service to use
name: Fiona W.
comments: Comments: This is a really easy service to use and we have noticed over the last 2 years more of our customers using the booking service.

title: Tickets with ease
name: Pat S.
comments: Comments: Very easy to use Ticket source and get tickets. Very easy to call off reports and check sales as an administrator. I can highly recommend it.

title: Great to Sell Tickets
name: corinne b.
comments: Comments: From beginning to end, I got great support from set up to end of performances, including my payment!! Very pleased!!

title: Regular user
name: Rachel C.
comments: Comments: It's generally been straightforward for my needs and when there have been any problems the customer support has been excellent.

title: Broadway Big Band Big Noise
name: David H.
position: ex Chair of Fundraising committee ned f
comments:
Comments: Excellent service. very easy to keep track of ticket sales, and most importantly we were paid very quickly after the show.

Ticket data provided very useful for future events.

Will recommend to any future organisations putting on a show. Great. Thanks for making my life a bit easier!

title: A good system
name: John C.
comments: Comments: The system is reliable and fairly easy to use although it takes a while to find your way around. We are about to try real time ticket printing for RES on the theatre front desk; hopefully it will be a fast and reliable process

title: Review of Ticketsource
name: Mark M.
comments: Comments: Having come to Ticketsource from a large national ticketing company I was amazed at how easy the process of signing up and learning to use the site was. The set up of each event is incredibly intuitive, the layout of the site and the ability to access data was a dream. I would thoroughly recommend any company to work with them.

title: Very Easy to Use and Comprehensive Package
name: Peter H.
comments:
Comments: Cannot praise this software enough. Have used for three years - (15+ shows).

Bookings are up and direct internet bookings are growing.

title: So easy to use
name: Stephen B.
comments:
Comments: Since using TicketSource, running our box office has proved much easier. Our direct online sales are pretty consistently around 25% for all shows.

It is also significantly easier to sell tickets in general especially for repeat customers whose details are remembered from show to show.

title: Consistent Great Service
name: Lynn G.
comments: Comments: We have always had brilliant service from TicetSource and I just wanted to say thanks for doing a great job.

title: Good overall service
name: Vie P.
comments: Comments: I have used TicketSource several times now. The cons are that they take quite a big chunk of the price, so I have had to increase ticket prices, and that they sometimes take a few days to transfer the money to me after the event. The pros are that events are easy to set up on there and that customers can navigate around easily.

title: Great Service
name: Gill R.
comments: Comments: Have only been using the service for two years but have had lots of help right from the beginning. Queries by e mail have always been responded to very quickly and all questions answered in a language 'non techies' like me can understand. Keep up the good work.

title: The best thing since sliced bread!
name: Gary S.
comments: Comments: Ticketsource has opened up a vast wealth of online functionality which helps us to promote and manage over 15 shows a year! WE thoroughly recommend this product

title: Great website support
name: Pauline D.
comments: Comments: Ever patient and helpful support staff, online how to guides and easy to follow directions. Thank you ticket source staff

title: Very satisfied.
name: Mel R.
comments: Comments: Have used TicketSource over a number of years the service gets better every year and as stated above fully satisfied.

title: Easy to Use, very Professional Results
name: Elaine A.
comments: Comments: Ticket Source is ideal for my purpose to sell tickets on line for an independent musician. It gives our fans a great alternative method of ayment.

title: Piano recital Gabriel Arnold
name: marion s.
comments: Comments: It was great to have you there on the promo. It made it very easy for people to book tickets on line, which seems to be more and more needed and wanted by the public. thankyou.

title: Brilliant service and as a new customer I will be returning for sure
name: Neil Sean S.
comments: Comments: Organised an " Audience with " Ticket Source were invaluable in making the event a huge success and as more people try the service this will become evident to them also .. thanks again

title: The best in the business
name: Tim D.
comments: Comments: A few years ago we reviewed all the options and choose TicketSource as the best. Since then they have grown and we continue to be confident we made the right decision.

title: Love it!
name: Silvie F.
comments: Comments: This is the first time I've used online ticketing software, and I was rather nervous, especially as we're just a small organisation.. I was amazed how easy it was to set up and use. The range of services it offers at no xtra cost is fantastic. I felt totally comfortable with this product.

title: Ticketsource was good but keeps getting better
name: Andy L.
comments:
Comments: Ticketsource is a great website. It is easy to use, works very well and has helped our society enormously.

The programmers respond to feedback and make improvements all the time.

It's a great service and I recommend it to anyone who needs to sell tickets or seats online.

title: Liberty Entertainments
name: Eddie D.
comments: Comments: I am delighted with Ticketsource, it's easy to use, I find the daily sales summary I receive very useful, tickets sale funds are transferred into my bank account promptly after the event & they are very friendly & helpful when Uve had queries. I strongly recommend them.

title: Oldie of Woodford
name: Derek S.
comments: Comments: Ease of both use and operate both as a customer and user/client. Payment using Paypal would be a great improvement

title: Taking the stress away
name: Helen R.
comments: Comments: Customers tell us that it's easy to book online through ticket source. I love the daily updates - we know if we have to market more urgently. Also, we have a database for customers who book and this is helpful.

title: Great all round service
name: Gill C.
comments: Comments: Ticket Source made the move from paper tickets to online so easy. We found the site easy to use for us and for our ticket buyers. No going back now!

title: First time user - very successful.
name: CHRIS A.
comments:
Comments: Took a bit of trial and error to set up initially, but was very worth it. Loved the reports. Will definitely use again - already planning our next production and preparing the information to upload.

Once uploaded, very simple to operate and access, both as administrators and customers. Very efficient payment as well.

title: First time user - very successful.
name: CHRIS A.
comments:
Comments: Took a bit of trial and error to set up initially, but was very worth it. Loved the reports. Will definitely use again - already planning our next production and preparing the information to upload.

Once uploaded, very simple to operate and access, both as administrators and customers. Very efficient payment as well.

title: Community Cinema thrives with TicketSource
name: Ian B.
comments: Comments: TIcketSource allow volunteers to cope with two shows a month without constant phone calls and ticket enquiries. The straightforward accounting system allows us to wrap up the accounts for each show within a day of the final credits. Our members and other customers love it for ease of use.

title: Ealing Youth Orchestra
name: Christopher B.
comments: Comments: We've been using Ticketsource for three years and have found it very efficient and easy to use. The numbers booking online have risen consistently.

title: Just does it!
name: Ian S.
comments: Comments: We use Ticketsource for 'Live @ Hackforth' a 100 seat pop up venue in North Yorkshire. The system ins easy to use and very reliable, the bar code scanner make the event very profestional! "Like a proper gig" commented one of our guests!!

title: Ticket Sales
name: Gillian P.
comments: Comments: Ticket Source sells tickets for our Theatre alongside our own Box Office ,we find this works well for us as the tickets are paid for and the customers just pick them us on the night of the performance.

title: Fantastic service!
name: Mary L.
comments: Comments: Forget about selling tickets yourself. We sold 1800 Tickets for our school show via ticketsource. No concerns about dealing with cash. So efficient. Tricia was so helpful and always returned my email queries within a few hours. I can't praise the website enough!

title: Works as expected
name: Richard C.
comments:
Comments: Does what it promises.

Editing entries is harder than it needs to be. I never click on the correct menu option the first time - definitely not intuitive to anyone other than the writer of the software. This would be less frustrating if I used the system more often but with only a couple of events a year I have to learn the quirks again each time.

title: Non-Profit Event Tickets-Winner Winner
name: Kathleen H.
comments: Comments: TicketSource was easy to use from setup to cash out. I called support once and they were super helpful. The icons that I placed on our website were easy to use and attractive. This will be my go to program for ticket sales.

title: Great Box Office Service
name: Anna M.
comments: Comments: We have used TicketSource for the last few years for our twice yearly drama productions. The system is very easy to use and the majority of our audience members are very happy with the service.

title: Great service
name: Beth C.
comments: Comments: This is an easy to use service which supports our need to sell tickets at a variety of Venus. Ticketsource provide fantastic, responsive customer service.

title: Excellent service
name: Alan S.
comments: Comments: We have been using Ticketsource for a few years now and, as well as the software working extremely well, the support from the staff is always second to none.

title: Ticketsource reviewed
name: Susie H.
comments: Comments: We have just started using ticketsource and were amazed to find how easy it is to use. The help and advice given is really useful.

title: Simple and effictive
name: Dick B.
comments: Comments: A simple system, ideally suited to a small amateur drama group, with limited human resource, expertise and money.

title: Great Value Professional Services
name: Wendi S.
comments: Comments: TicketSource allows small groups and organisations to present a professional online box office to their customers. It is extremely easy to use and has a number of useful features that make managing event books really straightforward.

title: Excellent free ticketing for small venues
name: Connie J.
comments: Comments: We have increased our ticket sales since we started using TicketSource. It's very easy to use and our customers appreciate being able to buy tickets at a time suitable to them

title: Ticketsource Assessment
name: Ben D.
comments: Comments: Ticketsource is the best ticketing website that I've come across in terms of both functionality and cost.

title: EMG Ticket Sales
name: Rachel W.
comments: Comments: Really good website for a range of seating plans with different prices. Also ability to set promo codes.

title: Excellent
name: James B.
comments: Comments: Website was very easy to use and allowed me to achieve my job with no problems it also gave me more feedback than expected. I will definitely use it again

title: Brilliant Company!
name: Liz L.
comments: Comments: My experience - and I am speaking as someone not particularly tech-savvy has been totally brilliant! they have been very helpful on the phone and the user interface is very easy to work and really well designed. Can recommend very highly!

title: Awesome System & People!
name: David L.
comments: Comments: Ticket Source has been perfect for all our events. A slick system, easy to navigate and manage, prompt payment to us and behind it all a friendly team (of real people you can talk to!) willing to help any time you get stuck. Couldn't ask for more.

title: Could be simplified?
name: Rhona D.
comments:
Comments: Could be simplified for ease of use.

It would be good if free places didn't have to pay a booking fee. We want to include free spaces on at our events so they are accessible, but if folk still have to input credit card details etc. and pay a fee it doesn't really work.

title: Does what it sets out to do! Professioanalise your ticket selling.
name: Richard F.
comments: Comments: Has made our ticket selling so much easier and helped to increase our sales. We rarely sell tickets on the door any more. Highly recommend this software.

title: Very helpful and supportive customer service.
name: Melanie R.
comments: Comments: I had to cancel an event last year and it was made so easy by the way everyone just received their payment back.

title: Excellent all round
name: Jenny S.
comments: Comments: This is easy to use the system, I found it very straightforward and the staff is very friendly and helpful.

title: First time user
name: Jo T.
comments: Comments: As a small amateur theatre company it was our first time using online ticket sales. It couldn't have been easier! The instructions are very easy to follow and very helpful staff if you call up with a problem. Would definitely use again. Thanks.

title: Makes my life so much easier
name: Sally B.
comments: Comments: Prior to ticket source I would have to process cheques and cash for courses and events. Now ticket source looks after the payments life is so much easier

title: Ticketsource
name: Sophie W.
comments: Comments: A very simple to use system, events are easy to set up, the tickets look very professional and the report functions are very useful.

title: Great site!
name: Joe L.
comments: Comments: Such a great site to use, easy to navigate and easy to sort ticket sales out. Also very prompt with payments after.

title: Excellent
name: Charlie S.
comments: Comments: We host a large Firework event in London and can say that the systems were fantastic. Branding was kept as our own and was so easy to use, if there were any problems they were solved straight away! Would defo use again!!! Thanks

title: Ticket Source - Burgess Hill Girls School
name: Tim O.
comments: Comments: Quick and easy way to setup and repeat regular events. Simple layout with password control where necessary.

title: TS Review - Brewhouse Theatre, Taunton
name: Alan H.
comments: Comments: Customer Service staff are always extremely helpful and knowledgeable, keen to help and responsive to our issues.

title: Fantatsic, User Friendly and Reliable
name: Andrew P.
comments: Comments: User friendly, easy to use and navigate, reliable, professional and makes you look professional to your customers, has made ticket sales so easy - thank you.

title: Superb ticketing service!
name: Claire S.
comments: Comments: A completely brilliant ticketing service, with a wonderfully friendly and helpful customer service team. They really have thought of everything. I have absolutely no reservations in recommending TicketSource wholeheartedly.

title: Super, Smashing, Great!
name: Mike D.
comments: Comments: What a fantastic service. The site is professionally run and customer service is second to none! Would highly recommend!

title: Well laid out & easy to use online Box Office system
name: Candy L.
comments: Comments: TicketSource provides a straightforward system which can be used easily by customers and administrators alike.

title: Great resource!
name: Geraldine H.
comments: Comments: Easy and such a useful way for us to run our box office needs, glad we discovered it and will continue to use for all our shows

title: North Staffs Operatic society
name: Gina B.
comments: Comments: I am sorry to be so positive but this system really works for us- staff are very helpful and we feel in control of our sales. Ticket blank supplies were a bit chaotic but i think that has been sorted.

title: Excellent service
name: Steve R.
comments: Comments: I've been using TicketSource for a number of years and have found them very reliable, prompt in payment, and very quick at customer service with real humans on the phone available to help out. I highly recommend them.

title: Ticketing made easy
name: V R.
comments: Comments: Every feature we required, easy to use interface and guidance, fast site, great pricing, nice looking front end for customers.

title: Doncaster Little Theatre
name: Heather S.

title: My experience is entirely positive and with guidance from Ticket Source the software is easy to use.
name: Keith B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: It is easy to use both for the administrator and our audience, the staff at Ticket Source are friendly and helpful and the cash appears in our bank account within a few days for the concert.

For our customers who live a distance from the venue, it is so simple to book tickets on line.

title: Worked perfectly for our five night panto - each night was a sellout!
name: Colin J.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The seating plans worked really well and allowed people to select their own seats, but despite being a bit nervous about this we still sold out every single seat!
cons: Cons: It would be nice to see some type of graph to show number of tickets being sold by time as the default reports were quite basic.

title: Very easy to use platform with a great set of features. Very Clear pricing structure!
name: Sethi D.
position: ICT Subject Leader and Class Teacher
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: Clear and easy pricing without hidden fees. Easy to use, yet powerful! Having used various other and similar event-organiser platform I've always found the set up and final fee structure complicated and difficult to navigate. With Eventsframe it's clear what you get for free and what you are given extra for the premium offering without them trying to hide or slap on extra fees for special deals.

The customer support is top and you can really tell that the people behind the platform have a good understanding f what it takes to run events. They understand the workflow of organising an event and this is represented in the way the support is given. I would definitely recommend EventsFrame to others!
cons: Cons: So far I have not come any Cons. The pricing of the premium could be considered a con by some, but personally I think it's great value for your money. Again the price is just that, no hidden fees. So when you do decide to go with a premium offering you know what you're paying and what you're getting.
overall: Overall: Overall its been a great time saver and has made running or managing event easy. As the software makes planning and organising the vents smooth and fast your can invite fellow teachers, parents, etc for Professional development with no hassle and a clean layout. I cant wait for extra features to be added in the future!

title: No fuss. Gets the job done
name: Jane Jacquelie V.
pros: Pros: The interface is very straightforward, not intimidating. Creating and/or editing tickets is very easy. I love how easy it is to create discounts. I've tried other online ticketing system before and managing multiple / overlapping discounts was a pain. EventsFrame made our process much more efficient.
cons: Cons: It's fairly new and have very basic features. I hope they add an Analytics dashboard but overall, it's a great system for managing events.
overall: Overall: It's an events platform developed by an events company.

title: It is an extremely user-friendly program to manage event registration. A time saver!
name: Guen S.
pros:
Pros: - easy to navigate

- versatile when in comes to features you want to request from support team.

- offers wide range of accepted payment methods

- event organization made easy!
cons: Cons: please incorporate more more helpful features such as, visibility on abandoned orders, offer notification options to event organizer.
overall: Overall: It is free and a perfect solution for our event registration management!

title: Very fast and easy to use
name: Matthias S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Never did I set up sales pages for seminars, online trainings and the like so fast and easy. Including several payment options as PayPal, Stripe and some others.
cons: Cons: I only regret that I did not know earlier about this software... ;-)
overall: Overall: When I first tried to figure this software out, I set up an event I conducted in earlier times. Soon I was so amazed how easy this process is. In the end I sold tickets for this event I even did not intent to conduct before I got access to this software. (Yes, that was really my first experience).

title: Generally good. I like how keen and reactive the EF guys are
name: Patrycja T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: We run internal events for our company and have been using EF for the past two months to make events. Generally it works well and is very simple. Attendees seem to like it....at least we had no complaints yet and they all registered ok.
cons: Cons: seems pretty new and lacks advanced features, the team are super keep though they call you back if you have any questions or sugestions
overall: Overall: easy to create events

title: I found an awesome new tool, EventsFrame, late in 2017. I absolutely love it for my event planning!
name: Jason K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Wickedly easy to use, and I LOVE the lack of hidden fees. I was organizing an event for the Fine Arts department in my school, and every time we set the ticket price, a reduction in our bottom-line was reflected once services like EventBrite took their slice of the pie. EventsFrame fixed that, and made the process of creating a ticketable event smooth and easy.
cons: Cons: The one feature I would like to see come to the package is the ability to customize the event page with an image of my choice. The default is good, but it'd be very nice to have a bit more creative control with a feature like this.
overall: Overall: Easy to use, very fluid development and deployment of events, simple for my target audience.

title: Very very impressive
name: Tom G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: very user friendly, really like using it and has helped with our process' from this end. Thanks for making this product available
cons: Cons: not found an issue as yet very user friendly, really like using it and has helped with our process' from this end. Thanks for making this product available
overall: Overall: Easy to use, very fluid development and deployment of events, simple for my target audience.

cons: Cons: So far itdoesn't have 'check in' functionality to check in attendees at the event, but that was the only missing feature I encountered

name: Seamus D.

cons: Cons: So far itdoesn't have 'check in' functionality to check in attendees at the event, but that was the only missing feature I encountered
overall: Overall: Ease of use and value for money make this app a no-brainer.

pros: Pros: Easy to use software including getting set up and directing attendees to. It's quite price competitive as well!
cons: Cons: PayPal will still take a fee for each payment, I don't think this is EventsFrame's fault, but irritating nevertheless
overall: Overall: Ease of use and value for money make this app a no-brainer.

title: Great to use. Used it in our events here in Cebu.
name: Neil Patrick T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of access and very simple to use. Very straightforward. Quite east to set up and nothing complicated.
cons: Cons: It's still new so there are more improvements needed. Still quite easy to use and it has the value for the money.
overall: Overall: Ease of use and value for money make this app a no-brainer.

title: Easy to set-up and use for all your event ticketing needs
name: Robert M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: You can tell that Eventsframe was created by someone who has organized many events because it really streamlines the whole ticketing and logistical issues that usually occur behind the scenes. I love how you can maximize the people coming to your events through early bird and bundle pricing. Smart event organizers know that people are what make events great and when you give people a break on the price they feel that they are being valued and just makes things so much more accessible to more people. I also like that you can do as many free events as you like and only have to start paying once you start to charge for your events.
cons: Cons: It is hard to find a con with Eventsframe because I know that any flaws will be quickly and efficiently fixed. Perhaps one flaw that I could find is that they could improve the number of templates that they offer to help new organizers get off the ground?
overall: Overall: Ease of use and value for money make this app a no-brainer.

title: A superb ticketing system
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: Very easy to set up your first event and then more.

Simple.

Easy to use.

Support are there when needed.
cons:
Cons: The only problem I found that is being looked into is it does not show the number of tickets left online!

ie If I am selling 100 and only had 6 left but any 1 person could buy up to 10, how would they know why it is failing? Ideally this says only 6 remaining.
overall:
Overall: Great - Love it.

Will be back again.

title: This tool has really streamlined our ticketing sales
name: Stuart W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: EventsFrame is another great example of how focusing on doing one thing really well can make a great impact on businesses. Their interface is slick and intuitive for anyone to use, so adoption inside our business has been easy. Customers tend to convert more comparing to other tools we have and underlying it all are a really responsive team who are quick to feedback. Overall really good tool, great team.
cons: Cons: Probably more templates would be good, wouldn't want to suggest too much as the focus is one of the strengths
overall:
Overall: Great - Love it.

Will be back again.

title: Simple way to sell event tickets
name: Luis P.
pros: Pros: What I was looking for with EventsFrame was a platform that allowed me to sell tickets for my small local events, and that's exactly what I got. The best thing is that it doesn't charge any commission on the tickets you sell, so it's great.
cons: Cons: I would appreciate a little more customisation freedom over the event landing page, but apart from that, all is great so far.
overall: Overall: EventsFrame is the perfect platform for selling tickets for your event. I've used it in a few already and it works like a charm.

title: Replaces the percentage fees per event, charged by other competitor softwares
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This is a relatively simple, easy to use, no-nonsense, cut the fluff, event planning app. It has all the essential features one would expect from a ticket management system. The QR code check-in feature works really well.
cons:
Cons: The app is relatively new and I am sure the issues will get addressed with time. Some main issues are:

1. You can't add images to the event except for the header.

2. Can't add custom sender mail

3. Allow a user to cut some steps to keep a short confirmation process
overall: Overall: The tool does what it does well. It just needs to get more mature and feature rich.

title: Use it to handle registrations for local events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Event registrations happen smoothly so there's no fuss and everything gets done! Getting an event going has never been easier!
cons: Cons: It's a new product and still has basic functionality - looking forward to seeing it grow and add new features!
overall: Overall: The tool does what it does well. It just needs to get more mature and feature rich.

title: Running your own events made easy
name: Fernando C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to create your own event pages, step by step, collect payments, manage ticket quantities and smooth user experience.
cons: Cons: So far I can't see any downsides. It works perfectly.

title: Great app, saved us alot of time setting up special events at our restaurant
name: Martin E.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: We used EventsFrame for our dining parties at our restaurant. It was very easy to set up the event and pass on special discounts to customers. We needed to manage our diners outside of the platform, this was easy to do by downloading a csv.
cons: Cons: I had a problem with the payment selection, but the support team was right on it. Other than that we didnt have any problems at all.
overall: Overall: The tool does what it does well. It just needs to get more mature and feature rich.

name: Martin S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: We'd been using Eventbrite to do some ticketing for local meetups, but their crazy expensive transaction fees were taking a huge portion of our revenue. We switched to EventsFrame, which charges only a monthly fee.
cons: Cons: There's very little I don't like. I wish the landing page builder was live already, but they say it should be this month
overall: Overall: The tool does what it does well. It just needs to get more mature and feature rich.

cons: Cons: EventsFrame has so many great features but would be awesome to add more details to the event page, if possible!

title: Experience of using OPTIMO
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like the fact that you can have all your products and revenue streams on one platform and sell them anywhere in the world at anytime. I also like the fact that they have numerous APIs and data fields to allow me to use the best CRM software and build my own applications to bespoke certain applications specifically for my business.
cons: Cons: Can't think of anything I didn't like in particular
overall: Overall: I have used OPTIMO to unify revenue streams, improve management controls and increase sales and delivery efficiency. The experience has been very good, nothing is too much trouble and I advent ended up in constant debates about cost.

title: Excel in everywhere
name: Romesh I.
pros: Pros: We are using Optimo since 2017 Aug. We found that their support and continues training o new releases are the thing that made them an industry leader. as a eventmanagemmnt and consulting feirm we are recomading Oprimo Software.
cons: Cons: Because of their current client list, We thought that Optimo software is for large enterprises, so we initially avoid them as a medium-sized business, when they arrive at our doorstep, We got to know, Optimo pricing really match with our budget and they are extremely good at implementing, So I suggesting Optimo to promote in the SME sector too.
overall: Overall: Satisfactory and hapy to have a friend like partner.

title: Super friendly and quick support from the initial consultation to implementation.
name: David B.
pros: Pros: Due to the module based system, we can select only what we need for running our business.
cons: Cons: No noticeable cons. When we face some implementation issues, we received very good support. So we don't have anything to mention here.
overall:
Overall: Mainly we can recommend this software to any event management company or a place that host event because this software is specially designed for massive events. we have implement this software to one of our client and they are very satisfied with the flow and the way this software work.

The comprehensive dashboard Giving more access to information and take better decisions.

Every feature of this software is well design to suit the specific needs. This software helps management team to forecast and prepare their place.

overall: Overall: In Optimo you find an all in one platform for venue and event management which is simply amazing. I haven't come across a product quite similar to this one. This system is a real game changer !
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Every venue manager should try this product

name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We are really happy to have Optimo Events as our solution provider for managing events with fully completed software, In the implementation stage I had a lot of questions in my mind, But within the 1st month, OPTIMO proved that they are the best in the industry with the most customizable event software product.
cons: Cons: None of the functions lac in the software due to the customizable nature of the software.
overall: Overall: Very satisfied! I wrote this review according to the request of Optimo Events, our event software solution provider.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Every venue manager should try this product

cons: Cons: Non, Because from the decision making to continues support, Optimo experience is outstanding!
