Charges applied were reasonable.
cons: Cons: Faced some hanging issues with the mobile app for Explara.
overall: Overall: Our event had a smooth registration portal, thanks to Explara. Couldn't explore many options; hope to utilise them in the next event. :)

title: Explara for our annual event
name: NITHIN A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: We have used Explara for our previous Startup Summit. I want to say, it is one stop platform for organizers like me pre & post engagements.
pros: Pros: Easy of use and best customer support
cons: Cons: Easy of use and best customer support
overall: Overall: Explara helped us to save time in managing everything related to the event registration.

title: Easy to customize to organizations needs
name: Jade S.
pros: Pros: Ticketfly has been our ticketing platform for 3+ years and we love it. Easy to customize to fit our needs and easy for the consumer to use. Support team is amazing as well and really goes above and beyond to help with whatever you need.
cons: Cons: They were recently acquired by Eventbrite so I think we'll eventually have to transition to their platform, which I think is way lower quality.
overall: Overall: Amazing ticketing platform that is easy to use and makes us look really professional.

title: Best ticketing system for small clubs & venues!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Ticketfly is SUPER user friendly, and a common household name for purchasing tickets. It's a trusted site, easy to navigate, and makes it easy to sell tickets to events to customers.
cons: Cons: In the back end, a user can't set anyone up for auto counts. Not a big deal, but I always have to contact an admin to get people set up for counts.
overall: Overall: Overall, I would recommend ticketfly to any up and coming music club!

title: My favorite ticketing company. Too bad it's going away
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Super easy backend interface. I was never confused when working events where we sold tickets through Ticketfly! Audit reports and will call lists always easy to find, names never listed confusingly. All around solid.
cons: Cons: That it got bought out by Eventbrite and is slowly transitioning all of its accounts onto that platform, which is more mobile-friendly but generally inferior in a lot of ways.
overall: Overall: I miss you Ticketfly!

title: I've used this for purchasing concert tickets
name: Ernie Z.
pros: Pros: I like the fact that it's super easy to use for purchasing tickets and it's pretty cool how they show a lot of other events/concerts going on so you can possibly check out more bands you like that are playing.
cons: Cons: The service fees are annoying. I almost wish the ticket prices that are shown would just include any service fees and that sort of thing instead of getting me excited for the cost and then all of a sudden it bumps up with the extra costs.
overall: Overall: I miss you Ticketfly!

title: Ticketfly is pretty fly
name: Chris H.
pros: Pros: Quick and easy to search and purchase tickets
cons: Cons: Services fees are absolutely ridiculous and greatly increase the cost of tickets.
overall: Overall: I've only used ticketfly a couple times but it worked well and I got my tickets and was admitted to the show without any issues. Much like other ticket vendors it all goes sour when you purchase multiple tickets and then get hit with the service fees at the end. Paying service fees for an electronic ticket is absolute bull crap and shouldn't be allowed. Much like Ticketmaster, Ticketfly uses these fees to pad their bottom line and generate revenue. I always suggest purchasing tickets from the venue box office but if you must...ticketfly is as good as the rest at getting you tickets from the convenience of your pc.

title: Solid alternative to Ticketmaster
name: Paolo C.
pros: Pros: Seems to be less clunky than Ticketmaster and the fees aren't exorbitant. Pretty easy to use and I always like the option of getting hard tickets . Never had to wait in a "virtual waiting room" for any events thru this site., which is nice.
cons: Cons: I've seen some shows that only sell digital tickets, which I don't always prefer. Also I tried transferring tickets to a friend once and their support said I couldn't for some reason....wasn't really clear as to why.
overall: Overall: Overall pretty good. Don't usually expect much from ticketing software companies as they seem to all be very similar as far as how they work and their fees.

title: Completely unsuccessful, from product performance through customer service.
name: Richard V.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Seems to be less clunky than Ticketmaster and the fees aren't exorbitant. Pretty easy to use and I always like the option of getting hard tickets . Never had to wait in a "virtual waiting room" for any events thru this site., which is nice.
cons:
Cons:

I attempted to use Ticketfly to purchase tickets to an Austin City Limits Moody Theatre event in Austin, Texas.
overall: Overall: None. Ticketfly was a complete and utter waste of user time. Yield to this consumer was negative.

title: I go to a lot of concerts and use Ticketfly to search for tickets
name: Tracy C.
pros: Pros: I like the ease of searching for tickets for specific bands/performers and specific towns or cities. The ticket choice menus are simple and easy to understand. Comes in handy when you are looking for that band that you've been waiting to see for ages!
cons: Cons: I guess there is no real negative to Ticketfly. I am just not a fan of reselling tickets in general, but understand that other than obvious scalpers (and there are many out there), things happen, and you may need to sell your ticket to a show for some reason.
overall: Overall: None. Ticketfly was a complete and utter waste of user time. Yield to this consumer was negative.

title: 100% Would Recommend
name: Christie C.
pros: Pros: After using many similar services Ticketfly is the absolute best way to sell tickets online. Customer service is amazing. Ticket fees are reasonable.
cons: Cons: No complaints. It's a fantastic product.
overall: Overall: None. Ticketfly was a complete and utter waste of user time. Yield to this consumer was negative.

title: Pricey but worth it
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I used many ticket softwares but this one is wonderful. It integrates easily with my social media pages, it's easy for my crowd to navigate and gathering sales info is wonderful. I love the how easy the code is to incorporate in my website and the IOS app ticket scan is a life saver. Now that it's combined with eventbrite I've grown my audience significantly
cons: Cons: I can't think of any cons at the moment but it's website could like a little cooler.
overall: Overall: None. Ticketfly was a complete and utter waste of user time. Yield to this consumer was negative.

title: Great, convenient software for buying tickets
name: Alex A.
pros: Pros: Ticketfly makes it super simple to buy tickets for events. It is one of my favorite softwares for getting tickets to events.
cons: Cons: There are not many cons here. It'd always be nice if there weren't additional fees on tickets but everyone does that. q
overall: Overall: Overall a very positive experience!

title: this product has been great for our events
name: Jami C.
pros: Pros: I love the ease in setting up an event. You don't have to be super tech savvy to use. Highly recommend.
cons: Cons: This product does seem a little pricey. I also had a hard time setting up a free event. So doesn't fit for all needs.
overall: Overall: Overall a very positive experience!

title: What a breath of fresh air
name: Henry D.
comments:
Comments: I've used their service to purchase tickets and was always surprised that a service a slick as this was offered with such reasonable fees. On top of that, whenever I had an issue, their customer support folks were beyond helpful.

When I finally needed a ticketing service for events that I throw, they were first on my list and they have not disappointed. Quick response time to inquiry. Willing to negotiate fees. A TON of tools (although I don't know how much f them I'll actually need....a lot seemed geared towards venues).
pros: Pros: I love the ease in setting up an event. You don't have to be super tech savvy to use. Highly recommend.
cons: Cons: This product does seem a little pricey. I also had a hard time setting up a free event. So doesn't fit for all needs.
overall: Overall: Overall a very positive experience!

title: Hard to make it through. Prices confusing
name: Conrad W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments:
Comments: I've used their service to purchase tickets and was always surprised that a service a slick as this was offered with such reasonable fees. On top of that, whenever I had an issue, their customer support folks were beyond helpful.

When I finally needed a ticketing service for events that I throw, they were first on my list and they have not disappointed. Quick response time to inquiry. Willing to negotiate fees. A TON of tools (although I don't know how much f them I'll actually need....a lot seemed geared towards venues).
pros: Pros: I love purchasing things on the go. I want my tickets and I want to know my seats. This makes it a possibility.
cons: Cons: What I like least was it didn't seem to be very intuitive nor was there a real forum to answer my questions. The last G.A. Tickets I purchased showed a price range yet no reason for the price difference. They also did not indicate when they would ship and I had a hard time getting those questions answered
overall: Overall: Overall a very positive experience!

title: Ticketfly Review
name: Verified Reviewer
comments:
Comments: I've used their service to purchase tickets and was always surprised that a service a slick as this was offered with such reasonable fees. On top of that, whenever I had an issue, their customer support folks were beyond helpful.

When I finally needed a ticketing service for events that I throw, they were first on my list and they have not disappointed. Quick response time to inquiry. Willing to negotiate fees. A TON of tools (although I don't know how much f them I'll actually need....a lot seemed geared towards venues).
pros: Pros: Very easy to navigate, fees are low and are clearly laid out, multiple types of ticket delivery options.
cons: Cons: No sporting events, limited selection of events due to lack of mainstream artists.
overall: Overall: Solid website if you are looking to see smaller musical acts, and not spend a ton of money to see live music.

title: Quick and easy service. Reliable website - trusted payment method. I use this often to purchase tix
name: Kylie A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments:
Comments: I've used their service to purchase tickets and was always surprised that a service a slick as this was offered with such reasonable fees. On top of that, whenever I had an issue, their customer support folks were beyond helpful.

When I finally needed a ticketing service for events that I throw, they were first on my list and they have not disappointed. Quick response time to inquiry. Willing to negotiate fees. A TON of tools (although I don't know how much f them I'll actually need....a lot seemed geared towards venues).
pros: Pros: I like the ease of use and the wide availability of tickets. I also trust that my payment information will not be compromised.
cons: Cons: I believe there is a significant upcharge in the price of tickets. Also, service fee is high and could be purchased elsewhere.
overall: Overall: Solid website if you are looking to see smaller musical acts, and not spend a ton of money to see live music.

title: Unresponsive, not-secure, people not receiving their tickets, rampant fraud
name: Paul T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments:
Comments: I've used their service to purchase tickets and was always surprised that a service a slick as this was offered with such reasonable fees. On top of that, whenever I had an issue, their customer support folks were beyond helpful.

When I finally needed a ticketing service for events that I throw, they were first on my list and they have not disappointed. Quick response time to inquiry. Willing to negotiate fees. A TON of tools (although I don't know how much f them I'll actually need....a lot seemed geared towards venues).
pros: Pros: They have a pretty website, making it easy to give them your money. They have horrible customer support, so good luck talking to them when theres a problem... and it seems there are always problems.
cons: Cons: No customer support, rampant fraudulent purchases, customers don't receive their tickets, security breaches releasing personal information via regular hacks...
overall: Overall: I have yet to hear back from their "Customer Service" I believe this entire company is a scam.

title: Ticketfly review
name: Paul B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments:
Comments: I've used their service to purchase tickets and was always surprised that a service a slick as this was offered with such reasonable fees. On top of that, whenever I had an issue, their customer support folks were beyond helpful.

When I finally needed a ticketing service for events that I throw, they were first on my list and they have not disappointed. Quick response time to inquiry. Willing to negotiate fees. A TON of tools (although I don't know how much f them I'll actually need....a lot seemed geared towards venues).
pros: Pros: The software was great everything works great and easy to use. Well written code with no bugs. I love the software but didn't enjoy the show tonight at the Revolution Hall in Portland Oregon.
cons: Cons: No customer support, rampant fraudulent purchases, customers don't receive their tickets, security breaches releasing personal information via regular hacks...
overall: Overall: I have yet to hear back from their "Customer Service" I believe this entire company is a scam.

title: Line Up
name: Bethan R.
pros: Pros: The software is very user friendly and has some very smart shortcuts for certain processes.
cons: Cons: The existing API links with agents' systems are limited but that will change as time goes on.
overall: Overall: As a long time Spektrix user, I was quite set in my ways by the time I came to launch Arts Tickets. At the time, the system was relatively basic and not well equipped to host a show with a booking period of longer than about a month but we have worked together over the last year to add and enhance features within the system and the guys have been so open-minded and accommodating of my millions of requests! They are always on the end of the phone or email to help and to pitch in if I need something urgently. I would already recommend the system as it is but can happily say that it is only going to continue improving.

title: Line-Up at The Bunker Theatre
name: Joshua M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The software is easy to use, incorporates live updates, and serves our needs of the theater.
cons: Cons: There are still some teething issues, but Line-Up is very fast to respond and fix any bugs or errors that arise.
overall: Overall: Line-Up has been exceptional, not only in delivering a ticketing system for The Bunker Theatre that provides ultimate ease at point-of-use for our customers but a system that aims to optimize the backend of the system, taking theater ticketing well and truly into the 21st century. Reactionary sales updates and analysis are helping us scrutinize the effectiveness of our marketing. On the door check-in is easy and sales can be taken right up to the show starting.

title: Incredibly helpful and ideally suited to our needs
name: Andrew D.
pros: Pros: It looks great, integrates well on our website and the worklow is well thought out from start to finish. Also, the help we had from the team was exceptional.
cons: Cons: There actually isn't anything I would identify as being a flaw. I think the service is young, which was initially a concern, but they seem to be doing everything right.
overall: Overall: We needed a ticket solution for our festival that was flexible, well integrated into our own site and looked good. That was harder to find than you'd think. We found Line-Up after a LOT of searching - and are really pleased with the results. We'll be working with them from now on.

title: A great all-round ticketing service at a resonable price and constantly improving.
name: Tessa H.
pros: Pros: We use LineUp for our entire theatre venue, including shows and festivals, and it's a great tool. It provides an all-round ticketing service at a reasonable price and has a great team, quick to give support and take feedback on board.
cons: Cons: It does perhaps not have as many features as some other providers at this stage, but new feature are being added all the time.
overall: Overall: We use it for our entire theatre venue to sell tickets for shows and festivals and it offers and all-round ticketing service.

title: Most helpful team EVER
name: Ami S.
pros: Pros: The customer service from these guys is just perfect. They are always on hand to fix anything, including large-scale stuff about how the software functions.
cons: Cons: Can't make notes on bookings - but it's in the pipeline. The final ticket list sin't always that comprehensive because we use a lot of codes, and they don't show up as separate amounts, menaing you have to do a bit more maths.
overall: Overall: Really comprehensive overview of many events, easy use, easy access to information.

title: Ticket Selling for Pint-Sized
name: Nicholas O.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: How customers can buy tickets on the page of the event, e.g. on a theatre website as opposed to taking you to an external link. Have found that this helps more people buy tickets for the event as it gets rid of any confusion and takes you to the payment process quickly.
cons: Cons: Can't make notes on bookings - but it's in the pipeline. The final ticket list sin't always that comprehensive because we use a lot of codes, and they don't show up as separate amounts, menaing you have to do a bit more maths.
overall: Overall: I run a theatre company called Pint-Sized and we use Line-Up to sell tickets for our short play events. It's easily the best ticketing service we've used - simple, so easy to use and we've found that we have actually sold more tickets through their quick, no-hassle payment system. The fact that customers can buy tickets on the actual page of the event, and the event organisers can check how many tickets you've sold within seconds, makes the whole process beneficial for everyone. Can highly recommend Line-Up to any event organisers out there, especially anyone involved in the arts. Easily the best ticketing system I've ever seen on a theatre website!

title: Excellent service!
name: Karen M.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and efficient
cons: Cons: Can't make notes on bookings - but it's in the pipeline. The final ticket list sin't always that comprehensive because we use a lot of codes, and they don't show up as separate amounts, menaing you have to do a bit more maths.
overall: Overall: I have had an excellent experience so far with line up, so easy to use and to incorporate on my website, also customer service is second to none, always answered quickly and given the greatest amount of help from them. Would highly recommend using line up to anyone and look forward to working with them for years to come !

title: The team are very responsive and incredibly helpful.
name: courtney l.
pros: Pros: The software is very easy to use and is intuitive. What's even better is the team is continuously improving the service and adding features.
cons: Cons: Some features haven't be integrated yet but the team are great about checking in and letting you know what's in the works.
overall: Overall: I have had an excellent experience so far with line up, so easy to use and to incorporate on my website, also customer service is second to none, always answered quickly and given the greatest amount of help from them. Would highly recommend using line up to anyone and look forward to working with them for years to come !

title: Line Up Now Review
name: Nicky W.
pros: Pros: Easy to set up, use and brilliant customer service
cons: Cons: Nothing, easy to use and very user friendly
overall: Overall: Brilliant, from start to finish, we have had support & excellent value for money

title: Just what we wanted
name: Lesley T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: The ticketing widget looks good on our website, and doesn't take customers away from our site. It gives a smooth, quick experience for our customers, is easy for us to manage - refunds and transfers are so easy to do. We are a small organization but have distinct requirements and chose the pro version to have bespoke tickets - we think this has been very worthwhile. The Customer Support has been excellent and they have helped us think it through and get it right for us (I'm not very IT savvy!). They are developing new features all the time as they get customer feedback. Have a look at our site www.ouseburntrust.org.uk/buy-tour-tickets and see for yourself.
pros: Pros: Easy to set up, use and brilliant customer service
cons: Cons: Nothing, easy to use and very user friendly
overall: Overall: Brilliant, from start to finish, we have had support & excellent value for money

title: We used Line Up to manage ticketing for our Festival. The customer support was second to none.
name: Jon T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: The ticketing widget looks good on our website, and doesn't take customers away from our site. It gives a smooth, quick experience for our customers, is easy for us to manage - refunds and transfers are so easy to do. We are a small organization but have distinct requirements and chose the pro version to have bespoke tickets - we think this has been very worthwhile. The Customer Support has been excellent and they have helped us think it through and get it right for us (I'm not very IT savvy!). They are developing new features all the time as they get customer feedback. Have a look at our site www.ouseburntrust.org.uk/buy-tour-tickets and see for yourself.
pros: Pros: Our needs were complex. There were multiple shows on each day, a variety of webpages needing widgets to link to the purchase basket, and a wide a range of combined and discounted tickets. Line Up worked tirelessly with us through a series of iterations to help come up with the perfect user interface. They even went as far as embedding for us the required widget code on each of about 30 separate pages on our website. Highly recommended.
cons: Cons: Nothing, easy to use and very user friendly
overall: Overall: Great customer support.

You have access to all your customers data which is usually withheld on other ticketing platforms.
cons: Cons: I had a bit of trouble working out how to use some features (which the lineup crew had no issue helping me understand once reaching out to them) but after getting the hang of things that issue was easily solved.
overall: Overall: Great customer support.

name: Dave P.

pros: Pros: Customer service
cons: Cons: Nothing
overall:
Overall: We worked closely with Line-Up as we were developing a new website for our venue and they were incredibly helpful. They added extra features to the plug-in as our request.

Months later, they continue to respond immediately to any request.

The posting of events is very easy, and I like the way it gets you to check that you are not duplicating an event (which can happen with several different people added events to one venue).

Two areas that could be improved are:

Adding categories

The buying tickets interface

Overall: We worked closely with Line-Up as we were developing a new website for our venue and they were incredibly helpful. They added extra features to the plug-in as our request.

Months later, they continue to respond immediately to any request.

The posting of events is very easy, and I like the way it gets you to check that you are not duplicating an event (which can happen with several different people added events to one venue).

Two areas that could be improved are:

Adding categories

The buying tickets interface

We are a small organization but have distinct requirements and chose the pro version to have bespoke tickets - we think this has been very worthwhile. The Customer Support has been excellent and they have helped us think it through and get it right for us (I'm not very IT savvy!). They are developing new features all the time as they get customer feedback. Have a look at our site www.ouseburntrust.org.uk/buy-tour-tickets and see for yourself.

title: BOOKING SYSTEM EXCELLENCE
name: Kimberlee P.
pros: Pros: Its simple to understand, offers lots of features, its support team is always available.
cons: Cons: Nothing.
overall:
Overall: I considered many different booking systems for my fitness business - but none of them offered the simplicity and user clarity that Bookwhen does. I can create recurring events with customer payment facilities attached easily, run detailed reports to understand booking trends, collect customer information for mail outs. Bookwhen even offers creativity to make the customer facing pages the same colours as my brand, upload my company logo, attachments, feature social media buttons etc.

Bookwhen's own features even prompt me to gear my business in new ways: various ticket types offer the ability to sell to the customer in various avenues, without over-complicating things. Even when I wanted to offer a commission-based element to my business that they didn't already support, I approached the team to see if they would code something specifically to support my business needs and together we made it happen. This sort of service is second to none.

The best part is that anytime I've ever needed support (which is a lot) I can use the instant chat feature, email and even call the support team to get approachable service and considered help.

Within 2 years using Bookwhen my business had grown from a sole trader to a large limited company - without such a fluid booking ability for my customers this would have never been possible.

The subscription price is competitive and the features and service are top notch, I fully recommend Bookwhen.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Using this software makes scheduling events and customers payments and reporting easy.

title: The perfect fit
name: Claire C.
pros:
Pros: Ease of use/very simple back end

User-friendly, clients find it easy to use and we have never had someone, not book due to the difficulty of the booking system.

Great design - Clean and neat

Does exactly what I need it to do

Excellent support
cons:
Cons: Nothing

I think it has more features than I am making full use of!
overall: Overall: I spent months trying to find the perfect booking system to meet my needs. There were many good products on offer, but nothing that gave me what exactly what I was looking for...there was always a compromise somewhere. I then found Bookwhen and it was a perfect fit. It has revolutionized the way we operate our business. It is user-friendly, very easy to navigate both backends and for our guests and it has a great design/layout which matched the look and feel of our website. Bookwhen also offers quick and professional support whenever you need. I was able to share feedback, so when the new system was introduced with the new improvements, I felt that my feedback was taken into account and that we had grown together! It really is a fantastic booking system, our business is running at 100% occupancy and I feel that this is partly due to the ease of online bookings. We will be going into our 5th year with Bookwhen and I cannot recommend it highly enough.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: I feel I have a personal relationship with the support team and that I am valued. When I am asked to feedback on certain things or when I feel I want to feedback on something specific to the software, then I am heard and where possible when they update the system, these new features are available.

title: Really flexible for a variety of businesses, useful for scheduling with different types of tickets
name: Kelsey k.
pros: Pros: I like Bookwhen because I sought it out to deal with a client who runs a business that deals with pet transport adoptions. They coordinate a drive up from the south to New England every 2 weeks, and need to register all of the information about the animals (where they're going, their health records, etc) and also assure that each dog has an appropriately sized kennel on the van. It's a little confusing, but because of the nature of the business, it's really important that everything be done safely and efficiently. Bookwhen allows us to set up transports, register the dogs, and take down information not only on the rescue the dog is coming from but also their new home. I use Bookwhen for some other, routine businesses that need yoga classes or other things run, but ultimately what keeps me recommending them for scheduling is that Bookwhen works for complicated businesses who need to take in a lot of info from customers, customers need different "seats" (crate sizes) and sometimes other information at intake. Bookwhen allows for _all_ of it, which is the best possible scenario for us.
overall: Overall: Super flexible. Schedule what you want, with the types of tickets you want, with the information you want without much fuss.

title: Brilliant Bookwhen!
name: Nicola H.
pros: Pros: Its easy to use from both our perspective and the customer facing side of things. We've been using Bookwhen for a couple of years and it has completely changed the way we do things. Attendance lists are easy to create quickly but also to download and manipulate to suit our needs. We love the way you can send links to whole public pages or just specific events. The event reminders are a great help in ensuring people arrive for events or get in touch to say they aren't coming. Customer service is brilliant. We rarely wait more than 5 minutes for a chat response. They listen to our feedback and it been great to be able to influence improvements for ourselves and for other users.
cons: Cons: There are a couple of things we'd like Bookwhen to be capable of but they are fairly minor and the company have already promised to add them to their development plan so I'm pretty confident we'll see changes over the coming months.

title: Easy setup, reduces admin, excellent support.
name: Christian H.
pros: Pros: We used it to run training for hundreds of employees, and it made it much easier, as they could pick a time that suited them and also manage their booking (reschedule mostly) which lifted the burden of admin off ourselves. Also handy features like automatic reminder emails the day before training, and the ability to export the data gathered during booking (email addresses used for follow up material and surveys).
cons: Cons: Nothing, it is easy to use. I suppose there could be some limitations if you have very advanced requirements, but then you probably wouldn't be looking for a service like this.
overall: Overall: Very good. The staff were fantastic, and their support articles were very well set up.

title: No need to look anywhere else, Bookwhen is the best option!
name: Claire L.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, excellent customer service and fantastic pricing.
cons: Cons: There are minor limitations... eg it doesn't integrate with Mailchimp yet. But this is offset by the excellent customer service - willing to listen to suggestions, always respond quickly to confirm whether your idea is already on their list of things to look at etc...
overall: Overall: Bookwhen has enabled me to run my tiny yoga studio with a lot less stress. I had been thinking of just doing bookings by SMS etc, but within 48 hours, Bookwhen had already demonstrated its value. There is zero chance I would remember everyone's bookings/cancellations/changes if it was done by SMS. With Bookwhen, my customers can make their own changes whenever they need to, meaning I don't need to get involved.

title: A great little booking tool and all for free!
name: Clare C.
pros: Pros: It has a simple interface where you can customise your event(s) and take multiple bookings or limit to just one booking per customer.
cons: Cons: It used to look a little dated but they recently got everyone on the old version to update to the new version (still free - yay) and it looks better now. It would be nice if you could customise the public facing page a little more, but for a free package, I'm not complaining!
overall: Overall: Helps us to stay organised when customers book in with us for webinars, consultations and online training sessions.

title: A truly 5-star Booking System *****
name: Carl B.
pros: Pros: The software is great and does exactly what you would expect from a booking system. It is extremely easy to navigate for both an administrator and from a users perspective. As well as the basic features you can also get the bells and whistles depending on your plan (at a more than reasonable price).
overall: Overall: We ran a successful Parents' Evening that was supported by an excellent product.

title: Best Booking Software Ever!
name: Leonie M.
pros:
Pros: Not being very tech savvy, I find this system so easy to use.

I run a small home-based business so it's great that Bookwhen is not and expensive to have.

Excellent Customer Support.

It has all the features that I need.
cons: Cons: I would say that the TROLLEY symbol should be bigger or a CART function needs to be applied as when some customers want to make multiple bookings, they don't always notice the trolley symbol near the class and so they book and pay for each class seperately. This causes an inconvenience.
overall: Overall: It's easy to use, affordable, has great features and customer support is always great.

title: Great product, service and support.
name: Brad M.
pros: Pros: Support team are awesome, friendly user interface, explanatory back end. Responsive to ideas and features users need. Decent payment portal transfers and option. Discount features/options for users.
cons: Cons: Back end could always have a few tweaks here and there. Mobile layout for block bookings could be a tiny bit clearer.
overall: Overall: I've been using bookwhen since its first iteration for my coaching business after looking around for the best balance of affordability and features. Throughout my use the support team has been there every step of the way, when I've found issues or got myself confused they've responsed FAST always looked into and solved my problems.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: If you're looking to an affordable, straightforward booking system for adbanced bookinga for classes, courses, shows or anything of that nature. I can't recommend this enough.

title: Fantastic Customer Service
name: Lucie B.
pros: Pros: Lovely interface, helpful staff and good value for money
cons: Cons: Exporting lists to excel etc is untidy so end up having to do copy and paste which is dull and time consuming, hard to search back for particular customers e.g. by name.
overall: Overall: The book when team are always on hand to offer fantastic help and customer service without making you feel inept! The 'new' version is very easy to use with a great looking customer interface. There are a couple of things that could be improved or added but the team are always welcome to feedback. Very happy and suits my small business perfectly!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Wish you could make your homepage a bit more customised - other than just a picture, e.g. layout etc. Would be nice to add on features such as wait list or reminder emails as a payable extra e.g. Lite plan but pay an extra 2 a month for wait list. As a small business I can't warrant the cost of the next plan up when it's not necessary but it would be nice to have the features that come with it.

title: Once you have learnt how to use it it is great
name: Catherine P.
position: NZPF Programme Co-ordinator Central North Island
pros: Pros: The capturing of data for enrolment means that parents do not have to write on the enrolment forms. We can easily see how many bookings we have and comunicate with them
cons: Cons: The Waitlist function can't have an extra question the birth of your baby. We need this function to be able to see what other groups babies and their parents can join

title: Great Product!
name: Kelly K.
pros: Pros: I like that Bookwhen is easy to use, allows for customization and is affordable.
cons: Cons: We like just about everything about this software. The only thing we would change is allow for duplicate emails when registering guests.
overall: Overall: We schedule all of our companies events through Bookwhen and are very pleased with this software. The software is fast, reliable and easy to use and customize. Plus, the prices are great!

title: Love it
name: Liz S.
pros: Pros: I absolutely adore this booking system. It is super easy to use and is great value for money. It is easy to set everything up and take payment online or cash payments. Groups of bookings is possible, continual bookings and course bookings are available.
cons: Cons: I would like to be able to see past bookings for longer periods of time. Being able to see bookings from a month ago would be fantastic and a way of printing out the booking sheet with contact details of my clients would be great too. I don't know if this is already an option and I just haven't found it yet.

title: Great, easy to use
name: Debbie R.
pros:
Pros: Easy to set up

Easy to manage

Saves time

Good price

Reply quickly to messages

Simple

Easy to adjust

Would like client profiles to enter info about current members and prospects.

Link to MailChimp would be amazing.

title: It works perfect for my small business.
name: Renee V.
pros: Pros: I like the ease of use for my side and the customers side as well. Also the charge for using the service is affordable.
cons: Cons: Wish I could sell products on it. I would sell my artwork products. Once in awhile when a customer cancels a class it does not refund their money.

title: Great customer support and great for small businesses like mine.
name: Lisa L.
pros:
Pros: It's a good price for what I get and it works well for my purposes generally.

I like to use the voucher system but don't think I get the most out of it because I don't know how.
cons: Cons: I really want to have reminders and waiting lists but will never need the extra bookings or admins so the package is limiting for my use. The landing page could look smarter and some of the print is too small or not obvious. eg voucher code and select number should be easier.

title: Great for children's classes!
name: Laura H.
pros: Pros: Bookwhen was the only booking software I found that was really tailored for running children's clubs and classes, not primarily an appointment booking system, which I didn't want. It is simple for my customers to use and although it has taken me a while to get all of my information on and work my way round the system (but then don't they all?) it does everything I need it to do. The help service is really good, offering help articles, live chat or on the phone. They are UK based and real quick to respond.
cons: Cons: Just the time it took to work it all out, but all the other trials I did were the same, I don't think there is any quick fix!
overall: Overall: Brilliant, exactly what I was looking for.

title: Overall an excellent product, affordable option for small and tiny businesses
name: Andrea B.
pros: Pros: The cost: I teach CPR as a hobby and net profit is only a few hundred a year. Bookwhen has been an excellent low cost option that meets my needs well. My customers can pay online if they want, they can see my scheduled classes and the details and locations for those classes.
cons: Cons: Just minor things: There is a little bit of confusion when there is the option to pay at class - the checkmark to pay later is kind of buried for the user. Also, some of the more advanced scheduling could be a little smoother, but overall it's very good.

title: Bookwhen Software Rocks
name: Tanya T.
pros: Pros: Ease of using the product.
cons: Cons: There needs to be an easier way to manage people that are on the wait list. Both in terms of viewing a list of all people on the wait list without having to scroll through all bookings and in terms of contacting them and booking them into a different time slot.
overall: Overall: As a small non-profit ticketing software can be overly expensive for our organization. Bookwhen offers a great product that meets our needs at an affordable price. There customer service is fantastic, they are very helpful and we found them to be quite responsive. They continue to add new features each year which has given us additional functionality. Highly recommend this product!!!

title: Simple but powerful
name: John H.
pros: Pros: It's easy for a new client to book into a class and easy for a regular client to use repeatedly and quickly. It's also easy for coaches to check on class attendance and it's veratile enought that we can use it for all of our needs.
cons: Cons: Its clunky to keep track of cash payments and doesnt have a dedicated page for taking register once the class begins.
overall: Overall: Dont underestimate Bookwhen. A tiny application compared to some other software booking packages but it's versatile, powerful and great to use. My clients find booking easy and repeat bookings even easier. I'm very happy with it.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: It's easily the most cost effective software on the market. At a fraction of the cost of GoTeamUp or MindBody but a realistic competitor.

title: Best point of sale for educational programs.
name: James L.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, user interface, fees, notifications, registration forms, discounting, customer service, payment interface
cons: Cons: Filtering events. It is difficult to create a link to filter to only a specific category of events. A lot of learnings on URLs needed.

title: I have received a lot of help from them even though I have the most simple package.
name: Rosemary J.
pros: Pros: Simple to use for the clients and for me. I find adding classes or changes times easy to do. Email confirmation is fantastic, also easy option to cancel. The help I have been given by their team has been second to none. I always recommend Bookwhen when people ask about it.
cons: Cons: When I started I had the waiting list option and someone on list would be contacted if a place became available. I cannot afford that any more as my business is very small and I don't earn enough to have that.
overall: Overall: I am not constantly getting telephone calls to book classes and then have to do so. People can book as far in advance as they want - which is useful for a popular class as I can only have six people in a session.

title: This has been one of the easiest quick wins for my business. It has streamlined my booking process.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Ease of use, tagging classes to be able to categorise them, the discount functionality, the teams speed of response.
cons:
Cons: It is not a difficult system but it can take a few months to iron out any small quirks to make it match your exact business needs.

There are a few minor functionalities that I would like it to have like a client notes section but the team know about this and add it to their list of modifications for the future.

The CSV file it provides me does not give me the exact MI I need so I am having to adapt to it. That said I have not spoken to the team about it so maybe it can be resolved.

title: Helped for a good period of time
name: Bradley M.
pros: Pros: Simple and works well on a laptop and mobile devices.
cons: Cons: Was promised a lot, most membership options however after waiting and being assured it was "one the way" never happened despite promises. Had to move elsewhere.

title: Ease of use, seamless interface for purchases, and outstanding customer service.

pros: Pros: User friendly functions on both sides, customer and consumer. The calendar function, and POS is very transparent and easy to use.
cons: Cons: None that I can think of. Since I've started using the system they've listened to user suggestions and update accordingly.
overall: Overall: Mainly for the clients experience. A fast, easy way to book appointments.

title: Great system - Team is always extremely helpful when we have a problem/or have a question.
name: Tamsin W.
pros: Pros: I find that this software is very easy to use, making it is easy for our staff to use - who may or may not be very computer literate. Overall it is simple, yet effective.
cons: Cons: That I, as the administrator, can't change delegate's details e.g. incorrect email addresses - Bookwhen have to do this.

title: Super easy to set up and use and my students find it easy too.
name: Angela C.
pros: Pros: The software was really easy to set up and start using. The online help was superb and really quick. Since using the software I have saved a lot of time on administration, feel more organised and my students also like it and find it easy to use.
cons: Cons: I have been using the software for almost a year and cannot think of any cons apart from I had some trouble finding my fees charged by Stripe, but that was nothing to do with Bookwhen.
overall: Overall: Reduced administration time, fewer cancellations

title: Couldn't function without this product!
name: Justin S.
pros: Pros: ease of use, ability to help run our business
cons: Cons: nothing
overall: Overall: We discovered Bookwhen 5 years ago by chance, and have been using it every since to book learners onto courses for several of our clients. We simply couldn't run elements of our business without it and it has helped us to sell courses by providing the booking system from Bookwhen. The Customer Support is excellent, always responding to help and often doing what you needed to do there and then. Highly recommend.

title: Just what I needed for my jewellery classes
name: Elizabeth Anne N.
pros: Pros: Easy to use for both administrators and customers. Really like that you can set up repeating events with ease. This software has made my bookings a breeze. Great customer service too.
cons: Cons: I don't think there's much I don't like about bookwhen. It ticks all the boxes for my business needs.

title: Bookwhen review
name: Craig B.
pros: Pros: I like the automation of the software. It saves me a lot of extra work, I can just concentrate on what I'm good at, delivering the classes and making my members sweat!
cons: Cons: Takes a little time to get used to. I'm not the greatest with online stuff anyway so it took me a little while to get my head around some of the features but I suppose that's the same with learning anything new.
overall: Overall: Bookwhen has automated a lot of my booking process and allows my members a number of options when it comes to booking, cancelling or transferring. It also offers us a professional looking booking system that is uniform across the brand.

title: A awesome product. I have been using it for the past 2 years and never had a problem
name: Matthew J.
pros: Pros: Easy to follow. If i had ever had a problem i can access FAQ or contact support and support returns very quickly
cons: Cons: I have nothong to criticize for this product. It is perfect for my bookings and is money for value. .
overall: Overall: Value for money. Easy to set up amd navigate.

title: Excellent features, service and value for money
name: Angie L.
pros: Pros: Great range of features and ease of use. Perfect for smaller and bigger enterprises. Fantastic customer service v
cons: Cons: Public face could be more visual. When there are lots of classes I think visually it might be hard to select an option for users.

title: Just brilliant!
name: Diane V.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, simple and straight forward, support access.
cons: Cons: None
overall: Overall: I cannot recommend Bookwhen enough. After spending days trawling through lots of different booking systems, I decided to take the plunge with Bookwhen. It is so very easy to use and is beautifully straight forward! Whenever I have needed to query something, the support team is always there to help and ususally contact me back in a couple of hours. It has been a lifesaver to my business and has meant my admin is not only reduced but recorded. There are so many systems out there but in my opinion Bookwhen is THE best! Others have far too many things to get your head around whereas bookwhen does what it says on the tin. I have shown and recommended Bookwhen to lots of my colleagues, who are also impressed with the service. 5* all the way!

title: Freedom from the chores of invoicing, hooray!
name: Gina D.
position: Owner of Gina Davies Autism Centre
pros: Pros: It is easy and manageable for both me and the customers. It has transformed my business, booking and paying online for courses has removed the need for invoicing/purchase orders/supplier detail forms and payment chasing. fantastic!
overall: Overall: Very reduced administration costs for the business

title: Bookwhen: To Use or Not to Use?
name: Melissa L.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: Bookwhen is extremely easy to setup! This super user friendly platform can help you with group events such as, meetings or classes. Bookwhen also offers email reminders to help reduce the amount of "no shows."
cons: Cons: Even with the most expensive package, Bookwhen does not have the ability to integrate with other apps that supply text reminders. While they do have some integration capabilities with payment processors and such, those capabilities are very limited. Bookwhen is also very limited on its personalization options.
overall: Overall: Overall, I was disappointed with what Bookwhen had to offer. I only used it during a free trial period and quickly switched back to a program that had the features I liked.

title: Since using Bookwhen for our training programmes and events, our workload has reduced significantly.
name: Trish O.
pros: Pros: The software is easy to use and adaptable. The waiting list function is brilliant and the reminders sent before an event works well for us. The customer support response is excellent, we never have to wait very long before receiving a response which is always dealt with efficiently.
cons: Cons: Bookwhen has worked very well for us so far so nothing to report in this section - all working brilliantly for us.

title: Easy set up and a wide range of functions that suit us better than other booking services.
name: Laura F.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The ease of use. I was able to schedule multiple events in minutes and save time in comparison to other booking services. The customer support via live chat is amazing and gives you a chance to ask any questions to help you make the most of Book When. The updates on support information are brilliant and it is clear that the customer service team listen to issues raised in order to provide a clearer guidance for future usage. I am very impressed with the software.
cons: Cons: I have yet to find any thing negative to say about the software. I suppose it would be nice to customise my booking site slightly more but it is not necessary.
overall: Overall: Easy service for myself and my customers

title: Simple, easy to use for business and customer, constantly improving and updating.
name: Rebecca H.
pros: Pros: It's so easy to use. It does what it says on the tin and if you ever need help support is readily available and very responsive. Customers love being able to book and pay in one place and we can maintain our branding on our booking page too.
overall: Overall: Users can book and pay for classes online and I can see who is attending and also capture customer contact info.

title: Quick and easy bookings for our sling library
name: Jennifer T.
pros: Pros: This software is easy for customers to use and takes the load off us, because we know that once the maximum number of bookings is reached, nobody else can book, so we don't end up with over-attended sessions.
cons: Cons: Setting up new events is a little long-winded... if we could copy an existing event and change the date, that would be handy. If I accidentally click on our own account link, I can't sign in as admin, so I have to re-enter the general Bookwhen page to log in. Also, when we send customers a link to our page, it seems to send them in to one particular time slot, and the less logical among them don't realise they need to press back to get out to all the available booking slots.
overall: Overall: We run a sling library for local parents, holding three sessions each month. We're volunteers doing it for free. We were finding that far too many families were turning up for us to deal with, meaning they had to wait ages to see us, and we were stressed, run off our feet, and running over time, ending up late to collect children from school and nursery. We set up a Bookwhen account so we could organise the sessions (so everyone doesn't arrive at 11am) and set a maximum number of available slots. It's made a really positive impact... we no longer dread busy sessions and customers know they won't have to wait long.

title: Easy to use and great value
name: Jonathan P.
pros:
Pros: Ease of use

Flexible

Addition of new options

Cost
cons: Cons: Hard to think of any.
overall: Overall: I've been using bookwhen for my social media workshops since launch and have found it easy to use and good value. Perhaps more importantly, delegates have found it straightforward to book my training. Answers to queries are speedy. It's great to see the service being improved. For example, the addition of Stripe as a payment option was a welcome addition. I would recommend for an business or event organiser looking for an easy to use, flexible and good value booking system.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Would recommend to event organisers and anyone who runs workshops or courses.

title: Excellent software, excellent customer service and excellent value.

cons: Cons: The user flow for admins is a little choppy, including the search functions and calendar views. I think there could be a more intuitive way for the layout of the the settings menus.

name: Toni M.

Pros: Cost effective

Efficient

Cons: Hoping for an app in very near future

Nothing negative to say really
