title: Bookwhen review
name: Louis G.
pros: Pros: I like it that is free and quite easy to use, we have been using it for some time and feed back is good!
cons: Cons: users find it challenging to cancel bookings and they have to explore deep to find it

title: Easy to use booking system that has just the right feature/ease-of-use balance
name: Johan V.
pros: Pros: Easu of use, ability to embed
cons: Cons: Nothing really
overall: Overall: We have embedded the app in our app, to allow our customers to see our online training schedule, as well as book for an upcoming training event.

title: Great product, great support
name: Odile C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: One feature I have found nowhere else: the ability to book multiple sessions in one transaction which allows me to offer flexible booking. All other systems I've found require my users to check out each session individually.
cons: Cons: I can see little tweaks that might improve front end usability (allowing front end users to search tickets) and some extra features that I think would compliment/improve functionality (membership & subscription options) but am happy to see that many of these points are earmarked for development.
overall: Overall: I can now offer flexible online booking for all my students.

title: Fantastic service and product. Could not be happier
name: Clinton B.
pros: Pros: Covers all my booking needs, well thought out, flexible & reliable. I only receive good feedback on the booking process.
cons: Cons: I started using this software about 8 months ago and honestly there isn't much it can't do with the service nor that the friendly service desk can't help with

title: Perfect system to manage bookings
name: Justine P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: The ease of setting up events.

Links to payment options.

Help pages offered every step of the way.

Option to transfer tickets.

Range of payment plans to suit your business.
cons: Cons: If someone gets stuck at the checkout for whatever reason. You can see that they've tried to book on but it hasn't worked, that's a bit frustrating from my point of view as I want them to be successful with booking.
overall:
Overall: Time effective way to manage bookings.

Email confirmation very helpful when a booking is made.

Overview tab very helpful.

Manages my bookings without me having to worry.

Any queries immediately responded to and there's never been a query that can't be answered by the Bookwhen team. Excellent customer service.

title: Extremely easy to use, very reasonably priced
name: Louise C.
pros: Pros: Once you set up the training/event, it takes care of things for you, it emails reminders, manages waiting list. I cuts the administration time managing these events down considerably
cons: Cons: I would like to be able to copy a full event, as sometimes there are minor changes to a recurrence of the event. Or even be able to save templates for repeated events/training.

title: A hassle free was to schedule.
name: Christian H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It's very straightforward to use and set up your listings. The support staff are always on hand, and they also have helpful articles to follow. Simple pricing plan makes it easy to explain to others why you need budget and what it will allow you to do. Free trial without entering card details helps to get a minimal viable product up and running to show others and argue the need for the service.
cons: Cons: Could add some more ways to filter bookings quickly, but this can be done with easy workarounds.
overall: Overall: Great, would reccomend and use again.

title: quite complicated for what my business needs the system for
name: Ashleigh H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy integration into a website build, and the look of the system is professional. The support team are also really helpful and even though it takes a long time to set up it does what it says on the tin.
cons: Cons: The flexibility an administrator has to change sessions with dates and times is very limited and when you need to change descriptions of play sessions, you have to be extremely careful about which ones the system changes when you make a change

title: Makes life so simple
name: Chris D.
pros: Pros: Simple to use and loads of features
overall: Overall: Bookwhen has revolutionised the way we run course & activity bookings, saving our volunteer leaders hours and hours of administration, allowing our members to quickly and easily see what's available then book courses, and giving fast & easy access to the instructors on who to expect.

title: Bookwhen is so easy to set up and use! It really only takes minutes!
name: Claire L.
pros: Pros: I love the fact that you can add future dates for classes at the same venues, without needing to set it up each time. Really easy to cancel bookings or transfer places if you need to.
cons: Cons: I honestly can't think of any downsides from me! The only minor point I can think of is that it'd be great to be able to have the 'send reminders' option I the basic package too, as I just don't run enough classes to warrant paying for more, but I appreciate something has to give

title: BookWhen has spared us from a lot of phone calls. Getting clients to an event was never this easy.
name: Keshav G.
pros: Pros: Capping certain number of attendees for an event is the best feature so far. Alongside unique attendees is definitely another best feature we require. Customizing public pages is worth the mention as well.
cons: Cons: Everything works perfect except its UI feels like it could definitely use a complete design overhaul.
overall:
Overall: 1. Informing about event details and having the clients book a seat easily.

2. Unique attendees is definitely a plus.

3. Lesser phone calls and enquiries about the events from clients which saves a lot of time and resources.

title: Amazing product at a budget price
name: Steven R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Being a charity we wanted a solution to aid our volunteers to book their training requirements. Bookwhen has offered a simple to set up and use solution, it has also meant we have reduced workloads of other volunteers by having a one stop centralised booking system
cons: Cons: So far only found a couple of small minor improvements that I would like to see however the benefits far outway any cons. I am also sure that once submitted the company will look to incorporate into future versions
overall: Overall: reduced volunteer time and easy to use centralised system

title: Just so easy!
name: Mary O.
pros:
Pros: As a small not for profit group, we needed something fast, easy, with good support. Bingo! - bookwhen is all of this.

Its easy to get started and to maintain, as the system is very intuitive.

title: Easy to use booking site
name: Sheryle C.
pros: Pros: Easy to use for my business and easy for my customers to book a class with me.
cons: Cons: Probably only the options for a header and positioning of logos etc. it would be great to have more editing functions on the header and logo options
overall: Overall: It's easy for customers to use

title: Utterly Fabulous!
name: Debra T.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and set up - good value with great service.
cons: Cons: Wish I could click a button to add photos. I know there is a way to do it but I never took the time to work out how.
overall: Overall: Book when makes my business look more professional. It saves me time and energy on my admin and my clients love it too.

title: Easy to use and good functionality for small business
name: juliana p.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to use (on the whole with a few areas for improvement), well priced and good functionality for a small business.
cons: Cons: The block booking options are decent but have room for improvement as a little clunky and the design feels a little dated.

title: Very easy to use with very responsive help and support
name: Thalia L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I think its great being able to add multiple ticket types to an event. The process for setting up a new event is explained very clearly. I have had great feedback from customers since we upgraded
overall: Overall: I am happy with the system at the moment, it does everything I need it to do, we upgraded recently which made a huge difference to our booking process

title: What a brilliant way to succeed!!!!!!!
name: Shane L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use and hugely functional user environment.
cons: Cons: Nothing!
overall: Overall: I was able to learn the bookwhen basics in a matter of 1 hr! Had access to the UI, created bookings, started taking payments and rarely does success come so easily!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: For those wanting an automated booking taking system with a highly functional interface and brilliant support - DON'T LOOK ANY FURTHER!.......BookWhen is it!

title: Bookwhen works flawlessly for our online scheduling needs. Clean and easy to use .
name: Elizabeth R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I like that the user interface is simple. Many of my clients are over 50 and they appreciate the ease of use. I thinj registering for a class should be a quick and easy experience and this fulfills those requirements.
cons: Cons: I have struggled a little with attempting to duplicate events. Many of my classes require the same description, but with different dates, different locations. This is probably user error as I am sure there is a simole way to do it.
overall: Overall: My clients immediately gave postitive reviews. Instead of my clients waiting until the class to pay fees, they can pay when they register via credit card. It has improved my business exponentially.

title: Very straightforward and easy to use.
name: Pauline S.
pros: Pros: It is very convenient, even on the free plan. It offers all the functionalities needed for my very small business.
cons: Cons: I would struggle to find something negative to write. All the options I need are there and easy to use.
overall: Overall: Perfect partner for my very small business.

title: Bookwhen has been a lifesaver, very easy to use and the customer support is excellent.
name: JUDY H.
pros: Pros: It's fairly basic, but in a good way. Not too difficult for amateurs, but has enough content for those more experienced users.
cons: Cons: I'd like to see more options for design/editing booking schedules. Just to make it easier for users to view and looks more appealing.

title: Great system
name: Astrid A.
pros: Pros: Great personal customer support. Software saves loads of admin time.
cons: Cons: Nothing at the moment. Had to learn how to operate it at first, but now am mostly competent.

title: Can't fault, an integral part of my business.
name: Caroline O.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, just fill in the fields and the payments are handled seamlessly. Once you set up your most used events, you can duplicate and change the dates quickly.
cons: Cons: I sometimes fail at duplicating events, I forget I need to check each field for outdated information and update.
overall: Overall: An online presence with paying facilities and a professional store front.

title: Used Eventbrite before found it complicated and expensive. This is simple and cheap.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Ease of use and fantastic, quick and friendly customer support - I want to get my events out there quickly, time spent understanding software is a waste so getting great help, even going so far as to do something for me was amazing, welcome and the best way to show me what to do
cons: Cons: I'd like to be able to have more advertising/photo around each entry on my schedule. Be able to show a set of events as different from others. Would be good to be able to sell a product/service.

title: Amazing Service !
name: Scott M.
comments: Comments: I got this service to help my client's book in for my 3 classes a week wow ! my client's love the fact that they can choose what class for the entire calendar year and we both get an email regarding the booking , I could not ask for a better service and also you can sync the booking into your mobile and email calender amazing ! I will be using this service as long as I am a Personal Trainer and Fitness Class Instructor my client base has grew and I have gained more followers as it looks better to have an online booking system and more professional ! 5 star Service ***** !

title: Fitness classes
name: Michelle H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The flexibility of being able to adapt my bookings and the ease of doing this. Keeping my customers happy and making bookingmy class as easy as possible for them. Online support is fast and always helpful.
overall:
Overall: Easy to use website. Customers found the website easy to use and liked that they could book and pay so didn't have to worry on the night. As an instructor this allows me to see how many participants I have before my class for numbers.

There are a lot of features including allowing people only to book for a certain number of people and weeks, the use of discount codes. The website is very easy to use and make changes for what I require for my class. I would highly recommend using bookwhen.

title: Great software, super customer service
name: Tabinda M.
comments: Comments: We bought Bookwhen for registration management of our annual conference. The features of the product were very user friendly and adaptive, the registration process went very smooth because of Bookwhen and saved our time and increased efficiency. But more than anything, the super great customer service was extremely helpful. Luke from Bookwhen helped us promptly every step of the way, there was not a single time when support was not provided timely. Thank you Bookwhen and kudos to the customer service team!

title: very helpful customer service, a great tool for my business
name: Laura G.
pros:
Pros: keeping track of bookings

making amendments to bookings if needed

being able to export contacts lists easily

title: Helps us let customers sign up for classes
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We use bookwhen to let customers reserve their spot in our weekend classes. Lets us run promotions and cap the number of attendees.
cons: Cons: Only shows the number of spaces available for an event, not the number of attendees. We've had some issues with promo codes being stackable too.

title: SUMMER CAMP REGISTRATIONS
name: OWEN M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This site is so user friendly and it looks great too. The vast options for making the site relevant to my organisation was excellent
cons: Cons: I don't have any. Great resource for any organisation
overall: Overall: Before I started my job my organisation was still doing registrations for events through paper. This method added to my administrative duties as I had to log all data only my computer. With bookwhen that all stopped overnight. All correspondence came to me for everyone who registered and then I could download all the information I wanted.

title: Very positive with the help of the support team.
name: Nadia H.
pros: Pros: Most of my business requirements are met. I like the booking reporting and the follow up email event reminders to customers.
cons: Cons: Sometime I get confused with certain options when I set up new classes, would do with further instructions on when is appropriate to use these functions. Software does not give you the option of selling vouchers to redeem later.

title: One of the best out there.
name: Laura G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: So easy to use, easy to set up, easy for clients to use, brilliant customer service and the best is great, especially for a 'baby' business like mine where I need to keep my costs low.

title: I find the product very useful and easy to use.
name: Deb L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The ease of use and the ease of set up. The customer service is great as well and the articles are helpful if you aren't sure what to do.
cons: Cons: If you aren't used to working with code this can be a bit of a drawback. I did have to make a video call to get support, but that did the trick in less than 10 minutes. Rep was very helpful.

title: Great booking process - cut our refunds and no-shows way down!
name: Katie M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: WOW. Why didn't we move to this system sooner? Previously, we'd taken phone and email registrations and billed at the end of the month. Talk about tedious! Now customers can log on, choose ALL their courses, pay, and receive confirmations, virtually automatically. This is saving us HOURS every week.

title: If you are an entrepreneur this is an a most tool to have.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I have tried this tool as a free trial an I love it. It gives the chance to evolve with others and keeping up with schedule.
cons: Cons: At the moment I like everything. No negative feed backs yet.

title: Handy and excellent support
name: Louise S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It is generally very straightforward to use and logical. The level and quality of customer support is outstanding.
cons: Cons: Not always clear what functions are displayed when using the basic package.

title: Really great programme
name: Alice G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Very easy to use and support has been great. Even with the free version they get back to you to help with any problems in good time. Great programme!
cons: Cons: Some functionality is restricted with the free version but that's to be expected and common across programmes.

title: Excellent support from the team. Easy to use.
name: Jennifer W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to use. Regular updates and improvements. Outstanding support on chat and email with team members.
cons: Cons: Only thing I had query about was setting up a direct debit subscription service at some point in the future, as would have been useful for my plans. Turns out I didn't need anyway!

title: Simple!
name: Tia P.
pros: Pros: Intuitive and easy to us, as well as free. The layout, options and presentation are straighforward and flexible.
cons: Cons: I am happy with the free option of this software, and have no complaints with any aspects of the product, thus far.
overall: Overall: Free, online management of small groups, in a transparent and efficient manner.

title: Outstanding Service
name: Anna N.
comments: Comments: Bookwhen offers an affordable, efficient and user-friendly online booking system and provides outstanding customer support. Fabulous software support. We can't recommend highly enough. Thank you Bookwhen!

title: Fantastic booking site
name: Divya K.
comments: Comments: I enjoy the ease of use, good functionality and great online customer service. I have been using it for a while and it's been great for my business.

title: Excellent product, easy to use and brilliant technical support
name: Sarah T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This booking system works! It's extremely easy to schedule your events and offers lots of options for multiple venues, class passes, individual events. Good online help sheets but also excellent customer service & technical support. My customers find it easy to use too.
cons: Cons: There isn't anything I don't like about this system . It does everything I need it to do and the pricing is very competitive.
overall: Overall: It saves me time doing admin, customers have the flexibility to book my courses at a time to suit them. Allows me to plan and to fill my classes

title: Simplicity!
name: Robert G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I've used the site for one community and found it very easy to use. Since then I've added a second community. Very easy site. Highly recommend.
overall: Overall: It works! Fact!

title: Easy to use, looks good and works well , great customer support
name: Cheryl S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Really easy to get started and set up
cons: Cons: Haven't found any cons yet
overall: Overall: I registered for the free package as I am testing out some new initiatives - if they take off I'll upgrade. You don't have to be a whiz with technology to get a handle on how to use the program. When I did run into difficulties I had extremely quick and efficient help from the support team (Luke in particular).

title: It's like having super-admin assistance, for our film festival--only better.
name: Cindy S.
pros: Pros: Easy-to-access daily and overall sales for screenings, donations and more. We can also sell passes and 10-packs, offer discounts, encourage donations, send ticket confirmations and thank-yous. Also, there's no disconnect from our website.
cons: Cons: Looking forward to having mobile ticketing (with notifications in text messages)this year! That's really all our folks asked for and do not yet have.
overall: Overall: Streamlining our ticketing, more advance ticket sales (with early bird discounts, too)--because it's so easy to use

title: We've just started using Elevent for our festival, and so far the process has been terrific.
name: Guy L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: - User-friendly interface makes setting up our ticket pages simple and fast.

- Options for real-time reporting are head and shoulders above what we had with our previous ticketing system.

- Completed ticket pages LOOK great - very attractive to our potential customers.

- Options for collecting donations, memberships etc in 'one stop shopping' is a fantastic feature.
cons:
Cons: - Fees are a bit higher than our previous supplier - mainly because our previous supplier had a non-profit rate for fees, while Elevent does not.

- Because there are SO many options for customizing tickets, the learning curve for our team has been a bit higher than anticipated.

- I don't like the fact that we have to rent Elevent scanners and can't just use our in-house devices to scan tickets.
overall: Overall: Streamlining our ticketing, more advance ticket sales (with early bird discounts, too)--because it's so easy to use

title: Generally a great experience, but they still need to do a few things to make it easier to use.
name: Judith L.
pros: Pros: It captures a lot of data which helps us know the customers. They also have great customer support and are very responsive to our requests and suggestions.
cons: Cons: Our customers complain that it's too complicated to use and requests too much information about them.
overall: Overall: Streamlining our ticketing, more advance ticket sales (with early bird discounts, too)--because it's so easy to use

title: Great platform, perfect for film festivals.
name: Peter Q.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, modern design. Plenty of features and continually offering new features and improvements. They 'get' film festivals. Friendly team to work with.
cons: Cons: Need more report options and customized reports. Backed by a relatively small team so some of the support documentation is lacking. Pricing is in the mid-range compared to other options we looked at (but the trade off is more features).
overall: Overall: Allowed us to move to scanning at venues, better website integration, easier customer experience, on-site box office.

title: Convenient and easy to use
name: Daniel M.
pros: Pros: It is just a clean and convenient way to purchase tickets. Simple and safe. Keeps me up to date on other events I may be interested in.
cons: Cons: Need more report options and customized reports. Backed by a relatively small team so some of the support documentation is lacking. Pricing is in the mid-range compared to other options we looked at (but the trade off is more features).
overall: Overall: Easy to use. Meets all my needs.

title: Best ticketing platform on the market, hands down
name: Blake N.
pros: Pros: We've been using NIGHTOUT for 5 years and they've provided us with everything we could ask for and more as event organizers. Incredibly easy to use, not only with Backstage and purchasing tickets, but for day of show check-in as well with the Entry Flow app. Love all the design capabilities and analytics, not to mention they have the most awesome team available 24/7.
cons: Cons: Not enough event organizers using NIGHTOUT
overall: Overall: NIGHTOUT >

title: Long Time User for My Venues
name: Frank C.
pros: Pros: Great interface and awesome staff. Would highly recommend to anyone setting up a venue or selling tickets for an event.
cons: Cons: Nothing. Any issues I have every had have been resolved quickly.. sometimes in a matter of seconds. The team at Nightout is alway there to help whether a holiday afternoon or middle of the night.
overall: Overall: NIGHTOUT >

title: Backstage is a game changer
name: Kirk R.
pros: Pros: Super easy to use for organizers. Lot of tools and analytics to tracks sales and promote events. Makes day of event check in a breeze. Costumer service also very helpful.
cons: Cons: We don't have any complaints. Everything has been smooth
overall: Overall: Love using Backstage for ticketing. The service has improved my business tremendously.

title: Backstage via Nightout | RMD Group
name: aaron w.
pros: Pros: Backstage is a reliable product with easy to use functionality.
cons: Cons: It takes a while to find out where specific functions are listed.
overall: Overall: Our experience with Backstage has been great. In fact, we've referred many to use this software.

title: Fantastic interface
name: Brett H.
pros: Pros: Ease of use among multiple team members, simple navigation, and all the functionality we need
cons: Cons: Can't really think of anything.
overall: Overall: A+!

title: Tried this product for 5x Years - Better Than EVERY other Ticket Company
name: Matt F.
pros: Pros: UI/UX is best of any ticketing product --- Advanced Controls -- Customization
cons: Cons: Lack of ability to refund orders manually
overall: Overall: A+!

title: Fantastic platform for growing businesses
name: HENRY L.
pros: Pros: really customizable for what we do which is night clubs and concert sales and promotion
cons: Cons: isn't available on app marketplaces like Maichimp, Facebook
overall: Overall: 2 years with Nightout, over 100 events

title: Great place for finding new talent
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I often have to look for hard to find talent for castings and love Backstage as there are always new faces of all ages and ethnic backgrounds to contact. They allow you to contact if you are a member and get notifications back.
cons: Cons: Not really anything not to like here- great for what I use it for
overall: Overall: 2 years with Nightout, over 100 events

title: Friendly, Hands on, Easy to Use Service
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The software is easy to use and has great qualities for events selling multiple tickets and wanting to track different sales and analytics. It has everything we need and is always adapting to add new features.
cons: Cons: We don't have any complaints about this software.
overall: Overall: The team is awesome to work with and hands on with any question we have, no matter how small. They help us completely set up our entire event on the website and quickly make adjustments and suggestions as needed. They have great customer service.

title: The Best!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: Easy to use

Quick & easy to review sales
cons:
Cons: Setting up Discounts and passwords are a little cumbersome

Would like to access the app on Android
overall: Overall: I have been using Backstage since its inception at Night out. Com and found it very easy to learn

title: Best Ticket App!
name: Andres N.
pros: Pros: Backstage is insanely easy to use to not only track ticket sales leading up to an event, but on the day off. Our staff and volunteers easily scan guests tickets (hard tickets and digital) or manually check guests in that may have forgotten their tickets.
cons: Cons: I can't think of anything I don't like.
overall: Overall: I have been using Backstage since its inception at Night out. Com and found it very easy to learn

title: Great POS and Support Team
name: Oniqueh G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: The reporting you are able to do in Korona is amazing. It helps us make decisions about store hours, staffing, products to re-order, etc. much easier. We liked being able to customize the buttons in a way that made the most sense for our business and staff. It is much easier to train new staff members on Korona compared to our previous POS software, which is great!

Our favorite part of the software would be the Support and even Sales team though, they made the transition so easy and continue to promptly assist us with any issue or concern that arises. They work with us to ensure we are happy with the way things are operating and are just AMAZING overall!
cons: Cons: We have struggled with getting the Quickbooks integration to work correctly for us. We also purchased a tablet from them that is extremely slow and frustrating to use the software on.
overall: Overall: We transitioned multiple software solutions looking to find something that would fully integrate while also helping us dig deeper into our sales data and manage our inventory more closely. Korona has provided solutions for all of those things and made it so much easier to manage our business uniformly across all three tasting room locations as well as managing our Wine Club and online store.

title: Never easy making changes/ but Korona was relatively painlessly
name: Jennifer B.
pros: Pros: Outstanding customer phone suppprt. Our account rep(s) are over the top attentive and eager to trouble shoot at any hour -this is always very reassuring
cons: Cons: Still not every thing we need and difficulties expressing our needs. Updates often times remove functionality that is worthwhile and it's difficult to convey the importance of not losing functionality. The time difference has also caused some issues on pressing issues -and updates are not tested on all platforms and to the extent that I feel they should be.
overall: Overall: Fairly straightforward POS system that is evolving

title: As a POS it offers great value for the money. i have used it for 4 years.
name: mubedi k.
pros: Pros: Support is outstanding. They keep adding features. It is easy to use. The back office has a lot of tools to help understand the business and customizing the UI is fairly simple.
cons: Cons: Rental inventory management is immature. Forces me to deal with 2 platforms which is unfortunate. Some of the queries are a bit weak in my opinion. I sometimes want to do AND operations to find products and it will do OR instead. Not as useful as it could be.
overall: Overall: Day to day management and business intelligence

title: We've never had any major issues, and any problem we have had are usually taken care of fairly quick
name: Anna L.
pros: Pros: The inventory tracking, ease of adding products, being able to track how fast things sell, which hours are busiest.
cons: Cons: It's changed how the shelf labels appear when they are printed, now the only choices are to have the price large enough to read or the product name big enough to read. It used to be both.
overall: Overall: Day to day management and business intelligence

title: Korona is a great system for a small business
name: Clifford T.
pros: Pros: The ease of use when using the system. The tabs help make the back office easier to navigate. It is ideal for the small business owner
cons: Cons: Sometimes I wish the updates would come faster. They do a great job of updating to fix issues when they do arise
overall: Overall: The benefits are ease of use of system which makes it easy to train staff faster. It also helps when dealing with large crowds

title: Korona helps to streamline and track my sales and purchasing activity with ease and efficiency
name: Jenny C.
pros: Pros: Consolidated, precise and easily accessible information. The evaluations give me a great overview while the specifics keep the details focused an accurate.
cons: Cons: Does not adapt well to a Macintosh, some things seem deeply embedded and take a while to figure out where they are and how to use then.
overall: Overall: The benefits are ease of use of system which makes it easy to train staff faster. It also helps when dealing with large crowds

title: Flexible, Scalable, and Integrated POS
name: Clark M.
pros: Pros: I love that this software is flexible enough to conform to any business workflow. Most of the popular cloud based point of sale solutions that I have tried are very rigid in their ability to adapt to your needs. It is cloud based so we have been able to integrate it with our Digital Signage solutions for automatic menu updates from Korona's inventory management tool. All features that I have requested or changes I have requested have been integrated into their regular release cycle. This is great because I get to help dictate the features and functions I need. This is something I have never experienced from a cloud POS vendor.
cons: Cons: So far, so good! The parent company is based in Germany but they have a great support team based here in the USA as well.
overall: Overall: The benefits are ease of use of system which makes it easy to train staff faster. It also helps when dealing with large crowds
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Make sure to analyze how flexible the software is. So many retail owners are frustrated with cloud POS tools that require you to follow the software workflow. Also, do they listed to your requests for new features or changes?

title: Best for Wineries
name: Peter C.
comments: Comments: Korona is a one-stop-solution for wineries. It combines retail sales, table services and event ticketing in a single POS java application and synchronizes everything to a back-end database. This allows reliability at the POS and secure remote management of customer service, sales, inventory and accounting from any internet connection. You can add powerful CRM/loyalty services, wine clubs, shipping and ecommerce. Korona integrates all the functions and services wineries need and optimal experiences customers expect in the tasting room and online.

title: Party Store/ Customer support
name: Mary H.
comments: Comments: My husband and I always wanted to open up a small business, it had always been a dream of ours. Therefore we opened up a small party store in our hometown. We knew nothing about business let alone what a POS solution was. A family friend recommended Korona, we signed up for the free trial to give it a try. Both my husband and I are the least tech savvy individuals you will ever meet. But navigating through the terminal is incredibly easy, Jake walked us through how to use the terminal and software and made is so simple for these two old old folks. A lot of the times we don't know how check inventory on certain items. When this happened all we had do is call technical support and they were always there. They are very helpful and quick to respond either by email or phone. They should be sick of my husband and me by now, but they are always so kind and responsive
pros: Pros: I like the customization, breadth of features, and inventory process. The functionality of the inventory process is user friendly and takes a lot of the work out of my hands and automates most of the process.
cons: Cons: There was a significant learning curve initially. As we further customize and adapt the system to our business the easier it is becoming to use.
overall: Overall: Better inventory management.

title: Easy to train volunteers and to pull reports. Gets the information I need.
name: Steve F.
position: Chief Executive Officer for Patron Services
pros: Pros: Ease of use. Friendliness and helpfulness of support and sales teams. Much better reports from the old system we used prior to conversion. More flexibility for online offers. Much better response from our clients on the ease of use during online purchases. Better subscription processes. When I discover a "bug" in a procedure, the team is there to help resolve the issues. Flexibility of changing things on the fly. The support team is always willing to put in our suggestions we might have to improve the system when we might find things that others might be able to use as well.
cons: Cons: With every system I have used in my 30 years in the ticketing industry there are always things that one would wish the new system to do. Some ideas coming from other systems, to others coming from volunteers, staff and administration asking if the system can do "this". After working on several different platforms, I know there is not a perfect system that can accommodate every need. Being a non-profit organization with limited funds it is sometimes too expensive to customize reports which results in having to run several reports to get all the information that I need and combine them into one for the administration, but I appreciate the reports are there that give me the information I need.
overall: Overall: knowing that our sales are being recorded in a safe and secure method.

title: Best Ticket Software I Have Ever Used!
name: Amber P.
pros: Pros: I have used many different ticketing softwares in my career, and Showare is by far the most user friendly...both for our end of things and for our patrons. After moving to Showare, we saw a 50% increase in internet sales, and our patrons actually commented what a great upgrade it was. I also like how quickly I can build shows and get them on sale to the public. Being on constant time restraints, it's nice to have so many quick capabilities. Perhaps the best thing about Showare is the client services team. Any question or issue is resolved incredibly fast. Sometimes we don't even know of an issue, and it's already remedied, and we are made aware ASAP. They take wonderful care of us and listen to all of our questions and ideas.
cons: Cons: When we first decided on Showare, there were a few reports and capabilities that Showare did not perform, that we were used to having. Instead of turning us away, they listened to us and helped us create a new report for our needs. Additionally, there have been things that we thought would be great additions to the system, not only for us, but to other venues as well. A few upgrades later...there they were!
overall: Overall: User-friendly, easy to navigate, up to date software, great upgrades, amazing customer service.

title: Great Software! Best Customer Service!
name: Daryl L.
pros: Pros: We have more than pleased with the flexibility of ShoWare as well as its stellar customer service! When we initially planned to use the system, the training was beyond what I've experienced with any other vendor. Our employees were initially a little intimidated by such a powerful system but once they realized how easy it really is to use, they LOVE it! We have employees who look forward to selling tickets on ShoWare because it is so easy and so intuitive. We are not a huge venue...as an HOA we bring in individual shows as well as season packages. We see the value because we are able to market to residents as well as the surrounding community using ShoWare. We also love the fact that upgrades are regularly introduced with advance notice. We looked at a variety of ticketing options but ShoWare won hands down. Post go-live, their customer service continues to be a winner in our book! And, yes, I love ShoWare as a customer too!
cons: Cons: We needed a system which could accommodate the various seat maps and configurations we use as well as sell season tickets to patrons. If what you need is general admission ticketing for one or two events, this software would be overkill.
overall: Overall: Training, flexibility, excellent customer service and value, value, value!

title: Great software and unbeatable customer service!
name: Erica E.
pros: Pros: We've been a Showare client for over 10 years and are still very happy with its ease of use (for both the customer and our team) and incredible flexibility.
cons: Cons: We're very excited that there is intergration with myemma, but hope that there will be more editing capabilities for scheduled messages soon.
overall: Overall: We couldn't be happier with Showare as a ticketing solution and would absolutely recommend this software.

title: Ease of use paired with helpful and genuine customer service.
name: Amanda S.
pros: Pros: Being new to the industry 4.5 years ago, accesso ShoWare is the only ticketing software I have used, and I couldn't imagine using anything else! Box Office associates and patrons alike find it very easy to navigate. After our venue decided to make some big changes to the seat numbering over the summer, our client services rep was very thorough and patient in helping me navigate through the process. What could have been a cumbersome project was made much easier due to his efforts.
cons: Cons: A lot of patrons forget passwords/change email addresses, etc. and create new accounts instead updating their current account(s). I would love to be able to merge duplicate patrons accounts together.
overall: Overall: We our very pleased with the software and appreciate the team at accesso ShoWare! Items such as setting up multiple dynamic pricing changes in advance and being able to hit "enter" after a keyword search (which might seem minor) are small pieces of continuous upgrades that are huge time savers and continue to grow our excitement for the product.

title: Switching to accesso Showare was the best decision we made!
name: Katie S.
pros: Pros: accesso Showare is a great program which made our theater's ticketing process more efficient, effective, and allows us to spend our time focusing on great customer service. The fees are affordable, and the ease of use is unbeatable. We love the customer service they provide us too. Our patrons can pick their seats, make donations, and search our schedule with ease. Our staff can ring sales, take orders, and print tickets seamlessly. We would (and often do) recommend it to anyone.
overall: Overall: We have seen more patrons, more effective marketing strategies, faster sales, and many more benefits from this software.

title: Excellent. Customer service is stellar
name: Stacy R.
pros: Pros: The ability to have access to many back-end features. Ease of use once learned. The many features that have the ability to drive revenue.
cons: Cons: The data entry fields do not auto fill with proper punctuation on the web/back end. ie, capitalized first name, hyphens in phone #'s etc. Not all reports are downloadable. There is not one report that has comprehensive information ( info from patron order address report and ticket buyer report would be helpful)

title: In a world of complexity, Accesso ShoWare and their ease of use is a breath of fresh air.
name: Brian K.
pros: Pros: The ease and control of building your own Events and Performances and simple point and click functionality allows for easy training of rotating staff throughout the year. The flexibility the system and the support team has for our unique style of selling tickets has been quite a blessing.
cons: Cons: As with most systems, the inability to change the delivery method on a completed order and not being able to do a partial refund seamlessly can be a bit of a burden. Thankfully these scenarios don't come into play too often and we can work around them.
overall: Overall: ShoWare is a great product for any venue looking for an easy system to use that allows the ability for the Box Office management to create and control their events. This take the stress off of relying on another entity to create your manifests and hope they finish on time.

title: Showare has changed the way we sell tickets for the better. It is truly a worry free process.
name: Tracy G.
pros: Pros: The process is streamlined and there are no surprises. It's easy to track current sales and report on them later. The recent updates to the software have made huge strides towards ease of use and flexibility. We have very active patrons and the servers never get overloaded so everyone leaves happy and with tickets. Our account manager is extremely communicative. He checks in on us and monitors every sale. We couldn't do it without him!
cons: Cons: Set up is tedious if working with a tour of multiple venues. It's not hard but it does take time to set up each individual seat map. I would love if we could update seat maps after they're applied to a performance. Otherwise well done!
overall: Overall: Our ticket selling process has streamlined and is now a no stress experience. We never worry about our sales running without a hitch. That peace of mind is invaluable to us as manage ticket access to the fans of some of the biggest musicians in the industry.

title: Love working with ShoWare products especially the new updates.
name: Angela M.
pros: Pros: The best pro about this software is the user friendly, easy to navigate and most important, I really like the user friendly help tab. The help tab gears you in the right direction when you need that quick refreshing of how to do or understand something your forgot.
cons: Cons: One thing I can say I would like to see an update on is when patrons enter a code, and the prices automatically change instead of using a drop box which to many can become very confusing, especially to elderly or non computer users.

title: Showare is a great value for the money
name: Steve F.
position: Chief Executive Officer for Patron Services
pros: Pros: The ease of training new people on the system. Our patrons love the online purchase procedure. The ease of setting up a season and individual shows for sale. The reports cover almost everything you can imagine and you can also have them customize reports (at a cost of course) but it is well worth the value.
cons: Cons: I mentioned the reports are great, but there is always room for improvement and could always add more reports as you never know what you are going to need next.
overall: Overall: Selling ticket on line and up selling to the patrons as they are buying one show and might be interested in other upcoming shows. Our accountant is much happier with the reports and the ease of use pulling information from the system to balance the daily books.

title: Great software so far
name: John B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The software is easy to use for the patron which is most important. I'm a quick learner so it was easy to learn to system and for me to train volunteers and other members of our team. They've had two updates so far since I've been using it. Updates are always fantastic. I love the advertising possibilities both onsite and confirmation email.
cons:
Cons: We sell tickets for different events (promoters), and not necessarily a venue. These promoters have volunteers, which we call committee members, sell tickets on their behalf directly from their mobile phone (cash transactions), if this system had that feature, I will blow my competition out of the water, along with the other features, as the touchscreen only works well for tablets.

Some of the reports are only view only and cannot be downloaded.

title: We love accesso ShoWare's product and service.
name: Nancy K.
pros: Pros: It is versatile in meeting all our needs. On the few occasions minor issues have come up, the customer service has been attentive and prompt. All issues are quickly addressed and resolved.
overall: Overall: We are much more efficient in meeting the needs of our patrons and the Brigade of Midshipmen.

title: Longtime relationship with ShoWare
name: Lauren M.
pros: Pros: We were the very first customer of ShoWare so we have seen the product/software grow since 2004. The ease of use has reached a wonderful level. It is so easy to train new employees on the system. As upgrades are added they have usually been easy to understand and easy to integrate into our daily use.
cons: Cons: Most cons are really only small issues here and there. They have mostly been resolved over time. No major cons at this point!

title: ShowWare has been very gracious in training me and assisting whenever needed.
name: Pamela F.
pros: Pros: I like that it is easy to navigate for myself and the cashiers within the Box Office. The newer features where I can adjust a seat map for a specific show without it affecting the seat maps of other shows using the same seat map is helpful.
cons: Cons: I wish there was a full map seat selection view both within the box office and for the customers to navigate more easily.
overall: Overall: It is easy to quickly train staff and provide notes within the Box Office tab to guide them with notes for each show.

title: Long Time Customer
name: Tracy G.
pros:
Pros: First and foremost our account manager has been incredibly responsive and helpful. So many companies don't have any sort of customer service or if they do they don't have someone who will pick up the phone.

I know I can call Customer support if I have a question and he's always there to help me out. I've been using ShoWare for many years and it only gets better with every improvement and feature add.
cons: Cons: It does take a good bit of training to get comfortable on the system, but that's to be expected as ticketing is a complicated process. It's a little more complicated for a touring artist than it would be for a venue with the same few seating charts but we've been able to make it work for our purposes without any big issues.

title: Great ticketing system!
name: Lydia R.
pros: Pros: The customization, reporting and messaging capabilities make it possible to create beautiful and detailed event pages with ease.
cons: Cons: Would love to see a live, interactive seat map integrated soon!
overall: Overall: Our customer service rep was an absolute pleasure to work with! He was extremely helpful and attentive, with quick responses to any questions that may arise.

title: ShoWare is GREAT!
name: Jay L.
pros: Pros: Easy to use. Very intuitive. Handles all aspects for our non-profit PAC.
cons: Cons: Sometimes can be a bit buggy, but the customer support is quick and helpful!
overall:
Overall: organized ticketing, membership, donations and sponsorship values in ONE PLACE. Not multiple platforms.

We have been happy for a long time with ShoWare!

title: Easy to use, ShoWare is a good choice for ticketing
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: ShoWare is a reliable tool to track ticket sales and manage our box office. It seems to be improving and we've received compliments on it from our patrons.
cons: Cons: ShoWare generates reports on ticket sales etc, but that isn't integrated into our other databases. We struggle managing that data, but that isn't exactly a limitation of the software.
overall: Overall: ShoWare allows us to advertise and sell tickets to many many events throughout the year.

title: accesso ShoWare, Two Years In
name: Kieran A.
comments:
Comments: We've just finished year two of accesso ShoWare after transitioning from a completely offline ticketing system. accesso ShoWare revolutionized the way we collect information about our guests. It feels like we've only scratched the surface of the amount of detail we can utilize.

We are a general admission daily attraction, and so unlike most of accesso ShoWare's usual clientele. In that regard, they have been great at working with us and helping us adapt the system to our needs. They are quick to offer solutions and check up to see how things are going. Any functionality problems we've had have been quickly solved.

With that in mind, the ease of use of accesso ShoWare for us as a general admission attraction suffers a bit- the amount of bending and adapting we've had to do to make accesso ShoWare work for our needs has created a steep learning curve for Box Office staff as some of the functionality is not necessarily intuitive for what we do. As with any system that's not custom made, there are functions we would wish for but that's to be expected.

We're looking forward to the next year of accesso ShoWare.

title: The "almost" perfect fit for your ticketing needs.
name: John V.
comments: Comments: I say almost mainly because as all grown ups know, nothing is actually perfect. However accesso ShoWare does come close in many ways. It's overall a user friendly product, easily teachable to use to ever changing staff if your a University. Like all web based ticketing systems the adjustments that you may need to make if an error is made in certain modules can be a bit frustrating. This is where accesso Showare's 5 Star Customer Service shines through. Not only is the account management team knowledgeable , efficient, and friendly. The company as a whole is firmly dedicated to improving the product based on the actual needs of their clientele. I find that very refreshing. Although not all input is able to be incorporated. accesso Showare's production team will keep it in mind for future releases and you may be very pleasantly surprised to see your venue idea added to a broader upgrade feature. Overall a great value and a worthy investment for venues of any size.

title: accesso ShoWare Ticketing System
name: Tracie L.
comments: Comments: Overall, accesso ShoWare has proven to be very user-friendly for our customers. I think there is a lot of potential with marketing upcoming shows via the online ticketing and Facebook that we haven't tapped yet. On the back end, I am disappointed with the gift certificate system--or lack of--so I'd love for that to be improved. I also wish there was a way to regulate how many tickets are printed with each order (a header and a receipt aren't always necessary) to prevent wasting excess ticket stock. Also, could a way to search a customer by address be added? That would be quite helpful.

title: Customer Service!
name: Shawna T.
comments: Comments: We picked up accesso ShoWare to replace our previous, somewhat obsolete, software. We knew in taking the product that it was still a bit young and had room to grow. The fact that it is a growing product is what gives it both pros and cons. There are a lot of nice features already, but there is still room for improvement in terms of reporting, ease of checkout, and fund development. The company welcomes input from its customer base and uses that input to fuel its upgrades. The response from staff to resolve problems is quite good. We look forward to sticking with the company to see where it goes as it seems to always be looking for areas in which to improve.

title: Much more than just ticketing
name: Arnie S.
comments: Comments: accesso ShoWare give my business everything I could ask for in a ticketing software and much more. For a small but flexible venue, accesso ShoWare gives us the ability to have multiple seat maps and forced table sales, eliminating odd tickets and lost revenue.

title: accesso ShoWare Appreciation!
name: Carissa C.
comments: Comments: accesso ShoWare ticketing has allowed flexibility in the way we operate our box office. Everything from year-round events, gate admission bundled with Grandstand shows, and specialty events within our Spring and State Fairs. There have been a few hiccups jumping from an older version to the current versions based on our customized needs but we are always able to work on better possible solutions to fit our business. I want to give a shout out to my project manager, Heather, for always taking the time to address our concerns, testing possible solutions and being a pleasure to work with!

title: Get Online and On-sale Now!
name: Bill P.
comments: Comments: accesso ShoWare is all web based which gives an advantage many other ticketing providers haven't mastered yet. A robust back-end user interface that's also user friendly makes accesso ShoWare easy to get up and running in very little time. Furthermore, their customer service and support has always been top notch, especially for new users to the system. Even their 24hr support line has been extremely helpful in getting me the answers I need when I need them...NOW! (and you know how that is; on event night when everything is happening at once) You're in good hands when you're working with the accesso ShoWare team.

title: accesso ShoWare
name: Kathy F.
comments: Comments: I LOVE our accesso ShoWare ticketing system! I receive nothing but rave reviews from our patrons on a regular basis. The ease in navigating the site and especially the ability from them to select their own seats online 24/7 is what I hear about the most. My true appreciation is for their technical support. If my manager isn't available there is always someone to my rescue! I promote accesso ShoWare whenever & wherever possible! I will be forever grateful to our sister organization for their recommendation of accesso ShoWare!

title: Our Secret Weapon
name: Courtney I.
comments: Comments: accesso ShoWare is easy to use, easily customizable to suit our needs, and the customer service always exceeds our expectations. We have been using accesso ShoWare for over 8 years and have yet to run into any major obstacles. They are innovative, listen to their customers, and are always striving to present clients with new and cutting-edge solutions. It is surprising to find a company that is so invested in their clients' needs and willing to use client feedback as a basis for their development.

title: Powerful
name: John W.
comments: Comments: accesso ShoWare is an excellent organization. They have built a full-featured ticketing solution which they continue to enhance, thereby staying on top of the latest technologies. And, their sales and support team members are experienced professionals who are knowledgeable about their industry and always responsive to their customers. Thanks to everyone for all the great work you do at accesso ShoWare.

title: accesso ShoWare is Great!
name: Caroline B.
comments: Comments: I have been using accesso ShoWare for nearly 3 years and have not once had a negative experience with the system. If there have been any difficulties or glitches they are fixed quickly and without complaint. Our company has often been asked how we would improve the system and our suggestions are always considered and more often than not implemented. Overall, this is the best ticketing system I have ever used.

title: Total control
name: Mikala T.
comments: Comments: If you have a strong comfort level with technology, and insist on having control over your functions (pricing codes, online fees, passwords, images, seating chart changes, custom scaling, etc.), then this product is an excellent match. The accesso ShoWare team is progressive, creative, responsive, and understand the day-to-day challenges of the Box Office.

title: accesso ShoWare
name: Aaron H.
comments: Comments: From the top down accesso ShoWare has provided excellent customer service for my facility since 2010. My interactions with Lark and Heather in Washington Sate and the team in Fresno have always felt like more of a partnership rather than your typical Service Provider/Client relationship. Their ability to think outside the box and build custom solutions for my facility has been amazing!

title: Perfect setup for our market
name: Lindsey G.
comments: Comments: We had great help from Sid getting everything going in quite a short order last spring for our playoff season. Once we were set up and operating, everything has been smooth sailing since then. We've had to call for help a few times and the staff were always prompt to help with any issues we were having.

title: accesso ShoWare Ticketing
name: Andrea L.
comments: Comments: Changing over to accesso ShoWare for our ticketing needs has been the best thing we've done to help our ticket sales. It's easy to use and the product support offered is outstanding. Our Account Manager Heather is always goes us above and beyond for us. We would highly recommend accesso ShoWare for all your ticketing needs.

title: Great Service, Easy-to-Use Ticketing System
name: Ryan H.
comments: Comments: We have found the accesso ShoWare software to be very easy-to-use, customer and client friendly, and quite competitive in terms of services and features with other ticketing platforms out there. The accesso ShoWare service has been excellent as well, they are all always quick to respond to any questions or concerns.

title: accesso ShoWare
name: Larry T.
comments: Comments: A terrific system, affordable, effective, and always current with new features added regularly like Facebook sales or mobile ticketing site. Best of all the people behind it are always ready to help you learn something or to just verify a best practice. I would totally recommend this product!

title: accesso ShoWare Review
name: Susan C.
comments: Comments: The product provides a great customer friendly experience and allows us the freedom to customize our performance and ticketing needs. Can't say enough about the excellent customer service that is provided by Heather, Bill and Daniel. They are always available to offer assistance and suggestions to get the job done!

title: Great software powered by great people
name: Trampas B.
comments: Comments: The software is quite easy and intuitive to use while at the same time giving us the horsepower we need to operate efficiently. The team at accesso ShoWare has been great at answering questions and finding ways to make their software work for us rather than making us fit into their mold.

title: Great product and staff
name: Debbie B.
position: Facility Rental and Event Services Manager
comments: Comments: Great online and on site ticketing system, easy to use by both our patrons and our staff. We also appreciate our fantastic account reps, Lark Ohta and Heather Hutchinson who are great to work with and always responsive to our "special" needs and requests.

title: Great service!
name: Tracey W.
comments: Comments: We have been pleased with the great customer service accesso ShoWare has provided us over the years. They have gone above and beyond to accommodate our requests and continue to improve.

title: Washington State Fair uses accesso ShoWare
name: Debbie M.
comments: Comments: Washington State Fair sells gate admission as well as ride packages online through accesso ShoWare and it works very well. The concert tickets are also sold on the system but customers get confused by the basket. We demand more than other clients on accesso ShoWare for various purposes, i.e. the concerts include gate admission or we pair with discount retailers, so often times we have to come up with our own work around. However, the accounting in accesso ShoWaree for the most part is accurate. The accesso ShoWare team is helpful too.

title: Great Product
name: Brenda W.
comments: Comments: Very happy with the product, especially the customer service. A huge shout out to Lark and Heather for their quick responses and unending patience and help.

title: accesso ShoWare meets all of our ticketing needs and is easy to use and the customer service is great too!
name: Robin D.
comments: Comments: Having a system that is user friendly but is able to handle subscription packages, flex series, single tickets and group sales transactions is integral to our daily business and accesso ShoWare does that well.

title: accesso ShoWare meets all of our ticketing needs and is easy to use and the customer service is great too!
name: Denise Lynn S.

title: Great Support and good for small non profit
name: Jennifer H.
pros: Pros: This is great software for silent auctions and generally a good value for a small non profit. They have amazing customer support with almost immediate response and the help section is fantastic. The on-line program for auction items is a tremendous feature. This gave us the opportunity to market our auction items in advance of the event and create a buzz. We love the ability to be able to pull up past donations and have the fields autofill - that saved a lot of work the second year we used the software. We also love the scheduled communications. We scheduled an e-mail 2 days prior to the event to go to all attendees with information on parking, dress, etc., as well as an e-mail 2 days after the event thanking people for attending. Lastly, we LOVE, LOVE, LOVE the e-mail/text notification for auction winners. So many people have commented on how much they appreciate this feature.
cons: Cons: I will say there were a few quirks with ticket purchasing. We had 2 couples buy tickets and have receipts but they were not in the software anywhere. This happened last year as well. Silent Auction has yet to find out why this happened, but overall the ticketing system works well. Since this quirk happened the first year we had a "back up" plan if it happened to anyone this year and how we would handle it. I wish the site was more clear about security of the site and that the credit cards are going through the paypal system, not our computers. Some people get funny about buying items on-line and we have had a few of these instances/complaints. I also wish it was more clear when someone was buying multiple tickets that the first ticket was going to the buyer - and if the buyer was buying tickets for someone else they could change this in the system if they were not attending or already purchased their ticket. I wish there was a way to modify the bid sheet layout. I think the site could easily become more user friendly by creating buttons for some commonly used things - such as create a donor, create a donation - instead of links buried down in the page. So many of the links look similar and can get confusing for people that are not using the software on a regular basis.
overall: Overall: I would love to see the other side of the database developed - the expense side. I would like to be able to run true reports revenue verses expenses. I wish Silent Auction Pro would have additional fields that could be labeled however the customer needed them - similar to creating different types of tickets but for other needs related to auction items. Lastly, I have only one complaint about the cost. I understand and accept the cost and 2% for auction items, however, it doesn't seems fair to have the charity pays 2% of the cost of a consignment item (ie. trip, autographed album cover) that cost $1000's of dollars. The charity ends up paying silent auction pro most of the profit they make on the item if they only make a couple of hundred of dollars over the consignment price. I believe the 2% should be on what the charity makes net on the auction not gross.

title: Excellent Choice
name: Lara K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This is terrific software, especially for a smaller nonprofit. What sold the software to us is that when I inquired about it online on a Saturday, I got an immediate phone call from the owner of the company and software developer. This was very typical of all interaction with this company throughout our use of the software - we got immediate responses from support when we had questions, they understand that auctions happen on weekends and support needs to be available then, and when we found a few quirks in the software they were repaired immediately, often by the developer personally. We previously used Greater Giving and BidPal; all three have features that I like and don't like, but overall SilentAuctionPro is by far the best value for the price. The a la carte pricing is a huge benefit for nonprofits like ours that cannot use all features (i.e. online bidding). Overall, from last year to this year (BidPal to SilentAuctionPro), we went from about 100 to 195 attendees, and from our worst checkout ever to our best. The instruction files, help menus, videos, etc were by the far the best of any nonprofit software we have used. We were invoiced after the auction for the software, which could be of great benefit for a nonprofit just starting out with their first auction.
cons: Cons: I would love to be able to have a website where people can enter their own donations and have them populate as donation items in the system. There were a few quirks like the system not liking quote marks and ampersands. I would like for there to be a bit more explanation on the page about the security of registering your card as many of my guests weren't comfortable doing so at the time of ticket purchase. It would also be great to have more customization options for the ticket sales page. Because of the way we run our auction, I would very much prefer to be able to assign bidder #s to a household rather than to an individual, but this would have been fine if we had noticed it earlier and planned accordingly. I would also like to be able to customize a bit more on the receipts, include ticket descriptions, etc. I would have set up our fixed price items differently than we were advised to as I don't think it was the best option for our auction and was a bit of a hiccup, but in fairness it was something we didn't get to in advance and did on the fly, so it would have been avoidable with a little planning. Although the reports are generally pretty great, I did have to piece together a few to get to what I needed which could be a pain for someone with less Excel experience. Really minor, but because we can't use online bidding, I print our bidsheets on carbonless paper. Would very much prefer that the half sheet option printed as a 2up because I ended up reformatting them in Adob
overall: Overall: Helped us run our best auction to date, with virtually no line at checkout, even though we had almost doubled our attendees from the prior year.

title: Tremendous system for making charity auction easier to set up
name: Charisse B.
pros: Pros: Donation entry was intuitive and loved that we could pull up items donated before so that we didn't have to retype everything. Demo environment allowed us to get committee members up to speed quickly and also allowed us to practice on some creative set up to meet our auction needs. Ticketing feature offered a variety of ticket options, some only displaying with a promo code, and love the addition of the asking for the email address for a ticket purchasers' guests - made it simple to reach all attendees with the marketing tools. Allowing the ticket purchasers to select the meal, or any other item we programmed made the table/catering coordination easy. Marketing features to promote the event to our attendees as well as help them feel connected to the event that was a couple months away. We set up an online auction the week before our event and people loved it! The online auction was open to the public so it allowed parents to share with friends and family that weren't planning on attending. We posted the event auction items on the online auction as previews to entice bidders to attend to get a chance at the rest of the silent and live items. Reporting is good, check in/out is all on one page, the system performance is great. Loved working in system even from our smart phone browser to check on things, make changes etc. any time, any where. Customer support was outstanding!
cons: Cons: Special characters aren't allowed in donation title so we had to change once they got loaded as an auction item. Special characters in the description like " for inch threw off the formatting of the data export to excel. Reporting is good, but would have liked a few more reports or the ability to create ad hoc reports. We found one report provided this item, but another report provided this item so we had to export to excel and do look up functions which is tedious to do each time. Would like more options for formatting of bid sheets, and also would like to see some additional options with displaying, leveraging the "Donation Tag" feature which is critical for us as our teams need to be identified. Would like filters on lists as well.
overall: Overall: Set up and run the event solely from volunteer committee without having to contract with other services for ticketing or check in/out. Handle high volume auction and attendee counts with smaller committee.

title: Silent Auction Pro helped us manage over 400 auction items at our event.
name: AMY A.
pros: Pros: Silent Auction Pro allows us to manage a high volume of donators, donations, auction items, bidders, etc. Customer support is great, they are always available to answer my questions timely. Loved the phone call the day before the event to share the 800 number. Love that we can email receipts to winners. Love that we can notify winners via email or text once a table is processed. Like that you can have multiple users at same time, especially at event day, doing data input, checking in bidders, checking out winners.
cons: Cons: 1) Certain characters are not liked by the program (inch symbol, & symbol), especially when exporting to excel. 2) Bid sheet area to write in bids is too crowded, would like options to modify bid sheet layout, not sure if we can or not but would like opportunity to export bid sheets to a file and add "NO BIDS" on back side of page 3) Price went up from last year, both module cost and %. 4) Would like more options to print vs export and when exporting to design what fields and sort order, especially on sold items 5) Dont like that when you create duplicate items that they are linked and then if one is not sold it cannot be deleted without deleting them both 6) When you update an auction item, you go back to the donation, update, then update auction item. It does not always take the updated title from the donation as the new title of the auction item. Cannot figure out why. 7) would like the name on the bid sheets to be larger font, as we had two bidders get the wrong cards and not know that it was not their name at the top 8) Would like bidders to write more clearly :) (I know, out our your control) 9) Would like a quicker way to see what auction items have no bids at the end of the event instead of scrolling through the page
overall: Overall: Silent Auction Pro allows us to manage a high volume of donators, donations, auction items, bidders, etc. Customer support is great, they are always available to answer my questions timely. Loved the phone call the day before the event to share the 800 number. Love that we can email receipts to winners. Love that we can notify winners via email or text once a table is processed. Like that you can have multiple users at same time, especially at event day, doing data input, checking in bidders, checking out winners.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Customer Service is great!

title: Silent Auction Pro - Good, but with some significant reservations
name: Alan H.
pros:
Pros: Capturing information about donors and donations

Creating auction items from donations

Checking guests in and out, and providing them with invoices

Bid entry (except for Fund-a-need)
cons:
Cons: Handling reservations and guests, especially couples and other groups

Formatting bid sheets - very little control over this format

Handling creation and bid entry for fund-a-need

Requirement to create a merchant account with Vantiv
overall: Overall: Southern Gateway Chorus used Silent Auction Pro (SAP) to manage our Gateway Gala for 2016, our major fund-raiser of the year. We found much to like about it, but also a few things that could stand improvement.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Be sure to train all the people who will be involved on the day of your event.

title: Silent Auction Pro Thought of Everything!
name: Stephanie D.
comments:
Comments: Overall, I am extremely pleased with this software. I was totally immersed in it, learning every possible feature and application, to ensure that we got the maximum use.

Pro's:

1. The Help section is extremely well documented, and the customer support is amazing. The You Tube videos were very helpful for training both me and my volunteers. Any time of the day or night when I sent an email, I had an immediate response.

2. The options available were extremely comprehensive and knowledgeable about the mechanics of a benefit fundraiser. I cannot think of anything that I wanted to do that I couldn't do. From donor setup, to bidding styles (purchase of ticket parties for Teacher Experiences, to Silent Auction bidding, setting different minimum bids etc) to performance tracking, exporting info, everything was there.

3. The buzz that we created with the auction was definitely a boost to our event. We doubled our attendance vs. last year, just by starting the auction 4 weeks before the event, and creating excitement about the items that we offered early.

4. I am now set up for next year, with over 50% of the input work established already (donors, pictures and logos, bidders, etc). Next year should be a lot easier!

5. Auction Day section is powerful and easy to use - The check in was easy, online bidding was easy, and checkout was VERY easy, especially for those who had already registered their credit cards online. I could just click "auto process" for a batch of auction items, and with a click of the button, 20 people were checked out at once. Then I just looked up the auction number, passed out the gift envelopes or baskets, and done!

title: A Software that DEFINITELY Helps you Raise More Money
name: Cindy J.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This was our first use of this software and we were very satisfied with the results we achieved the night of our event. The software is relatively easy to use - the modules are marked but you do need to take you time to make sure you are on the right page. The customer support was fantastic. Every time I had a problem or a question they were there to answer it. They were able to go into my site, analyze my problem and help me solve it.
cons: Cons: The modules could be designed to be easier to differentiate.
overall: Overall: This was our first use of this software and we were very satisfied with the results we achieved the night of our event. The software is relatively easy to use - the modules are marked but you do need to take you time to make sure you are on the right page. The customer support was fantastic. Every time I had a problem or a question they were there to answer it. They were able to go into my site, analyze my problem and help me solve it.

title: Saved Us Time, Trouble And Confusion!
name: Celia A.
pros: Pros: You can enter your donations one time and duplicate them if you have more than one or if you are repeating the same items the next year, you can see where your volunteers are in the process of getting their donations and they can mark their status, you can bundle lower value items together to make a larger basket and it is easy to do, the check in and check out at our event was fast! And, I was able to enjoy the actual event for the first time.
cons: Cons: Not really a con, but a suggestion if you use this software: have a designated person in charge of using the software and train everyone to enter the information consistently. I think their best practices was helpful'it saves time to make sure you take that step so you don't have to edit a bunch of things later.
