pros: Pros: I like that hosting a free event is free on the platform. The process for creating an event is straightforward too. I also like the flexibility, although limited, in branding an event. It's also great for tracking and communicating with RSVPs.
cons: Cons: I dislike having the system create tickets for every event no matter what. We've hosted events before that we wanted an rsvp for but we didn't need people to show tickets to attend. It made it confusing for them and more frustrating than it needed to be for us.
overall: Overall: We publicize events and gather rsvps for attendance.

title: Initial Impressions are Positive
name: Jack H.
comments: Comments: I've not really run it through its paces, but after my initial use, I'm willing to continue to use it. That's not to say I might not run into things I hate, but so far, so good.
pros: Pros: I've used EventBrite now for 3 free events. It's easy to create the event and to create a great looking landing page with the tool. I like the options it provides for specifying and then tracking the number of tickets claimed. It seems pretty easy and intuitive for the user on both desktop and mobile platforms.
cons: Cons: I hate the fees charged for ticket handling. But I don't know any way around it. I haven't done a paid event yet with EventBrite, but the fees look to be the typically outrageous "handling fees" that ticket brokers charge. I accept the reality that these folks aren't working for free, but it is really irritating to see a 10% or even 20% premium added to the cost of the ticket for "surcharges and handling." Yech.

title: The Event Shall Be...Bright
name: Aquirra RoEve L.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is an excellent platform for advertising events and purchasing tickets, for said event. The software is super easy to navigate, and as soon as you launch the home page you will be greeted with tons of info about upcoming events in your area, and around the country. If you download the app its a quick process, and a good place to store your tickets that have already been purchased, which helps if you are an eco-friendly person and want to cut down on paper usage.
cons: Cons: I don't have any qualms with the technicalities of the software, I think the color of the app is eye catching, but I wish that there was more of a pronounced design on the app, from an artists point of view.

title: Eventbrite Is the Best Choice for Straightfoward Events
name: Staci D.
position: Online Content and Community Manager for The Network
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is very intuitive and user-friendly. The fields are well organized and I can preview my event at any time. I like that I can share access to registration information with the people in my company hosting the events. It's also nice that I can limit their view to only see the data they need.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite is fairly limited when it comes to events that are more complicated. For example, we are planning an event where attendees may choose from dozens of workshops in multiple different time slots. This is not easy to do with Eventbrite.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite is easy to use and makes setting up events a quick and painless process. I like the easy way to process payments as well! Use it.

title: brilliant for Eventbrite are great app
name: Marianne L.
pros: Pros: Have a brilliant app. You get to speak with the vendor, get a feel of what they want and need if some issue with this you can move on to the next vendor.
cons: Cons: The isue with me is the time is not the same time on showing on the app but I know that the issu is on the event already. good job fr this app i always use it

title: Helps me plan my private events better.
name: Shola A.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has made it easy for us at my workplace to get professionals signed-up for our quarterly developer meetup.Personally for times I have organized private events like birthday parties ; this program has helped me in estimating the number of people likely to turn up for my event, thus ensuring I am able to plan near accurately.
cons: Cons: I dislike the fact that random strangers can somewhat stumble on my event and get an invite ,without actually being invited.

title: It is very easy to use
name: Annette G.
pros: Pros: It is very easy to use and advertise any events to local people. Having contact information on file and one-click emailing makes it way easier for people to get in communication with me if there are any queries
cons: Cons: I cannot think of any negatives for eventbrite except that advertising is kind of little expensive for every ticket as there is % + per ticket sold price + credit card processing fee which makes it to about 20% but it is worth it for the advertising we get

title: Great product, but most intergrations don't work in Australia
name: Caitlin P.
comments: Comments: Great product, ease to use and set up events. Inter rates with mailchimmp and Wordpress relitively easily. But if your in Australia you automatically loose out on over half the intergrations available. None of the NFP charity intergrations are good if your outside of the US, Canada is the exception to this rule with a few providers. I enquired about some of the new features they have been aludding to recently on their website, Particularly fundraising intergrations for event participants to collect sponsorship for their event, well customer service was quick to help but despit stressing I was from Australia and they would need to be able to offer their services here but also except an Australian Charity status, they just referred me to intergrations that did neither . Over all great product but feel like I'm missing out with the intergrations.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, setup or booking.
cons: Cons: Intergrations are only for the US, forget about using any of the NFP if your not from the States.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Basic events, great. Looking for an integrated platform, do some research first particularly if your outside of the US.

title: Great Way to Host an Event
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that Eventbrite is very user friendly. The options are all laid out for you and thought through (such as charging tax, promo codes, etc.). This tool works really well for my company because the event we host annually for our users is less than 100 people, so Eventbrite is an easy, somewhat cheaper option for us.
cons: Cons: There aren't many options (at least with the subscription we have) to design the look of the event page. Eventbrite also limits things like number of ticket types you can have depending on your subscription. The reporting tools of past events are a little limited/confusing as well.
overall: Overall: Works for what we need it to. I'm excited to see how our customers interact with our upcoming event on Eventbrite!

title: Free and Easy
name: Trish W.
pros: Pros: It was really easy to create our events, add banner photos, set up automatic email response with location. It even sends out reminders prior to the events. Is is app friendly so you can scan the tickets too. And, it's a great way to collect client contact information for mailing list too. Some software can be so overly complicated and Eventbrite didn't do that. They gave you everything you needed, for free, in a very intuitive setup.
cons: Cons: I did not have any dislikes about this software. It was incredibly easy to use.

title: Eventbrite review
name: Edward A.
pros: Pros: The amount of differents free events that the app have and the interface is very user-friendly. You can even post your own events and is really easy.
cons: Cons: Don't really works as you desire outside United States for example in the Caribbean
overall: Overall: If you plan to have a conference is really easy to put your event in this application.

title: Helpful Way to Share Event Information and Track Responses.
name: Jennifer O.
pros: Pros: It filled the need we had to provide easy registration links (and maps etc.). We don't require tickets or payment for the events for which we use it. We like that our target audience recognize the name of the software and trust it to RSVP. We also like automatic reminders it sends to those who have registered
cons: Cons: We did run into some confusion last year for our series of choral reading sessions where the same person was registered multiple times, causing us to expect a larger crowd than actually planned to attend. We assumed it was a user issue -- that they planned to bring a friend or two but chose not to provide specific names. However, it was actually a system glitch. As we use the free version, there was a little bit of difficulty at first when trying to get the issue resolved, but their support team was ultimately helpful.
overall: Overall: It works well for our registration tracking needs, provides easy-to-share links, and sends helpful reminders and directions to attendees.

title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
name: Sheryl K.
pros: Pros: I love that we can easily send out invitations to special groups of clients. For returning events we use this feature a lot as well as the event check-in which makes the planning process event simpler!
cons: Cons: They make everyone create an account for events and I wish there were more ready-to-use templates available.

title: Reasonable price, and good customer service
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Their fees aren't bad, and I feel like they understand that they are used by businesses of all sizes. We use Eventbrite for ticket sales on one event every year, and I wouldn't use any other system. It's easy to customize how tickets are issued and easy to refund tickets. No problems whatsoever. I had some questions, and called customer service once. I was so relieved to speak to someone and get the problem figured out immediately.
cons: Cons: I wish it was a little bit cheaper with its fees, but they gotta make a living!

title: Look no further for your event management system
name: Desiree R.
pros: Pros: Incredibly easy to use. Makes collecting payments for events a no brainer.
cons: Cons: I wish it integrated better into Salesforce and website calendars.

title: Better than most even management platforms, but not the best
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This platform is one of the most used event platforms, so the user experience (for ticket buyers) is simple and easy for them. Building your event is easy and enables you to create a launch an event within 10 minutes. It's great to use for small sized events, but for larger events the payout process can become a pain. It has great widget items that you can embed like a countdown clock or ticket buyer.
cons: Cons: The new embed feature they use is not compatible with all CMS. If your CMS does not work well with iFrames, you'll have to do 4 extra steps in the creation process in order to use the classic embed code. The map of where the event is located can be glitchy and not show up at all. If you're using the free version, you payout is sent after you event has occurred unless you can have support change it without a fee. There isn't an Eventbrite Wordpress plugin, which would be great as well.
overall:
Overall: - Simple to use

- Seamless user experience

- Safe to use for transactional functions

- Great support with great follow through

title: My new favorite event registration tool
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This sophisticated event marketing and registration tool is easy to use and track attendees. In addition, Eventbrite will help you collect money for registration, register people at the door and market your event to the public.
cons: Cons: I wish Eventbrite would take their money from the payments directly vs the user having to return after an event and pay the final bill. Just seems like an extra unnecessary step.
overall: Overall: Cost Value - Their cost is spot on and its one of the best event registration and marketing tools out there.

title: Find every day something to have fun
name: Federica V.
pros: Pros: I love the fact you can easily input your location, and Eventbrite always finds a lot of great alternatives and events near you. Some of the time, it is helpful not only in finding a location but it is inspiring and give amazing ideas/different options than usual!
cons: Cons: I don't like the fact you are not able to share the event via certain apps (such as WhatsApp) and that some of the times the price for the specific event is not extremely clear.
overall: Overall: Since I started using Eventbrite I started having so many more options for my nights out. I always have some ideas in mind that I can share with my friends and even if we are not enough motivated to find good fun activities Eventbrite does it for us.

title: Easy to Host Events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is super simple to use, and allows a lot of features even for free events without paying a dime for their service. That said, they handle all invoicing and payments, etc, for a pretty fair fee structure.
cons: Cons: They offer reporting on nearly everything, which is great. That said, it's not super intuitively organized, so I've, on multiple occasions, had to search around for specific data points before I found them.
overall: Overall: Overall, I think their service is awesome and handles almost all of the administration for hosting both free and paid events.

title: Consistently a fast expereince
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The only reason I breath a little sign of relief when I am trying to rush through an event sign up is when I see it's been created by eventbrite. I know that the fields can be autofilled and the event confirmations are easy to find later. I used to attend a ton of meetups and events, while it was never too difficult to get signed up. Often the whole process of entering the same data made we want to quite by the second field. It shouldn't take me half an hour to get through this because I'm looking for spending the least amount of time possible. It's been seamless and fast in my experience.
cons: Cons: I once tried to use the platform to find local events that were in my area... that was a mistake. The groupings are difficult to navigate, many events were completely off, the locations I was searching in weren't displaying in a map format, etc. This software isn't for discovery as much as it is for confirmations and organizing.

title: Eventbrite
name: Karman W.
pros: Pros: I use Eventbrite to post all my work related events that needs to get out to the general public. This platform allows me to do so very seamlessly. Since I work for a government agency, all software that use must be free, so this work out perfectly.
cons: Cons: I do not like that I can not add my companies logo (or perhaps I have not figured that part out). I would like the option to personalize the event page as much as possible, but all for free since the agency I work for does not have a budget for this type platform.

title: Eventbrite helps us run small local events as well as a massive world-wide.
name: Brent P.
comments: Comments: I highly recommend Eventbrite.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is great because it allows us to collect payment, registration, and issue tickets for several types of events. We use Eventbrite for small events of 10 or so attendees, medium sized events of 50-80 people and large complex, expensive events.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite doesn't have a ton of flexibility when it comes to designing the main page of our events. They do allow us to add a custom graphic or photo, but there are limitations to other parts of the look.

title: Great Event Organizer
name: Gigi J.
pros: Pros: It's really easy to set up and use. Makes tracking ticket sales and attendance super easy. We've been primarily using it for free events, so that's a perk as well.
cons: Cons: It can be a bit complicated to set up different ticket types so there is a learning curve at the start. We don't host a tonne of events on EventBrite so every time we do, we need to refamiliarise ourselves with the process.
overall: Overall: Has really made it easy to post events and coordinate ticket "sales" - how many tickets are left, cancellations, waiting lists, etc. Easy to promote on social media.

title: I love this product!
name: Anna W.
pros: Pros: when i get an invitation, it is by far the easiest procedure - to sign in, to sign up, and to rsvp to an event, invite others, or create my own. many awesome templates, and can save your invitees contact info, etc...
cons: Cons: i dont believe there is anything I dont like about this app! I get an invite, i'm encouraged to 'sign in for faster and easier rsvp', which in fact it is! I sign in, rsvp, and then done! It is so fast, done in seconds. What is there not to like about this app?

title: Eventbrite
name: Laura M.
comments: Comments: Overall an excellent event invitation software.
pros: Pros: The excellent thing about Eventbrite is that it has a lot of veraitility in style to send out invitations and saves previous information about guests, attendance and contact information for past and present events. It also allows for an organization to easily track how their sales and attendance is doing and gives a variety of ticket purchase options.
cons: Cons: The amount (%) taken out in ticket sales is a bit high compared to other credit card processing or other softwares.

title: Using Eventbrite more and more
name: Keagan C.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is super user friendly. It is very easy to work my way around the website, whether searching for an event(s) or if I am clicking an link that's taking me right to a specific event. The payment process through Eventbrite's website is also very cut and dry and simple to use. Lastly, I REALLY love that once I receive a confirmation email, a calendar event is created in my phone, I am asked to accept it and then within that event, my confirmation code and direct link to my confirmation email can be found!
cons: Cons: Don't have a specific item that comes to mind of what I don't like - it's a great service!

title: It's great!
name: Dan K.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is great for a quick and easy way to set up an event. You can easily add different payment options for your customers and even add descriptions for what the different options get you. It's great for everything from a golf outing to a simple free event.
cons: Cons: They take a percent of your ticket sales for operations. Yes, I know they have to operate - however, it would be great if their cut wasn't so high. For me, its a major turnoff when it comes to selling tickets for a high pricepoint. Might be better off looking at other platforms if you're actually selling tickets.

title: Great for small events!
name: Rachel M.
pros: Pros: I really enjoy the features provided for event management and for attendees. I think it's very straightforward, easy to use, and clean. It's helpful to organize the attendees as well. I've used it at several events, all without problems. I really like how you can export the event attendees very simply.
cons: Cons: I don't really have any complaints about it. I think the product is extremely easy to use, and I never had to ask for help on how to use it.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: I think that you should definitely consider it for your small events. I'm unsure how it works for large events.

title: Eventbrite is an underused resource!
name: C.F. J.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a great resource to stay in the know with what's happening in and around town. I like that I can use it to find upcoming events, such as, conferences, seminars, networking and do forth. It also can be used to promote your upcoming event(s).
cons: Cons: I think one thing Eventbrite can do is get their events SEO'd on web browsers. It would definitely help entrepreneurs gain more attendees and help Eventbrite, too.
overall: Overall: Overall, I've used it for years to either locate events in the area, to promote an event and to research.

title: With Eventbrite you can reach many people in minutes
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: You can planning, announce and get answers of your event in a short time
cons: Cons: I have not found anything that I do not like

title: Amazimg quality software
name: Kirinos I.
pros: Pros: I really like the fact that it has many features and it is fast and good
cons: Cons: It is quite complex for people new to skype

title: Great ticketing solution for small events, concerts, etc.
name: Hans H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: We used Eventbrite a couple of times to sell tickets for local music events. Over all, good experience.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite's service fees, etc. are, in my opinion, a little steep to make sense for most small events. They do provide a lot of value in streamlining the ticket-buying experience for a guest, so it may be worth it.
overall: Overall: We were happy to use Eventbrite for a couple of local music events selling less than 1000 tickets each. Which the fees were steep, they are for any ticketing software.

title: Have an Event you Want to Have Tickets for? This is your platform
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's free for organizers to use as long as your tickets are free, otherwise they charge per sale which is similar to other platforms where you sell stuff on. It integrates with just about EVERY other platform, social media, website, etc which is crucial if you want to get your event out there.
cons: Cons: The fees can be a little much if you're a smaller organization who's trying to get paid but not overcharge for your tickets, however, they are industry standard prices.
overall: Overall: Decent. Nothing really to complain about.

title: Eventbrite ,Fair shar
name: Marty D.
pros: Pros: Hi everyone ,Fair share of my thought I have found so numerous parties to go to and curiously things to do! you must attempt this because this is a great app
cons: Cons: I do have issue with this app when I fair open but it is fair exceptionally simple to settle. no problem at all

title: Note everywhere with eventbrite
name: Phoa D.
pros: Pros: Can take note and sync everywhere i go, whatever I take note
cons: Cons: I really addicted to this software because of using

title: Curate your professional events without a custom written app
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I've been using Eventbrite on and off for many years. As an attendee for conferences, I sometimes loathed having to install the app on my smartphone yet again. UNTIL, I went to a conference that decided to write their own app for attendees. It was a disaster. The custom app was buggy and pretty much featureless. That's when I realized that Eventbrite is the de-facto app to help curate and organize a complex event for attendees. Everything from tickets to itinerary listings, it does reliably and comfortably. It's easy to use for most people who are not tech savvy, while giving some power users some settings to tweak with regards to reminders and ticket/voucher organization (Apple Wallet, etc).
cons: Cons: You might only use Eventbrite a few times a year, but it doesn't stop it from trying to invade your ecosystem with integrations and email subscription. It's easy to untangle and unsubscribe but it can feel like a hassle sometimes.
overall: Overall: Just install it on your smartphone. You're going to use it eventually. And don't even think about trying to be trendy by writing your own app for your once a year event. Just use Eventbrite and enjoy the service that's tried and true.

title: Huge Fan
name: Vincent C.
pros: Pros: First, the app is pretty is elaborate and very well designed. It allows you to use your phone as the actual ticket! this is definitely the golden age of technology.
cons: Cons: I was expecting it to show more concert dates for some of the smaller acts. This may be a limitation of the data and not a reflection of the app itself.
overall: Overall: Overall, I can see this app going even bigger than what it is now. Possibly even being bought out by apple music. Who knows. But for now, it's very reliable and works like a charm.

title: Great option when you don't want to pay for a huge ticketing software program!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Very easy to set up and to sell tickets. It doesn't take long at all. Even someone with no ticketing or event experience can go in and easily figure out through the step by step instructions and info to fill out. More budget friendly than having to get a contract with a large ticketing company!
cons: Cons: I wish you could have more control at tailoring the interface (fonts/colours/etc) to your needs, but that isn't a huge con. Fees can be a bit pricey for those with very small businesses or non profits.

title: Eases event planning
name: Stacey S.
pros: Pros: I've used Eventbrite as an event planner and attendee. It's a simple way to collect data and share information in one place. I like that it's not connected to another platform (i.e. Facebook) so it feels more open to many users. You can collect payment through it as well, although I haven't used that feature as an event planner.
cons: Cons: You're still using someone else's software, but I feel more in control with Eventbrite than I do with some of their competitors.
overall: Overall: Planning and attending events.

title: Unbeatable for anything and everything related to events
name: Jeremy M.
pros: Pros: I've used Eventbrite as both a host and event-goer. For the latter I probably use the site at least once a week. And for creating events I've used it once with no problems - it worked flawlessly for selling tickets and organizing attendees.
cons: Cons: The percentage-based pricing will hit some ticket tiers harder than others. But Eventbrite is more affordable than many other ticketing software options so I will continue sticking with them for future events.

title: Eventbrite: Great Features and Great Looking, Too
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite offers great event management-with the ability to create ticketing fast, and as they have grown to become a really well-used platform, they provide an increasinlgy useful directory that can not only help you find great events, but also boost the attendance at your events.
cons: Cons: As an end-user/ticket purchaser, I despise the dreaded "service charge" that often adds an unsavory amount to your final total, but I have to say Eventbrite's charges are reasonable and clear, and if you're promoting an event, it is simple enough to build the service charge into your ticket price.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite makes event management a breeze, with electronic tickets that can be presented as paper or digital tickets, easily read by scanners to verify purchase and authorize entry. As a bonus, free events that need to be ticketed are not charged any service fees by Eventbrite.

title: Good for Event Invitations & Signup
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Able to have event logo on the page, easy categories to search for, clean look of website. Tickets can be on mobile device or printed out. Automatically sends ticket confirmation.
cons: Cons: It appears the website automatically changes to a different language (ex. from English to French) if you search for events in a location that uses a different language (ex. somewhere in Quebec). I would rather have all the page options stay as the original language and only the event name is in another language.

title: Best tradeshow and event management system
name: Sarah J.
pros: Pros: Coordinating tradeshows and events became very easy with a solution they had in this tool. They have a easy integration feature with excel.
cons: Cons: Success has its own challenges, as your events grow the database becomes slightly instable, looks like a room for improvement.

title: Essential tool for small to medium sized firms/ institutes
name: Chandrashekar J.
comments: Comments: Overall, this tool is good and does the job of setting up events! If you are a large organization, you might give it a miss!
pros: Pros: This tool is easy, intuitive, user-friendly and excellent for beginners. Events/ RSVPs can be created, sent and responses be collected in a very professional way. The registrant's details and payments can be collected in a hassle-free way. The best part is some customization is possible in the free version too and the Eventbrite App works smoothly on smartphones.
cons: Cons: Managing events with a larger crowd is not a great experience with Eventbrite as importing and downloading information becomes complex. Attendee list can be viewed only after linking to a Facebook page and something like connecting to LinkedIn could be preferred as it would be more professional.

title: Best event registration software
name: Vijay K.
pros: Pros: Register and manage all your fundraisers, tradeshows, event gatherings, public meetings, shows and seminars at one place as it is built on a cross platform.
cons: Cons: I see there is a price for every event or show registration which i feel shy to ask the customers though.

title: Probably the best, but still not perfect
name: Jameson P.
pros: Pros: Very easy for any user to set up an event and sell tickets, and can be expanded to support large scale events, festivals and concerts, with everything you need for event ticketing.
cons: Cons: Minor items are imperfect, such as integration with advertising tracking. Onsite ticket check in is not as reliable as you would like when you have a line of hundreds of people to deal with!
overall: Overall: Having worked with many music festivals, overall I would choose Eventbrite as my ticketing partner.

title: Simple and fantastic
name: Matthew B.
pros: Pros: People already KNOW Eventbrite! They are trusted and smooth. Using other platforms have caused issues with our attendees as some are unfamiliar and the processes are clunky. I appreciate the tools that allow us to remember all the details and pull of a much better event. The ticketing is great!
cons: Cons: We have used Eventbrite for years and will not be changing anytime soon. They are coming out with new features and bug fixes regularly and we love it!

title: Ease of use
name: Temina L.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite was a simple program that took us step by step in getting our event created and live. Each step was clear and concise. I was impressed at the ease of use. We have used Eventbrite at its' beginning and still today and have seen more activity to our events. Eventbrite has become more known and people recognize the site as a place to view non-profit events.
cons: Cons: We do wish there were more of a design aspect in creating an event to generate more interest instead of just a listing.

title: The perfect way to promote your business and find event in your area
name: Sharon C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It was easy to set up and login for find happening events in and around my area. Whether its a tech event or small business meetings to encourage start ups. Setting up your own events using your contacts and send invites and know how many people are coming is a breeze. The cost is extremely low and they have a professional level for paid events. Not all events are free.
cons: Cons: There is really nothing I not like about this program. To find used to the program, I would start with the essentials and if it works out , move on up to the next level.
overall: Overall: I am pretty new to it since my business is young. Overall I love it because my company is limited in its budget and advertising resources. if you are wanting to get out there and grow your business, eventbrite is the ticket. Especially if you are tired of the behind the computer approach.

title: Eventbrite For PFA
name: Molly C.
pros: Pros: I can track how many people are coming to our event, and who is coming.
cons: Cons: We have no complaints for this software.
overall: Overall: This is allowing us to save time and money by making it easy for students and parents to register for events on their own, rather then us having to register each individual

title: Takes your event throwing from a hobby to a business!
name: Brian W.
comments: Comments: Try it out if you are ready!
pros: Pros: The pro version adds a ton of functionality but here are the main three things that did it for me: Ticket sales on your own site Customizable checkout forms Detailed sales analytics
cons: Cons: The con is the dollar value of ticket cost on top of the %. It makes sense... You just have to get over the hump of having small value tickets and need to sell tickets so that it is practical of pay for those added features.

title: I use this all the time for events! Great for anything RSVP needed!
name: Jodylynne J.
pros: Pros: Love it! I use this for anything where I need an RSVP head count, or just want to plan a room size or meal. It's easy to setup your event, add pictures, time and date, plus description. You can even send the invites right from there especially if you already have the email addresses saved. It can also be shared directly into social media and easily accessed from there and sign up.
cons: Cons: It's been great so I don't have any, we've liked everything about it. As a real estate company who plans open houses and events frequently it's become our go to tool for planning.
overall: Overall: Wonderful experience

title: Eventbrite is a great tool for creating and managing attendees for events.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love the functionality of Eventbrite. For a free platform, it offers SO many different features. You not only can post events and get the word out there, but you can also manage attendees, send and schedule emails, and post the event to facebook right there through the website.
cons: Cons: When it comes to accepting payments for paid tickets, the fees can be a little steep. I did a charity event and eventbrite still took a cut of ticket sales.

title: Easy way for Event Management - Ticketing
name: Garrett W.
pros: Pros: Love that there is an option for free ticketed events. Many of our events are free and this is a great way to get a headcount. Being that we do many free events and people just "show up" without signing up, it's great to be able to add attendees manually after the event has taken place to have a more accurate headcount.
cons: Cons: I wish the pricing wasn't so steep. Many of our events are very low priced as we're a non-profit and only charge what it costs us to put the event on.

title: Review of EventBrite
name: Kishasha F.
pros: Pros: I have used Eventbrite. It is VERY easy to use the software. I have used the software as I have signed up to attend and pay for various events. I like the software can be set up to send invited guests reminders about the upcoming event that one has signed up to attend. I also like that it can be used for free events and used to track potential guests.
cons: Cons: I have NO cons about this software! It is a great tool to used to create events and have people register.

title: Great Software for Event Registration
name: Ian B.
pros: Pros: EventBrite makes it easy to register and sign-up for various events. It works from a mobile device and also allows you to browse events in your area if you are looking for things to do.
cons: Cons: I think the search feature could be a little more comprehensive since currently it is limiting in terms of fields. Also I wish there was a way to auto-complete any registration form if it requires a lot of fields to fill out so you could save time.

title: Easy Party Organizing
name: Jeanine P.
comments: Comments: I use this to organize our company celebrations/gatherings. It really helps keep things focused for me, and streamlines the process.
pros: Pros: Very simple to use, easy to load pictures, pdfs, and fun fonts. Great for putting class into an online invitation, and for keeping track of who is coming to the event.
cons: Cons: I like to format my invites creatively, there were some limitations to the formatting options. BUT, if your goal is to simplify the invitation and organization process, that's not such a drawback!

title: Exceptional Event Management Tool
name: Myca A.
comments: Comments: If you're looking for a way to sell tickets to your next event, you can't overlook Eventbrite. The features in the Professional and Premium suite specifically are valuable for event organizers of all kinds.
pros: Pros: From the easy to use mobile purchasing to ticket scanning, Eventbrite truly is a "bright" platform to use for ticketing. We've used it for multiple live events and have always enjoyed using the product. Specifically, the Professional toolset allowed us to save a great deal of staff time.
cons: Cons: I wish there were more integration with other platforms. We would like to be able to fully utilize our CRM and extend them to Eventbrite, but it's simply not easily feasible.

title: Eventbrite is very user friendly and have a lot of features
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is very user friendly and have a lot of features for what I needed to use it for. The application is very easy to manuever around. There were additional features that I would have liked to use, but it was not available for my level of subscription.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite didn't have all the features I thought it should have for the lower level user. It's pretty straight forward so I was able to make it work for what I needed.

title: EVENTBRITE -- a needed software, but it can be complicated
name: amy r.
pros:
Pros: I think it serves and important need -- posting tickets and getting tickets for a local event.

I have used it both as a seller and buyer.
cons: Cons: I wish there was better integration w/ the calandar. I miss events I would like to see
overall:
Overall: It is an efficient way to attend events and to give access. I have used it both ways -- and it works!

As I mentioned above, I wish there was better calendar intergration. I like when I get emails suggestting events -- the algorythm seems to know my taste.

title: A great platform for organizing and managing an event!
name: Arpan S.
pros:
Pros: - Events can be organized in a matter of minutes.

- Fully integrated with third party apps such as SurveyMonkey and MailChimp

- The interface is intuitive and the platform itself is very easy to use.
cons:
Cons: - The customer service is not good. It takes days to get an initial response on the email.

99% of the phone calls are routed to Voicemail!.
overall: Overall: It is a great tool for organizing events and finding nearby events for an individual and an organization.

title: EventBrite
name: Simera N.
pros:
Pros: -Ease of use

-Free to use if event is free

-Able to customize link for event

-Provides email alerts for each registration

-Ability to add logo to personalize event
cons:
Cons: -Doesn't give option for free version, to collect additional participant information such as phone number and address

-Doesn't give option of participant info in excel format for free version
overall: Overall: Happy with the product. I've used to collect participant info for 2 events I've coordinated and used it to rsvp for events hosted by others

title: Perfect for social butterflies
name: Marisa P.
pros: Pros: I absolutely love searching for events on eventbrite. You can find events based on different categories or genres. You can search by music, food, and by holiday. The possibilities are endless. You can find events in many different cities. As a social butterfly who also loves food, EventBrite is an amazing tool to venture out into the community.
cons: Cons: We need it to become more popular as not all events are listed.

title: Event Information & Registration
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a convenient interface for attendees to view event information and register for events. It's also easy to cancel registrations and access a list of attendees.
cons: Cons: The skin/theming isn't as customizable as I would like for it to be, in order to match the theming on event pages. I would also like more options to be able to frame just the registration section instead of the full page; Eventbrite has decreased the framing/sharing options in recent years.

title: Easy Invitations
name: Laura B.
pros: Pros: If you want to create a cool invite that reaches everyone who has email, and uses graphics that are fun this is an easy way to do that. Not everyone uses Facebook, so an invite here is better sometimes.
cons: Cons: With all freebie software platforms there are advertisements, it's just annoying sometimes frankly. Also, it would be great if a snail mail option with postal purchasing built in was included. Some people still don't respond or get (believe it or not!) email.

title: Makes Registering for Events Especially Easy
name: Jean D.
pros: Pros: I have registered for several conferences using EventBrite and I found it especially easy to use. Often conference registration is really cumbersome, asks for too many details and has too many pages. EventBrite seems to only ask for just the basics which is fine by me. I get a ticket on my phone and then that's it - I just pull it up when I arrive at the event. I don't have to print anything out beforehand - I just show up and show the ticket on my phone. Very easy experience.
cons: Cons: I can't think of anything. As a registrant I am always happy to see that it is the software being used.
overall: Overall: I think it is the seamlessness between registering on a desktop computer and then showing an admission ticket on a phone that makes EventBrite easy and almost transparent. Really nice experience overall.

title: Great Event Planning Tool for Non-Profits
name: Jenna M.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite has pretty much any feature or service that you could need to plan an event.
pros: Pros: For events where there is no ticket charge, Eventbrite is free to use. For a non-profit, this is great as we put on a lot of free events. It also so easy to manage and track event attendees through Eventbrite.
cons: Cons: In the past, I have found the customer service to be a little lacking, especially when I want to try and get someone on the phone.

title: Eventbrite is the best!
name: Chris W.
pros: Pros: Working with various events I have enjoyed my experience with eventbrite. Really easy to use for customers, will help you track and keep your event organized without worry. The positives are lots of features, options for collecting payments, reporting, notifications, and use of app. It works great!
cons: Cons: Their service fees are on the higher side. Would like to see more options for templates (use for promotion) which better fit what we're going for per event.

title: An okay event service.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I never had any issues using it. The UI/UX is quite clear and havent noticed anything that would stop me from using it. Other than that its up to the creator if he will make the event on facebook eventbrite etc.
cons: Cons: There isnt really any incentive to use it. I get annoyed that I have to retype things from my account a lot of times but its kinda irrelevant. If someone wants me to sign up through it, I will but thats it.

title: EventBrite
name: Courtney D.
pros: Pros: I like the ease of use to invite so many people at once to an event. I also like the tracking of responses to make planning easier for headcount and such.
cons: Cons: I wish the software had better templates for invitations. A more upgraded software or graphics would be great. I also wish it was a tad easier importing contacts.
overall: Overall: Overall, i truly aids us in being able to mass generate invitations for marketing events and such. It also helps us stay organized in terms of preparing for the events.

title: Eventbrite is a great Organization Tool
name: Courtney S.
pros: Pros: It is easy to organize an event and invite others in a timely and accurate matter. Also, finding events to attend or join is easy with this tool, which is especially important for those owning small businesses and need to make their presence known in the community.
cons: Cons: I have no complaints with this software.
overall: Overall: Overall, Eventbrite is an easy tool and fun to use. It makes finding, attending and planning events simpole and enjoyable.

title: Eventbrite allow me to sell or distribute the tickets for an event
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Is beautiful to use. Eventbrite is very well designed, so it is very useful to understand how the things work. The best of Eventbrite is that is free when your event is free! So when I'm organizing a free conversation or conference i know Eventbrite is the best solution to distribute my entrance tickets. Even when is a paid event, Eventbrite only takes the 6% as a commission for the sell and it give me an event page to promote the event and an app to control the sales.
cons: Cons: It could be amazing if Eventbrite implements more payment methods (I know you can use Debit and credit cards), that could be useful in no banked countries. Sometimes people prefers to go and pay physically what they buys.
overall: Overall: You can organize and sell your tickets for your next conference or class.

title: A one-stop shop to purchase (almost) all your tickets
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I can purchase and RSVP to thousands (even millions?) of events through their site. But most importantly: I trust them. Having used some shady sites and getting scammed, Eventbrite is a breath of fresh air.
cons: Cons: I find their mobile web experience a bit lacking. That's all I can think of.
overall: Overall: Been using on and off through the years. Always a great experience.

title: Great for small businesses!
name: Nicole W.
comments: Comments: Amazing Customer Service - whenever I had a question, I was able to get a quick answer either via phone or live chat
pros: Pros: -Easy use and implementation on website -good analytical insights -great customer service -has all features that our businesd needs
cons: Cons: Some features only seem to be accessible by the account owner and not the other admins (e.g. download attendee list including all form questions)

title: Easy and accessible, high transaction fees
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's incredibly easy to learn how to use Eventbrite, and it's pretty universally used, so users can easily navigate your event page to get details and purchase tickets, and it can be seamlessly integrated to many other platforms you're using to share your event.
cons: Cons: The transaction fees are quite pricey, unless you're hosting a free event, so I would definitely recommend doing your research before blindly using Eventbrite for your events.

title: Bringing events to your computer.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like the fact that you can just set-up an event if you're organising one. Everyone can sell tickets for their events and that's a good thing, makes your event available to a large audience so you could probably get more visitors by putting it on a website like Eventbrite.
cons: Cons: When you are selling tickets you will have some trouble solving everything. I remember having a lot of trouble with changing events and the available tickets. Had to wait a long time to get a response from their support aswell.
overall: Overall: Overall I like the idea of Eventbrite and it somehow works decent enough. (at the side of customers buying tickets the site is perfect and you'll have your tickets immediatly in your mailbox after paying). But from a seller's perspective I think they could've done a way better job at making it simple and easy to use.

title: Makes it very easy to schedule events
name: Cindy L.
pros: Pros: I have been using Eventbrite for several years. It is very user-friendly. Anyone can figure it out. You can manage rsvps, updates, pricing/location info, etc. It also keeps a history of your past events.
cons: Cons: Not much that I don't like. I've used other event planning apps/software, but I still like Eventbrite. Maybe they could eliminate or extend the timer that they place on the screen to finish your order before the tickets go back in the pool.

title: Eventbrite Provides Professionalism
name: Jason D.
pros: Pros: In my personal use for professional development events and in our organization's use for public events, Eventbrite brings clarity and simplicity to event publication and registration.
cons: Cons: Every experience with Eventbrite has been excellent. I cannot think of an improvement that I have wished for while using it.
overall: Overall: I have used this product to register for events for myself as well as participated in setting up public events through Eventbrite for others to use for registration.

title: Very helpful for planning events
name: Michael H.
pros: Pros: We almost always use Eventbrite for planning events because it is easy for us and easy for our participants when they register to attend. The fees are reasonable and we've never had a problem.
cons: Cons: At first, we found it a little difficult to link Eventbrite to some of the other software we use, including our website, so that people could go to one place for registering. Eventually, we got the hang of it, and now there's no problems at all.

title: Great event registration site
name: Valerie T.
pros: Pros: I like Eventbrite b/c of the way it integrates with social media. I can set up my facebook event page and have the option for people to buy tickets right there without having to be re-directed back to eventbrite. That is super helpful and makes us look really professional.
cons: Cons: I don't like that you can't really customize your event page. I think that was a recent change b/c you used to be able to manipulate colors and fonts for the page, but now the colors automatically generate based on your event header image.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite has been a great tool for selling tickets. I like that you can send email notifications to all or just a portion of your registrants. You can easily keep track of tickets sold and manipulate those controls. And I like the analytics that help you know who is buying and when. Great product.

title: Such a great tool to make event hosting/going much simpler
name: Chris W.
pros: Pros: We've never hosted an event, but have been on the "guest" end several times and each time we use Eventbrite, we can rest at ease knowing our bases are already covered and we don't have to worry about printing, remembering, or picking up any physical tickets. Makes attending the event so much easier to have everything in one place.
cons: Cons: We're really happy this app exists, though again we can't speak to the "hosting" side of using the app.

title: Love it
name: RC R.
comments: Comments: I could not imagine a better event RSVP software product. My life has changed since I used it.

title: I think this is pretty useful tool for events.
name: Jessica M.
pros: Pros: I would say that Eventbrite can handle really any event you want to promote or track tickets for. Even if you are a small business or an individual looking to book for an event. It sends out automatic emails and reminders, tracks your ticket sales, and embed events right onto your website.
cons: Cons: I would say the only thing I think would be cool is if you could white label this service somehow so Eventbrite's name didn't show up.

title: I've used Eventbrite to help launch a local directory site
name: Jake M.
pros: Pros: I liked how easy it was to navigate and use. It's a simple idea that can be very beneficial for the right person.
cons: Cons: Sometimes when it shows up in search engines it's not always accurate for what you were originally searching for.
overall: Overall: I used Eventbrite to help spread the word of a local directory website and community/tourism business. It was easy to use and beneficial for both myself and customers.

title: Relatively easy to use, recognizeability
name: Stephanie L.
pros: Pros: It's popular and recognizable, so hosting your event on this platform lends it some automatic credibility.
cons: Cons: I don't find it's interface particularly intuitive or user-friendly. That being said, you get used to it after a few times using it. Another con, they take out a significant chunk for Eventbrite processing fee. Many platforms take less commission, but are not as popular as Eventbrite (yet).

title: Eventbrite is efficient in this day and time...
name: Star H.
pros: Pros: I like the ability to get the word out about an Event to a mass number of individuals through e-vite and sharing a link to the event on social media platforms, which followers/friends also share. Eventbrite is efficient and super easy to use. It makes life simple in our digital world where mailing invitations is no longer favorable. The Eventbrite softwate helps me get an idea of the event turnout even prior to the event through rsvps/tickets sold, which in turn helps me prep to host/serve a number guests accordingly. One option I enjoy using on Eventbrite is keeping the location as TBA, and releasing the event location info only to those who plan to attend.
cons: Cons: I have no complaints about the Event software.

title: Fast and cost effective
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I liked that I had an option to switch between paid tickets and free tickets. I use Eventbrite to put on various events that are both paid and free to the public. This software has a large rate of use and people find it easy to understand. I have been able to easily see how many tickets have been reserved as well as communicate updates, with attendees easily able to cancel or remove their ticket.
cons: Cons: Setting up software took a little time to get used to, but once I had an account and some preferences loaded, the whole process was much easier. Sometimes the recommended events at the bottom have had some company competitors which there isn't an option to remove.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite is a fast, easy way to communicate details and send tickets about the event. With a little bit of time, a user can easily set up both paid and free events. I've hosted multiple events with this software and it's relatively painless to process payments and update the event.

title: Your entertainment website
name: Jamie H.
pros: Pros: I use Eventbrite for any and all shows i attend in my city and it is all i use. Not only do i find it better then Ticketmaster i feel like the service fees are less as well.
cons: Cons: I have absolutely nothing bad to say against Eventbrite. I have used this site for years and have yet to run into issues.
overall: Overall: Overall my experience with Eventbrite has been excellent. I am able to find and purchase tickets for ALMOST every show i go to PLUS my friends who throw events use them.

title: Event Management done right!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love the integration between the desktop and the mobile app. Also, I have found that the community sense on eventbrite is better than other similar tools. The potential event matching capabilities of Eventbrite are better and I constantly find myself aligned with the recommended events that are published on the site.
cons: Cons: If eventbrite could be integrated into an existing social media platform then it would be easier to track events through that integration as currently they have to be tracked seperately.
overall: Overall: Good overall experience with Eventbrite

title: LOVE LOVE LOVE Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's it literally my one stop shop. Now that is has gps locator, I don't have to enter the city! I travel often so this software is extremely beneficial when I want to find out the happenings.
cons: Cons: I have in the past had issues with the financial tools, but recently eventbrite has made it even easier to use. I've been a user for over six years now.

title: As a user this was awesome!
name: Kasja W.
pros: Pros: I loved how when invited to an event you can put your ticket for the event right into your wallet on your iphone! Love how professional and easy it is to use, would definately use if our office ever needed to use something like that!
cons: Cons: I got a ticket from an event in 2015 that I had put into my wallet on my iPhone and it is still there, not sure how to get rid of it. Not sure if it is an EventBrite thing or an Apple thing though.

title: Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Does everything I would need for buying tickets to shows and events that I want to attend. Pretty straightforward sign-up and archiving events, as well as accessing my tickets. Used for most events I go to, so it is convenient.
cons: Cons: Could be better at recommending concerts and events I would actually want to attend. Their browse and suggestions don't always align with my interests.

title: Used for 20th Class Reunion
name: Josh K.
pros: Pros: The company has been doing events for a long time. THEY KNOW THEIR STUFF! They have everything covered for small events like the one I organized (100-200 people class reunion). They also have a great platform for larger events!
cons: Cons: You must have a wi-fi connection to take credit cards at the event.
overall: Overall: I used this software both from my desktop and from their convenient app. I used this to organize a 20-year reunion for my high school graduating class.

title: Got an Event?
name: Krysti L.
pros: Pros: I like the fact that you can send an invitation via email or other ways of communication over paper. It saves trees and lets you be creative when creating an invitation no matter the even. I've used them for birthday parties and also received several for birthdays, weddings, gender reveals and many more.
cons: Cons: There isn't one thing I don't like about this. Being able to be creative and save time and money is excellent.

title: Eventbright User Friendly
name: Miriam J.
comments: Comments: Try and verify who the tickets are for, in the case they are changing the person attending event allow for easier change. No single person needs 6 tickets to anything, period.
pros: Pros: I use this several times a year to purchase. It's very straight forward and you don't have to worry about discrepancy in prices. I have mainly used this to purchase concert tickets and I usually see that the ticket prices stay stationary rather than fluctuating like other ticket or even websites. 10/10 recommend.
cons: Cons: Something Eventbrite along with most other event ticket selling platforms should really work on is the emphasis they should place on people who are ordering a LOT of tickets at once. There tends to be a clear trend in scalping tickets especially for events in small venues.

title: Get Your Tickets
name: Malecia B.
pros: Pros: I like how I can search for tickets by category because the majority of the time I am looking for free, food or music related events.
cons: Cons: It seems just a bit complicated to use as an administrator trying to set up an event. I'm sure it's really not that bad though and that I just need more time to utilize all that the software has to offer.
overall: Overall: Fine. Now I mostly use the mobile tickets and I'm glad that I get a reminder email about my upcoming event.

title: Simple and great way to get everyone together.
name: Jamie W.
pros: Pros: When trying to put together an event for 1000 employees and volunteers Eventbrite makes is easy for us to set up, track people, send the invites and remind people of the event.
cons: Cons: Nothing particular comes to minds as it does what is needed and expected, we only use it once or twice a year.
overall: Overall: It has made it so our HR and event planning committee spends less time figuring out logistics of who, what when and more time on the planning the fun of the event.

title: Eventbrite review
name: Tammy l.
pros: Pros: Great for reviewing a meeting content, date and time. Takes minutes to both set up and respond to a new meeting and venue.
cons: Cons: I cannot really think of a downside to this software. It truly takes minutes to use.
overall: Overall: This is the simplest of software for both setting up a meeting and reviewing a meeting invite. You have the ability to review the content of the meeting, the venue, date and time. Once accepted, it's one click to download to your calendar; Outlook, google, etc.

title: A simple way to take in-person events to the next level of professionalism
name: Paola P.
pros: Pros: I first used Eventbrite as a way to gather assistants for a promotional event. It made keeping track of the RSVPs and attendees so simple! I was able to export excel sheets with every person who confirmed they would assist, plus the fact that the reminders are sent out automatically and (at least) a paper ticket can be requested for the person to show on their phones or download them, makes them remember about the event even more. When you host a free event it is possible for a lot of people to forget about it or disregard it more easily, but when they have to take the time to download the ticket and so forth, it is more of a commitment. The add to calendar feature is also very very handy.
cons: Cons: Not sure if this is offered (it sure must be), but a pay option with no Eventbrite branding would be perfect and if I use it again I would be glad to purchase it.

title: Great way to rsvp and make payment for events
name: Joy T.
pros: Pros: I have always had an easy time responding to events on this software. I like that I am providing them with my information instead of the host when it is hosted by a group I am not familiar with
cons: Cons: I have heard their fees are high in comparison to their competition. While as a guest I'm not privy to the details I have been told it increases the amount I pay to attend events using the software
overall: Overall: Protect my financial information

title: Eventbrite is so awesome with tickets!
name: Brian B.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite saves and organizes your tickets whether the events or group sessions or webinars etc. are free or paid you still get a sense of it being an honorable situation younare going to since eventbrite makes the lrocess prior so satisfying.
pros: Pros: It really is a very organized app and platform and makes your experience with getting tickets feel very special!
cons: Cons: There are absolutely zero cons with eventbrite for me. I have always had a great and satisfying experience.

title: Great marketing and registration tool for events
name: Rae H.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is easy to navigate from both the event planner and attendee's perspectives. The fees are also minimal for ticket purchases. The mobile app enables event goers to easily manage their schedules and tickets.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite is best for simple events. I would not recommend it for use in complicated events, such as conferences with multiple simultaneous sessions.

title: Really great tool for finding things to do around town that you never knew existed.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This website has existed for 12 years but my girlfriend and I just found out about this a few months ago. She has lived in Dallas, TX her whole life and I have lived here for about 5 years now. We THOUGHT that we had done everything there was to do in Dallas, but after finding Eventbrite we realized we were very wrong. This website is really unique and easy to use and is truly a killer of boredom.
cons: Cons: The only thing that I can think of that is a con of this software is that you can't ask questions about the events online. I think the site would greatly benefit from some type of forum for each event where people could ask questions and have someone who knows about the event answer them. My girlfriend and I have found ourselves wondering things like what kind of clothes to wear or what seating would be like with many events, and have not been able to get those questions answered.
overall: Overall: Experiencing things that I never thought about and didn't know existed. Seeing Dallas, TX beyond just the mainstream stuff. Never running out of options for things to do on the weekend.

title: Entertainment Awaits
name: Nicholas H.
pros: Pros: I most enjoyed being able to view my already purchased tickets to events, and search for other events all within one mobile app. Eventbrite has been great for surprising my family with weekend outings to a variety of concerts, festivals, and other fun events.
cons:
Cons: I have only had a few minors issues with events not updating their head count or changes of dates to

Eventbrite. But these are very uncommon occurrences. Generally speaking I mostly never have this problem!
overall: Overall: My overall experience with Eventbrite is a positive one. I prefer this app to others of its kind, and as the app continues to update I can tell that the development team is working hard to make their product one of a kind in terms of features, function, and convenience.

title: Eventbrite makes Event Management Easy
name: Christine L.
pros: Pros: Regardless of the type of event, being able to keep track of attendance and are able to plan for the number of attendees more easily.
cons: Cons: The fee per ticket for the paid plans is unfortunate but it's not terrible. Overall I'd have to say that's my least favorite part of the program, it is very helpful otherwise.
overall: Overall: Our office space is multipurpose and can be used for external events. Eventbrite helps us gauge the attendance of those events.

title: Love to use this for staff parties!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: There are many selections to choose from when using it FREE.
cons: Cons: The better quality selections are ones that cost.
overall: Overall: I have used this over the last 5 years for our annual events in our company. I love that I can use it free of charge, I can email everyone to invite them , and it will update me and track who has responded and who hasn't. I also like the feature that allows you to limit the number of guests they are allowed to bring with them, and can be set to zero if it is a staff only function.

title: Great Event Planning Tool!
name: Ashley W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: I would definitely use Eventbrite for a future event.
pros: Pros: The Event Brite tool was great when planning our office Anniversary party. The tool made it easy to create and invite, an event page, and track how many guests had RSVP'd. It also made it easy to send follow up Thank you cards for guests that were in attendance.
cons: Cons: Some guests called that would be attending instead of RSVP'ing on the event link and there wasnt a way to mark them down as RSVP'd on the guest list. I had to create an RSVP using my email for each individual that called to RSVP and then receive tons of emails from Eventbrite for each person on did a manual RSVP for. Other than that, the site worked perfectly for our event.

title: Easy to use online purchasing
name: Twila A.
comments: Comments: I have not used Eventbrite as a vendor, but I can only imagine that the app makes it easy for smaller event organizers to track attendees.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes it easy to purchase or reserve tickets to a variety of events - both big and small. I appreciate how smooth the transactions are and how predictable the website is.
cons: Cons: No real cons - although I do get the very occasional email from the company promoting events and/or their product.

title: Eventbrite - Become a Phenomenon
name: Brian Mller J.
pros: Pros: This software just connects everything needed. Build the event on one platform and share it, extend it to all imaginable platforms. The integrations level and functionality is stunning and well thought through.
cons:
Cons: Id be missing functions to drag and drop content to the standard editor. It has html but a more intuitive userinterface Id prefer . As well the ability to make different text styles in the newsletters and on site.

Possible an option for accepting cryptocurrencies in the future.
overall: Overall: Helps with overall marketing of our events. It saves enormous amount of time and to have everything from one platform to extend into the rest is really a great tool in hand.

title: Makes my event look very professional.
name: Omoyeni l.
pros: Pros: I have used Eventbrite in organizing everything from personal birthday parties ,to office get together , to high-school reunions etc All I do is upload an image, create my event information and bravo! I have got a beautiful event page which displays my event in a professional manner. The map feature is icing on the Cherry.
cons: Cons: I think my one reservation will be privacy . I once created a professional get together event ,and I had like five persons show up without being invited ,however they had tickets and we had to make do with them.I was very much displeased.

title: Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to create free or ticketed events and is able to track who comes and clicks on your event. You are able to edit add and make changes whenever needed. Very user friendly and easy to search for other events in the area.
cons: Cons: The service charge on the ticketing is a little high. Since most of the users using this software are small business owners, it doesn't make sense to charge such a high service fee.

title: Great for event management and custom events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's really easy to use and the ticket management features are really robust. Especially being able to manage waitlists, multiple ticket types, reimbursements, custom order forms, etc. all through the application.
cons: Cons: There's little customization on the eventbrite pages themselves and marketing integrations to be able to tie it more into a larger marketing campaign and plan.

title: Perfect for managing events
name: Tania G.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is free to use when you are organizing free events. This allows us to manage all our events without costs, therefore allowing us to offer free events. The interface is very easy to use and all the features are available in the free version. It also integrates well with Facebook and MailChimp so that I can create the event at one place and update everywhere else at the same time.
cons: Cons: There isn't much I don't like about Eventbrite. One small irritant is that I can't seem to find a nice summary of all orders - when asking for the orders report, the information is presented in a detailed way.
overall: Overall: We use Eventbrite to organize free monthly conferences and create Eventbrite events to invite our members and manage attendees.

title: Great for sharing events
name: Sofie D.
pros: Pros: Initially, I used Eventbrite to share an event, and it was a great help, in less than a day the event was sold out, it is a useful and effective way to let a potential partecipant to know about your activity. Creating events within the platform is very simple, you are guided step by step, and everything can be changed at any time, the general graphics greatly enhances the offers and opportunities available. It is a fantastic tool to discover some very cool event in any city.
cons: Cons: The only thing that I found problematic, is that not always Eventbrite gives you a feedback about the participation to an event, it might tell you that you can still purchase a ticket while they are already sold out, but it happened to me only one time out of many times.
overall: Overall: I got a lot of visibility for an even that I organized, and I also discovered and partecipated to a lot of great event in the city where I live.

title: Easy way to create events
name: Marta H.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is pretty user-friendly and allows you to easily create events. You can upload an event photo and easily promote your event on social media. The interface looks clean and professional.
cons: Cons: Because the interface is relatively simple and straightforward you are limited in some aspects. For example, you event title can't be too long and the event photo is cropped to certain dimension; so there are some limitations in customizing.
overall: Overall: The platform allows you to track your event progress. You can set ticket sale limits and see how many tickets are currently sold which is a nice feature.

title: Great tool for setting up events
name: Shivraj P.
pros: Pros: Easy to create events and schedule them for any events from personal to professional or community. It can be just less than 3 minute to finish creating events if your script is ready. Ease of payments for users to register for events
cons: Cons: Tool still needs more better look and feel to reflect quality. As a user I want to feel secure when using this tool and should not doubt the trust of security threat.

title: Great for Organizing Events
name: Taylor H.
comments: Comments: Great integrations with other softwares and robust features!
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes it easy to customize the kind of ticket you want to sell and have a lot of features and event/ticket classifications that allows each event to be very customized. There is an option to have the ticket fees billed directly to the customer or to have the fees pulled from the overall event sales.
cons: Cons: Sometimes is takes a while to find the customization or feature that you want for a specific ticket categorization but usually there is a solution to all needs.

title: Eventbrite
name: brianna s.
pros: Pros: Basically any big event will have tickets through Eventbrite. It's a huge site filled with any and all event you can think of. Buying tickets on there is safe and secure. You can download or print your tickets within minutes of purchasing which is nice.
cons: Cons: Getting ahold of customer service can take awhile which can be frustrating if you are in a time crunch.
overall: Overall: Can download your tickets pretty quick.

title: Eventbrite review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a great tool to circulate invites and formalize any event. We host networking events and happy hours often. Creating an Eventbrite page adds a sense of legitimacy to the event, and also helps organize attendance, invites, and overall scheduling.
cons: Cons: Occasionally there is some confusion by attendees who have never used Eventbrite before and they must sign up for an account or leverage the tool. Pretty user friendly - just a drawback of formalizing an event through a software like Eventbrite. Some people will have just preferred a direct email. Very small and negligible drawback we've found.
overall: Overall: Overall, Eventbrite provides organization and legitimacy around events small and large for both attendees and event organizers.

title: Eventbrite is EASY to use and a great way to get exposure for your events
name: Pamela S.
pros: Pros: Product is easy to use. Great way to get exposure for your events. Audience can easily see events that are local or search by interests. Includes ways to push out and promote on Social Media if you are not really SM savvy. Allows you to easily duplicate ongoing or similar events, which helps keep branding consistent. Nice looking event page.
cons: Cons: Difficulty (if not impossible) connecting Social Media accounts if you are a consultant or agency that manages multiple Social Media Accounts. Wish there were a few more categories from which to choose. Sometimes your event doesn't really fit into one of the categories that are offered. Also, the HTML editor seems a bit antiquated.

title: User friendly and intuitive event management software
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The tool allows users to register for an event and share their registration on social media. Eventbrite offers categories of details which could be provided to attendees - but many are optional.
cons: Cons: I do not like that there is a percentage of each registration charged to Eventbrite for paid registrations.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite has been instrumental in promoting events to the public and providing all of the details in one place.

title: Party planning made easy
name: SANDRA K.
pros: Pros: The easy way to not only invite guests to any and all events, but also to track responses. The ability to sell tickets and other functions makes this the most efficient and simple way to organize any type of event.
cons: Cons: Some people are old school and refuse to use this wonder that makes planning a snap.
overall: Overall: It's made tracking attendees especially for expending purposes simple.

title: NO HELP IN SIGHT!
name: Michael S.
pros: Pros: Nothing
cons: Cons: Tech Support, Customer Service
overall: Overall: If you are an event organizer for your own sanity use another provider. Eventbrite DOES NOT HAVE LIVE SUPPORT FOR EVENT ORGANIZERS ANYMORE. Yes they used to that is why I loves using them. Now I cant log in because eventbrite isnt recognizing the email and the only tech support they have is online which they only send automated messages. I described thouroghly how it's not recognizing the email and they send me an email back telling me how to reset my password. Then they say if this doesnt help respond I still need help so I do that and still, NOTHING! My event is live and I cant access or look at anything. It has been 2 days. I don't know what happened to eventbrite but SERIOUSLY CONSIDER OTHER PROVIDERS IF YOU ARE AN EVENT ORGANIZER. SAVE YOURSELF THE HEADACHE!!!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Hire employees. TERRIBLE service

title: Have purchased multiple tickets through eventbrite. Overall a good experience.
name: Casey D.
pros: Pros: It's ease of use. I also like that it is so well catered towards low budget events and that it has the capability to have tickets that are for free but still need to be kept track of.
cons: Cons: I find it looks very basic and a little bit boring. I would like something brighter and that gives a couple more options.
overall: Overall: Able to share the link of tickets and get much more traffic for low cost/free events that are for smaller organizations.

title: Eventbrite
name: Heather S.
pros: Pros: I have had to use Eventbrite on several occasions to reserve spots for upcoming continuing ed. I found it simple to use. I like that it doesn't require a lot of time to schedule these events.
cons: Cons: I don't know of anything I can say negatively about this software.
overall: Overall: I like that it is simple and quick to register for things. I don't like spending twenty minutes registering for something. This software makes the process easy and quick.

title: Create your event and they'll handle all the tickets hustle
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: It makes ticket booking for events very swift and easy. Allows paying for tickets online for events that didn't have that option.

Each ticket has a QR code which if scanned marks the attendance of its owner to the event and hence very easily created and organized database for attendees which saves time and makes organizers job much easier
cons: Cons: The percentage they cut from the price of each ticket as their profit is somewhat high so that results in a magnified price for the ticket which discourages some people to attend the event and pay that high price.
overall: Overall: I used it as an event maker and as an attendee of an event and as I mentioned they make the ticket booking process way smoother and easier but on the expense of a higher ticket price

title: Easy
name: Jennifer D.
pros: Pros: It's easy to get tickets emailed, add to wallet on Iphone, and just register for events in the area.
cons: Cons: I really do not have anything bad to say, I've had very good experiences with the app and events I have attended.
