cons: Cons: Does not allow ability to customize reminder emails before an event.
overall: Overall: The app is being used by many academic and non-academic bodies to organize events and enable people to register. It is the new RSVP form and ticketing app.

title: Best Event Managing Platform
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Outside of Facebook, there aren't a ton of options for event management and curation; that's where Eventbrite fills in that gap. I've used it for both personal and work purposes and Eventbrite is super easy to use and my favorite part is being able to roll-forward events and duplicate listings for re-occuring events.
cons: Cons: The basics are free, which is great, but it does cost money to add different types of tickets and in some situations quantity limits for those tickets. Instead of a fee by ticket sale, it would be nice to have a subscription based payment model as an option.

title: Great software for promoting and supporting events and meetings
name: James S.
comments: Comments: Great, we can promote meetings, ensure signups and payments and market events just as we need to.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, intuitive interface, has rapidly become the standard for tech events and meeting planning.
cons: Cons: Nothing negative to say about it, very easy to use.

title: Eventbrite makes it easy
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is great because it helps keep track of RSVPs in an orderly way, and is super easy to setup and use. The integration/sharing of the software with other platforms (like FB is great too).
cons: Cons: I'm not there is anything in particular that sticks out at this time..

title: Great tool for organizing and attending business or tech events
name: Silviu O.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has great exposure to the tech ecosystem. Lots of events are being posted through Eventbrite hence lots of choices for attendees and event organizers. Their registering system is seamless. Creating an event is also extremely easy.
cons:
Cons: Although free for free events, pricing can be a bit high for low priced tickets, hence you need to consider price when setting the overall price of the ticket.

The main page when searching for events on the web does not contain the filter option. You need to perform another action in order to get to filters.
overall: Overall: A great product, no major problems.

title: Eventbrite - Ease of Access
name: Catherine O.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a great way to get a survey of local concerts, social events, and other various occasions in your area. I enjoy using this site because it brings all of the information into one webpage so that you do not have to consult multiple websites before making a decision. It offers fast AND accurate information.
cons: Cons: Occasionally the site will list that events that turn out to be sold out when you try to check out and purchase the ticket. In addition, price changes are very frequent on this site. Be aware that prices may change even after you put an item in your cart.

title: Great website
name: Savanna G.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is so easy to look through and find things that are happening in your area. It is also so easy to post and event for the community to see.
cons: Cons: No cons Eventbrite is a great resource so get people together in a community.

title: Great program for events and concerts.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This program is great for posting and attending events throughout the country. Allows for payment and ticketing on any device.
cons: Cons: The interface and search functions can sometimes not show all events nearby and requires some manual searches to get to the right items sometimes.

title: Easy way to get tickets or plan event
name: Anthony G.
pros: Pros: It's pretty straightforward whether you are just looking to get tickets to an event or get admission handled for your own event. Takes the guess work out of one part of your planning. Also don't feel ripped off like I do when I have to go through Ticketmaster with all of the fees added on there.
cons: Cons: Thing I like least is that it isn't popular enough for the big events. Doesn't yet compete with Ticketmaster whom I hate.

title: Great way to search for events!
name: Lynn G.
pros: Pros: I just moved to a new city, and Eventbrite is a great tool to search for events happening in Detroit and the surrounding area. I use it to look for cultural events, and I also use it for work to see what tech events are coming up. Additionally, I like that they send me emails based on what I have currently searched or have attended. This helps me to know what is coming up on the calendar.
cons: Cons: It's UX and UI design is a little basic, and not the most pleasing to the eye. This is not a huge deal at all, but it's something Eventbrite could work on for the future.

title: Great event planning software
name: Pieter H.
pros: Pros: This software is useful for any event application. Easy to use and very intuituve. Extremely scaleable: you can plan out a personal event for free, or creat events for largd scale opperations. The software includes ticketing options as well, so it can be the single program you use to reach your audience , ticket them, and collect market demographics from your participants.
cons: Cons: Can get confusing with large scale operations, and while the ticketing software is useful, it is not the most glamorous; other operatios devoted completely to ticketing can be more effective.

title: It can get the job done in most cases
name: Peter B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: When starting off with simple events eventbrite is wonderful. If you don't have the technical know how to build your own registration website and database eventbrite is a great solution. Their infrastructure has allowed our events (both free and paid) to function quite well. Integration with mail chimp was also very useful
cons: Cons: The one size fits all approach that they have works for the most part, however when organizing an event with several tracks and different components and registration options it became quite cumbersome to set up and manage, and one envisioned portion of the event needed to be slightly changed as we could not figure out how to make registration for that component work (we ended up taking registrations in person at the event for that portion so it all worked out). I also feel that Their customer service could be more responsive
overall: Overall: It was definitely an asset to the organization of the event, despite the small bumps in the road

title: Simple, clear, and easy to understand
name: Jennifer T.
pros: Pros: I have used this a few times when scheduling meetings and classes for work. I have never had any issues with it, and i get my notifications instantly. It seems extremely easy and I like it.
cons: Cons: Nothing. It seems to be fantastic. I have yet to find a flaw with it.

title: Great for events - from grassroots to professional
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Very easy to incorporate everything you need about your event into one shareable link. Easy to include photos and link a location to the map. The interface is nice and simple. Very trusted platform, so users are not typically turned off by entering their info into this system.
cons: Cons: I have had difficulty with the payment feature. Refunding ticket sales is difficult. Not being able to receive payment until after the event ends is also limiting. You are limited to eventbrite's branding and it is difficult to change the layout to reflect your own company colors/marketing scheme.

title: Very Simple from a User Perspective
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Receiving and responding to events is super simple, for all levels of technological literacy. The events we respond to usually have well over 100 attendees and the response rates seem much higher than a traditional email RSVP.
cons: Cons: Emails can get lost in the shuffle, having the ability to invite through alternate means (i.e. through Slack or other IM services) could be useful for departments that utilize those services.

title: Makes event planning easy.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Planning and setting up events are easy using Eventbrite. It's easy to send the invite to multiple parties with ease.
cons: Cons: I've only used the software if I'm planning an event, which is a few times a year. I can honestly say I don't have anything negative feedback to provide.

title: Review Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The feature that was by far the most useful on Eventbrite was the capability of segmenting the target audience, I had participants and sponsors to accommodate with tickets and payments. It was extremely easy to keep track of all the orders and create promotional codes.
cons: Cons: I would say the least user-friendly feature I found in Eventbrite was that it wasn't that easy to collaborate with the rest of the team. I had given them access but it was not very intuitive as to how to work together.
overall: Overall: The best feature outweighed the least favorable feature, it made my life easy when managing the event.

title: Know who's coming (and not)
name: Suzette R.
pros: Pros: Great way to keep track (especially when space/seating is limited), knowing who is RSVP to events and so forth.
cons: Cons: I personally haven't found any draw back with this system
overall: Overall: We have only used Eventbrite and no other system - its super easy to set up, keep track and so forth...no switching here!

title: Poor customer service during actual events
name: Jessica H.
comments: Comments: We have closed our account after using them for sub par services for a few years. We are growing and its time to move on.
pros: Pros: We enjoyed using this platform because they do allow photo and video integration. They roped us in the first year we worked with them by assigning us a an actual representative, but that quickly changed.
cons: Cons: It feels choppy because each event has to stand alone. They don't necessarily link together as one large event if you are trying to build out separate events for each day or time. Horrible customer service over time. We finally started to pay for their equipment and they didn't answer their phones or emails during our event at all. They also sent equipment that is not compatible by most standards to modern day technology or building codes. They did not seem to care about the aftermath of losing money for our event.

title: Love it
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like the ease of use and the fact that it connects to my mobile phone and work calendars, so I always know that events I've signed up for
cons: Cons: No complaints! They do send a lot of marketing emails, but it's easy to unsubscribe

title: Must have for anyone who wants to make managing events easier.
name: Tony S.
pros: Pros: Very user-friendly. As a smaller company not a lot of time and effort is needed to make things look professionally done. Customizing things like the landing page gives you more ownership.
cons: Cons: Wish we could get more information that our company wants when they register for an event. The only other down fall is getting people of the hurtle of getting to the site and getting registered, if Eventbrite could only come up with a magical solution to make that easier.
overall: Overall: Overall for easy to learn and setup. Makes your events look very professional. Give this software no hesitation and get started with it today.

title: Talk about Easy
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use. Can go back and see what you have registered for in the past, check dates, and easily bring up on your phone or print out your ticket
cons: Cons: If you used different emails to register, you can not combine the 2 emails into one account. They must stay separate.

title: I breathe a sigh of relief when I see an event organiser has used Eventbrite
name: Sarah C.
pros: Pros: I save so much time when event organisers use Eventbrite. It's a relief just to login and not have to compete all my details every time I book in to attend something. The dashboard and email follow ups are handy too.
cons: Cons: I really can't think of anything at all!

title: I used both in business and personal life
name: Sandra A.
pros: Pros: You can create, promote and send off invitations to hundreds of people with one simple click. If your event is free they do not charge for the service-which is also a major plus! They have a lot of wonderful templates that you can use to add a little flair to your flyer
cons: Cons: As mentioned in my title, I used this for both business and personal and lets just say a lot of business professionals were invited to my a baby shower. I was able to rescind the invitations but took a little bit of time separating my business and personal contact. I would recommend creating to accounts so it separates your contacts.
overall: Overall: Evenbrite helped create and mail off flyer for an event my company was having, best part about it, since the event was free, we did not have to pay for it.

title: Event Planning made easy
name: Rozario S.
pros: Pros: quick and efficient event planning especially for someone who is on the go and doesn't have the time to make and send out invitations
cons: Cons: There is not much to not like about this service. unless you are not tech Savy or are catering to people who are not tech savy

title: Great tool as an event attendee or host
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: The user-facing website and app offers a great user experience, making it a good choice for hosting an event through Eventbrite.

It's great to be able to set up a free event if you have no entry fee.
cons: Cons: It'd be nice to have a lower price option for events with a lower cost of entry.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite has been the choice of service chosen between colleges for hosting (and attending) game development industry events. It simply works and is great to use.

title: Easy Way For Our Team To Promote Events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: - Basically creates a landing page for us without having to communicate (and pay) for our web development team to make one - Visually appealing - Pushes onto a strong event searching pool - Built-in analytics dashboard very useful for quick insights on event campaigns
cons: Cons: - Landing pages it creates is fairly generic (looks like any other Eventbrite landing page) - Revenue payment is delayed for us until post-event, leaving us a bit stranded at times for cash - Customization of page difficult without extensive coding knowledge

title: A customized event planning platform
name: Manish T.
pros: Pros: mobile friendly Customized as per user requirements great collaboration with google maps and social accounts
cons: Cons: Site crashes multiple times because of load non responsive customer service issues with refund of the tickets

title: Useful for limited invite events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: My school uses this for events where the attendance is limited. This is a great way to get RSVPs that can be rescinded and given to others if the original person is unable to attend. Email reminders are a great feature.
cons: Cons: The sign up generally signs me up for marketing emails which can be annoying. It's hard to tell if I am unsubscribing from the marketing emails or all communications such as my reminders.

title: Great app!
name: Brian A.
pros: Pros: This app is great, mobile and web both. I have not created any events but I have RSVPed to a number of events. It is also great way to find things to do.
cons: Cons: I honestly I cannot think of any negatives. I have never had issues with RSVPing or getting to an event that takes eventbrite.

title: Excellent App for Keeping track of whats going around you
name: Khurram M.
pros: Pros: This app/software allows staying connected with the world. I've used it to book formal events, events related to the university, cultural events and many more.
cons: Cons: The is very less to dislike about this app/software.

title: Easy to Use for Anyone
name: Nathan S.
pros: Pros: I've mainly used this product to sign up for events, and everytime I do, it works smoothly.
cons: Cons: The only questions I've had with this product have come from the lack of clarity of information from those who set up events-----the product itself is clean and clear.

title: Eventbrite is overall an awesome company
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is super sleek and easy to use. I love their marketing emails and what they do as a company.
cons: Cons: No cons to using Eventbrite. One of the better companies out there managing events and making it easy for everyone to use.

title: Great App
name: Sai P.
pros: Pros: Let's you purchase tickets for almost anything. I purchased tickets many times here starting from meet ups to conferences.
cons: Cons: The fees is higher some cases. Other than that the the website works perfect in all cases. Pls look into the pricing.

title: Easiest way to manage your events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I've been an early adopter and I love how over the years, the app gained many new features but was able to retain its ease of use for everyone. It's such a powerful tool, invaluable for anyone who has to organize and manage any events - from birthday parties to big conferences. The search and browsing features are definitely the things that sets this app apart from competitors.
cons: Cons: Sometimes pages are so crowded with information that it might become hard to scan and process them - a little redesign and small improvements in the UI could definitely help.

title: Great Way to Coordinate and Manage Events
name: Andrew C.
pros: Pros: The ability to allow consumers to purchase tickets online to an event has given our Non-Profit Organization that I volunteer for a great way to manage attendees and track attendance as well as their payments.
cons: Cons: The fees for the transfer of funds to our account was a bit high, but for a convenience factor we chose to utilize Eventbrite for all advance purchases. I do know that Eventbrite has a pay at the door feature where I can track that they paid, but since we did not purchase the Card Reader from Eventbrite we could not connect the Square reader we had already.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is very easy to use. The best feature I find in it is its integration into emails. Provides features like asking queries to your guests, which helps me get to know the target audience even better.
cons: Cons: The interface could be more self explanatory especially when creating discounts or custom fields. Perhaps adding help boxes for these features could save the user from navigating to other pages for more information.
overall: Overall: Overall, Evenbrite is a very helpful application for creating and managing events. I would recommend this software to my colleagues.

title: Events that sell
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I host events at least once a quarter and search for events to attend every month. It is the only platform I use to track sales for my event, process payments, and widely invite past attendees to my event. It has articles that guide you on how to better market and sell tickets. The communication tools are excellent.
cons: Cons: I don't like that you can't get a payout every week; the final payout is on the same schedule as the others, and I can't collect the final payout after the event immediately ends.
overall: Overall: I LOVE Eventbrite and it has helped to optimize my events; the data collection process is excellent; it builds a contact lead of people who've attended your event in the past, so it's easy to keep track of your audience. The email list has driven at least 75% of my leads.

title: Good for ticket management.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: What I like most about Eventbrite is that you can add your tickets to your iPhone wallet, making them really quick and easy to access.
cons: Cons: In the app, the loading screen can be a bit long, but this is a minor issue.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Tiffany F.
pros: Pros: It is simple to set up events. I love that the mobile app contains the event tickets. It is user friendly for purchasing tickets to an event. Guests to my events have commented on how much they love using Eventbrite.
cons: Cons: The transaction fee is a bit steep, according to individuals who have purchased event tickets from our organization. That leaves us with finding a way to build that into our ticket pricing.

title: Eventbrite is cool
name: LaMar W.
pros: Pros: The interface is clean and very easy to use.
cons: Cons: The only thing that I find that's a little trying at times is the finding reports. Sometimes its tedious locating the right sales reports.
overall: Overall: My overall experience with Eventbrite is very good. Collecting Data from sales is the best.

title: Industry standard event ticketing software is great, just pricier than others.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite manages events and ticketing very well! It seamlessly collects money, and has options for ways to do that.
cons: Cons: It's pricier than other similar event and ticketing software that works just as well and fits my social values better. Other than that, it's great.

title: Easy to use and duplicate events
name: Espree D.
comments: Comments: Use it multiple times a month
pros: Pros: set up is fast and you can have free or paid events. I like that you can see the organizer and contact them.
cons: Cons: Better design. Would love a sexier looking page. It's hard to design in HTML and can be clunky at times

title: Super simple ticketing system for event organisers
name: Danielle O.
pros:
Pros: - Really easy for event organisers to setup.

- Option to integrate with other platforms including Facebook and MailChimp.

- Simple option for promo/discount codes for specific customers/users.
cons: Cons: Really struggling for a con here - I love it!

title: Complete Event management package
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: So it takes only 2 minutes to setup a profile, schedule an event or purchase tickets to an event. The e tickets can be saved in my mobile. It is very user friendly product and very helpful for small to medium organisations who either with to arrange an event or attend an event.
cons: Cons: I didn't come across any such cons of the product, however for the first time users, it can be tricky.
overall: Overall: It has helped my organisation in making a database of the event attendees. The number of people invited and the actual number of footfalls can be easily tracked which turns out to be a very helpful tool for future events

title: Great software
name: Jay D.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, useful for event check-in and RSVP's for nonprofit fundraising for both small and large scale events.
cons: Cons: I honestly love this software, so I can't think of any cons for my use (nonprofit event organizing).

title: Eventbrite
name: Daniel T.
pros: Pros: I like how easy it is to use, and you can use your phone to get into the event. A lot of events are using Eventbrite now.
cons: Cons: Sometimes searching on Eventbrite can be tough. Or, sometimes the titles of events can be different than just saying where the event is (bars).

title: Great Software
name: Tacita H.
pros: Pros: This software is great for booking events, such as concerts, parties, etc. it's easy to use and it's great whenever your on the go.
cons: Cons: There is nothing lease I like about this software.
overall: Overall: Overall experience is great.

title: A solid event platform with good integration capabilities.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This software is really quite simple to use, most features are very straightforward. The software integrates well with other platforms which is very useful when you have a large campaign that utilizes many different platforms.
cons: Cons: I've run into issues on several occasions when trying to schedule repeat events, or to copy an event to create a similar event. When copying events or creating recurring events the software is not as straightforward as with one time events. Integration can also get sloppy when creating a recurring event/copying an existing event to use a base for a new events.
overall: Overall: Our events were able to be posted to our website automatically, and we have been able to integrate our eventbrite events into our email campaigns through other platforms.

title: An easy way to look professional while letting them do all the work
name: Josh S.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite give me the ability to create an event for my church, with a professional design and themed branding, gathers an rsvp list that allows me to know how many are coming, what they are bringing, and how I should plan to accommodate the guests. It is like taking Facebook events to the next level. It also has full integration with Facebook and other outlets.
cons: Cons: They do take a small percentage of sales is you are selling your tickets to your events. That is probably a given since they do need to make so money as well. Since I use it for mostly free events for my church it comes in quite handy and there do not require a payment for that.
overall: Overall: This has made event sign up for my church a breeze to keep everyone organized, and to help us be able to plan for the event.

title: The Perfect Events Program
name: Travis O.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use for creating and customizing attractive, eye-catching pages for upcoming events. It's also very easy to track sign ups and message attendees.
cons: Cons: We don't have any complaints about Eventbrite; it does exactly what we need it to do.
overall: Overall: We use Eventbrite constantly for events and workshops. It's easy to create an event and make it look great with customizable text and pictures. It's also easy to see info on people who sign up for events and message them if needed. Eventbrite makes creating online event pages very easy and everyone has heard of Eventbrite, so it's a trusted, well-known website for people looking for local events.

title: Eventbright-Herotage
name: Ellen E.
pros: Pros: We use this program at Heritage Chirch for large events at Church. We were able to put an app on our phone to order tickets for special events
cons: Cons: I don't have any cons. This app was very easy to use and loved I could put application on my phone

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Alicia D.
pros: Pros: I'm able to find the great events within my city or borough. Navigating through the system is seamless
cons: Cons: I honestly have not experienced any cons with using this app. Navigating through the system is seamless

title: Great platform for events!
name: Kelly W.
pros: Pros: This software was incredibly user friendly. It offered many options for me to host my event through. Doing ticket sales was very easy to set up and follow through. It was so convenient to take payments and keep everything organized leading up to the event.
cons: Cons: It does cost for every ticket sale. You can choose to cover this fee yourself or wrap it up into the ticket prices. It's not a huge amount, but if you are hosting a charity or a low guest count event where you want to keep costs low, this may not be your first choice due to the cost to use it.

title: Know the events happening nearby.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's the best app that is helping us to know the events happening nearby (or we can search by any cities). I can create a new event and manage it very easily with eventbrite. And an integrated purchasing ticket for events is really great feature I enjoys.
cons: Cons: It will be better if we can know how many spots are available for an event while searching for an event. Or while purchasing the event ticket.
overall: Overall: The best app/software product available for get information about events happening nearby. Eventbrite made it easier to get a spot ready there.

title: The Best!
name: Briana H.
pros: Pros: I love using EventBrite, whether I'm sending an invite or I'm using it to sign up for another persons event. It's easy to use and sends you a calendar invite after signing up for an event.
cons: Cons: I haven't had any bad experience using EventBrite

title: Eventbrite has become the gold standard for invitations and events
name: Ashley M.
pros: Pros: EventBrite was easy to use for both the users setting up the event, as well as the invitees who are getting the invitations to respond to (RSVP). Eventbrite is a great product, and dominant in the marketplace. If there is an alternative that works as good as Eventbrite, I am unaware of that or those products.
cons:
Cons: There was nothing that I did not like.

Product is affordable (often free)

Product is accessible

Product is easy to use

Product is intuitive

Product is well designed.
overall: Overall: I have been using Eventbrite for all invitation needs for several years now, and I love it.

title: Super efficient!
name: Adele L.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is very easy to use, both for the organisation setting up an event and for the attendees registering their attendance. It is straight forward and all the options I need are there.
cons: Cons: Nothing to be honest. Shame I don't have more opportunities to use it!

title: Great for invitations
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It is easy to use and doesn't involve the download of a separate piece of software for the user who receive tickets
cons: Cons: I have not come across any. It has always been easy for me to access my tickets and print off the day of the event
overall: Overall: Great ticket platform

title: Great way to create Job Fairs
name: Janette R.
comments: Comments: We started to use this as a way to advertise an onsite job fair, it was a great way to drive traffic to our career website and allow for us to get people pre registered (then we could remind them about the job fair)
pros: Pros: We use this as a way to create searchable job fairs for our company. I love how easy it is, how far reaching the target market can be and how much it can help us bring in candidates
cons: Cons: I'm not sure how much their website is scrubbed by other websites, and I'm not sure what they could do about it. Maybe form partnerships with other hiring entities? Worksource? Chamber of Commerce?

title: Great product
name: Erica S.
pros: Pros: This product is very simple and easy to use for any type of event. It also is compatible to other software (ex. Crowdrise) which is helpful when hosting fundraising events.
cons: Cons: This product is really good for the value - no upfront costs.

title: Must have app for events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Great way to search and find something to be involved in whether its a conference, weekend party, or concert.
cons: Cons: Wish the app didn't take an additional fee on top of the ticket price but that's standard

title: Works Very Nicely
name: Ernie Z.
pros: Pros: I have used Eventbrite when signing up for certain events and it seems like it works awesome. Certain times when redirected from a website to another page like that can feel clunky, but Eventbrite doesn't feel that way to me at all.
cons: Cons: I guess the extra fees that you get charged would be my only con, but still I also totally understand it!
overall: Overall: Overall it feels well thought out and clear/easy to use.

title: Great event scheduling app that works
name: Samantha T.
pros: Pros: It's simple, and the best part is that it can be easily integrated with our Wordpress website.
cons: Cons: The only part I don't like is that it takes a % off + a fixed fee so it's quite a lot when you add them all up. Fixed price would have been ideal.

title: with eventbrite our forum grows each event
name: DANIEL G.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
comments: Comments: work with the eventbrite tool is a good experience, easy to use and give you a lot of corporation image
pros: Pros: i can provisioned the right amount of money for my event, cause i know with a lot of exactitud how many people will came to my event
cons: Cons: the price to use this kind of tool is very high here in mexico, everything we have to multiple by 20

title: Wide reach, calendar integration, good features
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: Ability to change, limit, keep track of attendees.

Well recognized.

Calendar integration.

Map included
cons:
Cons: Not as easy to use as I would hope.

Map wasn't always as accurate as I had hoped.

Room for more customization on invites would be nice.

title: Great for buying tickets for events
name: Michele F.
pros: Pros: I like that it tells you all the event info in one place and allows you to get tickets on site
cons: Cons: sometimes events get lost because you have to search by location and cannot simply search by event theme

title: Pretty good app
name: Annaliese S.
pros: Pros: I like that people can buy tickets to events easily with this app.
cons: Cons: The fees associated with using this app that is put on the customer. There are service fees, but I guess that is how eventbrite makes their money.
overall: Overall: My overall experience is positive.

title: Great way to sign up for and track conferences and events
name: Chris L.
pros: Pros: Excellent app which allows me to register for and track my attendance at a range of conferences, forums and events
cons: Cons: I would like Eventbrite to proactively alert me to events in my local area which it thinks I may be interested in attending

title: Easy to sell tickets without hassle
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: For a small company like mine, we can sell tickets to our events without the hassle of having to keep track of them all ourselves.
cons: Cons: Can't think of anything. Maybe the fees?
overall: Overall: Eventbrite makes events easier for small businesses and artists. Highly recommended!

title: Well Organized Software
name: Coach Kelley P.
pros: Pros: The one thing I love most about Eventbrite is that I can have my payments go directy to Paypal
cons: Cons: The one thing I do not like about Eventbriet is that they do not take their fees before paying out your money and yu wind up left with a bill.

title: Easy to organize and attend events in your local area!
name: John W.
pros:
Pros: Very easy to set up and run events for community groups and businesses.

Extremely friendly user experience for the customer.
cons: Cons: As an organizer and event customer no major cons. It's the go-to event planner for coordinators and customers.

title: Easy solution for digital tickets!
name: Rey W.
pros: Pros: We often did our events offline, but with Eventbrite it was easy to sell online tickets which resulted in even more ticket purchases. It's very easy for our customers to purchase tickets without having to meet us in person!
cons: Cons: The fees are a little on the high side. We don't really mind paying for it though, since we may have not got those ticket sales otherwise. Just know that going in!

title: Review of Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is super easy to use and I love how it always has recommendations for similar events.
cons: Cons: I think it should offer discount codes for frequent users.
overall: Overall: I always find more events that I am interested in.

title: So simple to register for events, free or otherwise
name: Stuart E.
pros: Pros: The Eventbrite webpage/event portal is very clean and easy to navigate and manage.
cons: Cons: A bit more customization in terms of event page appearance would be nice.

title: 123 Invite
name: Blandina F.
pros: Pros: What I love the most about Eventbrite, is that I am able to create an event and easily invite the people I want to attend. It is super easy and helps me organize my events. Eventbrite saves the hassle of printing tickets and now you are able to download your ticket on your phone and have it on you whenever you attend an event.
cons: Cons: All has been good with using Eventbrite! I love it!
overall: Overall: Using Eventbrite, I have been able to create an event online, which is now the most easiest way to get a reply! Even accepting an invite through the internet has been simple by just a click.

title: Great way to create and manage events
name: Kristen Z.
pros: Pros: I use eventbrite to create and manage events for my company. Its easy to set up events, create a Facebook event page and add the event to my website.
cons: Cons: The fees are a little expensive. Although it does give you the option to absorb the fee or pass it onto the customer it affects your pricing.
overall: Overall: Overall Eventbrite has made it really easy to create and manage events

title: Eventbrite for school events
name: Joleen K.
pros: Pros: I like the formatting and ease of use. It is easy to set up an event and provide the goer all the information they need (even payment options) all in one place. This is like a higher quality e-vite. It keeps track of who responded, counts your total coming and declined. It provides the goer a ticket to print off if needed. I also like that it sends reminders to patrons.
cons: Cons: At this time I have not had any issues with the software.
overall: Overall: I really enjoy Eventbrite. I usually print my ticket out and it gives me all the information I need to get to my event.

title: Easy to use, reasonable fees
name: Samantha P.
pros: Pros: It's great for a small organization with a small budget that only runs a few events per year. Easy to set up and manage events, plus payout is accurate and on time.
cons: Cons: Fees have been increasing over recent years but still reasonable

title: Amazing way to track guest lists
name: diandra d.
pros: Pros: Honestly, this is an incredible software for tracking your event. Not only can you see the guest list with ease, but you can promote, create, track, etc all for free. It's very straightforward and an incredible software for both minimal and more complex events. There is also software that allows for creating events with different price points; and as a bonus you can follow up with users when you recreate the event the following year. This saves on a lot of advertising costs.
cons: Cons: Settings were sometimes hard to find, and customer service was not there to support or guide you when you were lost. I think if you aren't computer savvy, you may want to find a more simple program.

title: Great way to get people to your event
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I really enjoy how user friendly this application is and how easy it is to quantify the amount of people expected
cons: Cons: There isn't much I dislike, but if I had to pick something it would be the amount of pictures to showcase the event

title: Great for what we use it for!
name: Alisha B.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, easy to communicate with customer support, reliable company to do business with
cons: Cons: We don't currently have any issues with Eventbrite.
overall: Overall: We use eventbrite to sell concert and event tickets. They're the best in the market; very easy to work with.

title: Useful For What It Is
name: John W.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a useful tool because people know how to use it, they are familiar with it, and it's user-friendly. We have used it to list a few events and have gotten OK results.
cons: Cons: Although I am not usually worried too much about design, there weren't too many ways to customize things on the back end. Of course they also take a cut of the profits although the fees were reasonable.

title: Eventbrite is fast becoming the leading event platform for small and big events
name: Jared L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Simplicity. It's very easy to either manage/setup your own event registration online or register for an event through the platform. I first discovered Eventbrite as a regular user and was impressed with the ease of finding events that I was interested in and that were close to my area. Registration pages look professional with plenty of customization options and payment processing/confirmation is error-free. The platform is being used by so many other companies that your event has a higher chance of being noticed just through discovery of similar events. I also really like how you can embed a checkout on your own website.
cons: Cons: Rarely some results were not as relevant as I'd like them to be as a regular user browsing through events.
overall: Overall: Very happy with the ease of use of creating events and the analytics are superb. Eventbrite has everything you could possibly need for hosting and promoting an event.

title: Easy to use and share
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The software is so intuitive and easy to use. I like the connectivity between Eventbrite and Facebook Events, so I can easily incorporate it into the pages I manage. The brand itself is well-known so I know my customers feel safe and comfortable using the platform.
cons: Cons: The initial user interface is a bit clunky. Logging in and navigating to your own events could be more streamlined. The landing pages are set up for new users only and not current users.
overall: Overall: Easy-to-use software to create and manage events and sell tickets.

title: Definitely use this!
name: Hannah L.
pros: Pros: Very easy to set up any event and invite all your friends! The RSVP list makes planning easy and fun!
cons: Cons: Haven't really run into any come to be honest. I've had only positive experience and can't think of something negative to say.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Shanggeetha C.
pros:
Pros: Used this app and its easy to use.

I have attended multiple events using Eventbrite free and paid events

Notification on the events are made easy for the users

Best software for conducting and informing people with free and paid events with filters
cons: Cons: Can give promotions or offers for paid events to bring more people using this software.

title: Eventbrite Rocks
name: Deniecea P.
pros: Pros: I liked that when you purchase tickets they can be sent to your email.
cons: Cons: That there were limited concerts in my city.
overall: Overall: I love going to concerts and dont have time to go to the box office. It makes it easier to purchase tickets without the hassle of a box office.

title: Great Product
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is an excellent product for everything event driven at your business. Be it 1-off employee events or larger client-driven conferences and opportunities, Eventbrite is an awesome tool to cover the majority of your needs.
cons: Cons: I don't like eventbrite for strictly event-driven products, because the company doesn't own a lot of key company information. But it is amazing for getting up off the ground or for 1-off things.

title: Good option for Event Registration
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to create registration forms, including multiple ticket types, custom questions, and allow for multiple tickets per order.
cons: Cons: Some of the customization is missing that I've seen with other software.
overall: Overall: We've only done free registration events, so I can't speak to the paid ticketing, but it does a good job of taking registrations. As long as you aren't in need of extensive customization over every little thing, it does a good job.

title: Wonderful event discovery tool!
name: Corissa H.
pros: Pros: I've used EventBrite a few times to find events going on around me and really enjoyed those events. It was simple to use and easy to find events!
cons: Cons: In the times I've used EventBrite, I haven't found any issues with the product.

title: Great service for finding events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I find that Eventbrite is a great resource for finding events. It's comprehensive and easy to sign up.
cons: Cons: I dislike the fees they charge. I know it's inevitable but regardless it's a hassle.

title: Eventbrite
name: Luis C.
comments: Comments: I used it to book some purchases My company uses it to plan general meetings
pros: Pros: To make sure and remember future events To book the new event
cons: Cons: Sometimes, when there is more than one event in the main event, is not possible to manage them clearly

title: Eventbrite always!
name: Heather M.
pros: Pros: I love that event Brite reminds me of my events multiple times after purchase. It immediately adds to my calendar and makes it easy for reference through my inbox.
cons: Cons: I haven't found any negatives from using event Brite.

title: No more forgetting about that Christmas party!
name: Rebecca G.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes it easy to attend lots of interesting (and sometimes free!) events that address things you like to do. I've personally learned about coding events and other niche topics that I wouldn't have found without the site.
cons: Cons: Sometimes I've had the site's automatic calendar feature be a bit buggy in how it integrates with Google (that is, adding the wrong time zone or event duration). This might be something on the organizer's end however and isn't a huge deterrent to using the software.
overall:
Overall: I would recommend using Eventbrite to anyone who finds their events schedule a bit overwhelming. The site consolidates your tickets until you need them, and gives you helpful reminders so that something important

doesn't slip under the radar.

title: Great scheduling software
name: Isaac F.
pros: Pros: I like most about this software is I don't have to use outlook!
cons: Cons: The email response you get is pretty general and a bit blah.
overall: Overall: We occasionally use this to schedule appointments rather than using outlook and find it to be an easy way of getting things done.

title: Event Management Made Easy
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes it easy for individuals and companies to create events and manage all aspects of them all under one platform. Creating an event page, selling tickets, sending updates, collecting emails, and keeping your customers updated are just a few of the main features offered by Eventbrite.
cons: Cons: Customer service could definitely be better. Takes a while to hear back.

title: Great Way to Organize Event Planning
name: Angelise S.
pros: Pros: I am able to create festive-looking events, send out invitations, and get responses with much ease. I am able to hide guests if need-be so as not to discourage others from coming. I love that I am able to get responses (RSVPs) quickly using this product.
cons: Cons: Sometimes when finding my own photos after an event which I post to this app can get a little tricky. I have to remember to click on the correct link to take me back to the photos I posted.
overall: Overall: Overall, this is a great product. It makes event planning much easier and managing guests, etc easy as well.

title: very useful application and very informative
name: Mahmud J.
pros: Pros: I had a wonderful experience with it to know all events happening around me in the field of my interest
cons: Cons: it is a great tool i actually love it, and hope they improve it more and more

title: Easy to use
name: Stephen W.
pros: Pros: Very easy to set up and use. Free events mean no cost to you or your events. It is very accepted out in the community.
cons: Cons: Embedding it into web sites can be awkward. Minor changes in the web page can break how it works for you.

title: Used Eventbrite to create and sell tickets to several events and then track sales info
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I found the program to be intuitive and easy to learn. I was worried that I or other luddites on our team might struggle with it but there was no struggle. Everyone enjoyed and appreciated the ease of the program.
cons: Cons: I was a little intimidated by the system that helps to tailor to the audience you want but was able to use it fairly easily along with everything else. This was new work for me so a lot of the hesitancy was me, not the program.
overall: Overall: The creation and management for tickets for events as well as sales.

title: Perfect for ticketing events!
name: Chris C.
pros: Pros: This tool allows you to easily set up an event, collect payments and provide a list of individuals for your doorman.
cons: Cons: Could be a little more robust in terms of functionality
overall: Overall: Overall, this tool has been excellent for smaller use needs!

title: Great Software For Any Event
name: Grace L.
pros: Pros: I love the analytics section of the software. Once the event ends, we can see when people bought the tickets and the quantity. This is great for event planning for the future. We can anticipate how long it will take for people to purchase tickets so we can give people ample time.
cons: Cons: The fees are slightly high (especially if our ticket sales are in the thousands of dollar range, we end up spending hundreds+ on fees) but it does not deter us from using the software too much.
overall: Overall: General experience is very good. We can use eventbrite for a variety of events (courses, webinars, fundraisers and other social events). It's great for tracking who is attending/participating in the event and it is great for tracking the fiscal portion of the event.

title: Our favorite event resource.
name: Dayton H.
pros: Pros: This is the primary software we use for event registration. Its great! Easy-to-use and trusted by most people. We love it.
cons: Cons: One occasion, the software glitches and seems to lose registrations. VERY VER VERY RARE though!

title: Events made easy.
name: Kevin B.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has always been an easy way to purchase or plan events with ticket sales. Nice UX and great support.
cons: Cons: Hard to find larger event tickets on the platform. Other than that, it's a great way to buy and sell tickets!

title: Easy way to organize/manage events
name: Chhavi B.
pros: Pros: Mobile app is great. Easy to use and intuitive. Easy to organize small meetups too. You can charge for events.
cons: Cons: No issues with the product. I really like it. It's easy to use. Maybe make it easy to to share event invite link.

title: Great tool
name: MONIQUE P.
comments: Comments: It serves us well when setting up corporate and personal events allowing directions content and itinerary info to those invited
pros: Pros: Being able to share event information to a vast amount of people
cons: Cons: Having to go into separate tabs in order to view info

title: Makes event planning easier
name: Jenna I.
pros: Pros: I love how easy this product makes tracking attendees and it sends reminders automatically!
cons: Cons: The UX design is a little bit cluttered, but that's my only complaint.
overall: Overall: Overall, this is a great product to use if you're planning an event!

title: Great tools as administrator and user
name: Lisa K.
pros: Pros: You do not have to track who did RSVP or not You can ask participants to contribute the event User friendly
cons: Cons: I have not encountered anything bad with this system. I use this as a user as well but I do like the simple set up.

title: A great way to collect and distribute tickets for events, small to large.
name: Brent P.
comments: Comments: Generally a great platform for event managers. Definitely an innovative way to sell and manage tickets.
pros: Pros: I've used Eventbrite for events with sales and it works very well. Eventbrite is generally well known and people are comfortable purchasing large tickets through the platform. Fees are reasonable. Lots of options and configurability.
cons: Cons: Design UI could be a little more user-friendly, but it's not bad. If you're a marketer or experience at all in design, it's no problem, but might potentially be a challenge for a first time user with no experience elsewhere.

title: Great for finding and planning events.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Very easy to create an event and find events. Easy payment system and there is the ability to make an event private.
cons: Cons: The refund process can be tedious is refunds are allowed.

title: Good way to get new clients!
name: Christopher L.
comments: Comments: Great experience and highly recommend!
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is very easy to use and a good way to make your business better known and to offer folks around you to attend an event that you are having. We have had several seminars on stem cells and it has brought us a lot of new clients interested bin learning more about our product and more importantly our business as a whole.
cons: Cons: Have not witnessed anything that I do not like at this point. Maybe the cost is a little steep but that is offset with the new clients we get in the door.

title: Easy to use!
name: Olivia K.
pros: Pros: What I liked most about this software is it is extremely easy to navigate.
cons: Cons: One thing about this software is that it seemed to lag each time I clicked on a link, but that may have just been my internet connection.

title: I would and I have recommended Eventbrite to others!
name: David and Kylie K.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite allows you an easy solution to hosting an event with a classy and seamless appearance
cons: Cons: The only downside to Eventbrite is the slight learning curve especially when bringing new people to use the system.

title: Great Ticketing System
name: Kirstie S.
pros: Pros: I love the way you can easily load events and manage the back end of your account.
cons: Cons: Trying hard to think of something to write, as there is not much to add to this great software.
overall: Overall: Its a great platform to use for both paid and ticketed events.

title: Perfect for Organizing Company Functions
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It does exactly what I need, which is creating an event for company functions. Managing invites, sending out reminders is a breeze.
cons: Cons: Nothing in particular as we only use it occasional and it does what we need.

title: Eventbrite
name: Justin Y.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is very easy to search for tickets. All I had to do was put in the search box what I wanted and it was there. I like that there are three columns for a search: Event, City or place and Date. This allows the search to be very specific. As a bonus there are categories underneath for specific searches such as free popular events, family time and many more. I like this feature because it allows me to discover tickets for something I might not have thought of. The layout is very easy to use and see. The front has a good mix of colors. All in all I find Eventbrite to be an A+ software.
cons: Cons: It's hard for me to ind anything wrong with this software. Everything responds well. I have no complaints on this software.
overall: Overall: I found this product is very easy to search for and use. I use it personally as well as for professional reasons.

title: Event Brite review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's an easy set up, practically done for you. It's connected to all the social media outlets which help boost my events
cons: Cons: The upgrade feature is such a hassle, in the past all of the features were listed up front.

title: Making events easy!
name: Hannah H.
comments: Comments: It's a great tool to use! I've used for multiple events!
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is well known in the community which helps because majority of your customers will have interacted with the platform previously! It is very simple to set up and easy to manage. If you aren't setting up or hosting an event, it is very easy to use to purchase tickets to a community event or function.
cons: Cons: The percentage they take for ticket sales is on the higher side. Also, when getting ready for registration or check in, it isn't the easiest thing to figure it.

title: Quick event set-up
name: Cynthia A.
pros: Pros: I use Eventbrite to take registrations. The set-up is quick and the integration with our merchant account was very easy.
cons: Cons: Reporting can be an issue as registrant info can't always be sorted the way you want.

title: Great Way to Manage an Event
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a great way to manage invitations for professional events. It's a lot easier than having a dedicated person in your office try to manage all the invitees to your event.
cons: Cons: Not everyone that was invited had an Eventbrite account, but the accounts were easy to set up and eventually everyone got on the same page.

title: Love Eventbrite
name: Melanie V.
pros: Pros: It's so simple and easy to use! A great tool to coordinate events!
cons: Cons: Not all people know about the platform. It hard to make them go to the website and register.
overall: Overall: I give to the Eventbrite Team a high five! Excellent work!

title: Good tool for events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that events are easy to set up with Eventbrite. Almost everything you need to create, market, promote, and share your event is already built-in for your use. Even people who don't often organise events can grasp it easily with this tool.
cons: Cons: Whenever I go back to the landing page, I find that it takes too long for me to go to the events I'm managing. There's barely any use for me to go to Eventbrite's home page and not see the things I'm going there for as an administrator.

title: It's easy to plan for and mount an event using Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: How much easier can organizing an event be, aside from buying tickets to other events apart from my own.
cons: Cons: I'm looking for it to be integrated into other messaging platforms for more ease of communication. Maybe a few bugs here and there.
overall: Overall: What's there to debate when this software just does whatever it's tasked to do - which is to help you plan, organize, and execute till the event is successfully done.

title: Easy, Straightforward Ticket Management!
name: Nag D.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has really straight forward pricing, free events are free events and paid have a percentage. There is not guess work, no unneeded add-ons that complicate the process. I also like the built in communication with event goers. I don't have to worry if I missed an email or ticket follow up.
cons: Cons: Hopefully in the future eventbrite could possibly give users the ability to customize pages just a little bit more.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite just gets the job done. It's has to be one of the easiest event sales/management systems out there.

title: A breeze to use
name: Jennifer B.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is so customizable for any type of event.
cons: Cons: Nothing really. I didn't have any problems or issues using it.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite was simple to set up and make our event live. It was very user friendly and took care of payments too.

title: Awesome tool to manage registrations for events
name: David S.
pros: Pros: I liked the UX/UI experience for users the most. Eventbrite makes it super easy to manage events and also for users to signup and register to attend events. This makes the organization process much nicer to manage the registration process for events.
cons: Cons: Can't really say there was a big con. But, I guess Eventbrite pushes users to organize their event through their website instead of pushing users to white label and have users signup through their own website for the event.
overall: Overall: Event Registration / Attendee Management

title: Eventbrite Connects Me to Local Events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I use Eventbrite to buy tickets to family friendly and adult oriented local events. I think that a lot of these events would not be able to hold events and sell tickets without a service like Eventbrite to facitiate ticket puraches.
cons: Cons: I think the Eventbrite fee should be included in the ticket price so there is no surprises when I go to check out.

title: Great for concert goers.
name: Kaci C.
pros: Pros: I have used this product when purchasing tickets to both concerts and 5k runs. Both types of experiences were positive and easy.
cons: Cons: No cons. The software is easy and fast to get through to book events.

title: Great platform to find and share events
name: M_nica J.
pros: Pros: It is very easy to use, and I really like the categories and filters, especially when I am looking for a specific type of date, place and cost. Publishing events are also easy and you only have to pay for the service if your event has a cost, if your event is free you don't have to pay to share it.
cons: Cons: Sometimes the filters for area don't work really well. Like if I am looking for events in a specific city it also shows me event in cities that are 2 or 3 hours away and that throws me off sometimes. If it showed the events of the selected city and then suggestions for surrounding cities it would be better.
overall: Overall: Overall Eventbrite is a great platform, I have found out about great events through this platform and also have been able to share my own events. I have the android app and use it on my phone all the time. It is just as easy to use it on the phone and the computer.

title: Eventbrite is Super Easy to Use!
name: Corine T.
pros: Pros: I like that it is a very easy to use tool in order to invite people to an event online and paperless. I think it is also really helpful when other people use it to invite me to an event, or when buying tickets for an event. It gives all the information you need like who is invited and who is coming or not coming. It also sends everyone an email as a confirmation for the event.
cons: Cons: As someone who is invited to an event, it does not let me see who else is invited to the same event.
overall: Overall: Overall Eventbrite has been awesome for sending and receiving invitations to events. I really like that it is paperless and also sends that confirmation email to help users remember when their event is taking place.

title: Great platform
name: Akniet K.
pros: Pros: Great platform to manage event registration.
cons: Cons: Registration is lengthy for customers/event goers. Wish It was a bit simplified.
overall: Overall: Great platform for event registration and management. It is very smooth and functional.

title: Convenient to Use
name: Henry M.
pros: Pros: This product makes it easy for you to sell tickets for your events. They also won't charge you fees if you are hosting free events in the community.
cons: Cons: When you publich the event, the first picture you see is the bright eventbrite logo. I set my own picture for an event but it always defaults to their logo and you have to scroll to see my event picture.

title: Easy and effective
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I think the software does what it needs to do very efficiently. The app works great also
cons: Cons: I would like to be able to download content on the app so I do not need data to get my tickets at an event

title: great event tool
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I use it to find great events happening in the city. From tech to sport to meetups.
cons: Cons: I would like it to have option to look for event on a specific date.

title: Film festival usage
name: Michael S.
pros: Pros: Ease of use and payment process. I really like how I can look at old events, which helps me benchmark
cons: Cons: Speed of payment, not visually stunning, I have never used the social media tools because they do not seem useful

title: Easy to use interface with lots of features.
name: Jenna M.
comments: Comments: Overall a really great program.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes it so easy to have your event up and offering tickets in just a few short minutes. The program also has many options to integrate events into your emails, social media and website.
cons: Cons: Not a whole lot to say here as I think the program is doesn't have any major weak points. I will say that it is has been very difficult (almost impossible) to get live support (i.e. someone on the phone). Most of my service questions have been answered by chat boxes and/or help pages.

title: Eventbrite
name: Jenny N.
pros: Pros: I liked the ease of being able to RSVP to an event and purchase tickets.
cons: Cons: There were a couple of events that I needed to get more information on and had a hard time finding where to request it.

title: Easy RSVP and ticketing
name: Eric S.
pros: Pros: This is a very user friendly service for ticketing and events. Also easy for purchasers to use on their end.
cons: Cons: There is not a lot to complain about. The only drawback is the customer service.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Becky H.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite offers a simple set-up for creating an event, importing list and sending invites. We love the easy to use templates provided, the ability to send follow-up and post event emails. Reporting has proven useful as well.
cons: Cons: The difficulty in exporting the attendee list. Post-even it's very important for our organization to easily access all attendees and invites.
overall: Overall: I would recommend Eventbrite in regards to creating, tracking, payment processing. A great tool for your events, small or large events, we always use eventbrite.

title: Great!
name: Caitlyn C.
pros: Pros: I like how easy it is to create an event and share it with an email list, a friend, the public, etc. I think this software has made it easier for communities to connect with the general public. I use it for my events in the office, to look up other events in the area I would like to sponsor, be a part of for leisure, etc.
cons: Cons: I wish their was a way to be able to promote an event through Eventbrite to the community. I think it would be cool if Eventbrite had a way to create an admin account and other people could submit events to that admin account so that the admin could decide if an event should be promoted or not to a certain group of individuals.

title: Eventbrite always has great local job fair and conference information in one spot for use to sign up
name: Whitney G.
pros: Pros: What we like most about Eventbrite is that they always have the most relevant job fairs posted. Being in the staffing industry we go to Eventbrite to see which large job fairs are happening in our area so that we can purchase a booth for marketing purposes.
cons: Cons: What I like least about Eventbrite is that it sometimes takes a long time to register for the events. I think that might be because they are a third party for the actual vendor.
overall: Overall: The benefits of using Eventbrite from a staffing company point of view is that we can always find the best and largest job fairs happening in our area so we can decide if we would like to purchase a booth to become a vendor. Eventbrite makes finding those job fairs easy.

title: Easy to Buy Tickets
name: Melissa B.
pros: Pros: Easy to Buy Tickets, share information about events
cons: Cons: limited space to include information about event
overall: Overall: I have used event brite myself for events and have looked at, purchased tickets and RSVPd for multiple events too

title: Eventbrite
name: Tina G.
pros: Pros: I love the ease of the product. It's one of those products that is easy to use and has a great purpose.
cons: Cons: I've never had a real problem with it. Even if I had a question, CS was helpful.

title: Easy to use
name: Teyanna W.
comments: Comments: Overall, great product and convenient
pros: Pros: This software is definitely user friendly and professional. I love that they offer a free platform for non-profits as I am in HR Recruitment and have put together invitation only interview days using it.
cons: Cons: While it is professional looking, customization is limited so I'm unable to be as creative as I'd like.

title: Eventbrite is great!!!
name: Lydia R.
comments: Comments: I use Eventbrite for all my events and to plan my social calendar. It's especially useful if you are attending the SXSW conference in Austin, TX. Reliable, fast, easy-to-use.
pros: Pros: Reliable, fast, easy-to-use!
cons: Cons: N/A!

title: Great For Event TIckets
name: Kris L.
pros: Pros: This application is essentially a wallet for event tickets. That I can store multiple types of tickets in the software and not need paper tickets is extremely convenient.
cons: Cons: I have no dislikes of the software at this time.
overall: Overall: We use event bright for employee events because it is so much simpler to keep up with an app opposed to paper tickets and even emailed tickets.

title: Nice tool for event hosting and participation
name: Benjamin B.
pros: Pros: I got along Eventbrite more or less by surprise. I had signed up for a job and the interview was performed using the software. It is a great tool, easy to use and with all important features you would expect, like chat, webinars, etc.
cons: Cons: It only works by installing a software on the computer or an app on the phone. The PC software is not available for Linux. The smartphone app works fine, though it requires a really good network or WiFi connection to work.

title: My favorite format for ticketing
name: Cherry H.
pros: Pros: I absolutely love the layout for Eventbrite!! The information for an event is all in one place and the location/time is always on the right-hand side which allows consumers such as myself to contemplate if the time of an event works for me while I read more about the event
cons: Cons: I do not have any Cons for Eventbrite at this time

title: Works well for most events
name: Karen T.
pros: Pros: It has the ability to store you information and will send you info on events similar to ones you have attended or purchased tickets for in the past. Some may not like this feature as it can clog up your inbox, but it has alerted me to some under the radar events that I would have never realized were taking place nearby.
cons: Cons: The processing fees that are associated with buying tickets online. I realize that this isn't really a criticism of the software, it's just a gripe in general.

title: Great tool to find new events around town.
name: Ankit K.
pros: Pros: I really like the ability to search for events by area or by dates on Eventbrite. The software also lets you send reminders to your email days before and enables me to add it to the calendar.
cons: Cons: Not the best customer service around with Eventbrite. hey say search results are only limited by geography, but if I try to book an events in anther country,for example, it's much harder to do so. For any international conferences, we just use the host's website instead of going through Eventbrite.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Teia R.
pros: Pros: I like the design layout. It breaks down the cost, the fee, and the tax well so I know what I'm paying for.
cons: Cons: I wish that when a ticket was sold out, it would make that more clear.

title: Perfect for registering attendees to your event!
name: Rebecca S.
pros: Pros: This program is perfect for organizing your event. With options for free or paid tickets, you can also offer a discount code, have attendees information, issue refund if needed. I also love the tracking tools to see who has registered and the total amount of registrants and it also tracks your sales.
cons: Cons: There is nothing I do not like about this software.
overall: Overall: With Eventbrite, I get my attendees registered, they get an email receipt instantly to their email, and I get insight reports. I love everything about this program.

title: Great for the right events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I think the ease of which you can scan and check people in at events using their app.
cons: Cons: Setting up the forms and contingencies for the various ticket types could be more user friendly.

title: Eventbrite review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy way to organize and promote workshops and events. Does the work for you for selling tickets and putting together attendance lists.
cons: Cons: Nothing, the site is great for events.

title: Ticketing System
name: Mark M.
pros: Pros: I fancy the software with its ability to create events and even advertise it, can share details to people via email. You can create free events as well as paid of which they'll take up a percentage from the tickets sold which I believe its a fair share.
cons: Cons: I have no problems with the platform I think it works well as intended.

title: Eventbrite
name: Hunter Q.
pros: Pros: Allows me to purchase tickets to events, which are then sent to my email and to the app on my phone. It can also add the event details to my Google and Outlook calendars. Very convenient.
cons: Cons: I can't think of any cons. I suppose it would be nice to have more information about the actual event. But by the time I am purchasing tickets on Eventbrite, I already know about the event. Perhaps push notifications about updates to events would be useful. Parking info?
overall: Overall: I've used this to purchase tickets to several business events and found it very easy to use. I downloaded the free app to my phone and the tickets automatically loaded to the app and were able to be scanned with a QR code right from my phone.

title: Good way to show events and sell tickets
name: Jeffrey B.
pros: Pros: Nice central location for local events for tracking attendees and for selling tickets. Also makes it easy to send out invites for recurring events too. Confirmations give ways to automatically add event to many calendars as well
cons: Cons: Have not had an issue but if mailers get sent often, might be easy for users to miss a notification

title: Great event platform!
name: Daniela I.
pros: Pros: Great platform to invite people to events. It's easy to use and it really helps to make the organization of an event easier.
cons: Cons: I didn't find any cons while using the platform.

title: Event ticket creation made easy
name: Timothy T.
pros:
Pros: - Easy and simple ticket creation

- Makes managing and tracking tickets a breeze

- Can be used for online events, webinars, offline events and conferences

- Pricing is reasonable
cons:
Cons: For software developers:

- Their API caused many problems in a project a couple years back. Be prepared to spend more time than you think for integration of systems into custom web platforms.
overall: Overall: I've used this for my own events and integrated their API in a startup project. Overall, the functionality is great and does what it is supposed to.

title: Eventbrite
name: Jovana M.
pros: Pros: I do like how it is connected with Facebook, and how easy is to create event.
cons: Cons: Everything is almost perfect on this software.
overall: Overall: Creating events.

title: Helpful way to have tickets on your phone
name: Mary W.
pros: Pros: Being able to sign up for events and put the ticket in my app has been very helpful. It can also be helpful to browse for current events in the area, though most have not been relevant to me personally.
cons: Cons: I do receive a lot of emails from eventbrite, most of which are not helpful or relevant to me. It is a little annoying to receive so many emails, and I am afraid that if I unsubscribe I will not be able to receive the emails I need for tickets for actual events I have signed up for.

title: Great product and customer service experience
name: Rebecca S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It was easy to use, and accommodated everything I needed at no cost.
cons: Cons: My custom questions weren't available when purchasing event tickets through facebook.
overall: Overall: Experience has been great. We had a small issue regarding questions not appearing on facebook. I contacted customer service. The reps guided me through a bunch of ways to correct my issue. When that didn't work, she offered a call back while she bubbled it up thru her tech team. The expectation was 24 hours, and she called back within minutes with a solution. AWESOME!!

title: Great way to showcase events!!
name: Jessica M.
pros: Pros: Simple, user-friendly, no training necessary, availability and familiarity with the site, customers or contacts are able to easily use to RSVP to events, and it's typically free!
cons: Cons: There are not any cons to report when I utilized this product for college fairs, and to let prospective students/employers know about upcoming events.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Robbie B.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is great -- it's super easy to put together event notices or smaller, private invites. Publishing and managing are easy, and as a user, email notifications, etc. make it much easier to keep track of events I plan to attend.
cons: Cons: Maybe I haven't gotten deep enough into its use cases to find Eventbrite's limits in terms of ease/usefulness, but I have yet to find anything I don't like about it.
overall: Overall: I use Eventbrite for general event notices as well as occasionally buy tickets for events through it.

title: Great for listing and attending events
name: Lenore P.
pros: Pros: Easily create events and search for events. Good visibility. Like the ability to charge for events.
cons: Cons: Fees are a little high for Professional version when accepting tickets.

title: Review of Eventbrite
name: Jacob G.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is the go to platform for general admission and reserve seating for a range of events. It makes payment seamless with handy virtual ticket and in general it's easy to navigate.
cons: Cons: One of my biggest negatives for Eventbrite is the customer service. It's limited to non-existent in my experience and resolving complaints is not an easy process.
overall: Overall: Overall I would recommend Eventbrite as it makes the process of securing admission to events, paid or unpaid, very easy and it's hard to find a comparable platform.

title: Great Mobile App & Event Platform
name: Jordan B.
pros: Pros: I love the mobile app for registering and creating events, they have easy ways to take payments, produce ticketing, and even create promotions within the software.
cons: Cons: I don't like the UI, especially on the app, because it forces you to click multiple times and navigate too many directions to find out about a specific event.
overall: Overall: If you are organizing a lot of personal or professional events and need a light solution or an advanced functionality to host, plan, take payments, and promote events, Eventbrite is a wonderful solution.

title: Eventbrite
name: Lindsay S.
pros: Pros: The feature I like most is being able to easily and quickly check-in event guest by simply scanning the code with your phone.
cons: Cons: I find the fee's to be on the higher end.

title: Great event planning software
name: Bara F.
pros: Pros: How easy it is to use - to invite people and keep track of people coming to your event. Also, I love the fact that it is free unless you charge for the event - so that has worked great for any company team-building events as well as personal parties.
cons: Cons: There is nothing I can think of at this moment. I really like it!

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I liked how easy it was to create events. I also had no issues at any step of the way. Things worked flawlessly and went off without a hitch!
cons: Cons: The one time that I did have an issue was when I was unable to reach customer support.
overall: Overall: Overall I would highly recommend using Eventbrite for creating events whether it be general admission or reserved seating

title: Extremely easy to use
name: claudia p.
pros: Pros: Loved the fact that i now do not have to print out or go and purchase invitations. Very convenient.
cons: Cons: Some people do not actually RSVP or click where they are supposed to.

title: schedule and RSVP for events free
name: Verified Reviewer
