pros: Pros: Very easy to use. Allows guests to easily RSVP with a tap of a button (and ofcourse without creating an account). Easy to view guest count and details as well!
cons: Cons: Some guests did not like the reminders, however as a host, it was helpful because it prevented me from having to chase down the guests that had not yet RSVPd/responded

title: I used Eventbrite in the past for events and to have guest purchase tickets.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Ease of use and ability to share event on social media, websites, etc. Great for our affinity group, Young Leaders Circle.
overall: Overall: Being able to keep all the guest and information in one location.

title: great for events and parties
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: Eventbrite made it simple to organize our events, even if you are not charging any monies in your event you can use this platform to have a correct headcount and RSVPs from your invitees.

I used for pay and free events, when you charge for events you get the monies in a simple way once you understand their procedures is pretty much all simple to use.
cons: Cons: people may not like to pay a fee for using the tool, but its much more reasonable than other platforms. in the end it worth the efforts, but money is always and issue.
overall: Overall: mostly use it for fundraising and social events where we don't want to use a formal productions agency. this is a great alternative.

title: An easy way to promote events and process tickets for small organizations
name: Becky B.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes it really easy and affordable for small organizations to promote events and get the word out. They also process all of your ticket purchases so you can focus on the event itself.
cons: Cons: Their customer support is not the greatest. They are really difficult to get in touch with since they don't offer live support.

title: Exactly what every event needs
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: - great platform to design RSVPs

- great platform to find events

- overall, quite user friendly

- I like the fact that I can have an eventbrite ticket in my iPhone passbook
cons:
Cons: - Has a boring outlook

- events that are by invite only still have tickets being sold on eventbrite to the general public. I find this confusing

title: Best for event tickets
name: rohit n.
pros: Pros: Easy user Interface as well as attractive event description can be given in application as well on website which makes it more appealing.
cons: Cons: Sometimes when you book a ticket for a show or function it doesn't email right away with your ticket. It takes time to deliver your ticket in your inbox.

title: Awesome way to organize and promote ANY event!
name: Linda F.
pros: Pros: #1--It's free to everyone--promoters and attendees. #2--It allows scheduling of events, emails, and reminders. #3--Ticket sales! My normal use is for member meetings, but we have held a couple of ticketed events as well. Ticket sales and proceeds are easy to set up, and proceeds are direct deposited after the event.
cons: Cons: The software has a learning curve. There are many features that are available but are discovered with use.
overall: Overall: Mass and targeted promotion of events and meetings.

title: Event Planning and Tickets Purchasing
name: Dana R.
pros: Pros: There are many event applications out there but the one I have had the most experience with is Eventbrite. It is for the most part very easy to use. I most recently had to purchase tickets for a networking event. It was a simple, secure process to pay either by debit or credit card. There is also a Paypal option which is helpful. I received immediate confirmationof my tickets by email. In the email I was encouraged to download the mobile app which I have done.
cons: Cons: It is hard to tell fraudulent events on this platform and difficult to get a refund of payments. Other than that I have had no negative experiences.

title: A great tool for any Event Manager, even the Novice.
name: Lindsay K. R.
pros: Pros: The website platform makes everything easy for event managers, new and old. It's easy to navigate and create events, send invites and maintain the guest lists.
cons: Cons: The thing I liked least about this software is just that when I first started using it, it wasn't as well known or reputable so some attendees were hesitant to input their information into the software - but all that has changed. Eventbrite has grown to be a much more well known and reputable entity in it's industry.

title: Best Ticketing Software
name: Pamela C.
pros: Pros: I love the ease of use. It is more than a ticketing software. It is a great site to find events as well.
cons: Cons: I can't think of anything I don't like about Eventbrite.

title: Set up events here
name: andrew s.
comments: Comments: use this all the time to set up parties and track invites. this works very well.
pros: Pros: ever easy to set up events and track responses
cons: Cons: this is a great product. no real cons to the product

title: Convenient to buy tickets
name: shari b.
pros: Pros: I love using this to purchase tickets to various events. Its so easy to use and convenient to keep track of tickets
cons: Cons: I have not had any cons when using this

title: Great central hub for all events, big or small.
name: Nikki S.
comments: Comments: My overall experience has been pretty good. I have continuously used this software for events and have been pleased.
pros: Pros: Check-in process is easy, ticket sales are super easy and an excellent main hub for all events, big or small. Using this software just makes the entire event process and experience smoother. You can also create customized data reports.
cons: Cons: In some situations events have been canceled with no advance notice of refund offer so this is something that needs to be worked on.

title: Making ticket sales easy
name: Aaron G.
pros: Pros: Being able to duplicate and publish events within minutes, having multiple show times for one event, creating seating charts with reserved seating and general seating.
cons: Cons: Fees can get pricey when selling higher price tickets. Refunds are easy but take a while to process.
overall: Overall: Selling tickets easier

title: Easy as pie..
name: Brett R.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: I like the ease of use for the software, they spend a real good amount of time designing the interface to be nice and easy.
cons: Cons: I think there are some invite options that are lacking and calendar features which I could use to tie into more services.

title: Non Profit Ticket Capture
name: Mark B.
position: Realtor Team Leader / Co-Owner"The Marks of Excellence" Team
pros: Pros: I am on the board of directors for a non profit, and we use this product to track our pre attendance for some of our larger events. It has never failed us and the integration with facebook is GREAT!
cons: Cons: Nothing! I can honestly say that we have had ZERO issues with this product!

title: great website for booking your events
name: Raghav L.
pros: Pros: very user friendly, can easily select events and ticketing options. good breakdown of menu options and payment procedure is good.....a good match up for the long standing ticket king.....ticketmaster!
cons: Cons: less flash adverts which obstruct the ticketing process (especially when on a timer)! a summary page would be helpful

title: We love using eventbrite for local music tickets that are being sold.
name: Samantha M.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is easy to use. It also does a great job of promoting out local music scene. The fees for the tickets are not outrageous either.
cons: Cons: I do wish since the tickets are electronic that we wouldn't be charged processing fees. We aren't having them mailed or printed so I feel its just pointless to pay that fee.

title: Easy to get tickets and make plans
name: Bethany S.
pros: Pros: I like how easy it is to get tickets. Some website confuse me with all their steps but this one went smoothly. I was able to go to the lantern fest and it was amazing!
cons: Cons: Nothing! I like how easy to use it is. It's a good program.
overall: Overall: It makes it easy to plan things and I love that it sends me an email so I can keep track of my events.

title: Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's a great way to get all of your event information in one place.
cons: Cons: Unless you have a computer or access to the internet (which not everyone does) It's difficult to get all your registration information complete.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite has helped to make it simpler for people to register for an event as well as for myself to check people in at the event.

title: Eventbrite is nice
name: Ariel B.
pros: Pros: I like that it was one of its kind for so long and the ease of use. I've used this for all events and I've never been disappointed even learned new apps they have, like organizer.
cons: Cons: I think the software, in which it currently is, should rebrand. There are newer apps coming out providing more features and options.

title: Eventbrite review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I have been able to purchase numerous tickets through event bright and save it on my phone
cons: Cons: The extra tax that you have to pay instead of paying cash in person

title: Easiest Event/Ticket Management Program
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes planning and managing our corporate events incredibly easy. The options to create different types of tickets, different availability and waitlists make it simple for us to see what we need to push and promote - as well as reach back out to attendees and waitlisters. I also love how easy it connects to social media platforms.
cons: Cons: The fee per ticket purchased is a little more expensive than other ticket management programs. Other programs have flat fees that make more sense for some of our events. Additionally, I also would like to see more development in the MailChimp integration.
overall: Overall: Overall, Eventbrite is our go-to for managing and tracking our upcoming events. While it may not always be the most cost-efficient option, it's by far the easiest to use - which makes the small pricing difference worth it.

title: Easiest way to publicise your event
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: super easy to use

the interface is great

allows for customization of target locations for better reach

has great features that are of value
cons: Cons: Didn't find it easy to manage attendees from the platform easy, couldn't find some guest based on how they input their names on the sign up, opted to print out a list instead

title: Great UX and amazing UI
name: Amado C.
comments: Comments: Keep up the good work and don't clutter the primary objective! Thanks!
pros: Pros: The interface is extremely helpful and guides you nicely through the checkout process. There isn't much friction that gets in the way of checking out, the design has removed all roadblocks and allows me to do what I need to do, namely RSVP or pay for an event registration.
cons: Cons: Could be a little less stressful, the large red counter makes you feel like you won't make it in time, but that may not necessarily be a con, more than a stressor.

title: Easy to use, free if you don't charge!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to create custom forms for event registration. You have a ton of flexibility and you can capture just about any kind of information about your attendees as you need. Additionally the data is formatted into a CSV which makes it easy to export and then import into another application.
cons: Cons: If you have larger events, the pricing can get a little high, but you still have the option to absorb the ticket fees or ask your guests to pay for them.

title: Eventbrite
name: Jailyn E.
comments: Comments: It's pretty easy to use, but I think they need to make it more widescale as far as events go. But easy to use, prices are great, and does a good job of promoting the event.
pros: Pros: Easy use
cons: Cons: Not always tailored to specific events

title: Review of Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I've used the mobile version of this software to purchase tickets for concerts. The app is extremely intuitive and allowed me to add my ticket directly to my Apple Wallet so that I have easy access to the ticket.
cons: Cons: I wish they would expand the software to include professional sports tickets in my area.

title: So much to do
name: Jennifer M.
pros: Pros: Easy access to multiple events going on with easy to RSVP options.
cons: Cons: None. No issues to report from my experiences.

title: Eventbrite
name: natalie s.
pros: Pros: I like the ease of setting events and the payment processing offered through Eventbrite.
cons: Cons: The processing fees are a bit high, but worth the ease of use.

title: Best way to manage events
name: Oshan M.
pros: Pros: With the Eventbrite platform , we can easily organise an event and get the audience for our events. User interfaces are very user interactive and not having complex processes to create an event. Even we can send emails for all attendees using a single click.Also we can issue tickets for the events through the platform.
cons: Cons: Transferring tickets to another attendees procedure should improve.
overall: Overall: Quick and easy to organise an event and we can track details with the platform.

title: Only worthwhile free ticketing software
name: Amanda H.
pros: Pros: Free for events you aren't taking money for online
cons: Cons: Some missing features, some extensions need updated
overall: Overall: It doesn't have everything but from a consumer standpoint, their event directory is surpassed by none. As an event creator, Eventbrite's 1 page, 3 step process is as easy as it gets. For simple events, I'd always use Eventbrite. However, for paid services, some competitors have better website builds/layouts available and data analytics. I do like that I can integrate with like SurveyMonkey and MailChimp but their Salesforce integration needs some work. For a free service, you can't go wrong.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Great user interface, allows you to easily receive and download tickets. Great mobile app, transferring tickets amongst peers is simple. Allows you to also purchase tickets based on your past events, relating to your interests, and gives recommendations. Notifications allow you to make sure you never miss an event!
cons: Cons: A lot of features, with can be overwhelming and does require a bit of learning at first.
overall: Overall: Great platform to purchase and organize tickets from!

title: Finding events made easy
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: There are so many different events posted on the site. The only issue is that they are not really regulated like a TicketMaster or LiveNation would be. This sometimes makes the events questionable in nature, but, as long as you look into what you are buying, you should be good.
cons: Cons: Like I said, sometimes you don't know the type of event and the legitimateness you are purchasing. The level of quality of events varies, which the software does not explain.

title: Eventbrite -- Rocks Event Registration and Promotion!
name: Alexandra (Alex) S.
pros: Pros: It's so easy! I can set up an event and push out in just a few minutes! Love that I can format text within the platform.
cons: Cons: Not much, especially since I only use the free/unpaid functionality.
overall: Overall: I used Eventbrite until my parent company disallowed it for compliance reasons. I'd go back to it in a heartbeat if my company permitted me to.

title: Eventbrite Review for Craig
name: Craig R.
comments: Comments: I was first introduced to Eventbrite in college and the ease of use with regards to it's connection with my phone and other apple products was one of the seamless reasons I trust and use eventbrite today.
pros: Pros: Functionality with my apple products
cons: Cons: Wish there was a better way to manage and sectionalize the events I register to on eventbrite.

title: Frequent Eventbrite user
name: Matt C.
pros: Pros: Relatively straightforward and easy to use. I like the recommendations on events that it provides-- I often hear about interesting activities that I wouldn't otherwise become aware of.
cons: Cons: A bit of a pain filling out the info required to get tickets for events, even with an account. I'm curious why they put a timer on completing the "transaction." I'm sure there's a good reason for it, but who wants to be on the clock? I guess it forces you to get the job done (relatively) quickly.

title: Eventbrite is an efficient & technologically progressive software, easy to use for patrons and organizers, but not without its own glitches.
name: Hasan Z.
comments: Comments: I use this software a lot and compared against multiple event ticketing platforms, it is one of the best!
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is an easy to use platform for patrons and organizers, with a plethora of customizable ticketing options for event administration. It's aesthetic is modern, and order history is very trackable.
cons: Cons: As common with all ticketing software, there are glitches that sometimes can slow down processing or take some understanding to resolve. Event customer service varies per event.

title: Reviw
name: Taylor Y.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: I did like how many options you were able to use to customize ticket sales: we had different tiers that allowed for different price brackets.
cons: Cons: There could've been more ease in some ways: either there were features I wanted that didn't exist or I couldn't find. An end date for ticket sales (not just up until the event date), a small deposit option, and more information fields that could be customized to fit the needs of my group would've been very helpful.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite was helpful in having a sure way to register people for our event, but overall having greater customization options or one's that were easier to find would have made my experience better.

title: Love This
name: Alec R.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a wonderful way to manage events and track attendance. From a user perspective signing up for events is so easy and requires little to no software experience.
cons: Cons: Our admin complains about the support. Sometimes their response time is not as quick as one would hope for (but who does?)

title: Easy to use event registration software if you are on a budget.
name: Nina Noelle S.
pros: Pros: I like that you can use Eventbrite for free if you are not doing a major, in-depth registration build for an event. It's great for startups and small companies that don't throw many events.
cons: Cons: It's very basic, if you need a robust system this is probably not the best solution for you or your company.

title: Great for registering for races or buying tickets!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I've used this software for buying tickets and registering for running events, its perfectly simple and I love that you can see other events in your area.
cons: Cons: I don't have any complaints about Eventbrite, always functions exactly how I need it to. There are booking fees but that's true of all ticket sites

title: Easy to use, wish it had more search filters
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like the friendly interface and ease of creating, saving, editing, publishing, and linking/sharing events. I was able to start using it for the first time with minimal effort.
cons: Cons: I wish it had more search options on the patron end, such as key words PLUS date, type of event, and location/city.

title: Very customizable
name: Heather L.
pros: Pros: It is very customizable and allows for so many options with tickets and registration.
cons: Cons: I do feel like the fees are a little on the high side.

title: Eventbrite review
name: Diane L.
pros: Pros: It is straight-forward and user-friendly.
cons: Cons: I don't always need an e-mail reminder of an upcoming event.

title: Get word of your event to the masses!
name: Daniel M.
pros: Pros: We cater a lot of charity and church function on my food trucks. This is a really affordable and productive way to get word of your event out to people. It also really helps us to get a good estimate of a head count of attendees.
cons: Cons: In the many times my small business has used Eventbrite to promote a function, we never had any problems!
overall: Overall: Getting a good estimate of those attending our functions. Allowing us to properly prepare to meet all our customers and guest dining needs.

title: Create events like a pro!
name: Mary M.
pros: Pros: Love being able to create events with style and ease. Lets me contact everyone in a more professional manner.
cons: Cons: I can honestly say that I have not ran into any issues with this software. It is very user friendly!
overall: Overall: Professionalism in creating an event that lets everyone reply, in which it helps me be able to prepare properly

title: Makes life easier
name: Candice C.
pros: Pros: Setting up is super easy. Youre able to view amount of ticket purchases you have. The control of setting up special discount codes for clients. Can use the site internationally
cons: Cons: Theres nothing so far I dislike about this site and app.
overall: Overall: Love eventbrite. Not only as an event organizer but also as patron.

title: Easy way to handle event invites
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use, and guests can check in to see how the event is progressing, read comments, etc.
cons: Cons: Nothing. It's pretty good for what it is.

title: Super fun and easy to use!
name: Amy T.
pros: Pros: Super easy to navigate - simply find what you want, purchase, done. Emails you a copy of what you're going to and there's no hassle.
cons: Cons: A couple events we've tried to book haven't been on eventbrite, so it would be cool if more events were added, but otherwise it's super easy and to the point.

title: Eventbrite is easy to use.
name: Mike V.
pros: Pros: I love how simple event registration is with Eventbrite. Consise and to the point.
cons: Cons: I would like a little more interaction between apps

title: Eventbrite review
name: Tasha B.
comments: Comments: The overall experience was good.
pros: Pros: We used this software for an offsite event where we needed to get reservation info. At the time, we like'd how we were able to get reminders sent out to participants and capture important data.
cons: Cons: We had a few problems regarding flexibility, I.e. payment terms.

title: Great Resource!
name: Angela S.
comments: Comments: I still use this site regularly.
pros: Pros: I was turned on to Evenbrite by a colleague almost a year ago. The platform itself is easy to navigate is very straightforward. The website is clean, the graphics are exceptional. Anyone could pop on and utilize the site immediately.
cons: Cons: There is not much in the area we reside to offer. I'm not completely convinced this is there "con", it may just be a matter of logistics.

title: Easy to use
name: Brooklyn H.
pros: Pros: User friendly and colors are easy on the eyes. makes rsvping and getting info easy
cons: Cons: I did not have complaints about this software.
overall: Overall: Good

title: Go-to for events
name: Zienab F.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite exceeds all of my expectations. I no longer need an entire team working on selling and collecting tickets for events because I utilize Eventbrite. Knowing that my attendees will have an easy time purchasing their tickets, and getting a confirmation email with detailed info on where to go and what to expect from my event is such a peace of mind.
cons: Cons: Although I understand why there is a fee, I only wish that somewhere purchasing tickets could be free! But, since my members are spending less time gathering and selling tickets, the fee is definitely a better, smaller investment.

title: Great for upcoming events
name: Gabe L.
pros: Pros: It is so easy to eventbrite for paying for upcoming events.
cons: Cons: I have had no problems with Eventbrite.
overall: Overall: My overall experience has be very positive.

title: Eventbrite Pros and Cons
name: Brenda W.
pros: Pros: It's an excellent way to raise awareness about events and keep track of who's coming. The pay automation is seamless, which is also very helpful.
cons: Cons: The interface is a bit generis. Events could be better represented if a more the event organizer's own graphics could cover the entire page.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite is an easy, seamless way to get people to attend events. It's a very popular software that most people are familiar with, comfortable using and confident purchasing tickets thru the site.

title: Eventbrite
name: Amanda B.
pros: Pros: Sign up and track upcoming events easily
cons: Cons: Auto search feature doesn't help pinpoint specific events

title: Great Option for Non-Profit Organizations
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to set up and use. Easy to create reports. Customization was simple. No charge to use if the event is free to attendees.
cons: Cons: So far, I have not found a "down side".
overall: Overall: Our organization is, in some ways, still moving into the 21st Century. We are working to use more social media to reach our clients and Eventbrite has helped. In addition, the time savings in registering clients for events is HUGE. The ability to collect contact information so that we can follow up with clients is also a big win for us so that we can maintain contact and work with clients that, though registered, may not have been able to attend our event. We also use this information to confirm attendance with clients prior to the event.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Carlye T.
comments: Comments: I'm a huge music fan, so finding a software that I can purchase tickets and view upcoming events is such a cool, unique product. Almost every time I purchase tickets for one concert, I usually end up buying tickets for another show as well. I also love being able to connect with other people who enjoy the same music as me. The potential to go to a concert alone and meet new people is incredible and unlike any other application I've experienced.
pros: Pros: Networking opportunities Upcoming events features Interest associations
cons: Cons: Ticket selection is glitchy sometimes

title: Eventbrite
name: Gonzalo P.
pros: Pros: It was easy to use and i felt that the data shared was secure using the software
cons: Cons: it could be a little difficult to navigate at times.

title: So Convenient
name: Helena W.
pros: Pros: I love EventBrite because it allows you to invite everyone to an event without having to spend money on actual physical invites. It's easy for people to RSVP and make comments. People are able to see who all is coming, all of the info for the event and everything. I have used it to invite people and have been invited via EventBrite and it's always very easy and convenient.
cons: Cons: I think they need more template and design options.

title: Excellent website in case you need to organize an event
name: Davide D.
pros: Pros: It is very easy and intuitive to use. It also offers a lot of different features to use in case you want to personalize the invitation
cons: Cons: The process to create is a little bit slow, but I feel that it is improving little by little and that it is going to become optimal in the near future

title: One Hub for All Events!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a dynamic software that can fine tune to a specific category of events, or show you everything and more than you imagined happening in any given area. Links to purchase tickets for events are also included.
cons: Cons: You may miss deals. Eventbrite does not track all deals being offered, so best to do a quick search before purchasing.
overall: Overall: I've always been happy with this software and will continue to use it to stay in the know for last minute and future events.

title: Best Way to Schedule an Event Quickly
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Super convenient and easy when you need to schedule an event. Best part is that it is free and you can literally use it for any kind of event (Birthday, bbq, holiday part, etc). I like the ability to set a limit on how many people can come per invitation as well.
cons: Cons: It would be nice to have the ability to make the invitation outline and design more customizable, but the reality is, is that it does what it was made to do very well.

title: Used a couple times
name: Kayla A.
pros: Pros: I have used Eventbrite a couple times now in buying tickets. It has worked well every time and I have no issues with this program. Plus I snagged Rachel Hollis tickets through Eventbrite so I kinda love them just for that
cons: Cons: I can't say I have any cons at this point in time.

title: Eventbrite has helped my SX Experiece
name: Jody C.
comments: Comments: Like using eventbrite for knowledge of what's going on, and for RSVP. It ROCKS!!!
pros: Pros: RSVP Feature
cons: Cons: Not the product, but I use to not have mobile data, was hard to keep up on wifi.

title: Needs improvement, but free, so can't complain too much.
name: April G.
pros: Pros: Great options for payment types and order form questions. Good Zapier integrations. And it allows you to publish to Facebook. Nice that it allows multiple users under one master account.
cons: Cons: No way to connect a member database to create member only tickets. Email options are limited...you can't email those who registered but didn't attend. Reporting UX design is cumbersome at best to use. You can't create event templates. The organizer name doesn't come through their Zapier integration.
overall: Overall: We use this for our events for a professional women's organization.

title: Better than most sign-up programs
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: In comparison to Signup genius, Eventbrite is much more sophisticated and user friendly. I especially like the design of the website and invitation forms.
cons: Cons: Not much that I did not like. However, it would be much more helpful if at least basic level of customer support is provided.

title: Have used as a consumer
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use. Email updates about purchased events are really nice. Receipts are clear and easy to use.
cons: Cons: As a consumer who uses to purchase tickets - maybe an app? Not sure if there is one - but if someone buys a lot of tickets could be an easy way to access and keep information.
overall: Overall: Nice

title: Eventbright is awesome
name: Brandon G.
pros: Pros: Setting up events and purchasing tickets to an event are so simple
cons: Cons: Really nothing. Great UI, and just simple and to the point

title: Review: Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that I am able to use it to both find events to attend, and also as a marketing tool to submit events for others to attend for my PR job.
cons: Cons: The information is not always up-to-date.
overall: Overall: I use this software at work to submit events to local calendars.

title: Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I've used this to post events - and find them - with general success.
cons: Cons: Would love to have comprehensive access to events analytics.

title: Event Brite aka Easy Brite
name: Brandon S.
pros: Pros: The app makes this service even more helpful. Especially the calendar sharing.
cons: Cons: Some vendors put the fee on to the purchaser.

title: Easily book an event!
name: Cynthia T.
pros: Pros: Links for events are easily mapped. And booking was never so convenient And as a bonus, I Booked an event that was cancelled, I was easily able to retain my deposit while others struggled.
cons: Cons: Hate to say it, but I am unable to think of a con! But that's never a bad thing!!

title: Sell tickets quickly and efficiently
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: - Easy set up

- Integration with major platforms (Facebook)

- Extremely user friendly

- Trusted platform by many consumers helps our guests feel safe making a purchase
cons: Cons: Really no complaints. Although they take a higher fee for more customizable ticking options, I understand they need to make money somehow.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite has help us fill the void in our current POS that does not allow us to sell tickets in advance.

title: Eventbrite
name: Frank B.
pros: Pros: This is a great service, it allows you to sign up for a meeting, webinars, social events, networking events or groups thru your desktop/Laptop/Tablet/Smart Phone
cons: Cons: None that I can say or complain about, great service for busy individuals.

title: Excellent for selling tickets to an event
name: Maggie W.
pros: Pros: We hosted a ticketed event at my job and Eventbrite made it so easy for our customers to buy tickets and made it so easy for us to keep track of the tickets that we had sold and when we had reached the capacity of our event. It is so user-friendly and simple that anyone, regardless of tech-savvyness, can use it without feeling overwhelmed.
cons: Cons: This isn't really a con, I just wish there were more customization options for how to make the ticket sales page look. I wish I could personalize it a little bit more for my specific ticketed event.
overall: Overall: Overall, great experience, and very user friendly.

title: Great Platform for Booking Tickets and finding out about Events
name: Emma S.
comments: Comments: This is a great platform for finding events and booking tickets! Easy, convenient, and safe!
pros: Pros: This is a great way to find out about events going on in my area. This is an easy way to book tickets to events safely and without fear of fraud.
cons: Cons: There aren't any cons I can think of for this software!

title: Easily Find Local Festivities
name: Yvette B.
pros: Pros: I like Eventbrite because I am able to find fun events and seminars to attend within my area. Eventbrite includes pictures and provides all the details you need for each event.
cons: Cons: It shows you how much time you have left to purchase tickets. If you have impulse control issues, that may be a trigger.
overall: Overall: Overall experience with Eventbrite has been great. They even offer ticket protection for a small fee. It's worth the investment just in case you can't attend an event.

title: Great way to manage your company's events
name: Clayton S.
pros: Pros: Super easy to use, extremely friendly UI. Probably the best is the ability to quickly create codes. We used this feature to create codes for customers asking for discounts for their coworkers...it let's us do something special for them and turn it around quickly.
cons: Cons: The only con is that they take a cut, but how else would they survive and make money? You can, however, very easily build in the price to be passed on to purchasers if needed.

title: Great event managing app
name: Jaime Rafael H.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite gives you the tools to organize events, make promotional codes,manage attendance and also gives additional exposure to the event you are creating.
cons: Cons: The mobile explorer version of the app does not have the use promotional code option, confusing non tech savvy users.

title: Find Awesome Local Events!
name: Demi G.
position: Executive Assistant to COO & General Counsel
pros: Pros: I've mostly only used Eventbrite as an attendee, not as someone who's listing/coordinating an event. That being said, it's easy to navigate, purchase & access tickets.
cons: Cons: I'm not sure that I use it extensively enough to find any areas of improvement. It works for how I use it!

title: Everyone should use this for events
name: Omarie P.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a very popular and standard event marketing and ticket sales software. I've used it to promote pop up shops and shows and will continue to use it. I love the different features and filters available for each event, and it's easy for event goers to access and purchase tickets on. Highly recommended!
cons: Cons: I don't have any cons, I've really never had any problems while using EventBrite and it is easy on the budget.

title: Best Ticketing service
name: Krishna R.
pros: Pros: Create tickets for your events easy with minimal effort, They have everything like tracking, promoting and analyzing the event. They have very good mobile app which makes verifying the tickets easy at the event. Hosting an event is easy just like a breeze, even booking tickets from event brite is very easy. Processing fee are reasonable compared to other platforms. All the features makes eventbrite on stand out.
cons: Cons: I wouldn't argue more that this is the best service I have nothing else to say.
overall: Overall: It is free for Free events and for paid they have a reasonable fee, Overall it is a great platform

title: The Best Event-Focused Mobile App
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite's mobile app is incredible. In the time it takes me on Google to find just ONE event I'm interested in going to, Eventbrite shows at least 5-10 events that are relevant to me. It's also very easy to register and buy tickets through the app.
cons: Cons: I have zero complaints about Eventbrite.
overall: Overall: My experience with Eventbrite's mobile app has been awesome, I've never encountered any issues with ticket purchasing.

title: Easy and free registration platform. Very user friendly.
name: Alexis F.
pros: Pros: This platform is super easy to use for all events. Set up is self-explanatory and can be used for all ranges of events or to set event reminders for upcoming dates. The integration is great and can be shared easily to Facebook, etc.
cons: Cons: I wish you could customize the platform a little more and make the website portion more designed to fit your event branding.
overall: Overall: Super easy platform to set up events for beginners and people with low budgets, yet highly effective.

title: Best tool to set up events
name: Vallery O.
pros:
Pros: Eventbrite allows me to set up an event in less than 5 minutes. As a recruiter in a start-up, I organize a lot of industry meetups and this has been an invaluable tool.

I love how professional it looks, its integration with other platforms such as Facebook and above all, I can use it from my phone!
cons: Cons: I have no complaints about eventbrite, it has served me well.
overall: Overall: An invaluable tool for setting up events and tracking attendance. I love it

title: Eventbrite: One Place for Events
name: Lord Gideon M.
pros: Pros: It was easy to find events related to my industry (SEO and other digital marketing events). Ticketing was also very straightforward.
cons: Cons: Sometimes it was hard to find events in specific locations.
overall: Overall: I went to a few events that I saw from Eventbrite. There was no hiccups from ticketing to the actual event.

title: On Cue.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that all the events are one site.
cons: Cons: I would like more interaction for customers

title: Incredibly easy to use and manage
name: Matt Z.
pros: Pros: The app is a great value add to any organization or individual. As Director of Operations, I managed an extensive event schedule, from Recruiting Fairs to Conventions to Hack-a-thons. Amazingly, Eventbrite was always an option when registering for the event. I was able to remotely manage multiple events to a variety of personnel in an incredibly effective manner . . .And it was free!
cons: Cons: Sometimes, my ability to access event information was limited by the event's IT department. I realize that this isn't Eventbrite's fault, but it does hamper the app's performance at times.

title: Booking tickets
name: Evelyn W.
pros: Pros: I can use this on my phone on the go. You can also search multiple venues.
cons: Cons: Seems you have to create an acct to purchase

title: Well worth the cost. A must have if you host small events.
name: Bradley G.
pros:
Pros: Very, very easy to set up events. Eventbrite has honed the market for quickly setting up an event and monetizing.

The reporting features are vital to our business.
cons: Cons: The fees are kind of steep relative to some of their alternatives -- and they always seem to change. We've experienced some confusion around what tier we are on.
overall: Overall: I have not come across an easier to use event and ticketing management software. It's a bit more expensive than I'd like but worth it in the end.

title: Great for those unique one of kind finds
name: TALIA D.
pros: Pros: I love that alot of the events found on eventbrite are unique and aren't typically of the norm. It has alot of cool find events that strike my interest.
cons: Cons: I dont like how sometimes organizers are able to post an event, without the ability of including thorough details about an event; sometimes it makes it difficult to contact someone or know specifics about an event due to lack of information.
overall: Overall: I love eventbrite and will continue to use it.

title: Keeps your event organized
name: Amy J.
pros: Pros: Everything you need to host a successful event in one software package.
cons: Cons: I have no real problems with this software.

title: Great way to set up events
name: Jeff B.
pros: Pros: Makes event planning easy and has many ways to personalize it.
cons: Cons: Nothing to not like, very intuitive and easy to use.

title: Eventbrite is fantastic
name: Sabrina M.
pros: Pros: Very simple to use, efficient, few bugs, works well with merchant accounts. Eventbrite was a top pick for our event registration needs.
cons: Cons: I wish Eventbrite had a calendar component to plug into our website. Without a calendar function, it forces us to have to use another 3rd party app.

title: Amazing Platform for Events
name: David N.
pros: Pros: This is a wonderful platform to create events; it has a lot of functionality and is easy to use.
cons: Cons: The fees for using this are bit high. But other than that, it's a great platform.
overall: Overall: Even though the fees are high, it is a trusted site by the general public and I recommend using this to create events.

title: Great for managing ticket sales
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like the ability to streamline seating and ticket sales and have real time information as to where we stand with upcoming events.
cons: Cons: The fees feel excessive at times, particularly when ticket prices have a low base. Also the payments can take longer than expected to arrive.

title: Does exactly what you need it to
name: Michelle M.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is simple to use as the host as well as the attendee.
cons: Cons: I can't think of anything that I dislike about it.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Anissa Y.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: I used eventbrite for an out of school club where we were to create a small company and come up with a product idea. We also had to host an event where we would ask our family, friends, and the "investors" to come and see our product and if our idea was good enough to pass. We used eventbrite to invite our guests and tell them the place and time of our event. The program worked flawlessly and allowed for our event to run smoothly. It was easy to use and easy to implement.
cons: Cons: There was nothing we did not like about using this software while we were using it.

title: Really great for events
name: Kevon G.
pros: Pros: Able to see upcoming events by city, state, country. Let's you single out the event type you are looking for purchase it, and placing it in an e-ticket holder so you know where it is. You can also put it in your apple wallet.
cons: Cons: No dislikes about this soft wear thus far.

title: Great solution for your event registrations
name: Dmitriy F.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is really easy to use, I like the functionality
cons: Cons: I can't really think of any cons, I like the software.

title: New ticket avenue
name: Lauren D.
pros: Pros: Super easy way to find and acquire tickets for local events. I use it for music events all the time as well as comedy and food events. Easy to purchase and have the ticket with quick access to Apple wallet.
cons: Cons: Doesn't include all the events I go to - expand more! There are a lot of concert venues in the area that do not use Eventbrite yet. They should partner with more venues because I love the ease of use.

title: Excellent Event Browser and Creator
name: Beverly A.
pros: Pros: Great website for searching for events. It also allow you to create , browse and promote local events. I love to browse to see what is going on in my city. Great place to catch up on the happenings in town. Great search area. Simple and fun. Having a babyshower, wedding or workshop event, this is the place to create or promote your event.
cons: Cons: You simply cannot go wrong with Eventbrite, its has the best set up.

title: Effective Promotion for my Events
name: Jean V.
comments: Comments: I like it and I will keep using it.
pros: Pros: I have used Eventbrite to promote my alpaca farm open houses. I can see how many people booked "tickets" even though no actual ticket is required for attendance. The ticket adds value to my free event.
cons: Cons: I'm not sure if this reaches my rural area as well as some other advertising avenues, such as Facebook, where I can target demographics very specifically.

title: Eventbride review
name: Vadims P.
pros: Pros: I used many event websites, but Evenrtbride is by far the most useful. In several years I use only it, this is really easy, free or paid events - very convenient UI.
cons: Cons: The least is... UI in mobile... Sometimes it is just horrible, not loaded assets or smth else - but you can not use website normally. Very rarely, but always in important moment.
overall: Overall: As overall I like this service, it makes my event management (people, tickets...) very comfortable.

title: Excellect source for event planning
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The speed of the notices when an event registration is submitted
cons: Cons: Nothing!Love this program. Very easy to use.

title: Fine but unnecessary
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Very easy to use. Clean user interface.
cons: Cons: It helped to keep track of potential head count coming for an event.

title: Eventbrite
name: Clayton S.
comments: Comments: I use Eventbrite for all my event scheduling and invitations. It is simple and intuitive.
pros: Pros: This makes scheduling my events easy! It also gives guests an easy way to accept or decline invites!
cons: Cons: There are no clear negatives to using this program!

title: Basic event management tool
name: Suzie R.
pros: Pros: Easy to create event invitations, track RSVPs, multiple service options and price is based on the cost of the event. If the event is free, then you can create the invitation for free. There's a percentage taken by Eventbrite as well as a fee per ticket for paid events.
cons: Cons: Could use more modern updates for free events. The percentage and fee combination seems a bit high. The company should charge one or the other.

title: Eventbrite event support
name: Martin M.
comments: Comments: I like Eventbrite but I fear they will be outdone in the marketplace.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is easy to use and is popular with many of the trade shows that I go to. Simple feature selection.
cons: Cons: Interface is easy but not that much of a value add to the events that people can register for. They need to update things.

title: Eventbrite is very handy
name: Josh S.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite helps connect events with the people who want to go to them. It's really well integrated into social, email and ticket companies. I use it regularly for my events.
pros: Pros: I really like how integrated it is into the other programs i need
cons: Cons: I would like the interface to be a little bit more intuitive. One thing i have never been able to figure out is how to do different amount of tickets for different days. This is an essential feature and I feel like it should be super easy to do.

title: I book all my tickets using eventbrite
name: abdelli s.
pros: Pros: I like how you can see all the events in your area and how it's easy to book tickets from eventbrite with the best prices.
cons: Cons: They have to review their refund policy and follow up more with the organizers.. It happened to me once for an Oscar after party in LA, that I reserved a VIP ticket but after that , when I went there, I found it super crowded and the security told us that they did sold a lot more tickets than the hotel capacity!! so it was a nightmare for me because I came from orange county driving to spend the night there but after that I had to go back home really mad!

title: Eventbrite
name: Lawrence N.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, efficient, accurate, allows us to concentrate on the event without worrying about providing information to attendees. Flexible & intuitive for attendees to register.
cons: Cons: Took us a bit to get used to it but that may have been more our fault than the software.
overall: Overall: For us it's a one stop shop for event registration and planning. Feature rich and flexible. Frees us up so we can use limited time for event planning and execution. A very nice product.

title: Simple Event Discovery Platform
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: In addition to advertising on MeetUp, we utilize Eventbrite for recruiting non employees to our user studies, promotional events and select happy hours. The tool is affordable, and fees can be passed directly to ticket purchasers. Indexing optimal--making our events easily discoverable across both Google and Facebook. Analytics tools are intuitive and useful for measuring our growth and success.
cons: Cons: Increased visual customization would be appreciated. Currently, pages have the same general look and feel, limiting the ability to further stand out. As tickets prices get more expensive, the fees are higher--making this less attractive for expensive conferences. Customer service is still in very elementary stages.

title: Quick and Easy!!
name: Melissa L.
pros: Pros: I like that it is simple and clean. I have used other apps that are not so very user friendly and I love this one. When you are creating an event you can basically do so in less than 5 minutes.
cons: Cons: To be honest with you I do not have any complaints. Like I said... it is simple and clean.
overall: Overall: By using Eventbrite I save a lot of time and I am able to track responses. Anytime I have an event I can check the day off and I can have an accurate headcount.

title: well thought out and well executed
name: Ariel E.
pros: Pros: Ease of use. Simple and intuitive platform. I can very quickly get my events up and running, The ability to repeat similar events without much effort.
cons: Cons: They have recently changed their plans yet again. There use to be a maximum per ticket processing fee and now it's a percentage with no max. For my business I sell high ticket items to workshops with a very low number of participants. This has almost doubled my fees.

title: LOVE having tickets at the swipe of a finger!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I am able to provide tickets to an event that you can access right from your mobile device. No more losing tickets. Also can provide info like a map, directions, etc. Very convenient! Highly recommend!
cons: Cons: Really don't have anything that I didn't like.

title: Easy to use, but can get pricey depending on what you're doing with it!
name: Lisa T.
pros: Pros: From a user point of view, it's very easy to buy, schedule, and redeem a ticket for an event. From a company standpoint, setting it up is also easy and they track your tickets and can handle all transactions. (But you do have to pay a fee)
cons: Cons: Although this works great for paid events, it can get pricey when you are doing a smaller free event, as the fees can really add up.
overall: Overall: Easy company to use for tickets (buying from or selling on).

title: Use Eventbrite for your event!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I can't say enough good things about this software. Ease of use #1! I will always use this software for event purposes. No one ever has a question b/c it's that easy!
cons: Cons: No negative feedback on EventBrite! Will be using this again in the near future!

title: User Friendly
name: Camille D.
pros:
Pros: Simple instructions and self explanatory

Easy access to promote on social media
cons: Cons: There is a fee if you use Eventbrite to process your payments, but it's a minimal fee.
overall: Overall: I would recommend Eventbrite, it's easy to set up and, it help gives you a little credibility if you're a newbie.

title: Eventbrite review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The BEST software for accepting reservations for any sort of event or program. It's easy to use and very user friendly, the form is very easy to customize so you can ask any sort of question while accepting RSVPs. It's so helpful to collect info on your clients that way.
cons: Cons: No cons - it's a great product and really easy to use for the administrator and the users.

title: Number 1 choice due to simplicity
name: Freddie I.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite beats any competition by its simplicity of use. Within minutes anyone can set up an event page with a range of useful features that can help you manage an attendee list, promote it and keep attendees updated with important information or changes. Particularly useful is how this syncs with Apple Wallet so you can check people's invites quickly upon entry with little effort from the customer required.
cons: Cons: Sometimes there is duplication of tickets and its not clear if customers need to down load a ticket or just use an email as confirmation.

title: Made our Event planning a breeze!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I loved how it allowed me to have our event posted for clients to register and pay online instead of having to collect the money in person for our events. Made the process of RSVP a breeze!
cons: Cons: Sometimes there would be a glitch i guess and some people would register twice. Not 100% sure how that happened but there would be one person that it would happen to each event.

title: Eventbrite has it all!
name: Sander W.
pros: Pros: Easy setup of events- and attendees registration. The tool allows you to send the invitations, check on bounces, and review who has clicked & RSVP'd. You're able to manage waitlists, multiple ticket types, reimbursements, and custom order forms, all through the application.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite should connect better with third-party integrations (i.e. Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.) rather than its own website. Sometimes it can be difficult to get in contact with support which causes delays in having issues resolved. It would be great if the analytics were more robust and expansive!

title: good for getting event information out, but a bit complicated
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: i enjoy eventbrite as a way to present information about events around town, especially the blurbs that lead such presentations. through the software i've marketed and attended a number of events that i would not have known about otherwise.
cons: Cons: while getting information about events is easy in the software, registering for them is another matter. a lot of the time i am taken to third party websites to finish the registration, but can't do so because that action logs me out of eventbrite, which makes a two-minute process into a ten-minute one.
overall: Overall: when receiving an invite through the software, i look up other ways to rsvp to avoid getting timed out or logged out of the software. i cannot say that i've had a great experience with it.

title: great event management tool
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: easy to use and share. I like it automatically updates my google calendar.
cons: Cons: in searching, sometimes too many events not of my interest show up that it's difficult to locate certain events

title: bye-bye paper invites
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love how you can add so many plug-ins to the product that make an event organizer's life so much easier. It's a very easy to understand and manipulate product as well.
cons: Cons: I feel like the ticketing options could be slightly better than what they are.

title: Good Product
name: April L.
comments: Comments: Great product and continues to become more user friendly.
pros: Pros: The integration with Facebook.
cons: Cons: Can become confusing with regards to promotions.

title: This product is great for events and tickets!
name: Trisha M.
pros: Pros: It is easy to use and stores and hold information. We used this for race registration for athletic events such as our spring dash which is a 5 K race.
cons: Cons: It give the user and option to create a profile. If they don't create a profile then data is not stored.

title: Affordable event planning made easy!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite made planning my annual sales conference a dream. I discovered it last year while planning our awards ceremony and banquet. I had looked into other products, but Eventbrite was by far the most cost effective for our needs. Eventbrite made meal planning, accommodations, and even printing nametags as easy as possible. We recevied praise from our end-users and they too found it easy to use. We will be using it again this year for more event planning.
cons: Cons: I did find a few navigations combersome at first, but the support team was great at helping me learn the program.
overall: Overall: Overall I was quite impressed with the ease of the program. We will be using it again this year at even smaller events. Very affordable and delivers as promised.

title: Best event scheduling software
name: Tyler H.
comments: Comments: I love using Eventbright and recommend it for any event scheduling.
pros: Pros: Eventbright makes it easy to create and share events with your audience. It also makes it easy to RSVP for events and use your mobile device to show your event tickets.
cons: Cons: Although Eventbright makes it easy to obtain tickets and share events it would be great to have the ability to store tickets in Apple Pay. There are not many cons as I love using this tool.

title: Eventbrite is Excellent for Event Promotion
name: Teresa Herbic H.
comments: Comments: Excellent resource for promoting your important events and causes. Thank you!
pros: Pros: I have been using Eventbrite for many years for both adoption and orphan care events, as well as for orchestra events. It is a very positive resource for getting the word out promotionally and successfully. I love this program!
cons: Cons: n.a - I love Eventbrite. I don't see any real cons with this important tool for promoting events most successfully.

title: Just enough features to get the job done
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is probably the best player in the events space because it's user-friendly and it has all the capabilities you need to pull off a great event and notify people. It tracks registrants and disseminates the information about the event efficiently.
cons: Cons: It's a little clunky and old-fashioned-- the UI could use an update and it can sometimes be complicated to register. Minor things like having to scroll for a long time to select a drop-down option.
overall: Overall: It has everything you need to pull off an event and manage the event participants. Definitely the tried and true event technology!

title: Convenience
name: Nikki D.
pros: Pros: I really like Eventbrite because it is simple and easy to use. Help me with posting and sending invites.
cons: Cons: At times it can be difficult to add list of contacts or update contacts since it doesn't link up with other sites

title: Event Planning with Eventbrite
name: Tonya J.
pros: Pros: Easily promote your event and sell tickets. People in your area can also see your social media feeds when you connect them to Eventbrite.
cons: Cons: Their cut is excessive and you have to wait until after the event to receive your money. Not helpful for some events.

title: Great for local, community events
name: Maria H.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite helps local communities get the word out about their events and handles the tickets. I love that there is no charge to those organizations hosting free events. Perfect for churches and community events just trying to have successful events.
cons: Cons: I have not used Eventbrite for anything but free events, so I am unsure of the fee schedule for paid ticket sales. Other than that, no complaints.

title: Great for Promoting & Managing Events
name: Nick T.
pros: Pros: Very simple to use. Great for promoting events, set up registration for attendees as well as sell tickets.Can be integrated in websites.
cons: Cons: Can't really say anything negative about Eventbrite. It's mobile friendly and very easy to use all around and

title: Eventbrite keeps event ticketing manageable
name: Kelli D.
pros: Pros: Options for promotion, fee flexibility (ie can be paid by either buyer or producer), option to process all payments immediately with paypal, generates traffic for event beyond your own reach
cons: Cons: They send way too many emails once you've created an event.
overall: Overall: I started using Eventbrite for my comedy shows after a bad experience with another ticket vendor. I like the flexibility and ease of use, their CMS is easy once you get the hang of it.

title: Make your event brite
name: Kim M.
pros: Pros: I have signed up for events and trainings using this software. I was able to quickly and easily sign up, pay and move on to other important tasks.
cons: Cons: I was not able to find issues with this product in the past. It works the way it's supposed to.

title: Easy way to organize events
name: Libby A.
pros: Pros: Easy tool to plan event, especially one for many people requiring tickets and a strict ticket procurement time
cons: Cons: Have heard feedback from guests that it has timed out during busy times via their mobile browser.

title: Quick to use but a few bugs
name: Kevin S.
pros: Pros: Using this app have been great, I travel a lot for Carnivals and would normally buy a wide number of event tickets either online or physical and have lost a few in the past. This app helps me keep them all in one place and on a digital forum.
cons: Cons: Sometimes I find it hard to find the tickets that I have bought when at the events due to not having wifi and my saved option is something unaccessible.

title: Great way to sell event tickets.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use and set up.
cons: Cons: I feel that the fee's per ticket are higher than I would like but also understand Eventbrite is a business.

title: Awesome Software
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love the fact that I can just about any event I'm looking for as well as plan my own events and keep count of who is attending. I also love the fact that I can payout my money to PayPal instead of waiting until the event ends.
cons: Cons: There is nothing I least like about EventBrite. Eventbrite is the only software I use to create online events.
overall: Overall: Although I create event on FB, Eventbrite is a trusted site to collect payments.

title: Easy way to sell tickets
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Great way to sell tickets for events. It's nice to be able to find local events by topic online and it certainly opens up ideas for things to attend.
cons: Cons: When the event is sold out, some of the details (like original cost) are no longer available.

title: Event scheduling software
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love this software and use it almost weekly to sign up for events. My favorite function is the tag function that allows me to filter out events I'd like to see.
cons: Cons: I wish the search function were better.

title: Tickets at Ease
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I enjoyed how easy and safe it is to purchase event tickets from Eventbrite. Also, information about the event is easy to find and navigate in the app.
cons: Cons: I can honestly say that I have not experienced any negative experiences using this software.

title: I love it but at a price!
name: Joe C.
pros: Pros: I love that it allows us to create alumni events and then sell tickets easily
cons: Cons: Fees are a little bit steep in my opinion. Especially if you chose the base option!
overall: Overall: It is easy for us to arrange events that otherwise would be time consuming for our project coordinators to manage.

title: Excellent product
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: So easy to use, outstanding invite platform
cons: Cons: Cannot think of any downsides to this software

title: Use it for everything from business to personal
name: Kelly G.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a great tool to get any events being held out to the public. It offers a wide variety of details where you can post as much (or as minimal) about the event as you'd like, post images, etc. Extremely easy to use and sharing to social sites is incredibly easy.
cons: Cons: Not too many that I could think of. What I use it for, it's perfect. It functions from a business and consumer perspective.

title: Quite good to find new events
name: Damiano C.
pros: Pros: Good range of events to discover what to do in a new city
cons: Cons: Sometimes the quality of the content of the events is really low. They should implement a filter to avoid low quality events/images to be published

title: Love it...
name: Tiffany W.
pros: Pros: I love the ease of not only buying tickets to an event but also CREATING events of my own for the classes that I teach. The reporting and analytics are awesome. Everything you need as a vendor is right there....
cons: Cons: There is nothing I like least about the software
overall: Overall: I have never had a negative experience with Eventbrite ever! Even when it came time to getting paid for events that I have hosted. Everything has worked out just fine.

title: Evetbit
name: Reen C.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a great easy way to send invites
cons: Cons: Eventbrite sometimes ends up in spam mail

title: Multiple events source
name: Lorenzo M.
pros: Pros: Good level of events available even in small locations
cons: Cons: The automatic personalization of events is not accurate, would be nice to have a better algorithm available. However the filter system is quite good.

title: Handy For Music Lovers!
name: Jenna R.
comments: Comments: When on the move and exploring new music, Event Brite has made it easy to check into events, shows and more. It's great that unlike many of their peers, they don't overload you with spam mail after you've signed up. I find that I prefer events that use Event Brite over other programs for ticket check in.
pros: Pros: No Spam, works flawlessly.

title: Familiar and trusted
name: Andrea T.
pros: Pros: I've used this through purchasing tickets quite a few times, seems easy to use and allows anyone to set up an event and sell tickets through the site
cons: Cons: Not much - maybe change the visual aspect of it and allow more customisation for events?

title: We use this for all our free events!
name: Tiffany L.
pros: Pros: We are a small real estate teams that offer client appreciation events to our clients that are free! This is a great program to keep track of who's coming and be able to keep the attendees up to date on the event (you can send out emails to the attendees)
cons: Cons: If you plan on charging for the event, eventbrite charges you to use their service. Luckily we only have free events with our company.

title: Great for event planning
name: Tammy A.
comments: Comments: I really like Eventbrite and would recommend it to others.
pros: Pros: I like that this site is easy to use and you are able to plan an event with everyone paying for themselves.
cons: Cons: It took me a little bit to figure out how to retrieve my tickets once I purchased it.

title: Easy and to the point
name: Bilal A.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and does what you want to do. I have bought many tickets with ease.
cons: Cons: Should include multiple logins so collect all tickets in one place. I have a university account and a personal one so it should be able to tell me about all.
overall: Overall: I have enjoyed using the software and its features. It is a useful software and should include more features like full fledged timetables of events, etc.

title: Eventbrite makes event planning and tracking hassle free!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to set up an event! Another aspect I love is how easily you can share your events on social media directly after set up. When planning an event on Facebook you can include a direct link to Eventbrite on the event page directing users to buy tickets. I also love that it has the option to create both paid and free events.
cons: Cons: After your event is over, it takes up to 10 business days to receive payment from the tickets sold. If you have to pay other vendors right away this can be tough as you have to wait to get paid.

title: Multiple User
name: Debbie C.
pros: Pros: I have attended multiple vents and it seems like everyone is using Eventbrite for scheduling. I really like that you can look at different categories, events or both.
cons: Cons: Sometimes with so many events listed it is hard to find everything going on in an area. Then on some weekends and holidays it is hard to decide since there are so many different choices!

title: I have used this for personal and professional events
name: Timothy Y.
pros: Pros: I like that updates come to your phone and email. you also get reminders about your event and can see who is attending
cons: Cons: i do not have any cons. I have never had a poor or bad experience using this software. not sure how anyone could
overall: Overall: great for events

title: No more printing tickets!
name: Jessica L.
pros: Pros: I like that it offers an options to use the QR code option for tickets versus the traditional printouts.
cons: Cons: I don't like that they charge a fee to use the services. Sometimes they charge the consumer and other times they charge the event host.

title: Pretty straightforward - no complaints
name: Kayleigh B.
pros: Pros: I really like how straightforward Eventbrite is. I also prefer using Eventbrite because a lot of people already have accounts through them, so it's easier to get people to attend your event or find your event when browsing the site. There's a feature that allows you to print a nametag for everyone attending which has come in handy at Career Fairs.
cons: Cons: There really isn't a whole lot of customizing available. There's just the one, or maybe two, templates available so complete branding is not offered. This also goes for the emails as well.

title: Best way to promote and manage an event
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's amazing, it doesn't charge any money for free events and lets clients have their tickets for your event effortlessly. When I used it for a free event that my organization hosted it allowed us to organize the attendees using barcodes which was very praised by our organizating and logistics team.
cons: Cons: To be honest while using it I didn't encounter anything that I disliked about it

title: Pretty good
name: Nadia V.
pros:
Pros: Eventbrite is great for searching for events near you and paying for the tickets.

There are categories to help you search.

Their fee for tickets isn't too high.

When you come to an event, you just have to show the QR code, and there's nothing more convenient than that.
cons: Cons: If you have any problem with your ticket, support might not even answer you.
overall: Overall: Easy to pay for tickets, easy to find events

title: Planning an Event
name: Marie M.
pros: Pros: I used Event Brite for a large event. It's very user friendly and I love the immediate response when someone replies with an RSVP. It was very easy to plan and coordinate the event.
cons: Cons: I wouldn't change anything about Event Brite.

title: All your events under one platform
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Can filter events by categories and all information is available under one platform
cons: Cons: The events don't appear in any chronological order so can get difficult to find the most recent upcoming event

title: Good option as an internet based invitation
name: Sandra S.
comments: Comments: I like Evite and I can't think of another big competitor out there
pros: Pros: Pretty much every company I've worked for used Evites and it's been easy to access the invite at any time and see who has RSVP'd and how many +1s are coming. Very user friendly it seems
cons: Cons: I honestly can't think of any cons regarding the platform. Maybe it'd be nice if they could add a video feature or add multiple photos to an invite?

title: Schedule Your Event Now
name: Kyle W.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes it very easy and convinent to make an event for your next performance, book reading, etc. Making an event is very straight forward and you can set your own ticket prices. Buying through eventbrite is also safe, secure, and very easy for your customers.
cons: Cons: Obviously they take a cut of the ticket sales, but that's to be expected with a website like this! It's a minor thing to be honest. Any other website would do the same thing.
overall: Overall: Use Eventbrite for all of your upcoming events and save yourself the peace of mind knowing that you are in good hands.

title: Great system, helps sell event invites
name: Adam H.
pros: Pros: If you mostly use it for free events (like us) - it's completely free. All the main functionality is available in their free tier - very impressive.
cons: Cons: Honestly - it's very good. Maybe it'd be nice to have some different designs for the event landing pages but the stock one works pretty well.
overall: Overall: Can't beat it for the price & functionality. Also works well in countries outside the US / Europe unlike a lot of systems.

title: I used Eventbrite on two projects. Both were a success
name: Joe H.
pros: Pros: We initially were going to build our own event registration feature for two websites for upcoming events. The best decision we made was to use Eventbrite instead. It saved us a ton of development time and the reporting is very nice.
cons: Cons: I have not had a negative experience with Eventbrite to date. If something comes up I'll update this review but I don't see any reason that would happen.

title: Good for setting Up Invites
name: Sharon B.
pros: Pros: This software allows you to quickly create invitations to events. There is a minimum learning curve and suitable templates are available. I found this useful in a pinch.
cons: Cons: The con I have regarding this software actually deals with their marketing. The marketing is a bit intrusive and become annoying. Outside of that it is a pretty good resource.

title: Eventbrite is an extraordinarily user-friendly software
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is easy to use and user-friendly, you can make an event posting with Eventbrite within mere minutes. The event pages look surprisingly professional and add a certain amount of legitimacy to events, compared to say conducting it by Facebook. EventBrite also makes RSVP-ing incredibly efficient, and is an example of modern innovation making our day-to-day lives a bit easier than in the past.
cons: Cons: EventBrite can feel limited when you're not a premium user, but that's to be expected with any tiered software. If you're looking to create a paid event, their fees can seem somewhat high as well. However, if you're coordinating public, free events, then EventBrite is perfect for you.

title: Easy Experience, Frustrating Fees
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The ticket buying experience is very straight forward and easy. Also customer service is very easy to reach.
cons: Cons: The service fee is a little steep. This seems like an industry standard to charge a fee for each ticket but a way in which Eventbrite could really differentiate itself from other ticket vendors would be to charge one service fee per transaction, rather then per ticket. Just an idea.

title: Great for parties to events
name: Madison M.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a great way to promote local events. You can include all the when?, where?, who?, why? information in an easy to read summary. You can create different tiers of tickets for consumers to buy and it will email them the confirmation. You can then contact customers with further detail.
cons: Cons: The pricing structure varies and can get expensive if you didn't budget for that.

title: Eventbrite has made me more social!
name: Sana A.
position: Senior Manager, Social Media Content Strategy
pros: Pros: I'm a huge fan of Eventbrite as iit's helped me find numerous events that tI'm interested in. I like thtat the site is so easy to use and the multiple filter options are helpful to narrow down the exact event I'm looking for, whether it's a professional conference, a networking event or a happy hour.
cons: Cons: I would like to see better event recommendations based on user history.

title: Easy to use, fees arent crazy
name: Paolo C.
pros: Pros: Ease of use with mobile ticketing is great feature. Although personally I'm old school, this does come in handy! Fees don't seem exorbitant on here, which is always appreciated.
cons: Cons: I have had a little bit of difficulty finding events in the app - maybe due to the way their search feature is programmed.
overall: Overall: Overall a very solid app and seems like it would be cost effective to those hosting even for free events.

title: Great app for online event planning
name: Mario M.
comments: Comments: It is a great app for organising all your events both online and onsite. We have been using it for over a year organising more than 20 internal and external events per month and it has proven to be a very productive and cost-effective app.
pros: Pros: Ease of use Price Fast deployment
cons: Cons: Problems with the search in website integration

title: My one stop for browsing through events
name: Neha V.
pros: Pros: (1) Ease of browsing through upcoming local events (2) A one stop shop to buy tickets to the events you want to go to (3) Different filters available make it easy to search based on the preferences like kids event or cultural event
cons: Cons: I have not seen a way to sign up for a notification with respect to the event that I am interested to go to so that if any change happens i can be notified

title: Eventbrite
name: sharon s.
pros: Pros: Pretty straight forward when using Eventbrite, all you do is search for an event you are interested in and buy the tickets on the website. Tickets are downloaded instantly, you can print them out or have the e-tickets on your phone to be scanned.
cons: Cons: Maybe broaden the different type of events, include smaller events that may be more local. Also, i don't like the processing fee.

title: Eventbrite
name: alex f.
pros: Pros: It does not take a long time to load the app and there are no issues between the web/mobile experience.
cons: Cons: The only con would be that I don't use it that often. There are other services offering similar products so it isn't used with all events.
overall: Overall: All in all it's good when you need it and doesn't seem to have too many troubles. Only drawback is you'll need multiple of the same type of app as there are other players in the space

title: One recruiters opinion
name: Rebecca T.
pros: Pros: It's a great product and it improves how we conduct business but a lot of the pitfalls of the software can outweigh the benefits at times.
