pros: Pros: I was able to RSVP and receive my tickets to an event with a simple click
cons: Cons: It would be cool to also use as a personal planner

title: Eventbrite is for Everyone!
name: Jill R.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use. You can pass the service charge to attendees. Great way to send updates to all attendees.
cons: Cons: Can't think of a single "con". This is a great app!

title: I use Eventbrite for signing up for events.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's good for signing up for events and that's about it. There's not much else that I'd recommend about this product.
cons: Cons: I do not like the email reminders when signing up for an event. It could be much less invasive in my inbox.

title: Easy to use
name: Alessandro P.
comments: Comments: Overall a good helper to organize your events!
pros: Pros: I love using Eventbrite because it is easy to use and makes your life easier when it comes to send multiple invitations and follow-up with each of them.
cons: Cons: It takes a couple of minutes to adapt to the software and to configure the body, text and users, but nothing too much to stress.

title: Great ticketing software
name: Lauren E.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to set up events, customize verbiage, and change or add payment settings. It is very intuitive, and it's a brand and system that's become more well-known and wide-spread where customers trust the system and secure payment checkout platform to be able to purchase without any worries.
cons: Cons: I wish I could customize the landing page more with different fonts, colors, and adding photo layouts. The option to be able to have a spotify streaming widget embeded would be great too.
overall: Overall: ease of setting up events

title: Simple and to the point
name: Diego Y.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is easy for both the administrator setting up an event and a user who is going to the event.
cons: Cons: Nothing, the software is simple and right to the point.

title: Great idea!
name: Mia Irene L.
pros: Pros: You can promote your event easily by using this software. It's easy to use! Plus, it sends reminders through email.
cons: Cons: If there could be more options for design.

title: Eventbrite
name: Jennifer S.
pros: Pros: This software provides an effective way to create and respond to events.
cons: Cons: While the software is neat and clear in appearance, it also appears overly simplistic.

title: Eventbrite has been super wonderful!!!
name: Chad F.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite has been so wonderful for my fitness startup! I am not a tech person at all, but I have found the site easy to navigate in order to create appealing and effective event and registration pages! It is very very user friendly and has helped create a community for my customers! My only bit of advice is that it takes a bit of time for tech support to respond to questions submitted online. Other than that my relationship and experience with Eventbrite has been quite wonderful!

title: Easy to set up events and all of your guests
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The ease of ability to set up an event and all of your guests, really simple.
cons: Cons: It does provide a lot of ads and follow ups on the free version, to be expected.

title: Easy Events
name: Eric W.
pros: Pros: eventbrite is the easiest/best way to find something to do on a popular weekend, the signup is quick and easy, and you can even sign up for multiple events without thinking too much about it
cons: Cons: i dont like how you get stuck on the mailing lists of events after the event concludes. I have to unsubscribe constantly

title: Very useful tool for event planning
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Very easy to set up an event, the mobile app is great as well.
cons: Cons: You have to cut and paste names and emails, it would be great if there was a way to sync contacts.

title: Great experience thus far. Only been using for about 6-8 months
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This product is key for not only external marketing and campaign awareness but for office-wide (internal) events as well. It has been a great way for us to stay connected in office and promote product outside of the office to reach as many end users as possible.
cons: Cons: I have nothing negative to say, really. I think twice now while uploading new events or editing event information, the software froze or crashed without auto-saving the information that was already started.

title: Staying local or checking out a different city ?
name: Tyler A.
pros: Pros: I appreciate how easy it is to look up events as well as create everyday girls nights, or movie dates.
cons: Cons: I honestly haven't ran into any issues with this software. Every experience either connecting with friends or creating my own event has been easy, efficient and made keeping track of minor details SOOOO MUCH EASIER!

title: Events Events Events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Great way to get a hold of tons of people to invite them to an event
cons: Cons: I don't like that I can not use it on the wallet app without having to download the app.

title: EventBrite
name: Ashley B.
pros: Pros: I liked that I was able to post multiple events and schedules onto this platform for easy posting.
cons: Cons: I don't like that the process is long and that you cant put together the slides on EventBrite and have to save it from another source.
overall: Overall: Overall EventBrite does make it so much easier to post a live schedule, and its just as easy to make changes if necessary.

title: What a great tool
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy way to create, organize and invite - an event planners greatest tool
cons: Cons: Sometimes hard for attendees to calendar the event or find more info once rsvp'ed.

title: Super easy and great software
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This is my preferred method of getting tickets to events, it is quick, easy, and secure.
cons: Cons: Sometimes scanners have a tough time picking up a qr code on my phone.

title: EventBrite
name: muhammad s.
pros:
Pros: Free

Ease of use

online

accessible from various devices
cons:
Cons: no offline capabilities

not good for third world countries or developing countries because they don't have internet
overall: Overall: GOOD.

title: Eventbrite is an inexpensive and incredibly easy to use ticketing platform
name: Peter Z.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is very easy to setup and configure events for our company, both as attendees and host company for lunch and learn events and networking sessions.
cons: Cons: It would be great if the location details for events would permit multiple locations for tours and/or events that travel from one location to the other.

title: Event creation and tracking with ease.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Even as a free tool, Eventbrite offers users many features that allow tracking of analytics of events.
cons: Cons: Sometimes the mobile app can be a little confusing.

title: Eventbrite
name: Pamela M.
pros: Pros: It is very user friendly and I used this software to book multiple events in the past with ease.
cons: Cons: There isn't anything that I dislike about this software.

title: Go-to app for finding events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is really easy to use and helps me basically find events around the city in which I might be interested.
cons: Cons: I haven't come across any feature which is frustrating to deal with in the app. From the time the event is selected to the time of receiving the confirmation, it is really smooth to use.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite has helped me to identify events and opportunities that are happening around the city. It consolidates the events at one place so you don't have to move from one website to another and waste your time.

title: Great product!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Evenbrite has simplified our event registration process significantly.
cons: Cons: No complaints! Would definitely recommend.

title: Excellent software
name: Manjot S.
pros: Pros: I have used this software to book several business events for our staff. It is very easy to use and quick to process events. It nicely organises event history and saves e-tickets for us to get in which are easily accessible on my phone.
cons: Cons: It doesn't have as many events available to book as some other sites.

title: Eventbrite will help sell more tickets online!
name: Michael K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: EventBrite is a fantastic tool for any event. It is reliable, accurate and cost-effective. I've urged team members to leverage Eventbrite for their personal events as well as continuous learning meetups here at work.
pros: Pros: I like most about Eventbrite is it's ability to work for any event, from concerts to a child's birthday party, it can help anyone plan an event. If the event is free, the the Eventbrite application is free! There is a great guide provided that helps beginners to go through setting an event up. It has great features and connects to 3rd party apps!
cons: Cons: The thing I like least is the limited options for the look and feel for your event page. The support from Eventbrite is great but it updates quickly. It can be difficult to find explanations online so you will need to go to Eventbrite customer service for answers (not a bad thing).

title: Standard for Event Promotion
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I have used this specifically for promoting corporate events in multiple cities. This software is incredibly easy to use and should be standard for any event large or small. Great for both promotion and RSVP management.
cons: Cons: The branding elements are minimal and you lose traffic to your website if you typically use a landing page for marketing and RSVP purposes

title: Can always depend on EventBrite
name: Jackie D.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has become the go-to for my company's event listings. It is easy to use and conveniently displays information on the page in a way that is pleasing to the eye. I think that EventBrite has streamlined event planning for the better.
cons: Cons: I think there could be a little more customization in terms of typeface/font size, but overall I am very satisfied.
overall: Overall: I am glad that this software is becoming more widely used so that all (or most) events can be accessed from one solid platform.

title: Best event registration system
name: Carlos C.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite is simple, customizable and accesible for all users and attendees. I organize small and big events and I can have a good control of registration and the event check in as well, all in once! Practical and modern, there is no better system that this one to organize events.

title: Best Free Ticketing System!
name: Aaron R.
pros: Pros: Ease of use and functionalitiy
cons: Cons: None
overall: Overall: We have used Eventbrite for over 3 years. We are a small distributor that host monthly lunch and learns for our customers. The ease of use makes our events successful every time!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: None

title: Eventbrite
name: Danielle F.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite is an easy to use, reliable site that allows you to scope out the best deals.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite allows you to seamlessly find tickets to different events in your destination at a great rate.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite is very competitive as there are always tons of users on the site so it is best to check back in and set notifications.

title: Great software for large event planning
name: Anna P.
comments: Comments: Great software for planning events.
pros: Pros: Easy to use Fast response Clean look and intuitive interface
cons: Cons: Time limit can be too short for user to enter all information.

title: Great for personal use and work!
name: Ari M.
pros: Pros: I use eventbrite to set up events for my personal and professional endeavors and its easy to use
cons: Cons: nothing. It's a very great and easy to use website

title: Great for free service. Limited support.
name: Mollie R.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite is a great for a simple, free service. If you're looking for detailed functionality, their work arounds get a little awkward for users. Also, support is slow to respond and I have had to work pretty hard to get to a real person.

title: Eventbright
name: Rosanna F.
pros: Pros: It's online and easy to use
cons: Cons: No possibility of uploading photos/documents
overall: Overall: The experience with Eventbright was OK but did not respond to our growing needs as the event drew to a close. We required people to send their photos which we needed for the badges but this programme would not let them upload these and we needed to send separate emails to each participant, resulting in photos with different formats and lots more work.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Would like the features to include an upload option

title: Full featured and easy to use - as an event provider and an attendee
name: Joe G.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite brings everything together in to one place for your event planning - selling tickets is easy, and allows easy registration at the event itself. The costs aren't too high, either.
cons: Cons: I've not really got anything negative to say about the software. I suppose the recommendations for related events attendees might like could be improved.
overall: Overall: Having used Eventbrite to purchase tickets for events I'm attending, and for organising events too, I've found it to be a very helpful all rounder.

title: Efficient Ticketing
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use platform for selling tickets to our events
cons: Cons: wish we could design different ticket emails
overall: Overall: Brilliant. have made our move into paid for events very simple

title: Great For Communities
name: Jenny P.
pros: Pros: This platform is a great modality for small communities to purchase and sell tickets or host workshops. You can easily download it onto your smart phone and have easy access to your ticket and information around the event.
cons: Cons: Sometimes it can be tricky navigating a ticket once you've purchased it.

title: Always easy
name: Samantha C.
pros: Pros: Whenever I see a link to an event that uses Eventbrite, I know it will be easy to use
cons: Cons: Sometimes I don't get reminders when I have upcoming events.

title: great way to share and attend events
name: Christine Y.
pros: Pros: It's a very easy way to find and attend events
cons: Cons: I can't really think of anything but it might be nice if you could sell one-off event tickets on here

title: Pretty good platform to keep track and sign up for events near you
name: Wei Z.
pros: Pros: It summarizes the events near you and gives you options to attend
cons: Cons: I've only used it a handful of times but so far nothing I can say that's negative

title: Easy to use
name: Michael M.
pros: Pros: -It's easy for end users -It's available in app and web form, so it's easy to find and access -The interface/GUI is intuitive
cons: Cons: -I didn't find any major flaws but the algorithm for figuring out what events are similar to others (and may be interesting to the user) is very poor and makes odd recommendations.

title: Easily sell tickets and while keeping your event organized!
name: Remington K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: It has very good Search Engine Optimization and will bring your event up in a google search relatively.
pros: Pros: Events are simple to setup and easy to manage. You can customize your event page with a description, as well as an event image and business image. It is nice having all of your tickets in one place and being able to print out a master list of attendees for the event.
cons: Cons: Some attendees had a difficult time finding the event on Eventbrite via their search bar. It had a hard time finding "David's" in the search.

title: Easy organization tool
name: Robert T.
pros: Pros: It's very easy to set up, invite, RSVP and organize events.
cons: Cons: Making people download a full app is sometimes a hassle, especially for just one event.

title: Needs to work better with other programs
name: Erin F.
pros: Pros: It's very easy to create an event, see the registrants, and pull a list for check-in. You can easily customize the event and advertise within the site itself.
cons: Cons: We use Hubspot and the fields do not cleanly transfer over into our CRM system, even though it's supposed to be compatible. We also suddenly lost the ability to see some of the required fields we ask on the Eventbrite form, so besides the initial notification emails, there is no way to go in and find our registrants details, which is very frustrating.

title: Eventbrite for hosting Outreaches
name: Jessica W.
pros: Pros: This tool makes it easy to marketing and sell outreach event tickets all in one space. It is very well organized and easy to use.
cons: Cons: Customization of the event pages are very limited.
overall: Overall: Overall Eventbrite makes event planning and payments easy to manage. The mobile ticket features are also very handy whenit comes to event check in.

title: Eventbrite - A great event management tool
name: Cole M.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite is a fantastic software package designed with the management of events at its core. With lots of native functionality and integrations to associated technology platforms, Eventbrite is a must have for companies looking to improve their event management capabilities. The ability to either pass along or absorb fees makes Eventbrite very flexible from a budgeting perspective. Overall, a great piece of software!

title: Events made easy
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to input event data and share event page to gain interest.
cons: Cons: There are no cons. Attendees can sign up for events directly through event page.

title: LOVE Eventbrite
name: Arestia R.
comments: Comments: I plan events for several groups in town and Eventbrite is simply the best tool for all my needs from start to finish. It's easy for guests to sign up for the event, but my favorite part is the check in app. It's the worst when you get to an event and there's a huge line because the organizers have to manually check off arrivals. But with the app, it's so quick and easy, we can zip people right through. Plus, we have a great rep in Boston. Highly recommend!

title: EventBrite was very easy to use
name: Alex L.
comments: Comments: We use EventBrite for some of our smaller fundraisers and monthly events. It is very easy to use, track attendees and payments, as well as share information and post-event details. Overall we really like using it and our volunteers appreciate the easy information. We would like to see additional app functionality and integration with new payment options as they come available but overall this is a great tool for us.

title: Eventbrite has been awesome
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to purchase tickets and save to my digital wallet.
cons: Cons: I don't have any cons other than the ease of finding a venue is challenging sometimes.

title: Great for tickets to events
name: Derek G.
pros: Pros: My favorite part about eventbrite is how it spans across multiple industries. I have purchased seminar tickets as well as concert tickets for competitive pricing.
cons: Cons: Sometimes I can't find exactly what I'm looking for (not too often), and have to use a different platform to get the tickets i need.

title: I love Finding New Events
name: Natalie R.
pros: Pros: This software is so easy to use and is great for finding similar events!
cons: Cons: Sometimes the similar events you are searching for aren't relevant.

title: Great for setting up and running events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Evertbrite is really easy to set up and use. I've used it s both an organiser and attendee of events and it is great for generating guest lists and communications between organisers and attendees.
cons: Cons: Perhaps the fee when using it professionally organising events however I can see the benefits.

title: Easy to Use
name: Tanner L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I just started using and managing Eventbrite recently. It's pretty easy to navigate and is becoming more of the industry standard for event management software. We are using it for an event here in just a few weeks and I have been very happy with it.
cons: Cons: Honestly, not a ton to put here yet. So far we have been really happy with how it's performed. Initially we had a link that didn't work, but that was user error, not really Eventbrites fault.

title: eventbrite
name: Elizabeth G.
pros: Pros: That it allows our company to get our events seen and have people RSVP easily.
cons: Cons: That creating a visually appealing event takes a bit of time.

title: Eventbrite
name: Sarah N.
pros: Pros: I use this software for events and meetings so I can get a head count.
cons: Cons: So far I have not found anything that I like least about this software.

title: Bought a lot of tickets through Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The tickets are easy to buy and the timer makes you act faster than you normally might.
cons: Cons: I have no problems with Eventbrite. All good things.

title: Easy to use event management software
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We've used Eventbrite for creating and managing our various events. It's simple and easy to use.
cons: Cons: Their administrative fees are quite high.

title: Easy to Use
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like the ease and convenience of this program for events and functions...even birthday parties.
cons: Cons: I don't like the processing fees that come out of it and informal form of ticket printing.

title: Easy!!!
name: Karrie D.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and you can print the tickets from your computer. I love that you do not have to wait for tickets to come in the mail because they could get lost or ruined. Eventbrite was a game changer for concerts and events everywhere.
cons: Cons: No cons that I am aware of. It is so easy to use.

title: Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use and advertise use for people to attend events. The fees were super reasonable and it was very convenient to get the word out for events hosted.
cons: Cons: A lot of people use Eventbrite. It was hard to find the event posted.
overall: Overall: It was great for my business and I really enjoyed the ease of promoting my business.

title: Way too Expensive
name: Robbie N.
pros: Pros: The software is easy to use and the features and UI is simple enough to understand without technical savvy.
cons: Cons: This is an unbelievably expensive service and not worth it for what you get.

title: Awesome for event/coouse participation
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: A breeze to use, quick and easy. Very user friendly interface. Awesome for tracking guests/registrants to a variety of events/courses.
cons: Cons: No cons from my user standpoint. It was easy and did not require alot of time to "learn" how to use .
overall: Overall: Used Eventbrite for 'online" courses, tracking progress of participants.

title: Easy to use and effective for small events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I used eventbrite for a fundraising event and it was really easy to use and worked really well! Collected money and sent emails to those coming as well. Seamless.
cons: Cons: I wish they had various design templates built in. Not too bad though in terms of looks.
overall: Overall: Great experience! Will use again if I need to.

title: Good solid event tool
name: Christine N.
comments: Comments: It works well for attendee registration, I look forward to continued product innovation and integration with other solutions.
pros: Pros: Ease of use for attendee registration
cons: Cons: Customer support is very limited

title: Excellent Program
name: samantha c.
pros: Pros: easy to use, and organize events and RSVPS. All event info is easily accessible.
cons: Cons: nothing. great software. I don't have any complaints.

title: Flexible event planning and execution platform
name: James P.
pros: Pros: Shows a list of events near you or a place of your choosing. You can also choose events to attend according to category. Provides APIs which you can easily integrate with any platforms that you have to use it more seamless Has mobile Apps hence easily accessible
cons: Cons: Does not have a self hosted version for those who don't want to use Software as a service option denying corporates that have regular events from eliminating recurring costs.

title: Reliable and a great way to spread the word about your event
name: Bryan A.
comments: Comments: Used it often as organizer and as an attendee of multiple events. It is very easy to use for signing up and the platform does a great job of exposing me to nearby events my friends may be attending as well.

title: Easily host events through Eventbrite
name: Vinayak S.
pros: Pros: Very easy to set up and host an event. Can customize things like number of tickets allowed per user, different pricing as per user.
cons: Cons: It sometimes becomes difficult to locate the ticket booked. The reminder email that is delivered before any event should also have the ticket attached to it.

title: Receiver
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I have only ever been on the receiving end of this but it is very user friendly.
cons: Cons: There is nothing that I have ran into that I dislike.

title: Cool
name: Tshepang R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: Its easy to schedule events using this.. I forget a lot so now it reminds me of dates and the fact that i have tickets for it.
pros: Pros: Visuals
cons: Cons: Not easy to use

title: Cool Tool for Planning and Marketing
name: Robert P.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: Great for Organizing Parties and Events. Corporate get together are made easy and tracking head counts and views are perfect.
cons: Cons: Software gets caught in Spam filters for high security clients.
overall: Overall: Great tool at the price especially if you do a lot of events that you would like clients and potential clients to attend.

title: Events close to you
name: Andre G.
pros: Pros: Its easy to create events, make then unique and then share them with audience.
cons: Cons: Overall its nice tool to use for events.
overall: Overall: Works as expected.

title: Perfect for Seamless Invitations
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: There are so many features packed in and the ease of use is fantastic.
cons: Cons: I would have liked more options in themes for the invitations.

title: (almost) flawless app for event management
name: Kinga O.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is one of the best event apps available on the market. It is very intuitive both for people attending events and for those organizing them, giving possibilities to event marketers for more effective (and cost-effective) event advertising. Also, I like the way it promotes events within the app and website.
cons: Cons: The mobile app should and could work better. Also, the accuracy of locations is not always as precise as it should be...

title: My Ticket Go To
name: Nicholas F.
pros: Pros: I use this app often for a variety of events. Quick, easy, and reliable.
cons: Cons: No complaints thus far. Maybe share more events that I like.

title: Check out all the events happening in your city.
name: Tyler A.
pros: Pros: I love how updated this application is, all the events have details and contact information. I use this site/app to tell my patrons about upcoming events in their area that are usually FREE or under $100.
cons: Cons: I don't like how often they remind you of events once you use their site/app.

title: Terribly easy to use!
name: Sonja A.
pros: Pros: Terribly easy to use. I pretty much had the task of updating my boss' events on Eventbrite thrown into my lap from day one. With no prior experience on the app, I ended up training myself. Seriously, if I can figure it out, anyone can!
cons: Cons: I cannot think of any cons. Again, so very easy to use. I no longer work for this client, but if I had need of it in the future, Eventbrite would be my first choice of app for posting/searching area events.

title: Easy to Use
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a user-friendly system that allows you to plan different events in in just a few moments and is robust enough to let you track the metrics you need.
cons: Cons: The lack of integration with other systems
overall: Overall: We have our members use Eventbrite to schedule local events. The process of collecting data is simple, seamless and incredible efficient and a huge time saver.

title: Eventbrite is wonderful for planning an event!
name: Jasmin P.
position: Virtual Field Trip Teacher/Coordinator at Roper Mountain Science Center
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: I loved using Eventbrite to plan my recent event. It was easy to use and kept track of who I'd invited and also sent reminders to them about the event. It made it so easy and effortless AND saved trees by being digital.
cons: Cons: I can't really think of any negatives from my experience.

title: Internet thieves
name: Peter H.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: There was nothing positive about the software
cons: Cons: this organization is a complete rip-off. They steal money that people pay for events and never turn it over to the organization that is hosting the event that the person bought the ticket for
overall: Overall: This organization is an internet rip-off. We set up an event for religious organization and sold tickets to the event. The organization of Eventbrite did not honor the contract that we had to agree to. They sent false invoices stating that they were going to send money that have been paid for the tickets and they never sent the money's. On multiple attempts to contact this organization of Eventbrite to resolve the issue they neglected to contact us back. Stay away from them as far as you can they are true rip-off artist

title: Nice for managing events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The software is great for setting up and managing events. It is easy to gather needed information and run reports.
cons: Cons: It would be nice to have a big more flexibility when it comes to their tickets. I don't always want to have a 'ticket' emailed but there doesn't seem to be a way to turn it off.

title: Great experience
name: Morgan D.
position: Director of Marketing and Social Media
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: Keep up the good work. We would love to work closer with eventbrite as an event partner in the future.
pros: Pros: The system was intuitive, easy to use for ourselves and our guests. The backend tracking was very helpful for our team as administrators.
cons: Cons: We were hosting an event where we could have used a few unique tool specific to our event, but were unavailable. The only other con for us is cost. As a nonprofit our budget is tight and unfortunately we aren't afford to use the system more than we have but it is great for free events.

title: Great product for Event Management
name: Ken Y.
pros: Pros: Able to register and manage many different types of events. The apps and website interface are very easy to use. Checking in event attendees is quick and easy.
cons: Cons: I would like to see more customization options. It also needs better integration with other apps and software to easily pass data.

title: Do not use this company if you need paid out weekly they are a joke!
name: joanne r.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: For the 2nd time I have received an 'oops' message from you reading payment. I agreed to use event brite due to the flexibility of weekly payments. You have been selling tickets for my event for 5 weeks now and I have not received a penny. Instead I got some rubbish about my bank rejecting the payment to start with I checked with my bank and they have no record of any attempt at payment from yourself then you say its because the sort code was wrong which it wasn't however i re inputted the details again and today another message saying there is a problem. My event is less than 3 weeks away and i have bills that should have been paid 2 weeks ago. Your company is a disgrace holding on to small businesses money and telling lies. I will not be using or recommending your company again. I am speaking with my lawyer on Monday as I may have to cancel this event if payment is not made to me as I do not have the funds to cover the costs of my outstanding bills for my event and your guys will be picking up the tab and explaining to my clients why this has happened.

title: Event Organizing Made Easy
name: Ryan S.
pros: Pros: We'd always struggled with some of the logistics of planning and managing events, but Eventbrite helped us solve almost all of those issues by streamlining our process. Registering and tracking guests is super easy and the ability to customize it for our needs has made it incredibly versatile across clients.
cons: Cons: I've never had any issues with the software, though some people have said their customer service can be a little slow.

title: Event Brite review
name: debi h.
pros: Pros: Super easy to use. Very versatile. Applicable to many industries.
cons: Cons: I don't have a con. The software is well designed and useful.

title: The right event organizer
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use. great Ux/Ui all events needed info and tickets in one place.
cons: Cons: I didn't find anything that I dont like in this software.

title: The best registration tool for events!
name: Meghan E.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This website has been a lifesaver for our event registration. It is so easy to create the form, invite the attendees and track the number of tickets sold. And the best part, there is no cost to use the site unless you charge a fee for your event.
cons: Cons: The only downfall is not being able to edit want information you want to collect from each attendee. All the fields are already completed and you have to choose from the list.
overall: Overall: Easy & user-friendly!

title: Easy to Use
name: Katherine B.
pros: Pros: I like that this software is easy to work with as a user and as an admin.
cons: Cons: I cannot think of anthing that I do not like about it.

title: I use eventbright app to search events in my local area or to get tickets to bars.
name: Steven P.
pros: Pros: Very simple to search through your area and see what events are free. It is also very simple to create a public event and post it.
cons: Cons: Very simple to use and interact with your community. You can add tickets to your phone so you don't have to waste paper printing them out. No complaints.

title: Good for what it is
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that it enables me to have my tickets for events delivered electronically straight to my inbox.
cons: Cons: There is a lot of information I have to fill out in order to get my tickets, I feel it is excessive. Sometimes it's also hard to figure out how to get my tickets printed.
overall: Overall: I use this software a lot because lots of events now sell their tickets with this product. Sometimes it's tough to use, especially when you have a promo code to enter. It is a good product for what it is though.

title: Ok
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a great tool to sell products!
cons: Cons: I've found software programs that are just as good or better than Eventbrite. There are other tools with lower fees available.

title: A must marketing tool for events
name: Priscilla Anabelle S.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a must tol for event marketing, very user friendly, easy to use and can be integrated with Facebook.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite is free as long as you're not selling tickets online, otherwise you will charged at a minimum 2% on each ticket sold. But still not entirely a bad feature.

title: Great to buy tickets!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I thought it was very easy to use and no hidden information like fees.
cons: Cons: There is nothing I do not like about this software.

title: managing events is much easier with eventbrite
name: Abdulrahman A.
pros: Pros: I have used eventbrite for organizing my own events and it was smooth experience
cons: Cons: their pricing was not so convincing for me

title: Great ticket platform
name: Nate G.
pros: Pros: Ease of use. Facebook events integration for purchasing and accessing tickets is my favorite feature and I also appreciate how they email you a pdf ticket the same day as he event as well.
cons: Cons: Service fees. Though not as bad as ticketmaster, the fees still often seem excessive.

title: One of the easiest tools to use to find events
name: Annalisa G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: -This is a tool I'll use when I'm trying to plan a) ahead or b) just trying to find something to do over the weekend. The date finder and tool bar are easy to navigate, and there are even events that are suggested right away.
cons: Cons: -Honestly, there aren't many cons to this software. I don't know if they have an app, but I haven't head anything. That would be the only improvement. For example, SeatGeek sends me emails when people I am interested in are coming to my area.

title: Life saver
name: Jorge L.
pros: Pros: It is easy to use and it works well with Iphones
cons: Cons: The thing I like least about it is that not everyone uses this platform yet

title: Great tool when you're new to any area!
name: Ashley R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: You can search hashtags, find local events that you would not normally see posted, and even buy tickets right there in the app. It's a great program! The "contact the organizer" feature is great as well.
cons: Cons: I really cannot think of anything negative. I have not found any issues with the program yet, although I have not been using it for a terribly long time.
overall: Overall: Great networking tool, great marketing tool, and overall very straightforward and valuable product!

title: Very convienient
name: Duane B.
comments: Comments: I use EvenBright periodically. A number of events I've been to use it. It's easy and works well
pros: Pros: It's really easy - makes gathering much easier
cons: Cons: None that I can think of

title: Use for small events
name: KATIE T.
pros: Pros: i really like when you are hosting an event you can see live who has booked and their details etc. This has been really important for promotional purposes of not targeting people who has already signed up for the event. Like that you can export the details of the people signed up for the event easily.
cons: Cons: I think overall its a great piece of software which can be used for getting events up easily, not much not to like.

title: Ease of use
name: Nick M.
pros: Pros: An excellent tool for events invites and new product launch parties.
cons: Cons: I haven't encountered any issues since inception.

title: Eventbrite for fun
name: Tiffany C.
pros: Pros: I find it very simple to use. I use it to register for workshops.
cons: Cons: sometimes it's hard to look for a specific event

title: Best way to plan events, sell tickets and manage attendance
name: Paul F.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This is great for creating events and because everyone seems to use it, it's become ubiquitous so everyone who might go to your event is immediately familiar with it.
cons: Cons: I don't like how the integration with websites still isn't very good. For example I might have a company with two locations and want to have a page on my website listing all upcoming events at Location A, and another doing the same for Location B. You can't do that unfortunately, as far as I could see.

title: Events your way
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Love the ease of using it to get all my events organized.
cons: Cons: The least I liked about it is that I just cant get enough.

title: Good for the job.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use. Sets up fast and creates a great way to create event invites.
cons: Cons: Branded for EventBrite so you don't really get to customize the appearance as much as you'd like.
overall: Overall: Gets the job done quick and easy. That's what makes it ideal. If you're looking for something fancier, go ahead. But this does the trick, and in a lot of ways is exactly what you need.

title: Event Forum is Ok
name: Nic G.
comments: Comments: I think that the site is great for anyone looking to promote their events, and a great place to start so that you learn how to create the posts. It's easy to use, really accessible, and straightforward.
pros: Pros: It's easy to post on Eventbrite, and is a good starting place if you don't have a large marketing budget for your events. It has a large audience, which means the opportunity for exposure.
cons: Cons: There have been times where the original time that was input for an event was created, and when going back a week later, the time changed somehow...this happened to me twice. The other downside is that because it's such a large audience, it's difficult to target specific, ideal, people.

title: Easy to use, great UI
name: James G.
pros: Pros: I have signed up for quite a few events using Eventbrite and it has always been a seamless process. Printing my tickets and receiving notifications was always simple.
cons: Cons: Nothing bad to say. This products does was it supposed to do and does it well.
overall: Overall: Fast, simple, and to the point.

title: Challenged to copy the Affiliate link from a copy button
name: Leith J.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Generally a good system I use for my business for events. I like that Eventbrite integrates into Facebook and there is a good marketing system
cons: Cons: The affiliate link didn't copy from the copy button on Android phones for clients so they didn't participate as affiliates which affected the overall attendance results for the event. I contacted customer support who reiterated on their end is fine and will not be changing the link button.

title: Good for smaller events
name: Chris A.
pros: Pros: Reasonably comprehensive ticket buying solution for mid-sized events (<900). Well-known platform so has a reasonable number of integrations
cons: Cons: Features for conferences haven't improved significantly in several years. Pricing becomes a bit high when ticket prices climb into several hundred points.

title: Awesome site
name: Monica S.
pros: Pros: It's incredibly easy to sign up for all sorts of events, the registration time is just a minute. I like that I receive a confirmation email with a ticket that I can print or refer back to.
cons: Cons: The registration times out, always makes me nervous! But I understand that it's a necessary feature.

title: The best event platform ever.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is very easy to use, from sign-up to creating and managing events. I use it a lot when I want to organize meetups. It makes my event looks so professional.
cons: Cons: I have been using Eventbrite for some while, I haven't found something that I dislike about the platform.

title: eventbrite review
name: sunny w.
pros: Pros: fantastic software for creating and inviting others to events
cons: Cons: extremely difficult to get ahold of customer support

title: Easily can find a concert anywhere anytime.
name: Shannon W.
comments: Comments: Simple set up very easy to use.
pros: Pros: Has so many options of things to go do. You can find music to go see, food events, events for kids, educational events it has it all.
cons: Cons: Sometimes when I'm searching for an event that I know for sure is happenening the app won't show the event.

title: Excellent!!!
name: Kyle K.
pros: Pros: I really like how I can monitor the number of invitees when setting up an event. Makes it easier instead of having to go through my email.
cons: Cons: I don't have anything negative to say about the product. I think it is very simple to use when I set up events for my clients.

title: Lots of emails
name: Annie E.
pros: Pros: It's easy to sign up for different events and the interface is logical
cons: Cons: You get a lot of emails using this system

title: I used it for a cultural event I organized in my city and registration was easy for
name: Jeanette B.
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is for people to register. I believe that this is the new era of registering for events and the beginning to a successful event.
cons: Cons: For a site that is made for sales of ANY kind to not have a customer support call in number and a slow response time is very inconvenient.

title: Eventbrite is the Go-To software for your events
name: Jamison B.
comments: Comments: It is an awesome piece of software both for folks who have only a few events to schedule but also for enterprise solutions.
pros: Pros: It is incredibly easy to use from setting up your events, scheduling, and receiving/managing your registrations. I also really like it's open API - it will communicate with many other tools you use!
cons: Cons: I could not figure out how to disable the feature for paying for registrations without losing some important functionality.

title: Eventbrite offers organizers a way to profit
name: Nikki P.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use, just a few minutes can build a ticketed event
cons: Cons: The percentage taken out from each transaction

title: A great way to increase awareness about events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: A good way to get the word out about an upcoming event
cons: Cons: Best for simple events, didn't use any advanced features

title: Great for selling tickets to events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I loved how easy it was to configure and begin selling tickets to events
cons: Cons: Like many companies do, Eventbrite takes a portion of the sales for themselves in return for allowing us to use their software. While this isn't a "negative", it is something that is good to know

title: Excellent event management software
name: Joshua J.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use event management software; clean ui that is well designed. Simple to promote events on the software.
cons: Cons: Integration with importing events into certain calendar software can be buggy at times. Email formatting for sending invites is occasionally off.

title: Easy Event Navigation
name: Stephanie M.
pros: Pros: It is easy to navigate and find multiple events, especially if they are linked to one conference. An annual conference I both work at and attend uses it each year to manage all the many activities happening simultaneously and it really helps to streamline things.
cons: Cons: None- it's been a huge asset to our event management!
overall: Overall: Helps to keep everything organized within one event platform. Easy to navigate and tech support is very responsive.

title: Event Database
name: Benjamin B.
comments: Comments: I use it when others invite me to an event through the program but do not use it for searching for an event itself.
pros: Pros: Readable
cons: Cons: Doesn't always link to addresses

title: A very convenient tool.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The registration page is very intuitive. I appreciate that I get an email confirmation with all information about the even (plus location via GoogleMaps). I like that I can add the event to my calender. I found a lot of events because of Eventbrite that I wouldn't have known about otherwise.
cons: Cons: So far I really like to purchase tickets via Eventbrite. I have no cons. I have not used the customer support yet.

title: Love Love Love Eventbrite!!
name: Christina D.
pros: Pros: I love the convenience of eventbrite! Super easy to use!
cons: Cons: I have no cons at all! I use eventbrite alot!

title: Great app for creating events
name: Konstantin S.
pros: Pros: It's very easy to create events and sell tickets
cons: Cons: Maybe a user facing UI could be a bit more friendly

title: So easy
name: Sian A.
comments: Comments: Nice and simple
pros: Pros: Easy to book and keep track of your tickets in the iWallet on my phone. I can access them anytime and I can never loose track of them
cons: Cons: I've sometimes found it hard to search and discover related events. It would be nice to be recommended events I would be interested in

title: NOT SO GREAT FOR BUSINESS BUT GREAT FOR PERSONAL USE
name: Taylor B.
pros: Pros: Awesome way to communicate with non work related people about events.
cons: Cons: This is not so great for business events but I have to be honest that I have tried it for business events in a while. The themes are less professional and more fun/personal in my opinion.

title: My Link yo Cool Events in Town
name: Briana K.
pros: Pros: I like that it gives me a link to events happening around me .This includes dates,times,tickets and registration.
cons: Cons: I don't have any complaints at this time .
overall: Overall: I moved to Washington DC from a small town within the past year.Eventbrite has been my link to fun events for my son and I .

title: Love them!!
name: Marvin N.
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to pull up your tickets.
cons: Cons: They have been great and I have no issues with them .

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It is easy to use and visually very appealing.
cons: Cons: I like the experience as a user but not as a seller.

title: Good for most event purposes
name: Jenny W.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
comments: Comments: Event Brite is really useful when planning/publishing events, but it could use more features/options to integrate other platforms instead of basically just being an RSVP website. However, overall a really useful site that I enjoyed using.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, didn't have too many issues with it.
cons: Cons: Could use more personality and modifications

title: A must to have when organizing an event... personal or professional
name: Jose R.
comments: Comments: Don't miss this app, it's a life saver when it comes to organizing an event and don't want to deal with it yourself.
pros: Pros: very easy to use, free for free tickets (which makes it a no-brainer for personal events like a class-reunion or so), alert and notifications at will. Very useful!
cons: Cons: Don't have any cons to my perspective. Non-Free tickets have a processing fee but it's just a fair arrangement for the great service they provide.

title: Great promotional & administrative tool
name: Chris E.
pros: Pros: This is such an effective tool for connecting with those interested in participating in any event you may be organizing
cons: Cons: This is not yet a very well known software. My hope is that this will be used more in the future as it is so helpful
overall: Overall: Simple to use & helpful for future promotions

title: Ease to join events
name: Jk N.
comments: Comments: The aaplication make it easy to register and join events that i get a link to. The aaplication make it easy to register and join events that i get a link to.

title: Great way to find something to do
name: LAURA C.
pros: Pros: I use eventbrite to find local events on free weekends or special occasions. Easy to use, shows you a location map and emails you your ticket!
cons: Cons: Could not find a flaw. I have even heard that adding an event is easy, although I have not done that yet.

title: Great if you need Marketing Help
name: William B.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: It's great for smaller venues and groups that need to get their word out quickly and easily. Support staff are wonderful to work with as well.
cons: Cons: We have our own marketing team so this wasn't as helpful as we thought as we connect to FaceBook ourselves.

title: good tool to promote your events
name: Andrew C.
pros: Pros: I am an event promoter and producer, and use eventbrite often for both my paid ticket events and free ones
cons: Cons: even though the percentage that eventbrite takes per ticket sold is very cheap, it would be beneficial that it would have a promotion for startups

title: So many emails
name: Mike S.
pros: Pros: As a recipient it's very easy to get invites and rsvp
cons: Cons: Their newsletter is a constant in my inbox

title: What are you doing this weekend? Use Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has been super helpful for me. I am a very introverted person and struggle to figure out what I want to do on the weekends. I have been able to search for local events that are happening. I have event created my own events as well. It interfaces well with social media as well as email. Super helpful
cons: Cons: I wish more people would use it. This way there would be more suggested activities

title: Great for Looking up Events and Getting Tickets
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easily look up events, easily readable. Great way to not only buy tickets but also sell them if needed.
cons: Cons: Prices can be a bit high. Site can appear somewhat clunky looking and overwhelming to a less tech savvy person.
overall: Overall: Overall very easy to use and look up events.

title: Great for events
name: Amanda N.
pros: Pros: I still use the software and love that we are only charged when I charge people. It is also very easy to use.
cons: Cons: I wish I could do more of my own layout.
overall: Overall: It was a great experience. We use this for our continuing education meetings all over the US. It works great for what I need,.

title: Love Eventbrite!
name: Jill R.
pros:
Pros: Eventbrite is the best place to go for info on events in your area, bar none.

It just has so much info and links to website of events to buy tickets etc. Perfect one stop place for events!
cons: Cons: I love this software and have zero complaints at all.

title: It's a good ticketing platform
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It has many years on the market, and for that reason, many companies use it. You can find a lot of events on it and is very easy to use
cons: Cons: It doesn't let you to add a massive data of guests, If you have a list of guests you have to add them one by one

title: Good For Users
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It allows for easy sharing of events and RSVP'ing.
cons: Cons: The interface with calendars is lacking.

title: Easy Solution for Ticketing
name: Courtney L.
pros: Pros: This has made our ticketed events much easier to keep track of. It is great that my whole team can see what's going on.
cons: Cons: I don't like the marketing side. I use a different software for that, because Eventbrite has been a bit complicated to deal with.

title: Decent Platform for Small Events
name: Aaron M.
pros: Pros: We use this for a local festival to register vendors and for this purpose it is well suited. We can create numerous different vendor types and set pricing easily.
cons: Cons: Our event is essentially the same every year, but copying the campaign is a pain (lots of copy & paste)
overall: Overall: We use this for our local festival. Eventbrite is easy for our vendors to use for registration, easy to issue refunds, etc. Unfortunately my experience has been that it is not very easy to set up a campaign.

title: Best DIY Event Management Platform
name: Nivas R.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is definitely the DIY Event Management Platform available because of the ease to setup and run without having to depend on external help. Love the Event Check-in option.
cons: Cons: Not much to dislike about Eventbrite apart from the pricing.

title: Eventbrite
name: Tonya J.
pros: Pros: So easy to use! You can sell tickets on social media and the Eventbrite site at the same time. Also, very reasonable prices for the tickets.
cons: Cons: I can't really find a downside to this software! I love it for ticketed events that are priced or free.

title: Nice all-in-one system
name: Stephanie R.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and set up. Lots of added functionalities that make it easy to print out name labels, sign in who attends a conference, etc. Good integration with third-party software.
cons: Cons: The price is quite high, unless you are running a free event

title: Eventbrite is integrative
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that I automatically get outlook calendar invites for events I register for. It keeps me reminded and up to date on my availability. It sure beats manually adding it to my calendar.
cons: Cons: Search terms. Whenever I search "digital" or "business" trainings, all I get are the same 100 results of a project management class. It's not really relevant and the Cincinnati calendar is flooded with them.

title: New user
name: Kimberley C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: As a new user I have found it to be extremely useful and easy to navigate I am still learning the software, however I am excited to get it done
cons: Cons: No cons at this present time I am a new user, I will stay dilegent to my reviews and post any shall I come upon any.
overall: Overall: The presentation of my end product is so spectacular I was amazed when I saw it I am still learning all this software has to offer. However I'm always at ease when I start it up

title: Awesome way to track upcoming events & buy tickets
name: Cheryl L.
pros: Pros: This software keeps tracks of events that you selected you were interested in. Awesome way to find local events and buy tickets to them. Many useful and wholesome events are posted on here.
cons: Cons: Been using this for years and have no probelms.

title: If you don't mind paying taxes on fees they keep then go for it.
name: D R.
comments:
Comments: Had no problems with Eventbrite until end of year tax reporting.

My NYE tickets were paid to my account on Jan 6th 2015 but Eventbrite claimed it on the 2014 1099 form. (My accountants loved that)!!!

Also wondered why my bank statements and 1099 form didn't add up??

Apparently they 1099 you on the fees they keep as there own service charge!!!!

Customer service couldn't even tell me that. My accountants had to figure it out on there own.

Did over 150k in ticket revenue with them last year. They will get $00 this year..

Check out Ticket Tailor. (This is not a plug) look for yourself. They have flat rate fees that are pretty reasonable in my book. And much easier to justify come tax time!!!

Software is great but if you don't want to pay taxes on there income then I would check out something different.

title: Best way to register and manage all of your events
name: Allyn B.
pros: Pros: EventBrite makes it really easy to create and share public events, as well as accept payments. The user interface is also very user friendly.
cons: Cons: I wish there were more way to customize your event page. Other than that I don't have any complaints!

title: Find events happening nearby
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's really nice software product, that helps to find events happening nearby as well as to register or buy tickets/pass for events. And I can search events by categories that I like.
cons: Cons: It's really a useful software product. I would like to have a feature that let us know how many passes/tickets are left for an event
overall: Overall: It really helped me to find great events happening nearby and buy the tickets throught it by online.

title: This is the only software I use for creating my events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: You can organize your events quickly and manage them all in one place. I like the different pricing options and features available that I can choose from based on the type of event I'm organizing. I also like the ability to log in from anywhere and track my sales.
cons: Cons: The Premium pricing package makes me choose a minimum threshold amount which doesn't always work for the event I'm organizing.

title: Eventbrite made it easy to keep event tickets organized
name: Relvin G.
pros: Pros: It kept all my event tickets organized and easy to pull up when entering the event. No searching emails or logging into websites in the browser, or remembering where my tickets were.
cons: Cons: I have not come across a "con" yet using Eventbrite.

title: A Simple Way to Create Events
name: Michael R.
pros: Pros: I most liked the ease of use of this software. From the first time I felt confident in my ability to use the software to meet my needs.
cons: Cons: While it was nice to see a plethora of events going on in my area, it was a little much to take in at first glance, so I wish the homepage was more straightforward.
overall: Overall: While the interface was slightly cluttered, Eventbrite gave me the tools I needed to create high-quality event information.

title: Easy and quick
name: Kristi C.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: I purchased tickets to an event using this software. Easy to navigate. I especially liked that I received an emailed receipt.
cons: Cons: Seemed a little much for a simple event site. I haven't attended the event though. I hope to see email reminders.

title: Thumbs up for Eventbrite!
name: Saya H.
comments: Comments: Simple to use, has all the advanced functions I want, love the DIYness of it combined with the more advanced help via customer service if needed, customers are familiar with it and trust it, makes ticketing something that doesn't take a lot of time or thought which for a busy event producer I appreciate.

title: People are using it.
name: Amy C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I use it as a user that need to buy ticket from. Some events also require free registration through it. Since people start using it. I will see it supposed to be easily used. But after I purchased a ticket, no vendor ever asked me to show the eventbrite confirmation or email or number ever.
cons: Cons: I noticed onetime that if I purchase a ticket through facebook, it's cheaper than eventbrite. I assume eventbrite charfe fees. more

title: Reach further than simply Facebook Events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's basically easy to use but what I like the most about this solution is the overall reach I can get - - and I can use it on most social media platforms for easily getting my events out there and being able to get an idea of how far my event is being shared.
cons: Cons: The online help center can be a little hard to use sometimes. I wish that was just a bit more user friendly but it's still usable.

title: A comprehensive overview of events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We can purchase tickets through EventBrite. Many events cannot be found on search engines or are hard to find. EventBrite is good for narrowing down the events that suit our requirements and expectations.
cons: Cons: Sometimes it does not show the link to purchasing tickets.
overall: Overall: This is a great tool to find events based on locations, content and other criteria. Also it is a comprehensive portal to capture which events are taking place.

title: Decent event registration service that should be smarter than it is
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's easy to register for events on Eventbrite. Mobile tickets are easy to access and use
cons: Cons: Eventbrite could be much smarter, using AI and your preferences to recommend things you like to do on specific days. Proactively plan my weekend for me

title: Okay
name: Jens P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: Good way to find events, but not the best. Could have an easier way to organize events

title: Ideal for free and paid events
name: Jessica L.
pros: Pros: Set up is incredibly easy. It's nice to be able to have attendees directed to one place to record attendance.
cons: Cons: Sometimes users get confused about the price of the event if it's free. Making the free cost more apparent would be helpful.

title: Eventbrite review
name: Angela T.
comments: Comments: Easy to use for customer and organizer. Easy navigation.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, mobile friendly
cons: Cons: Could be more visually appealing

title: Eventbrite makes it easy for us to sell our season tickets
name: Kathryn M.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, secure purchasing and selling, many features that allow you to buy tickets directly from eventbrite as well
cons: Cons: Customer support could be better. I had an issue with a seller and it was hard to get a quick response from eventbrite

title: Best Sign Up App
name: Juliana S.
comments: Comments: I love singing for events using this app. It makes easy to RSVP to events and share information with friends.
pros: Pros: Fast and easy
cons: Cons: None

title: It works worldwide!
name: Giulio G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It result helpful for me that I live and work in Ecuador, a country where it is not easy to find online information about events and much more. It keeps me updated on events, fairs, festivals and so on.
cons: Cons: Nothing negative to tell at the moment, I must say that I feel good with the service as it is. I hope that in the future it will be used by a greater number of users in Latin America.

title: Manages you event with ease
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I only use this to create Events and also attends Events. It is easy and free as long as your event is free. There are no hidden costs when setting up an event. However my buying experience has been different.
cons: Cons: When buying, I was confused and I asked for help but this is very limited and does not get to an answer. I do not use it anymore as my event was cancelled and I lost my money.

title: Sign up for events
name: kevin w.
pros: Pros: I use this to discover & sign up for events both in town & when im travelling. It helps me keep track of things i signed up to attend
cons: Cons: I wish it were a more attractive ux/ui. The website has a very dated look & feel like an old portal

title: A way to look for local events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that if I am looking for a specific type of event I can easily search Eventbrite for events occurring near me. I recently used it to find Halloween costume contests near me and it gave great suggestions. It is very user friendly. They also email me with events they think I would like. I've received a promo code for a free Shutterfly book in one of their emails.
cons: Cons: My one criticism is that their emails with event suggestions aren't usually events that I am interested.
overall: Overall: I usually just use Facebook to search for local events, but Eventbrite is a good option as well.

title: Easy For Selling Or Buying Tickets
name: Barbara K.
pros: Pros: I've both hosted and attended events and seminars where tickets are vended through Eventbrite. It's easy to use, cost effective, and simplifies that section of hosting.
cons: Cons: No real cons. Never had a problem getting tickets out there.

title: Eventbrite Product Review
name: Grant H.
pros: Pros: A great free tool that allows you to have a landing page and registration acknowledgement from attendees for whatever event you are hosting.
cons: Cons: The biggest thing I think that could use improvement is a condensing of the page and important information. Users are in tune and being trained with short, sweet, and to the point messages. At times, the page has key information in too many places that makes it hard to get the quick version of the event.
overall: Overall: Overall, it's a great tool and allows you to have a central location for all the information guests need in order to know about and sign up for an event.

title: Simple
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love how simple this app is. Incredibly user friendly. It's a great tool to find local events in your area.
cons: Cons: I do wish there was more variety to the app but I still really enjoy it.
overall: Overall: I would recommend this app as it is a simple way to find events!

title: Very nice event-ticketing software!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Have you ever wondered how to let people know that there's an event and want to avoid going to a mall to buy a ticket? My favorite feature is related to the last specific sentence, I can see where's a concert or any other event and if I like it, I just buy it utilizing the same platform! The tickets will be delivered to your email and it's as easy as that.
cons: Cons: I have no complaints about EventBrite, I love it.

title: To review eventbrite
name: Sharmaine V.
pros: Pros: The accessibility to use this software is so useful. You can check the necessary information about the event on just one-click!
cons: Cons: A little issue on some feature that requires more updates and improvement. Hope to get is soonest.

title: Simple to plan an event
name: Heidi A.
pros: Pros: Easy to plan and promote your event and even sell tickets! Literally takes a few minutes from set up to the event being live and the event is searchable in Google.
cons: Cons: I really don't have any negatives to give about Eventbrite.
overall: Overall: We had a yoga for cancer event we wanted to sell tickets for attending, we used Eventbrite and found the set up really easy to do. Provided a QR code and allowed us to promote on multiple platforms.

title: Easy to Use and Track Event Attendance
name: Jami T.
pros: Pros: I use this to create events for our company's Real Estate Agents. It's very easy to create the events, send invites, and track event registration. I also like that I can easily communicate with and send reminders to those who registered for the events.
cons: Cons: For paid events, the fees are a little high. Some of the different features and event customizations are difficult to find.

title: Review on Eventbrite
name: Colleen P.
pros: Pros: I have used Eventbrite a couple of times. It's easy to use and find event information. It has a lot of features for free event pages creations for companies to use.
cons: Cons: The upgrade cost is pretty pricey. A lot of add ons to your package/tickets.

title: So easy
name: Jennifer C.
pros: Pros: It's so simple to use and free to use for Events that are free. Also you can save your past events which makes work easier.
cons: Cons: It would be nice if the whole platform was free even if your tickets have a price attached to them.

title: Ease to use and good for events
name: Mariah K.
pros: Pros: Being able to put in emails and have them mass sent an event is great. Our company is on the larger side and Eventbrite allows us to send our invites for events with no problems at all. The templates are great and make for ease when constructing the form
cons: Cons: When accepting the event, you are then put in their system and they will email you when you may not want to receive their emails at all.

title: Use it to promote events.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I have seen that many organizations including many political parties use this software to promote their events. We decided to give it a try and made an event. I love how everything is in one place from the event information to purchase tickets. Very simple and easy-to-use software.
cons: Cons: I really have no negative opinions about this software. Give it a try it is awesome!

title: Eventbrite is lack luster
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I don't think I've used a tool that solves this problem that is better. Having said that, I don't like this tool much either.
cons:
Cons: Overall Quality is basic and poor.

Ease of Use is horrible and don't even try and use the mobile application. Hard to use, not intuitive and time consuming.

Features & Functionality are ok.

Customer Support: Needed many times but would be more time consuming to call.

Value for Money- not worth it.
overall: Overall: Overall I do not like the functionality or ease of use with this product. Anytime I get an invite from it I know I will lose 15 minutes of my life trying to fill it out.

title: All the features you need to get started
name: Paul S.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is one of the easiest event management tools you can use. They've got everything laid out in a super easy to navigate format and it all just makes sense.
cons: Cons: Nothing really it's easy to use and I can't fault it.

title: Very user friendly
name: Daniel D.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite app is very user friendly, and easy to use
pros: Pros: Nice UX Good integration with apple eco system

title: Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Ease of use and very easy to find local events that match my interests. Also very easy to transfer tickets if you sell or bought for someone else.
cons: Cons: No bad experiences, the app and the online website both work very well.

title: Easy to Use
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I guess what makes me go back to Eventbrite is that it is easy to use. I've never had a problem with customer service.
cons: Cons: You cannot accept Paypal payments which gets annoying when my patrons often want to pay via Paypal.

title: Free version is good enough for free events
name: Richard K.
pros: Pros: A lot of crucial functionality already included in the free software makes it my go to for pop-up events.
cons: Cons: Because it has a lot of extra functionality I don't need, the behind-the-scenes interface feels a bit cluttered.

title: Brilliant
name: Weronika K.
pros: Pros: Its easy to purchase in app and online as well as organise your own events
cons: Cons: Unfortunately organising your own events sometimes doesnt attract as many costummers as referenced by the website
overall: Overall: It a good way to purchase events tickets

title: Love Eventbrite
name: Colleen H.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite seems to be the most common service I use these days for registrations. It's quick, remembers my information and doesn't ask for much. The details are easy to find for each event I attend. Would recommend to anyone. I haven't used it much to find events happening around town, primarily used for registrations for events found elsewhere.

title: Set up your Ticketed Event with Ease
name: Jay B.
pros:
Pros: Easy Set Up

For the Most part its Set it and Forget it

E-tickets work wonderfully
cons: Cons: Customer Perception when driving them to Eventbrite in regards to making sure the CM know that they are still with the same organization

title: Love EventBrite
name: Krista S.
comments: Comments: Easy to use, keeps you on time and knowledgeable of your events. You won't be missing any events with this app

title: Easy to deploy software for our hoseted events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Super easy interface for when we want to coordinate company and customer events. No one has issues using.
cons: Cons: It's rare but have been kicked out of eventbrite while uploading an event. Other than that, it's worked great.

title: Go to for Events Near and Far
name: Marquel W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: Find any event near you listed

Offers multiple categories

Choose your price range

Create on Event
cons:
Cons: Too many events to choose from!

Booking could be simpler
overall: Overall: I was in Las Vegas on a business trip! I am no stranger to Vegas and all of the attraction and things to see and do been there done that right! So I happen to stumble across Event Brite and to be honest I was shocked they had stuff going on that they don't tell you about! Free festivals and wine tasting all around free carnival passes they made my two day stay not typical Vegas leisure ya know! I don't step foot I the strip because there was so much to do on Event Brite off the strip! They offer some of everything from conferences to concerts dope app very innovative! User friendly interface as well check out Event Brite for the non typical events and leisure just around the corner! Event Brite people is the way!

title: tickets
name: Anwer m.
pros: Pros: I have never been on an app where so many events, from my area are advertised. Being able to not only buy tickets to exclusive events but also have the ability to post tickets for events that I host myself is insanely convenient to me.
cons: Cons: I wish the app had a loyalty program so you would get rewarded for sharing it with friends and family.

title: Eventbrite is a very reasonably priced option for event management and promotion
name: Scott R.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is very easy to setup events and customize each event page, manage tickets/sign-ups and update attendees.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite does everything I would expect from a low-cost third party event management platform.

title: Our go to to charge for events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Ease of use is crucial! I like the layout, as well. Love how easy it is to create discount codes, etc.
cons: Cons: Honestly can't think of anything. I always wish software has the ability to have customizable interfaces so that's one.

title: EventBrite
name: Brittany W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I haven't really used EventBrite . I attended a Meet and Greet earlier this month and EventBrite was used by the woman who put the Meet and Greet together. The link was easy to share with all my clients and it was convenient for the organizer to know who'd be in attendance so we could be prepared for them.
cons: Cons: I don't have anything bad to say about it. I haven't used it directly just shared the link.

title: Excellent product
name: Alessandra C.
comments: Comments: I use Eventbrite both as participant and as an organizer, and I really enjoy each experience! It's easy to use, practical, and has all the functionalities I need. Whenever I needed answers, the Customer Support was always ready to help, with great feedback. I definitely suggest it create and promote your events!

title: Makes buying tickets easy
name: Keenan C.
pros: Pros: I like the fact that my tickets are held when I go to submit them, and that my card details are stored for the future.
cons: Cons: There have been times when I have gone to buy a ticket and the fees have seemed extortionate. It would make it easier to know why those fees were there, even if it's just explaining that it's for maintaining the site, it would make it easier to swallow.

title: Event Planning Made Simple
name: Claudia C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The software is very simple therefore making it easy to use. This is the first time we have used Eventbrite for one of our events. It was very easy to send out the invites to guests and as easy to receive the RSVPs.
cons: Cons: Initially I didn't check into the fees for the use but I think it may have been worth it, whatever we did pay.
overall: Overall: We were able to reach out to our invitees early enough without relying on the "snail mail".

title: Absolutely awesome
name: Habiba A.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is just perfect, and the best part is, it is completely free to organize and share events, as long as registration is free for the event.
cons: Cons: I have e never had any problems with this software.

title: Easy way to register people for events.
name: Roger W. O.
pros: Pros: For a company that arranges trainings, this software is convenient to register attendees and collect payment. Even offers discount codes.
cons: Cons: I have not experienced any particular challenges using this software.

title: Eventbrite makes event easy to manage
name: Joseph P.
pros: Pros: I like that it is easy to create new events, promote them online, sell tickets, and manage purchases night of.
