cons: Cons: I dislike that the fees are just as high if not higher than competitor programs that function very similarly.

title: Eventbrite for quick and easy get togethers
name: GRACE G.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: Easy to use with a great UI. Doesn't take much time to set up your event and get it posted for your attendees
cons: Cons: Fees are a little high (2.5%) depending on what package you use it for but they do offer custom pricing.

title: Great for large events
name: Aurora E.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: This software makes ticket sales for large or small events a breeze! It's also great for free RSVPs when you're trying to limit the body count.
cons: Cons: It's pretty great! I don't have any complaints or suggestions.

title: Easy to Use - Find and Cancel Events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's so easy to find and sign up for events as well as to cancel or make changes to your tickets. It's easy to use the app to navigate to your tickets.
cons: Cons: There is no easy to find customer service available.

title: Overall good value but could improve features
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use and fits well with many different websites - easy to get to
cons: Cons: Customer service took a long time to respond to inquires and there are many additional features that eventbrite could add to its website

title: Easy Scheduling/Ticketing Software for Business Funtions
name: Cory K.
pros: Pros: I like the ease of use when creating events and inviting people, along with RSVP function.
cons: Cons: I think the mobile app differs slightly from the desktop software, but it isn't major.
overall: Overall: Creating and inviting people to events.

title: Easy to use
name: Jenny O.
pros: Pros: It is easy to purchase tickets for events using this website. They also have an app you can download if purchasing tickets often.
cons: Cons: I have only used this website for purchasing tickets and have had no issues

title: Just the perfect app for all my events in the startup scene
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I dont know what much to say, its just a perfect little app. If you are offering an event, setup is easy; if you are attending an event, registration is easy. Moreover the app is plain, simple and great.
cons: Cons: Not much to say here but if i had to say something its the event recommendations i receive in the app, which most of the time actually dont interest me.

title: Awesome for event holding and registrations
name: Yashasvi A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This has been one of the best event applications available. i first got to know about the software when i was invited for a event in the university. After some research i found out that this is a really good software for event holding and all the registration needs.
cons: Cons: better if they could arrange the seating arrangement function in the upcoming updates. More updates with more features and templates would be needed.
overall: Overall: I have planned to use this software for my next event as i am new to event management. But definitely would try this.

title: Used twice, no problems
name: Stephanie K.
comments: Comments: I attended a Trump rally and the only way to get in was by having a ticket through Eventbrite. I had never used it before and it was quite easy. I then attended a local ATV event called Camp RZR and once again, super easy. I even got several updates/notifications regarding my event which was awesome.

title: Timesaver!
name: Sophia W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It is so easy to create events and share them out on social media with the app or a desktop. In just a few clicks and you are able to issue a refund, which for me is anytime saver when compared to my previous way of offering classes!
cons: Cons: I have to use a workaround for the managing events feature, but it may be user error and not an issue with Eventbrite.

title: I use this site all of the time!
name: Hanna M.
pros: Pros: The filters make it so easy to find the exact events I want. Then the ticket can be transferred into my Apple Wallet upon purchase.
cons: Cons: I haven't found any feature regarding this software that I dislike.

title: Hard to Beat for Event Coordination, Ticketing and Payment
name: Dave L.
comments: Comments: I've used Eventbrite for everything from launch parties to tailgates, and it just really is the easiest tool for generating interest and managing attendees for any kind of event you can think of. Payment systems and ticketing were super easy, and I have found it easy to do everything from refunding overpayment to communicating with guests.

title: Eventbrite
name: Heather H.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: We used this for a church function so it was nice to send out invites and have people rsvp so we had an idea of who was coming
cons: Cons: Took a while for people to check in and some people had to still register

title: Set up events and sell tickets quickly and easily
name: Jon P.
pros: Pros: App is awesome and it's super easy to set up and mange events + sell tickets. Promotion tools make it easy to market your event on Eventbrite.
cons: Cons: Processing fees can be steep and payouts can be delayed

title: Very easy to use!
name: Lilly C.
pros: Pros: I love that Eventbrite stores tickets for events/registration in an inbox for you so you can always come back and know that your ticket is safe and didn't get deleted.
cons: Cons: I don't have anything negative to say. Eventbrite makes my job very simple. I am always registering many people for events and it's extremely convenient for me.
overall: Overall: Very satisfied with this software

title: Used the program for a work function recently.
name: Louise A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: User friendly interface. Live updates and notifications for ticket sales. Sell tickets in a professional platform. Lots of customization options for various event types.
cons: Cons: There is not much that I've noticed about the app that I feel would be problematic except for one thing that annoys me a little bit. I find the link name way too long when sharing an event.

title: Eventbrite is what we use to help book our events
name: Jazmin C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It's easy to use and makes scheduling and filling events so much easier. It avoids double booking a seat and people are familiar with using it.
cons: Cons: The fee associated with using Eventbrite can be annoying when setting the costs of an event. Depending on how often you use this, it might be more beneficial to cover the costs yourself vs including it in the price of the event.

title: Great place to find events
name: Rafael P.
comments: Comments: It works very well. After having an account you register for new events with two clicks!

title: Nice way to host and share an event
name: Sue M.
pros: Pros: Easy to setup a new event. You can easily customize it to fit your particular event which is nice because we have different categories of attendees that we need to add for each event. The reporting feature is also a nice bonus!
cons: Cons: Wish there were some more layout options available for use. Would also like an easier way to contact customer service.

title: EventBrite Registration
name: Tim S.
pros: Pros: I enjoy eventbrite's customer service support team. Any time I've had an issue they were more than willing to help alleviate the problem.
cons: Cons: The software is very hard to learn at first. It depends on a person's individual user experience however I found it very hard to learn. Once I got the hang of things I can click right along.

title: So easy to use
name: Jennifer M.
comments: Comments: As soon as you get to the main page, everything is mapped out perfectly. It's so easy to find exactly what you're looking for, I don't have to click around to find things. The website lists every single feature and price of the software, I didn't have to ask any questions!! Very impressive

title: Great tool for nonprofits!
name: Jennifer J.
pros: Pros: It was very intuitive and easy to use for people who are not technologically savvy.
cons: Cons: Honestly, I do not think I have anything negative to say about Eventbrite. It worked very well for our purposes!

title: Great for any event!
name: Julio A.
pros: Pros: It's super easy to setup, load in all the info and super easy for guests to use.
cons: Cons: It would be nice if we could customize the look a bit more, but this is why it runs so well. So it's small thing.

title: Great App to Connect with the World Around Me
name: Rachel F.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I like that everything about this software is personalized. It's cool that I get to select exactly what type of activities I enjoy and input my location so I am shown only those that relate to me. It saves me time searching endlessly.
cons: Cons: It was difficult to navigate the software at first, to figure out where my tickets were and how to browse, but I learned relatively quickly, just like any other app.

title: Super easy to set up an event!
name: Cherlyn C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Like everyone has said, it's so easy to get an event set up.. I got mine up and running in minutes. It's really nice that they provide the analytics as well so you can keep track of your sales for your paid events. It saves a lot of time.. just set it and share the link!
cons: Cons: Really nothing that I didn't like. It was simple, easy and intuitive to use. Saved a lot of time for me.
overall: Overall: Ease of use

title: Events made easy
name: Enjanay V.
pros: Pros: I like how it is easy to RSVP to events sent in Eventbrite.
cons: Cons: There isn't anything I can think of at the moment.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite is useful because it tracks the replies or lack there of of the people invited to the events.

title: Recommended for local events.
name: Heidi H.
pros: Pros: I like that there's plenty of local events to choose from on EventBrite and it doesn't charge "convenience fees" for buying tickets like TicketMaster does.
cons: Cons: I think sometimes local event organizers do forget it exists, but that's about it. If you're organizing an event, don't forget to put it on EventBrite even if it's a free event!
overall: Overall: Easy to find local events.

title: The Bz
name: Mathew H.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite is the go to tool for tickets and information on the latest events in your area. I would recommend this app bc it's easy to use, it's extremely accessible, and it allows for great ticket management
pros: Pros: Simple, easy, fun
cons: Cons: Not all tickets go through eventbrite

title: Good product. Could be better
name: Braden A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I like how easy it is to set up an event, get it live, and get people signed up.
cons: Cons: I don't like how outdated some of the pages look. The landing page where you sign up for events can get pretty ugly, which is sad for such a large company.
overall: Overall: Pretty good experience overall - I've used it to get hundreds of people signed up for half a dozen events. I am going to continue to use it.

title: Event Organizing
name: roy w.
pros: Pros: Actually its simple and perfect very much easy to use. Create events and able to advertise them via emails, for paid events tickets are sold through the platform and they charge a commission which I believe its reasonable. This ticketing system is absolutely fabulous.
cons: Cons: This software functions as intended and I have no problem with it.

title: Sxsw eventbrite
name: Greg D.
comments: Comments: very nice invite/evite software. Use it all the time.
pros: Pros: Ease of use on multiple browsers
cons: Cons: Is it compatible with all browsers? What about java/flash potential non use via folks who have locked down browsers from their work computers

title: Great for events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love that it makes creating tickets for your event extremely easy. Creating an event is very easy.
cons: Cons: It is too easy for people to create multiple log ins and lose track of their tickets.

title: GLIDE Loves Eventbrite!
name: Ben R.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite is fabulous!

title: Awesome event application
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's super easy to add new events and the HTML widget functions are really easy to embed into websites
cons: Cons: The HTML widgets need to use Javascript and can sometimes clash with the website's JS

title: Simple ticketing tool
name: Tzlil K.
pros: Pros: It's easy to use and allows for quick entry of necessary guest information and quick purchasing through the system
cons: Cons: mobile interface for event replies can be simplified for external users

title: Excellent calendar and event management system
name: Luis B.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, simple, and free!
cons: Cons: Nothing really. Not much.

title: Love this app
name: Christina R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I love the layout and design of the app. It is so easy to use and it I can see everything at one glance.
cons: Cons: So far I have not found a single thing that I dislike about the app.
overall: Overall: My overall experience with this app has been awesome! This is such a game changer for date night or when family comes to visit. I have been looking for something like this for a while and am so happy that I found it.

title: Kind of does it all!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This app allows you to see events happening around you, search and purchase tickets and allows you to have your tickets right in the app.
cons: Cons: I have no complaints about this software!

title: Great for reaching masses, not great for narrowing audiences
name: Kelly M.
pros: Pros: I think if you have an event you are hosting/sponsoring, you must include your event on EventBrite because of how many people it reaches and how many people use the site to search for events.
cons: Cons: the pricing for the use of the software is a little high, to me. Each ticket sold through the site is charged a fee that the end user may not appreciate.

title: Easy to use when needed
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use, simple steps to view events and check out. Like that you can share on social media platforms etc.
cons: Cons: Dislike the linking when you purchase tickets to an event that has assigned seating. You are unable to view where you will be sitting. You have to look separately at the seating chart. Not as many details regarding the event available.

title: Organization For All Your Events
name: Blake C.
pros: Pros: I loved having all the information about my events in one place. It was easy to manage the site and application.
cons: Cons: I wish that I could more easily link my events to my Google Calendar.

title: Easy and fast
name: Stephane D.
pros: Pros: Easy to access to tickets, fast and simple. I used it regularly and it is practical and it works well!
cons: Cons: Improve the access to map and to infor;actions relative to the event. Sometimes there are some lacks

title: Good event product
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like how they offer a variety of options when creating an event and able to send and track invites
cons: Cons: just not a fan of seeing the ads on the emails but I get why they have to do it

title: A reliable event management app
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The mobile app, multiple interactions with other apps, make the event searchable and found easily to the relevant audience.
cons: Cons: Complicated interface and dashboard, very high commission on online payment, it charges commission for the at door sign-ins for events with paid tickets even if the payment was done at the door and not through the app, which is inconvenient and doesn't make sense

title: Perfect software for your event!
name: Kaela M.
comments: Comments: Super experience with Evebtbrite. I organized a training workshop through this and it was everything my team and I was looking for. We did not know where to start and it was recommended by a friend on Facebook. And I must say, I'd definitely refer it to someone too!

title: Great networking tool
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's like the hotels.com or kayak of event sites. It pulls all the different events by keywords and let's you easily register.
cons: Cons: Some events are in the past and will show up as options.
overall: Overall: Being in sales, I need to know where my clients are going. Eventbrite has helped me have a much farther reach. It has also connected me to non business groups that are fun to be a part of.

title: Can It Get Easier?
name: JD C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Eventbrite's ease of use is unparalleled. Simple to set up, easy on the eyes, and efficient to use. The reminder emails are key in helping us remind and ensure people are still coming to our events.
cons: Cons: I think they've pretty much nailed it for our use - no complaints
overall: Overall: Great flexibility in ticketing and easy to set up. They take a cut but it's reasonable and you just build it into the ticket price.

title: Eventbrite
name: Kelly J.
pros: Pros: That I can view multiple events in my area that are happening at lots of different venues.
cons: Cons: It does not organize events by date. It just seems to list events in random date order.

title: Quick, simple and easy to use
name: Nikki J.
pros: Pros: Very quick to set up and easy to track any event. Last minute amendments can be made quite easily. The feature to be able to add more tickets once your event has sold out is great! Allowing us to manage numbers.
cons: Cons: I find it very hard to find a con about eventbrite. Its so easy to use, that i dont actually think i have a any cons

title: Eventbrite
name: Whitney L.
pros: Pros: It is super easy to set up and allows you to sell tickets and keep track of number of attendees
cons: Cons: Sometimes looks a little plain. Would be better if the pages were more customize-able

title: Incredibly Easy To Use
name: Dustin J.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is the standard when it comes to events, both that we put on and ones that we accept to do personally.
cons: Cons: This software is easy to setup and doesn't have much downside!

title: Frequent Eventbrite user
name: Tesha C.
pros: Pros: Ability to search by location AND date, ability to pay for events within app, suggested events for me.
cons: Cons: Lack of advertisement, a lot of events and business don't know to use it.

title: My experience with Eventbrite was wonderful.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I liked how easy it was to create an event and was able to reach all the people that I wanted to know about the event.
cons: Cons: There was not much wrong with the software. Inviting people to events can be time consuming and using a new software meant that I had to type in some email addresses for people that I could not reach through social media, which it completely understandable.

title: Eventbrite
name: danielle e.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This made signing up for seminars very simple because you could scroll through to see all that was available.
cons: Cons: Could not see what I was registered for without going to cart and then could not add other classes in the same batch.
overall: Overall: Good way to see what classes are available and was easy to use, however I would tweak it so you could see the classes you had registered for while still scrolling through the options.

title: Eventbrite does it all
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes it simple to import your information to be able to sell and promote for your event.
cons: Cons: The search function could use work to make it easier to use. Looking for an event can often junk up your search results with events that are not similar in nature.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite is a simple way to get the word out for your event and achieve sales.

title: Making events easy!
name: Meghan F.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: I love the ease of utilizing Eventbrite. It's user friendly and understandable.
cons: Cons: I honestly don't have any genuine issues with the software. It rarely crashes or times out.

title: Used EventBrite to reserve tickets and register for events
name: Matthew V.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It's easy to use! I've used EventBrite mostly to register for events and buy tickets. It's great getting a reminder email about an event and all I have to do is click a button to reserve or buy a ticket. It's also a great resource to search for events whether its a fitness event or a concert and, of course, people can buy tickets straight from the site. I have yet to use it for distributing my own event tickets, but definitely will when i get the opportunity.
cons: Cons: The site can be a bit busy and their recommended events for my area do not look like anything I'd be interested in going to . . .at all.
overall: Overall: Easy to search events, buy tickets, and reserve a place or register for events.

title: Eventbrite review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to view, respond, and share events.
cons: Cons: Nothing stood out as a con with this software, easy to use as an end-user.
overall: Overall: As a respondent to events generated from Eventbrite, things couldn't be easier. Simply click link in email, register for the event and setup a reminder if needed. It is also convenient to share the event via the standard social media methods directly from the event page.

title: Eventbrite is great
name: Megan L.
pros: Pros: Like how easy it is to use, set-up for new events is so quick. The RSVP reports are helpful in the days leading up to an event.
cons: Cons: So far it has done what we have wanted.

title: event brite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is Easy to use, easy refunds, mobile friendly, user friendly, easy to navigate.
cons: Cons: It was Difficult at first to find a contact number when requesting a refund.

title: A great way to find out what's going on near you
name: Charlie A.
pros: Pros: It was very easy for me to look up events near me. I was able to search and find several adult cooking classes near me, fairly quickly.
cons: Cons: It doesn't seem like new events are added often, at least in my area. It's good to go on and browse once in awhile (every month or so), but for me it seemed pointless to use it more often.

title: Used for setting up rsvps for performances
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that I am able to make a page that is easily accessible to the public for the events that I manage in the facility that I help manage. I also love that I am able to create a Facebook event page directly from Eventbrite that links back to the event page.
cons: Cons: I personally haven't had any issues with Eventbrite.

title: Best event platform on the market!
name: Stefano C.
pros: Pros: It's a very intuitive platform that help you organize your event in less than 20 minutes.
cons: Cons: Sometimes fees may seem high but on a large number of sales they weigh less.

title: Great for internal events too!
name: Amanda M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Frankly, I liked that there was no cost associated the best!
cons: Cons: The software is geared towards public events rather than private, internal events, so some of the features were irrelevant. They should have a different template for internal events, in my opinion. I also think they could have better design templates.

title: functional, all-around useful
name: Massimo A.
pros: Pros: I love how this allows such customization when it comes to event information. It also looks great to share on facebook too. Eventbrite is a really great and powerful tool for schools and companies/organizations.
cons: Cons: I have no cons about this software as it has done it's job above and beyond! It has tons of great features!

title: Event Creation with Ease
name: Mandar P.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: I can create event and sell the tickets online, also event brite has a wide range of customers visiting there app for searching event and you can also get benefits of it. Pricing is based on how much tickets you sell. Support is awesome just drop a mail and you will receive an Email withing 24-48 hrs
cons: Cons: Good app to create only 1 drawback is there you need to visit desktop to check the status of your tickets sold. event brite should provide an Mobile app for the same.

title: Best website to create events and have them online
name: Albert o.
pros: Pros: I like that I was able to post and create content for the event and post specifics about my even and have it showcase to a lot of people and customers
cons: Cons: That it took about a day to get fully posted on the website
overall: Overall: I've had a great experience with eventbrite that was an easy transition for someone like me that don't use online website for events

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Henry R.
pros: Pros: My school uses eventbrite to notify people of upcoming events they've signed up for and it's awesome. It lets people view who is going to certain events and change your status on whether or not you're going
cons: Cons: I don't get why it is necessary to have an eventbrite account as a user if you are not creating events.

title: Convenient
name: Nathan J.
comments: Comments: This helps me remember things that I have scheduled, tickets that I have coming up, and it lets me know about things that I might be interested in. Being someone who keeps a lot of irons in the first, this is really helpful and convenient.

title: I like Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to book any artist's concert tickets that you like, I like that I can book sport events as well.
cons: Cons: Only prices vary when advertising and the actual price.

title: Free Version of Eventbrite is great!
name: Josh B.
comments: Comments: I've used this to host birthday parties in the past, and I think the authentification with an email address is fairly easy! Of all the simple event management platforms, my friends use this most (though mostly this is being displaced by Facebook).

title: Eventbrite is very useful
name: Michael R.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is user friendly - Several work colleges and myself have used this for a few events/seminars that we have attended. It has all the information needed for the event.
cons: Cons: None that I have seen yet, we are fairly new to it.
overall: Overall: We will continue to use Eventbrite where possible when attending events/seminars outside of our company.

title: Easy event management
name: Melissa M.
pros: Pros: This software's simple UI and efficient processing has made organizing my events and get-together's so easy. It's mobile friendly and offers many utilities to promote my events.
cons: Cons: There is a fee with every paid ticket sold. However, this is understandable as the creators need to be able to improve their product.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Chris J.
pros: Pros: Ease of use balanced with customization.
cons: Cons: Nothing at this time.
overall: Overall: I have used Eventbrite for several event registrations, and I feel like it is a great balance of ease of use and customization. Will recommend it in the future.

title: I have used Eventbrite for buying many event tickets.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like how it suggests events that you may be interested in depending on what kind of tickets you buy. I also like that you can add your ticket to your Wallet App on the iPhone. I think the formatting is intuitive and easy to use.
cons: Cons: I do not have many cons to report. I think if this website was marketed more and people knew more about it it could take off.

title: Promote Your Next Event With Ease
name: Kendra C.
pros: Pros: Eventebrite is an excellent platform for those looking to promote their events online. I love being able to have a customizable web page for my event. Many are familiar with Eventbrite now so that make it even easier to promote using this software.
cons: Cons: Accessing your payment prior to the event would be great!

title: The Perfect Site to Run Your Event
name: Cindy S.
comments: Comments: I have used Eventbrite to promote several accounting events. It is easy to use and always works well. They keep track of all the ticket details and payments for the event. They allow an easy way to check people in at the event as well.

title: Amazing organization for large events!
name: Molly B.
pros: Pros: We used it for a company wide event and it was amazing! It created a easy platform to be able to let people know where they needed to go and when they needed to be there!
cons: Cons: It honestly was great. A little confusing at first but as any app is, we just had to play around with it for a few and figured it out! Great app!

title: First time user and it went well
name: Brenda h.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I enjoyed being able to register for the event and purchase tickets online. The fact that you receive recepit and ticket online without standing inline is a win in my book.
cons: Cons: I do not know if it been fixed but when i purchased my tickets the page constantly locked up and I had to refresh the page or go back and start over but eventually it worked.

title: Everyone's uses it but it makes me sad
name: Sonya M.
pros: Pros: Everyone uses it so you know what to expect when the home screen pops up. And you know you will get an email promptly
cons: Cons: Why so many questions before I get what I want to accomplish. Also no way to add it to your calendar. I registered for a bunch of things for SXSW and when I tried importing , I got some weird PDF I cannot open

title: Eventbrite: Keep Updated on Events from your Phone
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy mobile application to follow events, allowing me to see daily schedules for each event with ease.
cons: Cons: The interface is a little slow on mobile devices.

title: Great for finding whats going on in your area
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Great for finding what's going on in your area and then letting you purchase tickets with ease.
cons: Cons: It could use a once over with its interface.

title: Great software!
name: Rachel W.
pros: Pros: I love the ease of getting people tickets! The check-in process is super easy and takes less than a second to scan on the phone! It's also great that it is free for a free event
cons: Cons: I wish the waitlist was easier to move people to the list after the registration period has ended, but otherwise great software!

title: Overall Solid Software
name: Max H.
comments: Comments: Overall I have a good experience when I use Eventbright, however there are small little issues that always cause a bump in the experience. For example, every time I select multiple guests for an event, it asks me for their information on the next page. If I decide at that point that I don't have one persons info, there is no way to easily remove them from the RSVP and I must start everything over, even sign in.

title: Nice way to get a ticket
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's very easy for the attendees to get a ticket and it's more official than a facebook event for a free event
cons: Cons: Transaction fees for paid event are high

title: Best platform for creating events and getting people registered.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's really easy to set up and also integrates easily with other tools which works out great. The platform also allows you to easily set up free and paid events!
cons: Cons: I wish the cost structure would be different as it gets a bit pricey when you have to give a % of your ticket sales plus a fee per individual ticket.

title: Eventbrite
name: Heather H.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: How you can create events and have people sign up for them to give you an idea of who's coming
cons: Cons: Figuring out how to use it, but once we did it was goid

title: Easy to use
name: Rachel B.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: Great tool for organizing events and having everything in one place.
cons: Cons: At this point, there really isn't anything that sticks out as negative right now.

title: Perfect for any Event
name: Lauren M.
pros: Pros: I love this software. I like how customizable it is and I like the designs they have for us.
cons: Cons: I personally have not found anything to complain about.

title: Cool
name: Prather B.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
comments: Comments: Its pretty chill, easy to use and user friendly. Some nice features and can include more new stuff like sharing pictures of event afterwards and stuff like that.
pros: Pros: Easy to sign up and use.
cons: Cons: Misses details at times.

title: Great for Events!
name: Jordan D.
pros: Pros: Allows ticket sales and tracking for special events your business may be hosting; easy to use; tracks ticket sales and provides up to date information for users; uploading events and ticket information is easy and is a great software to have for any business regularly hosting events
cons: Cons: Many users trying to access at the same time may slow the software, but will quickly pass allowing users to quickly and easily access their purchase and ticket information

title: Eventbrite did a good job
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We used it to sell tickets for a nonprofit fundraiser and it accomplished that goal easily. We were able to get the guests info and ensure a seamless process night of.
cons: Cons: It did not collect everything that we would have liked to capture about our guests. It was also not ideal for our limited number of guests who wanted to purchase tickets offline.

title: EventBrite Review
name: Heather S.
pros: Pros: Easy way to buy tickets for an event or check to see what is going on around me.
cons: Cons: Not always as up to date as I would hope and times out rather fast

title: Quick Easy
name: Donald R.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: Very easy to set up and event and track invites and RSVPs
cons: Cons: I'd rather see more security around who can respond and restrictions on forwarding invites

title: Managing Events in Office
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that I am able to send out to multiple emails and have people sign up for events easily.
cons: Cons: There are no con's with this software that I have found with my many uses.
overall: Overall: The benefits with Eventbrite is being able to communicate to multiple people and having them sign up for things on their own time and leisure. This is also a great way to have reminders of when/what to do for an event!

title: Very Practical for Every Event
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love that it's so easy to use and that tracking analytics is built right into the interface.
cons: Cons: I disliked the amount of cusomizations available

title: Decent but sometimes seemed over complicated
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It does make hosting events easier because all the information is right there.
cons: Cons: It sometimes seemed a bit overwhelming for a simple invitation.

title: Create any event!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use with various ways to promote, collect information and transaction for ticket payment methods. Whatever type of event, available for the general public or closed to invite only, you can customize using your own graphics and easy to make changes after creating. As a user, you are also able to follow an event if any changes are made due to weather, cancellations, etc.
cons: Cons: No complaints here! It's a great tool for promoting events.

title: Perfect for your next event!
name: Abigail G.
pros: Pros: What I love most about Eventbrite is that events are easy to find and your event can be easily found within categories.
cons: Cons: In my experience, I haven't had any problems using Eventbrite.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite is a great platform to use when you want to get the word out about your event while also providing the ability to purchase tickets.

title: Does its job
name: Carly S.
comments: Comments: It has a nice UX and allows users to easily sign up for events. I recommend this product
pros: Pros: Stated above
cons: Cons: I wish it kept me signed in so I didn't have to enter my information over and over again.

title: Good App but...for use with computer
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: It's easy to find popular events in your area. And at the same time u can filter by category.

Also, u can like events and share with friends or people u think would like them.
cons: Cons: This software has many problems when it is used with the celphone. For example, I had problems to select my seats.

title: Student Review of Eventbrite
name: Alex E.
pros: Pros: As a nursing student, Eventbrite is an amazing software to use when hosting, attending, or planning a big event. I've used Eventbrite while attending numerous parties, and conferences. It's easy to use, and quick.
cons: Cons: It does get a little tricky navigating through the software at some points.

title: Answers a need
name: Arnaud D.
pros: Pros: The offer is clear. It does what it says it does. Efficient
cons: Cons: There are many competitors and I think that Eventbrite doesn't adapt that quickly

title: Very easy to use!
name: Holly C.
pros: Pros: I loved that this software allowed our company to, not only invite many community members to our event, but also to keep track of those who had registered and responded. This made planning for our event so much easier!
cons: Cons: At times, some of the clickable headings seemed somewhat ambiguous.

title: Great experience every time
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I have not used eventbrite to create my own events but I have used it as a user and every time I have used it I love it! It is very user friendly and I love that tickets come straight to my inbox. Def recommend using it to create a great user experience.
cons: Cons: Don't have anything bad to say about this software.
overall: Overall: Great user experience!

title: Nice for events
name: Jesse T.
pros: Pros: Its simple and easy to use for local events. The user just inputs their info to register.
cons: Cons: It could add more functionality and customization.

title: AMAZING software
name: Kasey B.
pros: Pros: This software makes it easy to create, view and attend events. Very user friendly.
cons: Cons: There is very little that I would say needs improvement.

title: Book your events from home
name: Francesca w.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is the quickest and most comfortable way to book your place for an event. I've used it for conferences and seminars but also for cultural happenings, festivals and concerts.
cons: Cons: I think more event managers should start using this software. In some countries it is not popular yet.

title: Perfect for showing events and sharing
name: Russell C.
pros: Pros: I use it for one of my clients. They have a lot of small lectures that are open to the public. Helps them gain some new followers and customers. Also a very great company to work with and has great customer service.
cons: Cons: I have nothing negative to say about this since they make it so easy.

title: great app for tickets, great for clubs and small venues
name: Alberto B.
pros: Pros: i love the app UX design,easy to navigate and have access to tickets and event in the area. i love he recommendation that the app comes up with
cons: Cons: transferring tickets, i ad a ticket i wanted to give o a friend and it was hard to figure out how to do that i ended up not doing it, big con for me

title: Ticket ordering
name: Stephanie V.
comments: Comments: Ive used eventbrite to sign up/buy tickets to local events. its a nice platform and easy to use

title: Great!!
name: Monica L.
pros:
Pros: Easy to navigate

Easy to register and payment process
cons: Cons: Not easy to find events on other locations because it uses your phone's gps.

title: Eventbrite
name: Felipe P.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: The Eventbride app is very convenient in order to store event tickets
cons: Cons: The Eventbride app did not have anything I disliked about it

title: Never get bored!
name: Susan N.
pros: Pros: This software tells you about all the events that are happening in your town.
cons: Cons: I can't say anything negative about this software.

title: love this!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I'm able to book tickets to all events so quickly. Easy way to get the tickets i need!
cons: Cons: Nothing, it's simple to use and understand.

title: Eventbrite App is top notch
name: Share E.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use! Love the features showing events in my area, option to like different types of events and a great place to hold on to my tickets (making it so easy at the door).
cons: Cons: As far as I've used it, I've had no problems. Everything is clearly laid out and very user friendly.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Alexandra K.
pros: Pros: The website has every event you can think of in any local area.
cons: Cons: The only problem is there might be too many events to look at.

title: Great and easy to use!
name: Kim G.
comments: Comments: This site an be used by anyone! We use it at my company for tracking events for employees to see how many people are actually coming to our events when they sign up. This helps us plan for the future!

title: Great for finding local events!
name: Verified Reviewer
comments: Comments: I've used EventBrite to find good networking events in my area and have been impressed by the ease of use. You can filter by type of event you're interested in and pay directly through the app, which is convenient.

title: Very easy to create an event!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We had to create an event for our local branch and it was very easy to set up and use. They offer all the features you need to organize an event, get RSVPs and communicate with your audience.
cons: Cons: It was slightly complicated to use initially, but if you know someone who has used it before, it can be straight forward.

title: Very easy to use.
name: Venitria C.
pros: Pros: This is very easy to use. I love that you are also able to ingrate with other apps as well. I like the back office portion of this too because you are able to send out invitations via email.
cons: Cons: The few times that I needed to contact customer service have been rather difficult.

title: Event and Ticket Management with Eventbrite
name: Nneka O.
pros: Pros: I love how I can keep track of upcoming events with Eventbrite. I can also plan events that have many people coming, keep track of people who RSVP'd and more using this software.
cons: Cons: There is nothing I dislike about Eventbrite. It has been great so far.
overall: Overall: Managing and planning events.

title: Find tickets and events easily and fast
name: Tazlyn G.
pros: Pros: You can find events in your area with ease
cons: Cons: Sometimes it's hard to tell how much the event is or it doesn't show all events

title: Event ticketing
name: Frank J.
comments: Comments: I use Eventbrite for ticketing with free and paid events. They take care of payment processing and even do some promotion within the Eventbrite user community - all for a commission on each sale.

title: good tool for event management and ticket booking
name: PRANAV P.
pros: Pros: very convenient tool for checking the event information and booking tickets
cons: Cons: user interface needs to be improved a little

title: Easy to use, contains great information
name: Christine E.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This software is very helpful for events near you. It shows the date, time and a little bit about the event.
cons: Cons: I wish it would give contact info for questions and it would be nice if we could pay for tickets right on the website instead of being redirected all over the place

title: Protect Your Purpose
name: Juanita H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I just recently started using Eventbrite and it is very easy to use. I am able to purchase tickets for events as well as create and sell tickets for my own event.
cons: Cons: The organizer app is a little difficult to use at first I think maybe like a guide can be useful for first time users

title: Quick and easy
name: Brenda S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Quick and very easy to use. Not a lot of non-sense on page, which makes for less confusion. I was able to get on find what I was looking for and check out without any issues.

Very crazy high fees, kills sales as ticket buyers will steer away from their high fees. Whatever sales you make on this site, good luck getting your money back from these professional thieves.

The registration tool is really great and does a good job of keeping track of who responded, what their response was, head counts, etc.
cons: Cons: The features were really nice but the cost reflects this. And while they have the Essentials package which doesn't have all of the frills as the higher-price options, the % fee can still be steep. I would prefer less features for a lower cost.

It has a nice/easy to use layout where you can add customized text and photos. You can also collect money for your event.
cons: Cons: There isn't much to dislike - it is a great way to promote an event and learn about what is happening in your area.
overall: Overall: Easy way to advertise and get people out to your event!

title: Weemss offers an amazing experience
name: Jeremie M.
pros:
Pros: The user interface is great, easy and fun to use. Every functionality is there from coupons to special offers. The website integration works great on every platform and its design is so great and up to date that it fit perfectly within our website. And the responsive functionality makes for such a better experience for our customers. Emails are great and we only had positive feedback about them. Allowing customers to print their tickets and then SCAN them (how amazing is that) once they arrive at the event. On the backend, we could had every information we needed a click away and the feedback presented as graphics gave us great insights about our customers and allowed us to learn about who they are and how to target them.

Weemss is also way cheaper than other companies who offer a weaker product they try to pass off as great when its really not.

So yes, Weemss does offer an amazing experience!
cons:
Cons: Well, nobody likes to pay a fee on each ticket, but unlike their competitors, Weemss only take a tiny portion of the profits and use it to create a better user experience for both us - organisers and such - but also the person buying the tickets.

So much that it makes us happy not only to pay less than we would to their competitor, but also to know that the money is used to offer a better experience to our customers.

Because we are based in France, we would have liked a more international experience. Some sentences feel badly translated from english to french, and that's something our customers notice.

We would have loved to be able to fully customize the printed ticket, which we were only able to remotely do.

title: Look no further for your ticketing needs
name: Elenko E.
pros: Pros: ease of integration, ticket flexibility, marketing automation, api / zapier abilities, uptime, swiftness
cons:
Cons: we're using the software for running races and there are a couple of things that could be added:

- donations as part of the ticket

- multi-lingual support
overall: Overall: I'm writing having 2 full years of experience using WeeMss for our organisation. This software turned to be our CRM, to be honest.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Try it, you won't regret it

title: Weemss is the system, which allows us to develop our business and organize our events professional.
name: Yoana V.
pros: Pros: The best thing in Weemss is that there are many options and settings and in that way we can customize the registration forms according to our needs. Other very useful things are different methods of payments, automatic messages to registrants, the use of facebook pixel, excellent support.
cons: Cons: It is very difficult to say. For example when we have a free event, we have a hundreds of registrations and hundreds of emails about that. So it will be useful if we could stop that emails but still receive ones for other events.
overall: Overall: Easy organisation of our events, easy registration forms for our customers, easy processing of data. All this leaded to more sales, more income and new opportunities for our business.

title: We use weemss to manage our Innoawards contest since 3 years already.
name: Denitsa M.
pros: Pros: It is a handy tool that helps us organize submission and evaluation steps of our contest. We are able to create variety of nice entry forms for our participants. We can also clone the entire setup of the contest for the next editions that saves us time and efforts as organizers. The platform offers lean but stylish designs to be used as layout for the event web page. We can share access to the platform for co-organizers or invite jury members to vote on-line. All analytics are exportable which helps keeping track record on activities especially for project-based organisations.
cons: Cons: We'd appreciate functionality that makes the contest web page bilingual in order to promote the contest and awardees locally and internationally.

overall: Overall: Its one of those tools that makes you WOW while using it. I not only use it but also refer it and now we use it professionally in the company I work.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: No you are great!

overall: Overall: Well, first of all all guests sign up really easy, second - we can customize event page (when promoting free event, it's great benefit), and last, but not least, we can keep in touch with everyone, sending useful info, links and questionarees.

title: Interface really friendly
name: Anais B.
pros: Pros: I've been able to compare with other ticketing websites that might be slightly cheaper but the interface was not good compared to Weemss. It's easy to go through the different kind of infos, and easy to take actions without being afraid to do a mistake.
cons: Cons: My country currency wasn't directly supported by Weemss or the gateway payment platform. So payments had to go through conversions before arriving into my bank account. And we were losing a bit for each transactions.
overall: Overall: Once again, the interface makes it really easy for organizers to use and have a overview of their event.

title: Best out there
name: Rob W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to use / quick to get started / good customer care (Was - pricing system)
cons: Cons: Not sure how the pricing system will now affect me - depending on price of ticket / free events etc. Time will tell.
overall: Overall: After previously using Eventbrite, Ticket Tailor and a few others for paid for events - I migrated to Weemss. One of its strongest features is offline payments. Weemss has a really clean, easy to use interface and there are various marketing / promo options that are more flexible than other cloud based software. Customer service is exceptionally quick - (chat room or ticketing on the site).

title: Very simple and complete ticketing software
name: Georgi G.
comments: Comments: I organize events for more than 4 years and in last 3 i am using weemss to control processes and sell tickets.

title: A great tool that saved us a lot of time and energy.
name: Samuila J.
comments: Comments: WEEMSS is a fascinating tool, which does not require special skills and equipment and is highly user-friendly and reliable. With WEEMSS software we managed to organize our event registration process and tickets sales in a smooth and efficient manner the software managed to support the intensive traffic and overload (the first 100 tickets have been sold in less than half an hour). The ticket sales process is practically fully automated and minimizes the efforts of the event organizers to a minimum. The software provides real-time comprehensive statistics and analytics, which gave us the possibility to adapt our promotional and marketing activities accordingly.

title: Makes Business 1,000x Easier
name: Jessica W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: -Takes nearly all the hassle out of event registration/ticketing

-Easy to use/intuitive website and setup

-Fairly fast customer service help; chat usually available

-Easy to clone events

-Super customizable registrations

-Easy to scan entrants in on the Weemss app

-The most affordable platform I've found
cons:
Cons: -Invoice is in Euros, despite my settings being for USD; drives me a little crazy

Other than that, I don't really have any complaints.
overall: Overall: Just makes life so much easier! I haven't found any software I'd like better for my event platform.

title: Great for Growth

pros: Pros: Easy to use and a great range of registration information could be added. I also appreciated the ability to set sale times to open and close without having to physically log on to "turn the system on/off".
cons: Cons: It would be nice to receive notifications on a basis other than daily.
overall: Overall: My friends and I used this service for a small nonprofit. During ticketed events, we found Weems made it easy for us to set up, test, and track our sales. We were able to pull info directly from the system based upon the demographics/registration info we set up. The system was easy to use and gave us notifications and updates on how we were doing without having to log in. It was great.

We are using Weemss for one year now, selling concert tickets and I cannot praise it enough - the whole Weemss team is doing a great job, adding new features, investing in the system to make it better every day and their endless personal support with any type of question or problem is out of the way, THANK YOU. Keep up the good work.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Maybe some short tutorial videos on how to set up your event with different features would be helpful for the beginners as the system offers so much but you have to look carefully to find it or you need try it first to see how it works.

I can create every price level for tickets and create coupon codes easily.

High customization for ticket design template (with QR code or barcode), email messages for buyers and onepage website for purchasing online with a seating chart updated in real time.

Easy integration with PayPal Business, very low fees.

Chat support is very good, always finding the right solution.

I'm very happy, it cares every detail!

overall:

I should say, though, that their support is excellent and they did all they could to help me find a workaround for my problem.

recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: i d like others sizes for the ticket print, maybe options for personalizar the page and loyout, colors that i need (css configuraci_n)

title: Bit clunky and frustrating to begin, but infinitely improved my life in the long run, once I got it!
name: Natalie B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Weemss makes it so easy to collect payments and all the registration information required. Has saved me hours of admin time.
cons:
Cons: I would like to be able to change the view option on the registration page, ie. choose ticket category rather than date.

I would also like to be able to see the registration details all on one page rather than have to click on each individually. Also an option to email the whole group in one go would be great.
overall: Overall: Time saving.

title: I've had very fluid experiences. Everything has worked as promised!
name: Neale B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I like the ease of use and the flexibility. It is really easy to read and you just fill in each box the way you want. It makes things super efficient.
cons: Cons: I don't have something at this time. Probably being able to change the default dollar value of payments so it saves this for future events.

title: Easy to use software, with great features. I used it for a corporate event.
name: Maria Z.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The best thing is that it is very easy to use and after the event you have a great list of all the people, who attended.
cons: Cons: It charges on certain periods (e.g. once per month). I prefer to be charged once after the end of the event.

title: Very useful
name: Ana Rita M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: All the features and low cost
cons: Cons: Interface
overall: Overall: Very useful when planning events. I specially like the options for tickets. Includes a lot of great features.

title: Holdmyticket review
name: Garrett C.
pros: Pros: There are so many features I like about this software. I like how simple it is to use. We appreciate the live ticketing purchase updates, The ease of which we can capture our repeat customers data. I like that I can build an event from my Iphone (if I need to) in a very short time. We can repeat events easily. It builds facebook events for us. I could go on and on but I like that the features are not hidden or hard to find- there are a probably over a hundred things the software can do for you and it's all self explanatory and simple to use.
cons: Cons: I really have to think about this, but I would like to be able to manipulate the title of the events a little easier (font sizing, Italics, bold font, etc.) Other than that I honestly can't think of anything.
overall: Overall: My overall experience with Holdmyticket has been extremely positive - hands on customer service second to none. The pricing also is very competitive.

title: Great Ticketing System
name: Gregg W.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, direct integration with my website and the fantastic support that we have received on the very rare occasion that we've needed it.
cons: Cons: The only improvement that I can think of would be a better real time ticket purchase report to share with promoters. Emails are sent after every ticket purchase, but that email doesn't include the total number of tickets sold for a given event.
overall: Overall: Have been using HMT for about 7 years as my only ticketing/gate point of sale and have never considered switching to one of the others that constantly send emails with reasons to use their system. HMT's software is simple to use no matter the size of the venue and in the rare occasion that we've needed any type of support, a HMT rep has always been there to help out. I would recommend HMT to anyone looking for an easy, hassle-free ticketing software with exceptional customer support!

title: A Truly Fantastic Product!
name: Max K.
pros: Pros: A custom website built just for me and an Intuitive backend with a host of excellent features. The ticketing side for my customers is easy to use and setting up events is very straight forward.
cons: Cons: It would be great to have a little more control over the analytics regarding individual event tracking/page tracking as well as some sort of real time notifications via text or email as tickets are being purchased. It would also be great to have a way to globally update times and dates as needed for repeat events.
overall: Overall: HoldMyTicket has been instrumental in allowing me to easily expand my show offerings and the technical support and customer service has been phenomenal when I have requested assistance!

title: They Do What They Say and More
name: Ron P.
pros: Pros: Consistent quality product and service from their staff. They always answer their phones and return emails.
cons: Cons: Hard to come up with something here. There are more things I wish it did but they are willing to integrate or build API's and they are always agile.
overall: Overall: They under promise and over perform. The team at HMT is an absolute pleasure to work with and I couldn't ask for a better ticketing partner. So glad that we chose them over the "Big Guys" in the ticketing industry. 5 Stars all day!

title: Game changer for us!
name: Jesse H.
pros: Pros: Ticketing software is intuitive and easy to use. It was a total game changer for our tour company. HoldMyTicket definitely upped our game and gave us a more professional platform for our customers. We often get compliments about how easy it is to purchase tickets.
cons: Cons: We don't have anything negative to say about this software.
overall: Overall: I trust HoldMyTicket. They are easy to work with and they genuinely care about how they can make things easier for us.

title: HoldMyTicket review
name: Abbey R.
pros: Pros: The calendar feature, the offer feature, the dashboard, integration with social media. The newsletter
cons: Cons: The website integration/style/look could be better, but it works and is stable and in 12 yrs of use, it's never been not functional.
overall: Overall: Incredible. They care. They respond. They are great with my customers for questions/refunds etc. they consider upgrade suggestions. They are real people. I love this company. They are a true partner in my business.

title: User Friendly + Great Customer Service
name: CHELSEY P.
pros: Pros: HoldMy Ticket is very user friendly. We have a variety of users and new users working with the software every 6 months - our ability to get them up and running quickly is important and we are able to do that with HoldMy Ticket.
cons: Cons: Everything works quite well with the software and we don't have many additional needs. The one thing we are lacking is the ability to sell multiple tickets in a package.
overall: Overall: It's been great working with the HoldMy Ticket Team for the past couple of years. They are incredibly communicative and quick to reply to questions/needs of our organization. They have been easy to work with on all of our event ticketing needs and user set-up.

title: Arts People has helped my small community theatre in many ways resulting in higher revenue.
name: Leira S.
pros: Pros: It is easy to use , comprehensive and Arts People's customer service is the best I have had anywhere (I wish local waiters were as helpful as AP's client services department!). With integrated ticketing and donor services we now know much more about our patrons, how best to reach them, and what they respond to. The result is higher ticket sales, larger and more frequent donations, and generally stronger support of our little theatre. That the software integrates seamlessly with our website and products like Mailchimp and Facebook is a big plus. The help desk is full of articles which are clear and videos which give step by step instructions for the visual learners among us. But the strength of AP is it's people. Every person I have had contact with is a theatre artist. Because of that they really get my organization, why things I think are critical really are (so nice not to have to convince people of what is important!), and how to best solve whatever problem I am having. Recently they have been expanding their marketing tools. I know that there are many more benefits awaiting my organization if I fully utilize the products that Arts People offer. And, Arts People is CRAZY affordable, with very low start up costs and below market fees. Truly the best investment we have made at Ferndale Repertory Theatre.
cons: Cons: They have not yet solved global warming. I am sure they will get on that when they have a free minute.

title: The best ticketing provider, with the right options, at the right price.
name: Kevin P.
pros: Pros: I did extensive research into ticketing companies, and decided Arts People was the one to try. And we've stayed, for five years now, with no plans to change. Occasionally another ticketing company will contact me, and I'll compare costs. Arts People is lower or about the same. Those with higher costs try to tell me about their more expansive services - and I don't use them or need them. Arts People is right for me and my venue.
cons: Cons: I wish there was an app for patrons to easily manage their subscriptions and tickets, and that we could push advertising to, perhaps even flash-sales. Related, purchasing on a mobile device is more difficult for my patrons than they like.
overall: Overall: I did extensive research into ticketing companies, and decided Arts People was the one to try. And we've stayed, for five years now, with no plans to change. Occasionally another ticketing company will contact me, and I'll compare costs. Arts People is lower or about the same. Those with higher costs try to tell me about their more expansive services - and I don't use them or need them. Arts People is right for me and my venue.

title: Makes Theatre Ticketing and Patron Management a Sure Success
name: Liz D.
comments: Comments: Finding the right ticketing and patron management software for our Canadian medium size non-profit Theatre Woodstock in Ontario was a challenge! So much choice, but how to drill down to the essentials? After extensive research and review of their pressure-free demo, we chose Arts-People and we knew we had chosen well, but every day we realize we didn't know how well! The depth, range, and options from do-it-yourself implementation to full support is simply amazing. And fun too!! We love Arts-People and you will too!! We had finalized on three vendors, a large high-end full featured system focused on commercial theatres, a local, newer fully Canadian system, and Arts-People which had been recommended to us. All of the features of the high-end system at half the cost and with fees in Canadian dollars, we saved currently wicked exchange rates. With over 800 clients, primarily in the United States and Canada, and over ten years development, the system is sophisticated, full bodied, and comprehensive for real-time, online ticket and subscription sales, while being simple enough to be fully DIY, Do It Yourself, user enabled. The range of payment features include PayPal which customers really appreciate. The system is extremely well documented with in-depth, easy to navigate help resources, user forum, and 24/7 expertise. The real joy however is the staff, a close knit, thespian loving group of experts, truly arts people, ready, willing, and able to make you a success. And that's what it's all about, isn't it! Being a Success!! As we develop our own sophistication in marketing, fundraising, and patron management and satisfaction, Arts-People will be with us every step of the way, providing long-term, ever expanding solutions. We chose better than we knew!!

pros: Pros: The Ticket Turtle online ticketing system has literally changed our whole world. As a small and growing company, we struggled for years with providing our audiences with a high quality, accessible and easy to use ticketing systems. Ticket Turtle is not only user friendly from the purchasers perspective, it is also incredibly easy to use as an administrator. There are dozens of reports that give you an up to the minute view of all aspects of your ticket sales, detailed database forms to track your audiences, a very flexible donations and contributions system that makes getting donations from patrons a breeze (not to mention generating automatic thank you emails the instant the donation is received) and a versitile ticket pricing system. We will never use another ticketing system, particularly given the incredible level of customer service we have consistently received. We. Love. Ticket. Turtle.
cons: Cons: The only issue we have ever encountered is with the contributions system where it is difficult to process multiple purchased types in a single transaction (ie...buy a ticket, buy season tickets and make a donation all in one transaction). I believe, however, that TT is addressing this for a future version. I would also love to have the option of having TT staff act as ticket sales/phone staff and hope that TT goes down that road to provide that service in the future.
overall: Overall: We love this system and will never use another ticketing system.

pros: Pros: User friendly & fast; shopping cart feature; print-at-home tickets; customize-able BOCA and e-tickets; able to make the Ticket Turtle web page (where patrons buy our tix) look like our webpages, so patrons don't feel like they've left our website; exchanges are easy; the merge feature for the database is great (cuts down on duplicate entries!); mailing lists are easy to pull; gift certificates may be used online with a code so patrons don't have to bring it in; any balance remaining on a gift certificate is in the patron's record, so they can use it anytime; donations accepted online; discounts available online with a code; customer service questions are answered promptly; it's got a cute name and the staff is personable!
cons: Cons: Reporting does not seem complete. Over 90 reports available, but some seem to duplicate information. End of Show Reports currently do not include upgrade income in the sales numbers. I have had to add these in manually in an Excel Spreadsheet to balance with our deposits. Currently unable to refund back to credit cards, which is inconvenient; patrons have to wait for a refund check to be mailed to them.
overall: Overall: Overall, I highly recommend Ticket Turtle for ticketing needs.

overall:
Overall: The setup charges were in the lower range compared to other systems. It has a flexible list and email system. We use it to track our volunteers among other things. It has a membership and donation tracking system as well. Their robust report system provides every kind of information about tickets, comps, donations, and anything else you can think of. They will adjust your pricing for special shows, groups, or whatever, or if your skills are good enough, you can adjust the pricing yourself.



The support from Ticket Turtle has been fantastic! They bend over backwards to make setup go smoothly. Its never been more than a couple hours wait from the time I post a problem or question on their online help request form. And that includes weekends!



The real test of the system for online transactions is the end user. As people enter our theater with their paper in hand, I ask them about buying tickets online. Almost everyone says, It was really easy!

cons: Cons: The software includes a mailing list function at no cost. I use this function frequently. My only complaint is that the software does not retain the emails sent through this system. I had an instance where an email did not process correctly, and in order to resend it, I had to retype the entire email. I now write the emails in a word processor, save the file, and then copy and paste to Arts People.
overall: Overall: Ticketing system was set up in 2-3 days by the Arts People tech team, and they provided ongoing support throughout the process as I learned how to navigate and customize the system. The amazing customer service allowed me to open ticket sales (and bring in revenue) while I was getting up to speed.

title: Best Ticketing Option for any Theatre - Big or Small
name: Michael W.
comments: Comments: Finding the right ticketing and patron management software for our Canadian medium size non-profit Theatre Woodstock in Ontario was a challenge! So much choice, but how to drill down to the essentials? After extensive research and review of their pressure-free demo, we chose Arts-People and we knew we had chosen well, but every day we realize we didn't know how well! The depth, range, and options from do-it-yourself implementation to full support is simply amazing. And fun too!! We love Arts-People and you will too!! We had finalized on three vendors, a large high-end full featured system focused on commercial theatres, a local, newer fully Canadian system, and Arts-People which had been recommended to us. All of the features of the high-end system at half the cost and with fees in Canadian dollars, we saved currently wicked exchange rates. With over 800 clients, primarily in the United States and Canada, and over ten years development, the system is sophisticated, full bodied, and comprehensive for real-time, online ticket and subscription sales, while being simple enough to be fully DIY, Do It Yourself, user enabled. The range of payment features include PayPal which customers really appreciate. The system is extremely well documented with in-depth, easy to navigate help resources, user forum, and 24/7 expertise. The real joy however is the staff, a close knit, thespian loving group of experts, truly arts people, ready, willing, and able to make you a success. And that's what it's all about, isn't it! Being a Success!! As we develop our own sophistication in marketing, fundraising, and patron management and satisfaction, Arts-People will be with us every step of the way, providing long-term, ever expanding solutions. We chose better than we knew!!

I now write the emails in a word processor, save the file, and then copy and paste to Arts People.
overall: Overall: The Richland Players was looking for a better box office solution. Arts People came through by providing us with options no one else could do. Great Support and quick payment. Our patrons are overjoyed and our local arts partners are now jumping on this Bandwagon.

Our patrons love the flexibility of being able to purchase tickets online and have their e Ticket in advance of the performance...just like Broadway! Numerous reports provide all the necessary patron data, ticket counts for a show, financial information , and more. It's an amazing product!

title: Has gotten better and easier each time.

pros: Pros: Very easy to maneuver thru the site and the instructions are easy to understand. Having total control of all the tickets its easy to correct any errors.

overall: Overall: Easy to upload, allocate and track the tickets

title: Makes it easy to entertain clients while having complete control
name: Verified Reviewer
comments: Comments: My company does a lot of entertaining of clients, but our process was never easy. Employees would have to email their requests to an administrator, who would then track each one in an Excel sheet and seek approval from one of our senior executives. Not fun. InviteManager replaced this messy process and made it super easy. Now, we can load events into the system and have total control over which employees see them. They can request events in the system, and the entire approval process is totally streamlined within their system. We should have done this years ago. What's interesting is that by using a system based on giving company leaders total control over what's going on, we actually have a *higher* use of company events than ever before. I think it's because we took something that everyone felt was complicated and made it simple.
pros: Pros: - InviteManager really works with you to understand your current process and makes sure the transition to their solution will be super smooth - We no longer live in fear of what will happen in the event of an audit. InviteManager builds an automatic paper trail and is built to make sure only the right people have access to events. - Besides entertaining clients, our employees are also using InviteManager to purchase tickets on their own so they can hang out and have fun. It's actually led to a greater feeling of camaraderie in the office. Didn't really expect that, but it's great to see it happening
cons: Cons: None really come to mind. If you're using email and spreadsheets, it's time to join the 21st century.
overall: Overall: Easy to upload, allocate and track the tickets
