title: Excellent Customer support, easy to use software
name: Michael R.
pros: Pros: One of Roller's biggest assets is its team. If you have a problem or a training issue they are nearly always available on the phone and if they can't help straight away they will look into it.
cons: Cons: Reporting is probably Rollers biggest set back for us. While it delivers the basics running several sites reports individually can be time consuming and if you don't pay attention to the fields you are using can lead to inconsistencies. (There is however a patch in the works to integrate these down the line).
overall: Overall: Roller makes the life simple for the customer and is constantly seeking to improve. They are receptive to feedback and will try to act on it within reason. They have improved as an operator over the time we have used them and continue to seek to offer more to the market opposed to becoming stagnant or ignoring glitches like other software providers we have previously used.

title: Even better than we hoped for!
name: Lillian M.
pros:
Pros: It's functionality is fantastic and provides us with an all-in-one solution to manage our business.

It is easy to use giving us more control and flexibility.

The knowledge base has well written and informative articles.

The staff on the help desk are always happy to assist with any queries or problems and no request goes unanswered.

Our customer experience has improved dramatically with online bookings increasing exponentially.
cons:
Cons: I honestly can't think of anything I don't like about ROLLER.

If there is ever anything that doesn't quite meet our requirements, they listen to our problem and address it either by helping us find an alternative solution or by creating a feature request.
overall:
Overall: ROLLER are extremely professional and hardworking and dedicated to providing the very best product they possibly can.

I would highly recommend them!

title: The Leader In Entertainment Centre POS
name: Matthew G.
pros: Pros: The Roller platform has revolutionised the entertainment centre industry providing Urban Xtreme with an enhanced customer experience and features that provide the company with an increase in revenue. The platform has been designed with ease of use in mind increasing the throughput of patrons that can be processed at the POS, as well as increasing conversions at online checkouts. The team at Roller is constantly innovating the platform to provide an ongoing flow of new and exciting features.
cons: Cons: The roller back end can be difficult to jump strait into and start using however with the on boarding process and training documentation provided this becomes a very small hurdle to overcome
overall:
Overall: ROLLER are extremely professional and hardworking and dedicated to providing the very best product they possibly can.

I would highly recommend them!

title: Roller Software Review
name: Steve J.
pros: Pros: It's ability to grow and it's use of customer experience and requirements to improve their software to meet it's clients needs, as opposed to other companies who would improve their system based solely on what they thought was best.
cons: Cons: Lack of reporting facilities. Overall summaries of trade, customer footfall, graphics etc would be very helpful, with Only fault on an otherwise fantastic system.
overall: Overall: Customer efficiency, customer shopping experience, customer satisfaction, business operating improvements, booking accuracy, booking records.

title: ROLLER Review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: *User friendly.

*Product configuration is easy to use and adaptable.

*Customer service/communication tools are useful such as forms, Inbox and activity uses, email and call log.

*POS/Doorlist is user friendly and easily adaptable from the back end.
cons:
Cons: *Reporting system is basic and conflicting at times. Despite having a page for building reports, this does not work.

*New features are generally an additional charge even if customers are on a premium package. e.g Recurring passes etc. In my opinion some new features are tools that should have been available as standard anyway rather than sold as a new feature.
overall: Overall: Customer efficiency, customer shopping experience, customer satisfaction, business operating improvements, booking accuracy, booking records.

title: Using Roller as a trampoline park
name: Andreas M.
pros:
Pros: - We really like the Roller support (quick responses, solution oriented feedback)

- Roller understands our business and you can experience that expertise in the software

- Roller releases new features quite often and "thinks ahead of the market"
cons:
Cons: - language translations are currently not available for every feature (Roller is working on that)

- some stability issues with the payment providers (Adyen in our case)
overall:
Overall: If you are fluent in English and have a trampoline park Roller is at the moment the best "off-the-shelf" software in my opinion.

Especially the customer service (support and integration) does an ace job

title: Good system, although missing a few features
name: Filipe B.
pros:
Pros: Ease of use - Roller is very easy to use.

Reliability - once a product/session has been set up, you don't need to do anything else, no worry of issues with capacity, etc.
cons: Cons: Some basic features are lacking and the time frame and price for new features is too much.
overall: Overall: Great system, amazing customer service, with the lack of features letting down the software. Overall, I like the system.

title: A simple and easy intergration!!
name: Imram M.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use. Products can be uploaded within minutes. You can start selling instantly!
cons: Cons: It does a while for you to familiarize yourself with how to use the software. Maybe it's because there are so many amazing features.
overall: Overall: I'm so glad we chose Roller as our software provider. They provide excellent customer support and i would recommend Roller to any business.

title: Great solution network wide!
name: Steven S.
pros: Pros: Great onboarding system with attentive and committed staff. Soft ware is logical and easy to use for both the customer and staff while the actual system and complex and always developing to keep up with ever changing digtial demands.
cons: Cons: Basic features are considered additional, a lot of these would be unnecessary with the development of an API.
overall: Overall: Overall the experience has been positive, any challenges or dificulties were managed in a professional and friendly manner.

title: Roller Software - Go Air Cardiff
name: Amy M.
pros: Pros: Find it really easy to use. Can pick up the background of Roller easily and simple to figure out. Roller support is really efficient in response time too.
cons: Cons: Maybe were not getting the most of of all features that we pay for currently. Would love to get in contact with the team to discuss how to get more out of it.
overall: Overall: Overall the experience has been positive, any challenges or dificulties were managed in a professional and friendly manner.

title: Roller has been a revelation.
name: Liz V.
pros: Pros: POS and Reports. Flexibility in customising products.
cons: Cons: Sometimes the system is a little slow.
overall: Overall: Overall we are happy with the software

title: Roller Review
name: Jodie M.
pros: Pros: Roller is really easy to use and straight forward - really impressed, we were using ez-runner previously and roller is in a totally different league. Also roller are always improving and listening to the customer. The customer service is excellent too.
cons: Cons: Sometimes the waivers coming through to the system is slow
overall: Overall: An excellent system that makes our business run a lot smoother and more professional.

title: Easy, Fast and efficient
name: Toby B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Roller allows easy modification to best suit your venue and business. From the moment of talking with CSR, we were sold on what the system could do. Our project manager, has been excellent in helping build the software to support our business. All issues have been resolved super fast, and with a direct line of communication from the start. The fully customizable customer checkouts is a massive PLUS!
cons: Cons: Whilst modifications are easier to do than a lot of other softwares, I do feel as though this came at a cost of how much modification you can do.
overall: Overall: Roller has allowed us to fully go online. With all parties and jump sessions going online boasting our income from customers who are now able to book their favourites any time!

title: Overall great product and company to deal with.
name: Richard Q.
pros: Pros: Easy of use. Able to train up staff very quickly. Not a complicated system.
cons: Cons: Very little I don't like as they are always on the other end of a phone call for advice.
overall:
Overall: I feel the benefits of being able to produce gift cards and track balances now we have implemented it.

The customer support are exceptional. Always a pleasure to speak to and always find a rapid solution to help you out.

title: FOBX - Marketing Manager
name: Onkar B.
pros: Pros: I love the segmentation tool, it's perfect in allowing the business to utilise customer data for marketing purposes.
cons: Cons: I would love to see flexibility in the templates used, as sometimes small easy changes can make an immediate positive impact on a business e.g. change of text in the template etc
overall: Overall: Really enjoy using it.

title: Great Management system
name: Moha J M.
pros:
Pros: Roller has wide range of services from booking, reports, integrations with Google analytics, etc.

Also support team are really good and helpful. I've worked with 3 different management software so far and Roller is my favourite.
cons: Cons: Loyalty cards which they are working on it
overall: Overall: Really enjoy using it.

title: Powerful software with ease of use and productivity at the forefront
name: Matt P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Cloud based, customizable webstore checkouts that allow us to host on our site, constant platform updating based off client recommendations
cons: Cons: Gift cards need to be categorized as a product that can be discounted like any other.
overall: Overall: We have been thrilled with making the switch to Roller. They listen to us as clients and our ideas are valued and have been put to action to improve their software and our end user experience!

title: Great system
name: Kathy S.
pros: Pros: Via is very easy to set up & use. Has all the features needed in a veterinary practice software program, without the headache of set up that many systems with similar features requires. Tech support is always responsive & helpful.
cons: Cons: We had a few glitches that occured with upgrades, but have been able to find a work around or tech support resolve.
overall: Overall: With the full functionality of the whiteboard, it has eliminated most of our missed charges for invoicing, and allows use to provide a more thorough patient record for our hospitalized patients as a paperless hospital.

title: Via is essential to running our large practice
name: Mark M.
pros: Pros: Our practice sees 24,000 patient visits per year, with robust general practice, 24/7 emergency and specialty areas. Via has been an essential partner as our practice has grown and evolved over nearly 10 years. Via helps all elements of our hospital to organize and achieve efficiency both operationally as well as systems organization.
cons: Cons: Via's interface, like all current PMS systems, needs to evolve with industry best practices to be more responsive and functional in mobile environments.
overall: Overall: With the full functionality of the whiteboard, it has eliminated most of our missed charges for invoicing, and allows use to provide a more thorough patient record for our hospitalized patients as a paperless hospital.

title: A true collaborator and partner
name: Lyndsey J.
comments: Comments: The Edinburgh Fringe Box Office has been powered by Red61's VIA software since 2009, and in collaboration we have gone from strength to strength, distributing over 2.5 million tickets for the Festival Fringe 2016. The strength of the collaboration lies in the teams unending passion for the success of the Festival Fringe and the quality of service and software provided. We couldn't operate at the scale we do without the advanced networking capabilities that allow us to operate a multi user, multi tenant box office network across the city, which holds the experience of the customer at its heart. Red61 have been integral to the development of a seamless purchase/collection system that means customers spend less time queuing for tickets and more time enjoying the festival. High performing real time reporting means venues and companies can maximise their sales right up to the show starting, and with over 3,000 shows per year taking part in the Fringe Festival this last minute market is vital to the income generation abilities of companies and artists. The system is ridiculously easy to use, which means we save time and money training staff and it's intuitive interface means even those staff who are not regular users and quickly able to achieve their objectives. The support team are, in the main, made up of ex box office managers, meaning they bring a unique perspective to both the functionality of the system and the needs of its (often demanding) customers. Red61 are an invaluable partner in our ticketing operation and the software continues to go from strength to strength, offering innovative and creative solutions to a wide range of box offices across the city and the festival.
pros: Pros: Our practice sees 24,000 patient visits per year, with robust general practice, 24/7 emergency and specialty areas. Via has been an essential partner as our practice has grown and evolved over nearly 10 years. Via helps all elements of our hospital to organize and achieve efficiency both operationally as well as systems organization.
cons: Cons: Via's interface, like all current PMS systems, needs to evolve with industry best practices to be more responsive and functional in mobile environments.
overall: Overall: With the full functionality of the whiteboard, it has eliminated most of our missed charges for invoicing, and allows use to provide a more thorough patient record for our hospitalized patients as a paperless hospital.

Reporting

Connection with Antech, Sound, etc
cons:
Cons: It is client-centric rather than pet-centric, meaning we cannot distinguish between multiple pet visits with different causes without a lot of backup work.

Getting locked in single user mode.
overall: Overall: Setup was time consuming but setting it up right is worth the time. When training, support was supreme. Once training ended, customer support was not as strong.

title: Extremely poor costumer service
name: Kay H.
comments: Comments: I have used Via for 13 years and was overall pleased with product However to do the update I was informed that I would have to purchase all new computers as well as new software to the tune of 15000 +++. I did so. I was told I was getting the version 8.0 when I actually got 7.0 which did nothing that I wasn't able to do with my old software except that it doesn't work properly. When I can talk to someone they simply say it is a glitch in the program which would be fixed by 8.0. I was told 8.0 would be out in 2 weeks then next month then next month and so on. Well it came out 5 months later. They installed and now half of our computers don't work at all. No one other than our salesman will return my calls and let me know what is going or what they are going to do. So now i am going to be forced to spend more money and hire an attorney. I would recommend this software company to my worst enemy.
pros: Pros: Familiar with it
cons: Cons: Support
overall: Overall: Have had system since 2003. Liked system. No problem. Needed to update server and new updates. Did so. Required me to by all new computers and hardware. Person that came out to install had no idea what he was doing. Have had nothing but problems. Payed for s year of support. For the entire time we had support they NEVER returned our calls. Now that support is run out They say will not help us unless pay for support for same proper have had all along.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: DONT BUY IT!!!!!!!!!

title: Red61 and Southwark Council's Fireworks Night
name: Paul C.
comments: Comments: Red61 provided an excellent ticketing solution for our 23,000 capacity firework night display in London. The service they provided was excellent. The team was flexible in the support they offered. They delivered an excellent customer experience from ticket booking to on the ticket scanning that night. Thank you.
pros: Pros: Familiar with it
cons: Cons: Support
overall: Overall: Have had system since 2003. Liked system. No problem. Needed to update server and new updates. Did so. Required me to by all new computers and hardware. Person that came out to install had no idea what he was doing. Have had nothing but problems. Payed for s year of support. For the entire time we had support they NEVER returned our calls. Now that support is run out They say will not help us unless pay for support for same proper have had all along.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: DONT BUY IT!!!!!!!!!

title: Great service and value for money.
name: Joeri B.
pros: Pros: More features then known giants in ticketing like Eventbrite. Better data handling and almost 50% less costs.
cons: Cons: There are so many options to fine-tune your ticket sales, you need to spend some time in the dashboard
overall: Overall: More ticketsales, more insights in where my ticketsales are coming from and a save up time and money.

title: Great software
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It is very straightforward and has a very user-friendly layout. It is very clear where to put what and thus is very functional.
cons: Cons: If there is something wrong in the data you put or something else, a little balloon pops up in the right top corner of your screen, but it's not entirely clear that there is something wrong. That could be indicated better. Also, an auto-scroll option is missing when putting in data, e.g. when you press [tab] to go to the next field and you are at the bottom of the page, you can press [tab] as much as you want, but the fields remain out of sight.

title: Eventix is great for small businesses with a budget!
name: Kyle H.
pros: Pros: Eventix has streamlined our ticketing system for concerts at our venue. It has helped us manage inefficiencies and allowed us to avoid any conflicts we have had in the past regarding ticket shortages and pricing. They literally are the "compete event toolbox!"
cons: Cons: No cons - this service has helped us tremendously. With an IT background, I think there could be additional features implemented, but none have come to mind yet.
overall: Overall: This software has helped us avoid any shortages of tickets, which we had previously.

title: Just a few clicks
name: Danny K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Within a few clicks the product was mine
cons: Cons: It was nessecary to write my name twice in the software

title: A process that seems to keep improving with new functionality as we ourselves develop.
name: Meg T.
pros: Pros: I like that it keeps developing and growing with the customers and their needs. I love that they are open to feed back and take it seriously and work to make things better each year for the customers so the customers can make everyone happier such as the administrators, users, and registrants.
cons: Cons: I wish we could upload photos more and add to any text areas instead of linking them. Also, wish we could create a seating or vendor layout that would be visual for the registrants where they could click on it to select a seat or a booth space they want to purchase. Additionally, created the option to have a 2 step process of registration involved where registrants can be approved first and then they can pay fee. We make this happen ourselves by manipulating the database for us and utilizing the code feature to unlock payments. But, it would be neat if when they applied or registered then administrators would run a report and then check a box beside all the registrants to approve and then it sends an approval email to them. This would make it simple instead of going into each of the 300 profiles and marking a custom field in their schedule. so many steps to approve someone. Each one takes like several screens. If there were any easier way to do this that would be amazing.
overall: Overall: It really helps me to keep all of my registrants organized for different events. As well as my volunteer lists for events.

title: This is a great software for volunteer events
name: Amy S.
pros: Pros: Ease of use to register on both the front end and the back end. If there are any items that need to be addressed, customer support is always excellent. The features they continue to add on are terrific.
cons: Cons: There are some items I wish it had, but have not been developed yet such as a person being blocked from adding an invalid email. I also wish they would bring back the blocking emails from registering (maybe because the volunteer was not a right fit or they were banned for whatever reason). I also wish we would be able to download and/or contact all registrants in the system, not just by individual site. This would prevent some volunteers from receiving the same email (if they are registered for multiple sites) and would be less time for the administrator in sending out multiple emails for multiple sites.
overall: Overall: We have been utilizing TRS for 5 years and the system keeps getting better. Customer support is outstanding and Customer support representative is an absolute joy to work with. They listen to suggestions and take into consideration items to improve on, though I know they are unable to accommodate all requests.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: I think, if they have not done so already, create a "task force" team to help create/develop new features based on the needs of the various organizations they work with. They could do a call every quarter or twice a year just to discuss trends and wish lists TRS may not have thought of.

title: Easy to use, great customer service, very user friendly
name: Becky G.
pros: Pros: I like how you are able to clone previous sites to make it easier for me to update dates and any smaller position changes that occur with events that happen each year. The capabilities of the site seem very repetitive with adding shifts, customizing selections, etc, which makes building the site that much easier for me. The customer service with Flory and her team are top notch! They are always willing to answer questions and the follow up truly helps build the relationship with our team and theirs. Overall, I have had a very positive and great experience using the software!
cons: Cons: Occasionally I run into the issue of the site not being as customizable for the event as it could be. For example, if I am running an event that only has one registrant type, it seems like there should be an option for users to go right to selecting activities. It is not horrible to not take this extra step of creating this one registrant type on the page, but seems that it could be more user friendly by having this be an option on the back end.

title: TRS user/administrator for the last 4 years. As a company, we use TRS for 3+ events per year.
name: Meagan B.
pros: Pros: That we can customize it to do what we need. We use TRS for both volunteer and vendor management. Works best for volunteer management, but is best option for the price for vendor management.
cons: Cons: Would like better integration with our own existing websites for each individual site - ie co-branding capabilities beyond just the header banners.
overall: Overall: We use this software to manage our online applications for both vendors and volunteers for all of our live events. This product is used for 3 or more events per year, so our staff is very familiar with how TRS operates.

title: It has been positive, it offers most everything I need and seems to have a pretty good delivery rate
name: Jessica H.
pros: Pros: I like that volunteers can register for multiple events at once and that it now has texting available.
cons: Cons: Sometimes I still think the process for the volunteers can be difficult, I still hear from people having trouble. Sometimes I cannot pull all reports I would like to.
overall: Overall: I am able to allow all volunteers to register for the activities and events of their choice, it's makes management much easier for me as the volunteer coordinator.

title: I've grown accustomed to using myTRS and find it works well for my clients' needs.
name: Tina M.
pros: Pros: I like that it's a local company owned by someone I know and I've used this product enough that I'm pretty familiar with it.
cons: Cons: I would like to see myTRS return to the account manager customer service model. I miss having Tammy to reach out to for questions or help with one-off issues. I don't find the FAQ very helpful nor the support email as quick to response as I would like.

title: TRS has been a great experience and continues to be
name: Karen C.
pros: Pros: The software is user friendly and easy to use in the admin side. It also is beneficial that our template can be copied and pasted each year and I only have to add shift times and dates for each of my locations
cons: Cons: It would be beneficial if the software had the capability to send automatic reminders to volunteers

title: Always Impressed with myTRS
name: Chelsea K.
comments: Comments: I have been using myTRS for a variety of different large events since 2013 and have always been a fan of this management site. Specifically, I have used it for volunteer management and have really enjoyed seeing the positive changes that have been made over the years to make it easier for both us on the management side and the front end for the volunteers to sign up. Not only is it simple and easy to get set up and manage, I have had some of the best customer service and working relationship with myTRS when working and managing sites. I always know that if I have questions, I can send a quick email or set up a call and I will have a response quickly.

title: Using TRS for client events
name: Mona F.
pros: Pros: User interface for constiuents and volunteers to register is simple and attractive. Custom field features allow me to create additional fields for management use that are not visible to registrants. The ease with which it exports to MS Excel makes it possible to quickly merge more elaborate letters, invoices, reports, etc. created in MS Word. Search/Advance Search function easy to use for building queries. Email function easy to use and allows for easy segmentation of database for communication.
cons: Cons: Financial reports are a great resource for those needing basic information, but could be enhanced for those more engaged in financial managment of an event including reconciliation. Would like a new feature allowing reapplying payments when registrants change selected activities with the same or different prices. Despite lack of these advanced financial features for financial managers, I still rate TRS 5 stars in feature reachness because it meets or exceeds the registration features that most event managers need.
overall: Overall: With nearly 25 years in nonprofit management and event management, this is the best product I have found for ease of use for event managers and registrants/volunteers, custom field flexibility, report flexibility, and more.

title: Concessions Coordinator
name: Karen C.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and maintain
cons: Cons: That the system doesn't send out reminders - I do manually.
overall: Overall: The TRS system is easy to use and maintain for reaching out to our volunteers and for our volunteers to sign up for their concession shifts throughout the sport seasons.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: not at this time

title: TRS is very easy to use!
name: Ashley J.
pros: Pros: It's very user friendly! Since the system is very user friendly, it's great to use at any size conference. It's easy to pull reports for registration. It's also great if the same registrants attend the same conference every year, as the system will keep the information and you can easily register each time.
cons: Cons: Really nothing to complain about. There could be incomplete registrations if the registrant doesn't go till the end and unfortunately, the system doesn't show that their registration is incomplete. The registrant just doesn't receive the confirmation email to show them they are completely signed up.

title: From CLIENT to EMPLOYEE
name: Joelle B.
pros:
Pros: Before working at TRS, I was a client using the product. I was a Volunteer Manager for over 7000 volunteers and my first year we were using excel spreadsheets. TRS saved my life! I became efficient - knowing exactly who signed up for what shift, knowing where we were short volunteers, being able to track attendance, communicating with volunteers by event or shift because we actually got volunteers' email addresses!

Being able to actually pull reports before, during and after the event made me more effective as a volunteer manager.

Loved the 'include itinerary' option to always remind volunteers what they registered for!
cons: Cons: Would like to see the reporting become more robust where you can set even more specific parameters and even pull some sort of a daily report of activity.
overall: Overall: TRS allowed me to actually start managing my volunteers and my volunteer program instead of being stuck behind a desk swamped with admin work. It also made me more organized and helped better our volunteer program changing the mindset from 'we desperately need volunteers' to 'if you want to volunteer with us, you have to follow these rules'. I believe so much in the product that when the opportunity arose, I started working for TRS!

title: Great customer service. Easy to create the site.
name: Morgan S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The excel upload function is the best. It is very easy to create the volunteer sites and customize everything to the event itself. I love the reports that are available as well.
cons: Cons: It would be nice to have people use the same email address if they are in the same family. I have had quite a few people call and ask if they need to create a different email for themselves to sign up. Also, the activities are expanded underneath the activity groups so that might be nice to have not expanded. It takes a while to create an activity in the activity maker, it is much easier to do it in excel. Maybe instead of choose the month and day you could type it in instead?
overall: Overall: Quick and easy registration site.

title: Great for organizing large groups of Volunteers!
name: Beth B.
comments: Comments: 2015 marked the first year that we used TRS to register and manage Volunteers for VeloSano, a community fundraiser and cycling event for cancer research at Cleveland Clinic (www.velosano.org). In this, our second year, we had over 900 Volunteers filling over 1,100 shifts.

title: Columbus Indiana Visitors Center Review
name: Eric M.
pros: Pros: I like the setup for volunteer sign-up, check-in and reports and am thrilled that text messaging has been added to the communications component of the system.
cons: Cons: The email function could definitely improve. It would be nice to be able to send test emails or save drafts and come back to an email later. There is also a problem with the formatting of our banner when an email is sent. We have followed the size specifications but the image is distorted when it is sent.
overall: Overall: Working with the TRS product has been very positive for our organization. Most importantly they continue to make changes and updates that benefit the end user. As with anything, there is room for improvement but the overall product is very good and cost effective.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Simplifying the group sign-up feature would be helpful. And, when a volunteer signs up, the country and state drop downs are a little irritating.

title: Used TRS for 3 years for two large conventions
name: Rose Z.
comments: Comments: I first started using TRS for the National FFA Convention that we had in Louisville, KY from 2013-2015. It was required by the Convention to use this program and I can understand why because it was so easy to maintain so many volunteer shifts with so many volunteers (20+ different volunteer jobs and around 200 volunteers, each year!). We were able to check-in volunteers when they arrived at their shifts, run reports (daily schedule, personal itineraries for volunteer packets, and final volunteer totals, etc).

title: Great product for volunteers!
name: Marcie L.
pros: Pros: Registration reports, custom features, customer service
cons: Cons: Nothing so far - I wish I had more time to explore and experiment with the different reports and features.
overall: Overall: Currently working on our second registration site for volunteers and would recommend TRS to anyone planning a large event with staff or volunteers. It's very user-friendly and designed specifically for volunteer management.

title: A Great System that Kept Us Together
name: Kelsey E.
comments: Comments: TRS is a great company to work with. The Canadian Tulip Festival was in need of a volunteer registration system that would allow more time for volunteer management and less time spent scheduling volunteers in a spreadsheet. TRS truly delivered on that front. Our Account Manager was terrific and provided us with a lot of support on every level. The system was down for a few minutes one day but was fixed before I could even finish responding to their tech support message.

title: TRS provides high quality volunteer management system and stellar service
name: Katie Z.
pros: Pros: The ability for an organization to manage an event, whether large or small.
overall: Overall: We are a partner of TRS and have worked closely with them to onboard thousands of volunteers for many, many events, including some very high profile events. From working with TRS to build the initial integration to continuing to onboard clients using our turnkey integration, we have found that TRS support is truly stellar. Our clients love the solution and their software allows clients to successfully manage their event. We've noticed that clients continue to refer TRS to other clients and those that have events each year continue to recommend TRS to the new event committee. We're proud to be associated with such a quality product and organization.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: The best event management software I have seen.

title: It has been amazing.
name: Jerrell P.
pros: Pros: The functionality is very easy. It is very user friendly. I am able to access the site from anywhere.
cons: Cons: Would be amazing if it were more interactive or could be dressed up a little more (add video content, etc.).

title: Exactly what we need!
name: Gary C.
comments: Comments: As a volunteer driven organization we need to be sure we are able to register, track and communicate well with our volunteers. Having TRS makes us more organized and efficient and professional. We are still learning the ins and outs of TRS but with the constant support of Tammy and her knowledge of how to make it work for our organization I always feel good that there is no issue we cannot resolve (and there have been very few issues).

title: TRS - Great Product, Great Service
name: Valerie G.
comments: Comments: The 500 Festival has utilized TRS since 2008 and have continuously been impressed with the customer service and the product. It is easy to use from an outsiders perspective and is very user-friendly on the back-end.

title: Love working with TRS
name: Franziska S.
pros: Pros: easy handling, you can almost teach yourself everything, but if not the customer service is very good and fast
cons: Cons: Late integration with Verified Volunteers; it was not as easy as it sounded, always make sure to start the background check integration as soon as you go live with TRS
overall:
Overall: This is my first time using The Registration System to recruit volunteers for a big event. From the beginning, the customer support was amazing, whenever I needed help with something I got immediate response. The handling of the system is very easy and you can almost teach yourself all the different areas of the website. It is just a great tool to use for volunteer recruitment, especially with all their new features they are adding almost on a weekly basis.

Thank you for making the volunteer recruitment so much easier. I love working with TRS
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Always start the background check integration as soon as you go live with your site!

title: It's been great working with TRS. They're always accessible and have made things easy for us!
name: Davon R.
pros: Pros: The amount of work it takes off of our hands. We use it for volunteer registration and the fact that everything is online makes it a smooth operation for our office as well as our volunteers.
cons: Cons: There are a few rare occasions when a volunteer can slip through the cracks without completing all of the required information.

title: Customization
name: Emma M.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use
cons: Cons: Not as customizable as I would like.
overall: Overall: The system is fairly easy to use on both the back and front ends. The best improvement would be to add more customizable features. Over my experience with FFA, I have expressed my ideas with various TRS employees. Colors of website and button verbiage would be at the top of the list.

title: Run with TRS
name: Gee L.
pros: Pros: TRS gives the user/administrator total access and thereby control over his/her event. You are able to build out your event exactly the way you envision it - you decide what data/information is important to your event.
cons: Cons: I wish there was a "spell check" tool so I wouldn't have to "cut/paste" from a word document.
overall: Overall: I have not found anything as good as TRS on the market.

title: CDLC Fundraiser
name: Kimberly H.
pros: Pros: We could track all of the invitees to the fundraiser; we could easily send out event reminder e-mails to everyone at one time; we were able to pull up reports effortlessly; and TRS gave our fundraiser a polished look.
cons: Cons: Some people coming to the fundraiser didn't want to have to register/give email addresses. (Most fundraisers don't require this).
overall: Overall: I would highly recommend TRS. It is a quality product. We used it in an unconventional manner which created hiccups. I was so grateful for the easily generated reports which helped make grant compliance easier and having all the donor data in one place in preparation for our next solicitation.

title: Wonderful registration system
name: Kelci D.
pros: Pros: The Registration System is a fantastic tool to manage volunteers. It's extremely easy to learn how to use the system and it's very easy for your patrons as well. It's also great for repeat events since you can duplicate the site from year to year. It saves a lot of time and decreases error. The site provides many easy ways to pull reports and view patrons that have registered and selected shifts.
cons: Cons: Occasionally I would like to contact registrants with certain stipulations, however, the site does not allow you to make certain distinctions when contacting groups of people.
overall: Overall: TRS is a perfect tool for volunteer management. The creation and management of the site makes overseeing volunteers a breeze. The staff is readily available to assist with any obstacles and patrons find the site easy to navigate and understand.

title: Easy, Flexible, and Concise
name: Savannah L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I enjoy the streamlined functionality of website creation without having to know and implement actual website coding
cons: Cons: As certain classes and sessions needed to be changed, due to external factors, some individuals who were registered for those classes were then kicked out without updating their final schedule. We had several attendees who were following their confirmation email but the printed final schedule at the registration desk may have only included one of their actual classes and not the new or updated schedule. To combat this, I'd say that there would need to be minimal to no changes to the site or schedule after making the website go live.

title: Great product, fantastic customer service!
name: Liam G.
comments: Comments: I have had the opportunity to work with TRS closely over the past year. The biggest hurdle that I have found with the system, is that it is not user-intuitive and is difficult to navigate. That being said, the customer service that TRS provides is outstanding. My customer service representative is able to teach me how to use the system in a clear and concise manner. She answers every questions I have and is able to help me through any issue I have while using the website. I would have an email response with 24 hours, and am able to call with any questions I may have to get a more thorough response. Despite the difficulty of learning how to navigate the website, I would recommend TRS to anyone, especially those with a large volunteer base. Once you learn how to navigate the site, it is easy to customize the site to your specific needs. I can't imagine using a different product, as TRS has proved itself to be a huge asset to my organization.

title: GCSC Review of TRS
name: Becky G.
comments: Comments: As an organization, we have been using TRS for several years, even thought I recently jumped onboard to use about 1.5 years ago. I love that it is so user friendly and they are constantly making improvements to the site. Flory and her team are fantastic and always there if we have questions or need something explained a bit further. We use the program for multiple events each year, and it is very nice that you can duplicate a site from year to year with much of the same data still included. This saves time on the set-up of a brand new site and allows our team to focus on other areas. I would highly recommend TRS to other organizations looking for a new, user friendly, and engaging site for volunteer management.

title: I have just started using TRS and the staff has been great with assisting me.
name: Erika M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I like all that you can do with the software. You can really customize it to make it your own. this makes it very easy to customize to each of our events.
cons: Cons: Since there is so much customization some parts can be a little confusing, but it is easy to go through and figure out or ask for assistance.

title: Very easy to use, especially easy to follow when building the site. Very customizable.
name: Morgan G.
comments: Comments: I have been using TRS for three years now and 2015 was the first year for myTRS. myTRS has been a significant improvement on an already great software. The site is easy to navigate with a logical flow of tabs and headers. We have struggled in the past with the reporting not being as customizable as our event requires, but any reporting issues were solved with the new software. Our event is very complex and spans several days with several events built in. myTRS is able to accommodate our specific data needs without hassle. Any small glitches that came up as a result of either user or technological error were met with great customer service and clear answers to our questions for quick problem solving.

title: TRS to the rescue
name: Tyler S.
pros: Pros: The ability to track hundreds and thousands volunteers times, roles, responsibilities is game changing. It has helped us on many events track the volunteers we have and use.
cons: Cons: At times it can be clunky and thought to get around but I've yet to find a better option

title: TRS - The Registration System
name: Wendy H.
comments: Comments: TRS is priceless. It is like an extra staff member. It compiles all of the information and keeps it all in one place for when I need it. It does so much more than just volunteers. My entire festival from food vendors to art vendors all register with this system. I can communicate to the each group individually with the click of a button and even attach a file. I can change/add and delete things as needed without having to involve someone from the company, but if I run into a challenge they are always there to help! A++++ product. It is priceless for this event staff of almight ONE!

title: For the most part it is a very easy platform to use.
name: Josh S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use of it. Setting up in the back end is pretty straight forward with a lot of great features.
cons: Cons: Running reports. It was kind of confusing to pull exactly what I wanted from the user reports. Kind of clunky.
overall: Overall: Being able to gauge our volunteer interest.

title: Lacking ease for user but cost effective and has the basics
name: Bridget K.
pros:
Pros: Low cost

Easy to process or look up files
cons:
Cons: Can't link to our website URL or imbed registration

Confusing steps for registrants

Have to contact TRS for making new pages

Group registrations is confusing

Very simple - limited functionality
overall: Overall: Users have a lot of difficulty with the user friendly experience, particularly as the link to register takes them off our website and does not link back to the website. A few other glitches and questions with following the steps and popups. However, it's fairly easy to configure and TRS does reply to our emails. The low cost is the major reason we're using this service.

title: Great for Registering Young Volunteers!
name: Carla P.
comments: Comments: Our free art festival uses about 525 volunteers, many of them under 18. TRS was chosen 3 years ago because we could set it up to require a parent or guardian signature for those under 18. The support is great and we volunteered to be one of the first organizations to try out their redesigned streamlined system, new this year. We also checked out quite a few other similar packages this past spring, and decided to stay with TRS because it was still the most comprehensive volunteer management suite.

title: Helps events run super smoothly!
name: Chelsea M.
pros: Pros: It's so nice to be able to copy pages and events without much hassle. The best events I've worked on have used this.
cons: Cons: Sometimes it can be a little confusing especially for newbies. But customer support has never been an issue and now I'm a pro.

title: Integration with myTRS Platform
name: Sanjiv T.
comments: Comments: Xceede Solutions works with myTRS on various integration projects with Salesforce CRM. The team is always very responsive and technically astute. They have developed a robust platform and have made it easy to integrate in a very secure manner.

title: TRS
name: Tina M.
comments:
Comments: I like having access to the data, reports, etc in TRS but find it sometimes to be a bit cumbersome in setting it up. It takes a great deal of time to load everything in and test it before going "live." It's not a program that I can pass along to a staff member without either training them myself or having them go through training.

I like the staff and appreciate their responsive nature to any question I have.

title: Great Volunteer Registration System
name: Christine P.
comments: Comments: Great and simple to use volunteer registration program. It works well with organizations that have multiple locations/sites with many volunteers coming for many reasons, dates, events. It also has a sync with Salesforce that lessens the burden of data entry or potential duplicates.

title: Great registration software for non-profit foundation
name: Andrea Y.
pros: Pros: TRS allows us to set up easy online registration for our 3 events as well as high school reunions and our annual campaign. TRS can allow different levels of access for different users.
cons: Cons: I would like to see the ability to edit the account after initial financial process.
overall: Overall: Highly recommend TRS. Customer Service and project is great!

title: Great software for any event!
name: Ashley J.
comments: Comments: We've been using TRS for many years now, both the old system and new system, and it is very user friendly. The staff at TRS are very helpful and answer any questions you have very quickly. We will definitely keep using TRS for all of our event needs!

title: Quality Experience with TRS....Highly Recommended!
name: Matthew B.
comments: Comments: Flory and the team at TRS- The Registration System, made registration for my CPR Training event easy. I didn't have to worry about any issues with accepting online payments or obtaining contact information for my course participants. I was able to fully focus on planning and providing a quality training experience teaching people to save lives!

title: Amazing system
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The thing I liked the most was the amount of information that I had access to. This made my event run extremely smooth.
cons: Cons: There was nothing that I disliked while using MyTRS.
overall: Overall: This system helped me recruit, organize, and manage my event and all of its volunteers. It provided USA Diving a stress-free way to manage 100+ volunteers over the course of our 7-day event.

title: TRS
name: Ranae B.
comments: Comments: We've been using TRS for 7 years and have been very happy with the service we have received. From the support team to the business office, everyone has treated my organization very well. We are excited to see how the platform will work and we are looking forward to the new features it has.

title: TRS system is convenient and easy to use!
name: Giang T.
comments: Comments: I used the TRS system for my CPR project back in April 2014. I was very satisfied with its convenience and practicality. It was easy for me to edit the content or make changes, also for customer to pay online with great security. I recommend the TRS system to everybody without reservation!

title: trueU trueUnite
name: Erica T.
comments: Comments: Great onboarding. Ease of use for our requirements. Overall met our needs for our event. We would utilize in the future for another large scale convention.

title: Great and easy to use
name: Alex K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It is easy to navigate and it's really simple to create a new page. I like the flexibility that the website provides.

title: Love! But could use some updates that take our business model into consideration.
name: Tamara K.
position: Special Events, Open Kitchen Cooking Classes
pros: Pros: The price is one of the best on the market. It is visually appealing (helps with marketing). Ease of uploading new events.
cons: Cons: We use universe to sell tickets to cooking classes over the spring & summer months. Therefore, we are hosting between 4 to 6 unique events per week. Back end navigation is getting better, but when dealing with a large amount of events, can still be cumbersome and time consuming.

title: Great DIY event ticketing solution with ability and resources to improve.
name: Stefan M.
pros: Pros: The ability to not only sell tickets and check on sales daily but track who they are and where they are coming from. Their integrations are top notch and easy to manage if you don't have much of a tech background.
cons: Cons: The inability to transfer attendees after they've bought tickets. A common customer service issue for us is that a time slot ends up not working out and they would like to switch to an earlier or later session. The only way to do this is to refund the customer completely and have them buy the new tickets.
overall: Overall: The greatest benefit for us is the DIY solution for Ticketmaster venues. Universe's partnership with TM allows us to easily manage all facets of ticketing for our event from inventory to refunds to creative. Their dashboard allows us to track pacing to goals, their integrations allow us to measure marketing efforts, and their team is very responsive and collaborative.

title: We love this software and would t be able to do what we do as effectively without it.
name: Amy F.
pros: Pros: Ease of use and the ability to collaborate as a team. This software is well thought out and the company seems committed to evolving the software as technology changes.
cons: Cons: The sort features on the dashboard could use some improvements but it still works well. The messaging feature would be better if it sent a message to the admin email so it doesn't need to be checked and complete customization of content and timing of reminders would be nice.
overall: Overall: The greatest benefit for us is the DIY solution for Ticketmaster venues. Universe's partnership with TM allows us to easily manage all facets of ticketing for our event from inventory to refunds to creative. Their dashboard allows us to track pacing to goals, their integrations allow us to measure marketing efforts, and their team is very responsive and collaborative.

title: Great ticketing system, easy day-of-event checkin
name: Marco C.
pros: Pros: It's easy to set up, easy to use, and the ability to embed the ticket-buying capability right onto your own website is great. Also the fact that it supports Stripe as a payment method is a big plus.
cons: Cons: I wish the in-app reporting capabilities were a little more granular.
overall: Overall: For the last 2 years I have run ticketing a very large food and wine tasting event which raises over $100k to benefit a local public school. Universe saved us a great deal of time and thousands of dollars, in part due to its lower fees than the competition and in part because we were able to use Stripe (which offers lower processing fees for nonprofits). Universe's customer success group was excellent and always answered my questions promptly.

title: Not as good as the rest
name: James N.
pros: Pros: It looks slick and is easy to embed..connects with Stripe easily, support usually answers within 24 hours (US based only)
cons:
Cons: The entire platform looks easy, but once you get stuck in you really realise unintuitive the entire platform is.

Today the entire website was down, all our ticket forms across our websites disappeared.

Adding attendees manually for offline invoicing sends them "free" receipts .. We could go on all day.. We have used almost all of the top ticketing platforms and this cannot recommend
overall: Overall: If we could migrate all ticket buyers from this platform without disruption we would. So really cannot say there are benefits compared to others.

title: Major Glitches
name: Brandi R.
comments: Comments: I tried universe months ago and was impressed. It was easy to use. Easier and more intuitive than Eventbrite. Unfortunately, I decided to go back in and post some more events and I spent 2 hours retyping my profile information in, because everytime it saved and I went to another page it disappeared. I also had to remove an old event that sold one ticket worth $0. I tried "deleting event' but that wasn't an option, I tried unlisting it. I tried giving a "refund" of $0 to the one registrant and no luck. I finally had to just ask them to close the entire account. Eventbrite is a lot easier to use than universe. Universe is "simple" without the tech issues, but there are some serious usability issues if you ask me. Not sure if the previous posts are 100% accurate. All 5's in all areas doesn't seem authentic. I'll see if customer service contacts me back about my profile issue. I'd hate to start all over again with eventbrite. Major time waster! I'm urked!
pros: Pros: It looks slick and is easy to embed..connects with Stripe easily, support usually answers within 24 hours (US based only)
cons:
Cons: The entire platform looks easy, but once you get stuck in you really realise unintuitive the entire platform is.

Today the entire website was down, all our ticket forms across our websites disappeared.

Adding attendees manually for offline invoicing sends them "free" receipts .. We could go on all day.. We have used almost all of the top ticketing platforms and this cannot recommend
overall: Overall: If we could migrate all ticket buyers from this platform without disruption we would. So really cannot say there are benefits compared to others.

title: Universe has been fairly seamless to integrate into our ticketing operations.
name: James W.
comments: Comments: I tried universe months ago and was impressed. It was easy to use. Easier and more intuitive than Eventbrite. Unfortunately, I decided to go back in and post some more events and I spent 2 hours retyping my profile information in, because everytime it saved and I went to another page it disappeared. I also had to remove an old event that sold one ticket worth $0. I tried "deleting event' but that wasn't an option, I tried unlisting it. I tried giving a "refund" of $0 to the one registrant and no luck. I finally had to just ask them to close the entire account. Eventbrite is a lot easier to use than universe. Universe is "simple" without the tech issues, but there are some serious usability issues if you ask me. Not sure if the previous posts are 100% accurate. All 5's in all areas doesn't seem authentic. I'll see if customer service contacts me back about my profile issue. I'd hate to start all over again with eventbrite. Major time waster! I'm urked!
pros: Pros: The ease of setting up an event within the system, and ability to quickly train contract and volunteer staff. The ability to collect data from our attendees is integral.
cons: Cons: A walkup credit sale can be slightly difficult to process. It would be nice to digitally request scanning devices at the time the event is created within Universe.
overall: Overall: The ability to be our own box office

title: Customer service is great- super love the relational aspect.
name: Joanna W.
comments: Comments: I tried universe months ago and was impressed. It was easy to use. Easier and more intuitive than Eventbrite. Unfortunately, I decided to go back in and post some more events and I spent 2 hours retyping my profile information in, because everytime it saved and I went to another page it disappeared. I also had to remove an old event that sold one ticket worth $0. I tried "deleting event' but that wasn't an option, I tried unlisting it. I tried giving a "refund" of $0 to the one registrant and no luck. I finally had to just ask them to close the entire account. Eventbrite is a lot easier to use than universe. Universe is "simple" without the tech issues, but there are some serious usability issues if you ask me. Not sure if the previous posts are 100% accurate. All 5's in all areas doesn't seem authentic. I'll see if customer service contacts me back about my profile issue. I'd hate to start all over again with eventbrite. Major time waster! I'm urked!
pros: Pros: I like how easy it is to embed on the website. I also love how easy it is to get in touch with people.
cons: Cons: I think sometimes the ticketing UI, creating new tickets and such seems super confusing to navigate. Creating new tickets and locks, all of it is in places that doesn't come naturally to figure out.
overall: Overall: Great customer service.

title: I love the customer service and the look of everything. There are still glitches.
name: Kellyn R.
comments: Comments: I tried universe months ago and was impressed. It was easy to use. Easier and more intuitive than Eventbrite. Unfortunately, I decided to go back in and post some more events and I spent 2 hours retyping my profile information in, because everytime it saved and I went to another page it disappeared. I also had to remove an old event that sold one ticket worth $0. I tried "deleting event' but that wasn't an option, I tried unlisting it. I tried giving a "refund" of $0 to the one registrant and no luck. I finally had to just ask them to close the entire account. Eventbrite is a lot easier to use than universe. Universe is "simple" without the tech issues, but there are some serious usability issues if you ask me. Not sure if the previous posts are 100% accurate. All 5's in all areas doesn't seem authentic. I'll see if customer service contacts me back about my profile issue. I'd hate to start all over again with eventbrite. Major time waster! I'm urked!
pros: Pros: Love the look and feel. Love that it integrates well within our sites and that our customers don't have to leave our site to buy a ticket. The customer service is fantastic. I love knowing that I have someone that I can call if I need someone immediately (and it has happened).
cons: Cons: I don't like that we have to be logged in to purchase tickets. Many people forget their log in. I wish upgrading options were easier. I wish there were partial refunds capabilities.
overall: Overall: It's easy to use, and looks great.

title: Universe has been a great resource to add events and link to our website.
name: Verified Reviewer
comments: Comments: I tried universe months ago and was impressed. It was easy to use. Easier and more intuitive than Eventbrite. Unfortunately, I decided to go back in and post some more events and I spent 2 hours retyping my profile information in, because everytime it saved and I went to another page it disappeared. I also had to remove an old event that sold one ticket worth $0. I tried "deleting event' but that wasn't an option, I tried unlisting it. I tried giving a "refund" of $0 to the one registrant and no luck. I finally had to just ask them to close the entire account. Eventbrite is a lot easier to use than universe. Universe is "simple" without the tech issues, but there are some serious usability issues if you ask me. Not sure if the previous posts are 100% accurate. All 5's in all areas doesn't seem authentic. I'll see if customer service contacts me back about my profile issue. I'd hate to start all over again with eventbrite. Major time waster! I'm urked!
pros: Pros: I like the simplicity of it for adding in events and event information. I've used it for big and small events and enjoy the interface of it. The dashboard is super clean and easy to maneuver as well.
cons: Cons: The customization of the tickets can get confusing. I wish there was a little more flexibility and custom options for when you need multiple different tickets and ways for people to RSVP to your event.
overall: Overall: It's a great software and super easy to use. The interface is clean, simple and easy. The ability to connect the event to your website and link it up so your clients can easily head to the event page and purchase tickets benefits everyone involved.

title: Great Service - Best I have tried yet
name: Elliot W.
comments: Comments: Pros: I have used a lot of various ticket software over the years. Being an event organizer for some time, I have found a lot of options on the market, however what stuck out about Uniiverse is their social approach to ticketing. They have great integration with our website, and the social-features for promoting my event were amazing. I feel as though its a modern take on ticketing, one which really works well with how people discover and book events.
pros: Pros: I like the simplicity of it for adding in events and event information. I've used it for big and small events and enjoy the interface of it. The dashboard is super clean and easy to maneuver as well.
cons: Cons: The customization of the tickets can get confusing. I wish there was a little more flexibility and custom options for when you need multiple different tickets and ways for people to RSVP to your event.
overall: Overall: It's a great software and super easy to use. The interface is clean, simple and easy. The ability to connect the event to your website and link it up so your clients can easily head to the event page and purchase tickets benefits everyone involved.

title: Amazing Product! Check ins are flawless, easy to use app, and staff is next to none
name: Brian S.
comments: Comments: Pros: I have used a lot of various ticket software over the years. Being an event organizer for some time, I have found a lot of options on the market, however what stuck out about Uniiverse is their social approach to ticketing. They have great integration with our website, and the social-features for promoting my event were amazing. I feel as though its a modern take on ticketing, one which really works well with how people discover and book events.
pros: Pros: Easy to use App that shows check ins / remaining tickets out. Staff is constantly reaching out to improve the product and giving suggestions to assist with my events. My business is valued to them and they show it. Will never use another ticketing service
cons: Cons: Make sure you click remember to save when making changes to your event. It does not automatically save, so that make sure to remember to do that
overall: Overall: It's a great software and super easy to use. The interface is clean, simple and easy. The ability to connect the event to your website and link it up so your clients can easily head to the event page and purchase tickets benefits everyone involved.

title: Using Universe has been an incredible experience from top to bottom.
name: Jay H.
comments: Comments: Pros: I have used a lot of various ticket software over the years. Being an event organizer for some time, I have found a lot of options on the market, however what stuck out about Uniiverse is their social approach to ticketing. They have great integration with our website, and the social-features for promoting my event were amazing. I feel as though its a modern take on ticketing, one which really works well with how people discover and book events.
pros: Pros: The software is extremely customizable, with a wide array of features of all kinds to best suit are companies needs. Additionally, the customer support team is invaluably helpful in utilizing the system to its maximum potential
cons: Cons: Sometimes we struggle with user error of the scan functions, which the customer success team has been incredibly supportive in by sharing best practices for on-site processing. When occasional glitches arise, the development team is extremely responsive in correcting any issues.
overall: Overall: It's a great software and super easy to use. The interface is clean, simple and easy. The ability to connect the event to your website and link it up so your clients can easily head to the event page and purchase tickets benefits everyone involved.

title: The Best - Seriously!
name: Victoria F.
comments: Comments: I've used pretty much every event/ticketing site out there to organize events, and I'm so happy that I found Uniiverse. Their site is easy to use and browse and setting up events is simple - plus, they took a smaller cut of my ticket sales than any other site including EB ever did.
pros: Pros: The software is extremely customizable, with a wide array of features of all kinds to best suit are companies needs. Additionally, the customer support team is invaluably helpful in utilizing the system to its maximum potential
cons: Cons: Sometimes we struggle with user error of the scan functions, which the customer success team has been incredibly supportive in by sharing best practices for on-site processing. When occasional glitches arise, the development team is extremely responsive in correcting any issues.
overall: Overall: It's a great software and super easy to use. The interface is clean, simple and easy. The ability to connect the event to your website and link it up so your clients can easily head to the event page and purchase tickets benefits everyone involved.

title: Great site, Excellent service
name: Michael M.
comments: Comments: We are using Universe for the first time to handle all the ticketing for our film festival. I wish I had known abut this service years ago. Their site makes it easy to create and track events. Their customer service is excellent. Syracuse International Film Festival highly recommends this site.

title: Above and Beyond
name: Brittney E.
comments: Comments: I have not used Universe before but I am glad I decided to use them for our upcoming event. Patrick is my rep and he went above and beyond to make sure that I was able to get the full benefit of the site. I wasn't able to figure out how to post my event link on my Facebook page and he went ahead and did it for me. So far I am very pleased with my decision to use Universe. I will post another review once our event has passed.

title: I have used Universe for 6 events. Love you!!!
name: May W.
comments: Comments: Easy to set up. I like that I can make changes when needed. It is easy to check the progress of an event. I never have to worry about the money part of an event, because you take care of that. Very user friendly!

title: Attic Review
name: James H.
pros: Pros: It covers most of the things that I need and is fairly user friendly
cons:
Cons: I would like to offer a season pass.

I would like to send reminder emails about their upcoming shows

It is very slow generating reports

I wish it would remember ticket prices & seating charts for my venue

I wish it didn't charge me for comp tickets

I wish I could pick show dates from a calendar

I don't use the box office for check in.... take too long and I don't want to get charged for at the door sales
overall: Overall: Overall - its better than what I had before.... but, some of the above mentioned changes would be better for the "SMALL THEATER" guy like me.

title: Good booking system

overall: Overall: Very good & cost effective service.

title: Yapsody works very well.

overall: Overall: Very good & cost effective service.

title: Best Ticketing System for Non Profit
name: Casey H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I have been using Yapsody for tickets for a non profit event and it is easy for the end user and the patron. Fees are very cheap (not sure if that is because we are a non-profit) and integrates easily with WePay. Add access codes, different ticket types and more.
cons: Cons: It can be a bit cumbersome to navigate if you haven't used it before. It really is designed for multiple ticketed shows/concerts . I wish there were more reporting functions. I also wished the landing page for the event could be customized more.
overall: Overall: Very good & cost effective service.

title: Great choice for our community theatre group!

cons: Cons: It would be nice to be able to call someone with tech support issues. They do have 24/7 chat help available and they do a fantastic job.

title: The Scary Decision to move to online ticket sales.
name: Jeffrey S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use, seamless switch over from Wintix 5 to Wintix 6 with Webtix, fantastic staff to solve issues, custom programming if necessary. Hands free sales.
cons: Cons: There are a few bugs here and there that are being addressed by the great staff.
overall: Overall: Our company made the scary choice to move into Wintix 6/Webtix some time ago. Within no time at all we knew we made the best choice and the web orders came flowing into Wintix 6 with virtually no effort from our staff. Within less than a month, we booked over $26K in effortless sales. It works beautifully! We're thrilled (although we know we came to this a little late)! We also opted for some custom programming to accommodate student registrations for CampTMP and a personalized seating chart. The staff at Centerstage are wonderful and do everything they can to solve issues or problems. Another wonderful feature is to extract season ticket holders and then send customized renewal notices using mail merges.

title: Helps small fish theatre navigate the big internet ocean!
name: Natalie S.
comments: Comments: We started using Wintix/Webtix in the fall of 2013 for our 2014 season. It has jumped us into the 21st century by allowing us to offer online ticket sales! Wintix has enabled us to streamline the way we store all of our box office information and has eliminated the need for other software programs that we had been using to track our sales (Quicken, primarily), keep customer records and print tickets. We have been able to customize the program to our unique situation of selling flex season passes where passholders then reserve seats for each performance individually. We have a small house of 166 seats, but this software has made our job so much easier and less time consuming in handling tickets, payments, reservations, etc. The tech support is wonderful and has been so beneficial to a box office manager that is just tech savvy enough to by... yet has been able to make the switch without any trouble! OK, well I've made a couple of panicked phone calls, ha, ha. Ultimately, the online sales capability is taking a lot of pressure off of our box office and our patrons are making the switch to find it very convenient. We still provide limited box office hours to serve the less adventurous.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, seamless switch over from Wintix 5 to Wintix 6 with Webtix, fantastic staff to solve issues, custom programming if necessary. Hands free sales.
cons: Cons: There are a few bugs here and there that are being addressed by the great staff.

title: Happy with Wintix for more than ten years!
name: Jeffrey S.
comments: Comments: Tacoma Musical Playhouse (Tacoma, WA) has been using Wintix for more than 10 years with complete satisfaction. We have 2500 season subscribers and 2000-2500 single ticket buyers per show. We also use it for year-long educational programs, specialty shows, fundraising events and theater tours, concessions, etc. It is highly flexible. We use it to track 100% of all cash receipts. You simply set up a show to be any category of receipts such as tuition, show deposit refunds, liquor concessions. For non-show events we use the option to not use a seating chart. It's also great for Flex Pass season subscriptions where patrons don't use a series such as 3rd Friday of each show. The team at Center Stage Software are always attentive to special requests such as report modifications etc. They provide frequent updates with new features. I highly recommend it. Happy to answer questions for anyone considering a purchase.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, seamless switch over from Wintix 5 to Wintix 6 with Webtix, fantastic staff to solve issues, custom programming if necessary. Hands free sales.

title: You will love this software for your business!
name: Rochelle J.
comments: Comments: The Expo Center of Taylor County in Abilene, Texas has been a client of Center Stage Software for 10 years. In this time we have made many requests for specific options in the software. Bruce, Diane, Peggy and Twila always listen to the needs of our facility and what we think our customers are requesting. Center Stage Software has customized reports, helped us with fan club sales and patiently helped us through our busy, crazy moments of selling tickets. Their professionalism, understanding of the market place and building/customer relationships is outstanding. The flexibility of web ticketing to printing hard tickets for volunteers to sell and the price for this service is beyond compare. I recommend Center Stage Software highly.

title: Wintix offers a unique, unmatched, business model I know of
name: Denis N.
comments: Comments: We have been using their system for more than 15 years...maybe more! We started during the days when we had an internal Wintix/TixSales system installed in our servers and when we transitioned over to online/cloud based system, we saw a significant increase in our tickets sales. The system is a fixed asset to our company because we know exactly how much we pay for the entire year. No "per transaction" charge!!! Hooray!!! The ability to be able to communicate with Bruce-the best software engineer ever!! is a plus because everything is handled in a timely and efficient manner! We are a 349-seat non-profit theatre company and have not found any similar business models or service elsewhere!

Within no time at all we knew we made the best choice and the web orders came flowing into Wintix 6 with virtually no effort from our staff. Within less than a month, we booked over $26K in effortless sales. It works beautifully! We're thrilled (although we know we came to this a little late)! We also opted for some custom programming to accommodate student registrations for CampTMP and a personalized seating chart. The staff at Centerstage are wonderful and do everything they can to solve issues or problems. Another wonderful feature is to extract season ticket holders and then send customized renewal notices using mail merges.

pros: Pros: The platform is solid and the service provides exactly the tools we need for our organization. We produce multiple events with up to 20,000+ attendees per year. The primary sales functionality, customer tracking, box office capabilities, CSRs, and responsive attention to the client, customer, and end user needs are all SPOT ON. More importantly, they help us LOOK GOOD to the external public.
cons: Cons: I only wish we could deliver a ticket to a user via a 10-digit phone number (in the US ---using country codes would be a factor otherwise).
overall: Overall: We have been clients since their early days (perhaps even during development and/or beta). We value the RELATIONSHIP with their team and the stellar way they make us a priority. THANK YOU, FT TEAM!!!!
