The ThunderTix system proved to be exactly what we needed. Stacy once again held my hand through the set-up process, even though it wasn't really her job anymore. Pam Mason has also been extremely helpful, and our audience feedback reveals their experience just gets more and more enjoyable. What prompts me to write this is the almost uncanny ability ThunderTix has in predicting what I'm going to need next. The old seat blocking function allowed me to block our season subscribers' favorite seats so we could go online to the general public for ticket sales earlier than usual, which was great! But I faced the laborious old unblocking system which I knew would be time consuming. Lo and behold on September 1st, I can unblock seats with just a click!!! So happy! How did ThunderTix know? Just another example of listening to their clients and being proactively thinking ahead! I will always highly recommend ThunderTix to anyone looking for a straightforward, user-friendly, customer friendly, intuitive ticketing system, and I truly appreciate all the time and effort Stacy, Pam, and all the staff and programmers obviously put into their jobs. Well done, and THANK YOU!

title: Approachable company that listens to its clients, and has implemented great new features.
name: Glynnis D B.
pros: Pros: AFFORDABLE!!!!! Easy to implement, easy to train, easy to use, easy to maintain, easy to understand subscription models. Flexible as to gateway providers. We are a small not-for-profit community theatre group, entirely volunteer run. Our margins are very tight. We are grateful for your ticketing software that allows us to spread our reach to the internet. We now often sell out shows BEFORE the open.
cons: Cons: There is often too much info on the FAQ & Community sites. I dont have the time to wade through it all looking for my quick question. Really LOVE your responsive support folks who will take the time to answer my questions, even if the answer is already out there.

title: Great product for our ticketing needs!
name: Wendy K.
pros: Pros: We really like that is is user friendly for the customer, our reps and our users. The support is beyond excellent anytime a question or concern pops up. We get prompt and helpful answers.
cons: Cons: The issue we run into sometimes is when there is an update, there can be an unforeseen effect on other areas of the software that will need a fix.
overall: Overall: Thundertix has provided us with the tools we need to make purchasing tickets to our events all over the country as user friendly as possible. The added benefits like automated email reminders, product sales, waitlists and email marketing options have all had a positive impact on our customers and our sales.

title: This our 6th year with THUNDERTIX, they have THE best ticketing software service around
name: Craig Y.
pros: Pros: The interface is very customer friendly, is graphical, and easy to set up. Customer Service is quick, personable and very helpful. THUNDERTIX doesn't stand on its laurels, and each year a new addition, refinement, and addition to make our lives easier. As a 501C3 Organization with one event that funds our entire year's budget, we simply cannot have a problem. THUNDERTIX COMES THROUGH FOR US, YEAR AFTER YEAR.
cons: Cons: Initial set up fee to integrate our theater venue into the software was a bit expensive, but amortized over a period of years, it's been a worthwhile investment.
overall: Overall: It's friendly user interface for both vendor and customer, makes buying tickets easy to administer, even for casual internet users. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

title: Awesome software, exceptional customer service, great price - The complete Package!
name: Brian B.
pros: Pros: Since joining our organization several years ago, my first priority was to implement an automated ticketing system. I tested several vendors. We wanted to control what our patrons paid (if anything) to purchase tickets. So many vendor's pass on these high costs to the patrons to pay for the service. But Thundertix allows us to set the costs we might choose to pass on to our patrons. Not to mention that the cost of implementation was very reasonable and almost painless. They worked with us to customize and integrate their site to maintain the same look and feel of ours. Most of our patrons have no idea they're even on a third party site when buying tickets. Now they're taking things to the next level and integrating even more tools into their system that people use every day (i.e. Facebook, Twitter, Yelp, YouTube and MySpace). They're always working to enhance their system. Their response to issues is like lightening. So the thunderbolt logo is very appropriate.
cons: Cons: I honestly cannot think of any cons. And that is something you don't hear every day.
overall: Overall: I along with the rest of our board would highly recommend Thundertix to any organization looking for a simple, easy to use ticketing site that allows you to take control and save your patrons money and save yourself time. They are always improving their site and introduce new features, many of which come at no addtional cost, for their customers. They are extremely responsive to any questions, concerns or any unlikely problems you might encounter. They really are the best.

title: ThunderTix is amazing
name: Shelby S.
pros: Pros: The reporting features are a must have for us, especially for the ticket-holder list the day-of an event. We also utilize the plugins like Constant Contact which helps reduce time spent entering emails of attendees on the back-end before sending out a mass email. The ease of editing an event is also appreciated.
cons: Cons: It takes quite awhile to populate/generate a report when you want to export sometimes.
overall: Overall: Southern Arizona Arts & Cultural Alliance switched to ThunderTix for all ticket sales several years ago and its improved our ability to manage all facets of ticking for our events. As a non-profit, the bottom-line is also always a consideration and we find that ThunderTix is the most affordable ticketing service that gives the most bang-for-your-buck on the market.

title: Support is primarily available through email or forums. It's difficult to speak to a person.
name: Kathy R.
pros: Pros: It integrates nicely with credit card payments and was easy to set up on that front. It was VERY easy to scan tickets with the app as well.
cons: Cons: It's not as intuitive. Finding out where to click to sell tickets, to design tickets, how to make them look the way we needed them to look...it actually required note-taking that I could refer to because things weren't in the obvious places to look. But once that was learned, it became easy to make the software do what we needed. I feel like part of it might actually be the web design as opposed to the software...for example, there are two rows of tabs. The top row is supposed to be related to your account, and the second row to your specific event. It doesn't SAY that anywhere, and I think there are exceptions, but we had to figure it out. (Notice that I'm still not sure about that, and I've been the one primarily working on the event.) I feel like someone on the phone would have figured that out right away and told us and saved us a couple of hours of clicking, but finding a phone number is next to impossible. Email is responsive, though, so it's not like they leave you completely in the dark. It's just not convenient.
overall: Overall: I'm not sure that we did. I do know that I'd want to try it again now that we understand it more and see if we can make it fit our needs in other areas. After that, I'll decide if I'd be willing to recommend it.

title: Small Company with a Great Product
name: Jon E.
pros: Pros: ThunderTix is a smaller ticketing company with a great product team! Being a smaller company, feature requests for new functionality are honored frequently and quickly. In addition to their standard support features, a Facebook group offers insights and a chance to chat with other users to see how they do things and what is working well in their organizations.
cons: Cons: There isn't anything that comes to mind as a true "Con" to the software. There are some features we don't want our customers using, and we have found it easy to hide those features by using CSS.

title: Thundertix is the way to go when using choosing a ticketing system!
name: Carrie L.
pros: Pros: I like how I can manage our shows so easily. Thundertix is continually adding new features that give us new capabilities in reporting, the way we view our shows and the way we manage our shows as a whole.
cons: Cons: There isn't anything I would change at this point.
overall: Overall: We have been using Thundertix for our ticketing system for years now and I could not be more pleased with their service, prices and willingness to help us in any area that is needed. I work in the Corporate Office in Gruene and we use Thundertix for our ticketing system for Gruene Hall. As you can imagine Thundertix plays a vital role in our day to day tickets sales and we rest assured knowing they are always making sure everything is up and running and that if there is a problem that they are working to fix it as quick as possible. I 100% recommend Thundertix to all businesses in this line of work. You will not be disappointed!

title: Works Wonderful!! We love using this site for our ticket sales! It is so easy to use and nice layout
name: Grant S.
pros: Pros: The ease of use is amazing. It makes it so anyone can us the site, even if you do not know computers! Seeing ticket sales and recording and keeping track of them is not a hassle with your site!
cons: Cons: The one thing I like least about the software is that it limits search results for sales to 365 days only.
overall: Overall: Ease of knowing my event is listed and available to everyone and so easy to use by us and our customers!

title: Universal and all-in-one-place
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: My girlfriend and I go out frequently as we are located in an urban city and so using ThunderTix makes dealing with the whole ticket-ordeal so much easier than it needs to be. Everything is centrally located making it fast and easy.
cons: Cons: Some of the features are a bit useless (TO US) and so it'd be nice to have a dynamic pricing plan; we don't use the gift card selling feature nor the event/reports feature.

title: Best value around!
name: Jim T.
pros: Pros: Thundertix is easy to use, with great support only a phone call away if you need it. The software is continually improved based on the needs of clients.
cons: Cons: Nothing to dislike! We have had zero complaints from our customers.
overall:
Overall: Thundertix has been very positive for our venue, our customers love the convenience and ease of use.

I recommend them constantly to others in our industry.

title: Great experience, very simple interface
name: Jeffrey H.
pros: Pros: Simple to use! Updates are based on user input, and happen frequently. Customer service is personal, and responsive. Cost is great!
cons: Cons: Very little not to like about Thundertix. Years ago there were several limitations, but as of now (April 2018) there is nothing we have on our wish list.
overall: Overall: Easy to manager dinner theater software!

title: Great product for large and small businesses
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Thundertix Is very customizable. My organization uses it for collecting payments for event tickets, intensives/workshops, and classes in our semesters. You can get the breakdown of each event easily and quickly which saves you times and shows you where to continue investing your time and products in. The interface is easy for clients to navigate and simple for staff members to learn how to utilize.
cons: Cons: Functionality wise there are minor bumps in the road, but the support team is great with taking feedback, finding you an immediate solution, and taking your criticism into consideration for future updates.
overall: Overall: Overall I've had a wonderful experience with Thundertix. If I were running my own business this would be the first program I'd have in mind to utilize. The support/service team is excellent and I hope to maintain a good relationship with them.

title: Overall, the ticket purchase process is user-friendly. Setting up an event was easy to figure out.
name: Leslie D.
pros: Pros: What we liked most about the software was to be able to modify some of the features such as the fee, comp codes, reserved seating and block seating. It is easy to set up as event and make corrections.
cons:
Cons: There are three things that we would suggest:

Ticket Sales Exchange - If the customer requests to change tickets to another day, and split the reservation to different sections, we had to do multiple transactions. If the exchange was on 3 sections of the auditorium, we have to work on 3 separate transaction. May be best to process an exchange at one time - click on exchange, choose multiple sections all at one time.
overall: Overall: Our costumers are happy to reserve their own seats.

title: Almost a biased fanboi.... But it's that good.
name: Jason R.
pros: Pros: Simple to use. Simple to integrate with. Simple to get support. Simple to get feature requests evaluated and even implemented.
cons:
Cons: I'm trying.

I need 100 characters here to justify posting it, but the only problems I've had, there were user forum suggestions to manage, or they addressed them and they are fixed, now.
overall: Overall: Ease of use. Budget friendly... and expandable.

title: I have been using ThunderTix for event for just under a year.
name: Roslyn I.
pros: Pros: The price point is great for the service we receive. I like that there is a flat fee and that it does not charge per ticket like most services because some of our tickets are on top of that this is a 25% increase! The scanning feature has been really helpful. Also, I have had all my questions answered quickly when I take the time to ask for help.
cons: Cons: I do not find it easy to use or intuitive. I struggle to navigate the interface every time I get on it. On the scanning tickets end it is easy to use but on the management end it is not easy. Perhaps it will become easier as I use it more. But so far, I am frustrated with it in that way. Also, I do not see easy ways for the system to track the demographics of my customers or features along demographical lines. I wish there was more of this type of feature.
overall: Overall: We use it to sell tickets for all our big major events. It helps us sell tickets and scan people as they arrive when we are expecting 4,000 people!

title: That was my first ticket software experience and it was fairly easy to manage. Great support.
name: Marjolene G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I chose it because of its great layout and number of settings offered for a great price. It is easy to use and generate data report. All patrons were able to use it without problems. Easy to implement it on our website. I received awesome support by chat, email and phone when I had a question and was not able to find the answer online.
cons: Cons: The scanning system of the tickets with phone or tablet did not work AT ALL for us. I had to enter all tickets manually, about 75 per night. Not a big deal because not a lot of tickets, but still anoying, because people printed their tickets, but finally I was just recycling them after checking their names in the guest list.
overall: Overall: Easy and affordable online ticket system (not a lot of choices in our small town). Happy patrons. Other companies requested the name of the product to use it. More independant than using a third party to sell my tickets.

title: ThunderTix is easy to use and provides many different options.
name: Chris E.
pros: Pros: The thing I like most about Thunder Tix is the easy ticket sales for our events that it offers. Back in the day we took phone orders and had to mail out printed tickets. With Thunder Tix the customer orders their own tickets AND is able to prin them right out. And they can even show the ticket on their phone and we just scan it that way. The ease of use to our ticket helpers is also a benefit. We can view a variety of reports and can search within our order by a variety of different options.
cons: Cons: There is not too much that I do not like about Thunder Tix. At this time I cannot think of any suggestions for upgrades.

title: ThunderTix is hands down the best online Ticketing software I have ever used!!!
name: Verified Reviewer
comments: Comments: I use ThunderTix as my online ticketing system for my annual events that do ~5,000+ in online transactions per event. I combine the online system with an Authorize.net gateway payment system. I have used 3 different online ticketing platforms in the past and NOTHING compares to the benefits of ThunderTix. You set it up and maintain it yourself, no waiting for your IT folks to do it for you (nor having to pay for their time), which also means you can change things on the fly as you need to, it integrates easily with Authorize.net (or other payment systems) and you get your money from sales in 1 day, and you just cannot beat their pricing!! And did I mention the excellent customer service? Not only is their online forum very helpful, but when I was in really dire need of real live help, I just emailed them and usually had an answer within a couple hours. All the way around, this software and this company are the BEST and I am so happy to have found them! Will be using this software from here on out!
pros: Pros: Price Ease of Use Set up and Maintenance under my control Excellent and fast customer service Paid fast for sales
cons: Cons: Reporting is a little on the light side and not custom

title: Thundertix
name: Dan H.
pros: Pros: We moved to Thundertix as a way to control our costs in June 2011. Since then, it has been an important key to our business. It streamlined the customer buying experience, it was easy to set up new agents so that we could, in effect, expand office hours, the reports are informative and easy to customize, and customer service has been excellent. The flat monthly rate model works very well for us.
cons: Cons: Need some additional fields in the exported reports so that I can get a better feel for who my customers are, where they come from, how many order online as opposed to over the phone, how much I collect in fees, that sort of thing.
overall: Overall: I highly recommend Thundertix. It's been bullet-proof and we've never received a customer report of downtime. Allowing us to manage costs is crucial for us. We've had experience with Tix, which was also a solid system, but Thundertix is more flexible and saves us money.

title: Thunder Tickets serves our needs extremely well and I would recommend their service.
name: Patrick B.
pros: Pros: Ease of use and fast customer service and support. What else could you ask for? Any issues are addressed very quickly.
cons: Cons: I really do not have any issues with Thunder Tickets. Any issues that arose under my tenure have been addressed quickly.

title: I am now conducting my second ticket campaign for a chorus with audiences of 300-700.
name: Ken V.
comments:
Comments: I am a low volume user and not a professional so my learning curve may be slower than usual. Here are a few impressions that I have.

PROS:

1. My contact, Pam Mason, is very prompt and helpful.

2. When things are in place there seems to be no calculation errors of any sort.

3. The reports have lots of valuable information and help us keep up with stats.

4. The "Forum" is very helpful.

5. The cost is very fair.

NEEDS:

1. A graphics section to build auditorium maps with.

2. A whole auditorium view to see seat availability without changing screens. This would quicken "at the door" sales because customers could choose their seats more easily.

3. More clarity on using email notifications. If there is a cost involved it should show before one has to click the button and decide.

4. A way to run fake credit card test transactions without involving the gateway. This would make it easier to train staff.

5. I have not been able to "void" tickets which I should be able to do within 24 hours according to your information.

6. When emailed tickets fail to "send" there is no error message.

7. PC computers seem to have glitches in printing. My MacBook allows me to just hit "Print Tickets" but my PC seems to have to go back to where I can make the tickets appear as a PDF.

8. The "See All Dates" button needs to appear on many pages such as when one is looking at "Orders", "Customers", etc.

title: Great experience with ThunderTix!
name: KELLY B.
pros: Pros: It was extremely reliable -- we needed a precise ticket sales start time, as well as a new wait list feature. The system worked brilliantly. It was very easy to navigate and manage all details, including the ticket format, the guest lists, and more. We look forward to working with ThunderTix on future events as well. Thank you!
cons: Cons: I can't think of anything I liked least...We are in a unique situation in that our tickets sell out within minutes. The only concern was that the event showed up as sold out before it actually was sold out, because ticket purchasers had the tickets in their carts and there has to be a 10 minute hold time before releasing the tickets if they are not purchased. This is understandable.
overall: Overall: Great system and terrific support team!

title: Not easy to navigate with a line waiting for you
name: Kimberly P.
pros: Pros: Easy to buy tickets and have them resent to you.
cons: Cons: It is difficult to navigate quickly when each walk-up transaction is different...some want to know there seats/print tickets, others want to buy, others are buying for a different show. You have to go back so many screens to start all over. I wish there was more drop-down menu functions to navigate in less clicks. I wish you could see a seating chart at any point in time via pop-up vs having to leave your transaction when customer asks a seating question.
overall: Overall: Easy to buy tickets but not easy to work the ticket counter for assigned seating shows.

title: The bonus of this system is the customer service that comes with it. Knowledgeable, accessible.
name: Cynthia D.
pros: Pros: 1. Easy for my customers to use. 2. Thundertix is always improving and upgrading the features to make it easier for me to use. They are organized to be very responsive to the customer's needs and feedback. 3. Cost effective.
cons: Cons: 1. I just wish I could do more detailed searches of the database. 2. I find the package feature hard to work with.

title: Happy customer from Hawaii
name: Rey R.
pros: Pros: The ease of using this program.
cons: Cons: There are a lot of features that I am not fully aware of so I might be missing out on thing that might help me grow my business.
overall: Overall: I have 2 events per year called the Stingrey Classic and Aloha Muscle. It is the largest bodybuilding, physique, figure and bikini contests in Hawaii which are both sanctioned by the NPC (National Physique Committee). Both events sell tickets online and ThunderTix helped tremendously by setting up my seating charts and allowing my customers to pick their seats and purchase with a credit card. I am not very tech savvy using computers and their system is user friendly for even a novice like me. The BEST thing about ThunderTix is their customer service! Again, I am not computer literate but whenever I need questions or concerns customer support are alway there to help. They understand their program like a CHAMP! I'm sure there is a lot of features and functionalities that I'm not aware of but, representative always give me suggestions to maximize and improve my business. I would definitely recommend ThunderTix!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: No

title: My experience is pretty positive. We use the product for theater event ticketing.
name: Gina W.
pros: Pros: I like the new streamlined version of creating an event. We have special events frequently and it's convenient and fast to get the event up and ready for purchase.
cons: Cons: If we need to edit or change something that has already been created it's problematic. It would be nice to have a way to tweak the details of an event even after it has been created.
overall: Overall: It allows us to offer on line purchasing of our events and classes in an accessible way. We can run reports and keep track of sales easily.

title: thundertix functionality and support was appropriate for our needs.
name: Trisha G.
pros: Pros: Fairly simple to use. Support was available and responsive. Love being able to sell specific seats.
cons: Cons: Even though our venue remained the same each year, our section prices changed and we had to pay full price to put those price changes into effect.

title: easy to implement on startup and add functionality as we needed it
name: John C.
pros: Pros: easy event setup; good basic reports to manage the event; gives all the pricing options and then the ability to migrate to reserved seats
cons: Cons: would like to see additional interfaces to other CRM software like SalesForce; could use more functionality in online reports rather than download the detail and then manipulate in a spreadsheet; while ThunderTix will generate a Eventful event, there is no ability to track any sales through Eventful on either side.

title: Fabulous. If we had a question or problem, they were always there to help in a very positive way.
name: Joanne B.
pros: Pros: It does most of what we need it to. It is quite straight forward. You are encouraged to suggest additions to the program that would make it even better. They are constantly working on the suggestions to add more options or improve the options that are there.
cons: Cons: It does have a few limitations if you have more than one venue. However, they are working on that weakness as well.
overall: Overall: ease of selling tickets

title: Life saver!
name: Verified Reviewer
comments: Comments: We were able to set up thundertix in one day and have our entire season up and running, with ticket sales connected to our payment platform instantly. We were taking orders within 24 hours of signing up with Thundertix. The online tutorials are clear and easy to follow. Their customer support is lightening fast in responding. I email them at any hour, even on the weekends, and they return my email extremely fast. There are many ticket platforms out there, and we researched many of them, and tested some of the more popular options. All in all, thundertix has been well worth the cost. We have had ZERO downtime in selling our tickets. Once they are live, the thundertix platform has performed flawlessly. Also, the scanning app they provide is top notch. very fast and snappy. and the hardware they offer is another feature that we have enjoyed: pre-tested hardware integration with clear tutorials and immediate customer support. Just another example of how we have found the costs of the software well worth the benefits to our business. Couldn't be happier with our decision.
pros: Pros: simple setup easy payment setup fast and helpful customer support
cons: Cons: costs more than some of the alternatives, but that's only relative to other alternatives that offer less. we have found the costs well worth it and have recouped all of the costs quickly given how stable the platform is and how easily it integrates into our sales channels.

title: ThunderTix Review
name: Natasha G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I like how the app is used easy to use in the sense of updating for both customers and business users, so there is a mutual communication on what we have to offer to them.
cons: Cons: But there is not a description box of the event when you press manage instead you have to go into all of the settings to find the description of any event. If there was a Bloxwich had all the information for customers to read before they purchased the tickets e.g. what would be included at an event? What time the event would start? What things to bring?
overall: Overall: My overall experience with undertakes has been amazing! It has helped me sell tickets quickly and also engage with customers in being able to help their enquiries and their problems as we go through the information they have provided together over the phone or in person.

title: From old platform to event in under a week - 8000 patrons - half a season reprogrammed, flawlessly
name: Jason R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: I never trust "new user" reviews because they can be biased by excited new buyer syndrome.

But.... This product impressed me.

Event setup is simple and intuitive. Reports are clear and easy to read. Database import was easy (they imported it for us but required only one edit from my original data). Integration with payment gateway and email service was trivial.

Web interface is modern and clean. Coupons, donations, products are all effortless to create.

Price is excellent.
cons: Cons: Some pages need refreshing after edits, a glitch I am willing to bet is fixed before you read this. Experienced very slight occasional server lag during event definitions, but could easily be internet . Not a problem when purchasing when used as box office terminal.
overall: Overall: Inexpensive event ticketing is no small benefit. Simple interface allows less trained volunteers to make use of it to help run events.

title: Easy Interface. Easy to Setup. Reliable & A+ Professional Customer Service.
name: Sergio G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: I enjoyed the overall experience. What was great about ThunderTix was a combination of two things, dependability and customer service. Whenever I had a question they answered it either by phone or email in a timely manner. They were also very thorough as to what you cannot and could do. With much creativity and flexibility there isn't really much you cannot do with their ticketing system.
pros: Pros: It's affordable with its different ticketing plans, and you are not stuck paying an outrageous percentage of your sales. *Customer Service *Dependable *Automated Pre-sale system *Automated Post-sale system *Works on smartphones and tablets with easy. *Promotional tools. *Easy simple buttoning system even low tech Church volunteers of an elderly age were able to operate. *SSL Encryption on their end. *Works with multiple merchant portals
cons: Cons: I am not really sure. They seem to even be concerned about quickly changing their system to benefit you from their open customer support page. You can see what the customers complained about, and even how they solved it. It was freaking incredibly risky, but also awesome to see how they fixed it. So if there are issues which I did not experience, they probably won't last too long.

title: Love working with Thundertix
name: Ina h.
pros: Pros: The software is really easy to set up and has gotten us to think about our event in other ways to include other features. The customer support is very helpful, timely, patient and friendly.
cons: Cons: Our event isn't a concert, but a dinner dance gala, so the inability to sell tables and get tickets for all the seats sold (i.e. a table of 10 meant that we had to generate 9 extra tickets) was frustrating.
overall: Overall: Thundertix has been great to work with. The software responds to our needs and the ability to customise it to suit our needs and configurations is so helpful.

title: This software has made life much simpler for me as Treasurer of a community theater.
name: David R.
pros: Pros: I really appreciate how flexible this software is. Since we are a black box theater space, our seating number can vary from show to show. It is simple to change the number of seats available. I also appreciate the ease of creating cast and crew comp ticket codes.
cons: Cons: Some of the reporting does not seem terribly intuitive to me, so I often end up running reports that I don't really need.

title: ThunderTix makes my job as a tour guide a lot easier, on the administration side of things.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I can quickly see my entire season at a glance and quickly check in my guests as they arrive. It has been a great step in moving towards a paperless ticketing system.
cons: Cons: Our only issue has been when we are trying to check guests in on two devices, we have to stop to refresh to sync the list.
overall: Overall: It makes ticketing easy and checking in guests on a device gives us a more professional appearance.

title: Customer service at it's finest.
name: Melissa A.
pros: Pros: ThunderTix has been a long time partner with us. They are extremely responsive to our requests and are always looking for ways to improve. They meet our needs and provide solutions to our ever evolving needs.
overall: Overall: I am not a day to day user of the software. I use it periodically to look at trends, sales, etc. From my perspective, I don't have any dislikes about the software.

title: "Over the Top" Wonderful System!
name: Joanna C.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
comments: Comments: From the very first contact with ThunderTix over the phone, I knew I had found the right ticketing system for our choir. Every question was answered confidently. Details of the system were explained in very understandable laymen terms. Limitations of the ticketing system were offered honestly with explanations of how to overcome them. After deciding on ThunderTix, I was walked through the steps of set-up quickly and easily. The choir's performance ticket system was launched within a few short days! I have not had one issue with any sales to date. I also really appreciate the fact that ThunderTix understands nonprofit organizations and includes an option for donations. Love it!
pros: Pros: Everything! Please see above for specific pros.
cons: Cons: Just a suggestion, but it would be nice to be able to allow a group of attendees to purchase their own seats from a blocked area (sponsors/donors/VIP's). As an administrator, It is a really easy process to unblock and send tickets, but that would be a nice option to have.

title: Simple and Flawless
name: Joe F.
pros: Pros: We switched to ThunderTix after becoming disappointed with a far more complicated, way less attractive & WAY more expensive ticketing system.
cons: Cons: Coupon codes are limited- but rarely a problem.
overall: Overall: ThunderTix is basically perfect for any box office of any size.

title: Online Ticketing made easy. Who knew?
name: Pamela B.
pros:
Pros: Easy Setup.

Multiple ticketing options

Public presale advertising options.

Customization of each event

Seamless transition from company website

No long term contract
cons: Cons: No percentage based coupon discount (but we hear its in the works)
overall: Overall: Starting up a new theater and our first foray into reserved seat ticketing, Thundertix made the transition almost painless. Everything was explained up front and no question went unanswered. Since our offices at the theater were not completed before opening night, the online capabilities of Thundertix enabled us to run the entire ticketing operation out of a hotel room. The customer service (Ms. Stacy Chapman in particular) is outstanding and you feel as if you have your own private troubleshooting squad.

title: Best in the Business
name: Brian B.
comments: Comments: We have been with ThunderTix for over a decade and we wouldn't think of even considering going anywhere else. From the beginning ThunderTix always gave us the best return on investment. The system is so easy to use from both the managing side as well as from the consumer side. Their customer service is "top notch"! In the unlikely event you encounter issues with the system, they are extremely quick to respond to emails and calls. Our theatre would highly recommend their service to anyone.
pros: Pros: Customer Service. Lost costs. Openly request ideas from their clients to improve the system. Extremely easy to use.
cons: Cons: None at the present time.

title: Impressive and Powerful Ticketing Package
name: Phillip S.
pros: Pros: After looking into several ticketing packages, my tour company chose ThunderTix to solve our online challenge for better customer service. We had no idea how powerful the product would be! Instantly, we started seeing results and how easy the implementation was. The integration into our website was seamless in no time and we were booking business within a day of installation. Impressive in every aspect, including support. The suggestions and guidance from ThunderTix has proven invaluable and has resulted in added sales and revenue beyond expectations.
cons: Cons: So far, we've not found any serious flaws or shortcomings.
overall: Overall: Any business in need of booking and ticketing should strongly consider ThunderTix. Most impressive of all are the many features that are customizable and simple enough for rapid adoption. Straight-forward instructions coupled with excellent support make ThunderTix the goto option for solution-based booking and...more sales!

title: Fine but not the best option out there
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The customization is really nice -- from show details, customer reminders, and prices. The customer side of things is really clean and well setup.
cons: Cons: The navigation can be non-intuitive, but understandable once you get the lay of the land. The biggest issue we've come across is the inability to delete or archive orders. Our group sales processes including deposits were always in jeopardy of getting really messy on the back end. Even leaving notes about orders that you couldn't later update would get irritating for the small space provided.
overall: Overall: I feel like the biggest benefit is the price and the customization of the software. I would highly recommend spending quality time on the set-up to ensure you're using it to the best of its ability for your organization.

title: Great Customer Service and Excitement for the Future
name: Sean E.
pros: Pros: features for price
cons: Cons: limited visibility of data without download reports, limited functionality on ios app
overall: Overall: Great customer service! Pam is great! The software needs a facelift and more of an updated mac/ios look and more immediately accesible features (without downloading a report) but great value for the services that are offered!

title: Easy platform to work with once you figure it out.
name: David E.
pros: Pros: Ability to have control of sales platform and money is deposited direct to your account. Fees are reasonable. Phone app makes scanning easy.
cons: Cons: Learning the platform takes a little time. But it's worth taking the time to learn. Phone App is limited access to programming events.

title: Best option for small events I found
name: David C.
pros: Pros: The price and ease of use makes it a good fit for small events like ours. I am using it for my third year.
cons: Cons: Tracking cash sales seems more difficult than it should be. I could not find a way to add in cash sales without having the ticket fee apply. I ended up writing those down on paper and it is not ideal.
overall: Overall: Cost

title: Excellent Software for event management
name: Don B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The site is easy to use with great video tutorials. I have called a few times with things I didn't understand. The support I have received has been excellent and I had a resolution immediately. I had events scheduled and ticketing operational within minutes.
cons: Cons: I had a few minor issues with trying to integrate my shopping cart software with the site. I had to call support and they resolved the issue within seconds.
overall: Overall: I compared several event management programs and sites. Thundertix is hands down the easiest to use. They give you the most value for your dollar.

title: Can't beat the customer service - a company willing to grow with you.
name: Jennifer E.
pros:
Pros: customer service is top notch

problems are handled quickly and effectively

features can be added as needed, so you can grow into the system

does not require a service charge to customers

no complicated setup

easy to implement with multiple box office users

company will listen if there is a feature you want and see if they can find a way to offer it.

Have never experienced 'down-time' during our entire time using this system

almost immediate up-time after signing up

you can edit/add/delete events whenever you want or need to

interface can be operated on an iphone!
cons: Cons: There's never been a problem they haven't solved with me, so I can't think of one.
overall: Overall: I highly recommend this system. I spent hours and hours researching other systems and found that for our needs, Thundertix had everything, and was not overburdened with software/hardware that was excessive and cost-prohibitive.

title: Good website and app
name: Erin L.
pros: Pros: Easy to use. I was able to find my event and run reports. Sometimes the reports got a little hung up but nothing that wasn't fixed with a reset
cons: Cons: Just the reports got hung up from time to time.
overall: Overall: We use ThunderTix in correlation with the Harlem Wizards. It's easy to use and see the event

title: Very easy to use, with most features clearly designed to be quickly understood or even deducted.
name: Jorge G.
pros: Pros: Functionality allows for quick reference of all transactions; the platform never seems to experience any technical difficulties; Support Team actively listens to and quickly implements suggestions for improvement; clients immediately receive their Tickets and Confirmations.
cons: Cons: If anything, the lack of navigation from one feature to another without having to leave one area altogether.

title: Great cost effective online event tool!
name: Barb K.
pros: Pros: Pretty easy to use, good reports, reasonable price. A good solution for smaller venues who need online ticket and event sales. Can be customized to a point. Always improving features.
cons: Cons: The five minute time out on a ticket sale is tough when you are dealing with box office side, if you make a mistake in info and can't figure out what you did wrong it is frustrating and a little embarrassing when the guest is standing there.
overall: Overall: Definitely would recommend, especially to businesses that may not need a high end super expensive software. We did the research and by far this was the most flexible, easy to use, easy to implement and simple enough to train other on. We are pleased with ThunderTix!

title: Review for Dawn
name: Jason M.
pros:
Pros: Dawn was great to work with. I'm literate but I learn better with hands on experience. I had questions with my first rep and any questions I asked, I would just get links to things that I didn't understand and was told to read it. I felt like I was bothersome. I know this company has so many tools to become successful and I want to learn them all! It's great! So one day, frustrated I spoke with dawn. She's awesome, helped me understand things, was patient, friendly and I didn't feel like a moron talking to her. Give her a raise and a paid day off. Keep her happy because she is who you want to represent your company. If my first encounter was with her, you'd have all 5 stars. If I didn't encounter her, zeros.

Regards,

Jason
cons: Cons: None at the moment.
overall: Overall: None at this time.

title: Easy to Use! Perfect for my Event!
name: Tracie M.
pros:
Pros: Easy to Use and Set Up

Great Customer Service!!

Cost Effective!

Works like a champ! Rare to have any downtime
cons: Cons: Copy function to replicate times within event types could be more robust. Like the set up in account settings replicates to events by default though

title: Very easy to work with!!
name: Amy L.
pros: Pros: Ability to quickly check sales!! I could log in from my phone as well and that made checking the sales much easier!!
cons: Cons: Nothing that I can think of!! I found the software very easy to use and my customers who purchased tickets found it easy to use as well.

title: Horrible horrible
name: Natale H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Nothing
cons: Cons: Everything
overall: Overall: I had thundertix do event seating for my nutcracker ballet . You seriously can not talk to anyone if you have a problem . I had to take it off my website because so many people called me having trouble actually completing purchases . I asked thundertix to look into it and they kept saying that things were working out just fine . I have actual emails , voicemails and video footage of how it really didn't work . They also would not give me a refund for the time I actually couldn't use it . I would be happy to show anyone this .
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: I took time out of my busy schedule to warn you all . Do NOT use this service

title: Excellent Ticketing System
name: Charlie V.
pros: Pros: Custom Seating charts available for a very competitive rate. Offers many different pricing structures (much more than pay-per-ticket). Reliable up-time for services. Very robust, 1000's of tickets can be distributed within minutes of each other without a single issue of duplicate tickets being sold.
cons: Cons: A slight learning curve to find every feature available to admins. This could also be a positive because it is so customizable. At the end of the day, the user can tailor the system to their needs and brand it any way they wish if they are willing to take the time to utilize all features.
overall: Overall: A great web solution to a simple problem... Standing in line for tickets! We are able to act like a company twice our size and distribute 100% electronically thanks to Thundertix. We have been very customers for two years and are looking forward to many more.

title: Thundertix Review
name: Kathie D.
pros: Pros: I love the fact that we were able to upload the image of our theatre and numbered seats for our patrons to choose seats. I love that we can include product sales like show posters or tshirts with the ticket purchase. It is very intuitive software. The reporting is AMAZING and we are able to get an accurate record of transactions immediately following the close of a production.
cons: Cons: Nothing I can think of. It has been a great fit for us.
overall: Overall: For years we had general seating and people waiting in line to enter the theatre. Patrons would begin saving rows of seats causing much ill will and frustration. The reporting of ticket sales took much longer to calculate as well.

title: easy to track sales
name: Julie L.
pros: Pros: The ability to export guest lists to excel and manipulate data as needed. Ability to print out guest lists, etc.
cons: Cons: There was nothing that this software did not do that we needed therefore I don't have anything to write for a con.

title: Why use Ticketmaster, when there is ThunderTix?
name: Matt B.
pros:
Pros: -ease of use

-extreme flexibility

-extremely customizable

-constantly adding new features

-the best customer service

-puts the most amount of money back in our pockets compared to any other ticketing system we could find
cons: Cons: -custom features can take a while to implement
overall: Overall: Our venue used to be a ticketmaster shop. We were able to cut our service fees to our customers per ticket by over $2, but still were making 400% more per ticket than we were with ticketmaster. Talk about win/win! Overall profits for our first year of ThunderTix are up 25% just from switching over. We are about to enable facebook sales which should further increase revenue. Stacy Chapman is an unbelievable resource that has been there every step of the way to bend ThunderTix to our needs. I wish all tech companies were as pro and nice to deal with as ThunderTix. If you sell tickets and like to make money, ThunderTix is absolutely the way to go!

title: ThunderTix Is Fantastic
name: Katie M.
comments: Comments: The thing that strikes me most about ThunderTix is their incredible customer service. Working with Pam (read: phoning and emailing her incessantly to answer all my inane questions) was a dream. She never made me feel incompetent or silly for asking ANYTHING (even things that could easily be answered by troubleshooting on my end or looking it up on the website), and she was always extremely cordial and willing to give her time to help me. I LOVE the way the website works, and how as an Administrator I can see exactly who is buying tickets, where they are seated, when they bought them, etc., etc., etc. I had all the information about customers that I could want! I love the control I had over which information I wanted to require of my online customers; it was wonderful. So easy to use, and so great to be able to improve upon my skills year after year! I look forward to using ThunderTix for as long as I am involved in Theatre!

title: ThunderTix - A True GameChanger for small to medium businesses
name: Jerry T.
pros:
Pros: Ease of use

Excellent Customer Service

Easy to integrate into your website

User Friendly back end

Customizable

Plug and Play setup

Amazing Reserved Seating feature and mapping technology

Quick and easy checkout process

Continuous improvements from company to ensure always fixing any issues and capitalizing on new ideas from customers.
cons: Cons: Additional options for other great features (i.e. scanning, design of tickets, etc are incur additional fees...yes, I was hoping they were free:)
overall: Overall: I would recommend this to any event company looking for that cutting edge to help revolutionize their business. It was our first ticketing software type project and this was such a plug and play software that it made us look like geniuses to our clients. Thanks to the ThunderTix team for the support!

title: At Your Fingertips
name: CAROL V.
pros: Pros: That I have my selections at my fingertips and don't have to worry about printing out documents
cons: Cons: Nothing everything seems very functional
overall: Overall: I am able to help scan attendance at events

title: This program was so easy for multiple people to log in and be able to check ticket sales.
name: Rabecka J.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: That multiple people could login.. and we could actually print reports instead of downloading them. It was easy to review and I liked how the program was Lifetime and updated often. We had a specific limit of seats we could sell and so we were checking it frequently to make sure we did not over sell our event.
cons: Cons: You really had to search around to get reports to print easily. I wish we could have refined exactly what we were looking for and just print that report
overall: Overall: The benefit that we really utilized was keeping track of how many seats we sold so that we would not over sell our event. And also keep track of the revenue we were taking in to make sure the event was going to be prosperous for our non for profit organization. I also like that the fee was not so much that people felt are Booster program wasn't benefiting for the full amount of the ticket.

title: Loved this system for our events.
name: Kim F.
pros:
Pros: Check-in Feature

Ease of payment

Calendar format for functions

Private settings was a great feature for small groups
cons:
Cons: Wish it had a separate POS system

Search invoices I bit tricky.

Set up was easy but needed to be tweaked a few time to make it work how we wanted it to.

title: Easy to use, especially on my mobile device (Note 8).
name: Michelle H.
pros: Pros: I liked that the software was very easy to use. Once you login, you can quickly generate any report that you need. The reports were easy to generate and to print.
cons: Cons: I would prefer that all reports be available in PDF and excel format. While excel format was great, it was hard to look at on my smart phone.

title: Unmatched Service and Response Time
name: Amanda U.
comments: Comments: We are a non-profit theater in Arizona. We have been using Thundertix for three years. I spent months researching the different options and I know that I made the right choice. The software is very easy to use and they are always thinking of ways to improve the system. There is an upgrade nearly every month where new features are announced or improved. Our price has never been raised despite the addition of many new features. Pam and the rest of the service team are quick to answer and get things done. Recently a new update feature created a small issue for us. Pam was quick to get the tech team working on a solution for us and before we knew it a new feature had been created just for us. It's a small enough company that you get to talk to an actual person when you call! Imagine that! We couldn't be happier with Thundertix.

title: WOW!!! Thundertix is a GAME CHANGER for my business!
name: Scott P.
pros: Pros: Kudo's to Stacy Chapman, my account person and partner in making Thundertix work for my company! Are you kidding me!?? What have I been doing for the past 2 years, TT is a game changer, sales are exploding, customers are thrilled with the ease of use, and most importantly, the seamless integration with GroupOn and Deal Chicken promotions makes making money a snap, and effortless. THUNDERTIX ROCKS! Scott Pace, CEO North Pole Experience
cons: Cons: I didn't put this in 2 years ago!
overall: Overall: I have researched dozens of ticketing services and settled on Thundertix. Absolute BEST business decision I have made, and it shows BIG TIME in my growing sales success! Thanks Stacy & Thundertix!

title: Ashley's Review
name: Ashley K.
pros: Pros: I love the ease of this system. I can create, edit, change anything I want. I haven't fully utilized the system yet, but there are plenty of other features I am looking forward to using. We went from phone-call only reservations, to not having to do a thing. This saved me tons of time and money!
cons: Cons: The only con I've had thus far is if my event has officially "expired" I can't export to excel.
overall: Overall: Overall, I love this system and I hope to utilize it even more. We are migrating to online/credit card sales and this initially was a test and it seems to have passed. :)

title: Best so far
name: Erika B.
pros: Pros: Ease of use for both tickets sales and ticket tracking.
cons: Cons: Hard to find/use screen at venue day of for day of purchasers. Day of purchasers are not in alpha order, they are listed at bottom which requires seaching for them to check them in.
overall: Overall: Ticket sales for multiple location, multiple events, multiple users

title: User friendly for both company and customers.
name: Katie F.
pros: Pros: I love how easy the back end of the site is to navigate. Whether it's adding tickets to the cart or helping a customer with their order.
cons: Cons: The only thing is that some of our users have issues when purchasing tickets. The "robot" question gets asked several times and they call to complain.

title: Meets Our Needs Perfectly
name: Candice B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It easily incorporates into our website. Love how it tracks customers and number of tickets sold. Very useful!
cons: Cons: It doesn't not provide a printable calendar with our number of tickets remaining listed.
overall: Overall: We've had an overall great experience with ThunderTix!

title: My experience was very satisfactory in terms of use and convenience.
name: Ivan J.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I liked most about the software was the ease of use and the convenience of the software package. It was very user friendly and needed no assistance to utilize.
cons: Cons: I cannot think of anything that I liked least about the software package. I just wish that all software packages were as easy to use in my daily work.
overall: Overall: The benefits from this software is the instant access and the accuracy of the information.

title: Perfect for our needs
name: Lauren W.
comments: Comments: Down here in Gruene, Texas we are always "gently resisting change", but in 2010 it was time for our ticketing system to evolve to keep up with our now technology savvy customers. Back then, the Thundertix features were few but we didn't need anything fancy - just a reliable ticketing system that was user friendly. However, it didn't take us long to have a wish list for features, and Dawn and Stacy considered each of our requests regardless of how big or small. They are a fantastic partner to work with, and we always feel like a VIP customer. Now in 2015, they call us to make sure we are aware of new features to help better our customer's experience or minimize our labor. We greatly appreciate the Thundertix Team, and I would highly recommend ThunderTix for online ticketing needs!

title: In comparison to other systems
name: Chris G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use for someone new to the system. Intuitive
cons: Cons: Unable to use packages and the shopping cart feature. With multiple packages, we have to run multiple charges for a customer, can raise concern.

title: Gets the job done
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Allows me to create tickets and email reminders for various events. I like being able to create tickets and have them go live at pre-set dates. I like being able to track who purchased tickets and when. I like being able to create sales and activity reports.
cons: Cons: The software is effective but klugy to use. For example, when inputing an event address and time, instead of one entry, I'm required to enter in three separate places: the event description, the ticket, the listing of events.
overall: Overall: It makes possible the creation of tickets for multiple events at different times.

title: Our use of ThunderTix software has made our ticket sales so much easier
name: Vance E.
pros: Pros: It is fairly intuitive to set up our ticket sales. I have been impressed with all the features for setting up multiple nights, etc. Our customers have found the interface to be straight forward and easy to operate. It has taken a lot of the pain out of handling tickets. The reporting features after closing night are especially nice.
cons: Cons: It is not very easy to block out unavailable seats for certain nights, or reduce the cost of a seat in the case of an obstructed view.
overall: Overall: Ease of ticket sales seat up. Configuration of seating plans. Reporting features.

title: I found this software to be workable and easily tailored. The Customer Service is extraordinary.
name: Sonja G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Customer Service.! They answer quickly and most often with an easy fix or work around. I also like the way it looks to the consumer - clean, accurate, safe.
cons: Cons: Some site limitations due to coding. I would prefer a little more latitude with fonts and styles. And every once in a while a little glitch or idea needs time to work through the sales team.

title: We're pleased with the experience
name: Heather C.
comments: Comments: We are pleased with the ease of use, we'd like to see a few more features like an Android App for selling and scanning & an option for a shopping cart to avoid having our customers make multiple purchases. Overall, however, we are very pleased. Pam is a tremendous help and always ready with just the answer we need.

title: Incredbile Product and Unbelievable Service!
name: Kelly W.
comments: Comments: Our Company has used other ticketing software in the past and we are so glad we made the switch to ThunderTix!

title: Easy once you're rolling
name: Jessica F.
pros: Pros: I love the convenience of the spreadsheet of tickets sold along w emails and type of ticket purchased
cons: Cons: It's tough to navigate initially. I actually had to write the steps since I wasn't checking every day to remember

title: Simple and intuitive
name: Colleen F.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The simplicity of the program that allowed me to quickly and easily find the information I needed. The ability to track in real-time our sales progress.
cons: Cons: I had a little bit of trouble getting certain parts of the website to work on my mobile devices, but was able to find ways to work around the glitches.

title: Thundertix has been a great addition for our company.........
name: Angie R.
pros: Pros: We have been pleased with Thundertix overall. This system is user friendly and the customer support is great when you need assistance. It is nice to have a ticketing system where the user can be so hands on.
cons: Cons: The customization aspect is the only con. In order to customize this system to fit your needs such as reports, you are charged an hourly rate in addition to your regular monthly maintenance fee.
overall: Overall: I would definetly recommend using this ticketing system versus the competitors. The best part is that our money goes directly into our bank account daily instead of waiting to get our money after the Event is over.

title: Love it
name: Nicole S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This software is easy to use and very versatile!
cons: Cons: If I sell a season pass and they switch seats I have to exchange every single seat instead of just picking another one for all the games.
overall: Overall: Awesome! The support is second to none. They ALWAYS get back to me quickly and always fix any issues I have.

title: I have found this to be the most user friendly ticketing system.
name: Matthew R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: The ease of use for both the customer and the theater.

The mobile app is great with a few exceptions
cons: Cons: Mobile app is the only con, but can be fixed with a few things. It won't allow you to make edits to events nor see guest lists. With these two fixes it could be perfect.

title: Robust, Flexible, and Best Customer Service
name: Sally S.
comments: Comments: My company runs a small event series several days a year. We're a small company and we're not a venue, so we really need a flexible ticketing system that has a strong customer service department to make up for our lack of expertise and personnel. ThunderTix perfectly fits our needs for that reason. Any time one of us has a question about how to use the software, the ThunderTix team quickly provides us with solutions in a professional and friendly manner. We looked into the "big name" competitors for our ticketing needs and found ThunderTix to be more affordable, be more flexible, and have better support. Two thumbs WAY up for ThunderTix!!

title: Thank you ThunderTix!!
name: Vicki C.
comments: Comments: Shadowlight Theatre is very pleased with the ticketing and customer service ThunderTix offers. The website is very easy to use on the admin side as well as the customers. When we have questions that cannot be answered on the website help feature, customer service is prompt, efficient, and very friendly. The reports are accurate easy to download and simple to use. We enjoy using the Mail Chimp integration to market to our existing customers. The up load to Mail Chimp is very fast and has saved us hours of input work! We are very pleased with the continual upgrades to the website... it just keeps getting better! THANK YOU!!

title: I've done the research & ThunderTix is the best.
name: Jim S.
comments: Comments: When we opened our theatre in 2010, we were using an industry-leading software (that shall remain nameless) that was costing us a ridiculous amount of money. In 2012, after hefty research on the competition, we switched to ThunderTix for budget reasons, and though it started off a bit bare-bones, the amount of growth and the personalized attention to our needs has been nothing short of stellar. Pam & Stacy are amazing to work with, and the price is absolutely unbeatable. There are still features the bigger guys have that Ttix doesn't, but the company is constantly growing and improving, and I'm a very satisfied customer.

title: Great product, great company
name: Deirdre R.
pros: Pros: Great service, little downtime, lots of flexibility, terrific communication from the team, and very responsive to questions and suggestions.
cons: Cons: This is not the least expensive software on the market. But you get what you pay for, and with this software you get a real quality product.

title: Newport Walking Tours review
name: Brad H.
comments: Comments: We have been very impressed with the commitment to ongoing improvements by Thundertix. Our company switched to a different ticketing system for almost a year. The reason for the switch was primarily cost driven. The rival service advertised similar features but the reality was far from what was advertised. The customer service was nonexistent with the other company. Thundertix has been very responsive with technical support and advice on how we can improve the ticketing experience for our customers. I would recommend Thundertix to any company that wants a reliable way to sell and manage tickets to their events.

title: Best in the business!
name: Joanna C.
comments: Comments: HCCC has used Thundertix for four concerts now - two concerts in one venue and the other two in our current venue. The setup process for each concert as well as for each venue was very easy. Customer service has been consistently excellent - questions are answered quickly and accurately. Our guests have expressed their appreciation for some of the features Thundertix offers, such as the reminder email for upcoming concerts. Leadership is looking forward to using the survey feature for our current concert in April. I give Thundertix the highest rating possible!

title: Great Features,Easy to Use
name: Katie W.
comments:
Comments: Pros: very user friendly, easy to set up, excellent reporting features.

Cons: Pages are a bit slow to load, cannot purchase different prices/days at the same time (unless all are general admission).

The setup was a snap and the ease of use can't be beat, but the load time does need to be a bit faster. It would be nice to do different sections/days/priced events in the same shopping cart also. But overall, fantastic!

title: The website was very clear to understand and the platform was VERY user-friendly.
name: Thomas G.
pros: Pros: The issues we did encounter were mainly on our end but the tech support on their end always came through to deliver very easy solutions.
cons: Cons: The feedback was through e-mail, which sometimes took longer than we would have liked. The response was always same day though.

title: Thundertix review
name: Julie H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It's easy to manage and navigate through.
cons: Cons: Haven't found anything yet. We just started with it
overall:
Overall: The app is easy to install, straightforward and easy to use and navigate through. Has the essential features we needed for our event.

Ticket sales, etc

title: "Over the Top" Customer Service and Product!
name: Joanna C.
comments: Comments: From the very first contact with ThunderTix over the phone, I knew I had found the right ticketing system for our choir. Every question was answered confidently. Details of the system were explained in very understandable laymen terms. Limitations of the ticketing system were offered honestly with explanations of how to overcome them. After deciding on ThunderTix, I was walked through the steps of set-up quickly and easily. The choir's performance ticket system was launched within a few short days! I have not had one issue with any sales to date. Love it!

title: GREAT SOFTWARE! Easy to use + perfect customer support!
name: ANDREW P.
comments: Comments: At first, I was a little worried that the service might be too expensive, but after using ThunderTix, we are thrilled that we made the right investment into our online box office. Not only is ThunderTix easy to setup, but their customer service is the best in the business with a knowledgeable staff that actually KNOWS the software, and offers easy-to-follow instruction. We have handed this off to our client & our client is thrilled about the ease of use, the reports, and the customization for their events & shows! A+ service + software all-around! Highly recommend!

title: THE BEST customer service!
name: Michael R.
pros: Pros: Easy to use. Great customer service when you do need assistance.
cons: Cons: I don't have anything negative to say.
overall: Overall: I'm so impressed with the ability to talk to the same people any time I need assistance with my account. ThunderTix had been a cost effective service that meets all of our needs and I wouldn't consider any other service.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Once I used the software for a couple of events I became comfortable with using all the features of the software. It's simple to learn and use.

title: Great Customer Support
name: Rodney W.
comments: Comments: Being new in this industry, I did considerable research before deciding which ticket sale system I wanted to commit to. I've been using TT now for almost 3 weeks and have no regrets the choice. They had me up and going quickly and made it very easy on my end. The price is better than the other options I considered, and the system offers many excellent features. I have had very few needs to contact customer service, but each time I did they were very helpful answering my questions quickly. I highly recommend ThunderTix.

title: The Best in the Industry
name: Brian B.
comments: Comments: We have been with ThunderTix for over a decade and we wouldn't think of even considering going anywhere else. From the beginning ThunderTix always gave us the best return on investment. The system is so easy to use from both the managing side as well as from the consumer side. Their customer service is "top notch"! In the unlikely event you encounter issues with the system, they are extremely quick to respond to emails and calls. Our theatre would highly recommend their service to anyone.

title: My company has been using this software for over a year and we like it very much!
name: Christine G.
pros: Pros: It is extremely user-friendly and has great features to make the experience of ticket-selling easy for the seller and professional for the buyer.
cons: Cons: My only complaint would be the kick-out time for buying. It would be great if we could choose the time limit ourselves. Also, the scroll bar for the event listing page needs to be bigger and more prominent.

title: Thundertix solved all our ticketing woes. Their system is exactly what we needed.
name: Joshua F.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use to be able to jump right in. The software is very easy to learn. Anything you do not know immediately, there is a video to help you see how.

title: First time experience and still in the early stages of working with this platform
name: Jesse M.
comments: Comments: We had an experience with an online error in regards to customers being able to purchase and process payments and my account manager, Pam Mason, was extremely helpful in diagnosing our problem and providing the assistance and guidance we needed to help us remedy the problem. Pam was readily available, receptive to our problem, and solution oriented providing a high level of customer service which has really reinforced for us that we made the right decision in choosing ThunderTix for our event.

title: Easiest ticketing system I've seen in use!
name: Stacy H.
comments: Comments: ThunderTix is the easiest ticketing system I've seen in use. The number one plus for us is the ability to choose whether to pass along the cost of the system to our customers or include them in our overhead costs. The technical assistance is the best and is more than responsive to suggestions and requests than any other software system we've ever used. If you have an existing system, or are looking to get into online ticketing, don't miss the opportunity that ThunderTix provides.

title: Very good ticket service
name: Guillaume S.
comments: Comments: My organization has very demanding needs for a tickets system and ThunderTix is doing a very good job. I noticed a few minors bugs but they fixed them. There is one feature I would like to see added, however they have a request feature section where clients can post suggestions and vote on features requests, which is pretty nice. Their customer service is really good as well. For the price, ThunderTix might be the best option there is out there for your online tickets needs.

title: Easiest and most affordable ticket company!
name: christina l.
pros:
Pros: --most affordable compared to other ticket companies

--ease of use

--customer support

--website user interface

--scanner rental process

--reports
cons: Cons: --i had a lot of questions about the whole process but customer service was very helpful!
overall: Overall: I would definitely recommend thundertix, especially if you are unfamiliar with ticketing an event (it was my first event hosting experience). Its the easiest and most affordable ticket company out there!

title: Old Settlers Days Festival
name: Andy H.
pros: Pros: The customer service was excellent. Had some questions/issues that needed to be answered after work hours and ThunderTix responded right away. The USB scanners were very easy to use and the software system worked well for our needs. Overall, an enjoyable experience.
cons: Cons: Customers had to do multiple checkouts if ordering more than one item.
overall: Overall: I highly recommend using ThunderTix for festivals.

title: Easy to use ticketing system
name: Adriana F.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: We love this system! It was the perfect fit for our company. Customer service is amazing. She was there to answer all of my questions and her response time was so speedy. Thank you!

title: Easy to use and convenient.
name: jennifer o.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: As a volunteer at our local children's theatre, I was able to learn and us ThunderTix with ease. I could navigate between shows very easily. Changing seats or times was also very easy. I had one "lesson" and then with a little practice I was able to use ThunderTix like a pro. Teaching others was very easy as well.
cons: Cons: Entering the credit cards was my biggest challenge. I think this was on our end of the card reader and not a part of ThunderTix. It was more of a hassle than an actual con.

title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE ThunderTix! I researched many other ticket venues and none met what I needed!
name: LaToya W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The thing I like the most about this software is I can pull a report any time in order to see how sells are going. In addition, I was able to customize it to my event!! It's definitely economical for a first time event planner!! I can NOT be more happy and will FOREVER use ThunderTix with any future events as well as recommend it!
cons: Cons: I have No Cons as it pertains to this software. Everything has worked in my favor for a first time user!

title: user friendly
name: Julie M.
pros: Pros: easy to share tickets, easy to process refunds and exchanges, easy to create coupon and discount codes
cons: Cons: Sometimes users lose their links, also would like an easier way to conduct door sales or print extras
overall: Overall: no question that we increased ticket sales and I was able to focus more on the prodcution and not have to sell tickets

title: Tundertix in a nut shell
name: Jay J.
comments: Comments: We have very much enjoyed using and working with ThunderTix over the past 2 years. Their system always had delivered for us at many different types of events we produce. The ThunderTix team is always willing to work on creating new aspects and modules to enhance our usability as well as our customers registration interaction. They are an excellent option for any event coordinator or planet to use and manage their own registrations at a very reasonable price.

title: Online Ticket System For Our Bingo = AMAZING!!!!
name: Jeff H.
comments: Comments: When I found ThunderTix, my stress and sleepless nights were OVER!!! This system makes buying tickets to our Bingo Events so easy and everyone LOVES it. Our biggest benefit is: No More Duplicate Seats. We refer everyone to the online site and they get their tickets. All of our Bingo Players are so excited and thankful for making their experience even easier.

title: Thundertix Review
name: Jenn Q.
comments: Comments: It is much harder for hosts to find their sales reports & guest lists with all of the changes. We do send our hosts a detailed report of the icons added but many are very confused. Wish there was a way to continue to sell merchandise when tickets are sold out. Otherwise, I love working with Thundertix, the customer service is top rate *PAM* and always on top of things!

title: Transition from a paper environment
name: Stanley R.
comments: Comments: We moved from a totally manual, paper environment to Thundertix. It has gone very smoothly because Thundertix matched our old process and ticketing scheme so closely. Our audiences have enjoyed being able to order tickets from home. Furthermore, the cost of Thundertix is low enough that we have not had to add a convenience charge to ticket order. Customer service has been excellent.

title: Excellent product with excellent service.
name: Trevor R.
comments: Comments: We had concerns about handling the high traffic we knew would happen once ticket sales opened for our event. ThunderTix delivered without a hitch. They had a representative available for us the day and time that tickets went on sale to help us personally with any issues that might have come up. They were even able to help us resolve an issue that cropped up last minute with our merchant services vendor. Thanks, ThunderTix!

title: Thunder Tix affordable and user friendly
name: Kevin B.
comments: Comments: We have used Thunder Tix program for the past 5 years and the main thing I found when researching a 3rd party ticketing system is the Thunder Tix Software is easy to set up, learn, and implement into your ticket office system and the flexible, affordable plans they offer. The back end of the program also allows you to capture valuable data about the customers that are buying your tickets.

title: Wonderful Ticketing Service.
name: Sadie L.
comments: Comments: I absolutely love the ease of ThunderTix. I have no issue ever creating coupons or scheduling events. Unfortunately, I was not here when it was initiallly implemented so i am not familiar with the program and its capabilites as much as i'd like to be, regarding member info. However, i always feel comfortable to ask Pam (our rep) any questions or present any concerns!

title: Great Entry Level Ticketing!
name: Bryan B.
comments: Comments: We have used Thundertix for over a year and multiple events. It is flexible and easy to use. If you have any issues getting something just the way you want it, customer support is the most responsive for any company I have dealt with in years.

title: Very quick and easy
name: Adrian L.
