pros: Pros: Easy to navigate. Purchasing tickets is simple and not difficult. Easy to move tables and such. Looking up tickets is easy.
cons: Cons: Only allowed to take cc. Have timer when ordering tickets not long enough. Tracking for tickets without order number is hard.

title: Brownwood's Lyric Theatre - Use of ThunderTix Software
name: Eric E.
comments: Comments: We have been pleased with this software. This is our first "stepping out" for ticking software for our theatre and are delighted with the ease of the program and VERY appreciative of the customer service that we have experienced. We have found the reports to be beneficial and look forward to continuing to learn and utilize more of the components that exists within the program.

title: Very Satisfied!
name: Jade N.
pros: Pros: ThunderTix is very user friendly and the support team was a great help when we needed them. It was a huge decision for us to move to online ticket sales for our dance recitals and it was the best decision we could have made.
cons: Cons: Don't have one yet ...
overall: Overall: We would highly recommend ThunderTix to anyone looking to move to an online ticket system.

title: outstanding!!!
name: Terri D.
comments: Comments: Thundertix is incredible. We use to do all our own ticketing and I was skeptical at first. The website is so user friendly. They keep refining and updating to make it even better. If you have a question when you call a real live human being answers and walks you totally through it. Truthfully at this point I don;t have one negative comment.

title: Happy User!
name: Stephanie J.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: As a ticket coordinator for a show, I found the software very easy to use. I could run reports with ease and checking on patrons was a snap.
cons: Cons: I did find it difficult to purchase tickets on different nights to be tricky.

title: Community Events
name: Emily W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The radio station was able to refer potential customers to Thunder Tix. It is very user friendly. My staff and myself were able to log in to our account and access important data as well as keep track of those who were attending our event. Not only was it user friendly but it serves as a wonderful data source.
cons: Cons: There isn't anything I can think of that I did not like.

title: Great Box Office & Online Ticketing
name: Dena D.
pros: Pros: It has been a learning process, like anything new, but after you get the hang of it, it really is easy to use. It is very user friendly and has definitely exceeded my expectations. Always glad to see new items added and improved!
cons: Cons: Not at this time
overall: Overall: Highly Recommended!

title: Excellent Customer Service
name: Simone C.
comments: Comments: Not only was the sales rep patient and accommodating, the customer service agent spent over an hour making sure I set up my events and tickets properly so I could get the most out of the product for our specific needs. Such patience, grace, and a genuine pleasure to work with!

title: No software is perfect - but ThunderTix sure tries!
name: Chris Z.
comments: Comments: ThunderTix has proven to be powerful and intuitive for my needs. The customer service has been spectacular! I have had responses to my questions almost immediately. I've only begun to scratch the surface on what this software can do - but so far I have been satisfied!

title: It was a little hard to navigate through.
name: Arliz T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The PDFs were clearly visible and I preferred those over the excel sheets which were hard to follow.
cons: Cons: The excel sheets were hard to follow so I would just use the PDFs. I also didn't like that you couldn't delete files created by accident, or at least archive them.

title: Great tool for tracking ticket sales!
name: Shelley J.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to refer to often to track ticket sales. Able to run several reports for various forms of information.
cons: Cons: Had to manually manipulate spreadsheets to differentiate totals of individual levels of sales.
overall: Overall: We used ThunderTix for a Harlem Wizards fundraiser event for the high school. We sold 3 levels of tickets, presale merchandise and meals. This app organized everything for me!

title: Thundertix Rocks!
name: Adrian K.
comments: Comments: From beginning to end Thundertix has been nothing but helpful and solid in assisting getting the ticketing aspect of our event off the ground. They were kind, quick to respond and delivered a solid product at the best price in town. That's pretty darn good if you ask me.

title: Great Customer Service
name: Wes S.
comments: Comments: I had the pleasure of working with customer support representative on our Thundertix account. She was always available and ready to take on any integration task that we needed to try. Very helpful and responsive!

title: Awesome software and even better service!!!
name: Justina T.
comments: Comments: Our theatre company decided to switch systems and the transition was painless and WELL worth the change. We love how easy it is to use and our questions are answered very quickly. Thanks ThunderTix!!!

title: The hiccups i have had were rarely ThunderTix fault! Everything i've needed to do has been do-able.
name: David L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to setup and maintain events. The various "tasks' are grouped logically together and work nicely as a template to make sure i get all the details setup.
cons: Cons: not finding much, if any....i once had a problem when an upgrade *they* made clobbered an uploaded picture and i had to re-upload it.

title: Whale Watching
name: Nicholas D.
pros: Pros: Easy to use. Good price. great customer support. Most of the time I get to talk to someone without any wait. If not they get right back to you.
cons: Cons: I really don't have any.
overall: Overall: I would recommend ThunderTix to others that have almost any type of online selling.

title: Ticketing for Brewery Tours
name: Chris R.
comments: Comments: Thunder Tix is pretty easy to use. We have some peculiarities with our situation and Thunder Tix made modifications which addressed our needs. I appreciate having a live person answer the phone when I need assistance.

title: Excellent Customer Support!
name: Lisa R.
comments: Comments: I've been using ThunderTix for several years, and I am very impressed with their customer service. Always patient with my questions and extremely quick to respond and offer help.

title: Ease of Use
name: Kimberly G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Allowed parents to easily purchase online tickets for our Harlem Wizards Fundraiser. In addition, it allowed us to easily sort the data we needed for our event.
cons: Cons: Additional details to differentiate product from ticket options would have been helpful.
overall: Overall: Fund and data collection was made easier with this service.

title: Very intuitive program. If you ever have problems someone is always there to help and guide!
name: Diane M.
comments: Comments: This program transformed the way we sell and distribute tickets. They have thought of everything including kind and knowledgeable people that guide you every step of the way. 6 star customer service!

title: Thundertix is excellent, easy, and efficient
name: Barry S.
pros: Pros: This company is well staffed, and their product and implementation adept, efficient, and innovative. The customer service is also outstanding. Highly recommended.
cons: Cons: None at this time
overall: Overall: None at this time

title: Thundertix is easy and fast to use and has very helpful export features.e exp
name: Niki K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Layout is well designed, attractive and user friendly. It is very easy to navigate the site. Thumbs up on user experience.
cons: Cons: I have only been using the software for 2 months, and at this point I do not have suggestions to make this product better.

title: Happy with the software and service!!!
name: Raul F.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, good reporting, great customer services...
cons: Cons: I been using it for two years and don't have anything negative to said...
overall: Overall: Great tool to manage your ticket sales!!

title: Took pressures of collecting registration and money off of volunteers
name: Karen F.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use for registration and payment by users was simple. Users reported being happy eliminating cash
cons: Cons: Report reading for administrators to check sales reports and for reporting. Wish pet transaction fee was lower or option to pay for service vs have users pay service fee

title: Pirate and Princess tour ticketing system
name: Katy W.
comments: Comments: Cannot say enough about the customer service provided by the Thundertix team. Would like to have the ability for customers to edit or cancel their reserved tickets.

title: Great Company!
name: Scoggins B.
pros: Pros: Great customer service with quick response time. Always helpful and provides a great product that meets our needs for online ticket selling.
cons: Cons: Nothing to report
overall: Overall: We highly recommend!

title: Overwhelming at first. But I had lot of ticket types and products, 2 days and GA and VIP seating c
name: BEN J.
comments: Comments: I think you guys should offer a seating chart software. The 2 other ticket companies i used did. I was shocked that you guys do not.

title: very satisfied with all
name: Geoff G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: ease of use and customer support. reports were useful and easy to customize
cons: Cons: rather happy with all. I did not have any negative experiences
overall: Overall: I came in through Harlem Wizards but have been involved with other ticketing services before and was very pleased with the support staff

title: Great experience
name: Jared T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The software was very easy to use and navigate (even for someone who had no experience with it previously).
cons: Cons: I would appreciate a short tutorial, just to help guide someone new to ThunderTix.
overall: Overall: Great!

title: It is a very easy software to use for managing a larger events ticket sales. Customer support great
name: Paras P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use and ability to customize based on our needs. Very good customer service. Easy to setup various accounts for multiple users at a time. Ability to access it on cell phone and Web anywhere
cons: Cons: Summary report features can be improved. Mobile app needs to be more quick and efficient with more privileges for users

title: Excellent,
name: Christian P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: For me what sold it was the support, the support I received was just outstanding, I felt that they did care and wanting to help me sort out all my concerns however small they might be.

title: Thunder Tix is Awesome!
name: Mandi R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Thunder Tix was super easy to use. I had never used any ticket management software before and it was very easy to navigate and keep track of our ticket sales!
cons: Cons: There were no cons for me! My experience was great!

title: Great for Small Business
name: Heather A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It is easy and quick for us as a small business. I think the price is right for us
cons: Cons: The interface could use some work, but it doesn't affect its effectiveness

title: First Southern Review
name: Mitch R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It does what it says it will do
cons: Cons: No phone support for lower plans
overall: Overall: I tried Eventbrite and hated that I could not talk to anyone. I switched to Thundertix and have appreciated the experience.

title: ThunderTix
name: Julie A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The product was easy to use and I could print out the reports I needed easily.
cons: Cons: Would have liked a better menu layout

title: Great for managing tickets at events
name: Alicyn D.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: it's very intuitive and has a very well built out help system. It's also flexible so we have been able to tune it to meet our needs. The support is VERY responsive
cons: Cons: Only thing is that they won't allow PayPal as a way for members to purchase tickets. We didn't realize that when we signed on.
overall: Overall: We're a small non-profit run by all volunteers. Managing our events has been a nightmare. With ThunderTix our ticketing pretty much manages itself and saves us hours of work. It's also extremely affordable.

title: The website is so easy to use, the value is magnificent and is absolutely wonderful!!!
name: Gina K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months

title: Trust me you'll use it and you'll love it - DIYness of the Portal
name: Jai M.
comments: Comments: The best ever we have worked with - Townscript team and the ticketing portal! We have 12 events pan india all round the year and they manage seriously from needle to ship for us. HAIL TOWNSCRIPT !! :)
pros: Pros: * DIY (Do It Yourself) Thing! * Real 24x7 Dedicated Customer Support - Believe me always ready to help * Simplicity & Diversification of the portal * Efficient & Effective - both team & systems * Team has a solution for any kind of challenge * Timely and undelayed payouts * Marketing & Support Team
cons: Cons: * Organisers shall also have a control for sending promotional e-mailers and SMS's to the whole of the email database. Townscript can limit the frequency to be used for the same option to curb overusage of the same. Marketing team shall set a monthly calendar. * Payouts and Accounts - Gets disturbed in a way because whenever i ask for payouts, there's a lumpsum deduction from my existing events which pools up to the asked amount and in turn the balances for the events gets disturbed. Team, we seriously need to have a way out for this one and I'm sure team will have a way out. * Event creatives gets cropped badly.

title: decent software
name: Abid M.
comments: Comments: last year we had joined you'll exclusively and in our event graphic event from delhi's graphic was uploaded. we got it to notice but we were expecting compensation but no compensation was done, in the sense pushing event more aggressively, as for us it was our 1st event STILL we continued to be loyal and tied up with youll. this is the 3rd event and being a Foundation we expected a good support.
pros: Pros: database, when you talk about Marathon Events and reasonably an easy kinda software to operate and upload events.
cons: Cons: need more responsible managers for answering issues. reason mentioned in the General Comments. really need to look into this.

In Group Art Circle, we need to create tickets every weekend, so it is really easy to duplicate a past event and edit the information. Also i can go to the past events and pull up any info if i want.
cons: Cons: Really none. There is nothing i can say i would want to improve. I'm really happy with whatever Townscript is providing. I'm glad, i moved from instamojo to townscript.

title: 2016 Custom Eventgrid Platform
name: Anne H.
pros:
Pros: Quickstart: The ease of initial setup of events, a variety of design options like easy to use templates, and ability to post events using java or iframes for turnkey event booking. Can accommodate custom color palettes and design needs within the existing framework.

In depth: Eventgrid's team is willing to work on important customizations, and the platform is pliable enough to accommodate those changes.

The software on it's own is good, the team makes it awesome.
cons: Cons: Still needs some work on reports, would be interested in additional levels of automated communications to ticket holders, and some features could be more polished/nuanced.
overall: Overall: Eventgrid is one of the few software solutions we found that was willing, and able to work with us on important customization for our unique business needs, and meet our budget. From RFP & requirements review to our execution phase, they've been responsive, friendly, flexible and capable. The software has important baseline features, but is pliable enough to include unique considerations for our organization's structure. The team - I can't say it enough - is willing to walk through every step with us patiently and skillfully.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: The things that could be improved continually are improved. The team is awesome, the value is great. Would wholeheartedly recommend them.

The mobile app is intuitive and robust.
cons: Cons: The is currently no text/SMS delivery of tickets, but the team is working on adding that feature soon.
overall: Overall: End to end solution
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: The things that could be improved continually are improved. The team is awesome, the value is great. Would wholeheartedly recommend them.

title: Invaluable to our organization. Every aspect from beginning to end was superior.
name: Martha L.
comments: Comments: It would be hard for me to find any cons with MyBoxOffice and the use of its online ticketing system to sell tickets to our annual Nutcracker production. From beginning to end, the process was smooth and instrumental to our production's success. Florin, our direct contact with MyBoxOffice, not only helped us with sales but the marketing of our production. His guidance and suggestions were a big part of our 2015 Nutcracker season be our most successful in our organization's history. He was readily available to answer any questions from our staff as well as customers buying tickets to our performances. In addition, he was at every one of our performances assisting patrons and selling additional tickets. He is a gem. Our organization surveyed our families that were involved in our production and the overall satisfaction rate using the online ticketing system was superior. The convenience and easy process to purchase tickets was very much appreciated. The bonus of being able to select their own seats and print tickets from home was mentioned most from our families as to why they loved using this software. Not only was the use of the software and online process advantageous but assisted us with timing of performances as well over 90% of tickets were purchased in advance so there were no long lines at the box office on performance days. My organization cannot recommend MyBoxOffice enough. We will certainly be using them again not only for our Nutcracker season but other upcoming performances as well.

title: My Box Office works for us!
name: Pam E.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: It would be hard for me to find any cons with MyBoxOffice and the use of its online ticketing system to sell tickets to our annual Nutcracker production. From beginning to end, the process was smooth and instrumental to our production's success. Florin, our direct contact with MyBoxOffice, not only helped us with sales but the marketing of our production. His guidance and suggestions were a big part of our 2015 Nutcracker season be our most successful in our organization's history. He was readily available to answer any questions from our staff as well as customers buying tickets to our performances. In addition, he was at every one of our performances assisting patrons and selling additional tickets. He is a gem. Our organization surveyed our families that were involved in our production and the overall satisfaction rate using the online ticketing system was superior. The convenience and easy process to purchase tickets was very much appreciated. The bonus of being able to select their own seats and print tickets from home was mentioned most from our families as to why they loved using this software. Not only was the use of the software and online process advantageous but assisted us with timing of performances as well over 90% of tickets were purchased in advance so there were no long lines at the box office on performance days. My organization cannot recommend MyBoxOffice enough. We will certainly be using them again not only for our Nutcracker season but other upcoming performances as well.
pros: Pros: The fees for online ticketing and credit card processing are low and get charged to the customer, so we, as a non-profit, don't lose out a percentage of every ticket. This is a GREAT aspect. Also, the ticket printer works flawlessly, making our ticketing process so much more professional than in the past.
cons: Cons: There are SO many options in each drop-down menu (we only use a few in our small operation) that the process can seem daunting at first to our volunteers, but with training they see how simple our system really is.
overall: Overall: We decided on My Box Office when we decided to move into online ticketing for our small theater. They gave us flexibility in that some of our shows are General Admission, some are Reserved Seating, and some use other venues with different seating requirements. This software works for all of those options, and customer service has been great in helping us figure out how to make it all work, even with flexible wheelchair seating spaces! They helped us set up the credit card processing and that has been very smooth. Our Reserve Seating, night-of-show box office functionality has never been smoother!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Our Customer Service Rep, Florin, is great to work with - immediately responsive when I have a question, and I can unreservedly recommend this product to anyone needing online ticketing services.

title: We've been extremely happy with how this has changed our box office tracking and reporting.
name: Susan P.
comments: Comments: Pros - the software is easy to use in both the front end (web) and back end (admin). The customer service is terrific. Our account manager is available to us on an as needed basis and is friendly and knowledgeable. Every issue we have had has been fixed in a very short time.
pros: Pros: The fees for online ticketing and credit card processing are low and get charged to the customer, so we, as a non-profit, don't lose out a percentage of every ticket. This is a GREAT aspect. Also, the ticket printer works flawlessly, making our ticketing process so much more professional than in the past.
cons: Cons: There are SO many options in each drop-down menu (we only use a few in our small operation) that the process can seem daunting at first to our volunteers, but with training they see how simple our system really is.
overall: Overall: We decided on My Box Office when we decided to move into online ticketing for our small theater. They gave us flexibility in that some of our shows are General Admission, some are Reserved Seating, and some use other venues with different seating requirements. This software works for all of those options, and customer service has been great in helping us figure out how to make it all work, even with flexible wheelchair seating spaces! They helped us set up the credit card processing and that has been very smooth. Our Reserve Seating, night-of-show box office functionality has never been smoother!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Our Customer Service Rep, Florin, is great to work with - immediately responsive when I have a question, and I can unreservedly recommend this product to anyone needing online ticketing services.

name: Greg G.
