title: The software was easy to use and intuitive. Customer service was exemplary!
name: Selene M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Flexible and easy to use software and hardware. All inclusive package options at price points we can pick. Customer service was reliable and we always had all our questions answered - if an answer was unavailable then our rep made sure to find a solution we could work with. Inexpensive and extremely competitive. We have used other software from competing vendors and honestly would recommend PurplePass before recommending other software. Lots of great programming options based on our individual needs and not so overly complicated that we need an IT degree to manipulate the software - that is the bonus! Our rep, Gabriel, was great to work with and responsive to our sometimes wacky questions.
cons: Cons: We really liked the software as it is very competitive to other programs available on the market. The only two drawbacks we found include integration onto websites - it doesn't allow the user to stay on the website - it kept forwarding to PurplePass url. Perhaps this is due to our website software - WIX- but that was slightly annoying for our users. The other drawback is really more of a suggestion - while the software is easy to use and the search functions are great - there was not enough promotions by PurplePass for the events listed. It would be great to have a calendar of upcoming events promoted through social media or on the site itself - we found we had to "search" for our event and thought it would be a better selling point for PurplePass to offer "promotions" on the site and suggested events. Target market on social media for example.
overall: Overall: Easy to use, functionality, competitive price, friendly and responsive reps.

title: Purplepass has been awesome and had enhanced our event to be alot more effecient!
name: Julia K.
pros: Pros: The scanners were easy to use. Since most our staff have personal iphones it was easy to use. The reporting tools is awesome because it shows a breakdown of the sales and fees which is easy to read. I like there is an option to do a seating chart and assigned seating. Also being able to make our event personalized on purplepass.
cons: Cons: The app felt limited. If we wanted to scan we could only be on the "scanning mode", if we had a walk-in attendee that needed to purchase a ticket we had to remember to change modes. I didnt like the fact that I could not see a list of all attendees admitted. Not being able to add notes on ticket holders so staff that are scanning attendees into the event are alerted when someone has a notation on their ticket

title: FTMP Events
name: Gregory B.
pros: Pros: Low fees for customers, no minimum sales limits for promoters, great customer service and very quick turn-around
cons: Cons: Only thing that causes some confusion is the ticket links re-direct to a large string. Like http://www.purplepass.com/DOYLE122118 when loaded, turns into https://www.purplepass.com/#170920/FTMP_Events-DOYLE_(legendary_ex-guitarist_of_The_Misfits)-Buffalo_Iron_Works-December-21-2018.html
overall: Overall: Purplepass has been FTMP Events' ticketing service for over 5 years, and we stick with it due to the reliability and great service. We highly recommend them to anyone interested in selling tickets online for event(s).

title: My experience with PP compared to Ticketmaster has been hands-down more efficient and user-friendly!
name: Jocelyn E.
pros: Pros: Customer Support with key account leaders for constant back and forth. Easy and accessible use of reporting. User-friendly for both the user-facing and back end. Customization of our unique product (exhibitor ticket vs. public facing ticket). Show day support. A sense of urgency for the smallest to largest issues.
cons: Cons: Not enough suggestions for the future based on their experiences with your product or in the event industry as a whole. I would like to see more comp or case studies provided in order to make your our experiences better. Not able to customize the 'selling widget'. Not able to capture day-of geographic data information quickly though POS, currently no data collected besides redemption during day-of.

title: the best, most consistent customer service and responsiveness of any business I've ever dealt with
name: Andrew B.
comments: Comments: I am co-founder of an event-related business launching in Feb 2017. We put on events across North America, with 40+ events planned for our launch, and growing.

title: Great Product
name: Shenn S.
pros: Pros: Ease of use and cost. Good support. Lot's of options.
cons: Cons: We had a few minor issues when we first started using it, but we were able to resolve them through support from PurplePass.
overall: Overall: We are a small community theater and our initial ticketing platform was hosted on our own server. It worked fine at the beginning, but we started having many problems with it and it couldn't handle our ticketing load. So we started researching alternative ticketing solutions to implement. We tested around 10 different systems to determine what would work best for us. In the end, we chose Purplepass. Purplepass had the most features, was the easiest to implement, and was the lowest cost to operate. Whenever we had questions, Purplepass was always quick to respond and help us get the support we needed. We have been very happy using Purplepass. It has allowed us to increase our online sales and is the #1 way our customers purchase our tickets after only one season. We would highly recommend Purplepass to any organization, big or small, that is looking for a ticketing service.

title: Breath of Fresh Air!
name: Jenn K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: I thought that it was INCREDIBLY simple to just scan the ticket and have the counts automatically generated. It made getting an accurate count for our people easier and we had NO errors!

What did you like least about this software?
cons: Cons: From the use of the app, I can see that it is fairly primitive. There are a lot of features that I could access without issue on the website, that I could not access on the app. For the purposes of simplified scanning/ticket taking and will call checking, the app was amazing - but it would have been nice to have more depth to what I could access
overall: Overall: This was the first event that we have held where we have utilized PurplePass for our needs. From start to finish, it has been so easy to have a smooth event. The representative we spoke with was AMAZING and made the new information so simple. The tickets that we received for our event were STUNNING and having the ability to just scan them allowed for our guests to have a nice keepsake ticket. You can't beat the price, and we received the money from our online sales a SHORT time later. I am so glad our organization found PurplePass and I can't wait to continue using it!

title: Very pleased with Purplepass experience
name: Anupam B.
comments: Comments: Among a few ticketing solutions we investigated, we found Purplepass to be the most attractive from the user's perspective. Their interface to select seats simple stood out among the rest, and it super easy to configure. Our's was a special use case though, because we are membership based society which has several grades of membership. People already become members and are then given a choice of seats in their allocated zone. When we contacted Purplepass and told them our requirements, they responded back saying that it was a too complicated for their current system and that it will require them to change their internal engine to support this need. We however were very interested to go forward with this idea. At our end we created some web-services to access our data and made it available to Purplepass. Then we wrote a full requirement specification for Purplepass to implement. They started on the project a few weeks before the event and in one week or so, they had a prototype ready for us using our specification. We did some testing to make sure it met our needs, and went through a few more iterations perfecting it to an acceptable level. Note that this was done under a severe time crunch and Purplepass were very prompt in delivering our needs. We did launch a week before the event date and everyone was thrilled with the interface. As a bonus the interface also allowed the ability for members to re-allocate their seats after they have already selected their seats once. We also got thermal-printer tickets printed for the entire hall and rented scanners for box-office use. This was super easy to use. Overall I was very pleased with the experience and will use it going forward when we have big events like these.

title: Great customer service
name: Kelson H.
pros: Pros: Purplepass is very customer service friendly. Their software is so easy to use for online ticket sales.
cons: Cons: I don't like that it is not easy to adapt for events and festivals that are not common. We are a "unicorn" event and there are different features we need for our events that Purplepass does not offer.
overall: Overall: Every time I call to ask for help, Rep is so kind. He will walk me through the steps so I know what to do next time it happens. He also has walked me through all of the details for Purplepass and spent many afternoons providing training sessions with me while I learned the software. He has been a huge help. I am pleased with the software from a customer perspective, however I wish as a Promoter there were a few more features.

title: Very easy to use. Excellent customer service too!
name: James S.
pros: Pros: We've worked with three other ticketing vendors in the past six years, and Purple Pass is by far the best. For starters, their customer service level is amazing. They get back to you promptly, are super friendly, and work to resolve everything quickly. Their event setups are pretty detailed and customizable, and they will work with you to fine-tune things further per your event needs. Their check-in kiosks and POS check-in hand-helds are super easy to use at the gate or Registration. Events integrate great with our Word Press site and they work to customize things further if need be. Overall, just a fantastic experience.
overall: Overall: Ease of use. Multiple options conducive to our event needs. Fast check-in for attendees. And excellent customer service.

title: Great
name: James H.
pros: Pros: Ease of use and consistent updates of its features
cons: Cons: Not the easiest when trying to determine your event's stats.

title: The customer service rep - is incredible! Great attitude and fixed my issue quickly!
name: Adam S.
pros: Pros: Customer Service was amazing! The software was malfunctioning at time when I needed it most!! It was crunch time! He was the customer service rep who assisted me, and he was phenomenal! We were able to resolve the issue quickly, and he made it a pleasant experience. I highly recommend Purplepass for their customer service!
cons: Cons: Functionality was lacking. I was in a crunch-time situation and needed to post an event immediately... yea.... the website was malfunctioning to say the least.

title: I enjoyed using Purplepass software and system!
name: Michelle C.
pros: Pros: I enjoyed using Purplepass software and system! I use them for my pop-ups and art events. I like variety of options the user has to cater specifically to their ticketing needs and unique events. I was able to navigate the software and found setting up my event and tickets reasonably easy. If I had an issue, I was able to call their 24/7 customer service, and they would work with me step by step until everything I needed was up and going. Overall, I recommend working with Purplepass!
cons: Cons: There were a few times- items didn't always update immediately.
overall: Overall: Overall, my Purplepass experience has been positive! If I had any questions or trouble using Purplepass, each member of their staff was knowledgeable, ready to help, patient and kind. I recommend those considering a ticketing platform to look into Purplepass!

title: I wont go any where else for my ticketing needs!
name: Sam L.
pros: Pros: Love this application! So easy to use and fast! I can get my events up and going ready for sales in a matter of minuets!
cons: Cons: I cant think of anything I do not like at this time.
overall: Overall: Customer service is TOP NOTCH. Always prompt and extremely helpful! I can email a rep that I always work with that knows me and my company and he responds asap and always offers suggestions and provides resolutions. The equipment is modern and extremely helpful in stream lining my ticketed events. I wont go any where else for my ticketing needs.

title: Cloud Based Platform, But Anything New to Offer?
name: Daniel S.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: If you've sold tickets to any large size gathering, you know what a pain it can be to manage changes and information not eh day of the actual event. Purple pass appears to be able to handle this well with a cloud-based environment that can sync all users instantly. It also has a relatively simple setup.
cons: Cons: As a trial user, I can't say anything about using this software on a large scale. It appears that it would be useful, but honestly I'm just not willing to risk switching without a truly compelling reason. I did not see any such reason during setup, so I'll stick with my usual software.
overall: Overall: Simple setup, but no significantly different features.

title: The best ticketing source
name: Paul L.
pros:
Pros: What did you like most about this software?

Easy to work with and has many notable features including tracking of sales and other vital statistics.

What did you like least about this software?

Nothing

Describe your overall experience with Purplepass Ticketing (Optional)

I have been using Purplepass for over 8 years for multi events and every thing goes off without a hitch. PP is a seamless use system great for all of my needs as a promoter.
cons: Cons: Nothing it has all the features I require.

title: Purplepass Ticketing review
name: Regina D.
pros: Pros: It was so easy to use, set up and edit. Our customers told us they found it easy to purchase tickets. I found it was easy to reassign seats if the customer made a mistake and refunding was simple. The customer service is outstanding. easy to talk to, easy to reach by phone or email. Knowledgeable staff and friendly, extremely helpful from day one. Our other schools are now signing up for their shows.
cons: Cons: I honestly could not find one thing I do not like.
overall: Overall: Making it easier for my use as well as our ticket purchasers. The product we used in the past caused many problems. Since starting with purplepass we have no problems or complaints. I will continue to use them.

title: A ticketing team you can rely on!
name: Adam L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Its got a learning curve that doesn't exist with your typical EventBrite-esque ticketing platform but, with very little practice the customization options and availability make it far more worthwhile than the flashier, more corporate competitors. I've never felt like I was being nickle and dimed for promoting my event and, with the proper amount of time put into designing each ticketing page, they look far more professional, enticing, and on brand with whatever you might be promoting. The ambiance required to get my audience on-board with each of my immersive experiences begins with the ticket links and it is both a satisfying and refreshing to know this is available and reliable on Purplepass.
cons:
Cons: The learning curve for the more advance options was overwhelming at first and there are sometimes setbacks when paying the listing prices back to the company but both are easily fixed and overlooked.

The lack integration with platforms such as Facebook is irritating at times as tickets cannot be listed as readily on a Facebook event or boosted post but, with some creativity and patience this, too, can be overcome.
overall: Overall: Overall its been stellar. Far more so than the other sites I've used previously that use smaller event companies' reliance on a fancy ticketing platform to gouge extra money for capabilities that should come standard.

title: Ticketing For The Duplex!
name: Thomas H.
pros: Pros: The ease of use. It is very intuitive and smart software.
cons: Cons: The software can be some what finicky when I try to add copy to the listing. It would be easier if cutting and pasting work more smoothly than have to play with the fonts all the time.
overall: Overall: It's been great. Attention and service is top notch.

title: PurplePass is a great value for my money and is very user friendly and efficient
name: Robert G.
pros: Pros: Website is easy to use, Ticket stock ships to home within a day or 2 most. They are very fast and on point here
cons: Cons: They are pretty on point here with very few errors. The original tickets were a bit plane but they have recently added a feature for a higher quality ticket print . No complaints

title: Great Product
name: Karley M.
pros: Pros: The software is extremely easy to use. You don't have to be a rocket scientist to figure it out. Their motto says it all "we don't give you what we have; we give you what you need". their customer service is also exceptional.
cons: Cons: I have not had any issues with this software. If I do, I contact customer service and it is taken care of.
overall: Overall: Overall experience with Purplepass has been amazing. No complaints here!

title: Fantastic Company
name: Matthew C.
pros:
Pros: easy of use

flexible

user friendly
cons: Cons: None I have found...
overall: Overall: In the past Rockin For The Cure, Inc. has worked with other Ticketing companies and they were ok, didn't knock our socks off, and then came Purplepass. We couldn't be happier. Everything about this company speaks quality and professionalism. There are by your side every step of the way, answering any questions or concerns you may have. These days not too many companies take pride in going above and beyond, but Purplepass does. If you hosting an event and you want a company that is going to be with you, guide you and help to ensure you event is a success, do yourself a favor and call Purplepass, you'll be glad you did!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Do yourself a favor and use it!

title: General Admission ticketing
name: Kathleen C.
pros: Pros: The online and event day products are easy to use and set up. Event volunteers can be trained in moments. Customer service was excellent. staff was available when we needed them most.
cons: Cons: event day promotional ticket sales on tablet can be confusing.
overall: Overall: We have worked with several ticketing companies over the years and the Purple Pass team rises above the others. The most important element of our service oriented entertainment business is excellent customer service. The Purple Pass team is available to provide immediate answers and solutions to ticketing customers concerns quickly and efficiently. We appreciate the value this dedication to great customer service provides our business.

title: Purplepass - best no-frills ticketing system available
name: Ben T.
pros: Pros: I very much like the ease of use, ticketing widgets for my website, and the ability to get paid via direct deposit weekly.
cons: Cons: I do wish there was an option to autofill repetitive fields like venue/cap/address (saved venues, etc.).
overall: Overall: Very positive overall. I wish more people knew and used this platform.

title: I only use Purplepass for my events
name: Michael B.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use, and the fees on tickets for buyers is very low.
cons: Cons: I pretty much like everything, very easy to navigate.
overall: Overall: I've been using Purplepass for about 4 years now and love it. I would recommend them to anyone who's having an event.

title: Excellent so far, have used Purple Pass for two events so far and have had no issues.
name: Royce M.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, custom ticket printing is great! Fast delivery of tickets with no hassles. Had a problem with a widget and got a very fast response and fix to the issue.
cons: Cons: I can't find anything to complain about. About the only improvement to my experience would be to offer custom ticket printing templates in a variety of formats (PDF, PSD).

title: Overall the event went very well and the ticket handling was quite smooth. A big thanks, Purplepass.
name: Sumanth R.
pros: Pros: SEF celebrated Holi, the festival of colors on Mar 31 at the Alameda County Fairgrounds in Pleasanton, CA. We used Purplepass ticketing as we've been doing for the past few years. Right from setting up the online ticket sales to tracking sales to shipping the onsite handheld scanners to supporting them, the Purplepass support team was very helpful, resolving our issues. We processed over 1500 tickets.
cons: Cons: There was the occasional hiccup with a couple scanners, which is to be expected for an event of this scale, but the support team, walked us through the options and resolved issues.

title: Why I use Purplepass
name: Patte P.
pros: Pros: I love it! Makes it easy for me to build a page and do my ticketing. I love that I can get a notice everytime I sell a ticket. It's like Christmas! I also like working with the rep and others who were so helpful in getting a seating chart on line for me, so I could sell individual seats. I also like being able to get my money via PayPal instead of having to wait until two days after the events. It really helps my cash flow.
cons: Cons: Sometimes there are glitches but the rep and others get them fixed.
overall: Overall: Excellent! I recommend it all the time!

title: Working with this company has been great. The customer service is fantastic.
name: Christa B.
pros: Pros: I love the box office setting. It makes it very easy to sell tickets at the door in a timely fashion. Also, the customer service is unmatched. They answer emails quickly and resolve any issues in a timely fashion. They are willing to work around our time, even though we are three hours ahead in a different time zone.
cons: Cons: I think customers have a hard time finding events. I get calls constantly that patrons cannot find the ticket sales online via the purplepass website.

title: We used it at the Box Office & Gate at La Joll Festival of the Arts. The system works flawlessly !
name: Arman F.
comments:
Comments: We had a few adjustments we needed to make during the 2 day event. Gabe of Purple Pass made those adjustments immediately and kept us purring right along. We had 4 cashiers to handle the cash transactions. We had 4 shifts during the 2 days with 4 cashiers and 2-4 scanners. They were all volunteers. The touchscreens and software was intuitive and training for each shift was quick and painless. Around half of our ticket sales were on line. Those guests only had to be scanned. In the future we will need less cashiers. We had some issues with QR codes which were poorly printed and some folks who printed the receipt and not the ticket. Some folks had tickets on their smart phones and the screens were hard to read with the scanners.

Gabe was right there and immediately solved those problems and kept the guests happy. The stats which were available any time for the asking were invaluable during the event and planning for our next one. This was our 2nd year with Purple Pass. Last year the system was good but we had problems with the broadband service and credit card processing. Not a Purple Pass caused problem. The software, the touch screens and scanner were all better than last year. They keep getting better and better. I would not hesitate to recommend their system and especially the staff that supports it. Arman Freeman, La Jolla Festival of the Arts

title: Very happy with Purplepass Ticketing so far.
name: JOSEPH L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to use and set up events. Customer feedback has been all positive and the cloud ticketing us just what we needed.
cons: Cons: Just being honest...The equipment rental program. Very expensive IMHO for what you get if it it even needed. A true cloud company would not need this. Still have no problem so far with PP
overall: Overall: easy and inexpensive

title: Purplepass is the way to go!
name: W.P. L.
pros: Pros: We've worked with Purplepass the past 5 years, and Purplepass is by far the best ticket company in the United States to deal with: The customer service level is awesome. Easy to use event set up with custom ticket printing for the event. Day of the event software is easy to use & you have your funds for the event on within a few days.
cons: Cons: We have had no problems with the software, once we learned how to work it properly .
overall: Overall: We have eliminated ticket fraud with the Purplepass scanners.

title: Automate what you can.
name: Michael T.
pros: Pros: The software frees me up from busy work so I can focus on the important details of the event.
cons: Cons: I would love purple pass to have feature that make it able to better book appointments and not just events.
overall: Overall: Purplepass helps me get back to teaching instead of booking appointments for our student Massage clinics.

title: Features made for unique situations!
name: Sandra C.
pros: Pros: The convenience and design capabilities are great to work with for events.
cons: Cons: I wish the set-up side was a little more user friendly.
overall: Overall: Very good! The staff has continued to work to better our relationship and customize their product to fit our unique situation.

title: Was flawless, will use again in 2018!
name: Gary P.
pros: Pros: I liked the paper ticket feature, the cost and ease of use setting up event. Website event page was easy to use and share.
cons: Cons: I think it needs to help market its customers more via social media and email blasts. Also not sure who's end this is on but when sharing event on social media the thumbnail provided was a low purple pass one would like to have our event pic instead.

title: Scanners saved the day
name: Darryl N.
pros:
Pros: The scanners worked like a charm for us! Our Friday night show was completely sold out and we were able to get everyone in the venue within 10 mins of opening the doors. So happy with them.



The use of Purplepass for our event registration was seamless too! Our registration numbers were higher than they have been ever and I didn't have to chase down a single dollar of payment in the process. Thanks for making my job easy!
cons: Cons: Nothing whatsoever! Purplepass has worked with us in customizing our experience.
overall: Overall: We love Purplepass and would highly recommend it to anyone who does ticketed events!

title: The best in the West!
name: Marshal P.
pros: Pros: So far the customer service that backs your software is amazing!
cons: Cons: I have not experienced anything yet that I don't like.
overall: Overall: I have to say that it was the professionalism and patience of the rep, that convinced us to use Purple Pass over any other system. His ability to help us through this new process for our shows and the time he spent with us has been nothing short of amazing! Because of him, we have decided to use Purple Pass ticketing system for 100% of our shows ticketing. Thank you!

title: Intutive, seamless and easy to use/learn...
name: Prashant M.
comments: Comments: ICMCA used PurplePass for a huge event with more 2200 seats in the auditorium. Once set up, the software was easy to use and intuitive. Once we opened ticketing , our audience did not have any issues in buying tickets and the process was very smooth.

title: Best ticketing system by far!
name: Rusty B.
pros: Pros: This system is the easiest and most robust system we have used, however the customer support is on a whole new level. Always there when we needed them and attentive to needs.
cons: Cons: We have not had any issues that were not resolved quickly. Only issues have been with something that we did incorrectly.
overall: Overall: Ability to offer ticketing to our venue efficiently and professionally

title: We used PurplePass for admission into our VIP area during a week-long golf tournament.
name: Rachel W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It allowed us to track how many people were going through our doors and aided in the security of the VIP area. The app was easy to use. The rented scanners were convenient and also easy to use. Customer Service was great, who walked me through the set-up and ticket numbering process. Also, the data that was available on the website will help us better prepare for next year.
cons: Cons: I have no cons. The only issues we had were user errors and my personal misunderstandings. I set it up as one week-long event, rather than multiple days and events throughout the week. This caused issues on our end when tickets were scanned multiple times in one day. Again, nothing to do with the software itself. We were very satisfied with the results.
overall: Overall: Ease in tracking event guests and event security

title: Purplepass Ticketing Review
name: Jen P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Customer service was fantastic - I worked with one of the customer rep, he was responsive and super helpful! I had a unique ticketing need for a multi-day film festival and he was able to help me figure out a variety of ticketing solutions for a complex project.
cons: Cons: The only negatives would be with the ease of using the platform. It's a complicated back end, difficult to figure out where things are to make updates without having a customer service rep support. For a complex project this is not going to be a self-serve platform.

title: Temecula Education Foundation Adopts Purplepass Ticketing for TOTV, Summer School 2016
name: Barbara B.
comments: Comments: As a nonprofit organization, the all-volunteer Temecula Education Foundation (TEF) strives to spend its resources as effectively and efficiently as possible. Using the Purplepass platform helps us do that by allowing us in-house management of event ticketing and online class registration. We received excellent customer service in both endeavors. The in-person support exceeded expectations for the 2016 Taste of Temecula Valley (TOTV). PP online and phone support were outstanding for our TEF-managed registration for 2016 summer school classes. Considering we were implementing a new system, both events ran surprisingly well. I am not a technical person, but the system is very intuitive, and the tutorials are very helpful. The post-event data collection feature was an eye opener; it will be tremendously helpful as TEF looks to future marketing efforts. Tracking financial transactions and receiving payment were easily managed. Post events, I appreciate the opportunity to provide feedback and receive PP's improvement recommendations. There's a little bit of a learning curve, but overall, Purplepass ticketing has been a win-win for our organization.

title: Good service, low fees
name: Matt A.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, intuitive nature.
cons: Cons: The ticketing side is a little clunky and you're unable to see how many tickets have been redeemed.
overall: Overall: the Purplepass crew have been responsive and helpful. I recommend their service to anyone working within a tight budget.

title: Purplepass has made it very easy to transition and set up our ticket system.
name: Bryan K.
pros: Pros: For the most part, the interface is very intuitive and easy to use. Purplepass has added/changed features we needed making the process seamless.
cons: Cons: The merchant interface for the concession stand did not meet our need at first, however, Purplepass worked with us to update the software.
overall: Overall: Much better interface and ease of use compared to our prior ticketing system.

title: Easy tickets sales and stat ratings .. the software made selling tickets for events a breeze ..
name: Natalie V.
pros: Pros: The stats and reviews of tickets sales daily ..I appreciated the easy payment deposit and processing.
cons: Cons: The only thing I am say is that the final payment took a little longer than expected only because of tax reasons

title: Best ticketing Company for Independent Promoters To Use
name: Trevor B.
comments: Comments: I was originally approached by Purple Pass when I was using a very large ticketing company that had horrible customer service, and would not pay me my advanced ticket sales because they said they direct deposited my money to a closed account.

title: Support at PurplePass has been outstanding. I couldn't wish for anything more
name: John O.
pros: Pros: Purple Pass is always available to help tailor design the software to our special needs. I especially appreciate the courtesy and expertise of the staff.
cons: Cons: I really don't have any complaints or unhappiness with Purple Pass. We have used other providers in the past, but are unlikely to change.

title: Inexpensive Ticketing Solution
name: Gina D.
pros: Pros: It's very cost effective while still being useful and accessible.
cons: Cons: The layout on the purchasing page has cause some confusion for our users. "General Admission" tickets are listed more clearly than assigned seats, causing people to buy standing room tickets when they wanted seat
overall: Overall: It's been a good experience. No site is perfect, and the small problem I listed is minor. We've been able to control our events, control pricing, make changes when necessary, and the price we pay is very reasonable.

title: Receive checks fast!
name: Henry K.
pros: Pros: It's nice to be able to buy the tickets and advance and know you can just pick them up at the door.
cons: Cons: I have no criticisms! The software is great!
overall: Overall: As a patron of events, it makes it easy. And as a vendor, it is also so nice to receive a check within two weeks from Purplepass, and not have to deal with all the logistics.

title: Onsite ticketing help is great!
name: Dyme S.
pros: Pros: I like the fact that we can use this for every aspect of the ticketing process including the door. Other ticketing software's aren't entirely helpful when it comes to making payments at the door.
cons: Cons: The visual display isn't necessarily eye catching.
overall: Overall: I like it. I found it through a friend of mine who uses it at all of his events. It took time to convince me to convert to this software but once I started using it, I realized how much more helpful it functions were for my needs.

title: Easy to Use, Easy to Fix your Mistakes
name: Christopher P.
pros: Pros: It is easy to use to set up your events and decide on the look of tickets for your event. Pricing is low which makes it a great choice for small events too.
cons: Cons: Nothing really, it got the job done fast.
overall: Overall: It solves getting professional looking tickets for your event. We are a non-profit, but I mean none at all.

title: Added to the professional nature of my show!
name: Hannah M.
pros: Pros: This was my first cabaret that I produced and sung in so I was really happy that Purplepass made the whole experience so simple. The website is aesthetically pleasing and easy to use. I especially liked that I could see the guest list which saved me time. I could use the link on my own website and social media. Using a professional site rather than just a list at the door added to the professional nature of my show. Definitely going to continue to use Purple pass for future shows!
cons: Cons: A phone text feature would be nice but it seems you are adding that now.

title: Ussing PP as our POS for the wine and beer garden
name: Ted P.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and understand allowed our volunteer staff to learn very quickly and be of service to our customers. It was a huge improvement for us in processing and reporting. System up time was 100% and scanning credit cards, viewing the screens was awesome!
cons: Cons: Nothing. It delivered as promised. Staff is awesome!
overall: Overall: PP allows us to serve our customers quickly and efficiently. No customer complaints. Our staff loved the system. Thank you!

title: Purplepass Ticketing is a user-friendly system that allows us to focus on our event.
name: Kim S.
pros: Pros: The customer service from Purplepass makes the entire process simple and easy to operate. The system itself is extremely user friendly and with over 150 volunteers that is a necessity.

title: I bleed Purple!
name: William L.
pros: Pros: I love the fact the we can see what cities & states the ticket sales come from!
cons: Cons: Really don't have anything negative to say.
overall: Overall: My blood bleeds purple for Purplepass & Gabriel Afana is amazing to work with. Definitely check them out!

title: Purplepass completely changed my old antiquated process of ticket distribution and consolidation.
name: Tony P.
pros: Pros: Ease of ticket distribution, ticket tracking, reports, coupon codes etc.... Definitely user friendly!
overall: Overall: The software helped me get the the next level and helped streamline my ticket distribution process. Took me away from hours of working on spreadsheets and keeping them updated and organized.

title: Amazing product and customer service!!!!
name: Mary A.
pros: Pros: How easy it is to use and it's broad functionality
cons: Cons: There are no cons to the software that I've experienced
overall: Overall: We use Purplepass to service invitations / digital tickets for large corporate events. Their software allows us to customize invitations and reach thousands of clients with ease. Their customer service team goes above and beyond to ensure 100% satisfaction. I highly recommend them and look forward to continuing to work together in the future.

title: Use Purplepass is a a Breeze
name: Briana R.
pros: Pros: Purplepass is very user friendly. Easy to find events and easy to purchase tickets. The descriptions of the events is very helpful along with information on the venue and the capacity of the event. I also like that for the super summer theatre they have all additional information including parking information and allowed items.
cons: Cons: I could not find anything I did not like about the software.
overall: Overall: Using purple pass was very easy to use to purchase and also to redeem at the event. I would highly recommend this to people looking to purchase tickets for any event.

title: Purple Pass has amazing Customer Support
name: Maggie Y.
pros: Pros: It is easy to use.
cons: Cons: I haven't found anything that I don't like so far.
overall: Overall: Gabe and his team are wonderful to work with and very responsive. When I needed a report they didn't have a template for, Gabe created it for me! I have also received calls from customer service reps suggesting we add options that our customers are requesting, which increases our ticket sales. Everyone I have come in contact with at Purple Pass has always been helpful and polite. I highly recommend Purple Pass for anyone that is looking for a ticketing platform that is easy to use, cost effective and customer service oriented.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: If you don't see what you are looking for - ask! The team at Purple Pass is always ready to assist.

title: The one true ticket and pass system that works - period!
name: Steve B.
comments: Comments: Last year was the first year that our organization has requested to make a move to an online ticketing system to replace our ticket and pass fulfillment center, after 25 years.

title: PurplePass works great for my needs- smallish theatre shows done once a year.
name: Jaime M.
pros: Pros: Customer support is great. They get back to me within 24 hours every times I've asked for help, and the help is friendly and personal and human - something I very much yearn for in this world.

title: A local service for a local charity.
name: Lydia S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I found the software easy to use. It was pretty self explanatory and the guest list upload was simple and straight forward.
cons: Cons: Nothing. We did look into a few other sites similar to yours, but nothing showed up about Purplepass on google in our initial search. It would be great if you could boost yourselves for local San Diego companies.
overall: Overall: I found out about Purplepass while volunteering at a different event alongside one of their executives. He was very efficient and the equipment worked really well so we decided to use Purplepass for our event "Songs Of Irish Heores", which catered to over 600 people in downtown San Diego. The initial set up was easy and the processing through the site for our guests was also pretty smooth. Over the month in the run up to the event, I had a few queries and questions. As soon as I contacted the executives, they were quick to respond and sort out any issues. It was nice to have a personal connection to a company that was only a few miles away.

title: Invaluable service to my team
name: Chastity I.
comments: Comments: I decided to try PurplePass because I needed a system more robust than others I've tried (i.e. Eventbrite, Brown Paper Tickets, etc) without the Ticketmaster fees. I loved the ease with which the service became integrated into our show, making the service invaluable to my team. At one point, we discovered a feature we felt could be used that PurplePass did not have. We made the suggestion and asked for it to be considered in future builds. Within a couple of weeks the feature was added. I don't think they will (or should!) do this for everyone but we loved that they saw something that could be beneficial to us, and to the service they offered, and they acted.

title: Purple Pass was very convenient and easy to use for selling our festival tickets
name: Lori M.
pros: Pros: Purple Pass was easy to use. The customer service was good. They were easy to reach by both email and phone. The code was easy to add to our website
cons: Cons: I am not in love with the design of purple pass. It could be a cleaner, more professional looking layout.

title: Review
name: Kelson H.
pros: Pros: I like how customer friendly Purplepass is. I also think you have an incredibly strong customer service group who is willing to help anytime we need.
cons: Cons: I think there is a lot of room for improvements in reporting and overall functionality. But I have learned that you are willing to adapt which I think is great.
overall: Overall: In the last year we have been working on efficiency and Purplepass has really helped that transition for our organization.

title: Purple Pass - A Great Find!
name: G I.
comments:
Comments: This Team has what it takes to go the distance in Life. They have the key attributes of a successful enterprise. We look for relationships with people who have the Capacity and the Integrity to operate in this competitive Creative world of ours. Often times you find folks who have the Capacity (able and experienced in their craft) but, may not be totally trustworthy. On the other hand, people with the Integrity (honest with a great work ethic) may not have the knowledge and experience to perform at the levels our industry requires. So, it is refreshing to find people and Teams that exhibit both characteristics. The folks at Purple Pass, especially Brandon Foy and Gabriel personify both character traits.

They are true to their word, go the extra mile and they deliver results....on time.

title: Easy fast reliable
name: Natalie V.
pros: Pros: How easy it was to use. The way it stores past events on the same account. I liked the way we could specialize the type of tickets we sold .. e.g. Promo tickets or VIP
cons: Cons: Maybe just the wait time on the check, and not being notified when tickets are being sold but nothing major, overall great experience.

title: Great experience
name: Junior M.
pros: Pros: Easy to use.
cons: Cons: None.
overall: Overall: Best ticketing platform used to date. Costumer service is impressive and they are super fast with payouts & disputes.

title: mardi gras southeast texas
name: laura c.
pros: Pros: does exactly what we need
cons: Cons: we like it all!
overall: Overall: Purple Pass stayed with us until all the problems were solved. Customized the system to our needs and our salesman was outstanding!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: no

title: I.E. Taco Festival 2016 & Purple Pass... A perfect combination!
name: KC M.
comments: Comments: In our 2nd year the IE Taco Festival had grown into a highly attended event. This year was no different. We had approx 8k-10k attendees and Purpe Pass made it easy. We had never incorporated a POS system into our festivals however with purple passes real time tracking features and ease of use with their equipment it was really a no brainer.

title: Support is super fast and responsive!
name: Ronald K.
pros: Pros: Ease of use. The setup was quick, selling tickets was easy and getting people in their seats quick. Reports were very good and informative. Support is very good and quick to fix any issues or answer questions about the software or hardware.
cons: Cons: Needed a place for large bold reminders for people to bring their tickets to the show. I guess the print at home feature was not easy for some people to use or they didn't look in their emails.
overall: Overall: Loved it. Easy to use and final payment was quick and easy. Had a brief problem with will call seat assignments that was not there in the past but support resolved it.

title: Amazing Ticket Printing Service
name: JINHYUK B.
pros: Pros: It is simple and easy to use. And ticket printing turn around time is very short and its affordable
cons: Cons: website is kind of tacky and not user-friendly design.

title: The support team has gone above and beyond on numerous occasions! These guys are solid!
name: Heather C.
pros: Pros: Super easy to use. Fast and efficient. Great variety in ticket selection. Orders are able to be overnighted to Alaska! Fantastic customer service!
cons: Cons: I wish there was a way to reorder duplicate tickets, with only date changes. I'd like to order from my phone.

title: Taste of Coronado
name: DeAnn B.
comments: Comments: We have used Purplepass for the last 4 years for The Taste of Coronado. I have been very pleased with the ease of setting up tickets sales, watching the sales and stats, checking people in and new this year the mobile box office! We will continue to use PP for our event and recommend to others hosting events. My only suggestion would be to have a"sale completed" screen after the CC is processed, many people thought it didnt go through and charged the customer twice.

title: Self explanatory and easy to use
name: Heart O.
pros: Pros: Purplepass makes ticket sales very easy. The settings are easy to adjust and everything is within easy reach. I really love the way sales are tracked, so numbers and reports are in quick reach. I find it's also easy to look up tickets, which greatly enhances our ability to provide accurate customer service.
cons: Cons: It took a little getting used to, but I have no complaints. Everything is user friendly, regardless of selling or purchasing tickets.
overall: Overall: Purplepass is extremely self explanatory and easy to use. Highly recommended for anyone with ticket sales.

title: Great ticketing software and website
name: Patrick H.
pros:
Pros: I really like the ease of using Purple Pass Ticketing. Their website is very easy to learn and rep. at the company was very helpful on the phone with a few tips and guidance through the online app.

Payment for the tickets sales was direct through PayPal and I had zero issues.
cons: Cons: I cannot think of any cons. I was completely happy with Purple Pass Ticketing

title: Purplepass works great for performing arts companies and venues
name: John R.
comments: Comments: Purplepass is a very flexible and robust ticketing solution with good pricing and lots of options. As a performing arts organization handling our own ticketing, and needing a solution that would encompass a dynamic pricing model, we found Purplepass exceptional in its versatility. Although we've just started using Purplepass, we've found that the system can easily handle our complicated schedule, including varying show dates and times, and pricing dependent on when our audience attends. We chose to purchase our own ticket printer and order ticket stock from Purplepass, and have been very pleased.

title: Purplepass Streamlined our Ticketing Process
name: Alyssa C.
comments: Comments: We chose Purplepass to replace our clunky, outdated multi-step ticketing process with a state of the art widget-driven process that is easier to use for our customers and our box office.

title: Art Festival-Move back to Purplepass
name: Don L.
pros:
Pros: They delivered the full system we requested, and our team was so pleased with the way it worked.

Their "pricing" was also the best we had, and for a non-profit organization that was also important.
cons: Cons: I wasn't close enough to provide a response to this question
overall: Overall: Combining all ticketing for our event under one source was a great decision for us.

title: You don't need sales experience to use the software. Super easy!
name: Natalia F.
pros: Pros: It was very accessible and user friendly. It's straightforward, so even people with no sales experience can get the hang of it pretty quickly. I liked the e-check feature, because you can get paid for your event almost right away! Also, it made communication with the venue very simple.
cons: Cons: Although I was happy to receive an e-check, it was a bit fussy at the bank to get it deposited. Once I figured it out I was able to cash it successfully, but I wish it had been more clear that it should be done via ATM or mobile banking app; tellers did not accept the check.
overall: Overall: Purplepass made handling my event's ticket sales a breeze, and I am incredibly grateful!

title: Best Ticketing System in the market. User friendly, great marketing tools, up to date technology.
name: Mike S.
pros: Pros: Easy to use yet very complete back end tools. Also the support is great and prompt.
cons: Cons: I have used them 3 times and have not seen any bad things yet.
overall: Overall: Awesome.

title: Great. Easy to use.
name: Fareha Q.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to use and breaks everything down. Customer Support is awesome. Brandon is excellent help. I like that you can add promo codes,
cons: Cons: I would like to have a more breakdown of ticket stats. As far as who was using the coupons and who paid (for each row).
overall: Overall: Easy to use. Everything is all in one!

title: Customer Service is Top Notch
name: Karen L.
pros: Pros: They do flips to keep you happy. My customers love choosing their seat and using their promo codes. They really have thought of everything.

title: Very easy software to use
name: Jerry P.
pros: Pros: The software is incredible easy to use for those who self produce events and shows.
cons: Cons: There is nothing I don't like! Everything works.
overall: Overall: My experience with Purplepass as both someone selling tickets and buying tickets has been excellent. Easy to use and incredibly convenient.

title: Amazing customer service , fast payment processes and super nice ticketing
name: Amy L.
pros: Pros: Easy to use ! Simple and fast ! The support behind it is amazing. Top notch customer service with amazing follow up ! Ticketing choices are great and fast. Payment is super fast also

title: Precise/concise/personable and extremely HELPFUL Support staff
name: Michael T.
pros: Pros: Help line supports the magnificent features of the website; namely, video/ audio great/ ticket management charts magnificent also.
cons: Cons: Since there is nothing negative to state about the product, I am pleased with all aspects.

title: Purple Pass is an exceptional product that is backed by excellent customer care
name: Thomas H.
comments: Comments: We needed to move from a reservation system to a ticketing service, while other companies made promises - Gabriel and Purple Pass delivered. They have worked to create a system that fits our unique situation of handling 45 to 60 different performers on any given month. They listen to my needs, explain what can and can't be done and then work creating solutions to make the system run as smooth as possible for me, the club, our performers and our patrons. I couldn't be more pleased and look forward to building our business with them.

title: Superb Customer Service
name: Christopher H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The hardware and software were both very easy to use. I needed the assigned seating option. I was very happy with the service. They responded to my questions quickly and profesionaly.
cons: Cons: I don't hold many events so I'm no expert on what the cons of this service were. This was my first time using a service like this. I was able to figure everything out and had help when I needed it. Maybe as I learn more about this industry I'll be able to Nit Pic the problems of their service.
overall: Overall: Excellent. I learned about them through a referral and if I ever need anything like this again I will use them.

title: After using two other ticketing services, there is no comparison. These guys rock.
name: Randy K.
pros:
Pros: I love that they can build a seating map based upon limited information and they don't charge for it. Their customer service is excellent

The interface is mostly very good

Their box office features are very well integrated

A total solution
cons: Cons: Their reporting could use some improvement. There is definitely a learning curve to coax out the information you're looking for.

title: Great user interface, easy to navigate and simple for attendees to buy the tickets to the event.
name: Eric G.
pros: Pros: Super user friendly, Great customer support. I liked how it was easy to upload photos/videos and and a description to your event page. They also had great customization features that you can do with your event.

title: Our work with Purple Pass
name: Amy Y.
comments: Comments: Kids Rock Free at Fender Center for the Performing Arts has been using Purple Pass for some time. We are a non-profit that supports education for kids ages 7-17, and we teach keyboard, drums, guitar, bass, and vocal as well as having a drumline & band. To benefit out education program, we hold a number of concerts every year and we sell our tickets through Purple Pass. I myself am new to working here and I picked up the website quickly and easily. Their customer service has also been very helpful when we have had problems.

title: Best POS System
name: Amber F.
comments: Comments: We have had all of the big companies like Flavorus & Ticket Fly come through our venue asking to sign up with us but in the end it comes down to the fact that the ease of use with Purplepass & the customer service aspect is 5-star in every way. The Box Office POS system they provide us with is HEADS & SHOULDERS above that of any other ticketing platform we have had experience with - it is by far the easier user interface and makes editing our events and selling tickets at the door a complete breeze.

title: Everything you need for ticket sales
name: Libby C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It was easy to set up an event and include all the necessary details needed for the interested customers to be able to purchase confidently. It encompassed everything needed in regards to ticket sales and tracking of tickets.
cons: Cons: Some of the instructions on how to claim the money from the sales was not included in the FAQ and required calling to get additional details on that part of the process.
overall: Overall: Overall it was a good experience for what was offered and needed of the software for event execution.

title: Great customer service A+
name: Theresa S.
comments: Comments: The obvious con, price. I wish it didn't cost so much. I think a flat fee would be better. Pros a many. Kiosk equipment at no cost. Easy to use website. But the best perk is the customer service. I immediately upon signing up received an email from Gabe which included his cell phone number. I have called him 3 times, once after 5pm and he answered every time. He also stayed on the phone with me until all questions and issues were handled. I am a new customer and so far so good.

title: Good Experience Overall!
name: Christopher M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It is easy to use, navigate, and understand. I also like having the daily ticket updates sent straight to my email.
cons: Cons: I would like to be able to see who is buying/has bought tickets to my events with their email address so we can keep track of them, find out who are repeat customers, and email them about other upcoming events that they might be interested in.
overall: Overall: It has been a good experience overall. The echeck process was a little different and confusing for me at first, but then worked out just fine!

title: Very happy with Purple Pass!
name: Tracy J.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use and intuitive to figure out; customer service is excellent!
cons: Cons: Had to figure out a few things but called customer service and they assisted.

title: Great ticketing platform!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It was very easy to use and the support was awesome!
cons: Cons: It took us a bit to figure out how to export the data...
overall: Overall: We will be a return customer! Great program for our needs.

title: #1 Ticketing & Customer Service.. Here's Why...
name: Jovonni C.
pros:
Pros: Easy to use

Quick service
overall: Overall: I've used Purple Pass multiple times for my business and I will never go through anyone else. I was first referred by a friend because of their prices. I've been to their office in San Diego and was extremely impressed by their attitude, student mentality, and work ethic. They have gone out their way to put custom symbols, last minute corrections to my projects, express order, even direct delivery, all at little to no charge. As long as I'm hosting events I will use Purple Pass, because they go the extra mile for their customers. Big thanks to Purple Pass and it's team.

title: The Best Customer Service
name: Jacky S.
comments:
Comments: In the last year I have been using purplepass for my events, I really like the customer friendly page, it is so easy to use and so complete, you get all the information you need to organize and keep track of everything for your event.

The people at purplepass are very friendly and the always answer your questions and solve everything fast and with a great attitud.

I really recommend this page for your events.

title: Extra marketing was a bonus!
name: Alex O.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I liked the extra marketing, easy to use website, the slickness of how my ticketing page looked to costumers, getting paid was easy, adding offers/discounts was super simple 11/10 would recommend.
cons: Cons: I didn't find out until my tickets were live that people buying tickets would get an extra fee, so I wish I'd kept that in mind.
overall: Overall: Positive, will use again, I'll like how easy it is to make different types of links to my ticketing page which made my event look super professional!

title: Best Online Ticket Value
name: Susan C.
pros: Pros: All fees are passed to the patron.
cons: Cons: I don't think PurplePass is good for finding us new patrons.
overall: Overall: For most events, PurplePass is the best value for us. We are able to pass all the processing costs to the patron, which saves us a lot. Other sites might be better for patrons finding your event, but if they already have found you and just want to purchase a ticket, this is great.

title: We use this software for ticketing needs for our events.
name: Lindsey M.
comments: Comments: We have had a positive experience working with PurplePass this year. Not only is the staff friendly and easily accessible, but they also work to make sure our concerns are heard and use our feedback to improve their product. We have had a few bumps in the road, but the staff has quickly taken care of our needs. They take a very active interest in improving their software and tailoring things to their client's specific needs.

title: Great design and support that makes the Difference
name: Arman F.
pros: Pros: Ease of operation due to a logical sequence that allows for just a few minutes of training to get volunteer cashiers up to speed.
cons: Cons: No cons
overall: Overall: Our non-profit has an annual event with on line and on site box office sales. Two years ago Purple Pass Ticketing was there for us by customizing the on line design and then on site support at the event. The attendance at was about 6,000. The hardware and software combination was excellent. Purple Pass Techs were there to solve problems. None of which were caused by their hardware or software setup. Last year leadership decided to go with a different company. That was a big mistake. We survived, but the stomach acid was brutal. I am hoping we can go back to Purple Pass this year. That will be my vote!

title: Purple Pass without question is a YES and a MUST
name: Rebekah M.
comments: Comments: Purple Pass provided a one stop shop for all of our event needs. From pre-sale to payout each and every step of the way Purple Pass was there providing the software, report tracking, and customer support. Purple Pass was even on-site day of the event and the representative were very professional, helpful and friendly. Successful Event; extremely pleased with Purple Pass and their team .

title: Amazing Customer Service!

overall: Overall: Amazing Customer Service. Brandon Foy worked with us on every little detail and was always available when we needed him.

title: Purplepass Ticketing Review
name: Laura P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: That it makes everything easier and it's very customizable to my individual event needs. Helped me quickly whenever I had questions!

title: Outstanding software, support, development and value
name: Jamie C.
comments: Comments: Three to four years ago while searching online for ticketing solutions the options that were available were very limited. Choosing a solution for an entire season of concerts is a big step. osConcert was affordable but more importantly provides so much flexibility. I had very specific needs. Integration with Stripe and/or Square was necessary and it was implemented. Integration with Infusionsoft was crucial and it was implemented. The way I needed osConcert to present and deliver information as it related to infusionsoft was unique and it was implemented. osConcert and its developers are smart and understand what you want. The turnaround time is amazing and the development costs are incredibly affordable.

title: Excellent platform, and great support by developers
name: Robert C.
pros: Pros: Seat selection tools for customers, wide selection of payment options, responsive support.
overall: Overall: We have been using osConcert for five years, and have had no reason to switch. The system works well in browsers on all devices, and there are regular feature improvements. Our patrons love the ability to select their own seats, pick appropriate discounts, and pay in their preferred method. There is a cost for some of the upgrades over the years, but it is minimal. The upgrade and support costs are well worth the ability to control your own box office site without paying a per-ticket fee.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: We did a lot of research, and we check again almost annually, but this system is the best on the market if you need reserved seat selection and don't want to pay a commission per ticket.

title: Great inexpensive ticketing platform
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: Inexpensive

php and sql

installs as separate folder on your server

The author, is pretty helpful for support.
cons: Cons: Customers seem to have some difficulty with it. Its restricted in its interface with who and how you can connect and handshake with your processor. Works well with PayPal, problems with authorize.net, unable to connect to other processors.
overall: Overall: It is not very user friendly and required a fair amount of IT time to get it started and then to maintain it. The learning curve is pretty large. If you are proficient in PhP, then you'll do fine. The sql relationship chart is unavailable and the number of tables in astounding, so sql solutions are a pain.

title: OS Concert - Event Booking Software - Easy and user friendly for both client and management
name: Macmillan R.
pros: Pros: Simple and easy to use for both management and clients. Incredibly good value and great customer support.
cons: Cons: There are a few limitations as to the way that you can extract data for management purposes.
overall: Overall: Most importantly our clients have found this an easy platform to book their tickets via, as the booking process is kept as simple of possible with clear instructions. Map of seating is clear and well designed. As an end user once you are familiar with the package it is straight forward to use. It does have some limitations to the way data can be extracted and managed. Fantastic and quick customer support with regards to any issues or questions that we have had. The service is incredibly good value for money which was important for us as we are running a charity event and has enabled us to be in control of our own bookings without using a third party agency and additional expenditure. Highly recommended.

title: Makes a box office affordable
name: Matthew Q.
pros: Pros: Low cost, adaptable as os
cons: Cons: Some quirks (it's a converted shopping cart at base) but nothing grave
overall: Overall: We've used osconcert for a number of years now so we can sell individual seats for our festival concerts on our own website. Most of our sales are now online via the system and we also use it to generate tickets for our telephone sales. It has its foibles, like all systems, but it has proved dependable and the free support and inexpensive upgrades from Gordon have been great.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Need some basic knowledge/confidence to install but help available via email and online guides

title: Full featured, cheap to buy and run, good support but some compatibility problems
name: Phil M.
pros: Pros: Attractive customised seat plans, no commission on sales (apart from PayPal), cheap and well supported. When we started using it a few years ago, it was pretty much the only show in town if you wanted to offer allocated seating from a self-hosted solution to keep everything in-house and avoid booking fees on every sale (hundreds of pounds a year for us).
cons: Cons: Problems with OS compatibility (Ubuntu 16.04), occasional failed transactions and lack of CMS integration caused a lot of administrator work.
overall: Overall: Customers can choose, pay for and print their own tickets whenever they like, providing convenience for them and reducing administration for us. Attractive customised seat plan, self-hosted software with no booking fees.

title: Excellent Value in Reserved Seat Ticketing
name: Dan D.
pros: Pros: Configurability
cons: Cons: The system is obviously repurposed from an earlier system. The back-end usability is a bit complex, and requires a reasonable level of technical expertise that is typically not found in a school like ours. It is definitely not for everyone.
overall: Overall: We are a K-12 private school in Texas with about 700 students. This will be our 5th year using osConcert to sell reserved seating at our school theater productions.

title: Great product and great support!
name: RIch B.
pros: Pros: Does everything you'd expect from an advance professional ticketing system.
cons: Cons: Would love it if it could ticket using a Boca Printer. I haven't check the latest update, this may already be and option.
overall: Overall: Always fast and reliable support. Hands down the best best ticketing system for anyone who wants to retain total control of all aspects of online and offline ticket sales. I highly recommend this product to anyone serious about selling event tickets.

title: osConcert upgraded our user experience by 1000%
name: Douglas S.
pros:
Pros: Ease of use of the product is what makes the product so great. Customers get a tailored experience and expectation of exactly where they are going to sit during the performance. Admin is fairly easy to use once you get used to how it is organized. This is a full solution from sales, coupons, notification and integrations with our payment gateway.

Gordon has been very responsive and helped us with the layout and even integrating the payement gateway that we used. Each event has gone smoother than it has in the past with other solutions that we have used.

osConcert has removed a big headache that we had and I am very glad that we went with this ticketing solution
cons: Cons: The only cons that I have are associated with the admin. some options are buried and sometimes a little difficult to find. But the developer has been very responsive and helping out with advice where needed.

title: Solid Ticketing Workhorse for our Theater
name: David R.
pros: Pros: Great seating charts and easy navigation for customers
cons: Cons: Backend is complex and can be time consuming to find the area you need to adjust, but regularly used features are very straight forward and it has a decent searchable manual.
overall: Overall: The software takes a little bit to get setup, but once all is in place you have a great ticketing site that is very visual for the customer and makes even the smallest venue look professional. Setup costs are very low and we have only had minimal upgrade charges when our seating charts changed or big enhancements to the product. No service fees so we save thousands each year over other services and the customer service has always been spot on and eager to help us.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Make sure you fill in your DATE IDS for all shows and events/products since this is the field used to fun reports and such. Makes it much easier to get useful information back on attendance.

title: Great ticketing software for the small theatre
name: Ross M.
pros:
Pros: Adaptive with the aid of Gordon to our theatre's needs.

Inexpensive.

Ongoing support and updates.
cons:
Cons: Large learning curve.

Not friendly to computer ignorant older theatre volunteers.
overall: Overall: We found the best support from Gordon. He is proactive and eager to help adapt the software to our theatre's needs.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: If you have your own website and need ticketing software and you are like most smaller theatres operating on no money, this software is a MUST.

title: As a volunteer run Arts Festival we need affordable online ticketing - osConcert is a great solution
name: Peter B.
pros: Pros: Easy to set up and manage with comprehensive documentation. If something hasn't been clear the support has been absolutely first class.
cons: Cons: The only issues for a small minority of Customers have been outside osConcert and within Paypal (our method of payment). The number of these problems is small and readily resolved and are as a result of Paypal wording on their screens, the links to Paypal from osConcert work well.
overall: Overall: Having made the decision to provide online ticketing for our annual arts festival for the first time in 30 years we needed a solution that was simple to use, both for administrators and customers and osConcert provided it.

title: Great ticketing software
name: Alain C.
pros:
Pros: - Features

- Stability

- Security
cons:
Cons: - Steep learning

- Install is not for novice users
overall: Overall: I've been using osconcert on several sites and the package is rocksolid and fully featured. The admin interface takes a little time to get used to but once you know where to find stuff possibilities are almost limitless. I've found support to be very prompt and to the point. Overall a great piece of software.

title: Value for Money and more
name: Roger T.
pros: Pros: The seating plan look and the simple selection of exactly the seats you want.
cons: Cons: The ticket printing facility
overall:
Overall: I have been using the osconcert ticketing software for a little over 3 years now and believe it is excellent value for money and backed up with almost immediate customer support. I have talked to many of our customers and have received many positive comments. The seating plan set up and look is the first thing that attracts people and it is easy to use for the average computer user. It is also easy to set up for a booking agent who can then sell hard copy tickets directly to the public. If I have one small negative comment it is the ticket printing which many people seem to struggle with so perhaps this could be looked at in the future. All of the background information storage is easy to access and making changes to the seating and editing is simple. The customer support from Gordon has been exceptional from the early days of my learning about the software right up to today and email responses are very quick when a problem needs to be solved.

Finally I would like to say I highly recommend osconcert to all businesses looking for value for money ticketing software.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: If you are looking for value for money ticketing software then look no further.

It was the perfect solution for the events we support and we have recently moved to electronic ticketing, which worked great! I STRONGLY recommend osConcert.

title: OsConcert software has provided us with the perfect tool for our seating-plan management needs.
name: Bernard W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: 1) Major benefit for us: seating plan customisation to the eccentricities of our venue was perfect
